Title: chalii aaj gorii piyaa kii nagariyaa
Lyrics: chalii aaj gorii piyaa kii nagariyaa 2 mangiyaa men sinduur odhe chunariyaa 2 chalii aaj gorii piyaa kii nagariyaa   dulaaron se paalii ye komal kalii sii 2 chhipii maan ke aanchal men jaisii darii sii wo hii aaj jaae paraaii nagariyaa 1  ankhiyon men aansuu hain saanson men aandhii 2 sajan se milan ko sajaniyaa hai jaatii nainon se tham tham ke barase badariyaa 2  chalii aaj gorii piyaa kii nagariyaa

Title: un se nazaren milii aur hijaab aa gayaa
Lyrics: un se nazaren milii aur hijaab aa gayaa zindagii men hasiin inqilaab aa gayaa  bekhabar the umar ke taqaazon se ham hamako maaluum na thaa aise bhii din aayenge aainaa dekhe to aap apane se sharamaayenge aaj jaanaa ki sach much shabaab aa gayaa  aankh jhukatii hai kyon saans rukatii hai kyon in savaalon ka khud se javaab aa gayaa  dil ke aane ko ham kis tarah rokate jisape aanaa thaa kaanaa kharaab aa gayaa

Title: kin ghadiyon mein priit lagaaii
Lyrics: kin ghadiyon mein priit lagaaii sehanii padii judaaii bachapan kaa wo pyaar bhulaa do main to huii paraaii  chalii re chalii re main to des paraaaye chalii re chalii re main to des paraaaye bhiigii bhiigii palakon mein pyaar chhupaaye chalii re chalii re main to  jalaaye the jo diip ab wo bujhaa do jalaaye the jo diip ab wo bujhaa do mere pyaar kaa har nishaan tak mitaa do sapanaa hii samajho sapanaa hii samajho jo sapane sajaaye chalii re chalii re main to des paraaaye bhiigii bhiigii palakon mein pyaar chhupaaye chalii re chalii re main to  huii aaj jhuuthii wo aapas kii kasamein huii aaj jhuuthii wo aapas kii kasamein karein haay kyaa ham jo kisamat na bas mein likhaa bhaag mein jo likhaa bhaag mein jo mite naa mitaaye chalii re chalii re main to des paraaaye bhiigii bhiigii palakon mein pyaar chhupaaye chalii re chalii re main to

Title: pahalii pahalii baar mile hain  achchhaa jii
Lyrics: ra 	pahalii pahalii baar mile hain do diivaane aa 	achchhaa jii ra 	ho jaaegaa pyaar kisii naa kisii bahaane aa 	achchhaa jii ra 	pahalii pahalii baar mile threedots  aa 	aankhon ne aankhon se milakar khole dil ke raaz ra 	mere dil ne tere dil kii samajhii hai aavaaz aa 	tumhiin socho tumhiin samajho aage kyaa hogaa ra 	pahalii pahalii baar mile threedots  ra 	baaton hii baaton men tuune chhede dil ke taar aa 	hansate hansate ham ye kaisaa kar baithe ikaraar ra 	chhodo jii pachhataanaa kaisaa huaa jo honaa thaa aa 	pahalii pahalii baar mile threedots  aa 	hamane tumase tumane hamase kah dii dil kii baat ra 	haath badhaakar haath milaa lo rahenge donon saath aa 	kyaa kar legii duniyaa dekhaa jaaegaa do 	pahalii pahalii baar mile threedots

Title: khulii palak men jhuuthaa gussaa band palak men pyaar
Lyrics: zaraa thaharo zaraa thaharo sadaa mere dil kii zaraa sunatii jaao  khulii palak men jhuuthaa gussaa band palak men pyaar jiinaa bhii mushkil haay maranaa bhii mushkil aankhon men ikaraar kii jhalkii hothon par inkaar jiinaa bhii mushkil haay maranaa bhii mushkil  jis din se dekhaa tumako tum lage mujhe apane se aur aake rahe aankhon men haay aur aake rahe aankhon men ik manachaahe sapane se samajh naa aaye kyaa jiitaa main aur gayaa kyaa haar jiinaa bhii mushkil haay maranaa bhii mushkil threedots  tum pyaar chhupaake haare main pyaar jataake haaraa ab to saarii duniyaa pe haay ab to saarii duniyaa pe zaahir hai haal hamaaraa pahunch ke is manzil pe lautanaa ab to hai dushwaar jiinaa bhii mushkil haay maranaa bhii mushkil threedots  ise merii baat na samajho kyaa banataa hai baat banaa ke kuchh kahanaa thaa mere dil kaa haay kuchh kahanaa thaa mere dil kaa jaataa huun vahii doharaa ke na ho yaqiin to padhakar dekho aankhon men ik baar jiinaa bhii mushkil haay maranaa bhii mushkil threedots

Title: bedardii mere saiyaan shabanam hain kabhii shole
Lyrics: bedardii mere saiyaan shabanam hain kabhii shole andar se bade zaalim baahar se bade bhole bedardii mere saiyaan threedots  matalab ke hain rasiyaa koii inhen kyaa samajhe ye kud bhii nahiin apane bas inako kudaa samajhe dam bhar men ye tolaa hain dam bhar men maashaa hain banate hain tamaashaaii aur kud hii tamaashaa hain rahrah ke badalate hain dinraat nae chole andar se bade zaalim threedots  har ik adaa mere baalam kii niraalii hai baaten mohabbat kii magar pyaar se khaalii hain aadat se hain bade chanchal suurat hai badii saadaa aaj isako diyaa kal usase kiyaa vaadaa harajaaii hain inase koii kyaa bole andar se bade zaalim threedots

Title: aake siidhii lagii dil pe jaise katariyaa o saanwariyaa oy
Lyrics: aake siidhii lagii dil pe jaise katariyaa o saanwariyaa oy hoy                        o terii tirachhii najariyaaa                        le gayii meraa dil terii julmii najariyaa o gujariyaa oy hoy hoy                        o jaane saarii nagariyaa                         chhed chhed jaate ho kyuun dil ke taar                        o saiyaan o saiyaan o saiyaan padun tore paiyaan                        merii galii aate ho kyuun baar baar                        chhed chhed jaate ho kyuun dil ke taar                        jo naa tujhe dekhun naa aaye qaraar                        o gorii o gorii o gorii bad ke budhan tiir vii takkar                        kyaa main karuun gorii mujhe tujhase hai pyaar                        jo naa tujhe dekhun naa aaye qaraar                        hato jaao haay haay naa banaao haay haay haay                        natakhat rangiile sanwariyaa                        aake siidhii lagii dil pe jaise katariyaa o saanwariyaa haay haay                        maan jaao varnaa machaa duungii shor                       bachaao o munai o murge o kauve                      piichhe pichhe aate ho kyuun dil ke chor                       maan jaao varnaa machaa duungii shor                       ab hamase kahtii ho chal piichhaa chhod                        o gorii o natakhat o khatapat o panaghat o jhatapat                        pahale to baandhii nigaahon ki dor                        ab hamase kahtii ho chal piichhaa chhod                       o tore nainnaa haay haay miithe bainnaa oy hoy                       mujhako banaa gaye baanwariyaa                       aake siidhii lagii dil pe jaise katariyaa o saanwariyaa oy hoy                       o terii tirachhii najariyaaa                        o jaane saarii nagariyaa male     o gujariyaa

Title: kabhii ruk gaye to
Lyrics: kabhii ruk gaye hain kabhii chal diye na jaane kise dhuundate hain safar me kise kho diyaa thaa na jaane dagar me na jaane kise dhuundate hain safar me  akele rahen zindagii bhar akele na dil saath aayaa na gam saath aaye yahii raasten jinakii manzil nahiin thii yahii saath the bas yahii saath aaye kabhii ruk gaye hain threedots  kabhii maang kar le liye gam kisii kii kabhii apane gam kar diye hain paraaye ye bedard yaaden ye hamdard aansuu badii duur tak chhodane saath aaye kabhii ruk gaye hain threedots  kinaaraa milaa jo kinaaraa nahiin thaa bahaanaa thaa koii sahaaraa nahiin thaa yahii ek dil jisako samajhe the apanaa na jaane thaa kisakaa hamaaraa nahiin thaa

Title: aaii hain bahaaren mite zulmositam
Lyrics: rafii aaii hain bahaaren mite zulmositam        pyaar kaa zamaanaa aayaa duur hue gam        raam kii lilaa rang laaii koras ahaa haa rafii shaam ne bansii bajaaii koras ahaa haahaa                            2  rafii chamakaa hai inasaaf kaa suuraj phailaa hai ujaalaa koras ujaalaa        chamakaa hai inasaaf kaa suuraj phailaa hai ujaalaa rafii naii umangen sang laayegaa har din aanevaalaa koras aanevaalaa        naii umangen sang laayegaa har din aanevaalaa rafii ho ho        munnaa giit sunaayegaa        tunnaa dhol bajaayegaa koras munnaa giit sunaayegaa tunna dhol bajaayegaa rafii sangsang merii chhotii munnii naachegii chhamchham  rafii  koras        aaii hain bahaaren mite zulmositam        pyaar kaa zamaanaa aaya duur hue gam        raam kii liilaa rang laaii koras ahaa haa rafii shaam ne bansii bajaaii koras ahaa haahaa  rafii ab na honge majabuurii ke is ghar men afasaane koras ab naa honge majabuurii ke is ghar men afasaane rafii pyaar ke rang men rang jaayenge sab apane begaane koras pyaar ke rang men rang jaayenge sab apane begaane rafii ho ho ho        sab ke din phir jaayenge        manzil apanii paayenge        jiivan ke taraane milake gaayenge haradam rafii  koras  male koras        ho        aaii hain bahaaren mite zulmositam        pyaar kaa zamaanaa aaya duur hue gam rafii  male koras        raam kii liilaa rang laaii koras ahaa haa rafii  male koras        shaam ne bansii bajaaii koras ahaa haahaa rafii  koras  m koras        aaaa        aaaa

Title: patthar ke sanam tujhe hamane muhabbat kaa khudaa jaanaa
Lyrics: patthar ke sanam tujhe hamane muhabbat kaa kudaa jaanaa badii bhuul huii are hamane ye kyaa samajhaa ye kyaa jaanaa  cheharaa teraa dil men liye chalate chale angaaron pe tuu ho kahiin sajade kiye hamane tere rukasaaron pe ham saa na ho koi diivaanaa patthar ke threedots  sochaa na thaa badh jaaengii tanahaaiyaan jab raaton kii rastaa hamen dikhalaaengii shamaaevafaa in aankhon kii thokar lagii phir pahachaanaa patthar ke threedots  ai kaash ke hotii kabar tuune kise thukaraayaa hai shiishaa nahiin saagar nahiin mandirsaa ik dil dhaayaa hai saaraa aasamaan hai viiraanaa patthar ke threedots

Title: maazandaraan maazandaraan
Lyrics: maazandaraan maazandaraan  2  mere vatan mere jahaan ai gulasitaan jannatnishaan   har phuul teraa ik chaman  har shaak hai naazuk dulhan  ai jaaneman ai jaaneman  sadaqe tere threedots  sadaqe tere ye jismojaan  maazandaraan  maazandaraan   zarre hain tere yaa guhar  padatii hai shaahon kii nazar  laalojawaahir is qadar  mumakin nahiin threedots  mumakin nahiin jinakaa bayaan  maazandaraan  maazandaraan   ik husn kii mahafil hai tuu  har shauq kii manzil hai tuu  ham aashiqon kaa dil hai tuu  har lab pe terii daastaan  maazandaraan maazandaraan

Title: mil gaii thandak nigaahon ko tere diidaar se
Lyrics: mil gaii thandak nigaahon ko tere diidaar se ho sake to aaj de aawaaz mujhako pyaar se  2  tujhase milii hai zindagii tuune ataa kii roshanii naqsh hain dil ke mere tasviir tere pyaar kii pyaar wo shay to nahiin jo mil sake baazaar se ho sake to aaj de aawaaz mujhako pyaar se  mil gaii mujhako zubaan shauq hai meraa jawaan daud kar tujhako bataauun main bhalaa jaauun kahaan sheikh nisbat hai mujhe tere darodiiwaar se ho sake to aaj de aawaaz mujhako pyaar se  lab pe hai mere duaa tuu yuun hii mahake sadaa taariikiiyaan bujhatii rahen jalataa rahe teraa diyaa log maangaa hii karen kusbhuu tere gulazaar se  ho sake to aaj de aawaaz mujhako pyaar se mil gaii thandak nigaahon ko tere diidaar se ho sake to aaj de aawaaz mujhako pyaar se

Title: hai bahaarebaageduniyaa chand roz
Film: bambai ka chor bombay ka chor
Lyrics: hai bahaarebaageduniyaa chand roz chand roz dekh lo isakaa tamaashaa chand roz chand roz hai bahaarebaage threedots  laakh daaraa aur sikandar ho gae 2 aaj bolo vo kahaan sab kho gae aaii hichakii maut kii aur so gae 2 har kisii kaa hai baseraa chand roz chand roz hai bahaarebaage threedots  kal talaq rangiin bahaaren thii jahaan aaj qabron ke vahaan dekhe nishaan rang badale har ghadii ye aasamaan 2 aishogam jo kuchh bhii dekhaa chand roz chand roz hai bahaarebaage threedots  kyaa milegaa dil kisii kaa tod ke le duaa tuute dilon ko jod ke jaa magar kuchh yaad apanii chhod ke 2 ho terii duniyaa men charchaa chand roz chand roz hai bahaarebaage threedots

Title: dil khush hai aaj unase mulaaqaat ho gayii
Lyrics: dil khush hai aaj unase mulaaqaat ho gayii go duur hii se baat huii baat ho gayii  unase hamaaraa koii taaalluq to ban gayaa bigade bhii vo agar to badii baat ho gayii  dhadakan badhii to saans kii khushabuu bikhar gayii aanchal udaa to rang kii barasaat ho gayii  jii chaahataa hai maan bhii len ab kudaa ko ham jisakaa yakiin na thaa vo qaraamaat ho gayii

Title: bikharaa ke zulfen chaman men na jaanaa
Lyrics: bikharaa ke zulfen chaman men na jaanaa    kyon is liye ki sharmaa na jaayen phuulon ke saaye muhabbat ke nagame tum bhii na gaanaa    kyon is liye ki bhanvaraa tumhaarii hansii na udaaye  muhabbat ke bhanvare kii pahachaan kyaa ye kaliyon se puuchho hamen kyaa pataa harjaaii hogaa ham to nahiin hain kahiin siikh lenaa na tum ye adaa zubaan par kabhii baat aisii na laanaa    kyon is liye ki duniyaan se rasmevafaa mit na jaaye  kaho saath doge kahaan tak meraa vahaan tak jahaan aasamaan jhuk rahaa bolo chalogii jo tum le chaloge kahiin raah men ho na jaanaa judaa meraa pyaar dekhegaa saaraa zamaanaa    kyon is liye ki vaade kiye aur kar ke nibhaaye

Title: ek thii ladakii merii sahelii
Lyrics: ek thii ladakii merii sahelii saath palii aur saath hii khelii phuulon jaise gaal the usake resham jaise baal the usake  ham usako gudiyaa kahate the rangon kii pudiyaa kahate the saarii thii mujhe pyaarii thii wo nanhiin raajakulaarii thii wo  ek din usane bholepan se puuchhaa ye paapaa se jaa ke ab main kush rahatii huun jaise sadaa hii kyaa kush rahuungii aise  paapaa bole merii bachchii baat bataauun tujh ko sachchii kal kii baat naa koii jaane kahate hain ye sabhii siyaane   ye mat socho kal kyaa hogaa jo bhii hogaa achchhaa hogaa  2  bachapan biitaa aaii jawaanii ladakii ban gaii ruup kii raanii bal khaatii laharaatii phiratii  ek sundar chanchal ladake ne chhupchhup kar chupakechupake se ladakii kii tasviir banaaii aur ye kah kar use dikhaaii  is par apanaa naam to likh do chhotaa saa paigaam to likh do ladakii pahale to sharamaaii phir man hii man men muskaaii  ik din usane bholepan se puuchhaa ye apane saajan se ab main kush rahatii huun jaise sadaa hii kyaa kush rahuungii aise  usane kahaa kii merii raanii itanii baat hai maine jaanii  kal kii baat naa koii jaane kahate hain ye sabhii siyaane   ye mat socho kal kyaa hogaa jo bhii hogaa achchhaa hogaa  3   uun huun 2  ik paradesii duur se aayaa ladakii par haq apanaa jataayaa ghar waalon ne haamii bhar dii paradesii kii marazii kar dii  pyaar ke waade huye naa puure rah gaye saare kaab adhuure chhod ke saathii aur hamasaaye chal dii ladakii des paraaye  do baanhon ke haar ne rokaa vaadon kii diiwaar ne rokaa ghaayal dil kaa pyaar pukaaraa aanchal kaa har taar pukaaraa  par ladakii kuchh munh se naa bolii patthar ban kar gair kii ho lii ab gumasum hairaan sii hai wo mujhase bhii anajaan sii hai wo  jab bhii dekho chup rahatii hai kahatii hai to ye kahatii hai  kal kii baat naa koii jaane kahate hain ye sabhii siyaane   ye mat socho kal kyaa hogaa jo bhii hogaa achchhaa hogaa  3

Title: dil lagaakar aapase pachhataa rahe hain jaaneman
Lyrics: dil lagaakar aapase pachhataa rahe hain jaaneman pyaar karane kii sazaa ham paa rahe hain jaaneman  aankh kuchh aisii ladii naukarii karanii padii aa gae baaton men ham dil men chhuutii phulajhadii haay ham to phans gae ghabaraa rahe hain jaaneman pyaar karane kii threedots  dil to pahale de diyaa dilabar apane ho chuke paas jo puunjii bachii haay vo bhii kho chuke 2 ham to apane haal par sharamaa rahe hain jaaneman pyaar karane kii threedots

Title: soch ke ye gagan jhuume abhii chaand nikal aaegaa
Lyrics: soch ke ye gagan jhuume abhii chaand nikal aaegaa  jhilamil chamakenge taare soch ke ye gagan jhuume  chaand jab nikal aaegaa dekhegaa na koi gagan ko  chaand ko hii dekhenge saare chaand jab nikal aaegaa   1 phuul jo khile naa to kaise baagon men aae bahaar  dip naa jale to saanvariyaa kaise mite andhakaar  raat dekho kitanii hai kaalii abhii chaand nikal threedots  2 chaand se bhii tum hasiin ho nazadiik aao zaraa  chaand ke nikalane talak to tum jagamagaao zaraa  raat dekho kitanii hai kaalii abhii chaand nikal threedots

Title: dil dhuundhataa hai sahaaresahaare
Lyrics: dil dhuundhataa hai sahaaresahaare 2 lute dil ke aramaan bujhe nain taare dil dhuundhataa hai threedots  ye kyaa daur aayaa ki badalii bahaaren hue gair vo bhii kise ham pukaaren vo kahate the hamase ki ham hain tumhaare dil dhuundhataa hai threedots  vafaa is jahaan men kahiin bhii na paaii huii duur manzil ghataa gam kii chhaaii hain kaajal se kaale ajab din hamaare dil dhuundhataa hai threedots  banii mere dil par ye tasviir terii tujhe phir na paayaa ye taqadiir merii nahiin koii apanaa rahe besahaare lute dil ke aramaan threedots

Title: apanii ulfat pe zamaane kaa  to kitanaa achchhaa hotaa
Lyrics: mu 	apanii ulfat pe zamaane kaa na paharaa hotaa 	to kitanaa achchhaa hotaa 2 la 	pyaar kii raat kaa koii na saveraa hotaa 	to kitanaa achchhaa hotaa 2 mu 	apanii ulfat pe threedots  	paas aakar bhii bahut duur bahut duur rahe 	ek bandhan men bandhe phir bhii to majabuur rahe 	merii raahon men na ulajhan kaa andheraa hotaa 	to kitanaa achchhaa hotaa 2  la 	dil mile aankh milii pyaar na milane paae 	baagabaan kahataa hai do phuul na khilane paaen 	apanii manzil ko jo kaanton ne na gheraa hotaa 	to kitanaa achchhaa hotaa 2  mu 	ajab sulagatii huii lakadiyaan hain jag vaale la 	milen to aag ugal den katen to dhuaan karen do 	apanii duniyaa men bhii sukh chain kaa pheraa hotaa 	to kitanaa achchhaa hotaa 2 	apanii ulfat pe threedots

Title: zindagii men aayaa tuufaan
Lyrics: zindagii men aayaa tuufaan 2 hue aaj sab paraae din ye kaise aae zindagii men threedots  phailii gamon kii siyaahii main huun meraa hamaraahii maangii na thii tujhase duniyaa maine mohabbaat chaahii pyaar banake aayaa tuufaan zindagii men threedots  yaad karegaa zamaanaa qismat kaa ye tadapaanaa hiiron ko thukaraane vaale chunate hain daanaa haay kaisaa aayaa tuufaan zindagii men threedots

Title: chalchalchal mere dil pyaar terii manzil
Lyrics: mu 	chalchalchal mere dil pyaar terii manzil 	jahaan pyaar mile diladaar mile vahiin chalchalchal 	chalchalchal mere dil threedots  jaa 	pade na phir pachhataanaa vahaan  mu 	jo bhii pade sab sah le chal unakii galii men pahale 	kahatii hai duniyaa aaj agar to tujhako diivaanaa kah le 	hans ke pukaare hansane de pyaare duniyaa to hai jaahil jaa 	an ra ra ra mu 	chalchalchal mere dil threedots  jaa 	palat chalo ghar baitho sunaa  mu 	baith ke gam kyon jhelen haathon men vo daaman le len 	karake nigaahen chaar zaraa taqadiir kii baazii khelen 	phir vahii main huun phir vahii tuu ho phir ho vahii mahafil jaa 	i i i i mu 	chalchalchal mere dil threedots

Title: ai dilarubaa nazaren milaa
Lyrics: ai dilarubaa ai dilarubaa ai dilarubaa nazaren milaa kuchh to mile gam kaa silaa ai dilarubaa threedots  ashqon kaa ik dariyaa bahaa pyaasaa thaa dil pyaasaa rahaa nazaren milaa nazaren milaa rahane na de koii gilaa ai dilarubaa threedots

Title: kaun apanaa kaun paraayaa
Lyrics: kaun apanaa kaun paraayaa 2 duniyaa kaa ye bhed abhii tak koii samajh nahiin paayaa  jiivan kii naiyaa men sabhii hain raahii ik manzil ke inhiin men man ke miit milenge inhiin men dushman dil ke kisii ke dil men bharii hai nafarat kisii men pyaar kii maayaa kaun apanaa threedots  bichhade log bhii mil jaate hain kabhiikabhii jiivan men kushii kii laharen bhii uthatii hain kisii ke dukhiyaa man men kabhii kisii ne khoyaa jag men kabhii kisii ne paayaa kaun apanaa threedots  koii muurakh ban ke begaanaa apanon ko thukaraae koii kisii kii kushii ke kaaran raste se hat jaae koii kinaaraa chhod ke dhuundhe tuufaanon kaa saayaa kaun apanaa threedots

Title: tum akele to kabhii baag men jaayaa na karo
Lyrics: ra   tum akele to kabhii baag men jaayaa na karo  2 	     aajakal phuul bhii dilawaale huaa karate hain 	     koii qadamon se lipat baithaa to phir 	     to phir kyaa hogaa  2        	      la   tum akele to kabhii baag men jaayaa na karo 	     aajakal kaliyaan badii shok huaa karatii hain 	     koii shokii pe utar aayii to phir 	     to phir kyaa hogaa  2 	     tum akele to kabhii baag men jaayaa na karo  ra   tum kabhii zulf ko chehare pe giraayaa na karo  2 	     baaz dilawaale bhii kamazor huaa karate hain 	     koii naagin jo samajh baithaa to phir 	     to phir kyaa hogaa  2 Title: daiiyaa re daiiyaa jashodaa maiiyaa isako sambhaal
Lyrics: daiiyaa re daiiyaa jashodaa maiiyaa isako sambhaal badaa natakhat hai tero nandalaal  paniyaa bharan ko jaane naa de jaauun to vaapas aane naa de raah naa chhode matakii phode maakhan le nikaal badaa natakhat hai threedots  jamunaa pe aisii bansii bajaaii tan men man men aag lagaaii niind churaaii raam duhaaii kiyaa buraa haal badaa natakhat hai threedots  priit binaa koii giit naa jaane priit kii lekin riit naa jaane birahaa kii maarii raadhaa bichaarii tadape kitane saal badaa natakhat hai threedots

Title: kaise din biite kaise biitii ratiyaa
Lyrics: haay kaise din biite kaise biitii ratiyaa piyaa jaane na haay  nehaa lagaa ke main pachhataaii saarii saarii rainaa nindiyaa na aaii jaan ke dekho mere jii kii batiyaa piyaa jaane na haay kaise din biite kaise biitii ratiyaa piyaa jaane na  rut matavaalii aa ke chalii jaaye man men hii mere man kii rahii jaaye khilane ko tarase nanhii nanhii kaliyaan piyaa jaane na haay kaise din biite kaise biitii ratiyaa piyaa jaane na  kajaraa na sohe gajaraa na sohe barakhaa na bhaaye badaraa na sohe kyaa kahuun jo puuchhe mose morii sakhiyaan piyaa jaane na haay kaise din biite kaise biitii ratiyaa piya jaane na

Title: joshejavaanii haay re haay
Lyrics: joshejavaanii haay re haay nikale jidhar se dhuum machaaye duniyaa kaa melaa main huun akelaa kitanaa akelaa huun main joshejavaanii haay re haay   threedots  shaam kaa rangiin shok nazaaraa aur bechaaraa ye dil dhuundh ke haaraa koii sahaaraa par na milii manzil joshejavaanii haay re haay   threedots  koii to hamase do baat karataa koii to kahataa halo ghar na bulaataa par ye to kahataa kuchh duur tak sang chalo joshejavaanii haay re haay   threedots  bekaar guzare ham is taraf se bekaar thaa ye safar ab darbadar kii khaate hain thokar raajaa jo the apane ghar joshejavaanii haay re haay   threedots

Title: mere jiivan saathii kalii thii main to pyaasii
Lyrics: mere jivan sathi kali thi main to pyasi tune dekha hui khil ke bahar mere jivan sathi threedots  masti nazar men kal ke khumar ki  mukhade pe lali hai piya tere pyar ki khushabu se tere tan men basa ke  laharae yun dali si tere gunagar ki mere jivan sathi threedots  kahan ka ujala abhi vahi rat hai gori gori bahon pe jaise tera hath hai chudi                           kanon men ab tak vahi teri bat hai mere jivan sathi threedots  tujhako main sajana bindiya ka pyar dun chunari ke rang se ghar ko sanvar dun zulfon ka gajara nainon ka kajal  tere nazarane hain tujh pe hi var dun mere jivan sathi threedots

Title: taaron se pyaare dil ke ishaare  aanaa hii hogaa tujhe
Lyrics: taaron se pyaare dil ke ishaare pyaase hain aramaan aa mere pyaare aanaa hii hogaa tujhe aanaa hii hogaa aanaa hii hogaa 2  dil tujhe yaad kare aur fariyaad kare pedon kii chhaanv tale  teraa intazaar kare  2 saanjhsakaare dil ye pukaare pyaase hain aramaan threedots  haaledil jaan le tuu hamako pahachaan le tuu ham koii gair nahiin  baat ye maan le tuu  2 ham hain bechaare duniyaa ke maare pyaase hain aramaan threedots

Lyrics: mu 	mahabuub mere mahabuub mere 2 	tuu hai to duniyaa kitanii hasiin hai 	jo tuu nahiin to kuchh bhii nahiin hai la 	mahabuub mere mahabuub mere 	tuu hai to duniyaa kitanii hasiin hai 	jo tuu nahiin to kuchh bhii nahiin hai 	mahabuub mere threedots  mu 	tuu ho to badh jaatii hai qiimat mausam kii 	ye jo terii aankhen hain sholaa shabanam sii 	yahiin maranaa bhii hai mujhako mujhe jiinaa bhii yahiin hai 	mahabuub mere threedots  la 	aramaan kisako jannat kii rangiin galiyon kaa 	mujhako teraa daaman hai bistar kaliyon kaa 	jahaan par hain terii baanhen merii jannat bhii vahiin hai 	mahabuub mere threedots  mu 	rakh de mujhako tuu apanaa diivaanaa kar ke la 	nazadiik aajaa phir dekhuun tujhako jii bhar ke mu 	mere jaise honge laakhon koii bhii tujhasaa nahiin hai 	mahabuub mere threedots la 	ho mahabuub mere threedots do 		mahabuub mere threedots

Title: haathon men haath honthon pe afasaane pyaar ke
Lyrics: aa 	haathon men haath honthon pe afasaane pyaar ke 2 	manzil ko apanii chal die diivaane pyaar ke 2 ra 	dil kii raahon men aajaa in nigaahon men aajaa 	ai mere dil kii duniyaa merii baanhon men aajaa  aa 	aisii madahoshii kyaa itanii betaabii kyaa hai 	saamane jab hai manzil phir tumhen zaldii kyaa hai ra 	rahrah ke chhalake jaate hain paimaane pyaar ke 	manzil ko apanii threedots do 	haathon men haath threedots  ra 	kab se diivaanaa thaa dil teraa paravaanaa thaa dil 	kar diyaa tujhape sadake teraa nazaraanaa thaa dil aa 	dil kaa afasaanaa kah ke pyaar kii dhun men rah ke 	main bhii huun khoiikhoii tum bhii ho bahakebahake do 	mastii men duube jaate hain mastaane pyaar ke 	manzil ko apanii threedots 	haathon men haath threedots

Title: hasiin ho tum kudaa nahiin ho tumhaaraa sazadaa nahiin karenge
Lyrics: hasiin ho tum kudaa nahiin ho tumhaaraa sazadaa nahiin karenge agar mohabbat men huqm doge to hansatehansate ye jaan bhii denge  samajhate ho kud ko jaane kyaa tum ki saarii duniyaa ko kaaq jaanaa guruur kaa sar jhukegaa ek din hansegaa tum par ye zamaanaa hameshaa ye din nahiin rahenge hasiin ho tum threedots  hamaarii nazaron kaa shuqr kiijie ki aasamaan par tumhen bithaayaa hamaare dil ko duaaen diijie ki dhadakanon men tumhen basaayaa bulandiyon se giroge tum bhii agar nigaahon se ham girenge hasiin ho tum threedots  hamaare jaise agar hain laakhon tumhaare jaise bhii kam nahiin hain jo patthar se phod len sar vo aur honge vo ham nahiin hain nahiin mohabbat men mar sake jo bhalaa vo jiikar hii kyaa karenge hasiin ho tum threedots

Title: tumhiin to merii puujaa ho
Lyrics: la 	tumhiin to merii puujaa ho haan tumhiin to merii puujaa ho 	tumhen dil men basaayaa hai ta 	tumhiin to merii duniyaa ho haan tumhiin to merii duniyaa ho 	tumhen dil se lagaayaa hai 	tumhiin to merii duniyaa threedots  la 	ibaadat hai nigaahon kii tumhiin ko dekhate rahanaa 	terii har baat ko sahanaa 	tumhiin to mere saathii ho tumhen apanaa banaayaa hai 	tumhiin to merii puujaa threedots  ta 	tamannaa hai in aankhon kii tumhaare hii nazaare hon 	jahaan dekhuun tumhen dekhuun hasiin jalave tumhaare hon 2 	tumhiin ne merii manzil ko bahaaron se sajaayaa hai 	tumhiin to merii duniyaa threedots  la 	tumhaare haath men hai ab hamaarii laaj kaa aanchal 	na bah jaae kahiin dekho hamaarii aankh kaa kaajal 2 ta 	tumhiin to merii duniyaa threedots la 	tumhiin to merii puujaa threedots

Title: piyaa tose nainaa laage re nainaa laage re jaane kyaa ho ab aage re
Lyrics: piyaa tose nainaa laage re nainaa laage re jaane kyaa ho ab aage re nainaa laage re piyaa tose nainaa laage re nainaa laage re  ho jag ne utaare ho dharatii pe taare par man meraa murajhaaye ho un bin aaii ho aisii divaalii milaneko jiyaa tarasaaye aa saajan paayal pukaare jhanaka jhan jhan jhanaka jhan jhan piyaa tose    piyaa tose nainaa threedots  bhor kii belaa suhaanii nadiyaa ke tiire bhar ke gagar jis ghadii main chaluun dhiire dhiire tum pe nazar jab aaii jaane kyon baj uthe kanganaa chhanaka chhan chhan chhanaka chhan chhan piyaa tose piyaa tose nainaa threedots  ho aa ho aai holii aai ho sab rang laai bin tere holii bhii na bhaae ho bhar pichakaarii ho sakhiyon ne maarii bhiigii morii saarii hay hay   tanbadan meraa kaanpe tharthar dhinaka dhin dhin dhinaka dhin dhin piyaa tose  piyaa tose nainaa threedots  raat ko jab chaand chamake jal uthe tan meraa main kahuun mat karo chandaa is galii kaa pheraa aanaa meraa saiyaan jab aae chamakanaa us raat ko jab  milenge tanman milenge tanman piyaa tose piyaa tose nainaa threedots piyaa    ho ho piyaa  chorus  threedots

Title: matavaalii naar thumak thumak chalii jaaye
Lyrics: matavaalii naar thumak thumak chalii jaaye in kadamon pe kis kaa jiyaa naa jhuk jaaye matavaalii naar threedots  phuul badan mukhadaa yuun damake baadal men jyon bijalii chamake giit sunaa ke tuu chham chham ke lalachaaye chhup jaaye aay haay matavaalii naar threedots  ye chanchal kajaraarii aankhen ye chitachor shikaarii aankhen gaii dil chiir kataarii ankhen muskaaye shaamaaye jhuk jaaye matavaalii naar threedots

Title: kaun hai jo sapanon men aayaa kaun hai jo dil men samaayaa
Lyrics: kaun hai jo sapanon men aayaa kaun hai jo dil men samaayaa lo jhuk gayaa aasamaan bhii ishq meraa rang laayaa o priyaa o priyaathreedots  zindagii ke har ik mod pe main giit gaataa chalaa jaa rahaa huun bekhudii kaa ye aalam na puuchho manzilon se badhaa jaa rahaa huun threedots  saj gaii aaj saarii dishaaen khul gaiin aaj jannat kii raahen husn jabase meraa ho gayaa hai mujhape padatii hain sabakii nigaahen threedots  jism ko maut aatii hai lekin ruuh ko maut aatii nahiin hai ishq raushan hai raushan rahegaa raushanii isakii jaatii nahiin hai threedots

Title: ham aapakii mahafil men bhuule se chale aae
Lyrics: ham aapakii mahafil men bhuule se chale aae 2 ho maaf kataa apanii gardish ke hain bahakaae ham aapakii mahafil men threedots  kabhii dekhaa thaa ik sapanaa unhen samajhe the ham apanaa paraae ho gae hain vo bichhad kar kho gae hain vo ham aapakii mahafil men threedots  ajab saa vo zamaanaa thaa vo dhokhaa bhii suhaanaa thaa magar ab yaad kyaa kiije bhalaa fariyaad kyaa kiije ham aapakii mahafil men threedots  gilaa karane se kyaa haasil nahiin chaahat ke main qaabil samajhanaa main thaa diivaanaa bhulaa denaa ye afasaanaa ham aapakii mahafil men threedots  na ab tujhako sataauungaa idhar mudakar na aauungaa main kar ke dil ke sau tukade bichhaa jaataa huun is dar pe ham aapakii mahafil men threedots

Title: gairon pe karam apanon pe sitam ai jaanevafaa ye zulm na kar
Lyrics: gairon pe karam apanon pe sitam ai jaanevafaa ye zulm na kar rahane de abhii thodaa saa dharam ai jaanevafaa ye zulm na kar ye zulm na kar gairon pe karam threedots  gairon ke thirakate shaanon par ye haath ganvaaraa kaise karen har baat ganvaaraa hai lekin ye baat ganvaaraa kaise karen ye baat ganvaaraa kaise karen mar jaaenge ham mit jaaenge ham ai jaanevafaa ye zulm na kar ye zulm na kar gairon pe karam threedots   ham bhii the tere manzuurenazar dil chaahaa to ab iqaraar na kar sau tiir chalaa siine pe magar begaanon se milakar vaar na kar begaanon se milakar vaar na kar bemaut kahiin mar jaaen na ham ai jaanevafaa ye zulm na kar ye zulm na kar gairon pe karam threedots   ham chaahanevaale hain tere yuun hamako jalaanaa thiik nahiin mahhfil men tamaashaa ban jaaen is darjaa sataanaa thiik nahiin is darjaa sataanaa thiik nahiin ai jaanevafaa ye zulm na kar ye zulm na kar gairon pe karam threedots

Title: ye duniyaa rahe naa rahe kyaa pataa
Lyrics: ye duniyaa rahe naa rahe kyaa pataa meraa pyaar tujhase rahegaa sadaa  sitaaron se bhii tuu hai pyaaraa mujhe kalejaa bhii maange to de duun tujhe bhatakane na duun paas koii balaa meraa pyaar tujhase rahegaa sadaa  pasiinaa bhii teraa giregaa jahaan bahaa duungii main kuun apanaa vahaan dikhaa duungii kyaa maan kii hai maamataa meraa pyaar tujhase rahegaa sadaa  maamataa  mamataa

Title: ek to suurat pyaarii aur uupar se ye naaz
Lyrics: bi kya banaa rahe ho  sh kashtii banaa rahaa huun  bi aur is kashtii men jaaoge kahaan  sh jahaan tak ye le jaaye tum saath dogii kyaa  bi tumhaaraa dil kyaa kahataa hai  sh are mere dil ki kyaa baat ye to bahut kuchh chaahataa hai b ki chi hai  yahaan har kisii ke dil ki chaahat puuri ho jati hai  bi isakaa javaab to dil hii de sakataa hai  sh kisakaa dil tumhaaraa ya meraa  bi savaal bahut tedhaa hai  sh magar javaab bahut sidhaa hai haan yaa naa  bi agar main naa kah duun to  sh aur agar main tumhaarii naa ko haan samajhuun to  bi agar tum aise hii meri har baat ka ultaa matalab nikaloge to main haan      kah duungii  sh are yahii to main sunanaa chaahataa thaa haa haa haa haa   r rafii a aashaa   r ek to suurat pyaarii aur uupar se ye naaz  dil lene ke taubaa ye kaise hain andaaz  a tumhi bataa do aijii kyaa sachchii hai ye baat  nili aankhon vale hote hain dhokhebaaz   r idhar ye nigaahen udhar vo ghataayen dil kyaa kare divaanaa  a ye baaten anjaani na jaanon main divaani tum hii zaraa samajhaanaa  r ek divaane ko kyaa samajhaayegaa divaanaa   r barasati bahaaren machalati phuhaaren uf ye samaa mastaanaa  a ye rimajhim paanii kare hai manamaanii dil bhii huaa begaanaa  r yahi to hai jii dil vaalon kaa zamaanaa   dono jidhar ham jaaen chaman khil jaaen hansaane lage ye nazaaren  dono jahaan pe ruk jaaen vahiin pe jhuk jaaen kyaa chaand kyaa sitaare  dono hai ishaare pe chale hamaare ye zamaanaa

Title: o niile parbaton kii dhaaraa
Lyrics: o niile parbaton kii dhaaraa  aayii dhuundhane kinaaraa badii duur se sab ko sahaaraa chaahiye koii hamaaraa chaahiye  phuul men jaise phuul kii khushabuu dil men hai yuun teraa baseraa dharatii se ambar tak phailaa chaahat kii baahon kaa gheraa o niile parbaton kii dhaaraa threedots  suuraj piichhe ghuume dharatii saanjh ke piichhe ghuume saveraa jis naate ne in ko baandhe vo naataa hai teraa meraa o niile parbaton kii dhaaraa threedots

Title: sajanavaa bairii ho gaye hamaar chithiyaa ho to har koii baanche
Lyrics: sajanavaa bairii ho gaye hamaar 2 chithiyaa ho to har koi baanche bhaag naa baanche koy karamavaa bairii ho gaye hamaar  jaae base parades sajanavaa sautan ke bharamaae 2 naa sandes naa koii khabariyaa rut aae rut jaae duub gae ham biich bhanvar men 2 karake solah paar sajanavaa bairii ho gaye hamaar  suunii sej god morii suunii maram naa jaane koy 2 chhatapat tadape priit bichaarii mamataa aansuu roe naa koii is paar hamaaraa 2 naa koii us paar sajanavaa bairii ho gaye hamaar  chithiyaa ho to

Title: unase bichhad ke jab ham roye to aise roye
Lyrics: unase bichhad ke jab ham roye to aise roye aankhon me jaise ashqon ke biij boye  2   aanaa bhii unakaa bhuule jaanaa bhii unakaa bhuule  2 sab kuchh bhulaa ke ab to baithe hain khoye khoye  unase bichhad ke jab ham roye to aise roye aankhon me jaise ashqon ke biij boye unase bichhad ke jab ham   kal thaa pyaar dil men ab daag rah gaye hain  2 guzaregii umr saarii ye daag dhoyedhoye  unase bichhad ke jab ham roye to aise roye aankhon me jaise ashqon ke biij boye unase bichhad ke jab ham

Title: chandansaa badan chanchal chitavan dhiire se teraa ye musakaanaa
Lyrics: chandansaa badan chanchal chitavan dhiire se teraa ye musakaanaa mujhe doshh na denaa jagvaalo  2 ho jaauun agar main diivaanaa chandansaa badan   ye kaam kamaan bhanven terii palakon ke kinaare kajaraare maathe par sinduurii suuraj honthon pe dahakate angaare saayaa bhii jo teraa pad jaae  2 aabaad ho dil kaa viiraanaa chandansaa badan   tan bhii sundar man bhii sundar tuu sundarataa kii muurat hai kisii aur ko shaayad kam hogii mujhe terii bahut zaruurat hai pahale bhii bahut main tarasaa huun  2 tuu aur na mujhako tarasaanaa chandansaa badan     chandansaa badan chanchal chitavan dhiire se teraa ye musakaanaa mujhe doshh na denaa jagvaalo  2 ho jaae agar dil diivaanaa chandansaa badan   ye vishaal nayan jaise niil gagan panchhii kii tarah kho jaauun main sarahaanaa jo ho terii baanhon kaa angaaron pe so jaauun main meraa bairaagii man dol gayaa  2 dekhii jo adaa terii mastaanaa chandansaa badan   tan bhii sundar man bhii sundar tuu sundarataa kii muurat hai kisii aur ko shaayad kam hogii mujhe terii bahut zaruurat hai pahale bhii bahut dil tarasaa hai  2 tuu aur na dil ko tarasaanaa chandansaa badan

Title: vo hasiin dard de do jise main gale lagaa luun
Lyrics: vo hasiin dard de do jise main gale lagaa luun vo nigaah mujhape daalo ki main zindagii banaa luun vo hasiin dard   jo main tumase maangatii huun zaraa apanaa haath de do mujhe aaj zindagii kii vo suhaag raat de do jise leke kuchh na maanguun aur maang men sajaa luun vo hasiin dard   merii aarazuu to dekho tumhen saamane bithaakar kabhii dil ke paas laakar kabhii dilarubaa banaakar koii daastaan sun luun koii daastaan sunaa luun vo hasiin dard   mainne pyaar ke alaavaa kabhii tumase kuchh na maangaa tumhen jaane kyaa samajhakar mainne har qadam pe chaahaa meraa aaj faisalaa hai tumhen hamasafar banaa luun vo hasiin dard

Title: gum sum saa ye jahaan
Lyrics: gii  o o o he   o o  gii  gum sum saa ye jahaan ye raat ye havaa he   ek saath aaj do dil dhadakenge dilrubaa do   gum sum saa ye jahaan ye raat ye samaa  he   dekho vo chaand badalii kii ot men chhupane lagaa gii  ye niil gagan bhii pyaar ke aage jhukane lagaa he   itanii hasiin gii  itanii shariir he   hai chaand kii ye adaa do   gum sum saa ye jahaan ye raat ye havaa  gii  ulfat men chuur duniyaa se duur ham aa hii gaye he   manzil ke paas ab to huzuur ham aa hii gaye gii  chaahat ke phuul he   dekhen na dhuul do   daalii se na ho judaa  do   gum sum saa ye jahaan ye raat ye havaa       ek saath aaj do dil dhadakenge dilrubaa       gum sum saa ye jahaan ye raat ye samaa

Title: ek jurm karake hamane chaahaa thaa muskuraanaa
Lyrics: ek jurm karake hamane chaahaa thaa muskuraanaa marane na de mohabbat jiine na de zamaanaa  ham betaalluqii kii rasmen nibhaa denge par tum na yaad karanaa par tum na yaad aanaa  ye sochakar bujhaa dii kud shamaa aarzuu kii shaayad ho roshanii men mushkil nazar milaanaa  jab ashk pii liye hain jab honth sii liye hain tab puuchhatii hai duniyaa mujhase meraa fasaanaa  ek jurm karake hamane chaahaa thaa muskuraanaa

Title: shamaa se koii kah de  sitaaro unase kahanaa
Lyrics: shamaa se koii kah de ki tere rahaterahate andheraa ho rahaa ki tum ho vahaan to milane ko yahaan patangaa ro rahaa  sitaaro unase kahanaa nazaaron unase kahanaa sazaa ho rahii ki tum ho vahaan to milane ko yahaan shamaa ro rahii sitaaro unase kahanaa threedots  tadapate pyaar ke hii diidaar magar diivaanaa hamen roke shamaa se koii aise jale jaise patange se judaa ho ke duhaaii detedete judaaii sahatesahate andheraa ho rahaa ki tum ho vahaan to milan ko yahaan patangaa ro rahaa shamaa se koii kah de threedots  bandhii zanjiir magar bepiir terii tasviir nahiin jaatii sitam kii baat sahen ham ghaat milan kii baat nahiin aatii ki aahen bharatebharate andheraa ho rahaa ki tum ho vahaan to milane ko yahaan patangaa ro rahaa sitaaro unase kahanaa threedots

Title: jhanana jhanana baaje
Lyrics: jhanana jhanana baaje baaje bichhuvaa baaje nanadii jaage kaise aauun mitavaa more  aaii dvaar pe jab se ye rain kajaraarii dekhuun pyaar ke sapane main birahaa kii maarii  2 mohe koii na dekhegaa chaaye rahegii andhiyaarii  jhanana jhanana baaje threedots  pa ga ga pa dha ga ga pa dha ni dha ni sa dha dha ni sa dha ni dha dha ga pa ga sa ni sa  kaise aaj manaauun meraa man nahiin maane kahe laaj sharm ke tuu chhod de bahaane 2 mohe tere tuu unakii hai baakii saaraa jag jaane  jhanana jhanana baaje threedots

Title: rahegaa ishq teraa  aa aa bhii jaa raat dhalane lagii
Lyrics: rahegaa ishq teraa kaak men milaake mujhe hue hain ibtedaa men ranj intehaa ke mujhe  aa aa bhii jaa raat dhalane lagii ho chaand chhupane chalaa ho aa aa bhii jaa  terii yaad men bekabar shamaa kii tarah raat bhar2 jalii aarzuu dil jalaa aa aa bhii jaa  sitaaron ne munh pherakar kahaa alvidaa hamasafar 2 chalaa kaaravaan ab chalaa aa aa bhii jaa  ufak par khadii hai sahar andheraa hai dil men idhar 2 vahii roz kaa silasilaa aa aa bhii jaa  raat dhalane lagii chaand chhupane chalaa ho aa aa bhii jaa

Title: ham tum yug yug se giit milan kaa
Lyrics: ham tum yug yug se ye giit milan kaa gaate rahe hain gaate rahenge ham tum jag men jiivan saathii banakar aate rahe hain aate rahenge ham tum   threedots  jab jab hamane jiivan paayaa teraa hii ruup sajaa sajanaa har baar tumhiin ne maang bharii tumhiin ne pahanaayaa kanganaa ham phuul bane yaa raakh hue par saath nahiin chhuutaa apanaa har baar tumhiin tum aan base in aankhon men banakar sapanaa ham tum   threedots  ham aaj kahen tumako apanaa tum bhii kisii roz paraaye the duniyaa samajhii ham bichhad gaye aise bhii zamaane aaye the lekin vo judaa honevaale ham nahiin hamaare saaye the ham tum   threedots

Lyrics: taqadiir kahaan le jaaegii maaluum nahiin lekin hai yaqiin aaegii manzil aaegii manzil taqadiir kahaan le threedots  pairon kii thakan kahatii hai thahar mushkil hai dagar lambaa hai safar par dil kahataa hai gardish bhii aakir to kahiin pahunchaaegii taqadiir kahaan le threedots  suurat pe merii tum mat jaao aur haal bhii meraa mat puuchho ab merii tabiiyat baaton se kuchh bhii na bahalane paaegii taqadiir kahaan le threedots

Lyrics: allaa allaa allaa vo le gayaa chaandii chhallaa 2 main bhii usakaa dil le luungii kal ko  inshaaallaa  2 allaa allaa threedots  haath ko jo thaamaa to kaanpane lagii main aag lagii tan men aur haanfane lagii main koii merii saanson se taar jhanajhanaae jaane ab kyaa hogaa ye sochane lagii main allaa allaa threedots  haay re sharam se phir laal huaa cheharaa laal bhii kuchh aisaa gulaal huaa cheharaa ban gaii musiibat ye phuul sii javaanii haal kyaa bataauun jo haal huaa meraa allaa allaa threedots  kaliyaan kunvaarii pahachaanatii hain jisako phuul bhii kahenge vo chor hai hamaaraa allaa allaa threedots

Title: phir aane lagaa yaad vohii pyaar kaa aalam
Lyrics: rafiiphir aane lagaa yaad vohii pyaar kaa aalam inakaar kaa aalam kabhii iqaraar kaa aalam phir aane lagaa yaad vohii pyaar kaa aalam ushaapyaar kaa aalam  rafiivo pahalii mulaaqaat men2 vo pahalii mulaaqaat men rangiin ishaare phir baaton hii baaton men vo takaraar kaa aalam phir aane lagaa yaad vohii pyaar kaa aalam ushaapyaar kaa aalam  rafii vo jhuumataa balakhaataa2 vo jhuumataa balakhaataa huaa sarekharaamaa  main kaise bhulaa duun terii rafataar kaa aalam phir aane lagaa yaad vohii pyaar kaa aalam ushaapyaar kaa aalam  rafii kab aaye the vo kab gaye2 kab aaye the vo kab gaye kuchh yaad nahiin hai aankhon men basaa hai vohii diidaar kaa aalam phir aane lagaa yaad vohii pyaar kaa aalam inakaar kaa aalam kabhii iqaraar kaa aalam ushaapyaar kaa aalam rafiipyaar kaa aalam ushaapyaar kaa aalam rafii haay pyaar kaa aalam

Lyrics: sajanaa sajanaa o sajanaa tere pyaar men main gaii kho sajanaa tere hii kaaran banii re jogan ab honaa hai jo bhii ho sajanaa  ko 	ab ye laagii chhuute naa ab ye bandhan tuute naa  milate hii nain gayaa chain merii raaton kaa chal gayaa jaaduu terii pyaar bharii baaton kaa 2 sajanaa sajanaa threedots ko 	ab ye laagii threedots  bairii papiihaa jab piiyuupiiyuu gaae re laage vo baan merii jaan chalii jaae re 2 sajanaa sajanaa threedots ko 	ab ye laagii threedots  duniyaa ke mele na akele dekh jaaenge tere hii sang piyaa rang saare bhaaenge 2 sajanaa sajanaa threedots ko 	ab ye laagii threedots

Title: pyaar kii raah dikhaa duniyaa ko roke jo nafarat
Lyrics: pyaar kii raah dikhaa duniyaa ko roke jo nafarat kii aandhii tumamen hii koii gautam hogaa tumamen hii koii hogaa gaandhii pyaar kii raah dikhaa threedots  tum badaloge ultii chaalen bigade hue zamaane kii 2 tum laaoge bahaar vaapas is ujade viiraane kii 2 dekh rahaa hai kvaab zamaanaa murdaa chaandsitaaron ke fikr karo kuchh tum duniyaa kii  bigadii baat banaane kii  2 pyaar kii raah dikhaa threedots  tumhen mohabbat karanii hai bhuukhe nange laachaaron se tumhen to hai insaaf maanganaa zulm ke thekedaaron se tumhen mitaane hain saare jhagade takt aur taajon ke tumhen bachaanii haii ye duniyaa  top tiir talavaaron se  2 pyaar kii raah dikhaa threedots  vaadaa karo ki tum naa tuufaanon se ghabaraaoge mehanat aur sachchaaii kii tum sadaa raah apanaaoge naii zindagii naii kushii kaa nayaa daur tum laaoge phir apanii jaan bhii tum  ik nayaa jahaan basaaoge  2 pyaar kii raah dikhaa threedots

Title: parbaton ke pedon par shaam kaa baseraa hai
Lyrics: ra parbaton ke pedon par shaam kaa baseraa hai     suramaii ujaalaa hai champaii andheraa hai      su donon vaqt milate hain do dilon kii suurat se     aasman ne khush hoke rang saa bikheraa hai      ra thahatethahare paanii men giit sarsaraate hain     bhiigebhiige jhonkon men khushabuon kaa deraa hai     parbaton ke pedon par threedots      su kyon na jazb ho jaaen is hasiin nazaare men     roshanii kaa jhuramat hai mastiyon kaa gheraa hai     parbaton ke pedon par threedots      ra ab kisii nazaare kii dil ko aarzuu kyon hai     jab se paa liyaa tum ko sab jahaan meraa hai  do jab se paa liyaa tum ko sab jahaan meraa hai     parbaton ke pedon par threedots

Title: itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazadaar
Lyrics: itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazadaar jitane ke aasamaan pe zarre hain beshumaar  tere sivaa na kisii ko laayaa nigaah men laakhon hasiin aaye jawaanii kii raah men sadiyon se kar rahaa thaa tumhaaraa hii intazaar itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazadaar jitane ke aasamaan pe taare hain beshumaar itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazdaar  mainne bhii tere vaasate kitane janam liye jab dil ke raaston pe jale pyaar ke diye ek din zaruur paauungii itanaa thaa aitabaar itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazadaar jitane ke is zamiin pe jharane hain beshumaar itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazadaar  bekud banaa diyaa mujhe tere qaraar ne jannat agar mile to na luun tere saamane ye pyaar wo nashaa hai ki jisakaa nahiin utaar itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazadaar jitane ke aasamaan pe taare hain beshumaar itanaa hai tumase pyaar mujhe mere raazadaar

Title: dhiire chal ai bhiigii havaa
Lyrics: dhiire chal  2 ai bhiigii havaa ke mere bulabul kii hai niind javaan ke kahiin laage naa kisii kii use badanazar ke miithe sapanon men kho gaii hai bekabar dhiire chal ai bhiigii threedots  cheharaa kahiin hai zulfen kahiin hain hosh kahaan hai bhalaa  is bahaar men  2 kaliyon se kah de aaj na chataken champaakalii hai soii  intazaar men 2 are ho kitanii dilakashii chhaaii hai bekudii haay merii bebasii dhiire chal ai bhiigii threedots  pyaar kaa bhanvaraa kahataa hai tujhe aisii fizaa men  raaganii na gaa  2 niind ke saagar tuut na jaaen merii qasam tujhe  shor na machaa  2 are ho baadal bade pahare hain khade dil bhii kyaa kare dhiire chal ai bhiigii threedots  maujen rukii hain shaakhen jhukii hain kaise sunaae koii  dil ke raaz ko  2 are ho ashq chuum luungaa bin pie dil use nazar duungaa dhiire chal ai bhiigii threedots

Title: dhol bajaa dhol dhol jaaniyaa  zindagii ke saaz pe naacho
Singer: mukesh mahendra kapoor usha timothi hemlata
Lyrics: dhol bajaa dhol dhol jaaniyaa zindagii ke saaz pe naacho sabhii jhuum ke ban jaaen pyaar kii kahaaniyaan dhol bajaa threedots  zindagii terii to ik chhapii huii kitaab hai jisamen tere len den kaa sabhii hisaab hai apane dil ke aaiine men jhaank aur dekh le khud hii ik savaal hai to khud hii ik javaab hai dekh zaraa dekh zaraa dil kii meharabaaniyaan zindagii ke saaj pe threedots  saaz vo ki jisase sadaa aae sadaa pyaar kii phuul vo ki jisape khud fidaa ho rut bahaar kii jisakaa mol hai use to har koii kariid le jisakaa koii mol nahiin vo khushii hai pyaar kii pyaar se pyaar se sajaa lo tum javaaniyaan zindagii ke saaj pe threedots  paanv naachane lage hain jhuumane lagii nazar dil machal rahaa hai aane vaane kal kii sochakar der se sahii chalo vo raah par to aa gae aaj hamakhyaal bane kal banenge hamasafar pyaar kii pyaar kii yahii hain kyaa nishaaniyaan zindagii ke saaj pe threedots

Title: nasiib men jisake jo likhaa thaa vo terii mahafil men kaam aayaa
Lyrics: nasiib men jisake jo likhaa thaa vo terii mahafil men kaam aayaa kisii ke hisse men pyaas aaii kisii ke hisse men jaam aayaa  main ik fasaanaa huun bekasii kaa ye haal hai merii zindagii kaa na husn hii mujhako raas aayaa na ishq hii mere kaam aayaa nasiib men threedots  badal gaiin terii manzilen bhii bichhad gayaa main bhii kaaravaan se terii muhabbat ke raaste men na jaane ye kyaa makaam aayaa nasiib men threedots  tujhe bhulaane ki koshishen bhii tamaam naakaam ho gaii hain kisii ne zikrevafaa kiyaa jab zubaan pe teraa hii naam aayaa nasiib men threedots

Title: yuun ruutho naa hasiinaa merii jaan pe ban jaaegii
Lyrics: yuun ruutho naa hasiinaa merii jaan pe ban jaaegii merii jaan pe ban jaaegii yuun ruutho naa hasiinaa  karate na jo bahaanaa nazadiik kaise aate ye faasalaa ye duurii ham kis tarah mitaate haathon men tum na lete jab haath hii hamaaraa is beqaraar dil ko milataa kahaan sahaaraa 2 haay yuun ruutho naa threedots  ye baal bikharebikhare gaalon pe yuun na hote ye naag kaalekaale phuulon men yuun na sote ye raat kaa andheraa din se gale na milataa ulfat kaa shok gunchaa aise na dil men khilataa 2 haay yuun ruutho naa threedots  aao kariib aao palakon pe baith jaao aankhon men jhuum jaao dil men mere samaao ab muskaraa ke kah do ham to kafaa nahiin hain ek dil hai ek jaan hai hamtum judaa nahiin hain 2 haay yuun ruutho naa threedots

Lyrics: laalii laalii doliyaa men laalii re dulhaniyaa piyaa kii piyaarii bholii bhaalii re dulhaniyaa  laalii laalii doliyaa men laalii re dulhaniyaa miithe bain tiikhe nainon vaalii re dulhaniyaa  lautegii jo godii bhar hamen naa bhulaanaa ladduu pedhe laanaa apane haathon se khilaanaa terii sab raaten hon diivaalii re dulhaniyaa  duulhe raajaa rakhanaa jatan se dulhan ko kabhii na dukhaanaa tuu goriyaa ke man ko naazuk hai naazon kii hai paalii re dulhaniyaa

Lyrics: chhamchham ghungharuu bole dekho chhamchham ghungharuu bole raadhaa laaj kii maarii itut dole dekho chhamchham ghungharuu bole   baat chale to aanchal dhalake pagpag ruupgagariyaa chhalake  2 kanchan kaayaa jhilamil jhalake khaay kamariyaa hichakole  dekho chhamchham ghungharuu bole 2  ma ga ma ga sa ga ni dha ma ni sa ni dha ni sa ni dha ma  ga ma dha ga ma dha ni sa 3  palpal badhatii jaaye ulajhan paar kare kaise gharaangan jaan kii dushman ban kii jhaanjhan bhed jiyarawaa ke khole  dekho chhamchham ghungharuu bole  aa aa aa aa aa  pii bin aise tadape gorii bin chandaa jis tarah chakorii  2 jaayegii milane choriichorii saasnanadiyaa jab so le  dekho chhamchham ghungharuu bole 2

Title: saat samundar paar ke gudiyon ke baazaar se

Lyrics: saat samundar paar ke gudiyon ke baazaar se achchhii sii gudiyaa laanaa gudiyaa chaahe naa laana pappaa jaldii aa jaanaa  1 tum pardes gae jab se    bas ye haal huaa tab se    dil diivaanaa lagataa hai    ghar viiraanaa lagataa hai    jhilamil chaand sitaaron ne    daravaazon diivaaron ne    sabane puuchhaa hai ham se    kab jii chhuutegaa gam se    kab jii chhuutegaa gam se    kab hogaa unakaa aanaa pappaa   2 maan bhii lorii nahiin gaatii    ham ko niind nahiin aatii    khel khilaune tuut gae    sangii saathii chhuut gae    jeb hamaarii khaalii hai    aur baasii diivaalii hai    ham sabako naa tadapaao    apane ghar vaapas aao    apane ghar vaapas aao    aur kabhii phir naa jaanaa pappaa   3 kat naa samajho taar hai ye    kaagaz nahiin hai pyaar hai ye    duurii aur itanii duurii    aisii bhii kyaa majabuurii    tum koii naadaan nahiin    tum isse anajaan nahiin    is jiivan ke sapane ho    ek tumhiin to apane ho    ek tumhiin to apane ho    saaraa jag hai begaanaa pappaa

Lyrics: chalo achchhaa huaa tum bhuul gaye 2 ek bhuul thaa meraa pyaar ho saajanaa  chalo achchhaa huaa tum bhuul gaye 2   main samajhuungii baaware nayanaa dekh rahe the sapane ho dekh rahe the sapane  2 kho kar sab kuchh khoyaa bhaag men thaa ye apane  chalo achchhaa huaa tum bhuul gaye ek bhuul thaa meraa pyaar ho saajanaa chalo achchhaa huaa tum bhuul gaye  man bagiyaa men aag bharii thii phuul kahaan se khilate ho phuul kahaan se khilate ek nadii ke do the kinaare kaise bhalaa phir milate  chalo achchhaa huaa tum bhuul gaye ek bhuul thaa meraa pyaar ho saajanaa chalo achchhaa huaa tum bhuul gaye 2
