Lyrics: na main dhan chaahuun na ratan chaahuun tere charanon kii dhuul mil jaaye to main tar jaauun haan main tar jaauun he raam tar jaauunthreedots  moh man mohe lobh lalachaaye kaise kaise ye naag laharaaye isase pahale ki man udhar jaaye main to mar jaauun haan main mar jaauun he raam mar jaauun  tham gayaa paanii jam gayii kaayii bahatii nadiyaa hii saaf kahalaayii mere dil ne hii jaal phailaaye ab kidhar jaauun main kidhar jaauun  2 ab kidhar jaauun main kidhar jaauunthreedots  laaye kyaa the jo leke jaanaa hai nek dil hii teraa khazaanaa hai shaam hote hi panchhii aa jaaye ab to ghar jaauun apane ghar jaauun ab to ghar jaauun apane ghar jaauunthreedots

Title: kiye apane haathon se  mohabbat men saaraa jahaan
Lyrics: kiye apane haathon se terii tasviir ke tukade nahiin tasviir ke tukade ye hain taqadiir ke tukade  mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai  mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai zamiin jal gaii aasamaan jal gayaa hai  2 mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai  shaguufaa khilegaa na koii chaman men 2 ki hansataa huaa gulasitaan jal gayaa hai  mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai zamiin jal gaii aasamaan jal gayaa hai mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai  na manzil hai koii na koii thikaanaa 2 chaman lut gayaa aashiyaan jal gayaa hai  mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai zamiin jal gaii aasamaan jal gayaa hai mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai  zubaan par na laanaa tuu naamemohabbat 2 muhabbat kaa naamonishaan jal gayaa hai  mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai zamiin jal gaii aasamaan jal gayaa hai mohabbat men saaraa jahaan jal gayaa hai

Title: aap se pyaar huaa jaataa hai
Lyrics: aap se pyaar huaa jaataa hai khel dushvaar huaa jaataa hai  tumane kyon pyaar se dekhaa mujhako    2 dard bezaar huaa jaataa hai  is tamanna men ki tum doge sazaa tum doge sazaa dil gunaahagaar huaa jaataa hai  dil jo har qaid se ghabaraataa thaa ghabaraataa thaa kud hii giraftaar huaa jaataa hai

Title: ajii qiblaa mohataramaa kabhii sholaa kabhii nagmaa
Lyrics: ajii qiblaa mohataramaa kabhii sholaa kabhii nagmaa is aap ke andaaz kaa haay kyaa kahanaa ajii qiblaa mohataramaa threedots      uf ye gussaa kaalii aankhen ho rahii hain gulaabii aapakii to ye adaa hai har kisii kii karaabii are re re re maine tumhen dekhaa sirf dekhaa maanie kahanaa 2 ajii qiblaa mohataramaa threedots  aarazuu thii chand lamhen yuun hii chalatephirate betakalluf ho ke tumase chand baaten karate tum jo hasiin the dil ne chaahaa saath hii rahanaa 2 ajii qiblaa mohataramaa threedots

Title: hamadam mere maan bhii jaao
Lyrics: ho  hamadam mere maan bhii jaao kahanaa mere pyaar kaa   are halkaahalkaa surkh labon pe rang to hai iqaraar kaa  2 are hamadam mere  hoy pyaar muhobbat kii havaa pahale chalati hai phir ik lat inakaar kii rukh pe dhalati hai  2 ye sach hai kam se kam tuu ai mere sanam laten chehare se sarakaao tamannaa aankhe malati hai  haay hamadam mere   haay tumase milmil ke sabaa duniyaa mahakaaye badal ne chorii kiye anchal ke sang   2  ye sach hai kam se kam tuu ai mere sanam churaa luun main bhii do jalave meraa aramaan bhii rah jaaye  haay hamadam mere

Title: itanii badii duniyaa jahaan itanaa badaa melaa
Lyrics: itanii badii duniyaa jahaan itanaa badaa melaa magar main hn han han  kitanaa akelaa  2  ai dil ghadii bhar to mil ke karen baaten 2 katatii nahiin aise tanhaa merii raaten sabako milaa saathii bhii aaii milan belaa magar main kitanaa akelaa threedots  guzare dilon kaa hai dhundhalaa nishaan baaqii 2 dil to bujhaa kabase ab hai dhuaan baaqii dukhate hue dil pe bhalaa kyaakyaa nahiin jhelaa magar main kitanaa akelaa threedots

Title: main kushanasiib huun mujh ko kisii kaa pyaar milaa
Lyrics: main kushanasiib huun mujh ko kisii kaa pyaa milaa badaa hasiin mere dil kaa raazadaar milaa main kushanasiib huun  hai dil men pyaar zubaan chup jhukii jhukii nazaren ajab adaa se koii aaj pahalii baar milaa main kushanasiib huun  kisii ko paake mere dil kaa haal mat puuchho ki jaise saare zamaane pe iktiyaar milaa main kushanasiib huun  kisii ne puure kiye aaj pyaar ke vaade merii vafaa kaa silaa mujh ko shaanadaar milaa main kushanasiib huun  mere chaman kaa har ek phuul muskuraane lagaa vo kyaa mile mujhe mausamebahaar milaa main kushanasiib huun

Title: o basantii pavan paagal naa jaa re naa jaa roko koii
Film: jis desh mein gangaa behti hai
Lyrics: o basanti pavan pagal na ja re na ja roko koi o basanti threedots  ban ke patthar ham pade the suni suni rah men ji uthe ham jab se teri banh ai banh men bah uthe nainon ke kajal na ja re na ja roko koi o basanti threedots  yad kar tune kaha tha pyar se sansar hai ham jo hare dil ki baji ye teri hi har hai sun ye kya kahati hai payal na ja re na ja roko koi o basanti threedots

Title: ab do dilon kii mushkil aasaan ho gaii hai
Lyrics: ra 	ab do dilon kii mushkil aasaan ho gaii hai 	duniyaa ko mohabbat kii pahachaan ho gaii hai la 	ab pyaar kii har manzil aasaan ho gaii hai 	aapas men do dilon kii pahachaan ho gaii hai  ra 	is raaste se guzaraa ik din koii bechaaraa 	naa jaane kis adaa se tumane use pukaaraa 	aisaa kiyaa ishaaraa kuchh soch ke bechaaraa 	vo ho gayaa tumhaaraa 	duniyaa bhii dekhakar ye hairaan ho gaii hai  la 	kab se tumhaarii kaatir ham raah men pade the 	ik roz phir ye dekhaa tum saamane khade the 	aisii nazar milaaii duniyaa mujhe bhulaaii 	kuchh soch bhii na paaii 	jaise ki ruuh merii bejaan ho gaii hai  ra 	milanaa thaa jinako ab vo diivaane mil gae hain la 	terii daastaan se mere afasaane mil gae hain ra 	ab ek hii kahaanii ab ek hii fasaanaa 	ab ek hii taraanaa la 	do jism to hain lekin ik jaan ho gaii hai

Title: mujhe tum mil gae hamadam sahaaraa ho to aisaa ho
Lyrics: mujhe tum mil gae hamadam sahaaraa ho to aisaa ho jidhar dekhuun udhar tum ho nazaaraa ho to aisaa ho mujhe tum mil gae threedots  kisii kaa chaand saa cheharaa nazar se chuum letii huun 2 kushii kii intahaan ye hai nashe men jhuum letii huun 2 huii taqadiir bhii roshan sitaaraa ho to aisaa ho jidhar dekhuun udhar threedots  udhar dil hai idhar jaan hai ajab mushkil kaa saamaan hai 2 labon par muskaraahat hai magar saanson men tuufaan hai 2 ye main jaanuun yaa tum jaano ishaaraa ho to aisaa ho jidhar dekhuun udhar threedots

Title: raat kaa samaa jhuume chandramaa
Lyrics: aayaa na koii aise yahaan chham se na hogaa o kaam kiyaa hamane vo rustam se na hogaa  raat kaa samaa jhuume chandramaa  tan moraa naache re jaise bijuriyaa	2 raat kaa samaa threedots  dekho dekho dekho huun nadii pyaar kii suno suno suno baandhe nainaa bandhii main alabelii maan lo badii ziddii 2 maane mujhako jahaan raat kaa samaathreedots  naachuun naachuun naachuun moranii baag kii doluun doluun doluun hiraniyaa madabharii ghuungar baaje chhmaachham 2 raat kaa samaathreedots  dhiire dhiire dhiire jiit merii huii haule haule haule haar terii huii terii tarah jaa re jaa bahut dekhe 2 mujhasaa koii kahaan raat kaa samaathreedots

Title: raahii tuu mat ruk jaanaa tuufaan se mat ghabaraanaa
Lyrics: raahii tuu mat ruk jaanaa tuufan se mat ghabaraanaa kabhii to milegii terii manzil kahiin duur gagan kii chhaon men  maanaa ki gaharii hai dhaaraa par hai kahiin to kinaaraa tuu bhii milaa aashaa ke sur men man kaa ye ekataaraa kabhii to milegii terii manzil kahiin duur gagan kii chhaon men  sabakaa hai uuparavaalaa sabako usii ne sambhaalaa jab bhii ghire gam kaa andheraa usane kiyaa ujiyaalaa kabhii to milegii terii manzil kahiin duur gagan kii chhaon men  raahii tuu mat ruk jaanaa tuufan se mat ghabaraanaa kabhii to milegii terii manzil kahiin duur gagan kii chhaon men kahiin duur kahiin duur kahiin duur kahiin duur

Title: dil ke aaiine men tasviir terii rahatii hai
Lyrics: dil ke aaiine men tasviir terii rahatii hai main ye samajhaa koii jannat kii parii rahatii hai dil ke aaiine men threedots  sharabatii aankhen terii zindagii bhar kaa nashaa dil kii dhadakan hai merii terii paayal kii sadaa ai jaanevafaa dil ke aaiine men threedots  sochataa huun main kabhii kyaa tujhe bhii hai kabar ki terii ek nazar hai merii shaamosahar tuu bahaaron kaa hai dil tuu nazaaron kaa jigar ai jaanevafaa dil ke aaiine men threedots  husnemaasuum teraa kabhii magaruur na ho apanii taariif tujhe kabhii manzuur na ho ishq vaalon se jafaa teraa dastuur na ho ai jaanevafaa dil ke aaiine men threedots

Title: aap ko pyaar chhupaane kii burii aadat hai
Lyrics: aap ko pyaar chhupaane kii burii aadat hai aap ko pyaar jataane kii burii aadat hai  aap ne siikhaa hai kyaa dil ke lagaane ke sivaa aap ko aataa hai kyaa naaz dikhaane ke sivaa aur hamen naaz uthaane kii burii aadat hai threedots  kis liye aap ne sharamaa ke jhukaa lii aankhen is liye aap se ghabaraa ke bachaa lii aankhen aap ko tiir chalaane kii burii aadat hai threedots  ho chukii hai der bas ab jaaiyegaa jaaiyegaa bandaa paravar zaraa thodaa saa kariib aaiyegaa aap ko paas na aane kii burii aadat hai threedots

Title: tumhaarii mast nazar gar idhar nahiin hotii
Lyrics: tumhaarii mast nazar agar idhar nahiin hotii nashe men chuur fizaa is qadar nahiin hotii  tumhiin ko dekhane kii dil men aarazuuen hain tumhaare aage hii aur uunchii nazar nahiin hotii  kafaa na honaa agar badh ke thaam luun daaman ye dil fareb kataa jaan kar nahiin hotii  tumhaare aane talak ham ko hosh rahataa hai phir us ke baad hamen kuchh khabar nahiin hotii

Title: yahii hai tamannaa tere dar ke saamane
Lyrics: yahii hai tamannaa tere dar ke saamane merii jaan jaae merii jaan jaae haay yahii hai tamannaa threedots  tere dar pe aayaa to bas aa gayaa main na piichhe hatuungaa zamaane ke dar se zaraa dekh luun main ye ruk kii bahaaren ye qad pyaaraapyaaraa ye zulfon ke saae haay yahii hai tamannaa threedots  gilaa hai mujhako tere kudaa se hasiin jisane itanaa banaayaa hai tujhako na aataa kabhii terii galiyon men zaalim tere husn ne khud bulaayaa hai mujhako jalaakar koii shammaa kaise kahegaa ke dekho yahaan par naa paravaanaa aae haay yahii hai tamannaa threedots  muhabbat men terii agar maut aae to vo maut kitanii hasiin maut hogii kisii roz main teraa daaman pakadakar jo mar jaauun kyaa dilanashiin maut hogii kabhii aisii koii ghadii aa rahii ho to merii duaa hai vo jaldii se aae haay yahii hai tamannaa threedots

Title: sulajhaao na ulajhii zulfon ko ham ulajhan men
Lyrics: mu 	sulajhaao na ulajhii zulfon ko 	ham ulajhan men pad jaate hain 	sulajhaao na ulajhii threedots aa 	yuun dekh ke ulajhii nazaron se 	kyuun aap hamen ulajhaate hain mu 	sulajhaao na ulajhii threedots  	ham duub rahe hain mastii men aise men palaken jhapakaanaa aa 	dar hai aankhon men ban jaae na koii afasaanaa mu 	ye pal to guzar jaate hain magar 	afasaane hii rah jaate hain 	sulajhaao na ulajhii threedots  aa 	in bahakii baaton se dekho jii hamen na bahakaao mu 	muddat se yuun hii tadapate hain ab aur hamen naa tadapaao aa 	ham pyaar kii lambii raahon pe 	chalane se bhii ghabaraate hain mu 	sulajhaao na ulajhii threedots

Title: ham jab chalen to ye jahaan jhuume
Lyrics: ham jab chalen to ye jahaann jhuume aarazuu hamaarii aasamaan ko chuume o ho ho ham jab chalen threedots  ham nae jahaan ke paasabaan ham naii bahaar ke raazadaan ham hansen to hans pade har kalii ham chalen to chal pade zindagii saare nazaaron men phuulon men taaron men hamane hii jaaduu bharaa ham jab chalen threedots  hamase hai fizaaon men rangobuu hamase hai is zamiin kii aabaruu nadiyon kii raaginii hamase hai har taraf ye taazagii hamase hai saare nazaaron men threedots  duur ho gaiin sabhii mushkilen khinch ke paas aa gaiin manzilen dekhakar shabaab ke hausale khudbakhud simat gae faasale saare nazaaron men threedots

Title: koii sone ke dilavaalaa koii chaandii ke dilavaalaa
Lyrics: koii sone ke dilavaalaa koii chaandii ke dilavaalaa shiishe kaa hai matavaale meraa dil mahafil ye nahiin terii diivaane kahiin chal  hain to sanam lekin patthar ke sanam yahaan pyaar vaalii naramii adaaon men kahaan honthon se dekh inake takaraae na teraa pyaalaa koii sonethreedots  kyaa jaaniye kahaan se aatii hai kaanon men sadaa ai diivaane gam teraa sab se judaa is mahafil se uthaa dil na bahalegaa ye matavaalaa koii sonethreedots

Title: aaj kii mulaakaat bas itanii
Lyrics: f aaj kii mulaakaat bas itanii  kar lenaa baaten kal chaahe jitanii  m achchhii nahiin hoti hai zid itanii  dekho hamen tumase hai priit kitanii   f pyaar jo kiyaa hai jataate ho kyuun  baat aisii hothon pe laate ho kyuun  m aur ham jo puuchhen sataate ho kyuun  abhii abhii aaye abhii jaate ho kyuun   m kabhii kabhii aise bhii aayaa karo  chaand nikale to ghar jaayaa karo  f aayenge jaayenge marazii se ham  pyaar hai to naaz bhi uthaayaa karo   m thaharo main dil ko sambhaaluun zaraa  palakon men tumako chhupaa luun zaraa  f samajhe na ab tak mohabbat hai kyaa  aao tumhe ye bhii samajhaa duun zaraa

Title: chekhush nazaare ke khud pukaare hai
Lyrics: chekhush nazaare  2 ke khud pukaare hai yaar kii manzil  gulon kii vaadii sabaa kii bastii galii bahaaron kii nigaah ko thii talaash kab se inhiin nazaaron kii ki bekhudii men nikal padaa hai uthaa ke saazedil chekhush nazaare threedots  ye vo mahal hai karake dariichaa hai aasamaan jisakaa ye vo hai chilaman ki jisake piichhe hai vo hasiin qaatil chekhush nazaare threedots

Title: kaabe men raho  chaahe yah maano wo maano
Lyrics: ba 	kaabe men raho yaa kaashii men  	haan 	nisbat to usii kii zaat se hai ma 	haan 	tum raam kaho ke rahiim kaho 	matalab to usii kii baat se hai do 	matalab to usii kii baat se hai  ba	ye masjid hai wo butakhaanaa 2 do 	chaahe ye maano chaahe wo maano 2 	maano ye maano chaahe wo maano  ba	ye masjid hai wo butakhaanaa 	chaahe ye maano chaahe wo maano ma	bhaii 	makasad to hai dil ko samajhaanaa 2 do 	maano ye maano chaahe wo maano  ba 	ye masjid hai wo butakhaanaa ko 	ye masjid hai wo butakhaanaa ma 	makasad to hai dil ko samajhaanaa ko 	makasad to hai dil ko samajhaanaa ma 	ye masjid hai wo butakhaanaa 	makasad to hai dil ko samajhaanaa ko 	chaahe ye maano chaahe wo maano 2   haan ye shekobarahaman ke jhagade  2 sab naasamajhii kii baate hain  hamane to hai bas itanaa jaanaa bhaii hamane to hai bas itanaa jaanaa chaahe ye maano chaahe wo maano  gar jazbemuhabbat saadik ho har dar se muraade milatii hain  mandir se muraade milatii hain  masjid se muraade milatii hain  kaabe se muraade milatii hain  kaashii se muraade milatii hain  har ghar hai usii kaa kaashaanaa bhii har ghar hai usii kaa kaashaanaa chaahe ye maano chaahe wo maano  ye masjid hai wo butakhaanaa makasad to hai dil ko samajhaanaa chaahe ye maano chaahe wo maano

Title: dil kaa bhanvar kare pukaar pyaar kaa raag suno
Lyrics: dil kaa bhanvar kare pukaar pyaar kaa raag suno pyaar kaa raag suno re  phuul tum gulaab kaa kyaa javaab aapakaa jo adaa vo bahaar hai aaj dil kii bekalii aa gai zabaan par baat ye hai tumase pyaar hai dil tumhiin ko diyaa re pyaar kaa raag suno re threedots dil kaa bhanvar threedots  chaahe tum mitaanaa par na tum giraanaa aansuu kii tarah nigaah se pyaar ki unchaai ishq ki gaharaai puuchh lo hamaarii aah se aasamaan chhuu liyaa re pyaar kaa raag suno re dil kaa bhanvar threedots  is hasiin utaar pe ham na baithe haar ke saayaa ban ke saath ham chale aaj mere sang to guunje dil kii aarazuu tujhase merii aankh jab mile jaane kyaa kar diyaa re pyaar kaa raag suno threedots  aap kaa ye aanchal pyaar kaa ye baadal phir hamen zamiin pe le chalaa ab to haath thaam lo ik nazar kaa jaam do is naye safar kaa vastaa tum mere saaqiyaa re pyaar kaa raag suno re uu uu uu   threedots

Title: zindagii kyaa hai gam kaa dariyaa hai
Lyrics: zindagii kyaa hai gam kaa dariyaa hai na jiinaa yahaan bas men na maranaa yahaan bas men ajab duniyaa hai zindagii kyaa hai threedots  haay re vo insaan ke jisako gam kii nazar lag jaae chupakechupake aahen bhare aur munh se na kuchh kah paae dil apanaa hansataa hai khud par  aur kabhii rotaa hai  2 zindagii kyaa hai threedots  jhuuthii hain duniyaa kii bahaaren rang hain saare kachche vaqt pade to thaam len daaman phuul se kaante achchhe is gulashan men qadamqadam par ek  nayaa dhokhaa hai  2 zindagii kyaa hai threedots  jab insaan akelaa thaa to dukh bhii na the jiivan men paayaa jab hamaraahii usane duub gayaa ulajhan men ye duniyaa hai begaanon kii kaun  yahaan apanaa hai  2 zindagii kyaa hai threedots

Title: hasiin ho kudaa to nahiin ho
Lyrics: hasiin ho hasiin ho kudaa to nahiin ho ruko ruko havaa to nahiin ho  hasiin ho kudaa to nahiin ho ruko ruko havaa to nahiin ho  ye chaal bemisaal hai adaa bhii ye qamaal hai magar sunaa hai aapane qamaal to jamaal hai isalie kahataa huun akad ke na chalo hasiin ho kudaa to threedots  na yuun matakmatak ke chal na paanv yuun patak ke chal khade hain ham bhii raahon men dupattaa na jhatak ke chal bahut hasiin milenge hamako naaz na karo hasiin ho kudaa to threedots  na rastaa hai ye aapakaa na rastaa ye mere baap kaa agar main saath ho liyaa to kyaa gayaa janaab kaa main aadamii huun kaam kaa jii saath le chalo hasiin ho kudaa to threedots

Title: chaudahaviin kaa chaand ho yaa aafataab ho
Lyrics: chaudahaviin kaa chaand ho yaa aafataab ho jo bhii ho tum khudaa ki qasam laajavaab ho  zulfen hain jaise kaandhe pe baadal jhuke hue aankhen hain jaise may ke payaale bhare hue mastii hai jisame pyaar kii tum vo sharaab ho chaudahaviin kaa threedots  cheharaa hai jaise jhiil me khilataa huaa kanval yaa zindagii ke saaj pe chhedii huii gazal jaane bahaar tum kisii shaayar kaa kvaab ho chaudahaviin kaa threedots  honthon pe khelatii hain tabassum kii bijaliyaan sajade tumhaarii raah men karatii hain kaikashaan duniyaaehusnoishq kaa tum hii shabaab ho chaudahaviin kaa threedots

Title: chhod de saarii duniyaa kisii ke lie
Lyrics: chhod de saarii duniyaa kisii ke lie ye munaasib nahiin aadamii ke lie pyaar se bhii zaruurii kaii kaam hain pyaar sab kuchh nahiin zindagii ke lie  tan se tan kaa milan ho na paayaa to kyaa 2 man se man kaa milan koii kam to nahiin khushabuu aatii rahe duur se hii sahii saamane ho chaman koii kam to nahiin chaand milataa nahiin sabako sansaar men hai diyaa hii bahut roshanii ke lie  kitanii hasarat se takatii hain kaliyaan tumhen kyuun bahaaron ko phir se bulaate nahiin ek duniyaa ujad hii gaii hai to kyaa duusaraa tum jahaan kyuun basaate nahiin dil ne chaahaa bhii to saath sansaar ke chalanaa padataa hai sab kii khushii ke lie

Title: shamaa bujhane ko chalii
Lyrics: shamaa bujhane ko chalii 2 hai yahii dard ki jal jaae patangaa na kahiin shamaa bujhane ko chalii threedots  usane chaahaa ki meraa chaahane vaalaa to rahe main rahuun yaa na rahuun ghar kaa ujaalaa to rahe apane priitam ke lie chhod dii priitam kii galii shamaa bujhane ko chalii threedots  bhuulakar sabako bas ik apanii vafaa saath lie apane hii ashqon men bhiigii huii ik raat lie gam ke tuufaan men ghirii thokaren khaatii nikalii shamaa bujhane ko chalii threedots

Title: aman kaa farishtaa kahaan jaa rahaa hai
Lyrics: aman kaa farishtaa kahaan jaa rahaa hai chaman ro rahaa hai machii hai duhaaii 2  kiyaa kaam aisaa ki halachal machaa dii ye duniyaa jahannum thii jannat banaa dii khinchii aa rahii hai saarii kudaaii chaman ro rahaa threedots  bahut der jaagaa thaa soyaa huaa hai aman ke kyaalon men khoyaa huaa hai ye kaisii muhabbat ye kaisii judaaii chaman ro rahaa threedots  ye jiivan kii manzil pe chhutaa hai hamase koii to manaao ye ruuthaa hai hamase nazar mere baabuu ko kisane lagaaii chaman ro rahaa threedots

Title: kidhar main jaauun  kabhii kisii kii kushiyaan koii luute naa
Lyrics: kidhar main jaauun samajh na paauun bulaa rahii hain do raahen idhar hai mamataa aur udhar hain bhiigii nigaahen  kabhii kisii kii kushiyaan koii luute naa banatebanate mahal kisii kaa tuute naa kabhii kisii kii threedots  bhanvar se bach ke ek bhatakatii naav lagii thii kinaare kise kabar thii phir pahunchegii in aansuon ke dvaare haay is tarah bhaag kisii se ruuthe naa banatebanate mahal threedots  abhii abhii do phuulon vaalii jhuum rahii thii daalii ghirii achaanak kaalii badalii bijalii giraane vaalii hotehote saath kisii kaa chhuute naa banatebanate mahal threedots

Title: kisii kii yaad men duniyaa ko hain bhulaaye huye
Lyrics: kisii kii yaad men duniyaa ko hain bhulaaye huye zamaanaa guzaraa hai apanaa khayaal aaaye huye   badii ajiib khushii hai gamemuhabbat bhii hansii labon pe magar dil pe chot khaaye huye   hazaar parde hon paharen hon yaa hon diivaaren rahenge merii nazar men to vo samaaye huye   kisii ke husn kii bas ik kiran hii kaafii hai ye log kyuun mere aage hain shammaa laaye huye

Title: aur kitane gam uthaae aadamii
Lyrics: aur kitane gam uthaae aadamii kyuun jie jab jii na paae aadamii aur kitane gam uthaae threedots  raah bhuule jab musaafir saamane tuufaan aae har qadam ke saath manzil aur usase  duur jaae  2 tuut kar kyuun gir na jaae aadamii kyuun jie jab jii na paae threedots  ek sapane ke lie is zindagii ko vaar baithe daanv par sab kuchh lagaayaa aur baazii  haar baithe  2 dard ye kisako sunaae aadamii kyuun jie jab jii na paae threedots

Title: do din kii zindagii kaisii hai zindagii
Lyrics: do din kii zindagii kaisii hai zindagii 2 koi na ye jaane  hoa bhiitar andheraa hai baahar hai raushanii dekhen na parawaane do din kii zindagii kaisii hai zindagii  aramaan kii bastii jaane kaisii hai bastii utanii hii suunii hoa utanii hii suunii jitanii chhaayii hai mastii nazaron men baankapan aankhon men sau chaman siine men viiraane  do din kii zindagii kaisii hai zindagii  pahale to kyaa kyaa sapane dikhalaaye duniyaa phir kud hii tuutaa hoa phir kud hii tuutaa sapanaa ban jaaye duniyaa duniyaa kii chaah kii nagamon kii aah kii jhuuthe hain afasaane  do din kii zindagii kaisii hai zindagii hoa  phuulon ne dekhaa khil ke murajhaanaa dil kaa taaron ne dekhaa hoa taaron ne dekhaa jal ke bujh jaanaa dil kaa the kal jo meharabaan the kal jo raazadaan nikale vo begaane  do din kii zindagii kaisii hai zindagii

Title: koii lautaa de mere
Lyrics: albele din pyaare mere bichhade saathii saare haay kahaan gaye haay kahaan gaye  koi lautaa de mere biite hue din  2  biite hue din vo hay pyaare pal chhin  koi lautaa de threedots  main akelaa to na tha the mere sathi kai  ek aandhii si uthii jo bhi tha leke gai  aaj main dhuundhun kahaan kho gaye jaane kidhar  2 biite hue din vo haay pyaare pal chhin koi lautaa de threedots  mere khvaabon ke nagar mere sapanon ke shahar  pii liyaa jinake liye mainne jivan ka zahar  aise bhi din the kabhi meri duniya thi meri   2 biite hue din vo haay pyaare pal chhin koi lautaa de threedots

Title: mere saamane vaalii khidakii men
Lyrics: mere saamane vaalii khidakii men ek chaand kaa tukadaa rahataa hai afasos ye hai ke vo hamase kuchh ukhadaa ukhadaa rahataa hai  jis roz se dekhaa hai usako ham shamaa jalaanaa bhuul gae dil thaam ke aise baithe hain kahiin aanaa jaanaa bhuul gae ab aath pahar in aankhon men vo chanchal mukhadaa rahataa hai  barasaat bhii aakar chalii gaii baadal bhii garaj kar baras gae par usakii ek jhalak ko ham ai husn ke maalik taras gae kab pyaas bujhegii aankhon kii din raat ye dukhadaa rahataa hai

Title: zindaabaad zindaabaad ai muhabbat zindaabaad
Lyrics: zindaabaad zindaabaad ai muhabbat zindaabaad 2 zindaabaad zindaabaad ai muhabbat zindaabaad 2  daulat kii zanjiiron se tuu 2 rahatii hai aazaad  zindaabaad zindaabaad ai muhabbat zindaabaad 2  mandir men masjid men tuu aur tuu hii hai iimaanon men muralii kii taanon men tuu aur tuu hii hai aazaanon men tere dam se diindharam kii duniyaa hai aabaad  zindaabaad zindaabaad ai muhabbat zindaabaad 2  pyaar kii aandhii ruk na sakegii nafarat kii diivaaron se kuunemuhabbat ho na sakegaa kanjar se talavaron se mar jaate hain aashiq zindaa rah jaatii hai yaad  zindaabaad zindaabaad ai muhabbat zindaabaad 2  koras aa aa aa threedots  ishq bagaawat kar baithe to duniyaa kaa ruk mod de aag lagaa de mahalon men aur takteshaahii chhod de siinaa taane maut se khele kuchh na kare fariyaad  rafii koras zindaabaad zindaabaad 2 ai muhabbat zindaabaad 2  koras aa aa aathreedots aa aa aa aa aa aa aathreedots  taaj hukuumat jisakaa mazahab phir usakaa iimaan kahaan 2 jisake dil men pyaar na ho wo paththar hai inasaan kahaan 2 pyaar ke dushman hosh men aa ho jaayegaa barabaad  rafii koras zindaabaad zindaabaad ai muhabbat zindaabaad 2  rafii zindaabaad zindaabaad  zindaabaathreedotsd koras zindaabaad zindaabaad  zindaabaad zindaabaad

Title: merii mahabuub kahiin aur milaa kar mujhase
Lyrics: taaj tere liye ik mazahareulfat hii sahii  tum ko is vaadiierangiin se aqiidat hii sahii    mere mahabuub kahiin aur milaa kar mujh se  bazmeshaahii men gariibon kaa guzar kyaa maanii sabt jis raah pe hon satavateshaahii ke nishaan us pe ulfat bharii ruuhon kaa safar kyaa maanii   merii mahabuub pasepadraaetashhiirevafaa tuu ne satavat ke nishaanon ko to dekhaa hotaa mudraa shaahon ke maqaabir se bahalane vaalii apane taariik makaanon ko to dekhaa hotaa   anaginat logon ne duniyaa men muhabbat kii hai kaun kahataa hai ki saadiq na the jazbe un ke lekin un ke liye tashhiir kaa saamaan nahiin kyon ke vo log bhii apanii hii tarah mufalis the   ye imaaraatomaqaabir ye fasiilen ye hisaar mutalqulhukm shahanshaahon kii azamat ke sutuun daamanedahar pe us rang kii gulakaarii hai jis men shaamil hai tere aur mere ajadaad kaa khuun   merii mahabuub unhen bhii to muhabbat hogii jinakii sannaaii ne bakhshii hai ise shaklejamiil un ke pyaaron ke maqaabir rahe benaamonamuud aaj tak un pe jalaaii na kisii ne qandiil   ye chamanazaar ye jamunaa kaa kinaaraa ye mahal ye munaqqash darodiivaar ye maharaab ye taaq ik shahanashaah ne daulat kaa sahaaraa le kar ham gariibon kii muhabbat kaa udaayaa hai mazaak   mere mahabuub kahiin aur milaa kar mujhase

Title: mere mahabuub qayaamat hogii
Lyrics: mere mahabuub qayaamat hogii aaj rusavaa terii galiyon men muhabbat hogii naam nikalegaa teraa hii lab se jaan jab is dilenaadaan se rukhasat hogii mere mahabuub   mere sanam ke dar se agar baadesabaa ho teraa guzar kahanaa sitamagar kuchh hai khabar teraa naam liyaa jab tak bhii jiyaa ai shamaa teraa paravaanaa jisase ab tak tujhe nafarat hogii aaj rusavaa     mere mahabuub qayaamat hogii aaj rusavaa terii galiyon men muhabbat hogii merii nazaren to gilaa karatii hain tere dil ko bhii sanam tujhase shikaayat hogii  terii galii main aataa sanam nagamaa vafaa kaa gaataa sanam tujhase sunaa na jaataa sanam phir aaj idhar aayaa huun magar ye kahane main diivaanaa khatm bas aaj ye vahashat hogii aaj rusavaa   merii tarah tuu aahen bhare tuu bhii kisii se pyaar kare aur rahe vo tujhase pare tuune o sanam dhaaye hain sitam to ye tuu bhuul na jaanaa ki na tujhape bhii inaayat hogii aaj rusavaa

Title: rang dil kii dhadakan bhii laatii to hogii
Lyrics: rang dil kii dhadakan bhii laatii to hogii yaad merii unako bhii aatii to hogii rang dil kii dhadakan threedots  o  pyaar kii kushbuu kahaan aatii thii kaliyon se ho ke aaii hai havaa bhii unakii galiyon se  2 chhuu ke unake daaman ko aatii to hogii rang dil kii dhadakan threedots  o ye bahaaren ye samaan sab usake dam se hai vo piyaa kuchhkuchh kafaa rahataa jo hamase hai jaan kuchhkuchh usakii bhii jaatii to hogii rang dil kii dhadakan threedots   jaa rii ai titalii nagariyaa pii kii tuu jaanaa ho bhalaa teraa kabar kuchh unakii le aanaa  2 tuu vahaan pe vaise bhii jaatii to hogii rang dil kii dhadakan threedots

Title: chaand takataa hai idhar aao kahiin chhup jaaen
Lyrics: chaand takataa hai idhar aao kahiin chhup jaaen 	kahiin laage naa nazar aao kahiin chhup jaaen 2  ra 	phuul shaakon se jhuke jaate hain honthon kii taraf 	jhonke bal khaa ke mude jaate hain zulfon kii taraf 	chhod kar inakii dagar aao kahiin chhup jaaen 	kahiin laage naa nazar threedots  su 	main hii dekhuun sajan duujaa na dekhe tohe 	kaa kabar kaun sautaniyaa toraa man mohe 	o dil pe daalo na asar aao kahiin chhup jaaen 	chaand takataa hai threedots

Title: mohabbat ho gaii hai mere meharabaan ko
Lyrics: mohabbat ho gaii hai mere meharabaan ko kisii naameharabaan se  aaj aalam hai yuun bekudii kaa jaise ho jaae koii kisii kaa aaj nazaren bhii hain bahakiibahakii aaj saansen bhii hain mahakiimahakii jaanevafaa chun ke laae ho phul kis gulasitaan se mohabbat ho gaii threedots  kal to aisii na thii beqaraarii aaj kyon dil pe ulajhan hai jaane kyaa kahiekahie haay allaah kuchh to zubaan se mohabbat ho gaii threedots

Title: rahate the kabhii jinake dil men ham jaan se bhii pyaaron kii tarah
Lyrics: rahate the kabhii jinake dil men ham jaan se bhii pyaaron kii tarah baithe hain unhii ke kuuche men ham aaj gunahagaaron kii tarah  2  daavaa thaa jinhen hamadardii kaa khud aake na puuchhaa haal kabhii  2 mahafil men bulaayaa hai ham pe  2  hansane ko sitamagaaron kii tarah  2 rahate thethreedots  barason se sulagate tan man par ashkon ke to chhiinte de naa sake  2 tapate hue dil ke zakhmon par  2 barase bhii to angaaron kii tarah  2 rahate thethreedots  sau rup dhare jiine ke liye baithe hain hazaaron zahar piye  2 thokar naa lagaanaa ham khud hain  2 giratii huii diivaaron kii tarah  2 rahate thethreedots

Title: gaataa rahe meraa dil tuu hii merii manzil
Lyrics: gaataa rahe meraa dil tuu hii merii manzil kahiin biiten na ye raaten kahiin biiten na ye din  2  pyaar karane vaale are pyaar hii karenge jalane vaale chaahe jal jal marenge dil se jo dhadake hain vo dil haradam ye kahenge kahiin biiten na threedots  o mere hamaraahii merii baanh thaame chalanaa badale duniyaa saarii tum na badalanaa pyaar hame bhii sikhalaa degaa garadish men sambhalanaa kahiin biiten na threedots  duuriyaan ab kaisii are shaam jaa rahii hai hamako dhalate dhalate samajhaa rahii hai aatii jaatii saans jaane kab se gaa rahii hai kahiin biiten na threedots

Title: in havaaon men in fizaaon men tujhako meraa pyaar pukaare
Lyrics: in havaaon men in fizaaon men tujhako meraa pyaar pukaare  aajaa aajaa re tujhako meraa pyaar pukaare   ruk na paauun main khichatii aauun main dil ko jab diladaar pukaare  aajaa aajaa re tujhako meraa pukaare   tujhase rangat tujhase mastii in jharano men in phuulon men  tere dam se meri hastii jhuule chaahat ke jhuulon men  machalii jaayen shokh umange do baahon ka haar pukaare  aajaa aajaa re   dil men tere dil kii dhadakan aankh men teri aankh ka jaadu  lab par tere lab ke sang saans men teri saans kii khushabuu  zulfon ka har pench bulaaye anchal ka har taar pukaare  aajaa aajaa re tujhako meraa pyaar pukaare   in havaaon men in fizaaon men tujhako meraa pyaar pukaare  aajaa aajaa re tujhako meraa pyaar pukaare   ruk na pauun main khinchati aauun main  dil ko jab diladaar pukaare   laut rahii hain meri sadayen diivaron se sar takaraa ke  haath pakad kar chalane vaale ho gaye rukasat haath chhudaake  unako kuchh bhi yaad nahiin hai ab koi sau baar pukaare   ilm nahiin tha itani jaldii khatam fasaane ho jaayenge  tum begaane ban jaaoge ham diivaane ho jaayenge  kal baahon ka haar milaa tha aaj ashkon ka haar pukaare  aajaa aajaa re tujhako meraa pyaar pukaare

Title: garajat barasat saavan aayo re laayo na sang men
Lyrics: garajat barasat saavan aayo re garajat barasat saavan aayo re laayo na sang men hamare bichhade balamavaa sakhii kaa karuun haay  garajat barasat saavan aayo re garajat barasat saavan aayo re saavan aayo saavan aayo re garajat barasat saavan  rimajhimrimajhim meghaa barase rimajhimrimajhim meghaa  barase  barase rimajhimrimajhim meghaa barase tadape jiyaravaa miin samaan pad gai pii kii laal chunariyaa piyaa nahiin aae garajat barasat saavan aayo re garajat barasat saavan  pal pal chhin chhin pavan jhakore     3 laage tan par tiir samaan  tiir samaan sakhii laage tan par tiir samaan nainan dhale to bhiigii sajariyaa agan lagaae garajat barasat saavan aayo re laayo naa sang men hamare bichhade balamavaa sakhii kaa karuun haay  garajat barasat saavan aayo laayo naa  sang men  hamare  bichhade  balamavaa sakhii kaa karuun haay re haay

Title: gorii chalo na hans kii chaal zamaanaa dushman hai
Lyrics: ra 	gorii chalo na hans kii chaal zamaanaa dushman hai 	terii umar hai solah saal zamaanaa dushman hai aa 	kuchh paravaah nahiin sarakaar zamaanaa dushman ho 	mujhe tumase huaa hai pyaar zamaanaa dushman ho  ra 	o chaand sii ujalii hasiinaa tum chhod do aanaajaanaa 	rokegaa tumhaarii raahen ham jaisaa koii diivaanaa aa 	koii laakh lagaae pahare main pahare tod ke aauun 	huun tere milan kii pyaasii main duniyaa chhod ke aauun  ra 	ye ishq hai aag kaa dariyaa tum sochsamajh ke utaranaa 	hain isamen hazaaron tuufaan aasaan nahiin hai guzaranaa aa 	jab pyaar kaa bandhan baandhaa phir aag ho yaa ho paanii 	dar jaae vo kaisii ulfat jal jaae vo kaisii javaanii ra 	gorii chalo na threedots

Title: ab koii gulashan naa ujade ab vatan aazaad hai
Lyrics: ab koi gulashan naa ujade ab vatan aazaad hai ruuh gangaa kii himaalay kaa badan aazaad hai  khetiyaan sonaa ugaaen vaadiyaan motii lutaaen aaj gautam kii zamiin tulasii kaa ban aazaad hai  mandiron men shankh baaje masjidon men ho azaan shekh kaa dharm aur diinebarahaman aazaad hai  luut kaisii bhii ho ab is desh men rahane na paae aaj sabake vaaste dharatii kaa dhan aazaad hai

Title: kaarii badariyaa maare lahariyaa moraa jiyaraa udaa jaae re
Lyrics: kaarii badariyaa maare lahariyaa moraa jiyaraa udaa jaae re 2 e dhiire se chal arii bairii pavan moraa goraa badan khulaa jaae re haay raamaa moraa jiyaraa udaa jaae  bhiigaabhiigaa mausam yah bhiigaabhiigaa mausam ye din alabele ye din alabele jiyaa nahiin laage saavan men akele 2 pii ki pukaar kare paapii papiihaa mere dil ko bedardii jalaae re kaarii badariyaa threedots  kaliikalii bhanvaraa jo dolan laage 2 miithimiithii piidaa karejavaa men jaage 2 e manavaa ko thaam yahiin sochuun main raam koii morii nagariyaa bataae re ho kaarii badariyaa threedots  piya bin phiikii re piyaa bin phiikii yah sajdhaj morii yah sajdhaj morii itut bhatake javaanii nigodii 2 e chadhatii umar liye jaae udhar jahaan raaton ko nindiyaa na aae re haay haay kaarii badariyaa threedots

Title: sun pyaare sajanaa re man gaaye giit suhaane
Lyrics: aa 	sun pyaare sajanaa re man gaaye giit suhaane 	giiton men pyaar hai teraa tuu maane yaa na maane mu 	daaliidaalii matavaalii rut aaii phuul sajaane 	phuulon men ruup hai teraa tuu maane yaa na maane aa 	sun pyaare sajanaa threedots  mu 	tuu kahade to jhiil sii gaharii aankhon men kho jaauun aa 	aaj meraa jii chaahe terii baanhon men laharaauun mu 	tuu kahade to threedots aa 	aaj meraa jii chaahe threedots 	giit milan ke gaauun  mu 	daaliidaalii aa 	aa aa aa mu 	matavaalii aa 	aa aa aa mu 	aaii phuul sajaane 	phuulon men ruup threedots aa 	sun pyaare sajanaa threedots

Title: andaaz meraa mastaanaa  takaaliinaa
Lyrics: andaaz meraa mastaanaa maange dil kaa nazaraanaa zaraa sochake aankh milaanaa ho jaae na tuu diivaanaa ke ham bhii jawaan hain samaa bhii jawaan hai na phir ham se kahanaa meraa dil kahaan hai meraa dil kahaan hai  ko takaaliinaa   pyaar kii kitaab huun main sach huun phir bhii kvaab huun main dekhakar suruur aae vo ajab sharaab huun main main huun jawaanii kaa rangiin taraanaa rangiin taraanaa  ko takaaliinaa   andaaz meraa mastaanaa threedots  tujhako merii justujuu hai mujhako terii aarzuu hai mere dil kaa aaiinaa tuu dil ke aaiine men tuu hai ham se hii roshan hai saaraa zamaanaa saaraa zamaanaa  ko takaaliinaa   andaaz meraa mastaanaa threedots  main kidhar huun tuu kahaan hai ye zamiin yaa aasamaan hai mere tere pyaar kii ye kyaa ajiib daastaan hai   miithaa saa ye dard bhii hai suhaanaa dard suhaanaa  ko takaaliinaa   andaaz meraa mastaanaa threedots

Title: aaii aaii basantii belaa
Lyrics: koras aaii aaii basantii belaa aa a a a aaii aaii basantii belaa lagaa re lagaa phuulon kaa banban melaa magan man jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa  miinaa aaj aanand kaa bahaar relaa ke gungun gaae bhanvar alabelaa kalii kaa mukh chuum rahaa aaii aaii  koras jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa aaii aaii threedots  miinaa naache kaliyaan  naache ghuunghat nikaal  mannaa piile piipal kii daal deve patton kii taal aaj koii nahiin hai akelaa  2 milan kii belaa lagan kaa melaa magan man jhuum rahaa aaii aaii jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa  lataa jhananananananana chhum chhananananananana baaje pagpagpagpag painjaniyaan   2 alabelii naar sajake singaar ancharaa sanbhaal aaii pii ke dvaar 2 nainon men laaj adharon men pyaar 2 man men haan haan  mukh na na na na na na  chhum chhananananana jhananananananananana baaje pagpagpagpag painjaniyaan jhananananananana chhum chhananananananana baaje pagpagpagpag painjaniyaan   mannaa kahiin baaje mridang kahiin baaje re jang  miinaa kahiin pichakaarii pichakaarii chhuute re rang mannaa aaj rangiilii rangon kaa melaa  2  koras milan kii belaa lagan kaa melaa magan man jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa jhuum rahaa  aaii aaii basantii belaa

Title: tere pyaar men diladaar jo hai meraa haaleizaar
Lyrics: paas rahate hue bhi tujhase bahut dur hain ham  kissaedard sunaate hain ke majabuur hain ham   tere pyaar men diladaar jo hai meraa haaleizaar  koi dekhe ya na dekhe allaah dekh rahaa hai  tere pyaar men diladaar threedots  jabase teri yaad mere dil men samaaii hai  vallaah kisii raat mujhe niind nahiin aai hai  miithaa miithaa dard hai honthon pe aahen sard hain  cheharaa bhi meraa zard hai  na jaane kya rang dikhaae tera intazaar  tere pyaar men diladaar threedots  tu hii meri zindagii hai tu hii meri jaan hai  mujhako tu mil jaaye meraa yahii ek aramaan hai  tera meraa sath ho kuchh dil se dil ki baat ho  jii bharake mulaakaat ho  nagame gaaen pyaar ke milakar chheden dil ke taar  tere pyaar men diladaar threedots  sadake tere jaauun meraa tuutaa dil jod de  nazaron ka hijaab zaraa nazaron se hii tod de  aankhon se kyuun dur hai kyuun milane se majabuur hai  dil meraa gam se chuur hai  yuunhii tadape jaauungii jab tak na hogaa diidaar  tere pyaar men diladaar threedots

Title: jaane vaale kabhii nahiin aate  dil ek mandir hai
Lyrics: ra 	jaane vaale kabhii nahiin aate 	jaane vaalon kii yaad aatii hai  su 	dil ek mandir hai 2 	pyaar kii jisamen hotii hai puujaa 	ye priitam kaa ghar hai 	dil ek mandir threedots  	 har dhadakan hai aaratii vandan 	aankh jo miinchii ho gae darshan  2 	maut mitaa de chaahe hastii yaad to amar hai 	dil ek mandir threedots  	 ham yaadon ke phuul chadhaaen 	aur aansuu ke diip jalaae  2 	saanson kaa har taar pukaare ye premnagar hai 	dil ek mandir threedots

Title: ham ne jo dekhe sapane sach ho gae vo apane
Lyrics: ham ne jo dekhe sapane sach go gae vo apane o mere sajana din a gae hain pyar ke mere sajana din a gae qarar ke ham ne jo dekhe sapane threedots  aise hi sada sajadhaj ke meri ankhon men raho javan tum main saya ban ke sath chalun mujhe le chalo jahan tum ham ne jo dekhe sapane threedots  ham janam janam ke sathi hain puja hai prit hamari is janam men tumako pa hi liya main ho gai tumhari ham ne jo dekhe sapane threedots

Title: dekhaa hai sabhii ne chaand ko use kyaa dekhen
Lyrics: dekhaa hai sabhii ne chaand ko use kyaa dekhen tujhe dekh liyaa sab dekh liyaa 2 dekhaa hai sabhii ne threedots  nazaron men yuun hii naaraazii hai par dil hii dil men raajii hai ab duniyaa jo chaahe soche use kyaa jaanen tujhe jaan liyaa sab jaan liyaa dekhaa hai sabhii ne threedots  honthon pe aabehayaat lie chalatii hai bahaaren saath lie tere jaisaa hasiin koii aur bhii ho use kyaa maanen tujhe maan liyaa sab maan liyaa dekhaa hai sabhii ne threedots  kuchh aise dil ne pukaaraa tujhe jannat se zamiin pe utaaraa tujhe ab aur kudaa ke paas hai kyaa ham kyaa maangen tujhe maang liyaa sab maang liyaa dekhaa hai sabhii ne threedots

Title: sikandar bhii aaye  na koii rahaa hai  ye desh aazaad ho ke rahegaa
Lyrics: sikandar bhii aaye kalandar bhii aaye na koii rahaa hai na koii rahegaa hai tere jaane kii baarii videshii ye desh aazaad ho ke rahegaa meraa desh aazaad ho ke rahegaa na koi raha hai threedots  sikandar ko poras kii taaqat ne rokaa gorii ko prithvii kii himmat ne tokaa jab khuunii naadar ne chhedii ladaaii to dillii kii galiyon se aavaaz aaii lagaa le tuu kitanaa bhii zor ai sitamagar ye desh aazaad threedots  parataap ne jaan de dii vatan pe shivaajii ne bhagavaa udaayaa gagan pe maradon ne khaaiin aazaadii kii kasamen adaa auraton ne kii jauhar kii rasmen kafan baandh kar raanii jhaansii pukaarii ye desh aazaad threedots  siraaj aur tiipuu zafar aur naanaa thaa har ek inamen qaumii diivaanaa yahaan le ke aaye bagaavat kii aandhii tilak neharuu aazaad netaajii gaandhii bhagat sinh kii raakh ne pukaaraa ye desh aazaad threedots  halaakuu rahaa hai na hitalar rahaa hai musolinii kaa naa vo lashkar rahaa hai nahiin jab rahaa ruus kaa jaar baakii to kaise rahegaa saalaazaar baakii govaa kaa har bachchaa bachchaa pukaaraa ye desh aazaad threedots  kal ko agar aaye chaao yaa maao lagaa denge ham zindagii kaa daanv hamaaraa hai kashmiir nefaa hamaaraa kabhii jhukegaa na jhandaa hamaaraa zaraa desh ke dushmanon se ye kah do ye desh aazaad threedots

Title: jaane meraa dil kise dhuundh rahaa hai in hariibharii vaadiyon men
Lyrics: jaane meraa dil kise dhuundh rahaa hai in hariibharii vaadiyon men kabhii na kabhii to takaraaegaa dil dil se inhiin aabaadiyon men jaane meraa dil threedots  ye kisakii lagan manzilmanzil har roz mujhe le jaatii hai ye kisakii tamannaa siine men jo aas ke diip jalaatii hai 2 o jaane meraa dil threedots  jharanon men nahaatii jalapariyaan kyon jaane mujhe lalachaatii hain jangal kii kanvaarii kaliyaan bhii hanshans ke qayaamat dhaatii hain o jaane meraa dil threedots  jab dekhe binaa madahosh huun main dekhuungaa use to kyaa hogaa kyaa nuur bharii suurat hogii kyaa pyaar bharaa jalavaa hogaa 2 o jaane meraa dil threedots

Title: na tum hamen jaano na ham tumhe jaanen
Lyrics: magar lagataa hai kuchh aisaa meraa hamadam mil gayaa na tum hamen jaano na ham tumhen jaanen magar lagataa hai kuchh aisaa meraa hamadam mil gayaa na tum threedots  ye mausam ye raat chup hai ye honthon kii baat chup hai  khaamoshii sunaane lagii hai daastaan   2 nazar ban gai hai dil kii zubaan na tum threedots  muhabbat ke mod pe ham mile sabako chhod ke ham  dhadakate dilon kaa leke ye kaaravaan    2 chale aaj dono jaane kahaan na tum threedots

Title: tumhen aur kyaa duun main dil ke sivaay
Lyrics: tumhen aur kyaa duun main dil ke sivaay   tum ko hamaarii umar lag jaaye   tum ko hamaarii umar lag jaaye  2    muraaden hon puurii saje har tamannaa  muhabbat kii duniyaa ke tum chaand bannaa  bahaaron kii manzil pe hansanaa hasaanaa  kushii men hamaarii bhii aawaaz sunnaa  kabhii zindagii men koii gam na aaye  tum ko hamaarii umar lag jaaye    mujhe jo kushii hai tumhen kyaa bataauun  bhalaa dil kii dhadakan ko kaise chhupaauun  kahiin ho na jaauun kushii se main paagal  tumhen dekh kar aur bhii muskuraauun  kudaa diljalon kii nazar se bachaaye  tum ko hamaarii umar lag jaaye    sitaaron se uunchaa ho rutabaa tumhaaraa  bano tum har ik zindagii kaa sahaaraa  tumhen jis se ulfat ho mil jaaye tum ko  samajh lo hamaarii duaa kaa ishaaraa  muqaddar tumhaaraa sadaa jagmagaaye  tum ko hamaarii umar lag jaaye

Title: main shaayad tumhaare liye ajanabii huun
Lyrics: main shaayad tumhaare liye ajanabii huun magar chaand taare mujhe jaanate hain ye saare nazaare mujhe jaanate hain 2  pattaapattaa yahaan raazadaan hai meraa zarrezarre men rakh dii hai main ne zabaan 2 puuchhate hain sabhii aaj mujh se yahii bhuul baithe hain kyon pyaar ko maharabaan bhuul jaao bhii tum to mujhe gam naa hogaa ki sab gam ke maare mujhe jaanate hain ye saare nazaare mujhe jaanate hain  bevafaaii kii raahon men tum kho gaye har qadam par the merii vafaa ke nishaan 2 tum gaye chhod kar har qasam tod kar rah gaii ban ke chaahat merii daastaan apane vaade ke jin ko nibhaa naa sake tum vo vaade tumhaare mujhe jaanate hain  ye saare nazaare mujhe jaanate hain  main shaayad tumhaare liye ajanabii huun magar chaand taare mujhe jaanate hain ye saare nazaare mujhe jaanate hain

Title: kyaa gam jo andherii hain raahen ik shammaaetamannaa
Film: barsaat ki raat the rainy nights saathi
Lyrics: kyaa gam jo andherii hain raahen ik shammaaetamannaa saath to hai kuchh aur sahaaraa ho ki na ho haathon men tumhaaraa haath to hai  kyaa jaane kitane diivaane ghar phuunk tamaashaa dekh chuke jis pyaar kii dushman duniyaa hai us pyaar men koii baat to hai

Title: naazaniin badaa rangiin hai vaadaa teraa
Lyrics: r duur bahut mat jaaiye leke qaraar hamaaraa    aisaa na ho koii luut le raah men pyaar hamaaraa  l paas raho yaa duur tum tum ho saath hamaare    denge gavaahii puuchh lo ye kaamosh nazaare  r naazaniin badaa rangiin hai vaadaa teraa     o hasiin hai kidhar kaa iraadaa teraa	   2    aankh mudatii huii zulf udatii huii    faasalaa kyon hai zyaadaa teraa l o hamadam mere khel na jaano chaahat ke iqaraar ko    jaanejahaan yaad karoge ik din mere pyaar ko  l chhaaye ho mere dil pe nazar pe tumhiin    aaj to merii ulfat kaa kar lo yakiin    e jii hamase tumhen ek lagaavat to hai    tumhen hamase muhobbat nahiin  r hamasafar tuu hii meraa hai lekin sanam     saath men hain kisii ajanabii ke kadam	   2    merii ulajhan yuunhii besabab to nahiin    dil kii betaabiyon kii kasam o  l hamadam mere khel na jaano chaahat ke iqaraar ko    jaanejahaan yaad karoge ik din mere pyaar ko

Title: likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa
Lyrics: lataa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa  2 kishor agar ise samajh sako mujhe bhii samajhaanaa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa threedots  lataa javaab thaa kisii tamannaa kaa  likhaa to hai magar adhuuraa saa are o o o o   javaab thaa kisii tamannaa kaa   likhaa to hai magar adhuuraa saa kishor kaisii na ho merii har baat adhuurii abhii huun aadhaa divaanaa lataa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa kishor agar ise samajh sako mujhe bhii samajhaanaa lataa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa  lataa jo kuchh nahiin to ye ishaare kyuun  thahar gae mere sahaare kyuun   are o o o o   jo kuchh nahiin to ye ishaare kyuun  thahar gae mere sahaare kyuun   kishor thodaa saa hasiinon kaa sahaaraa leke chalanaa hai merii aadat rozaanaa lataa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa kishor agar ise samajh sako mujhe bhii samajhaanaa lataa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa  kishor yahaan vahaan fizaa men aavaaraa  abhii talaq ye dil hai bechaaraa are o o o o   yahaan vahaan fizaa men aavaaraa   abhii talaq ye dil hai bechaaraa lataa o o threedots dil ko tere ab tak naa samajhe tujhahii ko hamane pahachaanaa lataa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa kishor agar ise samajh sako mujhe bhii samajhaanaa lataa likhaa hai terii aankhon men kisakaa afasaanaa

Title: aasamaan se aayaa farishtaa pyaar kaa sabak sikhalaane
Lyrics: aasamaan se aayaa farishtaa pyaar kaa sabak sikhalaane dil men hai tasaviir yaar kii laayaa huun vo dikhalaane kaho pyaar hai tum se   jaa jaa o jaanaa kaho pyaar hai tum se   jaa jaa jaa  dilabar terii kaatir main chaand chhod kar aayaa huun le le nazaraanaa main apane pyaar ko laayaa huun aasamaan se aayaa farishtaa   threedots  siikho zaraa siikho andaaz pyaar kaa hamase tum kar lo are kar lo iqaraar pyaar kaa hamase tum aasamaan se aayaa farishtaa   threedots  saayaa huun main teraa tere saathsaath hii aauungaa aashiq huun main teraa baahon men baandh le jaauungaa  aasamaan se aayaa farishtaa pyaar kaa sabak sikhalaane dil men hai tasaviir yaar kii laayaa huun vo dikhalaane kaho pyaar hai tum se   haan haan o jaanaa kaho pyaar hai tum se   haan hai   threedots

Title: ye dil hai muhabbat kaa pyaasaa is dil kaa tadapanaa kyaa kahiye
Lyrics: ye dil hai muhabbat kaa pyaasaa is dil kaa tadapanaa kyaa kahiye maayus hain ham magarur ho tum aur tumape hii mitanaa kyaa kahiye ye dil hai  ye shauk hamen ke uthaa le unhen vo sharmohayaa ke maare hain ye shauk ye shauk hamen ke uthaa le unhen vo sharmohayaa ke maare hain  2 ye had se guzar jaanaa apana aur unakaa simatanaa kyaa kahiye ye dil hai  kis soch men ho kuchh hosh nahiin ye ghabaraahat bhii kaisii hai  2 bal khaa ke hamiin se hat jaanaa phir hamase nipatanaa kyaa kahiye ye dil hai  aa jaao hamaarii baahon men haay ye hai kaisii majaburii aa jaao aa jaao hamaarii baahon men haay ye hai kaisii majaburii  2 ham aapake hain koi gair nahiin apanon se ulajhanaa kyaa kahiye  ye dil hai threedots

Title: meraa naam hai umar jaanii khaauun rotii inglistaanii
Lyrics: meraa naam hai umar jaanii khaauun rotii inglistaanii dekhuun roz filmen hindii main bhii kaisaa chhappadakaanii  nikal pade hain ladane ko ham apanaa siinaa taane paas hamaare kyaa hai yaaron ye to duniyaa jaane dhokhaa de gae chaauuenlaaii mere maulaa kii duhaaii maine yaaron unako samajhaa main bhii kaisaa chhappadakaanii meraa naam hai threedots  golii videshii kaam na aaii havaaii jahaaz nikale havaaii paitan nagar banaa bhaarat men pad gaii ultii ladaaii lene gae the ham kashmiir vaapas aa gae jaise tiir maine taubaa kar lii bhaaii main to thaharaa chhappadakaanii meraa naam hai threedots

Title: saiyaan saiyaan pyaar na jaane
Film: trip to moon chand par chadhaai
Lyrics: saiyaan saiyaan pyaar na jaane baat na maane  saamane aauun ruup sajaake  dekhe naa tuu ek nazar bhii aankh uthaake dekhe naa tuu  pyaar kiyaa hai mainne tujhako dekh na tadapaa aur mujhako duniyaa degii  mujhako taane saiyaan threedots  baat karuun to nain jhukaae  aur chale haath jo pakaduun haath chhudaae aur chale o man bairii kyaa hai thaanii ab to dil kii sun le kahaanii jhuuthe jhuuthe kar na bahaane saiyaan threedots  rain na biite kaise bitaauun  tere binaa koii jatan se chain na paauun tere binaa sakhiyon men meraa jii na laage miithaamiithaa dard jaage aae terii yaad sataane saiyaan threedots

Title: mujhe ye phuul na de
Lyrics: mujhe ye phuul na de tujahko dilabarii kii qasam ye kuchh nahiin hain terii saadagii kii qasam  nazar hasiin hai to jalave hasiin lagate hain main kuchh nahiin huun mujhe merii husnagii kii qasam  tuu ek saaz hai chhedaa nahiin kisii ne jise tere badan men chhupii narm raaginii kii qasam  ye raaginii tere dil men hai mere tan men nahiin parakhane vaale mujhe terii saadagii kii qasam  gazal kaa naaz hai tuu nazm kaa shabaab hai tuu yakiin kar mujhe merii hii shaayarii kii qasam

Title: ye hawaa ye fizaa hai udaas jaise meraa dil aa bhii jaa
Lyrics: o ho ho o ho ho o ho o ho o ho ho ho o ho ho o ho ho ho ho ho o ho ho ho ho ho o ho ho  ye hawaa ye hawaa ye hawaa ye fizaa ye fizaa ye fizaa hai udaas jaise meraa dil meraa dil meraa dil aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa 2  aa ke ab to chaandanii bhii zard ho chalii ho chalii ho chalii dhadakanon kii narm aanch sard ho chalii ho chalii ho chalii dhal chalii hai raat aa ke mil aa ke mil aa ke mil aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa 2  raah men bichhii huii hai merii har nazar har nazar har nazar main tadap rahaa huun aur tuu hai bekabar bekabar bekabar ruk rahii hai saans aa ke mil aa ke mil aa ke mil aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa 2  o ho ho o ho ho o ho o ho o ho ho ho o ho o ho ho ho ho ho ho o ho ho ho ho ho o ho ho

Title: shamaa gul kar ke na jaa
Lyrics: shamaa gul kar ke na jaa yuun ki jalaa bhii na sakuun  2 raushanii terii mohabbat kii main paa bhii na sakuun shamaa gul kar ke na jaa  badagumaan itanaa na ban haath jhatakane vaale  2 haath jhatakane vaale apanii bigadii huii qismat ko banaa bhii na sakuun shamaa gul kar ke na jaa  ek hii raat men aansuuon ke charaag itane jale  2 charaag itane jale gam agar dil kaa chhupauun to chhupaa bhii na sakuun shamaa gul kar ke na jaa  jaanevale mujhe kis raah men chhodaa tuune  2 chhodaa tuune yaad aa bhii na sakuun tujh ko bhulaa bhii na sakuun  shamaa gul kar ke na jaa yuun ki jalaa bhii na sakuun  2 raushanii terii mohabbat kii main paa bhii na sakuun shamaa gul kar ke na jaa

Title: o phirakii vaalii tuu kal phir aanaa
Lyrics: o phirakii vaalii tuu kal phir aanaa nahiin phir jaanaa tuu apanii jubaan se ki tere nainaa hain zaraa beiimaan se o matavaalii ye dil kyon todaa ye tiir kaahe chhodaa nazar kii kamaan se ki mar jaauungaa main bas muskaan se o phirakii vaalii threedots  pahale bhii tuune ik roz ye kahaa thaa 2 aauungii tuu naa aaii vaadaa kiyaa thaa sainyaa ban ke badariyaa chhaauungii tuu naa chhaaii  mere pyaase  2 nainaa tarase tuu nikalii naa ghar se kaise biitii vo raat suhaanii tuu sun le kahaanii ye saare jahaan se ki tere nainaa hain threedots  sochaa thaa maine kisii roz gorii hans ke 2 bolegii tuu naa bolii merii mohabbat bharii baaten sunsun ke dolegii tuu naa dolii  o sapanon men  2 aane vaalii ruk jaa jaane vaalii kiyaa tuune meraa dil chorii ye puuchh le gorii zamiin aasamaan se ki tere nainaa hain threedots

Title: maanaa mere hasiin sanam tuu rashqemaahataab hai
Lyrics: maanaa mere hasiin sanam tuu rashqemaahataab hai par tuu hai laajavaab to meraa kahaan javaab hai  hairat se yuun na dekhiye zarraa huaa to kyaa huaa    2 zarraa huaa to kyaa huaa apanii jagah pe jaaneman zarraa bhii aafataab hai  tere shabaab kaa suruur chhaayaa jo do jahaan par      2 chhaayaa jo do jahaan par merii nigaaheshauq se aayaa vo inaqalaab hai

Title: dekhaa hai terii aankhon men pyaar hii pyaar beshumaar
Lyrics: dekhaa hai terii aankhon men pyaar hii pyaar beshumaar 2  paayaa hai terii baaton men pyaar hii pyaar beshumaar  dekha hai terii aankhon men   e bahaaron kii parii ye hai taqadiir merii  jo bhi samajhaa hai mujhe  vo inaayat hai terii  2  dekhaa hai threedots  mere achchhe the karam  jo mulaaqaat hui  meharabaan husn huaa kyaa ajab baat hui  2  dekhaa hai threedots  main ne sochaa bhii na thaa  mujhako mil jaayegii tuu jaise laharaaye sabaah  vaise laharaayegii tuu  2  dekhaa hai threedots

Title: na chhudaa sakoge daaman
Lyrics: na chhudaa sakoge daaman na nazar bachaa sakoge na chhudaa sakoge daaman jo main dil kii baat kah duun 2 to kahiin na jaa sakoge na chhudaa sakoge daaman  vo hasiin saa tasavvur jise tumane zindagii dii 2 use bhuul kar bhii shaayad 2 na kabhii bhulaa sakoge na chhudaa sakoge daaman  ye nazar jhukiijhukii sii ye qadam rukeruke se 2 meraa dil ye kah rahaa hai 2 kahiin tum na jaa sakoge na chhudaa sakoge daaman  mere hamanashiin tumhiin ho mere hamsafar tumhiin ho 2 merii kaunasii hai manzil 2 ye tumhiin bataa sakoge na chhudaa sakoge daaman na nazar bachaa sakoge na chhudaa sakoge daaman

Title: aankhonaankhon men hamtum ho gae diivaane
Lyrics: ki 	aankhonaankhon men hamtum ho gae diivaane aa 	baatonbaaton men dekhaa ban gae afasaane ki 	aankhonaankhon threedots  ki 	ham ajanabii the tum the paraae 	ik duusare ke dil men samaae 	ham aur tum men uf ye mohabbat kaise ho gaii 	ham tum jaane nahiin jaane aa 	baatonbaaton threedots  ki 	kitanii hasiin ye tanahaaiyaan hain aa 	tanhaaiyon men rusvaaiyaan hain ki 	rusavaaiyon se darate nahiin ham la 	chhedo pyaar kii baaten ki 	chhodo ye bahaane do 	aankhonaankhon threedots

Title: meghavaa gagan biich jhaanke
Lyrics: meghavaa gagan biich jhaanke jhuke baadal sakhii naacho naacho rii 2 paayal jhanajhanaake jhanajhanaake meghavaa gagan biich jhaanke  chaaron or dekho jaaduu chhaayaa lachakane do guiyaan goriigorii kaayaa bajaa lo jhaanjhan rang men aake jhuumo re magan chhanchhan balakhaake meghavaa gagan biich jhaanke threedots  saa re ga saa pa pa saa re ga saa  pa ni pa ni dha ni dha pa  badii pyaarii belaa aaii aalii zaraa leke thumakaa naacho dede taalii katiile nayan karake baanke rijhaa lo sajan ko nainaa milaake  meghavaa gagan biich jhaanke threedots

Title: ham bhii kho gae hain dil bhii
Lyrics: mu 	ham bhii kho gae hain dil bhii kho gayaa hai 	kahate hain pyaar jisako shaayad vo ho gayaa hai ka 	ham bhii kho gae threedots do 	ham bhii kho gae threedots  mu 	dil hamako dhuundhataa hai ham dil ko dhuundhate hain 	manzil pe ham khade hain manzil ko dhuundhate hain ka 	dil hamako dhuundhataa threedots do 	kahate hain pyaar jisako threedots  ka 	kyaa chiiz hai mohabbat samajhegaa kyaa zamaanaa 	itanii sii hai kahaanii itanaa saa hai fasaanaa mu 	kyaa chiiz hai mohabbat threedots do 	kahate hain pyaar jisako threedots

Title: mast aankhen hain ki paimaane do
Lyrics: ta mast aankhen hain ki paimaane do     haay aaj to mujhako bahak jaane do aa itane chhalakaa ke na paimaane do     haay ik zaraa hosh men aa jaane do  ta hosh kaa kaam bahaaron men nahiin     tum saa ik phuul hazaaron men nahiin     dil kii tasqiin nazaaron men nahiin     dil ke nazadiik zaraa aane do aa ik zaraa hosh men aa jaane do ta aaj to mujhako bahak jaane do  aa dil kii har jiit men ek haar bhii hai     pyaar aataa bhii hai dushvaar bhii hai     har kadam par koii diivaar bhii hai     milane paate nahiin diivaane do ta mast aankhen hain ki paimaane do aa haay ik zaraa hosh men aa jaane do  aa khoyaa khoyaa saa ye khvaabon kaa samaan     hamen le aayii hai aramaan kahaan ta yahii duniyaa to vo duniyaa hai jahaan     ek ho jaate hain begaane do aa itane chhalakaa ke na paimaane do ta aaj to mujhako bahak jaane do  aa din khushii kaa jo guzar jaayegaa     qaafilaa dil kaa kidhar jaayegaa ta vaqt sharamaa ke thahar jaayegaa     apanii zulfen mujhe bikharaane do aa aaj to mujhako bahak jaane do ta mast aankhen hain ki paimaane do

Title: agar dil kisii se lagaayaa na hotaa
Lyrics: agar dil kisii se lagaayaa na hotaa zamaane ne hamako mitaayaa na hotaa agar dil kisii se threedots  giraanaa hii thaa tuune  aansuu samajh ke  2 to nazaron men hamako basaayaa na hotaa agar dil kisii se threedots  muqaddar men gar yahii  rusavaaiyaan thiin 2 to mahafil men terii main aayaa na hotaa agar dil kisii se threedots  agar tere daaman kii  hasarat na hotii  2 to yuun zindagii ko mitaayaa na hotaa agar dil kisii se threedots

Title: itanii badii duniyaa jahaan itanaa badaa melaa
Lyrics: itanii badii duniyaa jahaan itanaa badaa melaa magar main kitanaa akelaa kitanaa akelaa  ai dil ghadii bhar to milake karen baaten katatii nahiin aise tanahaa merii raaten  2 sab ko milaa saathii jab bhii aaii milan belaa magar main kitanaa akelaa kitanaa akelaa  guzare dinon kaa hai dhundhalaa nishaan baaqii dil to bujhaa kab se ab hai dhuaan baaqii  2 dukhate hue jiite bhalaa kyaa kyaa nahiin jhelaa magar main kitanaa akelaa kitanaa akelaa itanii badii duniyaa threedots

Title: aadhii raat ko khanak gayaa meraa kanganaa
Lyrics: la 	aadhii raat ko khanak gayaa meraa kanganaa 2 	kahiin aae hon na sajanaa hamaare anganaa 	aadhii raat ko khanak threedots  	jaa ke sajan se kaarekaare badaraa ye to kaho zaraa mere lie 2 	pyaar ke rang men rang lii hai maine korii chunar piyaa tere lie 	 is rang pe  2 chadhegaa ab koii duujaa rang naa 	aadhii raat ko khanak threedots  ra 	o jii ho sunake khanak ham tere kanganaa kii 	baat hai kyaa pahachaan gae 2 	kaun pukaare kaise hain ishaare jaanane vaale to jaan gae 	 tere saamane  2 khade hain gorii tere sajanaa 	chaahe kuchh bhii ho tuute na tumhaaraa kanganaa la 	aadhii raat ko khanak threedots

Title: ye vaadaa karen jahaan bhii rahen
Film: dil bhi teraa hum bhi tere

Title: ai ishq ye sab duniyaa vaale
Lyrics: ai ishq ye sab duniyaa vaale bekaar kii baaten karate hain paayal ke gamon kaa ilm nahiin jhankaar kii baaten karate hain  har dil men chhupaa hai piir koii har paanv men hai zanjiir koii puuchhe koii un se gam ke maze jo pyaar kii baaten karate hain  ulfat ke naye diivaanon ko kis tarah se koii samajhaaye nazaron pe lagii hai paabandii diidaar kii baaten karate hain  bhanvare hain agar madahosh to kyaa paravaane bhii hain khaamosh to kyaa sab pyaar ke nagamen gaate hain sab yaar kii baaten karate hain

Title: zulf bikharaatii chalii aaii ho
Lyrics: zulf bikharaatii chalii aaii ho ai jii socho to zaraa badalii kaa kyaa hogaa  aankh sharaabii terii usamen gulaabii dore sharm ke maare dahake gaal ye goregore aag bhadakaatii chalii aaii ho ai jii socho to zaraa sholon kaa kyaa hogaa zulf bikharaatii threedots  le baithii hain hamako ye anajaan adaaen chhod ke dar ko tere bol kahaan ham jaaen jaal phailaatii chalii aaii ho ai jii socho to zaraa panchhii kaa kyaa hogaa zulf bikharaatii threedots

Title: kisii ko pataa na chale baat kaa ki hai aaj vaadaa mulaaqaat kaa
Lyrics: kisii ko pataa na chale baat kaa ki hai aaj vaadaa mulaaqaat kaa  2 buraa haal hai dil ke jazbaat kaa ki hai aaj vaadaa threedots  na din thaa na dil men ye aramaan the 2 ye lab muskaraahat se anjaan the judaaii men ham to pareshaan the kudaa meharabaan thaa na insaan the magar aaj kyaa zikr sadamaat kaa ki hai aaj vaadaa threedots  muhabbat ajii yuun machalane lagii 2 shammaa jaise mahafil men jalane lagii chhurii maan lo dil pe chalane lagii koii dil kii hasarat nikalane lagii badalane lagaa rang haalaat kaa ki hai aaj vaadaa threedots  sajaao ye raahen bichhaao nigaahen 2 kabar unakii aaii nazar muskaraaii huaa hai ishaaraa milegaa sahaaraa muhabbat kii pyaasii mitegii udaasii kii diidaar hogaa abhii pyaar hogaa banegaa fasaanaa kisii baat kaa ki hai aaj vaadaa threedots

Lyrics: ki 	sultaanaa sultaanaa tuu na ghabaraanaa 	teremere pyaar ko kyaa rokegaa zamaanaa 	tod ke sab diivaaren tujhako le jaaegaa diivaanaa la 	sulemaan sulemaan tuu na ghabaraanaa 	teremere pyaar ko kyaa rokegaa zamaanaa 	shamaa usii mahafil men jalegii jisamen hogaa paravaanaa  	terii ho jaauun main daudii chalii aauun 	meraa naam le ke pukaaro to zaraa ki 	main teraa ho jaauun jaanodil lutaauun 	kabhii apanii zulfen sanvaaro to zaraa la 	jab ye zulfen ki 	laharaaen la 	kaale baadal ki 	chhaa jaaen la 	taubaa ban jaae afasaanaa ki 	sultaanaa sultaanaa threedots  	kyaa chup rahenge bhalaa ye kab kahenge 	ke honthon pe apane rukii hai koii baat la 	duniyaa ne haay pahare hain lagaae 	abhii to hai mushkil hamaarii mulaakaat ki 	dushman mere la 	so jaaen ki 	jab andhere la 	ho jaaen ki 	mere kvaabon men aa jaanaa 	sultaanaa sultaanaa threedots

Title: he gangaa maiyaa tohe piyarii
Film: ganga maiya tohe piyri chadhaibo bhojpurifilm
Lyrics: he gangaa maiyaa tohe piyarii chadhaibo saiyaan se kari de milanavaa haay raam saiyaan se kari de milanavaa ho raam  gangaa nahaaye suuraj paiyaa laage aaii naa maii eke manganavaa ho raam he gangaa maiyaa tohe threedots  naa more gun dhang naa more karajii  naa more eko gahanavaa ho raam kho ghuunghat jab piyaa moko dekhi hai kar bainii kauno bahanavaa haay raam kar bainii kauno bahanavaa ho raam he gangaa maiyaa tohe threedots  eke kothariyaa men aanaa re baabaa eke kothariyaa men rahanaa ho raam gun avagun moraa sab jag jaane piihar se leke anganavaa haay raam piihar se leke anganavaa ho raam he gangaa maiyaa tohe threedots

Title: ye kaun thak ke so rahaa
Lyrics: ye kaun thak ke so rahaa hai gulamohar kii chhaanv men ye phuul hai paraag hai ye aag hai charaag hai  jagaao mat ise ke phir  sulag uthengii chingiyaan garaj uthengii badaliyaan  laraz uthengii bijaliyaan thakaan khone do ise sapan pirone do ise  ye mufalison kaa taaj hai ye desh kaa suhaag hai  na ghuum ai zamiin tuu  na rang badal o aasamaan bahut dinon pe hai banaa  ke bijaliyon men aashiyaan masal ise lage nahiin havaa ise chhue nahiin ye soz hai ye saaz hai ye baagabaan ye baag hai  ye us safar pe hai chalaa  kushii jahaan haraam hai ke gam jahaan mukaam hai subah jahaan kii shaam hai sunaao loriyaan ise pilaao chaandanii ise ye subah kaa shabaab hai ye zindagii kaa raag hai

Title: dost kahaan koii tumasaa tumasaa nahiin koii mister
Lyrics: dost kahaan koii tumasaa tumasaa nahiin koii mister kabhii tum darling kabhii mahabuubaa kabhii tum bholiibhaalii sister dost kahaan koii tumasaa tumasaa nahiin koii sister  chalii gaii jaane do   ek ghuunt men paaravatii tum ek ghuunt men chandramukhii  2 ek baar lag jaao gale se devadaas hain bade dukhii uun ek buund men churchil ho gaye ek buund men hitler e e e e e  dost kahaan koii tumasaa tumasaa nahiin koii mister   rum chadhe to gam utarenge tum kisake ham kisake raat ko pii ke boriyaa dhuundhen din ko dhuundhen bistar waah haa  dost kahaan koii tumasaa tumasaa nahiin koii mister   kisakii aankh kaa aansuu hai ye tair rahaa hai pyaale men  2 duub naa jaaye andhere men khencho ise ujaale men ye kisake sinduur se maine 2 daag liyaa hai dil par  dost kahaan koii tumasaa

Title: terii nigaahon pe marmar gae ham
Lyrics: terii nigaahon pe marmar gae ham baankii adaaon pe marmar gae ham kyaa karen  3 terii nigaahon pe threedots  zulfon men leke saarii raat chale saaraa zamaanaa lie saath chale aise men jiine kaa mazaa hai sanam aankhon se teriimerii baat chale bevafaa ek nigaah dekh le dekh bhii le terii nigaahon pe threedots  terii adaa kaa to javaab nahiin merii vafaa kaa bhii hisaab nahiin suurat tumhaarii badii kuub sahii dil to hamaaraa bhii karaab nahiin bevafaa ek nigaah dekh le dekh bhii le terii nigaahon pe threedots

Title: o saajanaa na puuchh mujhase pyaar kyaa hai
Lyrics: o saajanaa na puuchh mujhase pyaar kyaa hai kitaaben dil men padh ke dekh le ki  pyaar kyaa hai  2  taaron se raat ko jab dil kii baat ho jaan lo ki jiyaa kho gayaa ki dillagii men dil kisii kaa ho gayaa o saajanaa na puuchh threedots  sapanon men har ghadii aate jo ajanabii jaan lo ki ab to niind bhii gaii ki apanii raat bhii paraaii o saajanaa na puuchh threedots

Title: ye raat bhii jaa rahii hai ke gam kii ghataa chhaa rahii hai
Lyrics: ye raat bhii jaa rahii hai ke gam kii ghataa chhaa rahii hai mere hamadam tuu nahiin aayaa ye raat bhii jaa threedots  nahiin jis taraf koii manzil usii raah pe chal rahii huun terii yaad men o sitamagar shamaa kii tarah jal rahii huun 2 shamaa bujhii jaa rahii hai mere hamadam tuu threedots  koii dushmanii aasamaan kii muhobbat kii har daastaan kii kahiin ye na ho ki tuu aae chale jaaen ham is jahaan se 2 honthon pe jaan aa rahii hai mere hamadam tuu threedots  ye raat bhii  jaa rahii hai  3

Title: main raahii anjaan raahon kaa o yaaron meraa naam anajaanaa
Lyrics: main raahii anjaan raahon kaa o yaaron meraa naam anajaanaa main panchhii anjaan baagon kaa o yaaron meraa naam threedots  mere saare giit anjaane jaane kyaa ye log diivaane jaane bas ye kaliyaan ye phuulon kii galiyaan main raagii anjaan giiiton kaa o yaaron meraa naam threedots  raste men bahaar mil jaae shaayad koii yaar mil jaae nikalaa huun akelaa dhuundhuun koii melaa main saathii anjaan sapanon kaa  pukaaro meraa naam threedots

Title: jumme kii raat ho yaa din jummeraat kaa
Lyrics: jumme kii raat ho yaa din jummeraat kaa karake jaanaa gorii vaadaa mulaaqaat kaa  piir kii raat aur din itavaar kaa kiyaa hai vaadaa maine piyaa tose pyaar kaa   yaad hai gorii teraa chhip chhip ke milanaa duniyaa kii nazaron se bach bach ke chalanaa ye na puuchho piyaa biitii kaise ratiyaan kar gaiin jaaduu terii niilii ankhiyaan miithaa miithaa dard hai nazaron ke vaar kaa kiyaa hai vaadaa maine threedots  nikalo na galiyon men ban than ke gorii aisii hii baaton se khulatii hai chorii duniyaa ne roke agar tere mere raaste aauungii ud ke piyaa milane ke vaaste sang mere tuu hai nahiin dar mohe majhadhaar kaa kiyaa hai vaadaa maine threedots

Title: muskuraa laadale muskuraa
Lyrics: muskuraa laadale muskuraa 2 koii bhii phuul itanaa nahiin kuubasuurat hai jitanaa ye mukhadaa teraa muskuraa laadale muskuraa  terii ye muskaan koii na chhiine kabhii ho phuul kii sej soye jawaanii terii maalik se hai ye duaa hai ye duaa  koii bhii phuul itanaa nahiin kuubasuurat hai jitanaa ye mukhadaa teraa muskuraa laadale muskuraa  tujhako jo dekhaa wo din yaad aane lage aankhon ke bujhate diye jhilamilaane lage main tere jaisaa hii thaa aisaa hii thaa  koii bhii phuul itanaa nahiin kuubasuurat hai jitanaa ye mukhadaa teraa muskuraa laadale muskuraa  bach ke tuu chal laadale buraa hai ye jahaan ban saanp dansataa hai apanaa hii saayaa yahaan 2 har koii hai bewafaa hai bewafaa  koii bhii phuul itanaa nahiin kuubasuurat hai jitanaa ye mukhadaa teraa muskuraa laadale muskuraa 2

Title: man re tuu kaahe naa dhiir dhare
Lyrics: man re tuu kaahe naa dhiir dhare vo nirmohii moh naa jaane jinakaa moh kare man re threedots  is jiivan kii chadhatii dhalatii dhuup ko kisane baandhaa rang pe kisane pahare daale rup ko kisane baandhaa kaahe ye jatan kare man re threedots  utanaa hii upakaar samajh koi jitanaa saath nibhaa de janama maran kaa mel hai sapanaa ye sapanaa bisaraa de koi na sang mare man re threedots

Title: aaj dil pe koii zor chalataa nahiin
Lyrics: aaj dil pe koi zor chalataa nahiin  muskuraane lage the magar ro pade  roz hii kii tarah aaj bhii dard thaa  ham chhupaane lage the magar ro pade   aur ab kyaa kahen kyaa huaa hai hamen  tum to ho bekhabar ham bhii anjaan hain  bas yahi jaan lo to bahut ho gayaa  ham bhii rakhate hain dil ham bhii insaan hain  muskuraate hue ham bahaanaa koi  fir banaane lage the magar ro pade   hain sitaare kahaan itane aakaash par  har ek ko agar ik sitaaraa mile  kashtiyon ke liye ye bhanvar bhii to hain  kyaa zaruuri hai har ek ko kinaaraa mile  bas yahi soch kar ham badhe chain se  duub jaane lage the magar ro pade   umr bhar kaash ham yuun hii rote rahe aaj kyuun ke hamen ye hui hai khabar  muskuraahat kii to koi kimat nahiin  aansuon se hui hai hamaari kadar  baadalon kii tarah ham to barase binaa  laut jaane lage the magar ro pade

Title: har dil jo pyaar karegaa vo gaanaa gaayegaa
Lyrics: har dil jo pyaar karegaa vo gaanaa gaayegaa diivaanaa sainkadon men pahachaanaa jaayegaa diivaanaa   threedots  aap hamaare dil ko churaa ke aankh churaaye jaate hain ye iktarafaa rasamevafaa ham phir bhii nibhaaye jaate hain chaahat kaa dastuur hai lekin aap ko hii maaluum nahiin o o o jis mahafil men shamaa ho paravaanaa jaayegaa diivaanaa sainkadon men   threedots  bhuulii bisarii yaaden merii hansate gaate bachapan kii yaad dilaa ke chalii aatiin hain niind churaane nainan kii ab kah duungii karate karate kitane saavan biit gaye jaane kab in aankhon kaa sharamaanaa jaayegaa diivaanaa sainkadon men   threedots  apanii apanii sab ne kah lii lekin ham chup chaap rahe dard paraayaa jisako pyaaraa vo kyaa apanii baat kahe khaamosii kaa ye afasaanaa rah jaayegaa baad mere apanaa ke har kisii ko begaanaa jaayegaa diivaanaa sainkadon men   threedots  diivaanaa

Title: aanchal men sajaa lenaa kaliyaan zulfon men sitaare bhar lenaa
Lyrics: aanchal men sajaa lenaa kaliyaan zulfon men sitaare bhar lenaa aise hii kabhii jab shaam dhale tab yaad hamen bhii kar lenaa aanchal men sajaa lenaa kaliyaan  aayaa thaa yahaan begaanaa saa aayaa thaa yahaan begaanaa saa chal duungaa kahiin diivaanaa saa chal duungaa kahiin diivaanaa saa diivaane kii khaatir tum koi ilzaam naa apane sar lenaa aise hii kabhii jab shaam dhale tab yaad hamen bhii kar lenaa aanchal men sajaa lenaa kaliyaan  rastaa jo mile anjaan koi rastaa jo mile anjaan koi aa jaae agar tuufaan koi aa jaae agar tuufaan koi apane ko akelaa jaan ke tum aankhon men na aansuu bhar lenaa aise hii kabhii jab shaam dhale tab yaad hamen bhii kar lenaa aanchal men sajaa lenaa kaliyaan

Title: hamane dekhaa hai tumhen aisaa gumaan hotaa hai
Lyrics: hamane dekhaa hai tumhen aisaa gumaan hotaa hai aankh milatii hai to kyon dard javaan hotaa hai hamane dekhaa hai threedots  aisaa lagataa hai ki hamadam meraa vaapas aayaa mere jiivan pe muhabbat kaa nashaa saa chhaayaa dil men chalane lagaa phir husn kaa roshan saayaa hamane dekhaa hai threedots  jaane kyon meraa dil qadamon pe jhuk jaataa hai koii bichhadaa huaa saathii mujhe yaad aataa hai ye milan pyaar bharaa kisalie tadapaataa hai hamane dekhaa hai threedots  aaj sadiyon kii mulaakaat nikal aaii hai jaise tuufaan se baaraat nikal aaii hai dil men rahatii thii vo hii baat nikal aaii hai hamane dekhaa hai threedots

Title: main to ek khvaab huun is khvaab se tuu pyaar na kar
Lyrics: main to ek khvaab huun is khvaab se tuu pyaar na kar pyaar ho jaae to phir pyaar kaa izahaar na kar main to ek khvaab huun threedots  ye havaaen sabhii chupachaap chalii jaaengii laut kar phir kabhii gulashan men nahiin aaengii apane haathon men havaaon ko gariftaar na kar  2 main to ek khvaab huun threedots  shaakh se tuut ke gunche bhii kabhii khilate hain raat aur din bhii zamaane men kahiin milate hain bhuul jaa jaane de taqadiir se taqaraar na kar  2 main to ek khvaab huun threedots

Title: raazedil unase chhupaayaa naa gayaa
Lyrics: raazedil unase chhupaayaa naa gayaa 2 pyaar kii aag kuchh aisii bhadakii 2 ek sholaa bhii dabaayaa na gayaa 2 raazedil unase threedots  pahalepahale to mujhe vo samajh hii na sake dil ko tadapaate rahe mujhako tarasaate rahe aankh se aankh kaii baar milii 2 dil se dil phir bhii milaayaa na gayaa raazedil unase threedots  mujhako pahachaan ke vo dardedil jaan ke vo kuchh pareshaan se hain kuchh pashemaan se hain itane sharamaae hue hain hamase 2 sar jhukaayaa to uthaayaa na gayaa raazedil unase threedots  aankh milate hii jhukii baat honthon pe rukii berukii pyaar banii jiit bhii haar banii kar gaii kaam mohabbat kii nazar 2 unase daaman bhii bachaayaa na gayaa raazedil unase threedots

Title: dil kii manzil kuchh aisii hai manzil
Lyrics: ole ole ole ole ole ole o dil kii manzil kuchh aisii hai manzil pyaar jis ne kiyaa ho vo jaane  pahaluu men yuun to sab ke hii dil hai dard ho jis men dil vahii dil hai pahaluu men yuun to sab ke hii dil hai dard ho jis men dil vahii dil hai pyaar jo hogaa dard bhii hogaa pyaar na ho to jiinaa mushkil hai aaj kis se javaan hai ye mahafil pyaar jis ne kiyaa ho vo jaane  dil kii manzil kuchh aisi hai manzil threedots  itanaa badaa hai duniyaan kaa melaa log dilon se milate nahiin hain itanaa badaa hai duniyaan kaa melaa log dilon se milate nahiin hain pyaar binaa to dono jahaan men phuul khushii ke khilate nahiin hain kaun kis kaa huaa hai qaatil pyaar jis ne kiyaa ho vo jaane  dil kii manzil kuchh aisi hai manzil threedots

Lyrics: merii mohabbat paak mohabbat aur jahaan kii kaaq mohabbat kahiin tumhen pyaar na ho jaae 2 o bachbach ke chalanaa huzuur merii mohabbat threedots  puurabpashchim uttardaxin mere pyaar kii siimaa meraa pyaar hai itanaa uunchaa jaise raamrahiimaa 2 merii mohabbat threedots  tumako paakar svarg se sundar manzil maine paa lii tere pyaar men mar jaane kii qasam hai maine khaa lii 2 merii mohabbat threedots

Title: agar sun le to ik nagamaa huzuureyaar laayaa huun
Lyrics: agar sun le to ik nagamaa huzuureyaar laayaa huun vo kalii chatakii ki dil tuutaa par ik jhankaar laayaa huun agar sun le tuu ek nagamaa threedots  mujhe maaluum hai itanaa ki main kyaa merii qiimat kyaa jo sab kuchh thaa jo kuchh bhii nahiin aisaa pyaar laayaa huun agar sun le tuu ik nagamaa threedots  achaanak aa girii bijalii to phir suurat yahii nikalii ujad gayaa dil to ab zakmon kaa gulazaar laayaa huun agar sun le tuu ik nagamaa threedots  ajab huun main bhii diivaanaa ajab hai meraa nazaraanaa ke unake lie apanii vafaa kaa tuutaa haar laayaa huun agar sun le tuu ik nagamaa threedots

Title: saarangaa terii yaad men nain hue bechain
Lyrics: saarangaa teri yaad men nain hue bechain  madhur tumhaare milan binaa  din katate nahiin rain ho saarangaa teri yaad men threedots  vo ambuvaa ka jhuulanaa vo pipal kii chhaanv ghuunghat men jab chaand tha mehandii lagi thi paanv ho aaj ujadake rah gayaa  2 vo sapanon ka gaanv ho threedots saarangaa teri yaad men threedots  sang tumhaare do ghadii bit gaye jo pal  jal bharake mere nain men aaj hue ojhal  ho sukh leke duhkh de gayiin 2 do akhiyan chanchal ho threedots saarangaa teri yaad men threedots  saarangaa terii yaad men nain hue bechain madhur tumhaare milan binaa din katate nahiin rain  madhuban ke madhukunj men chalat birahaa samiir baat takuun terii main priye jal jamunaa ke tiir

Title: jo diyaa thaa tumane ik din
Lyrics: mahendra kis baag men main janmaa khelaa meraa romrom ye jaanataa hai tum bhuul gae shaayad maalii par phuul tumhen pahachaanataa hai  jo diyaa thaa tumane ik din mujhe phir vo pyaar de do ik karz maangataa huun bachapan udhaar de do  tum chhod gae the jisako ik dhuul bhare raste men vo phuul aaj rotaa hai ek amiir ke guladaste men meraa dil tadap rahaa hai mujhe phir dulaar de do ik karz maangataa huun threedots  merii udaas aankhon ko hai yaad vo vaqt salonaa jab jhuulaa thaa baahon men main banake tumhaaraa khilonaa merii vo kushii kii duniyaa phir ek baar de do ik karz maangataa huun threedots  hemant tumhen dekh naach uthate hain mere pichhale din vo sunhere aur duur kahiin dikhate hain mujhase bichhade do chehare jise sunake ghar vo lauten mujhe vo pukaar de do  mahendra ik karz maangataa huun threedots

Title: aajaa re mere pyaar ke raahii
Lyrics: aajaa re mere pyaar ke raahii raah nihaaruun badii der se aajaa threedots  jo chaand bulaae main to nahiin boluun jo suuraj aae aankh nahiin kholuun muund ke nainaa main tihaarii  raah nihaaruun badii der se aajaa re threedots  kahaan hai basaa de tan kii kushabuu se ghataa se main kheluun zulf terii chhuuke ruup kaa tere main pujaarii raah nihaaruun badii der se aajaa re threedots  kahiin bhii rahuungii main huun terii chhaayaa tujhe mainne paake phir bhii nahiin paayaa dekh main terii priit kii maarii  raah nihaaruun badii der se aajaa re threedots

Title: dhadakaa hai dil men pyaar tumhaaraa
Lyrics: dhadakaa hai dil men pyaar tumhaaraa abhiiabhii chamakaa hai aarazuu kaa sitaaraa abhiiabhii  mahabuub kii nigaahekaram kaisii chiiz hai vo ek pal to chaand se hamako aziiz hai jo hamane unake ghar men guzaaraa abhiiabhii chamakaa hai aarazuu kaa sitaaraa abhiiabhii  aae hain ham sharaabemohabbat pie huye aankhon men ik kumaar kii duniyaa lie huye dil maangataa hai unakaa sahaaraa abhiiabhii chamakaa hai aarazuu kaa sitaaraa abhiiabhii  betaabiyaan raaton ko hamen ab jagaayengii aaenge jab vahaan se to yaaden bulaayengii chaahegaa jii ke jaaen dubaaraa abhiiabhii chamakaa hai aarazuu kaa sitaaraa abhiiabhii

Title: more nainaa saavan bhaado
Lyrics: more nainaa saavan bhaado torii rahrah yaad sataae baalam kit jaauun re main to ro ro kar mar jaauun re  aaiin ras kii bharii phuhaaren morii bhiig rahiin re ankhiyaan it rimajhim men saanvariyaa morii sulag rahii re bagiyaa main to priit kiye pachhataaii re moraa dard na jaane koy baalam kit jaauun re threedots  main to pavan chakore dholii ban jangal kii hiraniyaa kahaan chhup gayaa re moraa chandaa kit gayii re haay chaandaniyaa are motii chugatii hansii ab chug rahii re angaare baalam kit jaauun re threedots

Title: milii kaak men muhabbat jalaa dil kaa aashiyaanaa
Lyrics: milii kaak men muhabbat jalaa dil kaa aashiyaanaa jo thii aaj tak haqiiqat vahii ban gaii fasaanaa  ye bahaar kaisii aaii jo fizaan bhii saath laaii main kahaan rahuun chaman men meraa lut gayaa thikaanaa  mujhe raastaa dikhaakar mere kaaravaan ko luutaa idhar aa gale lagaa luun tujhe garadishezamaanaa

Title: aaj kii raat hai bas jalawaa dikhaane ke liye
Lyrics: aaj kii raat hai bas jalawaa dikhaane ke liye aaj kii raat nahiin ruuth ke jaane ke liye2 aaj kii raat  apane haathon se ye ghuunghat to uthaa lene do pyaas aankhon kii merii jaan bujhaa lene do aaj tum laaj ke zevar ko utaaro dilabar aag menhadii kii zaraa dil men lagaa lene do aaj kii raat hai pahaluu men samaane ke liye 2 aaj kii raat nahiin ruuth ke jaane ke liye aaj kii raat  kaalii zulfen mere kaandhe pe bikhar jaane do tiir kaajal ke mere dil men utar jaane do aaj mahakii huii tanahaaii yahii kahatii hai jo mere dil pe guzartii hai guzar jaane do aaj kii raat hai baanhon men uthaane ke liye 2 aaj kii raat nahiin ruuth ke jaane ke liye  aaj kii raat hai bas jalawaa dikhaane ke liye aaj kii raat nahiin ruuth ke jaane ke liye aaj ki raat

Title: na phuulon kii duniyaa  paayaliyaa baavarii baaje
Lyrics: aa a a  na phuulon kii duniyaa na taaron kii duniyaa ye hai bas kayaalebahaaron kii duniyaa  yahaan mast nazaren bahakane ko tarase umangon bhare dil dhadakane ko tarase ye hai pyaar ke besahaaron kii duniyaa  yahaan gam hai laakhon masarrat nahiin hai tadapane kii lekin ijaazat nahiin hai ye hai ishq ke beqaraaron kii duniyaa  na phuulon kii duniyaa na taaron kii duniyaa ye hai bas kayaalebahaaron kii duniyaa  aa a a  paayaliyaa baavarii baaje paayaliyaa morii jhanana jhanana jhana jhananana baaje a a paayaliyaa baavarii baaje threedots  aa a a  aaj sakhii more pii ghar aaye aa a  a aaj sakhii more pii ghar aaye dekhdekh chhab jiyaraa jaaye baar baar moraa man laharaaye paayaliyaa baavarii baaje threedots  saat suron ke diip jalaake aa a a saat suron ke diip jalaake prem biin kii dhun par gaake aaj naachuun main piyaa ko paake paayaliyaa baavarii baaje threedots  aa a a
