Title: bade aaye shikaarii shikaar karane
Lyrics: are he he he he he he he he he bade aaye shikaarii shikaar karane 2 in bholebhaale hiranon pe aa haa haa haa haa in bholebhaale hiranon pe vaar karane bade aaye aa haan bade aaye shikaarii shikaar karane 2  chitavan ko taan jyuunhii khiinchii kamaan jyuunhii khiinchii kamaan apane karejawaa ko laagaa re baan are laagaa re baan bhuule hai ab to ye tanman kaa bhaan tanman kaa bhaan tadape re machhalii se ab inake praan are ho  dekho byaakul hai nain byaakul hai nain haay man hai bechain haay haay man hai bechain kaise kaatenge e rain aaye kaahe the dil ko o ho ho ho ho ho kaahe aaye the dil ko biimaar karane  bade aaye aa haan bade aaye shikaarii shikaar karane 2  ghaayal banaane ko itanaa udham itanaa udham isake liye kyaa ye aankhen thiin kam kyaa ye aankhen thiin kam kisase ye nakhare aur kisase ye dam kisase ye dam kaisaa gajab haay kaisaa julam are ho  ab badale hai rang ab badale hai rang dekho thirake hai ang dekho thirake hai ang nahiin chhutega e sang aaye kaahe re nainon ko aa haa haa haa haa haa  aaye kaahe re nainon ko chaak karane bade aaye aa haan bade aaye shikaarii shikaar karane 2 in bholebhaale hiranon pe o ho ho ho ho ho in bholebhaale hiranon pe vaar karane bade aaye aa haan bade aaye shikaarii shikaar karane 2 bade aaye

Title: vo zindagii jo thii ab terii panaahon men
Lyrics: vo zindagii jo thii ab terii panaahon men 2 chalii hai aaj bhatakane udaas raahon men vo zindagii jo threedots  tamaam umr ke rishte ghadii men kaaq hue 2 na ham hain dil men kisii ke na hain nigaahon men 2 vo zindagii jo threedots  ye aaj jaan liyaa apanii kamanasiibii ne 2 ki begunaahii bhii shaamil huii gunaahon men 2 vo zindagii jo threedots  kisii ko apanii zaruurat na ho to kyaa kiije 2 nikal pade hain simatane qazaa kii baanhon men 2 vo zindagii jo threedots

Title: terii raahon men khade hain dil thaam ke
Lyrics: terii raahon men khade hain dil thaam ke haay ham hain diivaane tere naam ke merii ankhiyon ke nuur mere dil ke suruur chaahe raho duurduur tumhen paanaa hai zuruur terii raahon men threedots  baadal barase duniyaa jaane ankhiyaan barasen koii na jaane dil kii lagii ko dil hii jaane terii raahon men threedots  kis chhaliyaa pe ye dil aayaa patthar se shiishaa takaraayaa na vo apanaa na vo paraayaa terii raahon men threedots

Title: night in london zulfon kii kahaanii hai
Lyrics: zulfon kii kahaanii hai jannat kii nishaanii hai nagamon kii javaanii hai dilaqash hai suhaanii hai  phir koii ishaaraa kiijie phir nazaaraa kiijie phir mahafil aa jaae rang pe abhii to janaab aaegaa shabaab abhii zaraa hai kamasin  chaand aur bahaaron ke binaa dekhie sitaaron ke binaa roshan hai rangiin hai raat ye isakii bahaar isape nisaar bharii javaanii ke din

Title: o nirdaii priitam
Lyrics: o nirdaii priitam  o nirdaii priitam pranay jaga ke hriday churaa ke chup hue kyon tum o nirdaii priitam  ye chandaa shiital kahalaataa phir kyon mere ang jalaataa phuul saa komal baan madan ka  2 shuul banake tan men chubh jaataa  tumhare shur ke birahaa tap men aag banii punam o nirdaii priitam  2  aa threedots tum madhuban ke ramar sayaane ban kii kalii tera hriday na jaane gunjan men kya man men kya tha priit ya chal tha kya pahachaane chit ke chor kathor hriday ke kyon mile the ham o nirdaii priitam  o nirdaii priitam  pranay jaga ke  hriday churaa ke  chup hue kyon tum  o nirdaii priitam

Title: tum se hii merii zindagii
Lyrics: mu  tum se hii merii zindagii merii bahaar tum gii apane hii dil se puuchh lo kis kaa pyaar ho tum  mu  tum se hii merii zindagii threedots   mu  gaatii huii havaaon men teraa hii giit hai gii saajan mere nigaahon men terii hii priit hai      chandaa kaa ruup chaandanii meraa shringaar tum      tum se hii merii zindagii threedots  gii ye muskuraataa aasamaan ye jhuumatii zamiin mu  mujhako zaraa sambhaalanaa kho jaauun na kahiin      aise men apanaa kah bhii do bas ek baar tum do  tum se hii merii zindagii threedots  mu  aatii hai aisii pyaar kii ghadiiyaan nasiib se gii ye dil kii dhadakanen zaraa sun lo qariib se      aaye ho leke pyaar ke sapane hazaar tum mu  apane hii dil se puuchh lo kis kaa pyaar ho tum do  tum se hii merii zindagii threedots

Title: kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar
Lyrics: hamm threedots  kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar 2 mohe chaakar samajh nihaar kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar 2  tuu jise chaahe aisii nahiin main haan terii raadhaa jaisii nahiin main phir bhii huun kaisii kaisii nahiin main krishnaa threedots mohe dekh to le ek baar kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar  2  buund hii buund main pyaar kii chunakar pyaasii rahii par laaii huun giridhar tuut hii jaae aas kii gaagar mohanaa threedots aisii kaankariyaa nahiin maar kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar  2  maatii karo yaa swarna banaa lo tan ko mere charanon se lagaa lo muralii samajh haathon men uthaa lo socho naa kachhu aab he krishna muraar kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar mohe chaakar samajh nihaar chaakar samajh nihaar  2 kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar tere dwaar kaanhaa kaanhaa aan padii main tere dwaar

Title: suno jaanaan mere pahaluu se mat jaanaa
Lyrics: suno jaanaan suno jaanaan mere pahaluu se mat jaanaa agar jaanaa to yuun jaanaa judaa sar tan se kar jaanaa suno jaanaan threedots  ye cheharaa kyuun chhupaae ho ye daaman kyon bachaae ho zaraa baitho chale jaanaa kaii din men to aae ho tum ik rangiin dhokhaa ho nahiin maaluum kyaakyaa ho tumhen takaliif to hogii ghadii bhar ko thahar jaanaa suno jaanaan threedots  nigaahenaaz kii baaten javaanandaaz kii baaten abhii to tumase karanii hain bahut sii raaz kii baaten abhii se bevafaaii hai duhaaii hai duhaaii hai mere paas aao pahale phir jidhar chaaho udhar jaanaa suno jaanaan threedots  ye aakir kaisaa vaadaa hai kaho ab kyaa iraadaa hai mujhe dil de ke dil le lo saudaa siidhaasaadaa hai tumhen pahachaanane vaale nahiin yuun maanane vaale kahiin tum baatonbaaton men na apanaa kaam kar jaanaa suno jaanaan threedots

Title: main huun diivaanaa badaa mastaanaa
Lyrics: main huun diivaanaa badaa mastaanaa duniyaa mujhe kuchh bhii kahe gaataa chalaa dil kaa taraanaa main huun diivaanaa threedots  ruup nagar kaa raahii huun main pyaar meraa saramaayaa hai mere lambe safar kaa saathii ek meraa hii saayaa hai main huun diivaanaa threedots  udate udate pyaare panchhii is duniyaa se duur chale main bhii unake sang chalaa huun chaand nagar men shaam dhale main huun diivaanaa threedots

Title: main pyaar kaa diivaanaa sabase mujhe ulfat hai
Lyrics: main pyaar kaa diivaanaa sabase mujhe ulfat hai har phuul meraa dil hai aur dil men muhabbat hai main pyaar kaa diivaanaa threedots  ghabaraa ke kizaan gujarii aur daur nayaa aayaa insaan ke jiivan men ik rang nayaa laayaa  siine men naii halachal  2 chehare pe bhii rangat hai main pyaar kaa diivaanaa threedots  sunataa huun main laharon se sangiit bahaaron ke dam lene ko rukataa huun saaye men chanaaron ke  kaante hon ki angaare  2 chalanaa merii aadat hai main pyaar kaa diivaanaa threedots  tuu kyaa hai mujhe ek din mil jaae to main jaanuun aur phuul mere dil kaa khil jaae to main maanuun  jalavon kaa pujaarii huun  2 diidaar kii hasarat hai main pyaar kaa diivaanaa threedots

Lyrics: chalat musaafir moh liyo re pinjade vaalii muniyaa   4 	 ud ud baithii halavaiyaa dukaniyaa  2 he raamaa ud ud baithii halavaiyaa dukaniyaa aare barafii ke sab ras le liyo re pinjade vaalii muniyaa   2 	  a he a he threedots he raamaa 	  ud ud baithii bajajavaa dukaniyaa  2 aahaa ud ud baithii bajajavaa dukaniyaa aare kapadaa ke sab ras le liyo re pinjade vaalii muniyaa   3 	 jiyo jiyo palakadas jiyo  	 ud ud baithii panavadiyaa dukaniyaa  2 he raamaa ud ud baithii panavadiyaa dukaniyaa aare biidaa ke sab ras le liyo re pinjade vaalii muniyaa   3

Title: ab yahaan koii nahiin aaegaa
Lyrics: ab yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin aaegaa diletanahaa gametanahaaii men dhal jaaegaa ab yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin aaegaa ab yahaan koii nahiin  ye hasiin chaand hai yaa diidaaehairaan koii ye meraa dil hai ke hai mahafileviiraan koii zindagii hai ke ye hai zulfepareshaan koii kaun is ulajhii huii zulf ko sulajhaaegaa ab yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin aaegaa ab yahaan koii nahiin  daasataan katm mere dard kii ho jaaegii saath hii tere terii yaad bhii kho jaaegii muntazir aankh bhii thak haar ke so jaaegii raat kaa aakarii aansuu bhii chhalak jaaegaa ab yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin aaegaa ab yahaan koii nahiin

Title: dil jo na kah sakaa
Lyrics: dil jo na kah sakaa vahii raazedil kahane kii raat aaii dil jo na kah sakaa  nagamaa saa koii jaag uthaa badan men jhankaar kii sii tharatharii hai tan men 2 ho pyaar kii inhiin dhadakatii dhadakatii fizaaon men rahane kii raat aaii dil jo na kah sakaa threedots  ab tak dabii thii ek maujearamaan lab tak jo aaii ban gaii hai tuufaan 2 ho baat pyaar kii bahakatii  bahakatii nigaahon se kahane kii raat aaii dil jo na kah sakaa threedots  guzare na ye shab khol duun ye zulfen tumako chhupaa luun muund ke ye palaken 2 ho beqaraar sii larazatii larazatii sii chhaanvon men rahane kii raat aaii dil jo na kah sakaa threedots

Title: ishq kii garmiiejazbaat kise pesh karuun
Lyrics: ishq kii garmiiejazbaat kise pesh karuun ye sulagate hue dinraat kise pesh karuun  husn aur husn kaa har naaz hai parde men abhii apanii nazaron kii shikaayaat kise pesh karuun  terii aavaaz ke jaaduu ne jagaayaa hai jinhen vo tassavvur vo kayaalaat kise pesh karuun  ai merii jaanegazal ai merii iimaanegazal ab sivaa tere ye nagamaat kise pesh karuun  koii hamaraaz to paauun koii hamadam to mile dil kii dhadakan ke ishaaraat kise pesh karuun

Title: merii zindagi ke chiraag ko terii berukii ne bujhaa diyaa
Lyrics: merii zindagi ke chiraag ko terii berukii ne bujhaa diyaa tere raaste kii main kaak huun mujhe aaj tuune basaa diyaa  tujhe paake bhii terii justujuu tujhe milake bhii terii aarzuu tere paas laake nasiib ne mujhe kitanii duur hataa diyaa  tuu vo phuul jisamen vafaa nahiin main vo dard jisakii dawaa nahiin tujhe dekhakar jo ye lab hanse terii aarzuu ne rulaa diyaa

Title: chhuu lene do naazuk honthon ko kuchh aur nahiin hain jaam hain ye
Lyrics: chhuu lene do naazuk hothon ko kuchh aur nahiin hain jaam hain ye qudarat ne jo hamako bakshaa hai vo sabase hansiin iinaam hain ye  sharamaa ke na yuun hii kho denaa rangiin javaanii kii ghadiyaan betaab dhadakate siinon kaa aramaan bharaa paigaam hai ye chhuu threedots  achchhon ko buraa saabit karanaa duniyaa kii puraanii aadat hai is mai ko mubaarak chiiz samajh maanaa kii bahut badanaam hai ye chhuu threedots

Title: abhii kyaa sunoge sunaa to hansoge
Lyrics: abhii kyaa sunoge sunaa to hansoge ki hai giit adhuuraa taraanaa adhuuraa 2 jo tum chup rahoge jo kuchh na kahoge rahegaa sadaa ye fasaanaa adhuuraa ki hai giit adhuuraa taraanaa adhuraa  zamaane se jo main ne siikhaa nahiin kuchh bhii vo mere kaam kaa sikhaa do jo tum miit mere mujhe nagamaa ik apane naam kaa saje subah cheharaa khile shaam kaa  abhii kyaa sunoge sunaa to hansoge ki hai giit adhuuraa taraanaa adhuuraa 2  qariib aa ke bhii duur rahanaa tumhii jaano hai is men raaz kyaa jo kuchh hai to hai naaz gam par karuun dil par main apane naaz kyaa sadaa merii kyaa hai meraa saaz kyaa  abhii kyaa sunoge sunaa to hansoge ki hai giit adhuuraa taraanaa adhuuraa 2  kisii kaa na ho jis pe saayaa mujhe aise din aisii raat do main manzil to kud dhuundh luungii mere haathon men apanaa haath do qadam do qadam tum meraa saath do  abhii kyaa sunoge sunaa to hansoge ki hai giit adhuuraa taraanaa adhuuraa 2

Title: dilenaadaan ko sanbhaaluun to chale jaaiyegaa
Lyrics: dilenaadaan ko sanbhaaluun to chale jaaiyegaa ek zaraa hosh men aa luun to chale jaaiyegaa  abhii raahon men andheraa hii andheraa  hogaa aur andhere men chhupaa koii luteraa hogaa har taraf diip jalaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa ek zaraa hosh men aa luun to threedots  jaan pahachaan mulaaqaat huii kuub huaa merii duniyaa men naii baat huii kuub huaa baat se baat banaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa ek zaraa hosh men aa luun to threedots  rok luun aap ko dil men nahiin aramaan aise meri duniyaa men kahaan aate hain mehamaan aise apanii duniyaa ko sajaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa ek zaraa hosh men aa luun to threedots

Title: aaj kii raat ye kaisii raat ki hamako niind nahiin aatii
Lyrics: ra 	 aaj kii raat ye kaisii raat ki hamako niind nahiin aatii 	merii jaan aao baitho paas ki hamako niind nahiin aatii  2 	aaj kii raat threedots  saa 	he ye aaj tumhen kyaa ho gayaa hai 	uf tum apane dil ko samajhaao naa ra 	machal uthaa ye dil naadaan badaa ziddii badii mushkil 2 	kudaa ko bhii manaa luun main magar maane naa ruuthaa dil 	tumhiin dekho karo koii baat ki hamako niind nahiin aatii 	merii jaan aao baitho threedots  saa 	suno merii ek baat maanoge 	maanoge naa 	tumhen andhere men niind nahiin aatii to 	to lo main roshanii kie detii huun ra 	andheraa hai to rahane do mujassim chaandanii ho tum 2 	na jaae roshanii tumase ki aisii roshanii ho tum 	na siine se hataao haath ki hamako niind nahiin aatii 	merii jaan aao baitho threedots  saa 	maaruungii haan

Title: jayjay he jagadambe maataa
Lyrics: jayjay he jagadambe maataa dvaar tihaare jo bhii aataa bin maange sabkuchh paa jaataa  tuu chaahe to jiivan dede chaahe pal men jiivan lele janmmaran sab haath men tere he shakti he maataa jayjay he threedots  paapii ho yaa hove pujaarii raajaa ho yaa hove bhikhaarii phir bhii tuune jodaa sabase maanbete kaa naataa jayjay he threedots  jabjab jisane tujhako pukaaraa tuune diyaa hai badhake sahaaraa har bhuule raahii ko teraa pyaar hii raah dikhaataa jayjay he threedots

Title: bhagavaan ik qusuur kii itanii badii sazaa
Lyrics: bhagavaan ik qusuur kii itanii badii sazaa duniyaa terii yahii hai to duniyaa se main chalaa bhagavaan ik qusuur threedots  duniyaa ke zaalimon ne chalaaiin vo aandhiyaan saare chiraag bujh gae main dekhataa rahaa duniyaa terii yahii hai threedots  main ye samajh rahaa thaa mere daag dhul gae hogaa kuchh aur kuunejigar ye pataa na thaa duniyaa terii yahii hai threedots  mujh saa badanasiib na hogaa jahaan men jo bhii milaa usii ne gunahagaar hii kahaa duniyaa terii yahii hai threedots

Title: raah ke taalib hain  apanii bhii kyaa zindagii hai niraalii
Lyrics: raah ke taalib hain par beraah padate hain qadam dekhie kyaa dhuundhate hain aur kyaa paate hain ham  apanii bhii kyaa zindagii hai niraalii jahaan gae thukaraae gae jaise botal khaalii  rangiin vo zamaanaa thaa sapanaa vo kyaa suhaanaa thaa tab subahoshaam kushiyon ke jaam har saans ek taraanaa thaa ab to bas har ghadii dukh bharii bebasii aas kii har kiran ashq ban bah gaii apanii bhii kyaa zindagii threedots  kyaa niind kisako sonaa hai ab saarii raat ronaa hai dukhade bichhaa ke sab kuchh bhuul ke bas ek baar sonaa hai zindagiizindagii o merii laadalii aa gale mil hai shaayad ye raat aakarii apanii bhii kyaa zindagii threedots

Title: raat suhaanii hai
Lyrics: raat suhaanii hai soyaa soyaa chaand hai merii qasam hai tujhako ek baar muskuraa de  phir kahaan ye mast nazaare phir kahaan ye samaa hansate hain aakaash ke taare aise me tuu kahaan pyaas milan kii hai thodii thodii aas hai  merii qasam hai tujhako ek baar muskuraa de  dilarubaa dil tujhe pukaare nain se nain milaa pyaar bhare kuchh karake ishaare priit kii riit nibhaa raat nashiilii hai khoyaa khoyaa pyaar hai merii qasam hai tujhako ek baar muskuraa de

Title: panth nihaaruun  pade barakhaa phuhaar
Lyrics: panth nihaaruun dagar buhaaruun nain bahaauun niir suulii uupar sej piyaa kii kis vidh milanaa hoy  pade barakhaa phuhaar kare jiyaraa pukaar dukh jaane naa hamaar bairan rut barasaat kii pade barakhaa phuhaar threedots  ut barase badaravaa kaare it barase do nain hamaare haay mitii kajare kii dhaar lutaa man kaa singaar dukh jaane naa hamaar threedots  dukh hamarii abhaagan priit ke vo hii jaane jo haaraa ho jiit ke tuute sapanon ke haar suunaa laage sansaar dukh jaane naa hamaar threedots

Title: mujhe raat din ye kyaal hai vo nazar se mujhako
Lyrics: mujhe raat din ye kyaal hai vo nazar se mujhako giraa na de merii zindagii kaa diyaa kahiin ye gamon kii aandhii bujhaa na de mujhe raat din ye threedots  mere dil ke daag na jal uthen kahiin mere siine kii aag se 2 ye ghutiighutii merii aah bhii kahiin hosh mere ganvaa na de mujhe raat din ye threedots  main diyaa huun aisaa jahaan men ki jalaa to huun nahiin roshanii 2 jo jigar men hai vo kalish kahiin merii hasaraton ko mitaa na de mujhe raat din ye threedots

Title: zaalim zamaane ne itanaa sataayaa hai
Lyrics: zaalim zamaane ne itanaa sataayaa hai rone lagii zindagii gam muskuraayaa hai 2 zaalim zamaane ne threedots  phuutii merii qismat tuute sabhii sapane 2 gairon se shiqavaa kyaa karen luut gae apane apanaa jise samajhe usane mitaayaa hai rone lagii zindagii threedots  aansuu mere kab tak denge sahaaraa mujhe 2 tuu hii sahaaraa ai maut de roro pukaaraa tujhe jiine se bhii ab to jii ghabaraayaa hai rone lagii zindagii threedots

Title: mere mahabuub tujhe merii muhabbat kii qasam lataa
Lyrics: mere mahabub tujhe meri muhabbat kii kasam  phir mujhe nargisii aankhon ka sahaaraa dede  meraa khoyaa hua rangiin nazaaraa dede  mere mahabub tujhe threedots  ai mere kvaab kii taabiir meri jaanejigar  zindagii meri tujhe yaad kiye jati hai  raat din mujhako sataataa hai tassavvur tera  dil kii dhadakan tujhe aavaaz diye jati hai  aa mujhe apanii sadaaon ka sahaaraa dede  meraa khoyaa hua rangiin nazaaraa dede  mere mahabub tujhe threedots  yaad hai mujhako meri umr kii pahalii vo ghadii  teri aankhon se koi jaam piyaa thaa mainne  meri ragrag men koi bark si laharaaii thi  jab tere maramarii haathon ko chhuaa tha mainne  aa mujhe phir unhiin haathon ka sahaaraa dede  meraa khoyaa hua rangiin nazaaraa dede  mere mahabub tujhe threedots  saamane aake zaraa paradaa uthaade rukh se  ik yahii meraa ilaajegam hai  teri furaqat ne pareshaan kiyaa hai mujhako  ab to mil jaa ke meri jaan pe ban aaii hai  dil ko bhuulii huii yaadon ka sahaaraa de de  meraa khoyaa hua rangiin nazaaraa de de  mere mahabub tujhe threedots

Title: mere sapanon kii raanii kab aayegii tuu
Lyrics: mere sapanon kii raanii kab aayegii tuu aaii rut mastaanii kab aayegii tuu biitii jaaye zindaganii kab aayegii tuu chalii aa aa tuu chalii aa threedots  phuul sii khil ke paas aa dil ke duur se mil ke chain naa aaye aur kab tak mujhe tadapaayegii tuu mere sapanon kii raanii kab aayegii tuu threedots  pyaar kii kaliyaan baagon kii galiyaan sab rangaraliyaan puuchh rahiin hain giit panaghat pe kis din gaayegii tuu mere sapanon kii raanii kab aayegii tuu threedots  kyaa hai bharosaa aashiq dil kaa aur kisii pe ye aa jaaye aa gayaa to bahut pachhataayegii tuu mere sapanon kii raanii kab aayegii tuu aaii rut mastaanii kab aayegii tuu biitii jaaye zindagaanii kab aayegii tuu chalii aa aa tuu chalii aa threedots

Title: mat ro maataa laal tere bahutere
Lyrics: mat ro maataa laal tere bahutere 2 janamabhuumi ke kaam aayaa main bade bhaag hain mere mat ro maataa laal tere bahutere mat ro   ho hans kar mujhako aaj vidaa kar janam safal ho meraa  2 rotaa jag men aayaa hansataa chalaa ye baalak teraa mat ro maataa laal tere bahutere mat ro   ho kal main nahiin rahuungaa lekin jab hogaa andhiyaaraa  2 taaron men tuu dekhegii hansataa ek nayaa sitaaraa mat ro maataa laal tere bahutere mat ro  phir janamuungaa us jin jab aazaad bahegii gangaa maiyaa phir janamuungaa us jin jab aazaad bahegii gangaa unnat bhaal himaalay par jab laharaayegaa tirangaa  mat ro maataa laal tere bahutere janamabhuumi ke kaam aayaa main bade bhaag hain mere mat ro maataa laal tere bahutere mat ro

Title: nadii naare na jaao shaam paiyaan paduun
Lyrics: nadii naare na jaao shaam paiyaan paduun  paiyaan paduun shaam paiyaan paduun  nadii naare na jaao shaam paiyaan paduun    nadii naare jo jaao to jaibe karo biich dhaare na jaao shaam paiyaan paduun    biich dhaare jo jaao to jaibe karo us paare na jaao shaam paiyaan paduun    us paare jo jaao to jaibe karo sang savatiyaa na laao shaam paiyaan paduun   sang savatiyaa jo laao to jaibe karo hamase na milaao shaam paiyaan paduun   nadii naare na jaao shaam paiyaan paduun

Title: dil meraa aaj kho gayaa hai kahiin
Lyrics: dil meraa aaj kho gayaa hai kahiin aapake paanv ke niiche to nahiin  yuun nazar pher ke mat jaaie rukie to zaraa aapako merii qasam thaharie sunie to zaraa hai jahaan aap meraa dil hai vahiin aapake paanv ke threedots  kis tarah dil kii main tauhiin ganvaaraa kar luun aapakii bholii nigaahon pe bharosaa kar luun dil churaataa nahiin hai kaun kahiin aapake paanv ke threedots  dil churaayaa ho to pahaluu men chhupaae rakhie zindagii bhar mujhe diivaanaa banaae rakhie lekin ek baar dilaa diijie yaqiin aapake paanv ke threedots

Title: gaa diivaane jhuum ke raat kii zulfen chuum ke
Lyrics: gaa diivaane jhuum ke raat kii zulfen chuum ke dil bhii hai diladaar bhii hai mausam bhii hai pyaar bhii hai  kal tak duniyaa aur thii par aaj zamaanaa aur hai dil kii kahaanii aur hai aankhon kaa fasaanaa aur hai duub nashe men chhed maze men tuu koii nagamaa mastaanaa gaa diivaane threedots  kaun ye aayaa jhuumataa mastii men qadam hain chuur se dekh rahe hain ye samaan mudmud ke sitaare duur se husn chalaa hai ishq se milane lekar dil kaa nazaraanaa gaa diivaane threedots

Title: ek vo bhii diwaalii thii ek ye bhii diwaalii hai
Lyrics: ek vo bhii diwaalii thii ek ye bhii diwaalii hai ujadaa huaa gulashan hai rotaa huaa maalii hai 2  baahar to ujaalaa hai magar dil men andheraa samajho naa ise raat ye hai gam kaa saveraa 2 kyaa diip jalaayen ham taqadiir hii kaalii hai ujadaa huaa gulashan hai rotaa huaa maalii hai  aise na kabhii diip kisii dil kaa bujhaa ho main to vo musaafir huun jo raste men lutaa ho 2 ai maut tuu hii aa jaa dil teraa sawaalii hai ujadaa huaa gulashan hai rotaa huaa maalii hai   ek vo bhii diwaalii thii ek ye bhii diwaalii hai ujadaa huaa gulashan hai rotaa huaa maalii hai 2

Title: aankhen khulii thiin aaye the vo bhii nazar mujhe
Lyrics: aankhen khulii thiin aaye the vo bhii nazar mujhe phir kyaa huaa nahiin hai kuchh is kii khabar mujhe aankhen khulii thiin threedots   un kaa kayaal dil men tasavvur nigaah men roshan vahii chiraag hai yaadon kii raah men vo chhod kar gaye the isii mod par mujhe phir kyaa huaa nahiin hai kuchh is kii khabar mujhe aankhen khulii thiin threedots   ab to mujhe andheron se ulfat sii ho gaii aankhon ko intazaar kii aadat sii ho gaii takanaa hai un kii raah yuun hii umr bhar mujhe aankhen khulii thiin aaye the vo bhii nazar mujhe

Title: qaatil hai terii har adaa har dil hai tujh par fidaa
Lyrics: qaatil hai terii har adaa har dil hai tujh par fidaa raahii apanii manzil bhuule dekh ke teraa cheharaa pyaarii hai tuu itanii kudaa bhii to chaahataa hogaa hasiin hai tuu kudaa bhii to maanataa hogaa  cham cham chamake teraa badan jiivan saagar paar karake muskaanon men motii chhupe hain siipon sii palaken mahafil men hai har dil men hai ab teraa hii jalavaa  pankh nahiin hai jisake aisii tuu hai ruup parii jannat ko kyon chhodaa tuune falaq se kyon utarii jab dekho tab karate hain lab teraa hii charachaa

Title: haaledil unako sunaanaa thaa sunaayaa naa gayaa
Lyrics: haaledil unako sunaanaa thaa 2 sunaayaa naa gayaa sunaayaa naa gayaa jo zubaan par mujhe laanaa thaa 2 vo laayaa naa gayaa vo laayaa naa gayaa haaledil unako threedots  pyar men siine pe sar rakhake to dil qadamon par 2 aap ko apanaa banaanaa thaa 2 banaayaa naa gayaa banaayaa naa gayaa haaledil unako threedots  khelatii aankh micholii rahii nazaren apanii 2 jinako palakon men chhupaanaa thaa 2 chhupaayaa naa gayaa chhupaayaa naa gayaa haaledil unako threedots  ek hii vaar men haathon se jigar chhiin liyaa 2 haay jis dil ko bachaanaa thaa 2 bachaayaa naa gayaa bachaayaa naa gayaa haaledil unako threedots

Title: ai chaand zaraa chhup jaa ai vaqt zaraa ruk jaa
Lyrics: aa 	ai chaand zaraa chhup jaa ai vaqt zaraa ruk jaa 	ik baat hai honthon pe kah luun to qaraar aae 	ik bojh to hat jaae ra 	ai chaand zaraa chhup jaa ai vaqt zaraa ruk jaa 	ruk unakaa idhar ko hai ab kyuun na bahaar aae 	duniyaa na badal jaae 	ai chaand zaraa chhup threedots  aa 	sab kvaab saa lagataa hai is raat men jaaduu hai 	kaamosh nazaaron kii har saans men jaaduu hai 	ham hain ki bandhe se hain dil hai ki udaa jaae 	ik baat hai honthon threedots  ra 	main pyaar kii baazii men dil haaraa to kyaa haaraa 2 	pahaluu men mere duniyaa baanhon men jahaan saaraa 	kyaa degaa muqaddar ab ham maang ke pachhataae aa 	ai chaand zaraa threedots

Title: mahafil men aap aae jaise ki chaand aayaa
Lyrics: donon  aa aa aa aa mahafil men aap aae mahafil men aap aae jaise ki chaand aayaa  2 ye ruk pe kaalii zulfen zulfen ye ruk pe kaalii zulfen ye baadalon kaa saayaa mahafil men aap aae jaise ki chaand aayaa  mubaarak  aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aapake aane se suman  aapake  mubaarak  aane se is dil ne dhadakanaa siikhaa suman  bin piye hosh ke aalam men bahakanaa siikhaa mubaarak  sard aahon kaa mazaa kyaa hai ye jaanaa hamane suman  halkiihalkiisii kisii aanch men tapanaa siikhaa donon  kuchh ham bhii aur chamake chamake kuchh ham bhii aur chamake kuchh dil bhii jagamagaayaa mahafil men aap aae jaise ki chaand aayaa  donon  aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa tum na dekho haay tum na dekho to tamannaa hamen tadapaatii hai dekhate ho to qayaamatsii guzar jaatii hai muskuraahat hai ki laharaatii hai bijalii jaise dekhiye aaj to kiskis kii qazaa aatii hai ghabaraaii shammaemahafil mahafil ghabaraaii shammaemahafil paravaanaa dagamagaayaa  mahafil men aap aae jaise ki chaand aayaa

Title: ik sunaharii shaam thii bahakiibahakii zindagii
Lyrics: ik sunaharii shaam thii bahakiibahakii zindagii raah men ham tum mile merii palakon ke tale aashiyaan teraa ban gayaa ik sunaharii shaam  do qadam milakar chale to faasale kam ho gae pyaar ne duniyaa badal dii kyaa se kyaa ham ho gae shole shabanam ho gae ik sunaharii shaam thii threedots  shaam to ab tak vahii hai rang hai lekin judaa jaane kis vaadii men apanaaa qaafilaa gum ho gayaa phir hai dil tanhaa meraa ik sunaharii shaam thii threedots

tum   tum jis kii tamannaa kar baitho  un logon kii qismat kyaa kahiye  ejii kyaa kahiye  chaandii kaa badan sone kii nazar  female din raat duhaaii dete hain ye haal hai in diivaanon kaa jahaan kare koii  ye haal hai in diivaanon kaa diivaanon kaa  female jiite bhii nahiin marate bhii nahiin bechaaron kii haalat kyaa kahiye ejii kyaa kahiye  chaandii kaa badan sone kii nazar

Title: ye rangiin mahafil gulaabiigulaabii
Lyrics: ye rangiin mahafil gulaabiigulaabii mere dil kaa aalam sharaabiisharaabii ye rangiin mahafil threedots  nazar se nazar kii mulaaqaat dekhii adaaon ke tiiron kii barasaat dekhii o bahut dekhe hamane dil dene vaale magar tujhamen zaalim naii baat dekhii dekh kar umr bhar kii kushii mil gaii ye rangiin mahafil threedots  kisii se kabhii pyaar kar ke to dekho kisii husn vaale pe mar ke to dekho ho tuufaan ke daaman men laakhon kinaare ye sholon kaa dariyaa guzar ke to dekho ik naii bekudii ik naii roshanii mil gaii ye rangiin mahafil threedots

Title: jo kvaab sajaa hai palakon men
Lyrics: jo kvaab sajaa hai palakon men vo kvaab haqiiqat ban jaae ye dard jo dil men jaagaa hai ai kaash mohabbat ban jaae  jaane kyaa sochakar shok hotii gaiin merii maasuum angadaaiyaan aaiine kii nazar se milaakar nazar giit gaatii hain tanhaaiyaan 2 ye dard jo dil men jaagaa hai threedots  chaandanii raat men naachataa huun magar niind aankhon men ghulatii nahiin so rahuun to kisii ke jagaaye binaa merii ab aankh khulatii nahiin 2 ye dard jo dil men jaagaa hai threedots

Title: ye vaadiyaan ye fizaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhen
Lyrics: ye vaadiyaan ye fizaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhen 2 khaamoshiyon kii sadaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhen  ye vaadiyaan ye fizaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhen  taras rahen hain javaan phuul honth chhuune ko machalmachal ke havaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhen khaamoshiyon kii sadaaen  tumahaarii zulfon se khushabuu kii bhiikh lene ko  jhukiijhukii sii ghataaen bulaa rahii hain tumhen  khaamoshiyon kii sadaaen  hasiin champaii pairon ko jabase dekhaa hai  nadii kii mast adaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhe  khaamoshiyon kii sadaaen  meraa kahaa na suno dil kii baat to sun lo  har ek dil kii duaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhe  khaamoshiyon kii sadaaen  ye vaadiyaan ye fizaaen bulaa rahii hain tumhen

Title: guzare hain is tarah se duniyaa men din hamaare
Lyrics: guzare hain is tarah se duniyaa men din hamaare bhiige rahen hameshaa aankhon ke do kinaare  siine se ranjogam ko hamane lagaa ke rakhaa majabuuriyon ko dil hii dil men chhupaa ke rakhaa karate bhii kyaa ai qisamat tere sitam ke maare guzare hai is tarah se  hasarat bharii kahaanii kissaa hai bekasii kaa likhaa hai aansuuon se afasaanaa zindagii kaa kuchh naa kisii se kahanaa ai merii bezubaanii gardish nasiib kii hai kyaa dosh hai kisii kaa tuute chamakchamak kar taqadiir ke sitaare guzare hai is tarah se threedots

Title: suniye to zaraa kahaan ruuth ke chale
Lyrics: suniye to zaraa kahaan ruuth ke chale yuun baat badhaayaa nahiin karate   haan memsaab   jii memsaab suniye to zaraa kahaan ruuth ke chale yuun baat badhaayaa nahiin karate jis dil men sanam tasaviir ho terii us ko thukaraayaa nahiin karate   haan memsaab   jii memsaab  chhodo gussaa sambhaalo zaraa aanchal dekho dekho ulajh gayii paayal ajii ho ke khafaa yuun ek dam uth ke jaayaa nahiin karate suniye to zaraa threedots  jo ye tuute to koii mushkil hai vo to kaho ki dil meraa dil hai ajii darpan ko yuun har dam thes lagaayaa nahiin karate suniye to zaraa threedots  kahaa aao to tum lage jaane is adaa ke hamiin hain diivaane ajii aur ko ham apanii qasam yuun bulaayaa nahiin karate suniye to zaraa threedots

Title: ham ne jafaa na siikhii unako vafaa na aaii
Lyrics: ham ne jafaa na siikhii unako vafaa na aaii patthar se dil lagaayaa aur dil ne chot khaaii  apane hii dil ke haathon barabaad ho gae ham kisase karen shikaayat ab kisako den duhaaii  duniyaa banaane vaale main tujhase puuchhataa hun kyaa pyaar kaa jahaan men badalaa hai bevafaaii

Title: watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa
Lyrics: himaalaa kii bulandii se suno aawaaz hai aaii kaho maanon se den bete kaho bahanon se den bhaaii  watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa rahegii jab talak duniyaa ye afasaanaa bayaan hogaa watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa  himaalaa kah rahaa hai is watan ke naujawaanon se khadaa huun santarii banake main sarahad pe zamaanon se bhalaa is waqt dekhuun kaun meraa paasabaan hogaa watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa  chamanawaalon kii gairat ko hai sayyaadon ne lalakaaraa utho har phuul se kah do ke ban jaaye wo angaaraa nahiin to dosto rusawaa hamaaraa gulasitaan hogaa watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa 2 rahegii jab talak duniyaa ye afasaanaa bayaan hogaa watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa  hamaare ik padosii ne hamaare ghar ko luutaa hai  2 bharam ik dost kii bas dostii kaa aise tuutaa hai ke ab har dost pe duniyaa ko dushman kaa gumaan hogaa watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa  sipaahii dete hain aawaaz maataaon ko bahanon ko hamen hathiyaar le do bech daalo apane gahanon ko ke is qurabaanii pe qurabaan watan kaa har jawaan hogaa watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa rahegii jab talak duniyaa ye afasaanaa bayaan hogaa watan pe jo fidaa hogaa amar wo naujawaan hogaa

Title: gusse men jo nikharaa hai us husn kaa kyaa kahanaa
Lyrics: gusse men jo nikharaa hai us husn kaa kyaa kahanaa kuchh der abhii hamase tum yuun hii kafaa rahanaa 2  is husn ke saagar kii ik buund churaa len ham 2 in garm nigaahon ko siine se lagaa len ham 2  pal bhar isii aalam men  2 ai jaaneadaa rahanaa kuchh der abhii hamase threedots  ye bahakaa huaa cheharaa ye bikharii huii zulfen 2 ye chadhatii huii dhadakan ye badhatii huii saansen 2  saamaanekazaa ho tum  2 saamaanekazaa rahanaa kuchh der abhii hamase threedots  pahale bhii hasiin thiin tum lekin ye haqiiqat hai 2 vo husn musiibat thaa ye husn qayaamat hai 2  auron se to badhakar ho  2 khud ke bhii sivaa rahanaa kuchh der abhii hamase threedots

Title: tan rang lo jii ajii man rang lo
Lyrics: ra tan rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo ko tan rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo ra khelo khelo umang bhare rang pyaar ke le lo ko khelo khelo umang bhare rang pyaar ke le lo ra rang lo rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo ko tan rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo  ra aa aa aa aa     aaj nagarii men rang hai bahaar hai     galii galii men to ras kii phuhaar hai ko galii galii men to ras kii phuhaar hai ra pichakariyon men rang bharaa pyaar hai ko pichakariyon men rang bharaa pyaar hai ra is rang men jiivan rang lo ko ho tan rang lo man rang lo     rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo threedots  la naacho naacho rii sakhii re holii aaii re la ghar ghar men rangiilii rut chhaaii re ko ghar ghar men rangiilii rut chhaaii re la aaj duniyaa ne mastii lutaaii re     aashaaon kaa daaman rang lo ko ho tan rang lo man rang lo     rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo threedots  ra aaj mukhade se ghuunghataa hataalo jii     ho zaraa sajanaa se ankhiyaan milaa lo jii ko ho zaraa sajanaa se ankhiyaan milaa lo jii la rang jhuuthe more tan pe na daalo jii ko rang jhuuthe more tan pe na daalo jii     man pyaar men saajan rang lo     ho tan rang lo man rang lo     rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo threedots  la raadhaa sang holii khele banavaarii re ho ko raadhaa sang holii khele banavaarii re ho la ang ang pe chalaae pichakaarii ho ko ang ang pe chalaae pichakaarii ho la kahe bainyaa pakadake anaarii     dil rang lo jii dhadakan rang lo ko ho tan rang lo man rang lo     rang lo jii ajii man rang lo tan rang lo threedots

Title: sanam raah bhuule yahaan aateaate
Lyrics: sanam raah bhuule yahaan aateaate 2 bhalaa rah gae vo kahaan aateaate sanam raah bhuule threedots  dil kii baaten to chhupii sii rahatii hain 2 vo kyaa jaane jo nigaahen kahatii hain unhen aaegii ye zubaan aateaate sanam raah bhuule threedots  rotii aankhon ko hansaanaa mushkil hai 2 is bechainii ko chhupaanaa mushkil hai na len vo meraa imtihaan aateaate sanam raah bhuule threedots  mujhase jhuuthii vo qasam naa khaaenge 2 unakaa vaadaa hai yahaan vo aaenge magar jaaegii merii jaan aateaate sanam raah bhuule threedots

Title: pukaarataa chalaa huun main
Lyrics: pukaarataa chalaa huun main galii galii bahaar kii bas ek chhaanv zulf kii bas ik nigaah pyaar kii pukaarataa chalaa huun main  ye dillagii ye shokhiyaan salaam kii yahiin to baat ho rahii hai kaam kii koi to mud ke dekh legaa is taraf koi nazar to hogii mere naam kii pukaarataa chalaa huun main  sunii merii sadaa to kis yaqiin se ghataa utar ke aa gayii zamiin pe rahii yahii lagan to ai dilejavaan asar bhii ho rahegaa ik hasiin pe pukaarataa chalaa huun main

Title: vo jharokhe se jo jhaanke to itanaa puuchhuun
Lyrics: vo jharokhe se jo jhaanke to itanaa puuchhuun main rukuun yaa chalaa jaauun 2 vo jharokhe se jo threedots  chorii dil kii chorii raste chalate mujhako luutaa 2 samajho kuchh bhii samajho par naa samajho itanaa jhuuthaa chain nahiin ab to buraa haal hai meraa apanii qasam  ek hii savaal hai meraa  2 ke vo jharokhe se jo threedots  aashiq main huun aashiq is galii ko kaise chhoduun 2 aae vo jo aae paanv pakaduun haath joduun kaun huun main kyaa huun ye sab bhuul chukaa huun yahaan khadaa ab main yahii soch rahaa huun ke vo jharokhe se jo threedots

Title: na tum bevafaa ho na ham bevafaa hain
Lyrics: na tum bevafaa ho na ham bevafaa hain 2 magar kyaa karen apanii raahen judaa hain na tum bevafaa threedots  jahaan thandiithandii havaa chal rahii hai 2 kisii kii mohabbat vahaan jal rahii hai zamiinaasamaan hamase donon khafaa hain na tum bevafaa threedots  abhii kal talaq to muhabbat javaan thii 2 milan hii milan thaa judaaii kahaan thii magar aaj donon hii beaasaraa hain na tum bevafaa threedots  zamaanaa kahe merii raahon men aajaa 2 muhabbat kahe merii baanhon men aajaa vo samajhen naa majabuuriyaan apanii kyaa hain na tum bevafaa threedots

Title: yah rang bhare baadal ye udataa huaa aanchal
Lyrics: aa 	yah rang bhare baadal ye udataa huaa aanchal ra 	kahataa hai ishaaron se mausam hai bahaaron kaa 	aa kahiin duur chal aa 	aa ye rang bhare threedots  ra 	tere ye hasiin andaaz sanam diivaanaa banaa ke chhodenge aa 	ye soch liyaa thaa pahale hii tumhen apanaa banaa ke chhodenge 2 ra 	ab raahen zindagii kii ho jaaengii sahal aa 	ye rang bhare threedots  	ye hansataa huaa rangiin samaan kahiin biit na jaae baaton men 2 ra 	ai jaanevafaa taqadiir merii hai aaj se tere haathon men aa 	tuute naa zindagii bhar kvaabon kaa ye mahal do 	ye rang bhare threedots

Title: haath aayaa hai jab se teraa haath men
Lyrics: aashaa    haath aayaa hai            haath aayaa hai jab se tera haath men            aa gayaa hai nayaa rang jazabaat men            main kahaan huun mujhe ye kabar hii nahiin            tere qadamon pe hii gir na  jaauun kahiin            haath aayaa hai             dil  men nazaron se chup chup ke aayaa hai tuu            dil churaa ke  meraa muskuraayaa hai  tuu            tu kahe to main x2            ek baat tujh se kahuun            meraa saathii nahiin balki saayaa hai tuu x2            ungaliyaan jab zamane kii mujh par uthe            kho na jaanaa kahiin aise haalaat men            roshanii zindagii men muhabbat se hai            varanaa rakha hai  kyaa chaandanii raat  men            haath aayaa hai  mahendra  dil ke jazabaat ko main na thukaraauungaa            balki tasaviirejazabaat ban jaauungaa  aashaa    oh ho haa haa haa  mahendra  haq muhabbat kaa  aashaa    oh ho ho o o  mahendra  haq muhabbat kaa hotaa hai kaise adaa            vaqt aayaa to main ye bhii dikhalaauungaa x2  aashaa    pyar ke devataa ke qadam chuum kar            zindagii nazar kar  duungii saugaat men            ab na ghabaraao manzil kii duurii se tum            tum akele nahin  main bhii huun saath men            haath aayaa hai

Title: merii jaan tum pe sadake ehasaan itanaa kar do
Lyrics: meri jaan tum pe sadake ehasan itana kar do  meri zindagi men apani chaahat ka rang bhar do   1 kisi chand ki zarurat  nahin meri zindagi ko  ki taras rahaa hun kab se  main tumhari roshani ko  mujhe roshani dikhaa ke  ehasan itana kar do meri zindagi threedots   2 ye tumhari zulf jisako  mili shokhiyan ghata ki  inhin badalon ke niche  meri har nazar hai pyasi meri pyaas tum bujhaa ke  ehasan itana kar do meri zindagi threedots   merii jaan tum pe sadaqe ahasaan itanaa kar do  merii zindagii men apanii chaahat kaa rang bhar do  merii jaan tum pe sadaqe   threedots  merii har khushii adhuurii meraa har singaar phiikaa  binaa pyaar ke na bhaaye  mujhe chaand kaa bhii tiikaa mujhe pyaar se sajaa kar ahasaan itanaa kar do merii zindagii   threedots  main havaa kaa rukh badal duun  mile pyaar jo tumhaaraa jahaan duub kar main dekhuun  ho usii jagah kinaaraa mujhe tum gale lagaake ahasaan itanaa kar do merii zindagii   threedots

Title: mere dilabar mujh par kafaa na ho
Lyrics: ra 	 mere dilabar mujh par kafaa na ho 2 	kahiin terii bhii kuchh kataa na ho 	jo ye dil diiivaanaa machal gayaa 2 ko 	jo ye dil diiivaanaa threedots  2  	jo kisii ke roke rukaa na ho 	kisii sangedar par jhukaa na ho 	tere dar par kaise phisal gayaa  	ye nazar men mastii ghuliighulii 	ye sunaharii rangat dhuliidhulii 	ye ghanerii zulfen khuliikhulii  	vo zamaane bhar kaa guruur hai 	vo nashaa hai jo bhii suruur hai 	vo tere shabaab men dhal gayaa  	mere dil kii jaanib nigaah kar 	o mujhe naa gam se tabaah kar 2 	kabhii bhuul se hii nigaah kar  	o zaraa soch ki duniyaa kahegii kyaa 	terii rusavaaii bach rahegii kyaa 	jo diivaanaa ghar se nikal gayaa

Title: pyaar kaa fasaanaa banaa le dil diivaanaa
Lyrics: mu 	pyaar kaa fasaanaa banaa le dil diivaanaa 2 	kuchh tum kaho kuchh ham kahen 2 la 	pyaar kaa fasaanaa threedots  mu 	aisaa naa ho baagon se bahaar chalii jaae 	kaliikalii ho ke beqaraar chalii jaae 	aisii rut binaa kie pyaar chalii jaae 	isiilie to kahaa hai la 	pyaar kaa fasaanaa threedots  mu 	chhotii sii hai aaj kii hamaarii mulaaqaat la 	han han mu 	ye na ho ki jii men rah jaae jii kii baat 	jaane phir kab koii dekhe hamen saath 	isiilie to kahaa hai la 	pyaar kaa fasaanaa threedots

Title: kahaan chhupe ho man ke  ho saavan ke jhuule pade
Lyrics: la 	kahaan chhupe ho man ke mitavaa nainaa bhae udaase 	chhalak rahaa hai sukh kaa saagar ham pyaase ke pyaase  	ho ho 2 	saavan ke jhuule pade 2 	sainyaa jii hamen tum kahaan bhuule pade  ta 	ye nainaa jo tumase lade gorii jii 	torii palakan ke niiche khade la 	saavan ke jhuule pade threedots  	tum nahiin aae hamako bhuule 	hamare anganaa phulavaa na phuule 	hamako akelii dekh sahelii 	kahatii hai kyuun naa khilatii chamelii 	belariyaa naa mandave chadhe to 2 	sainyaa jii hamen tum threedots ta 	ye nainaa jo tumase threedots la 	saavan ke jhuule pade threedots  ta 	tore dil men hamaraa dil hai 	jaise tore nain men til hai 	hamare milan bin ye manabhaavan 	saavan bhii to kyaa hai saavan 	piipal ke patave jhade o 2 	ye toremore jab tak na nainaa lade do 	saavan ke jhuule pade threedots

Title: main zindagii kaa saath nibhaataa chalaa gayaa
Lyrics: main zindagii kaa saath nibhaataa chalaa gayaa har fikr ko dhunen men udaataa chalaa gayaa  barabaadiyon kaa sog manaanaa fizuul thaa  2 barabaadiyon kaa jashn manaataa chalaa gayaa main zindagiithreedots  jo mil gayaa usii ko muqaddar samajh liyaa  2 jo kho gayaa main usako bhulaataa chalaa gayaa main zindagiithreedots  gam aur khushii men fark na mahasuus ho jahaan  2 main dil ko us muqaam pe laataa chalaa gayaa main zindagiithreedots

Title: bane to ban jaae  main teraa huun duulhaa tuu merii dulhan
Lyrics: bane to ban jaae zamaanaa dushman main teraa huun duulhaa tuu merii dulhan  bane to ban jaae zamaanaa dushman tuu meraa hai duulhaa main terii dulhan  duniyaa ne zanjiiren to daalii thiin paanv men ai jii aa hii baithe ham terii zulfon kii chhaanv men ki honaa thaa ho ke rahaa ye milan bane to ban jaae threedots  main dolii men baith ke ghar aaii chaand ke are main laayaa huun chaandanii ko seharaa baandh ke na chorii hii kii hai na kiyaa hai gaban bane to ban jaae threedots

Title: qaraar khoyaa muhabbat men  ke jaan chalii jaae jiyaa nahiin jaae
Lyrics: ra 	qaraar khoyaa muhabbat men is zamaane ne 	ye baat sach hii kahii hai kisii diivaane ne  	ke jaan chalii jaae jiyaa nahiin jaae 	jiyaa jaae to phir jiyaa nahiin jaae la 	ye ilzaam sar pe liyaa nahiin jaae 	liyaa jaae to phir jiyaa nahiin jaae  ra 	zamaane men nahiin diivaanaa ham saa 	diivaanaa nahiin ye zamaanaa ham saa 	ye kyaa jaane ye kyaa samajhe ye baaten pyaar kii la 	ke pyaar har kisii se kiyaa nahiin jaae 	kiyaa jaae to phir jiyaa nahiin jaae  	na aaii kabhii niind na aayaa hai qaraar 	hamaarii taubaa ham nahiin karenge pyaar 	bas laao dil hamaaraa hamako de do o sanam ra 	ye dil le ke vaapas diyaa nahiin jaae 	diyaa jaae to phir jiyaa nahiin jaae  	churaa ke nazaren na dekho tum ye phuul 	suno ye berukii hamen nahiin qubuul 	yaa ham bhale jaaen yaa kah do ye bahaar chalii jaae la 	bahaar chalii jaae piyaa nahiin jaae 	piyaa jaae to phir jiyaa nahiin jaae 	ke jaan chalii jaae threedots

Title: terii pyaariipyaarii suurat ko kisii kii nazar naa lage chashmebad duur
Lyrics: terii pyaariipyaarii suurat ko kisii kii nazar naa lage  chashmebad duur mukhade ko chhupaa lo aanchal men kahiin merii nazar naa lage chashmebad duur   yuun na akele phiraa karo sab kii nazar se daraa karo  2 phuul se zyaadaa naazuk ho tum chaal sanbhalkar chalaa karo zulfon ko giraa lo gaalon par mausam kii nazar naa lage chashmebad duur   ek jhalak jo paataa hai raahii vahiin ruk jaataa hai  2 dekhake teraa ruup salonaa chaand bhii sar ko jhukaataa hai dekhaa na karo tuma aaiinaa kahiin khud kii nazar naa lage chashmebad duur   dil men chubhe vo tiir ho tum chaahat kii taqadiir ho tum  2 kaun na hogaa tum pe divaanaa pyaar bharii tasaviir ho tum nikalaa na karo tum raahon par zarron kii nazar naa lage chashmebad duur

Title: diye bujhe bujhe nainaa thake thake piyaa dhiire dhiire chale aao
Lyrics: diye bujhe bujhe nainaa thake thake piyaa dhiire dhiire  chale aao   3  koi duur se aavaaz de chale aao chale aao     3  raat raat bhar intazaar hai  dil dard se beqaraar hai      2 saajan itanaa to naa tadapaao chale aao chale aao     3 koi duur threedots  aas todake mukh modake   kyaa paaoge saath chhodake             2 mere man ko ab yuun naa itanaa tarasaao chale aao     3 koi duur threedots

Title: ye kaun chitrakaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar
Lyrics: ye kaun chitrakaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar  harii bharii vasundharaa par niilaa niilaa ye gagan ke jisape baadalon kii paalakii udaa rahaa pavan dishaaen dekho rang bharii dishaaen dekho rang bharii chamak rahiin umang bharii ye kisane phuul phuul se kiyaa shrringaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar  kudarat kii is pavitrataa ko tum nihaar lo inake gunon ko apane man men tum utaar lo chamakaa do aaj laalimaa chamakaa do aaj laalimaa apane lalaat kii kan kan se jhanakatii tumhiin chhabii viraat kii apanii to aankh ek hai  isakii hazaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar  tapasviyon sii hain atal ye pavarton ki chotiyaan ye barf ki ghumaradaar gheradaar ghaatiyaan dhvajaa se ye khade hue dhvajaa se ye khade hue hain vriksha devadaar ke galiiche ye gulaab ke bagiiche ye bahaar ke ye kis kavi ki kalpanaa ye kis kavi ki kalpanaa kaa chamatkaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar hai ye kaun chitrakaar

Title: mere raajaa mere laal tujhako dhuundhuun
Lyrics: mere raajaa mere laal tujhako dhuundhuun main kahaan 2 roe mamataa tadape maan tujhako dhuundhuun main kahaan  tuu kyaa jaane tere ghar se chale jaane par kyaa biitii mere pyaare terii maataa aur terii bahanaa tere gam men roro ke mar jaaenge saare aajaa vaapas aajaa mere raajaa threedots  is jag men kyaa hai meraa ik sapanaa tuu meraa vo bhii tuutaa ruuthii qismat ruuthii duniyaa merii ankhiyon ke taare tuu kyon ruuthaa aajaa vaapas aajaa mere raajaa threedots

Title: jo baat tujh men hai terii tasviir men nahiin
Lyrics: jo baat tujh men hai terii tasviir men nahiin  tasviir men nahiin jo baat tujh men hai  rangon men teraa aks dhalaa tuu na dhal sakii saanson kii aanch jism kii kushabuu na dhal sakii tujh men tujh men jo loch hai terii tahariir men nahiin tahariir men nahiin jo baat tujh men hai terii threedots  bejaan husn men kahaan raftaar kii adaa inakaar kii adaa hai na iqaraar kii adaa koii koii lachak bhii zulfegirahagiir men nahiin jo baat tujh men hai terii threedots  duniyaa men koi chiiz nahiin hai terii taraha phir ek baar saamane aa jaa kisii taraha kyaa aur kyaa aur ek jhalak merii taqadiir men nahiin taqadiir men nahiin jo baat tujh men hai terii threedots

Title: hiyaa jarat rahat din rain
Lyrics: hiyaa jarat rahat din rain ho raamaa jarat rahat din rain  2   ambvaa ki daali pe koyal bole 2 tanik na aavat chain o raamaa jarat rahat din rain  baswaari mein madhur sur baaje 2 birhii papiharaa bolan laage madhure madhur madhu bain o raamaa jarat rahat din rain  aas adhurii pyaasii oomariyaa 2 jaaye andheraa sunii dagariiyaa darat jiyaa bechain  darat jiyaa bechain o raamaa jarat rahat din rain hiya jarat rahat din rain o raamma jarat rahat din rain

Title: sun more rasiyaa sun manbasiyaa chhod ke ab
Lyrics: la 	sun more rasiyaa sun manbasiyaa 	chhod ke ab nahiin jaanaa mu 	pyaar nibhaauungaa dil se na jaauungaa 	main to teraa hii diivaanaa  la 	honthon pe mere piyaa teraa hii naam hai 	main huun terii daasii tuu meraa ghanashyaam hai 	tere lie chhodaa maine saaraa zamaanaa 	sun more rasiyaa threedots mu 	pyaar nibhaauungaa threedots  	aandhii se khele chaahe mausam bahaar kaa 	bujhane na duungaa kabhii diipak pyaar kaa 	chamakegaa chaand ban ke pyaar kaa fasaanaa 	pyaar nibhaauungaa threedots la 	sun more rasiyaa threedots mu 	pyaar nibhaauungaa threedots

Title: soch rahii thii kahuun naa kahuun par aaj kahuungii
Lyrics: soch rahii thii kahuun naa kahuun par aaj kahuungii mere sanam tuune le to liyaa dil yaad rahe meraa jiinaa hai mushkil tere binaa tere binaa soch rahii thii   kyaa main kahuun sajanaa mujhako huaa kyaa hai mujhamen base ho tum tumase chhupaa kyaa hai tum hii suno ab kahataa hai kyaa dil yaad rahe meraa jiinaa hai mushkil tere binaa tere binaa soch rahii thii   haay re dil dhadake aur main ghabaraauun jii ye kare kaise udake chalii aauun tuu hai mere aramaanon ki manzil yaad rahe meraa jiinaa hai mushkil tere binaa tere binaa  raah men jab tere saath nikalatii huun bahakate hain ye qadam udatiisii chalatii huun yuun hii rahe sapanon kii ye jhilamil yaad rahe meraa jiinaa hai mushkil tere binaa tere binaa soch rahii thii

Title: jabjab apanaa mel huaa to dil ye pukaaraa
Lyrics: jabjab apanaa mel huaa to dil ye pukaaraa janamjanam tak tuut sake naa kabhii saath hamaaraa jabjab apanaa mel threedots  tere gam ko gale lagaa ke ho apanii kushiyaan main tujhape lutaa duun gar thodaa saa tuu muskaraa de ho to viiraane men kaliyaan khilaa duun ho sharamaataa hai kaliyon ko bhii ye bairii ruup tumhaaraa jabjab apanaa mel threedots  chhed ke apane pyaar kaa nagamaa ho tere dil men taraane jagaa duun terii aankh ke aansuu le ke ho nae chaandsitaare banaa duun ho niil gagan par diip jale hain zaraa dekho nazaaraa jabjab apanaa mel threedots  laakh janam ke aramaanon kaa ho koii rangiin fasaanaa banaa duun lekar aag tere gaalon kii ho goregore kanval main khilaa duun ho dil kahataa hai aaj milegaa nadiyaa se kinaaraa jabjab apanaa mel threedots

Title: tere nainaa talaash kare jise
Lyrics: khoyii khoyii aankh hai jhukii palak hai jahaan jahaan dekhegaa tuu vahiin jhalak hai khoyii khoyii threedots  tere nainaa talaash kare jise vo hai tujhii men kahiin diivaane tere nainaa threedots  yahaan do ruup hain har ek ke yahaan nazaren uthaanaa zaraa dekh ke o jab us kii muhabbat men gum hai tuu vahii suurat nazar aayegii chaar suu kaun kyaa hai man ke sivaa ye koii kyaa jaane tere nainaa threedots  ye javaan raat le ke teraa naam kahe haath badhaa koii haath thaam  o kaalii alakaa ke baadal men bijaliyaan gorii baahon men chaahat kii angadaaiyaan jo adaa hai ishaaraa hai pyaar kaa o diivaane tujhe chaahiye aur kyaa par ruk jaa man kii sadaa bhii sun diivaane tere nainaa threedots

Title: baagon men phuul kisane khilaae hain maine to nahiin
Lyrics: la 	baagon men phuul kisane khilaae hain ra 	maine to nahiin maine to nahiin  la 	chor kaun taare kisane churaae hain ra 	maine to nahiin maine to nahiin taubaa  la 	taubaa kaa savaal kyaa taubaa maine kii nahiin ra 	kaisaa ye suruur hai maine pii hai jii nahiin 	phir mere hosh kisane udaae hain ra 	maine to nahiin maine to nahiin  la 	aakir is jahaan men hotii hai ye baat kyon 	do aur do jamaa karen to banate nahiin paanch kyon 	do aur do chaar kisane banaae hain ra 	maine to nahiin maine to nahiin  la 	ye jo dil ke saaz the vo to beaavaaz the 	tere mere pyaar ke afasaane to raaz the 	raaz sabako ye kisane bataae hain 	tuune to nahiin tuune to nahiin ra 	maine to nahiin maine to nahiin

Title: duniyaa vaalon raamsiitaa kii  galiigalii siitaa roe
Lyrics: duniyaa vaalon raamsiitaa kii naii kahaanii sun lo vaalmiik se kuub sunii ab merii zubaanii sun lo  galiigalii siitaa roe aaj mere desh men siitaa dekhii raam dekhaa aaj nae bhesh men  tumane naam sunaa siitaa kaa main use dekh aayaa huun o dharm ke thekedaaron main ek naii raamaayan laayaa huun vo siitaa thii raamaayan kii jiitii jaagatii ruuthe raam se jo khoyaa pyaar maangatii galiigalii siitaa roe threedots  raam kii liilaa dekh chuke koii usakii liilaa jaane naa raam yahaan siitaa yahaan par koii pahachaane naa aage badh ke dekh diivaane tuu hii inakaa raam hai isake dil ko chiir ke dekh liyaa teraa naam hai galiigalii siitaa roe threedots  dharatii phatii siitaa chhupii kahiin nazar aaye naa ye vo siitaa hai ki jise dharatii bhii chhupaaye naa ye bhii siitaa vo bhii siitaa fark dekho bhaag men vo aag se laut aaii ye hai abhii aag men galiigalii siitaa roe threedots  bahan jis bhaaii kii hai vo bhii kafaa ho gayaa maan ye kisii laal kii hai vo bhii judaa ho gayaa janak siitaa chhod de to kahaan jaae jaanakii maan ise pahachaan ke bhii phir nahiin pahachaanatii galiigalii siitaa roe threedots  kyon bharosaa nahiin isape kyaa ye pyaar jhuuthaa hai bolobolo aansuon kaa kyaa ye haar jhuuthaa hai isakii kathaa jhuuthii hai to jhuuthaa bhagavaan hai jhuuthii hai raamaayan saarii aur jhuuthaa raam hai dharm jhuuthaa prem jhuuthaa jhuuthaa hindustaan hai deviyon pe dosh lage aaj mere desh men siitaa to hai raam nahiin aaj mere desh men galiigalii siitaa roe threedots

Title: tere paas aa ke meraa vaqt guzar jaataa hai
Lyrics: ra 	tere paas aa ke meraa vaqt guzar jaataa hai 	do ghadii ke lie gam jaane kidhar jaataa hai aa 	jab kabhii duur se tuu mujhako nazar aataa hai 	pyaar hans kar merii aankhon men sanvar jaataa hai ra 	tere paas aa ke threedots  aa 	tuu vahii hai jise is dil ne sadaaen dii hain 2 	tuu vahii hai jise nazaron ne duaaen dii hain 	tuu vahii hai ki jo dil le ke muqar jaataa hai ra 	do ghadii ke lie threedots do 	tere paas aa ke threedots  ra 	 jaam itane terii mastii bharii aankhon se pie 2 	bekhudii men tujhe sajade merii nazaron ne kie 	tere jalavon men kudaa mujhako nazar aataa hai aa 	pyaar hans kar threedots do 	tere paas aa ke threedots  aa 	terii yaad aate hii ghabaraa ke chalii aatii huun 2 	main har ik qaid ko thukaraa ke chalii aatii huun 	main nahiin aatii mujhe pyaar idhar laataa hai ra 	do ghadii ke lie threedots do 	tere paas aa ke threedots

Title: chalo ik baar phir se ajanabii ban jaayen ham donon
Lyrics: chalo ik baar phir se ajanabii ban jaaen ham dono chalo ik baar phir se threedots  na main tumase koi ummiid rakhuun dilanavaazii kii na tum merii taraf dekho galat andaaz nazaron se na mere dil kii dhadakan ladakhadaaye merii baaton se na zaahir ho tumhaarii kashmkash kaa raaz nazaron se chalo ik baar phir se threedots  tumhen bhii koi ulajhan rokatii hai peshakadamii se mujhe bhii log kahate hain ki ye jalave paraae hain mere hamaraah bhii rusavaaiyaan hain mere maajhii kii  2 tumhaare saath bhii guzarii huii raaton ke saaye hain chalo ik baar phir se threedots  taarruf rog ho jaaye to usako bhuulanaa behatar taalluk bojh ban jaaye to usako todanaa achchhaa vo afasaanaa jise anjaam tak laanaa naa ho mumakin  2 use ek khuubasuurat mod dekar chhodanaa achchhaa chalo ik baar phir se threedots

Title: chhaliyaa terii baaton baaton men
Lyrics: chhaliyaa terii baaton baaton men main bharamaa gayii re  jiyaraa milan kii priit navelii jab main samajhii priit pahelii laaj merii haay laaj merii mohe khaa gaii re terii baaton men threedots  chhal khaa gaii re bharamaa gaii re sharmaa gaii re terii baaton baaton men

Title: pyaar aankhon se jataayaa to buraa maan gae
Lyrics: pyaar aankhon se jataayaa to buraa maan gae haaledil unako sunaayaa to buraa maan gae pyaar aankhon se threedots  apane gajare ke har ek phuul kii taariif sunii 2 zakmedil hamane dikhaayaa to buraa maan gae pyaar aankhon se threedots  vo to har roz rulaate the ghataaon kii tarah 2 hamane ik roz rulaayaa to buraa maan gae pyaar aankhon se threedots  bekudii par merii hansate rahe sharmaate rahe 2 ab zaraa hosh men aayaa to buraa maan gae pyaar aankhon se threedots  sirf itanii sii kataa par hamen dushman jaanaa 2 sar ko qadamon pe jhukaayaa to buraa maan gae pyaar aankhon se threedots

Title: ye hariyaalii aur ye raastaa
Lyrics: ye hariyaalii aur ye raastaa 2 in raahon par teraameraa jiivan bhar kaa vaastaa ye hariyaalii aur threedots  phuulaaphalaa hai priit kaa anganaa gaatii huun tere pyaar kii rachanaa dil kii ye baaten dil men na rakhanaa kah do jo kahanaa hai o more sajanaa ye hariyaalii aur threedots  tum rahate ho mere man men aise jaise ujaalaa chaand ke tan men jaise kushbuu phuul chaman men jaise thandak mast pavan men ye hariyaalii aur threedots  aag ulfat kii dil men lagii hai dhiiredhiire badhatii rahii hai pyaasii koyaliyaa jalatii rahii hai jaljal ke tumase kah rahii hai ye hariyaalii aur threedots

Title: dilvil pyaarvyaar main kyaa jaanuun re
Lyrics: dilvil pyaarvyaar main kyaa jaanuun re jaanuun to jaanuun bas itanaa jaanuun ki tujhe apanaa jaanuun re  tuu hai buraa to hogaa par baaton men terii ras hai jaisaa bhii hai mujhe kyaa apanaa lage to bas hai ghar ho teraa jis nagarii men chaahe jo ho teraa naam re gharvar naamvaam main kyaa jaanuun re threedots  aadat nahiin ki sochuun kitanon men hasiin hai tuu lat men hain kitane ghuunghar nainon men kitanaa jaaduu bas tuu mohe achchhaa laage itane hii se mujh ko kaam re latvat nainvain main kyaa jaanuun re threedots  kuchh jaanatii to kahatii rut ban kar ke main khilii huun daalon sii jhuumatii main saajan se aa milii huun tuu hii jaane rut hai kaisii aur hai kitanii rangiin shaam re rutvut shaamvaam main kyaa jaanuun re threedots  paayaa hai jab se tujhako dil par nahiin hai qaabuu ek pyaas hai labon par bikhare pade hain gesuu kuchh to kah de dard hai kaisaa kaisii pyaas hai ye har gaam re labvab pyaasvyaas main kyaa jaanuun re threedots

Title: ho pyaar baantate chalo
Lyrics: ho pyaar baantate chalo hai pyaar baantate chalo he pyaar baantate chalo kyaa hinduu kyaa musalamaan ham sab hain bhaaiibhaaii pyaar baantate threedots   pyaar hai zindagii kii nishaanii ye bujurgon kaa kahanaa hai yaaron ek hii saaz ke taar hain sab hamako milajul ke rahanaa hai yaaron  2 he socho kal kyaa the dekho aaj kyaa ho tumako le naa duube kahiin apanii ye ladaaii  ko 	pyaar baantate threedots   raam ye hai to rahamaan tum ho ye hai karataar to jaan tum ho naam kuchh ho magar ye naa bhuulo sabase pahale to insaan tum ho  2 ai nanhen shahazaadon ai kal ke netaaon tumase hamane kyaakyaa ummiiden hain lagaaiin  ko 	pyaar baantate threedots   ye ajantaa hai vo taaj dekho har jagah pyaar kii hai ek kahaanii pyaar sadiyon se ab tak amar hai aur har chiiz hai aaniijaanii  2 he jab tak ye duniyaa hai tab tak ye zindaa hai sabane sar jhukaayaa jab inakii yaad aaii  ko 	pyaar baantate threedots

Title: thumakthumak mat chalo kisii kaa dil tadapegaa
Lyrics: thumakthumak mat chalo kisii kaa dil tadapegaa mandmand mat hanso koii raahii bhatakegaa thumakthumak mat threedots  kaajal se kat jaaye kalejaa aankhen hiire kii kanii raahon men ho jaaye ujaalaa chehare par vo chaandanii gesuu khule mat rakho kisii kaa dil ulajhegaa thumakthumak mat threedots  dil men utar naa jaaen kisii ke shok nigaahen rok lo aah nikal naa jaae kisii kii apanii adaaen rok lo ban ke ghataa mat utho koii pyaasaa tarasegaa thumakthumak mat threedots

Title: aajaa ke bulaate hain
Lyrics: aajaa ke bulaate hain tujhe ashk hamaare aajaa ke bulaate hain  chup chaap nigaahon ne tumhen pyaar kyaa thaa is dil ne  muhabbat ka jo iqaraar kyaa thaa katate hain mere din unhiin yaadon ke sahaare yaad aate hain vo din jo tere saath guzaare aajaa ke bulaate hainthreedots  honthon pe machalane ke lie giit nahiin hai ab haar hai jiivan men koii jiit nahiin hai ham pyaar kii baazii kabhii jiite kabhii haare yaad aate hain vo din jo tere saath guzaare aajaa ke bulaate hain threedots  jis nadiyaa pe katatii thii har ik shaam suhaanii 2 jis nadiyaa pe hansatii thii kabhii aa ke javaanii rotaa hai meraa dil usii nadiyaa ke kinaare yaad aate hain vo din jo tere saath guzaare aajaa ke bulaate hain

Title: ham pyaar tumhen  hamen apanaa banaa kar dekho
Lyrics: ra 	ham pyaar tumhen karate hain hamen apanaa banaa kar dekho aa 	is baat se ham darate hain aankhen na milaa ke dekho ra 	ham pyaar tumhen threedots  	ye chaand se chehare pe laharaatii huii zulfen 	diivaanaa banaatii hain balakhaatii huii zulfen 	zulfon kii ghataaon ko chehare se hataa ke dekho 	ham pyaar tumhen threedots  aa 	kyon itane diivaane ho ai jalavon ke saudaaii 	aisii bhii bhalaa hamamen kyaa baat nazar aaii 	dekho to magar hamako kuchh hosh men aakar dekho ra 	ham pyaar tumhen threedots  	chalake to zaraa dekho in pyaar kii raahon men aa 	aa jaaen na kahiin ham duniyaa kii nigaahon men ra 	dam bhar ke lie aisii duniyaa ko bhulaa kar dekho 	ham pyaar tumhen threedots

Title: yah phuulon kaa gajaraa yah meraa singaar
Lyrics: yah phuulon kaa gajaraa yah meraa singaar koii le ke aayaa hai sapane hazaar  ye gajaron ke phuulon men kyaa mil gayaa zamiin jhuum uthii aasamaan hil gayaa havaaon men udane lage aaj ham ki unakii nazar men bhii dekhaa hai pyaar ho koii le ke aayaa hai threedots  un aankhon ne bhii kuchh kahii daastaan muskaraane lagaa aaj saaraa jahaan saans lene men bajatii hain shahanaaiyaan aa gaii zindagii men anokhii bahaar ho koii le ke aayaa hai threedots  merii aankhon ne dekhaa thaa sapanaa koii ban gayaa muhabbat men apanaa koii do qadam ab to chalanaa bhii mushkil huaa baat vo ho gaii jisakaa thaa intazaar yah phuulon kaa gajaraa threedots

Title: aankhon se jo utarii hai dil men
Lyrics: aankhon se jo utarii hai dil men tasaviir hai ek anjaane kii khud dhuundh rahii hai shamaa jise  kyaa baat hai us paravaane kii aankhon se jo utarii hai dil men threedots   vo usake labon par shokh hansii  rangiin sharaarat aankhon men saanson men mohabbat kii kushabuu vo pyaar kii dhadakan baaton men duniyaa merii threedots badal gayii banake ghataa nikal gayii taubaa vo nazar mastaane kii khud dhuundh rahii hai shamaa jise  kyaa baat hai us paravaane kii aankhon se jo utarii hai dil men threedots   andaaz vo usake aane kaa chupake se bahaar aaye jaise kahane ko ghadii bhar saath rahaa par umar guzaar aaye jaise unake binaa threedots rahuunngii nahiin kismat se ab jo kahiin mil jaaye khabar diivaane kii khud dhuundh rahii hai shamaa jise  kyaa baat hai us paravaane kii aankhon se jo utarii hai dil men threedots

Title: merii zindagii tere pyaar men ham kahaankahaan se
Lyrics: merii zindagii tere pyaar men ham kahaankahaan se guzar gae mere dil se aaii terii sadaa ham jahaanjahaan se guzar gae  mere dil ne dhuundhaa jagahjagah ki pataa tumhaaraa nahiin chalaa phire ham bhii terii talaash men guleaarazuu to nahiin khilaa 2  jahaan aafataab na jaa sake  2 ham vahaanvahaan se guzar gae merii zindagii tere threedots  tuu hazaar pardon men ho kahiin tujhe paa ke maanenge ek din tuu kahiin rahe tuu kahiin chhupe tujhe laa ke maanenge ek din  hamen maut kaa koii dar nahiin  2 tere aastaan se guzar gae merii zindagii tere threedots  mere dil se nikalaa hai giit jo tuu sune to phir koii baat hai tuu jhalak dikhaa tuu nazar to aa merii har duaa tere saath hai  tujhe dekh len isii shauq men  2 gamedojahaan se guzar gae merii zindagii tere threedots

Title: main to bhuul chalii baabul kaa des
Lyrics: main to bhuul chalii baabul kaa des  piyaa kaa ghar pyaaraa lage  koii maike ko de do sandes  piyaa kaa ghar pyaaraa lage   1 nanadii men dekhii hai bahanaa kii suurat  saasuu jii merii hai mamataa kii muurat  pitaa jaisaa sasur jii kaa bhes piyaa threedots  2 chandaa bhii pyaaraa hai suuraj bhii pyaaraa  par sabase pyaaraa hai sajanaa hamaaraa  aankhen samajhe jiyaa kaa sandes piyaa threedots  3 baithaa rahe saiyaan nainon ko jode  2  ik pal vo mujhako akelaa naa chhode  nahiin jiyaa ko koii klesh piyaa threedots

Title: haay gazab kahiin taaraa tuutaa
Lyrics: haay gazab kahiin taaraa tuutaaa luutaa re luutaa mere sainyyaa ne luutaa  pahalaa taaraa atariyaa pe tuutaa 2 daanton tale main ne daabaa anguuthaa 2 luutaa re luutaa saanvariyaa ne luutaa haay gazab kahiin taaraa tuutaaa   threedots  duusaraa taaraa bajariyaa men tuutaa  2 dekhaa hai sabane  chhuuta  2 luutaa re luutaa sipahyaa ne luutaa haay gazab kahiin taaraa tuutaaa   threedots  tiisaraa taaraa phulbagiyaa men tuutaa  2 phuulon se puuchhe koii hai kaun jhuutha  2 luuta re luuta darogaa ne luutaa haay gazab kahiin taaraa tuutaaa   threedots

Title: ye zulf agar khul ke bikhar jaae to achchhaa

Title: tum agar saath dene kaa vaadaa karo
Lyrics: tum agar saath dene kaa vaadaa karo main yunhii mast nagame lutaataa rahun tum mujhe dekhakar muskuraatii raho main tumhen dekhakar giit gaataa rahuun tum agarthreedots  kitane jalave fizaaon men bikhare magar maine abatak kisiko pukaraa nahiin tumako dekhaa to nazaren ye kahane lagiin hamako chehare se hatanaa gavaaraa nahiin tum agar merii nazaron ke aage raho main har ek shah se nazaren churaataa rahuun tum agarthreedots  maine kvaabon men barason taraashaa jise tum vahii sangemaramar kii tasvir ho tum na samajho tumhaaraa muqaddar hun main main samajhataa hun tum merii taqadiir ho tum agar mujhako apanaa samajhane lago main baharon kii mahafil sajaataa rahun tum agarthreedots  main akelaa bahut der chalataa rahaa ab safar zindagaanii ka katataa nahiin jab talak koi rangiin sahaaraa naa ho vaqt qaafir javaanii kaa katataa nahiin tum agar hamaqadam banake chalatii raho main zamiin par sitaare bichhaataa rahun  tum agar saath dene ka vaadaa karo threedots

Title: aa jaanejaan aa mere husn javaan
Lyrics: aa jaanejaan  aa jaanejaan  aa meraa ye husn javaan javaan javaan  tere liye hai aas lagaaye  o zaalim aa jaanaa na		2  aa jaanejaan threedots  o aankh se mastii tapake hai tapake hai tuu dekhe na dil kaa saagar chhalake hai chhalake hai tuu samajhe na aa la la la la la aa kyon tadapaaye tuu kyon tarasaaye o zaalim aa jaanaa na aa jaanejaan threedots  o duur se kitanii aayii huun aayii huun tuu jaane na pyaar kaa tohfaa laayii huun laayii huun tuu maane na aa la la la la la aa bedardii se tuu kyon thukaraaye aa zaalim aa jaanaa na aa jaanejaan threedots

Title: main gaauun tum so jaao sukh sapanon men kho jaao
Lyrics: main gaauun tum so jaao sukh sapanon men kho jaao maanaa aaj kii raat hai lambii maanaa din thaa bhaarii par jag badalaa badalegii ek din taqadiir hamaarii us din ke khvaab sajaao  1 kal tum jab aankhen khologe jab hogaa ujiyaaraa khushiyon kaa sandeshaa lekar aaegaa saveraa pyaaraa mat aas ke diip bujhaao  main gaaun threedots  2 jii karataa hai jiite jii main yun hii gaataa jaaun gardish men thake haathon kaa maathaa sahalaataa jaauun phir ik din tum doharaao  sukh sapanon threedots

Title: chaandii kii diivaar na todii pyaar bharaa dil tod diyaa
Lyrics: chaandi kii diivaar na todii pyaar bharaa dil tod diyaa ik dhanavan ki beti ne nirdhan ka daman tod diyaa chandi ki threedots  kal tak jisane qasamen khain dukh men sath nibhane ki aj vo apane sukh ki khatir ho gai ik begane ki shahanaiyon ki gunj men dabake rah gai ah divane ki dhanavanon ne divane ka gam se rishta jod diya ik dhanavan ki beti ne nirdhan ka daman tod diya chandi ki threedots  ye kya samajhe pyar ko jinaka sab kuchh chandi sona hai dhanavanon ki is duniya men dil to ek khilauna hai sadiyon se dil tutata aya dil ka bas ye rona hai jab tak chaha dil se khela aur jab chaha tod diya ik dhanavan ki beti ne nirdhan ka daman tod diya chandi ki threedots

Title: sharamaa ke ye kyon sab pardaanashiin
Lyrics: sharamaa ke ye kyon sab pardaanashiin aanchal ko sanvaaraa karataa hain kuchh aise nazar vaale bhii hain jo chhupchhup ke nazaaraa karate hain  betaab nigaahon se kah do jalavon se uljahanaa thiik nahiin aanaa sambhal ke pardanashiinon ke saamane jhukatii hai zindagii bhii hasiinon ke saamane mahafil men husn kii jo gayaa shaan se gayaa jis ne nazar milaayii vahii jaan se gayaa ye naazoadaa ke matavaalaa bemaut bhii maaraa karate hain threedots  koii na hasiinon ko puuchhe duniyaa men na ho gar dilvaale nazaren jo na hotiin to nazaaraa bhii na hotaa duniyaa men hasiinon kaa guzaaraa bhii na hotaa nazaron ne sikhaayii inhen shokii bhii hayaa bhii nazaron ne banaayaa hai inhen khud bhii khudaa bhii ye husn kii izzat rakhane ko har zulm gavaaraa karate hain threedots  chheden na muhabbat ke maare in chaand sii suurat vaalon ko arz kar do ye nuqtaachiinon se  ki rahen duur naazaniinon se agar ye khush hon to  ulfat kaa ahataraam karen zaraa bhii kafaa hon to qatleaam karen ye shok nazar ke khanjar bhii siine men utaaraa karate hain

Title: kyon jii aakir kaun ho tum  aavaaraa huun
Lyrics: aa 	kyon jii aakir kaun ho tum mu 	aavaaraa huun aa 	ghaas ke paas kyon khade ho mu 	ghasiyaaraa huun aa 	ho kyon jii aakir kaun ho tum mu 	aavaaraa huun ghasiyaaraa huun aavaaraa huun huun huun  mu 	tuu hai huur zamiin kii raanii main maasuum farishtaa aa 	tod na mere laaj ke bandhan jod na dil kaa rishtaa 	jaa jaa jod na dil kaa rishtaa 	aakir terii jaat hai kyaa mu 	bhatiyaaraa huun aa 	kyon jii aakir kaun ho tum mu 	aavaaraa huun ghasiyaaraa huun bhatiyaaraa huun huun huun  aa 	har ladakii kii aankhon par tum bijalii ban kar girate mu 	dil kii gatharii sar par rakhakar galii galii ham phirate 		haan haan galii galii ham phirate aa 	aisaa kyuun karate ho tum mu 	banajaaraa huun aa 	kyon jii aakir kaun ho tum mu 	aavaaraa huun bhatiyaaraa huun banajaaraa huun huun huun  mu 	jab tuu naache naazoadaa se dharatii kaa dil dhadake aa 	tujhe pakad kar piituungii main bhaag yahaan se ladake 		chal hat bhaag yahaan se ladake 	main rustam kii ladakii huun mu 	main daaraa huun aa 	ghaas ke paas kyon khade threedots

Title: ab der ho gaii vallaa tuu chhod de meraa pallaa
Lyrics: o  ab der ho gaii vallaa tuu chhod de meraa pallaa  2 phir milenge inshaaallaa ab der ho gaii vallaa tuu chhod de meraa pallaa phir milenge inshaaallaa ab der ho gaii vallaa 2   mujhe rok na zaalim bedardii haay lagatii hai mujhako saradii  2 mujh jaisii phir na paaoge mar jaaungii main uii allaa ab der ho gaii vallaa tuu chhod de meraa pallaa ab der ho gaii vallaa   ai jaanemohabbat jaane de de mujhako ijaazar jaane de  2 main tumase waadaa karatii huun kal aauungii inshaaallaa ab der ho gaii vallaa tuu chhod de meraa pallaa ab der ho gaii vallaa   achchhaa sarakaar kudaahaafiz mere diladaar kudaahaafiz  2 kyuun kafaa ho gaye kyaa kahane hain subhaanallaa ab der ho gaii vallaa tuu chhod de meraa pallaa ab der ho gaii vallaa 2

Title: umr huii tumase mile phir bhii jaane kyon
Lyrics: la  umr huii tumase mile phir bhii jaane kyon      aise lage jaise pahalii baar mile hain he  umr huii baag saje phir bhii jaane kyon      aise lage phool pahalii baar khile hain  la  ruup jagaa yuun bin sanvaare saajanaa main sanvar gaii 2      aaj lagaa yuun aaj lagaa yuun      motiyon se merii maang bhar gaii      kajaraa chhalake acharaa dhalake      aise lage jaise pahalii baar mile hain  he  sang tumhaaraa merii zindagii ko raas aa gayaa 2      paa ke sahaaraa paa ke sahaaraa      duur thhaa main apane paas aa gayaa      duniyaa saarii laage nyaarii      aise lage jaise pahalii baar mile hain  la  jhuum uthaa tan man men ek aisii baat aa gaii 2      jisakii thii lagan jisakii thii lagan      aaj vo milan kii raat aa gaii      alake lahake akhiyaan bakahe      aise lage jaise pahalii baar mile hain

Title: dil kii aavaaz bhii sun mere fasaane pe na jaa
Lyrics: dil kii aavaaz bhii sun mere fasaane pe na jaa merii nazaron kii taraf dekh zamaane pe na jaa  ik nazar fer le jiine kii ijaazat de de ruuthane vaale vo pahalii sii muhabbat de de ishq maasuum hai  2 ilazaam lagaane pe na jaa  vaqt inasaan pe aisaa bhii kabhii aataa hai raah men chhodake saayaa bhii chalaa jaataa hai din bhii nikalegaa kabhii  2 raat ke aane pe na jaa  main haqiiqat huun ye ik roz dikhaauungaa tujhe begunaahii pe muhabbat kii rulaauungaa tujhe daag dil ke nahiin mitate hain mitaane pe na jaa

Title: jiyaraa tarase dekhana ko
Lyrics: jiyaraa tarase dekhana ko 2 lagii hai aas milan kii jiyaraa tarase dekhana ko jiyaraa tarase threedots  ik rut biitii ik rut aayii tere milan kii raah na paayii 2 jyot jalaayii man men lagan kii jiyaraa tarase dekhana ko jiyaraa tarase threedots  ruup kii pyaasii pyaar kii maarii saarii nagariyaa tak tak haarii 2 banake joganiyaa apane sajan kii jiyaraa tarase dekhana ko 2 jiyaraa tarase threedots   jiyaaraa tarase dekhana ko jiyaraa tarase threedots

Title: nazar men bijalii adaa men shole
Lyrics: nazar men bijalii adaa men shole janaabeaalii main sadake jaavaan zaraa palat ke idhar to dekho 2 o gusse vaalii main sadake jaavaan   kabhii to hamako salaam kar lo kabhii to puuchho ke haal kyaa hai  2 ye husn tumako diyaa kudaa ne tumhaaraa isamen kamaal kyaa hai nazar men bijalii threedots   teraa ye aashiq teraa diivaanaa zamaane bhar men judaa hai pyaare  2 labon pe mere jo aa gaii hai vo tere dil kii sadaa hai pyaare nazar men bijalii threedots

Title: kyuun mujhe itanii kushii de dii ki ghabaraataa hai dil
Lyrics: kyuun mujhe itanii kushii de dii ki ghabaraataa hai dil kahiin machal na jaauun kahiin phisal na jaauun machal na jaauun phisal na jaauun kyuun mujhe itanii kushii de dii ki ghabaraataa hai dil  ek main huun aur bahaaren beshumaar ho na jaaye aaj aanchal taartaar dhak se ho jaataa hai meraa jii jo itaraataa hai dil kyuun mujhe itanii kushii de dii ki ghabaraataa hai dil  khil gaii huun apanii suurat dekhakar lag na jaaye mujhako merii hii nazar ye vo rut hai jisamen apane par kud aa jaataa hai dil kyuun mujhe itanii kushii de dii ki ghabaraataa hai dil  zindagii betaab hai mere liye pyaar rangiin kvaab hai mere liye sab bahak jaate hain jaane kyuun jo bahakaataa hai dil kyuun mujhe itanii kushii de dii ki ghabaraataa hai dil

Title: ek tuu jo milaa saarii duniyaa miilii khilaa jo meraa dil
Lyrics: ek tuu jo milaa saarii duniyaa milii  khilaa jo meraa dil saarii bagiyaa khilii   tu suraj main surajamukhii huun piyaa  naa dekhuun tujhe to khile naa jiyaa  tere rang main rangii mere dil kii kalii  khilaa jo threedots  anokhaa hain bandhan ye kangan saajan  binaa dor ke bandh gayaa meraa man  tu jidhar le chal main udhar hii chalii  khilaa jo threedots  kabhi jo naa bichhade vo sathi huun main  tu meraa diyaa teraa bati huun main  bujhaayaa bujhii jalaayaa jalii  khilaa jo threedots  ek tu naa milaa threedots   ek tu naa milaa sari duniyaa mile bhi to kyaa hai meraa dil naa khilaa sari bagiyaa khile bhi to kyaa hai  dharatii huun main aur tu hai gagan  hogaa kahaan teraa meraa milan  laakh pahere yahaan pyaar dil men pale bhi to kyaa hain  ek tu naa milaa threedots   taqadir kii main koi bhuul huun  daalii se bichhadaa huaa phuul huun  sath teraa nahiin sang duniyaa chale bhi to kyaa hai ek tu naa milaa threedots  tujhase lipatakar jo ro lete ham  aansu nahiin the ye motii se kam  teraa daaman nahiin ye aansuu dhale bhi to kyaa hai ek tu naa milaa threedots

Title: ishaaron ishaaron men dil lene vaale
Lyrics: ishaaron ishaaron men dil lene vaale bataa ye hunar tuune siikhaa kahaan se nigaahon nigaahon men jaaduu chalaanaa merii jaan siikhaa hai tumane jahaan se  mere dil ko tum bhaa gae merii kyaa thii is men khataa mere dil ko tadapaa diyaa yahii thii vo zaalim adaa yahii thii vo zaalim adaa ye raanjhaa kii baaten ye majanuu ke kisse alag to nahiin hain merii daastaan se  muhabbat jo karate hain vo muhabbat jataate nahiin dhadakane apane dil kii kabhii kisii ko sunaate nahiin kisii ko sunaate nahiin mazaa kyaa rahaa jab kii khud kar liyaa ho muhabbat kaa izahaar apanii zubaan se  maanaa kii jaanejahaan laakhon men tum ek ho hamaarii nigaahon kii bhii kuchh to magar daad do kuchh to magar daad do bahaaron ko bhii naaz jis phuul par thaa vahii phuul hamane chunaa gulasitaan se

Title: tum jaise bigade baabuu se main ankhiyaan bachaauun
