Lyrics: tum jaise bigade baabuu se main ankhiyaan bachaauun thingin thingin naachuun aur duniyaa ko nachaauun tum jaise bigade threedots  aankhon men madhushaale rang bhare ye pyaale chandaasuuraj donon mere kaanon ke hain baale 2 apane aap ko kyaa samajho ho baabuu o baabuu tum jaise bigade threedots  mukh pe lat laharaae ghan badaraa sharamaae niil gagan kaa baankaa raahii paayal baandhane aae 2 apane aap ko kyaa samajho ho baabuu o baabuu tum jaise bigade threedots

Title: mahalon kaa raajaa milaa
Lyrics: mahalon kaa raajaa milaa ke raanii betii raaj karegii khushiikhushii kar do bidaa tumhaarii betii raaj karegii  galiyongaliyon dhuum machegii 2 kaandhekaandhe dolii chalegii dolii men dolegaa jiyaa 2 ke raanii betii raaj karegii khushiikhushii kar do bidaa threedots  jis ghar jaae swarg banaa de 2 donon kul kii laaj nibhaa de yahii baabul jii denge duaa 2 ke raanii betii raaj karegii khushiikhushii kar do bidaa threedots  betii to hai dhan hii paraayaa 2 paas apane koii kab rakh paayaa bhaarii karanaa naa apanaa jiyaa 2 tumhaarii betii raaj karegii khushiikhushii kar do bidaa threedots

Title: sharaabiisharaabii ye saawan ka mausam
Lyrics: sharaabiisharaabii ye saawan kaa mausam kudaa kii qasam kuubasuurat na hotaa agar isamen rangemuhabbat na hotaa sharaabiisharaabii threedots  suhaaniisuhaanii ye koyal kii kuuken uthaatii hain siine men rahrah ke huuken chhalakatii hai mastii ghane baadalon se ulajhatii hain nazaren hasiin aanchalon se ye puranuur manzar ye puranuur manzar ye rangiin aalam kudaa kii qasam kuubasuurat na hotaa agar isamen rangemuhabbat na hotaa sharaabii sharaabii threedots  gulaabiigulaabii ye phuulon ke chehare ye rimajhim ke motii ye buundon ke sehare kuchh aisii bahaar aa gaii hai chaman men ke dil kho gayaa hai isii anjuman men ye mahakii nashiilii ye mahakii nashiilii havaaon kaa paracham kudaa kii qasam kuubasuurat na hotaa agar isamen rangemuhabbat na hotaa sharaabii sharaabii threedots  ye mausam salonaa ajab gul khilaae umangen ubhaare ummiiden jagaae vo betaabiyaan dil se takaraa rahiin hain ke raaton kii niinden udii jaa rahiin hain ye saharejawaanii ye saharejawaanii ye kvaabon kaa aalam kudaa kii qasam kuubasuurat na hotaa agar isamen rangemuhabbat na hotaa sharaabii sharaabii threedots

Title: vahii udiiudii ghataaen hain ek tum nahiin ho to
Lyrics: vahii udiiudii ghataaen hain ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin	 2 vahii bhiigiibhiigii havaaen hain ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin  2  hai kalii se gul ko mile hue yahaan zakmedil hai khile hue vahii koyalon kii sadaaen hai vahii koyalon kii sadaaen hai ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin  jo kiye the vaade nigaahon men vahii ud gae aae havaaon men vahii khoiikhoii fizaaen hain vahii khoiikhoii fizaaen hain ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin  yahiin kal to tum mere saath the gore haathon men mere haath the magar aaj honthon pe aahen hain magar aaj honthon pe aahen hain ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin ek tum nahiin ho to kuchh nahiin

Title: kal raat vaalii mulaakaat ke lie har baat ke lie maaf kiijie
Lyrics: kal raat vaalii mulaakaat ke lie har baat ke lie maaf kiijie maaf kiijie  2  aaiinaa naa dekhie merii suurat dekhie siidhiisaadii bholiibhaalii merii muurat dekhie aadamii shariif nahiin huun main kyaa bhalaa qaabiletaariif nahiin huun main kyaa bhalaa aap hii ye insaaf kiijie 2 maaf kiijie 4  merii kyaa mazaal hai jo main daaman thaam luun taubaataubaa merii taubaa aapakaa main naam luun vo paravaanaa vo mastaanaa koii aur thaa main nahiin thaa vo diivaanaa koii aur thaa maan jaaie dil saaf kiijie 2 maaf kiijie 4  sunie janaab ye merii pahalii bhuul hai pahalii bhuul maaf ho ye duniyaa kaa asuul hai aap jo na honge ajii ham pe meharabaan aapko sitamagar kahegaa ye jahaan aur kyaa kahuun maaf kiijie maaf kiijie 4 kal raat vaalii threedots

Title: sajanaa meraa dil teraa dil gayaa mil
Lyrics: sajanaa  sajanaa meraa dil teraa dil gayaa mil kisii se mat kahanaa o sajanaa  2  pyaar hansaa hai abhii abhii lage nazar na ise kabhii  2 o sajanaa sajanaa sajanaa sajanaa meraa dil teraa dil gayaa mil kisii se mat kahanaa o sajanaa   dil jo meraa meharabaan hai mujhako koii gam kahaan hai  2  tuu nahiin to kuchh nahiin hai tuu jo hai to dil javaan  2  sajanaa meraa dil teraa dil gayaa mil kisii se mat kahanaa o sajanaa   main huun terii ye qasam le tuu hai meraa ye qasam de  2  ham na badalen chaahe badale ye zamiin ye aasamaan  2  sajanaa meraa dil teraa dil gayaa mil kisii se mat kahanaa o sajanaa  pyaar hansaa hai abhii abhii lage nazar na ise kabhii  2 o sajanaa sajanaa sajanaa sajanaa meraa dil teraa dil gayaa mil kisii se mat kahanaa o sajanaa

Title: yaa merii manzil bataa yaa zindagii ko chhiin le
Lyrics: yaa merii manzil bataa yaa zindagii ko chhiin le 2 jisake piichhe gam lage hon us kushii ko chhiin le yaa merii manzil threedots  de nahiin sakataa agar aaraam kii ik saans bhii 2 paanv mere tod de aavaaragii ko chhiin le yaa merii manzil threedots  aankh men aansuu kahaan ro duun jo apane haal par 2 aa gaii jo apane gam par us hansii ko chhiin le yaa merii manzil threedots

Title: tainuun saamane bathaa ke
Lyrics: tainuun saamane bathaa ke sharmaan ve aihoii meraa jii kardaa tainuun chorii chorii takadii phiraan ve aihoii meraa jii kardaa  tere tere bin meraa lagadaa na jii ve holii jayaa das meraa lagadaa ain kii ve kuj bol kuj das zaalamaan ve aihoii meraa jii kardaa  saarii saarii raat yaadaan teriyaan sataundiyaan sufane kii aun saanuun niindaraan naiin aundiyaan kadii tainuun naal apane jagaan ve aihoii meraa jii kardaa  tere baajon dil nuun main laare lappe launii aan vede vichon uth ke banere utte aunii aan enj dil nuun dalaase denii aan ve aihoii meraa jii kardaa

Title: main tere pyaar men kyaa kyaa na banaa
Lyrics: ma 	main tere pyaar men kyaa kyaa na banaa dilabar 	jaane ye mausam 2 gii  	main ghataa pyaar bharii tuu hai meraa baadal 	jaane ye mausam 2  ma 	tuu hai merii banshii main huun teraa kaanhaa gii  	teraa meraa pyaar hai sadiyon puraanaa ma 	dil ke har taar men hai raag teraa haradam gii  	main ghataa pyaar bharii threedots  ma 	tuu hai merii manzil main huun teraa saahil gii  	karake rahenge ik din tujhe haasil ma 	chale tuu hii gorii dil men sadaa chham chham gii  	main ghataa pyaar bharii threedots

Title: zindagii ke safar men akele the ham
Lyrics: zindagii ke safar men akele the ham mil gae tum to dil ko sahaaraa milaa aa gae ik nae raaste par qadam jab tumhaarii nazar kaa ishaaraa milaa  zindagii ko tamannaa thii hamaraaz kii paazedil kii zaruurat thii aavaaz kii tumane jab muskuraakar pukaaraa hamen zindagii ko khushii kaa nazaaraa milaa  ab zamaane kaa dar hai na duniyaa kaa gam apanii taqadiir par naaz karate hain ham aaj aankhon ko jalave tumhaare mile aaj haathon ko daaman tumhaaraa milaa

Title: le lo le lo sapanon kaa saudaagar aayaa
Lyrics: le lo le lo sapanon kaa saudaagar aayaa le lo ye sapane le lo  tumase qismat khel chukii tum qismat se khelo ab tum qismat se khelo  ye rangbirange sapane ye jiivan ke ujiyaare ye tanahaaii ke saathii ye bhiid men sangsahaare ye chaand aur suuraj apane ye andhii raat ke taare 2 sapanon kaa saudaagar threedots  ik chhaliyaa aas ke piichhe daude to yahaan tak aaye har shaam ko dhalataa suuraj jaatejaate kah jaae vo tay kar letaa manzil jo ik sapanaa apanaae 2 sapanon kaa saudaagar threedots

Title: niind kabhii rahatii thii aankhon men ab rahate hain saanvariyaa
Lyrics: niind kabhii rahatii thii aankhon men ab rahate hain saanvariyaa chain kabhii rahataa thaa is dil men ab rahate hain saanvariyaa  log mujhase kahen dekho udhar nikalaa hai chaand kaun dekhe udhar jaane kidhar nikalaa hai chaand chaand kabhii rahataa thaa nazaron men ab rahate hain saanvariyaa niind kabhii rahatii thii threedots  jhuuth bolii pavan kahane lagii aaii bahaar ham baag men gae dekhaa vahaan pyaar hii pyaar phuul rahate honge chaman men kabhii ab rahate hain saanvariyaa niind kabhii rahatii thii threedots  baat pahale bhii aur tuufaan se darate the ham baat ab aur hai ab hai hamen kaahe kaa gam saath kabhii maanjhii thaa sang lekin ab rahate hain saanvariyaa niind kabhii rahatii thii threedots

Title: thahariye hosh men aaluun to chale jaaiyegaa
Lyrics: rafii thahariye hosh men aaluun to chale jaaiyegaa suman m threedots m threedots rafii aapako dil men bithaaluun to chale jaaiyegaa suman m threedots m threedots rafii aapako dil men bithaaluun threedots  rafii kab talaq rahiyegaa yuun duur kii chaahat banake     2 dil men aa jaaiye iqaraaremuhabbat banake apanii taqadiir banaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa suman m threedots m threedots rafii aapako dil men bithaaluun threedots  suman mujhako iqaraaremuhabbat pe hayaa aatii hai    2 baat kahate hue garadan merii jhuk jaatii hai dekhiye sar ko jhukaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa rafii m threedots m threedots suman dekhiye sar ko jhukaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa rafii haay  aapako dil men bithaaluun threedots  rafii aisii kyaa sharm zaraa paas to aane diije     2 rukh se bikharii hui zulfen to hataane diije pyaas aankhon kii bujhaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa thahariye hosh men aaluun to chale jaaiyegaa threedots

Title: ai kaash chalate mil ke
Lyrics: ai kaash chalate mil ke ye tiin raahii dil ke chaand aur main aur tuu uu uu  chalaa chalaa saa raat kaa jaaduu koii na ho har suu udatii ho khushabuu tum ho ham hon kam se kam ho faasale dil ke ai kaash chalate mil ke threedots  nazar pe ho na dil pe ho qaabuu koii na ho har suu udatii ho khushabuu chalate chalate jaa nikalate paas manzil ke ai kaash chalate mil ke threedots

Title: zaraa sambhaalanaa  ki teraameraa nayaanayaa pyaar huaa hai
Lyrics: mu 	zaraa sambhaalanaa merii jaan apanii nigaahen 	ki teraameraa nayaanayaa pyaar huaa hai 2 la 	 na chhed aaj hain  2 aur hii dil kii adaaen la ka 		ki teraameraa threedots  la 	chaand utar aayaa jaise zamiin pe 	duniyaa nazar aaii hamako yahiin pe mu 	tujhe apanii bahaaron kii kabar hai ki nahiin 	terii apane ishaaron pe nazar hai ki nahiin la 	terii nazar jaane hayaa apanii hamen kyaa kabar ka 	rang nikhar aayaa hai aaj tumhen dekhakar mu 	yahiin pe rok le merii jaan apanii nigaahen 	ki teraameraa threedots la ka 		ki teraameraa threedots  mu 	tere qadam aae dil ke chaman men 	bijalii sii laharaaii saare badan men la 	chalo chuukaa nahiin tiir kuchh to huaa ka 	mere dil kaa tere dil par asar kuchh to huaa mu 	dekh mere sapanon kaa shiishmahal tod ke 	ab na kahiin jaanaa tuu saath meraa chhod ke la 	abhii na aazamaa la ka 	abhii na aazamaa saajanaa merii vafaaen 	ki teraameraa threedots tii 		ki teraameraa threedots

Title: toraa man darpan kahalaaye
Lyrics: praanii apane prabhu se puuchhe kis vidhii paauun tohe prabhu kahe tu man ko paa le paa jayegaa mohe  tora man darpan kahalaye  2 bhale bure sare karmon ko dekhe aur dikhaye tora man darpan kahalaye  2  man hi devata man hi ishvar man se bada na koy man ujiyara jab jab phaile jag ujiyara hoy is ujale darpan pe prani dhul na jamane paye tora man darpan kahalaye  2  sukh ki kaliyan dukh ke kante man sabaka adhar man se koi bat chhupe na man ke nain hazar jag se chahe bhag lo koi man se bhag na paye tora man darpan kahalaye  2  tan kii daulat dhalatii chhaayaa man kaa dhan anamol tan ke kaaran man ke dhan ko mat maati mein raund man kii qadar bhulaanevaalaa viiraan janam gavaaye tora man darpan kahalaye  2

Title: aapake pahaluu men aakar ro diye
Lyrics: aapake pahaluu men aakar ro diye  2 daastaanegam sunaakar ro diye aapake pahaluu men aakar ro diye  zindagii ne kar diyaa jab bhii udaas aa gaye ghabaraa ke ham manzil ke paas sar jhukaayaa sar jhukaakar ro diye aapake pahaluu men aakar ro diye  shaam jab aansuu bahaatii aa gaii  2 har taraf gam kii udaasii chhaa gaii diip yaadon ke jalaakar ro diye aapake pahaluu men aakar ro diye  gam judaaii kaa sahaa jaataa nahiin aapake bin ab rahaa jaataa nahiin pyaar men kyaakyaa ganvaakar ro diye daastaanegam sunaakar ro diye aapake pahaluu men aakar ro diye

Lyrics: mu 	dil se dil kii dor baandhe choriichorii jaane 	hamtum tumham sangsang chale  aaj kahaan  2 la 	dil se dil kii dor threedots  mu 	qadam milaakar chale udhar le ke chale ye pyaar jidhar la 	pyaar ke raahii tuu hii bataa katm kahaan hogaa ye safar mu 	jahaan pe gaae dil kii saragam jhuum jhuum koii 	hamtum tumham threedots  la 	naii sii duniyaa nayaa samaan chhupaa huaa thaa pyaar kahaan mu 	chhupaa huaa thaa yahiinkahiin kabar ye dil ko magar nahiin la 	hataao paradaa pyaar jagaa chalo basaa len 	hamtum tumham sangsang ek  nayaa jahaan  2 do 	dil se dil kii dor threedots

Title: kis tarah jiite hain ye log bataa do yaaron
Lyrics: kis tarah jiite hain ye log bataa do yaaron hamako bhii jiine kaa andaaz sikhaa do yaaron kis tarah jiite hain threedots  pyaar lete hain kahaan se ye zamaane vaale 2 un galiikuuchon kaa rastaa to dikhaa do yaaron hamako bhii jiine kaa threedots  dard ke naam se vaaqif na jahaan ho koii 2 aisii mahafil men hamen bhii bithaa do yaaron hamako bhii jiine kaa threedots  saath denaa hai to khud piine kii aadat daalo 2 varanaa maikaane kaa dar hamase bhii chhudaa do yaaron hamako bhii jiine kaa threedots

Title: chhedaa jo dil kaa fasaanaa  allaa jaane maulaa jaane
Lyrics: chhedaa jo dil kaa fasaanaa hansaa zor se kyon zamaanaa allaa jaane maulaa jaane 2 chhedaa jo dil kaa threedots  mubaarak jahaan tujhako teraa uthaayaa faqiiron ne deraa milegaa kahaan ab thikaanaa allaa jaane maulaa jaane chhedaa jo dil kaa threedots  milaa kuchh na raastaa badal ke giraa vo chalaa jo sambhal ke ye khel kitanaa puraanaa allaa jaane maulaa jaane chhedaa jo dil kaa threedots  bachaa saarii duniyaa se jo dil huaa apane tiiron se ghaayal padaa kaisaa ultaa nishaanaa allaa jaane maulaa jaane chhedaa jo dil kaa threedots

Title: dil kii baat bataaen kis ko
Lyrics: dil kii baat bataaen kis ko ham dukh dard ke maare log aahen bharen to dekh ke ham ko hans dete hain saare log  ud jaate hain aas ke panchhii gaa kar miithaa giit koii is gulashan kii riit niralii kis ko banaae miit koii maango phuul to bhar dete hain jholii men angaare log dil kii baat threedots  koii kis ke dukh sukh baante koii kis kii raah take dosh hai ye apanii qisamat kaa ham na kisii ko chaah sake varanaa is duniyaa men honge kaise kaise payaare log dil kii baat threedots

Title: haiyaa o gangaa maiyaa  gangaa maiyaa men jab tak
Lyrics: haiyaa o gangaa maiyaa 2 gangaa maiyaa men jab tak ke paanii rahe mere sajanaa terii zindagaanii rahe zindagaanii rahe haiyaa o gangaa maiyaa 2  mere jiiwan ke o re khewaiyaa tere haathon men hai merii naiyaa duniyaa kuchh bhii kahe bhale kahatii rahe merii pujaa terii hii diwaanii rahe diwaanii rahe  haiyaa o gangaa maiyaa 2 gangaa maiyaa men jab tak ke paanii rahe mere sajanaa terii zindagaanii rahe zindagaanii rahe  chhipii naarii ke man men hai siitaa jisakaa jiivan angaaron pe biitaa mere jiivan ke raam teraa letii huun naam mere honthon pe terii kahaanii rahe kahaanii rahe haiyaa o gangaa maiyaa 2 gangaa maiyaa men jab tak ke paanii rahe mere sajanaa terii zindagaanii rahe zindagaanii rahe  aage agni ke phere lagaakar  aaii main tere dvaar kar ke solah singaar  mere maathe pe terii nishaanii rahe nishaanii rahe  haiyaa o gangaa maiyaa 2 gangaa maiyaa men jab tak ke paanii rahe mere sajanaa terii zindagaanii rahe zindagaanii rahe

Title: badatamiiz kaho yaa kaho jaanavar meraa dil tere dil pe
Lyrics: badatamiiz kaho yaa kaho jaanavar meraa dil tere dil pe fidaa ho gayaa bachaao koii sambhaalo koii o merii jaanejaan main tabaah ho gayaa ho lalaa ho lalaa 2 badatamiiz kaho yaa threedots  kitane miithe hain lab tere jaanegazal tuu buraa bhii kahe to lage hai bhalaa inhiin andaaz ne maar daalaa hamen naa tumhaarii kataa naa hamaarii kataa ho lalaa ho lalaa 2 badatamiiz kaho yaa threedots  merii ulfat se nafarat na kar sangadil dekh inakii badaulat ye duniyaa banii ishq kii aag men jal ke hastii mitaa phir kabar ho tumhen kyaa hai dillagii ho lalaa ho lalaa 2 badatamiiz kaho yaa threedots  pyaar karanaa koii jurm kab hai sanam pyaar meraa kudaa pyaar meraa dharam pyaar maine kiyaa kyaa gunaah kar diyaa tum socho zaraa tumako merii qasam ho lalaa ho lalaa 2 badatamiiz kaho yaa threedots

Title: aankh ko jaam samajh baithaa thaa
Lyrics: aankh ko jaam samajh baithaa thaa anjaane men saaqiyaa hosh kahaan thaa tere diivaane men  jaane kis baat kii unako hai shiqaayat mujh se naam tak jin kaa nahiin hai mere afasaane men  dil ke tukadon se terii yaad kii khushbuu na gayii buuemai baakii hai tuute hue paimaane men  dilebarbaad men ummiid kaa aalam kyaa hai timatimaatii hui ek shamaa hai viiraane men

Title: mere mahabuub tujhe merii muhabbat kii qasam
Lyrics: mere mahabuub tujhe merii muhabbat kii qasam phir mujhe naragisii aankhon kaa sahaaraa de de meraa khoyaa huaa rangiin nazaaraa de de mere mahabuub tujhe threedots  bhuul sakatii nahiin aankhen vo suhaanaa manzar jab teraa husn mere ishq se takaraayaa thaa aur phir raah men bikhare the hazaaron nagamen main vo nagamen terii aavaaz ko de aayaa thaa saazedil ko unhiin giiton kaa sahaaraa de de meraa khoyaa threedots  yaad hai mujhako merii umr kii pahalii vo ghadii terii aankhon se koii jaam piyaa thaa maine mere rag rag men koii barq sii laharaaii thii jab tere maramarii haathon ko chhuaa thaa maine aa mujhe phir unhiin haathon kaa sahaaraa de de meraa khoyaa threedots  maine ik baar terii ek jhalak dekhii hai merii hasarat hai ke main phir teraa diidaar karuun tere saae ko samajh kar main hansiin taajamahal chaandanii raat men nazaron se tujhe pyaar karuun apanii mahakii huii zulfon kaa sahaaraa de de meraa khoyaa threedots  dhuundhataa huun tujhe har raah men har mahafil men thak gaye hain merii majabuur tamannaa ke kadam aaj kaa din merii ummiid kaa hai aakhirii din kal na jaane main kahaan aur kahaan tuu ho sanam do ghadii apanii nigaahon kaa sahaaraa de de meraa khoyaa threedots  saamane aa ke zaraa pardaa uthaa de ruk se ik yahii meraa ilaajegametanhaaii hai terii furaqat ne pareshaan kiyaa hai mujhako ab mil jaa ke merii jaan bhii ban aaii hai dil ko bhuulii huii yaadon kaa sahaaraa de de meraa khoyaa threedots

Title: aap aa jaaen to  duniyaa men aisaa kahaan sabakaa nasiib hai
Lyrics: aap aa jaaen to dil ko qaraar aa jaae  duniyaa men aisaa kahaan sabakaa nasiib hai koiikoii apane piyaa ke kariib hai duniyaa men aisaa threedots  duur hii rahate hain unase kinaare jinako na koii maanjhii paar utaare 2 saath hai maanjhii to kinaaraa bhii kariib hai duniyaa men aisaa threedots  chaahe bujhaa de koii diipak saare priit bichhaatii jaae raahon men taare 2 priit diivaanii kii kahaanii bhii ajiib hai duniyaa men aisaa threedots  barakhaa kii rut ho yaa din hon bahaar ke lagate hain suunesuune bin tere pyaar ke 2 tuu hai to zindagii ko zindagii nasiib hai duniyaa men aisaa threedots

Title: sochataa huun ye kyaa kiyaa mainne
Lyrics: mu sochataa huun ye kyaa    ye kyaa kiyaa mainne    kyaa ye saradard le liyaa mainne   la sochatii huun ye kyaa    ye kyaa kiyaa mainne    kyon ye saradard le liyaa mainne   mu kaun hai ye kahaan se aaii hai    ye to apanii nahiin paraaii hai    aisii chanchal shariir aur jhuuthii    phir bhii dil ko ye aisii bhaaii hai    haath haathon men le liyaa mainne    dilenaadaan ye kyaa kiyaa mainne    sochataa huun ye kyaathreedots   la dekh kar yuun  vo muskuraayaa kyuun    muskuraayaa thaa paas aayaa kyuun    naak itanii sii aap itanaa saa    phir bhii merii nazar ko bhaayaa kyuun    isako arpan kiyaa hiyaa mainne    dilenaadaan ye kyaa kiyaa mainne   mu raat din ishq kaa jo ronaa thaa la liijiye ho gayaa jo honaa thaa mu ye jo qaafir dhadak rahaa hai yahaan    is ne ek din mujhe dubonaa thaa    dilenaadaan ye kyaa kiyaa mainne la jo kiyaa thiik hii kiyaa mainne    dil kaa raushan kiyaa diiyaa mainne mu sochataa huun ye kyaathreedots

Title: aap aaye to kayaaledilenaashaad aayaa
Lyrics: aap aaye to kayaaledilenaashaad aayaa kitane bhuule hue zakhmon kaa pataa yaad aayaa aap aaye   threedots  aap ke lab pe kabhii apanaa bhii naam aayaa thaa shokh nazaron se muhabbat kaa salaam aayaa thaa umr bhar saath nibhaane kaa payaam aayaa thaa aapako dekh ke vo ahadevafaa yaad aayaa kitane bhuule hue zakhmon kaa pataa yaad aayaa aap aaye   threedots  ruuh men jal uthe bujhatii huii yaadom ke diye kaise diivaane the ham aapako paane ke liye yuun to kuchh kam nahiin jo aapane ahasaan kiye par jo maange na paayaa vo silaa yaad aayaa kitane bhuule hue zakhmon kaa pataa yaad aayaa aap aaye   threedots  aaj vo baat nahiin phir bhii koii baat to hai mere hisse men ye halkii sii mulaaqaat to hai gair kaa ho ke bhii ye husn mere saath to hai haay kis vaqt mujhe kab kaa gilaa yaad aayaa kitane bhuule hue zakhmon kaa pataa yaad aayaa aap aaye   threedots

Title: husn se chaand bhii sharamaayaa hai
Lyrics: husn se chaand bhii sharamaayaa hai terii suurat ne gazab dhaayaa hai  2  haay in pyaar men duubii huii aankhon kii qasam aadamii kyaa hai farishton ke bahak jaaen qadam bin pie mujhape nashaa chhaayaa hai terii suurat ne threedots  jab se paayaa hai tujhe hosh nahiin hai mujhako yaa to ye sach hai ki dekh rahaa huun tujhako yaa koii kvaab nazar aayaa hai terii suurat ne threedots  muskaraaen jo tere lab to bahaaren aaiin khil gae phuul padii terii jahaan parachhaaiin tuune gulashan meraa mahakaayaa hai terii suurat ne threedots

Title: dil ai dil bahaaron se mil
Lyrics: dil ai dil bahaaron se mil sitaaron se aankhen milaa ye samaan ye rangiin samaan mausam bhii hai pyaar kaa yahii hai mere tere kvaabon kii duniyaa dil ai dil threedots  bahut paas thii pyaar kii manzilen magar raastaa bhuul jaate the ham agar dil kii nazaron se tum dekhate khade saamane muskuraate the ham dil ai dil threedots  achaanak kayaalon men aakar mere tumhiin merii niinden churaate rahe tumhen ham ne dil men bulaayaa to thaa magar tum hii daaman bachaate rahe dil ai dil threedots  muhabbat kaa ye giit gaate hue ham is raah men aaj kho jaayenge zamaanaa ye ab chaahe jo bhii kare liyaa jis ne dil us ke ho jaayenge dil ai dil threedots

Title: naa maanuun re  dagaabaaj torii batiyaan
Lyrics: naa maanuun naa maanuun naa maanuun re dagaabaaj torii batiyaan naa maanuun re  piyaa man men tore kaa hai main naa jaanuun re dagaabaaj torii batiyaan threedots  saanjh kahe tose  chundarii mangaibe  2 chundarii mangaibe tose chundarii mangaibe bhor bhae to bisar gaii batiyaan 2 naa maanuun re dagaabaaj torii batiyaan threedots  hamarii garaj pe  mukh se naa bole  2 mukh se naa bole sainyaa mukh se naa bole apanii garaj pe milaay le akhiyaan naa maanuun re dagaabaaj torii batiyaan threedots

Title: ai mere pyaare vatan
Lyrics: ai mere pyaare vatan ai mere bichhade chaman tujh pe dil qurabaan tuu hii merii aarazuu tuu hii merii aabaruu tuu hii merii jaan  tere daaman se jo aae un havaaon ko salaam chuum luun main us zubaan ko jisape aae teraa naam   2 sabase pyaarii subah terii sabase rangiin terii shaam tujh pe dil qurabaan threedots  maan kaa dil banake kabhii siine se lag jaataa hai tuu aur kabhii nanhiin sii betii ban ke yaad aataa hai tuu   2 jitanaa yaad aataa hai mujhako utanaa tadapaataa hai tuu tujh pe dil qurabaan threedots  chhod kar terii zamiin ko duur aa pahunche hain ham phir bhii hai ye hii tamannaa tere zarron kii qasam   2 ham jahaan paidaa hue  us jagah pe hii nikale dam tujh pe dil qurabaan threedots

Title: e musavvir tere haathon  kuchh aisii pyaarii shakl
Lyrics: e musavvir tere haathon kii balaaen le luun kuub tasviir banaaii mere bahalaane ko  kuchh aisii pyaarii shakl mere dilarubaa kii hai jo dekhataa hai kahataa hai qudarat kudaa kii hai kuchh aisii pyaarii threedots  is saadagii ko kyaa hai zaruurat singaar kii diivaanii khud hai is par javaanii bahaar kii duniyaa men dhuum usake hii naazoadaa kii hai jo dekhataa hai threedots  nazaron ke ek tiir se sansaar jii uthe zulfon kii chhaanv daal de biimaar jii uthe aanchal ke taar men thandak havaa kii hai jo dekhataa hai threedots  saayaa nahiin hai jisakaa yahii hai vo naazaniin aisaa zamiin par koii aayaa nahiin hasiin gaalon pe jo bhii rang hai laalii hayaa kii hai jo dekhataa hai threedots

Title: khaaii thii qasam ik raat sanam
Lyrics: khaaii thii qasam ik raat sanam  tuune bhii kisii ke hone kii hone kii ab roz vahiin se aatii hai aavaaz kisii ke rone kii rone kii khaaii thii qasam  aatii hai terii jab yaad mujhe bechain bahaaren hotii hain  2 merii hii tarah is mausam men  ghanaghor ghataaen rotii hain kahatii hai fizaa ro mil ke zaraa ye raat hai mil ke rone kii rone kii khaaii thii qasam  maangii thii duaa kuchh milane kii magar kuchh dard milaa kuchh tanhaaii  2 tuu paas hii rah kar paas nahiin rotii hai milan kii shahanaaii hasarat hii rahii is dil ke hasiin aramaanon ke puure hone kii hone kii khaaii thii qasam khaaii thii qasam

Title: ai merii jaanevafaa maine dekhaa hai ye kyaa
Lyrics: ai merii jaanevafaa maine dekhaa hai ye kyaa zulf chehare pe girii chaand badalii men chhupaa ai merii jaanevafaa threedots  chalane lagii kyon havaa laharaa ke jhuum ke aaii hai shaayad terii zulfon ko chuum ke 2 ai merii jaanevafaa threedots  ghuunghat uthaayaa teraa rangiin bahaar ne tuu vo kalii hai jo khil jaae pyaar men saahil pe dekhaa tujhe laharen javaan huiin aur chhuu ke daaman teraa jaane kahaan gaiin 2 ai merii jaanevafaa threedots  tere hii dam se to aaj kii raat hasiin mastii men duubii fizaa lo chalii duur kahiin gumasum sii baithii hai kis haal men ulajhaa diyaa hai tujhe kis kyaal ne 2 ai merii jaanevafaa threedots

Title: zindagii kaa ajab fasaanaa hai
Lyrics: la 	zindagii kaa ajab fasaanaa hai 	roterote bhii muskuraanaa hai 	zindagii kaa ajab fasaanaa hai  mu 	ishq men jaanate hain jaan gaii 2 	phir bhii kahate hain aazamaanaa hai 2  la 	kaisii mushqil hai koii kyaa jaane 2 	aag ko aag se bujhaanaa hai 	zindagii kaa ajab fasaanaa hai  mu 	dil lagaayaa thaa par na thii ye kabar 2 	maut kaa ye bhii ek bahaanaa hai la 	roterote bhii muskuraanaa hai mu 	zindagii kaa ajab fasaanaa hai la 	roterote bhii muskuraanaa hai

Title: badii mushkil se huaa teraa meraa saath piyaa
Lyricist: fayyaz hashmi tanvir naqvi masroor anwar
Lyrics: printtitile  badii mushkil se huaa teraa meraa saath piyaa badii mushkil se varanaa tere binaa berang the din raat piyaa badii mushkil se huaa teraa meraa ho teraa meraa saath piyaa badii mushkil se  aaii milane kii ghadii tarase hue nain mile2 terii kyaa baat hai tuu jab bhii mile chain mile ho mujhe chain mile rahe sang sang tere kushiyon kii baaraat piyaa badii mushkil se huaa teraa meraa ho teraa meraa saath piyaa badii mushkil se  apane charanon men sadaa rakhanaa mujhe miit mere2 devataa man ke tere vaasate hain giit mere ho piyaa giit mere bas yuun hii hotii rahe pyaar kii barasaat piyaa badii mushkil se huaa teraa meraa ho teraa meraa saath piyaa badii mushkil se  saamane tuu jo rahe gam bhii hain manzuur mujhe2 tujhako ulfat kii qasam karanaa nahiin duur mujhe naa kabhii duur mujhe mere jiivan kii kushii ab hai tere haath piyaa badii mushkil se huaa teraa meraa ho teraa meraa saath piyaa badii mushkil se varanaa tere binaa berang the din raat piyaa badii mushkil se huaa teraa meraa saath piyaa badii mushkil se

Title: samajhii thii ke ye ghar meraa hai maaluum huaa mehamaan thii main
Lyrics: samajhii thii ke ye ghar meraa hai maaluum huaa mehamaan thii main ho jinhen apanaaapanaa kahatii thii ho un sabake liye anajaan thii main  is tarah na mujhako thukaraao ik baar gale se lag jaao haay main ab bhii tumhaarii huun logon ruutho na agar naadaan thii main   meraa khoyaa huaa bachapan laa do mujhe kyaa dosh huaa samajhaa do mujhe wo honth bhii naa kyuun kahate hain jin honthon kii muskaan thii main  tum shaad raho aabaad raho ab main tum sabase duur chalii haay parades banii hain wo galiyaan jin galiyon kii pahachaan thii main

Title: aane se usake aae bahaar jaane se usake jaae bahaar
Lyrics: aane se usake aaye bahaar jaane se usake jaaye bahaar badii mastaanii hai merii mahabuubaa merii zindagaanii hai merii mahabuubaathreedots  gunagunaae aise jaise bajate hon ghungharuu kahiin pe aake parvaton se jaise girataa ho jharanaa zamiin pe jharano kii mauj hai vo maujon ki ravaanii hai merii mahabuubaa  is ghataa ko main to usakii aankhon kaa kaajal kahuungaa is havaa ko main to usakaa laharaataa aanchal kahuungaa huuron kii malikaa hai pariyon kii raanii hai merii mahabuubaa  biit jaate hain din kat jaatii hai aankhon men raaten ham naa jaane kyaa kyaa karate rahate hain aapas men baaten main thodaa diivaanaa thodii sii diivaanii hai merii mahabuubaa  ban sanvar ke nikale aae saavan kaa jab jab mahiinaa har koii ye samajhe hogii vo koii chanchal hasiinaa puuchho to kaun hai vo rut ye suhaanii hai merii mahabuubaa

Title: dekhiye saahibon vo koii aur thii
Lyrics: dekhiye saahibon vo koii aur thii aur ye naazaniin hai merii main inape marataa huun samajhaa thaa main ye hain khadii lekin vahaan koii aur thii inake liye ai mohataram chhedaa kisii aur ko thaa kudaa kii qasam dekhiye saahibon   threedots  logon kahane do isako ye hai koii diivaanaa main na jaanuun kisii ko itanaa meraa fasaanaa o ho ek dam galat fasaanaa hai inase to puraanaa hai apanaa silasilaa dekho to pyaar inako bhii hai meraa kumaar inako bhii hai inake liye ai mohataram chhedaa kisii aur ko thaa kudaa kii qasam dekhiye saahibon   threedots  main ne kab isako chaahaa kah do itanaa na phenke aashiq banane se pahale apanii suurat to dekhe o ho suurat bhalii burii kyaa hai saudaa to nazar kaa hai saudaa pyaar kaa inako kahaan gam doston rusavaa hue ham doston inake liye ai mohataram chhedaa kisii aur ko thaa kudaa kii qasam dekhiye saahibon   threedots  haay haay dekho to isako bole hii jaa rahaa hai ulajhii baaton men zaalim sabako ulajhaa rahaa hai o ho sach ban gayaa agar ulajhan phir kahiye janaabeman merii kyaa kataa mujh par yakiin ab kam sahii main saadaa dil mujarim sahii inake liye ai mohataram chhedaa kisii aur ko thaa kudaa kii kasam dekhiye saahibon   threedots

Title: mere desh kii dharatii sonaa ugale ugale hiire motii
Lyrics: mere desh kii dharatii sonaa ugale ugale hiire motii mere desh kii dharatii threedots  bailon ke gale men jab ghungharuu jiivan kaa raag sunaate hain gam kos duur ho jaataa hai khushiyon ke kanval muskaate hain sunake rahat kii aavaazen yuun lage kahiin shahanaai baje aate hii mast bahaaron ke dulhan kii tarah har khet saje mere desh threedots  jab chalate hain is dharatii pe hal mamataa angadaaiyaan letii hai kyuun naa puuje is maatii ko jo jiivan kaa sukh detii hai is dharatii pe jisane janam liyaa usane hii paayaa pyaar teraa yahaan apanaa paraayaa koi nahiin hai sab pe hai maan upakaar teraa mere desh threedots  ye baag hai gautam naanak kaa khilate hain chaman ke phuul yahaan gaandhii subhaashh taigor tilak aise hain aman ke phuul yahaan rang haraa harii sinh nalave se rang laal hai laal bahaadur se rang banaa basantii bhagat sinh rang aman kaa viir javaahar se mere desh threedots

Title: jo guzar rahii hai mujh par use kaise main bataauun
Lyrics: jo guzar rahii hai mujh par use kaise main bataauun 2 vo kushii milii hai mujhako main kushii se mar na jaauun 2  mere dil kii dhadakanon kaa ye salaam tumako pahunche main tumhaaraa hamanashiin huun ye payaam tumako pahunche use bandagii main samajhuun jo tumhaare kaam aauun vo kushii milii hai threedots  mere dil kii mahafilon men vo muqaam hai tumhaaraa ke kudaa ke baad lab par bas naam hai tumhaaraa merii aarazuu yahii hai main tumhaare giit gaauun vo kushii milii hai threedots  merii zindagii men hamadam kabhii gam na tuu uthaanaa kabhii aaen jo andhere mujhe pyaar se bulaanaa main chiraag huun vafaa kaa main andhere jagamagaauun vo kushii milii hai threedots

Title: dil kaa diyaa jalaa ke gayaa
Lyrics: dil kaa diyaa jalaa ke gayaa  ye kaun merii tanhaaii men 2  soye nagame jaag uthe honthon kii sehanaaii men  dil kaa diyaa threedots   pyaar aramaanon kaa dar khatakaae kvaab jaagii aankhon se milane ko aaye2  kitane saaye dol pade suunii sii anganaaii men  dil kaa diyaa threedots   ek hii nazar men nikhar gaii main to  aainaa jo dekhaa sanvar gaii main to2  tan pe ujaalaa phail gayaa pahalii hii angadaaii men  dil kaa diyaa threedots   kaanpate labon ko main khol rahii huun  bol vahii jaise ke bol rahii huun2  bol jo duube se hain kahiin is dil kii gaharaaii men  dil kaa diyaa threedots

Title: mile to phir jhuke nahiin nazar vahii pyaar kii
Lyrics: mile to phir jhuke nahiin nazar vahii pyaar kii naadaan dil tujhe kyaa maaluum  ulfat kii to ghabaraanaa aazaar se kyaa dil de baithe to phir jiit se kyaa haar se kyaa dil kii baazii hai jiit haar kii mile to phir jhuke nahiin threedots  man men jalatii kuchh tapatii sii pyaas lie path men baithe rahe roz naii aas lie yahii jhuuth hotaa hai intazaar kii mile to phir jhuke nahiin threedots  na sahii kaliyaan daaman ko gulazaar karen jo mile chaahat kaa khaar to ham pyaar karen rangat usamen bhii hai bahaar kii mile to phir jhuke nahiin threedots

Title: maajhii merii qismat ke jii chaahe jahaan le chal
Lyrics: aa a a a maajhii merii qismat ke jii chaahe jahaan le chal jii chaahe jahaan le chal 2 aa a a a  yah suneharii shaam aaii rang lekar pyaar kaa ab pataa mujhako chalaa hai apanii pahalii haar kaa apanii pahalii haar kaa kah sake naa saamane ham kah rahe hain duur se ho gae ham dil ke haathon ab to kuchh majabuur se maajhii merii qismat ke threedots  aa a a a  tuu hii mere dil kii manzil tuu hii meraa hamasafar zindagii se badhake mujhako terii ik miithii nazar terii ik miithii nazar terii aankhon men rahuun main tuu mere dil men rahe zindagii bhar pyaar kii yah naav aise hii bahe maajhii merii qismat ke threedots   aa a a a

Title: shamaa se koii kah de ki tere rahate andheraa ho rahaa
Lyrics: mu 	shamaa se koii kah de ki tere rahate andheraa ho rahaa 	ki tum ho vahaan to milan ko yahaan patangaa ro rahaa su 	unase kahanaa nazaron unase kahanaa sazaa ye ho rahii 	ki tum ho vahaan threedots  mu 	tadapataa pyaar ki ho diidaar magar diivaar hamen roke su 	shamaa aise jale jaise patange se  judaa ho ke  2 mu 	duhaaii detedete judaaii sahatesahate andheraa ho rahaa 	ki tum ho vahaan threedots  	bandhii zanjiir magar bepiir terii tasviir nahiin jaatii su 	sitam kii baat sahen ham ghaat milan kii raat  nahiin aatii  2 mu 	ki aahen bharatebharate tadap ke maratemarate andheraa ho rahaa 	ki tum ho vahaan threedots

Title: baalamavaa bolo naa bolo naa bolo naa
Lyrics: aa a a a baalamavaa bolo naa bolo naa bolo naa 3 main to duur khadii sharamaauun nainaa puuchh rahe kit jaauun kit jaauun saajanavaa bolo naa bolo naa bolo naa  man kii umangen dagamag dolen jhuum chalii main jhuum chalii main 2 bekal manavaa phirane aayaa terii galii men terii galii men kyaa main paas terii chalii aauun nainaa puuchh rahe kit jaauun kit jaauun saajanavaa bolo naa bolo naa bolo naa baalamavaa threedots  puuchh rahii main prem kii pagalii aas lagaake aas lagaake 2 o a a doge naa saajan hamako sahaaraa haath badhaake haath badhaake dekho chalchal ke ruk jaauun nainaa puuchh rahe kit jaauun kit jaauun saajanavaa bolo naa bolo naa bolo naa baalamavaa threedots  dhiire dhiire bole sun merii dhadakan o diivaane o diivaane  2 o a a dil ko hamaare rakh le dil men koii na jaane koii na jaane kaise aur tujhe samajhaauun nainaa puuchh rahe kit jaauun kit jaauun saajanavaa bolo na bolo naa bolo naa baalamavaa threedots

Title: laagaa chunarii men daag chhupaauun kaise
Lyrics: laagaa chunarii men daag chhupaaun kaise laagaa chunarii men daag chunarii men daag chhupaaun kaise ghar jaaun kaise laagaa chunarii men daag threedots  ho gaii mailii morii chunariyaa kore badan sii korii chunariyaa   2 aa threedots jaake baabul se nazaren milaaun kaise ghar jaaun kaise laagaa chunarii men daag threedots  bhuul gaii sab bachan bidaa ke kho gaii main sasuraal men aake aa threedots jaake baabul se nazare milaaun kaise ghar jaaun kaise laagaa chunarii men daag threedots  korii chunariyaa aatmaa morii mail hai maayaa jaal   2 vo duniyaa more babul kaa ghar ye duniyaa sasuraal haan jaake baabul se nazare milaaun kaise ghar jaaun kaise laagaa chunarii men daag threedots  aa aa dhiim ta na na na dir dir taanum taa na dere na dhiim ta na na na dir dir taan dhiim ta dere na threedots sapt suran tiin graam bansii baajii dir dir taanii taa nii nii da nii da pa ma pa ma ma ga ma dha ga ma ma ga re sa dha dha kete dha dha dha kete dha dha keta dha keta dharat paag padat nayii paran jhaanjhar jhanake jhana nana jhana nana dir dir ta tuum ta da nii ta na na na ta na na na dhiim ta na na na na dir dir taam   threedots

Title: har tukadaa mere dil kaa detaa hai duhaaii
Lyrics: har tukadaa mere dil kaa detaa hai duhaaii dil tuut gayaa aapako aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii har tukadaa mere dil kaa detaa hai duhaaii dil tuut gayaa aapako aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii  har tukadaa mere dil kaa  manzil ko tarasate hain aur saamane manzil hai kahanaa hii padaa hamako qismat badii qaatil hai 2 chhup chhupake mere haal pe rotii hai kudaaii dil tuut gayaa aapako aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii  har tukadaa mere dil kaa  kyaa dosh hamaaraa thaa ham ye naa samajh paaye duniyaa terii mahafil men ham aaye to kyon aaye 2 ab kitane janam aur jalaayegii judaaii dil tuut gayaa aapako aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii  aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii  hotaa hai zamaane men har baar milan apanaa kab niind se jaagoge kab tuutegaa ye sapanaa 2 jaage naa agar aap to jaagegii tabaahii dil tuut gayaa aapako aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii  aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii aawaaz naa aaii

Title: kitanii anjaanii suuraten lekar  jaane kahaan dekhaa hai
Lyrics: kitanii anjaanii suuraten lekar lab pe jaane se naam aate hain kisako maaluum thaa mohabbat men aise maqaam aate hain  jaane kahaan dekhaa hai kahaan dekhaa hai tumhen jaagiijaagii aankhon ke sapanon men jaane kahaan dekhaa threedots  jamanaa kinaare kabhii bhiigiibhiigii cholii men saanvare ke sang kabhii gopiyon kii tolii men kahaan kahaan puuchhaa hai kahaankahaan dhuundhaa hai jaane kahaan dekhaa threedots  raavii ke kinaare jahaan hiir kii saheliyaan puuchhatii hain roz vahii pyaar kii paheliyaan jaane kahaan dekhaa threedots  niil ke kinaare kabhii shaam ke ujaale men zulekhaa pukaaraa hai tumako kyaalon men jaane kahaan dekhaa threedots

Title: nain tumhaare mazedaar o janaabeaalii
Lyrics: mukesh	nain tumhaare mazedaar o janaabeaalii     2 aashaa	hamako tumase hai pyaar o janaabeaalii     2 mukesh	nain tumhaare mazedaar o janaabeaalii  pyaar kiyaa tumase kyaa hamane gunaah kiyaa     2 aap ke ishaaron pe khud ko tabaah kiyaa banate hain hamahii gunahagaar o janaabeaalii nain tumhaare mazedaar o janaabeaalii aashaa	hamako tumase hai pyaar o janaabeaalii  aap chaahe kuchh ho nigaahon pe chhaa gaye    2 merii zindagii men bahaar banake aa gaye ham hain tumhaare talabagaar o janaabeaalii hamako tumase hai pyaar o janaabeaalii mukesh	nain tumhaare mazedaar o janaabeaalii  raah men pade hain huzuur ke gulaam hain     2 giit mere sun lo vafaa ke payaam hain ham hain tumhaare tabedaar o janaabeaalii nain tumhaare mazedaar o janaabeaalii aashaa	hamako tumase hai pyaar o janaabeaalii

Title: le chal mere jiivan saathii  pyaar hii pyaar hai jahaan
Lyrics: le chal le chal mere jiivan saathii le chal mujhe us duniyaa men pyaar hii pyaar hai jahaan  ham tum ham tum janmon ke saathii ham tum hain jis duniyaa men pyaar hii pyaar hai vahaan le chal le chal mere threedots  jab se nazar men aap base hain mastii sii chhaaii aankhon men chhaaii rahe ye mastii bas jaae dil kii bastii mahakii rahen ye vaadiyaan le chal le chal mere threedots  priit kaa bandhan baandh ke tumane priit pe hii upakaar kiyaa hai ab ye bandhan na tuute yug yug ye saath na chhuute chalataa rahe yuun kaaravaan le chal le chal mere threedots

Title: mujhe apanaa yaar banaa lo phir dekho mazaa pyaar kaa
Lyrics: mujhe apanaa yaar banaa lo phir dekho mazaa pyaar kaa are aazamaan ke dekho dil kaisaa hai diladaar kaa mujhe apanaa yaar threedots  jin raaston se nikaluun ek dhuum sii machaa duun jin mahafilon men jaauun vo mahafilen sajaa duun main raahii huun alabelaa aur pyaasaa huun diidaar kaa mujhe apanaa yaar threedots  main kyaa karuun ke zaalim suurat hii aisii paaii dil meraa aaiinaa hai dil men nahiin buraaii mere dil ko dil men le lo hai hiiraa aitabaar kaa mujhe apanaa yaar threedots  duniyaa kii vaadii men bin yaar kaisaa jiinaa dariyaa bhii suunaasuunaa jab tak naa ho safiinaa are sun lo duniyaa vaalon ye nagamaa dil ke taar kaa mujhe apanaa yaar threedots

Title: laagii manavaa ke biich kataarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaarii
Lyrics: laagii manavaa ke biich kataarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaarii haay kaisii zulmii banaayii taine naarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaarii   aisaa ghungharuu paayaliyaa kaa chhanakaa morii maalaa men atak gayaa manakaa main to bhuula prabhuu main to bhuula prabhuu sudhbudh saarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaarii   threedots   koii chanchal koii matavaalii hai koii natakhat koii bholiibhaalii hai kabhii dekhii na thii haay kabhii dekhii na thii aisii phulavaarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaarii   threedots   badii jatanon saadh banaayii thii merii barason kii puny kamaayii thii taine pal men haay taine pal men bhasam kar daarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaarii   threedots   mohe baavalaa banaa gayii va kii batiyaan mose katatii nahiin hain ab ratiyaan padii sar pe haay padii sar pe bipat atii bhaarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaari   mohe un bin kachhuu na suhaaye re more akhiyon ke aage laharaaye re gore mukhade pe haay gore mukhade pe lat kaariikaarii ki maaraa gayaa brahmachaarii   threedots

Title: chaahe kare duniyaa laakh jafaa
Lyrics: chaahe kare duniyaa laakh jafaa zindaa rahegaa naamewafaa chaahe kare duniyaa laakh jafaa  kaun kar sakaa judaa zindagii se pyaar ko 2 kis kaa hausalaa hai jo luut le bahaar ko aaii kizaan phir bhii rahaa gulashan haraa zindaa rahegaa naamewafaa chaahe kare duniyaa laakh jafaa  saaz tod doge tum taar tharatharaaenge 2 aag banake raag ye tum ko bhii jaalaaenge ai zaalimo rokoge kyaa dil kii sadaa zindaa rahegaa naamewafaa chaahe kare duniyaa laakh jafaa

Title: dar pe aae hain qasam le dil hathelii par hai
Lyrics: dar pe aae hain qasam le dil hathelii par hai sun le ham na jaaenge  zindagii men to kisii se pyaar karanaa thaa zaruur 2 mar gae ham aap par vaise bhii maranaa thaa zaruur haan jii maranaa thaa zaruur jaan lab par hai kasam le saans jab tak hai sun le ham na jaaenge dar pe aae hain threedots  yuun na thokar maarie ki tuut jaaegaa ye dil 2 aap pachhataaenge phir na haath aaegaa ye dil 2 le isii dil kii qasam le kaaq ho kar tuu bhii sun le ham na jaaenge dar pe aae hain threedots  mayaqadaa bhii raah men thaa tod aae hain use 2 jaam apane haath men thaa chhod aae hain use 2 tere pyaase hain qasam le duur se aae hain sun le ham na jaaenge dar pe aae hain threedots

Title: paradesiyon se na ankhiyaan milaanaa
Lyrics: paradesiyon se na ankhiyaan milaanaa paradesiyon ko hai ek din jaanaa paradesiyon se na   aatii hai jab ye rut mastaanii banatii hai koii na koii kahaanii abake baras dekhe bane kyaa fasaanaa  sach hii kahaa hai panchhii inako raat ko thahare to ud jaaen din ko aaj yahaan kal vahaan hai thikaanaa paradesiyon se na   baagon men jabjab phuul khilenge tabtab ye harajaaii milenge guzaregaa kaise patajhad kaa zamaanaa paradesiyon se na     hamane yahii ek baar kiyaa thaa ek paradesii se pyaar kiyaa thaa aise jalaa ye dil jaise paravaanaa paradesiyon se na   ye baabul kaa des chhudaaen des se ye parades bulaaen haay sunen naa ye koii bahaanaa paradesiyon se na      pyaar se apane ye nahiin hote ye patthar hain ye nahiin rote inake liye naa aansuu bahaanaa haay paradesiyon se na   naa ye baadal naa ye taare ye kaagaz ke phuul hain saare in phuulon ke na baag lagaanaa paradesiyon se na   hamane yahii ek baar kiyaa thaa ek paradesii se pyaar kiyaa thaa roroke kahataa hai dil ye diivaanaa paradesiyon se na

Title: mere dil pe andheraa saa chhaane lagaa
Lyrics: mere dil pe andheraa saa chhaane lagaa aap chehare se chilaman hataa liijie 2 mere aage zamaanaa ye jhuk jaaegaa aap apanii nigaahen jhukaa liijie mere dil pe andheraa threedots  jaan le lo bhale par lagaa lo gale ye duurii na hamase sahii jaaegii 2 hamape jannat ke daravaaze khul jaaenge aap pahaluu men apane bithaa liijie mere aage zamaanaa ye threedots  aapake dil kaa gam dil men rakh lenge ham aur daavaa karenge na ehasaan kaa 2 aapakaa pyaar paane ke qaabil hain ham aap chaahen agar aazamaa liijie mere aage zamaanaa ye threedots  ek rangehayaa ek rangevafaa rang do aapakii donon aankhon men hain 2 kaise hote hain donon jahaan dekh luun aap pal bhar ko palaken uthaa liijie mere aage zamaanaa ye threedots

Title: aaj hai pyaar kaa faisalaa ai sanam
Lyrics: aaj hai pyaar kaa faisalaa ai sanam aaj meraa muqaddar badal jaaegaa tuu agar sangadil hai to paravaah nahiin mere nagamon se patthar pighal jaaegaa  dekh main huun badii chot khaae hue tere qadamon men huun sar jhukaae hue aa gale se lagaa le mujhe varanaa phir baat rah jaaegii vaqt tal jaaegaa aaj hai pyaar kaa threedots  dil ko mere teraa dil nahiin chaahie aur sivaa isake kuchh nahiin chaahie tuune kar dii agar ik nigaaheqaram meraa tuutaa huaa dil sambhal jaaegaa aaj hai pyaar kaa threedots

Title: denewaale kisii ko garibii na de
Lyrics: denewaale kisii ko gariibii na de maut de de magar badanasiibii na de denewaale threedots  hue paidaa gariib hai ye kisakii kataa ham ko duniyaa men kyuun tuune laayaa bataa kyuun hai chup kuchh bataa kuchh bataa denewaale threedots  chhiin lii har kushii aur kahaa ki na ro gam hazaaron diye dil bhii dene ke saath karake sausau sitam kush na ho denewaale threedots  chhod kar ye jahaan bol jaaen kahaan koii gamakwaar hai na koii maharabaan kud kahen kud sunen daastaan daastaan denewaale threedots

Title: piparaa ke patavaa sariikhe dole manavaa
Lyrics: piparaa ke patavaa sariikhaa dole manavaa ki jiyaraa maan uthat hilor are puravaa ke jhonkavaa se aayo re sandesavaa ki chal aaj desavaa kii or piparaa ke patavaa threedots  jhuki jhuki bole kaare kaare ye badaravaa kabase pukaare tohe nayanon kaa kajaravaa umad ghumad jab garaje badariyaa re thumak thumak naache mor puravaa ke jhonkavaa se threedots  simit simit bole lambii ye dagariyaa jaldii jaldii chal raahii apanii nagariyaa rahiyaa takat birahaniyaa dulhaniyaa re baandh ke laganavaa kii dor puravaa ke jhonkavaa se threedots

Title: taqadiir kaa fasaanaa jaakar kise sunaaen
Lyrics: taqadiir kaa fasaanaa jaakar kise sunaaen is dil men jal rahii hain aramaan kii chitaaen  saanson men aaj mere tuufaan uth rahe hain shahanaaiyon se kah do kahiin aur jaake gaaen  matavaale chaandsuuraj teraa uthaaen dolaa tujhako khushii kii pariyaan ghar tere leke jaaen  tum to raho salaamat seharaa tumhen mubaarak meraa har ek aansuu dene lagaa duaaen     ujad gayaa hai muhabbat men zindagii kaa chaman sitaare hain merii duniyaa ke aansuon kaa qafan  taqadiir kaa fasaanaa jaakar kise sunaaen is dil men jal rahii hain aramaan kii chitaaen  dekhe the jo bhii sapane vo ban gae hain aansuu jaatii huii havaaon le jaao merii aahen  apanaa to gam nahiin hai gam hai to itanaa gam hai vo bewafaa na samajhen hamase badal na jaaen  is bebasii pe merii roegaa aasamaan bhii duubegii saarii dharatii dekhengii ye fizaaen

Title: banaa ke meraa muqaddar  kyaa yuun hii ruuth ke
Lyrics: banaa ke meraa muqaddar bigaadane vaale javaab de o meraa ghar ujaadane vaale  kyaa yuun hii ruuth ke jaane ko mohabbat kii thii 2 zindagii merii mitaane ko mohabbat kii thii kyaa yuun hii threedots  aankh men aansuu lab pe kahaanii terii mujhako tadapaatii hai dinraat nishaanii terii kyaa mujhe tuune rulaane ko mohabbat kii thii kyaa yuun hii threedots  o mujhe bhuulane vaale tuu kahaan hai aajaa kyaa huii mujhase kataa ye to zaraa batalaa jaa yaa ye kah de ke dikhaane ko mohabbat kii thii kyaa yuun hii threedots

Title: pate kii baat kahegaa kahegaa jab bhii diivaanaa
Lyrics: pate kii baat kahegaa kahegaa jab bhii diivaanaa merii suurat pe naa jaanaa pate kii baat kahegaa threedots  vahaan kuchh der hai pyaare nahiin andher hai pyaare jo tujhako na dikhaaii de nazar kaa pher hai pyaare tuu bahakaave men na aanaa hai usakaa sab jag jaanaa merii suurat pe naa threedots  chaar ke aath tuu kar le aath se saath tuu kar le rahegaa phir bhii ye khaalii pet ko laakh tuu bhar le siikh le man ko manaanaa sabar se kaam chalaanaa merii suurat pe naa threedots  jo na talavaar se hogaa vo pal men pyaar se hogaa na kar paaenge jo laakhon vo ek diladaar se hogaa sabhii se pyaar nibhaanaa hai apanaa chalan puraanaa merii suurat pe naa threedots

Title: mujhe gale se lagaa lo bahut udaas huun main
Lyrics: aa mujhe gale se lagaa lo bahut udaas huun main          nazar men tiir se chubhate hain ab nazaaron se     main thak gaii huun sabhii tuutate sahaaron se     ab aur bojh na daalo  ra bahut sahii gameduniyaa magar udaas na ho     kariib hai shabegam kii sahar udaas na ho     bahut sahii      sitam ke haath kii talavaar tuut jaaegii     ye uunchniich kii ciivaar tuut jaaegii     tujhe kasam hai merii hamasafar udaas na ho  aa na jaane kab ye tariikaa ye taur badalegaa     sitam kaa gam kab musiibat kaa daur badalegaa     mujhe jahaan se uthaa lo bahut udaas huun main

Title: mujh ko is raat kii tanahaaii men aavaaz na do

Lyrics: mujh ko is raat kii tanahaaii men aavaaz na do jisakii aavaaz rulaa de mujhe vo saaz na do aavaaz na dothreedots  mainne ab tum se na milane kii kasam khaaii hai kyaa khabar tumako merii jaan pe ban aaii hai main bahak jaauun kasam khaake tum aisaa na karo aavaaz na dothreedots  dil meraa duub gayaa aas merii tuut gaii mere haathon hii se patavaar merii chhuut gaii ab main tuufaan men huun saahil se ishaaraa na karo aavaaz na dothreedots  raushanii ho na sakii laakh jalaayaa hamane tujhako bhuulaa hii nahiin laakh bhulaayaa hamane main pareshaan huun mujhe aur pareshaan na karo aavaaz na dothreedots  kis kadar roz kiyaa mujhase kinaaraa tumane koii bhatakegaa akelaa ye na sochaa tumane chhup gae ho to kabhii yaad hii aayaa na karo aavaaz na dothreedots

Lyrics: uthiiuthii ye nigaahen  haay haay rasiyaa tuu badaa bedardii 2 jiyaraa moraa jaane qasak tore man kii 2 ho rasiyaa tuu badaa bedardii haay haay rasiyaa tuu badaa bedardii 2  batiyaan jhuuthii torii  nainaa chhal se bhare  2 kohuu naa priit kare tore sang raam kare tore sang haa haa haa haa raam kare lobhii torii nazaren ho lobhii torii nazaren lobhii torii nazaren ho torii nazaren hain khotii torii marajii ho rasiyaa tuu badaa threedots  jiyaa ke bain piyaa kachhahuu jaane nahiin 2 kachhahuu jaane nahiin zulmii moraa kahaa haay zulmii moraa kahaa ekahuu maane nahiin kare manamaanii ho kare manamaanii dikhaae kudagarjii ho rasiyaa tuu badaa threedots  kaahe kaa maan kare kaahe ko dhaae julam  priit kii haay pade  2 to pe o bairii balam jaa re nahiin maanuungii  jaa re nahiin maanuun  2 ho jaa re nahiin maanuungii saiyyaan torii marajii ho rasiyaa tuu badaa threedots

Title: do ankhiyaan jhukiijhukii sii
Lyrics: mu 	do ankhiyaan jhukiijhukii sii 2 	kaliyon se naazuk honthon par kavitaa rukiirukii sii 	do ankhiyaan jhukii threedots  	sharamaatii palakon men sapane jab aankhmichaulii khelen 	laharaatii zulfen mukhade ko saae men jab le len 	ik kushbuu udiiudii sii 	do ankhiyaan jhukii threedots  la 	mere dil kii kaamoshii men halachal kaun machaae 	ik dhundhalii sii tasviir bane aur banakar mit jaae 	ik hasarat dabiidabii sii mu 	do ankhiyaan jhukii threedots  	ek pal laage apaniiapanii aur duuje pal begaanii 	kuchh anjaanii sii suurat hai kuchh jaanii pahachaanii 	paas aakar chhupiichhupii sii 	do ankhiyaan jhukii threedots

Title: ham ne apanaa sab kuchh khoyaa pyaar teraa paane ko
Lyrics: ham ne apanaa sab kuchh khoyaa pyaar teraa paane ko chhod diyaa kyon pyaar ne tere dardar bhatakaane ko pyaar teraa paane ko ham ne apanaa threedots  vo aansuu jo bah nahiin paae vo baaten jo kah nahiin paae dil men chhupaae firate hain ab ghut kar mar jaane ko pyaar teraa paane ko ham ne apanaa threedots  usakii rahe tuu jisakii ho lii tujhako mubaaraq pyaar kii dolii baith gae ham gam kii chitaa par zindaa jal jaane ko pyaar teraa paane ko ham ne apanaa threedots

Title: main suuraj huun tuu merii kiran sang teraa rahe
Lyrics: ra 	o main suuraj huun tuu merii kiran sang teraa rahe aa 	ho main aag men terii jal jaauun dil meraa kahe ra 	o main suuraj huun threedots aa 	ho o main aag men terii threedots  ra 	chaand kaa tukadaa meraa hamasafar 	tuu chale to giren taare bhii raah par aa 	aa haa haa mujhape huii jab terii ye nazar 	main kahaan huun nahiin apanii bhii kabar do 	ab yaad jahaan kii bhulaane dekho jii dekho ham chale ra 	o main suuraj huun threedots aa 	ho main aag men terii threedots  aa 	duulhaa hai tuu meraa aur main dulhan terii ra 	tuu milii to mujhe mil gaii har kushii 	ek nashaa hai teraa pyaar bhii 	tuu nahiin to kaise kate zindagii do 	ab saath sadaa kaa nibhaane dekho jii dekho ham chale ra 	o main suuraj huun threedots aa 	ho main aag men terii threedots  ra 	rut hai javaan aur tum bhii ho hasiin aa 	o le chalo ki mujhe tum par hai yaqiin ra 	aa haa haa pahaluu men tum ho to jannat hai yahiin aa 	ho ye samaan to jannat men bhii nahiin do 	ab pyaar kii duniyaa basaane dekho jii dekho ham chale ra 	o main suuraj huun threedots aa 	ho main aag men terii threedots

Title: ye samaa ye rut ye nazaare dil meraa machalane lagaa
Lyrics: ra ye samaa ye rut ye nazaare dil meraa machalane lagaa     jaane vafaa ai dilarubaa aise men aa merii baahon men aa la rok le nigaahon ke ishaare tan meraa pighalane lagaa     main huun terii tuu hai meraa aa mere dil kii panaahon men aa  shaane  pe mere giraa de zulfen aankhon pe mere bichhaa de zulfen aisaa jagaa de pyaar kaa jaaduu saare jahaan pe chhaae nashaa

Title: kaii din se jii hai bekal
Lyrics: kaii din se jii hai bekal ai dil kii lagan ab le chal mujhe bhii vahaan mere piyaa hai jahaan  bichhadii nazar nazar se to bechain ho gaii aise lagaa ke jaise koii chiiz kho gaii ab unake binaa huun aise jaise nainaa bin kaajal kaii din se threedots  aatii hain unake pyaar kii maujen machalmachal kab tak kahuungii dil se main apane sambhalsambhal jaa des piyaa ke ud jaa tuu man ke panchhii ghaayal kaii din se threedots  aaii jo unakii yaad to saansen mahak gaiin aankhon men bijaliyaan sii hazaaron chamak gaiin jis or uthiin ye nazaren laharaae pyaar ke baadal kaii din se threedots

Title: tumako piyaa dil diyaa kitane naaz se
Lyrics: tumako piyaa dil diyaa kitane naaz se nainaa lad gae bholebhaale kaise dagaabaaz se ho tumako piyaa dil diyaa threedots  haay re duhaaii terii zulmii piyaa dhadake anaadii jiyaa ye kyaa huaa uii main mar gaii laaj ke maare dekhaa kis andaaz se ho tumako piyaa dil diyaa threedots  laagii najariyaa torii jaaduu bharii maangii bahaaren hamane bijalii girii dil ke soe aramaan jaage terii hii aavaaz se ho tumako piyaa dil diyaa threedots

Title: yahaan koii nahiin teraa mere sivaa
Lyrics: yahaan koii nahiin teraa mere sivaa kahatii hai jhuumatii gaatii havaa tum sab ko chhod kar aa jaao aa jaao aa jaao  baadal bhii ban ke paanii ik din to barasataa hai lohaa bhii jal ke aag men ik din to pighalataa hai jis dil men ho muhabbat ik din to tarasataa hai yahaan koii nahiin   threedots  terii man kii ulajhanen sulajhaanaa chaahataa huun tujhe aaj se apanii main banaanaa chaahataa huun man ke sunahare mandir men bithaanaa chaahataa huun yahaan koii nahiin   threedots

Title: chandaa ko dhuundhane sabhii taare nikal pade
Lyrics: rafii bachchonthreedots  ek samay kii baat suno andhiyaarii thii raat suno diipak chorii ho gayaa chaand kahiin par kho gayaa bachchaa phir kyaa huaa rafii chandaa ko dhuundhane sabhii taare nikal pade 	2 galiyon men vo nasiib ke maare nikal pade chandaa ko threedots aashaa chandaa ko dhuundhane sabhii taare nikal pade        2 galiyon men vo nasiib ke maare nikal pade chandaa ko threedots  unakii nazar kaa jis ne nazaaraa churaa liyaa unake dilon kaa jis ne sahaaraa churaa liyaa us chor kii talaash men saare nikal pade chandaa ko threedots  gam kii andherii raat men jalanaa padaa unhen phuulon ke badale kaanton pe chalanaa padaa unhen dharatii pe jab gagan ke dulaare nikal pade chandaa ko threedots  unakii pukaar sun ke yah dil dagamagaa gayaa ham ko bhii koii bichhadaa huaa yaad aa gayaa bhar aaii aankh hamaare nikal pade chandaa ko threedots

Title: daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao
Lyrics: daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao 2 chhodo jii ye gussaa zaraa hans ke dikhaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao 2 chhodo jii ye gussaa zaraa hans ke dikhaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao  chhotiichhotii baaton pe na bigadaa karo 2 gussaa ho to thandaa paanii pii liyaa karo khaaliipiilii apanaa kalejaa na jalaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao 2 chhodo jii ye gussaa zaraa hans ke dikhaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao  daadii tumhen ham to manaa ke rahenge 2 khaanaa apane haathon se khilaa ke rahenge chaahe hamen maaro chaahe hamen dhamakaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao 2 chhodo jii ye gussaa zaraa hans ke dikhaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao  kaho to tumhaarii ham champii kar den 2 piyo to tumhaare liye hukkaa bhar den hansii na chhupaao zaraa aankhen to milaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao 2 chhodo jii ye gussaa zaraa hans ke dikhaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao  hamase jo bhuul huii maaf karo maan 2 gale lag jaao dil saaf karo maan achchhii sii kahaanii koii hamako sunaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao 2 chhodo jii ye gussaa zaraa hans ke dikhaao daadiiammaa daadiiammaa maan jaao 2

Title: dhalatii jaae raat kah le dil kii baat
Lyrics: ra 	dhalatii jaae raat kah le dil kii baat 	shamaaparavaane kaa na hogaa phir saath 	dhalatii jaae raat threedots  aa 	mast nazaare chaand sitaare raat ke mehamaan hain ye saare 	uth jaaegii shab kii mahafil nuuresahar ke sunake nakkaare ra 	ho na ho dubaaraa mulaaqaat 	dhalatii jaae raat threedots  	niind ke bas men khoiikhoii kul duniyaa hai soiisoii 	aise men bhii jaag rahaa hai hamtum jaisaa koiikoii aa 	kyaa hasiin hai taaron kii baaraat ra 	dhalatii jaae raat threedots  aa 	jo bhii nigaahen chaar hai karataa usape zamaanaa vaar hai karataa ra 	huun raahevafaa kaa ban ke raahii phir bhii tumhen dil pyaar hai karataa aa 	baithaa naa ho le ke koii ghaat ra 	huun dhalatii jaae raat threedots

Title: tum to dil ke taar chhedakar
Film: roop ki rani choron ka raja
Lyrics: tum to dil ke taar chhedakar  ho gayethreedots bekhabarthreedots  chand ke tale jalenge ham  ai sanamthreedots raat bhar  tum to dil ke taar chhedakarthreedots   tum ko nind aegi tum to so hi jaaoge  kis ka le liya hai dil ye bhi bhul jaaoge  ye to kah ek baar khvab men to aaoge  khvab men to aaogethreedots  tum to dil ke taar chhedakar threedots  apani ek aur raat ulajhanon men jayegi  shokh shokh vo ada ham ko yaad aegi  mast mast har nazar dadr banake chhayegi  dadr banake chhayegithreedots  tum to dil ke taar chhedakar threedots  ab to sabr kaa bhii haath ham se chhuutane lagaa ab to baat baat par dil bhii ruuthane lagaa kyaa gazab har koii ham ko luutane lagaa ham ko luutane lagaa threedots  tum to dil ke taar chhedakar  ho gayethreedots bekhabarthreedots tum to dil ke taar chhedakarthreedots

Title: badaliibadalii duniyaa hai merii
Lyrics: ma	paradesii ghar aae ki rahrah kare vichaar 	pahale kisakaa naam luun kisakii karuun pukaar 	 ma	badaliibadalii duniyaa hai merii 	jaaduu hai ye kyaa tere nainan kaa    2 la	banake kajaraa ankhiyon men rahaa 	ek sundar sapanaa bachapan kaa    2  la	kahatii thii sadaa dil kii dhadakan  2 	tuu baith bichhaake apane nayan 	sachchii hai agar ye terii lagan 	laut aaegaa saathii jiivan kaa do	badaliibadalii duniyaa   ma	mere giiton ke chanchal svar  2 	aae honge baadal banakar 	barase honge is aangan par 	deke sandes mere man kaa do	badaliibadalii duniyaa   la	is raat ko chaand tale ye milan do	is raat ko chaand tale ye milan la	chup dekh rahaa hai niil gagan do	dauharaayegaa ye madmast pavan 	sangiit hamaarii dhadakan kaa 	badaliibadalii duniyaa

Title: chunarii sambhaal gorii udii chalii jaae re
Lyrics: ma chunarii sambhaal gorii udii chalii jaae re     maar na de dank kahiin nazar koii haay     dekh dekh pag na phisal jaae re     saaraa raaraa raaraa raah ha aah   la phisalen nahiin chal ke kabhii dukh kii dagar pe     thokar lage hans den ham basane vaale dil ke nagar ke ma are har kadam bahak ke sambhal jaae re stop     saaraa raaraa raaraa raah ha aah  ma kiranen nahiin apanii to hai baahon kaa sahaaraa     diipak nahiin jin men un galiyon men hai hamase ujaale     are bhuul hii se chaandanii khil jaae re stop     saaraa raaraa raaraa raah ha aah  la pal chhin piyaa pal chhin ankhiyon kaa andheraa     rainaa nahiin apanii par apanaa hogaa kal kaa saveraa ma are rain kaun sii jo na dhal jaae re stop     saaraa raaraa raaraa raah ha aah

Title: sab javaan sab hasiin koii tumasaa nahiin
Lyrics: sab javaan sab hasiin koii tumasaa nahiin 2 ho gae jisake ham vo tumhiin ho tumhiin sab javaan sab hasiin threedots  dekhaa jo tumhen mahasuus huaa pahachaan hai apanii muddat se kvaabon men basii thii jo suurat milatii hai tumhaarii muurat se 2 sab javaan sab hasiin threedots  rastaa bhii mile manzil bhii mile jab saath chale diivaane do yaa haath pakad lo badhake tumhiin yaa mujhako qariib aa jaane do ye sitam kab talaq tum kahiin ham kahiin sab javaan sab hasiin threedots  kuchh jaan ke bhii dhokhaa khaayaa kuchh dekhe unake ishaare bhii lo aas kii badalii men chamake ummiid ke chaand sitaare bhii ho gaii aaj puurii dil kii kamiin sab javaan sab hasiin threedots

Title: itanaa na mujhase tuu pyaar badhaa ke main ek baadal aavaaraa
Lyrics: ta itanaa na mujhase tuu pyaar badhaa ke main ek baadal aavaaraa kaise kisii kaa sahaaraa banuun ke main khud beghar bechaaraa itanaa nathreedots  ta  mujhe ek jagah aaraam nahiin ruk jaanaa meraa kaam nahiin meraa saath kahaan tak dogii tum  mai desh videsh kaa banjaaraa  la  is liye tujhase pyaar karuun ke tu ek baadal avaaraa janam janam se huun saath tere  ke naam meraa jal kii dhaaraa  la o niil gagan ke diivaane tuu pyaar na meraa pahachaane main tab tak saath chaluun tere jab tak na kahe tuu main haaraa  ta kyuun pyaar men tuu naadaan bane ik baadal kaa aramaan bane meraa saath kahaan tak dogii tum main desbides kaa banjaaraa itanaa nathreedots  ta madahosh hameshaa rahataa huun khaamosh huun kab kuchh kahataa huun koii kyaa jaane mere siine men hai bijalii kaa bhii angaaraa  ta aramaan thaa gulashan par barasuun ek shokh ke daaman par barasuun afasos jalii mittii pe mujhe taqadiir ne merii de maaraa itanaa nathreedots

Title: baat itanii sii hai kah do koii diivaanon se
Lyrics: baat itanii sii hai kah do koii diivaanon se aadamii vo hai jo khelaa kare tuufaanon se baat itanii sii hai threedots  naii manzil naii raahon pe chale hain ham to ye maaluum hai kaanton pe chale hain ham to  gam bhii dar jaataa hai  2 ham jaise mastaanon se aadamii vo hai threedots  apanii taqadiir pe ronaa badii naadaanii hai jaan sii chiiz ko khonaa badii naadaanii hai  kuchh to dhiiraj rakho  2 kah do koii naadaanon se aadamii vo hai threedots  zindagii vo hai chaman ke phuul bhii khil jaate hain dil ke tukade jo bichhadate hain vo mil jaate hain jaise shiishe kabhii mil jaate hain paimaanon se aadamii vo hai threedots

Title: yahaan raat kisii kii rote kate yaa chain se sote
Lyrics: yahaan raat kisii kii rote kate yaa chain se sotesote kate taqadiir men kaisii raat merii na sote kate na rote kate yahaan raat kisii kii threedots  ulfat men hai mitanaa riit merii pinjare men tadapatii priit merii panaghat pe pahunchakar pyaasaa huun kyaa haar merii kyaa jiit merii taqadiir men kaisii threedots  dil bharaabharaa pyaase hain nayan hai paas magar mushkil hai milan panchhii hai akelaa suunaa hai chaman aankhon men namiin hai dil men jalan taqadiir men kaisii threedots

Title: nigaahen milaa kar badal jaane vaale
Lyrics: nigaahen milaa kar badal jaane vaale mujhe tujh se koii shikaayat nahii hai ye duniyaa badii sangadil hai yahaan par kisii ko kisii se muhabbat nahii hai  jafaaon se tuune mere dil ko todaa mujhe tuune zaalim kahiin kaa na chhodaa huaa mujh ko maaluum sab kuchh lutaa kar vafaa kii yahaan koii kiimat nahii hai  na pahale se din hai na pahalii sii raaten bhulaa dii vo tuune muhabbat kii baaten sunaaye the tuune jo jhuuthe fasaane jaraa sii bhii un men hakiiqat nahii hai  karuun main jo fariiyaad apanii zubaan se giiren tuut kar bijaliiyaan aasamaan se main ashqon men saare jahaan ko bahaa duun magar mujh ko rone kii aadat nahii hai

Title: na baaz aayaa muqaddar mujhe mitaane se
Lyrics: havaa kaamosh hai aur chup hain sitaare sisak kar so gaye hain aramaan hamaare  na baaz aayaa muqaddar mujhe mitaane se2 bharii bahaar men huun duur aashiyaane se2 na baaz aayaa muqaddar mujhe mitaane se  qusuur unakaa na merii kataa na duniyaa kii na duniyaa kii mit gaii kud hii men mitane ke ik bahaane se2 na baaz aayaa muqaddar mujhe mitaane se2  bujhii naa pyaas merii2 pii ke dekh lii har shai2 pyaasii hii laut chalii main bhare maikaane se2 na baaz aayaa muqaddar mujhe mitaane se bharii bahaar men huun duur aashiyaane se na baaz aayaa muqaddar mujhe mitaane se

Title: bataa de koii mohe shyaam kii dagariyaa
Lyrics: bataa de koii mohe shyaam kii dagariyaa 2 shyaam kii dagariyaa more raam kii dagariyaa  bataa de koii mohe shyaam kii dagariyaa  kahaan main dhoondhoon siitaa raman ko  kaise main paaoon shyaam sundar ko  bataa de koii shyaam se milane kii jataniyaa bataa de koii mohe shyaam kii dagariyaa 2    shyaam sundar kii mohanii muurat raamkrishhna kii saawalii suurat 2  dikhaa de koii donon kii mohanii muuratiyaan bataa de koii mohe shyaam kii dagariyaa 2          nis din tarasat nain hamaare kaise milenge mohe raam piyaa re 2  dikhaa de koii lalitha ko shyaam ki nagariyaa bataa de koii mohe shyaam kii dagariyaa 2          shyaam kii dagariyaa more raam kii dagariyaa bataa de koii mohe shyaam kii dagariyaa

Title: kal raat zindagii se mulaaqaat ho gaii
Lyrics: kal raat zindagii se mulaaqaat ho gaii lab tharatharaa rahe the magar baat ho gaii kal raat zindagii threedots  ek husn saamane thaa qayaamat ke ruup men ek kvaab jalvaagar thaa haqiiqat ke ruup men cheharaa vahii gulaab kii rangat lie hue nazaren vahii payaamemuhabbat lie hue zulfen vahii ki jaise dhundhalakaa ho shaam kaa aankhen vahii jin aankhon pe dhokhaa ho jaam kaa kuchh der ko tasalliiejazbaat ho gaii lab tharatharaa rahe threedots  dekhaa use to daamaneruksaar nam bhii thaa vallaah usake dil ko kuchh ehasaasegam bhii thaa the usakii hasaraton ke kazaane lute hue lab par tadap rahe the fasaane ghute hue kaante chubhe hue the sisakatii umang men duubii huii thii phir bhii vo vafaao ke rang men dam bhar ko katm gardishehaalaat ho gaii lab tharatharaa rahe threedots  e merii ruuheishq merii jaaneshaayarii dil maanataa nahiin ki tuu mujhase bichhad gaii maayuusiyaan hain phir bhii mere dil ko aas hai mahasuus ho rahaa hai ke tuu mere paas hai samajhaauun kis tarah se dilebeqaraar ko vaapas kahaan se laauun main guzarii bahaar ko majabuur dil ke saath badii ghaat ho gaii lab tharatharaa rahe threedots

Title: jiyo to aise jiyo jaise sab tumhaaraa hai
Lyrics: jiyo to aise jiyo jaise sab tumhaaraa hai maro to aise ki jaise tumhaaraa kuchh bhii nahiin  ye ek raaz hai ki duniyaa na jisako jaan sakii yahii vo raaz jo zindagii se haasil hai tumhiin kaho ye raaz tumhen kaise samajhaauun ke zindagii kii ghutan zindagii kii qaatil hai har ek nigaah ko ye qudarat kaa ishaaraa hai jiyo to aise jiyo threedots  jahaan men aa ke jahaan se khinchekhinche na raho vo zindagii hii nahiin jisamen aas bujh jaae koii bhii pyaas dabaae se dab nahiin sakatii isii se chain milegaa ki pyaas bujh jaae ye kahake mudataa huaa zindagii kaa dhaaraa hai jiyo to aise jiyo threedots  ye aasamaan ye zamiin ye fizaa ye nazaare taras rahe hain tumhaarii ik nazar ke lie nazar churaa ke har ek shai ko yuun na thukaraao koii shariiqesafar dhuundh lo safar ke lie bahut qariib se maine tumhen pukaaraa hai jiyo to aise jiyo threedots

Title: chhup gaye saare nazaare oye kyaa baat ho gaii

Title: sun ai maahazabiin mujhe tujhase ishq nahiin
Lyrics: sun ai maahazabiin mujhe tujhase ishq nahiin tujhase ishq nahiin nahiin nahiin  e vallaah yuun main teraa qaayal huun naazoadaa pe maayal huun jalavon kaa dam bharataa huun chhupchhup ke dekhaa karataa huun par ai pardaanashiin mujhe tujhase ishq threedots  tujhase nazar jab ladatii hai chot sii dil par padatii hai paanv bahakane lagate hain saans dahakane lagatii hai par hai mujhako yaqiin mujhe tujhase ishq threedots  gair se jab tuu hans ke mile jaag uthate hain dil men gile ulajhan men pad jaataa huun soch ke kuchh ghabaraataa huun par e shok hasiin mujhe tujhase ishq threedots  tuu vah dilakash hastii hai jo kvaabon men basatii hai tuu kah de to jaan de duun jaan to kyaa iimaan de duun pa ai haasilediin mujhe tujhase ishq threedots

Title: agar mujh se muhabbat hai
Lyrics: agar mujh se mohobbat hai mujhe sab apane gam de do x2 in aankhon kaa har ik aansuu mujhe merii qasam de do agar mujh se mohobbat hai  tumhaare gam ko apanaa gam banaa luun to qaraar aae x2 tumhaaraa dard siine men chhupaa luun to qaraar aae vo har shay jo tumhen dukh de mujhe mere sanam de do agar mujh se mohobbat hai  shariikezindagii ko kyuun shariikegam nahiin karate dukhon ko baant kar kyuun in dukhon ko kam nahiin karate tadap is dil kii thodii sii mujhe mere sanam de do agar mujh se mohobbat hai  in aankhon men na ab mujhako kabhii aansuu nazar aaen x2 sadaa hansatii rahen aankhen sadaa ye honth muskaae mujhe apanii kabhii aahen kabhii dardoalam de do agar mujh se mohobbat hai mujhe sab apane gam de do in aankhon kaa har ik aansuu mujhe merii qasam de do agar mujh se mohobbat hai

Title: jab jab bahaar aaii aur phuul muskuraaye mujhe tum yaad aaye

Lyrics: jab jab bahaar aaii  aur phool muskuraaye mujhe tum yaad aaye 2 jab jab bhii chaand nikalaa aur taare jagamagaaye  mujhe tum yaad aaye 2  ik pyaar aur wafaa kii tasaviir maanataa huun 2 tasaviir kyaa tumhen main taqadiir jaanataa huun  ho dekhii nazar ne kushiyaan yaa dekhe gam ke saaye mujhe tum yaad aaye 2  apanaa koii taraanaa main ne nahiin banaayaa 2 tum ne mere labon pe har ek sur sajaayaa o jab jab mere taraane duniyaa ne gungunaaye mujhe tum yaad aaye 2  mumkin hai zindagaanii kar jaaye bewafaaii 2 lekin ye pyaar vo hai jis men nahiin judaaii o is pyaar ke fasaane jab jab zubaan pe aaye mujhe tum yaad aaye 2

Title: rahen naa rahen ham mahakaa karenge
Lyrics: rahen naa rahen ham mahakaa karenge banake kalii  banake sabaa  baagevafaa men   mausam koi ho is chaman men rang banake rahenge ham khiraamaan chaahat kii khushabuu yuun hii zulfon se udegii khizaa ho yaa bahaaraan yuun hii jhuumate yuun hii jhuumate aur khilate rahenge banake kalii banake sabaa baage vafaa men rahen naa rahen ham   khoye ham aise kyaa hai milanaa kyaa bichhadanaa nahiin hai yaad hamako kuuche men dil ke jab se aaye sirf dil kii zamiin hai yaad hamako isii sarazamiin isii sarazamiin pe ham to rahenge banake kalii banake sabaa baagevafaa men rahen naa rahen ham   jab ham na honge jab hamaarii khaak pe tum rukoge chalatechalate ashkon se bhiigii chaandanii men ik sadaasii sunoge chalatechalate vahiin pe kahiin vahiin pe kahiin ham tumase milenge banake kalii banake sabaa baagevafaa men   rahen naa rahen ham   suman       hain khuubasuurat ye nazaare       ye bahaaren hamaare damqadam se rafii       zindaa huii hai phir jahaan men       aaj ishqovafaa kii rasm hamase donon       yuun hii is chaman yuun hii is chaman kii       ziinat rahenge banake kalii banake sabaa baagevafaa men       rahen naa rahen ham

Title: kuchh log ruuth kar bhii
Lyrics: kuchh log ruuth kar bhii lagate hain kitane pyaare chup rah ke bhii nazar men hain pyaar ke ishaare kuchh log ruuth kar bhii threedots  guzarii hai jo bhii ham par unako bataaen kaise afasaanaaegamedil unako sunaaen kaise ham ne chhupaa liye hain palakon men ashk saare kuchh log ruuth kar bhii threedots  ham unape berukii kaa ilazaam kyon lagaaen unakii jafaa kaa ai dil ham kyon buraa manaaen jo chaahen ab karen vo dil par sitam hamaare kuchh log ruuth kar bhii threedots  is dil men kaise kaise tuufaan machal rahe hain apanii hii aag men ham chupchaap jal rahe hain hain kitane kuubasurat is aag ke sharaare kuchh log ruuth kar bhii threedots

Title: chaahe to moraa jiyaa lai le
Lyrics: hamane unake saamane pahale to khanjar rakh diyaa phir kalejaa rakh diyaa dil rakh diyaa sar rakh diyaa aur kahaa  o chaahe to moraa jiyaa lai le saanvariyaa pher ke nainaa na jaa na jaa main vaarii rasiyaa chaahe to moraa jiyaa lai le threedots  maan bhii jaao na chhodo ladakaiyaan jaane naa duungii jaane naa duungii main dekho more sainyaa rok rahii gorii banhiyaan ki ruk jaao o man basiyaa o chaahe to moraa jiyaa lai le threedots  baalamawaa dekho hamarii suuratiyaa kaajarawaa barase kaalii kaalii ratiyaa saawan bhaadon morii ankhiyaan ki ruk jaa o manabasiyaa  o chaahe to moraa jiyaa lai le threedots   aaiinaa hai ki hai qaatil ke muqaabil qaatil mujhe dar hai kahiin dar jaaye na qaatil qaatil

Lyrics: wo saadagii kahen ise diiwaanagii kahen2 unakaa badhaa jo haath yahaan dil lutaa diyaa  pahale pahal ke dard kii lazzat na puuchhie2 lazzat na puuchhie utthii jo dil me huuk to main muskuraa diyaa2 unakaa badhaa jothreedots  ye kaun sochataa hai ke sajadaa qubuul ho2 sajadaa qubuul ho ye kaun dekhataa hai kahaan sar jhukaa diyaa2 unakaa badhaa jo threedots  aanchal kii ot ho ke na ho ab nasiib men2 ab nasiib men mainne charaag aaj hawaa men jalaa diyaa2 unakaa badhaa jo threedots

Title: tuu jahaan jahaan chalegaa meraa saayaa saath hogaa
Lyrics: tuu jahaan jahaan chalegaa meraa saayaa saath hogaa meraa saayaa  meraa saayaa  kabhii mujhako yaad karake jo bahenge tere aansuu to vahiin pe rok lenge unhen aake mere aansuu tuu jidhar kaa rukh karegaa meraa saayaa saath hogaa threedots  tuu agar udaas hogaa to udaas huungii main bhii nazar aauun yaa naa aauun tere paas huungii main bhii tuu kahiin bhii jaa rahegaa meraa saayaa saath hogaa threedots  main agar bichhad bhii jaauun kabhii meraa gam na karanaa meraa pyaar yaad karake kabhii aankh nam na karanaa tuu jo mudake dekh legaa meraa saayaa saath hogaa threedots  meraa gam rahaa hai shaamil tere dukh men tere gam men mere pyaar ne diyaa hai teraa saath har janam men tuu koi janam bhii legaa meraa saayaa saath hogaa threedots

Title: gaa rahii hai zindagii har taraf bahaar men kis liye
Lyrics: ma gaa rahii hai zindagii har taraf bahaar men kis liye asha chaar chaand lag gaye hain tere mere pyaar men is liye 2  ma aa gayaa aanchal kisii kaa aaj mere haath men 2 asha hai chakorii aaj apane chandramaa ke saath men 2 ma chal padii do kishtiiyaan aaj ek dhaar men kis liye asha chaar chaand lag gaye hain tere mere pyaar men is liye ma gaa rahii hai zindagii har taraf bahaar men kis liye asha chaar chaand lag gaye hain tere mere pyaar men is liye  asha chhuu rahii tan man ko mere priit kii purvaaiiyaan duur kii ambraaiion men gunjatii shehanaaiiyaan 2 ma sau gunaa nikhaar hai aaj to singaar men kis liye asha chaar chaand lag gaye hain tere mere pyaar men is liye ma gaa rahii hai zindagii har taraf bahaar men kis liye asha chaar chaand lag gaye hain tere mere pyaar men is liye  asha zindagii bhar ke liye tuu baanh merii thaam le 2 jab talak ye saans hai har saans teraa naam le 2 ma ik nayii duniyaa khadii apane intezaar men kis liye asha chaar chaand lag gaye hain tere mere pyaar men is liye ma gaa rahii hai zindagii har taraf bahaar men kis liye asha chaar chaand lag gaye hain tere mere pyaar men is liye

Title: chaand kitanii duur thaa sitaare kitanii duur
Lyrics: chaand kitanii duur thaa sitaare kitanii duur the tum jo aa gae to sab kariib aa gae chaand kitanii duur threedots  tumhaaraa haath raat men hinaa kaa rang mal gayaa hamaare dil ke taaq men chiraageshauq jal gayaa do badan ke saae anjuman sajaa gae chaand kitanii duur threedots  bujhaa do pyaas pyaar kii labon se kuchh to bol do bas ek niind so sakuun ye zulfenaaz khol do thaam lo hamen ham dagamagaa gae chaand kitanii duur threedots

Title: tere pyaar ne mujhe gam diyaa tere gam kii umr daraaz ho
Lyrics: tere pyaar ne mujhe gam diyaa tere gam kii umr daraaz ho vo zamaanaa aae kudaa kare mere pyaar par tujhe naaz ho tere pyaar ne mujhe threedots  meraa pyaar luutane vaale jaa tuu tamaam umr javaan rahe terii zindagii men fizaan rahe mere saath ho merii bebasii tere saath nagamaaosaaz ho tere pyaar ne mujhe threedots  kahiin aur chal mere dil yahaan kabhii laut kar nahiin aaenge milii dil lagaane ki vo sazaa ke kahiin bhii dil na lagaaenge use kyaa pataa ki vafaa hai kyaa jise bevafaaii pe naaz ho tere pyaar ne mujhe threedots

Title: o pavan veg se udane vaale ghode tujh pe savaar hai jo
Lyrics: o pavan veg se udane vaale ghode  tujh pe savaar hai jo meraa suhaag hai vo  rakhiyo re aaj unakii laaj ho o pavan threedots  1 tere kandhon par aaj bhaar hai mevaad kaa  karanaa padegaa tujhako saamanaa pahaad kaa  haldii ghaatii nahiin hai kaam koii khilavaad kaa  denaa javaab vahaan sheron kii dahaad kaa  ghadiyaan tuufaan kii hain  tere imtahaan kii hain  rakhiyo re aaj unakii laaj ho o pavan threedots  2 chhakke chhudaanaa denaa tuu dushmanon kii chaal ke  unakii chhaatii pe chadhanaa paanv tuu uchhaal ke  laanaa suhaag meraa vaapas tuu sambhaal ke  tere itihaas men akshar honge gulaal ke  chetak mahaan hai tuu  bijalii kii baan hai tuu  rakhiyo re aaj unakii laaj ho o pavan threedots

Title: aap se maine meri jaan muhabbat ki hai
Lyrics: rafi   aap se mainne merii jaan muhabbat kii hai         aap chaahen to merii jaan bhii le sakatii hai         aap jab hai to mere paas meraa sab kuchh hai         jaan kyaa chiiz hai iimaan bhii le sakatii hai         aap se mainne threedots  rafi   aap ko mainne muhabbat kaa kudaa samajhaa hai         aap kahiye ke mujhe aapane kyaa samajhaa hai         zindagii kyaa hai muhabbat kii maherabaanii hai         dard ko mainne haqiiqat men davaa samajhaa hai         aap se mainne threedots  ashaa   dil vo hii hai jo sadaa giit vafaa ke gaayen         pyaar karataa ho jise pyaar hii karataa jaaye         sainkadon saal ke jiine se hain bahetar vo ghadii         haath men haath ho jab yaar kaa maut aa jaaye         aap se mainne merii jaan muhabbat kii hai         aap chaahen to merii jaan bhii le sakaten hain  ashaa   aap jab hai to mere paas meraa sab kuchh hai         jaan kyaa chiiz hai iimaan bhii le sakatii hai         aap se mainne  threedots  rafi   aap jab hai to mere paas meraa sab kuchh hai         jaan kyaa chiiz hai iimaan bhii le sakatii hai         aap se mainne threedots

Title: jagat bhar kii roshanii ke liye  suuraj re tuu jalate rahanaa
Lyrics: jagat bhar kii roshanii ke liye karodon kii zindagii ke liye suuraj re jalate rahanaa suuraj re jalate rahanaa   threedots  jagat kalyaan kii khaatir tuu janmaa hai tuu jag ke vaaste har duhkh uthaa re bhale hii ang teraa bhasm ho jaaye tuu jal jal ke yahan kiranen lutaa re  likhaa hai ye hii tere bhaag men ki teraa jiivan rahe aag men suuraj re   threedots  karodon log prithvii ke bhatakate hain karodon aanganon men hai andheraa are jab tak na ho ghar ghar men ujiyaalaa samajh le adhuuraa kaam hai teraa  jagat uddhaar men abhii der hai abhii to duniyaan main andher hai suuraj re   threedots

Title: palakon ke piichhe se kyaa tumane kah daalaa phir se to faramaanaa
Lyrics: r palakon ke piichhe se kyaa tumane kah daalaa phir se to faramaanaa l nainon ne sapanon ki mahafil sajaai hai tum bhi zaruur aanaa r palakon ke piichhe se kyaa tumane kah daalaa phir se to faramaanaa  r taubaa meri taubaa    mushkil thaa ek to pahale hi dil kaa bahalanaa    aafat phir usape lat men tumhaaraa  mukhadaa chhupaa ke chalanaa   2 l aise na bolo pad jaae mujhako sharamaanaa r palakon ke piichhe se threedots  l duniyaa naa dekhe dhadake meraa man rastaa sajan meraa chhodo tan tharatharaae ungali hamaari dekho piyaa na marodo  2 r yuun naa sataao mujhako banaake divaanaa r palakon ke pichhe se threedots  r bach bach ke hamase o matavaali hai ye kahaan kaa iraadaa  naazuk labon se phir karatii jaao   milane kaa koi vaadaa  2 l dil ye meraa ghar hai tumhaaraa aa jaanaa r palakon ke pichhe se threedots
