Title: merii aur unakii priit puraanii
Lyrics: merii aur unakii priit puraanii chal chal jaavuu yaa munbaiilaa munbaii nagarii sab se pyaarii  vahiin base man miit meraa haan re raamaa jii jii jii jii jii jii  gaii ek din piyaa sang main aare dekhe rangiin pyaare nazaare lagaa phuulon ke desh men aaii gaii aage to dekhii powaaii khulaa niilaa gagan  khulaa niilaa gagan main thii main thii magan vahiin sab kuchh main aaii rakh rakh rakh merii aur unakii priit puraanii threedots  banbaii mere sapanon kii raanii mere unake milan kii kahaanii tuune sach karake sapane dikhaaye do bhatake hue dil milaaye raat din main teraa naam haay raat din main teraa naam luungii sadaa zindagaanii hai ye jab tak tak tak merii aur unakii priit puraanii threedots

Lyrics: ra 	aankhon aankhon men na jaane kyaa ishaare ho gae 	muskuraa kar tumane dekhaa ham tumhaare ho gae 	aankhon aankhon men threedots  su 	raatdin kii beqaraarii umr bhar kii bekhudii 2 	dil lagaa kar kuchh to jiine ke sahaare ho gae 	aankhon aankhon men threedots  ra 	haay ye maasuum cheharaa ye adaa ye baankapan 2 	tujhase mil ke rang dil ke aur pyaare ho gae 	aankhon aankhon men threedots  su 	tumako paa kar is jahaan men hamane sab kuchh paa liyaa ra 	tumako paa kar is jahaan men hamane sab kuchh paa liyaa do 	ab hamen kyaa chaahie jab tum hamaare ho gae 	aankhon aankhon men threedots

Title: kabhii nekii bhii usake dil men gar aa jaaye hai mujhase
Lyrics: kabhii nekii bhii usake dil men gar aa jaaye hai mujhase jafaaye kar ke apanii yaad sharamaa jaaye hai mujhase kabhii nekii  udhar wo badagumaanii hai idhar ye naatawaanii hai 2 na puuchhaa jaaye hai usase na bolaa jaaye hai unase kabhii nekii  huye hain paanv hii pahale nabardeishq men zakmii 2 na bhaagaa jaaye hai mujhase na thaharaa jaaye hai mujhase kabhii nekii bhii usake dil men gar aa jaaye hai mujhase kabhii nekii  sambhalane de mujhe ai naaummiidii kyaa qayaamat hai 2 ke daamaanekayaaleyaar chhuutaa jaaye hai mujhase kabhii nekii bhii usake dil men gar aa jaaye hai mujhase kabhii nekii

Title: laharon pe lahar ulfat hai javaan
Lyrics: laharon pe lahar ulfat hai javaan  raton kii sahar chalii aao yahaan  sitaare timatimaate hain tu aajaa aajaa  machalatii jaa rahi hai ye havaaen aajaa aajaa  laharon pe lahar ulfat hai javaan threedots   sulagatii chaandanii men tham rahii hai tujh pe najar  kadam ye kis taraf badhate chale jaate hain bekhabar  zamaane ko hai bhuule ham ajab si khvaab ye safar  laharon pe lahar ulfat hai javaan threedots   na jaane kaunasii raahen hamara kaun saa hai jahaan  sahaare kisake ham dhuundhe hamaarii manjil hai kahaan  sadaa dil kii magar kahatii hai meri duniyaa hai yahaan  laharon pe lahar ulfat hai javaan threedots

Title: mainne rakhaa hai muhabbat apane afasaane kaa naam
Lyrics: yaa habiibii  4  mainne rakhaa hai muhabbat apane afasaane kaa naam mainne rakhaa hai muhabbat tum bhii kuchh achchhaasaa rakh do apane diivaane kaa naam  2 mainne rakhaa hai   kis qadar khuubasuurat hai tere diidaar kii duniyaa merii nazaron kii jannat hai zulforukhasaar kii duniyaa kis qadar khuubasuurat hai tere diidaar kii duniyaa tumhen pahachaanaa hai khudaa ko samajhaa hai khudaa ko jaanaa hai mainne rakhaa hai   dil pe tum haath jo rakh do merii tasakiin ho jaae jaaneman zindagii merii kuchh to rangiin ho jaae dil pe tum haath jo rakh do merii tasakiin ho jaae nazar mil jaane do qayaamat aatii hai qayaamat aane do mainne rakhaa hai   ishq par kyaa guzaratii hai husn ye raaz kyaa jaane mere dil ke tadapane kaa koii andaaz kyaa jaane ishq par kyaa guzaratii hai husn ye raaz kyaa jaane hai dil parawaane kaa koii hamase puuchhe mazaa jal jaane kaa mainne rakhaa hai

Title: laakhon taare aasamaan men ek magar dhuunde naa milaa
Lyrics: laakhon taare aasamaan men ek magar dhuundhe naa milaa dekhake duniyaa kii diivaalii dil meraa chupachaap jalaa dil meraa chupachaap jalaa threedots  qismat kaa hai naam magar kaam hai ye duniyaa vaalon kaa phuunk diyaa hai chaman hamaare kvaabon aur khayaalon kaa jii karataa hai khud hii ghont den apane aramaanon kaa galaa dekhake duniyaa kii diivaalii threedots  sausau sadiyon se lambii ye gam kii raat nahiin dhalatii is andhiyaare ke aage ab ai dil ek nahiin chalatii hansate hii lut gai chaandanii aur uthate hii chaand dhalaa dekhake duniyaa kii diivaalii threedots  maut hai behatar is haalat se naam hai jisakaa majabuurii kaun musaafir tay kar paayaa dil se dil kii ye duurii kaanton hii kaanton se guzaraa jo raahii is raah chalaa dekhake duniyaa kii diivaalii threedots

Title: aankhon men qayaamat ke kaajal honthon pe gazab kii laalii hai
Lyrics: aankhon men qayaamat ke kaajal honthon pe gazab kii laalii hai bandaaparavar kahiye kisakii taqadiir sanvarane vaalii hai  sazakethreedots sazake main tumhaarii baahon ke jo aag lagaa dii paanii men qurabaan tumhaarii aankhon ke jo bhar den rang javaanii men mar jaaun tumhaare gaalon par jin men ke gulon kii laalii hai bandaaparavar threedots  o ho hothreedots ye aapakii mastii kaa aalam ye bahake hue jazabaat mere kuchh kah na sakaa main diivaanaa kahate hain magar haalaat mere yaa aap nashe men dube hain yaa merii nazar matavaalii hai bandaaparavar threedots

Title: hai ye zamiin hamaarii  saaraa jahaan hamaaraa hai
Lyrics: hai ye zamiin hamaarii vo aasamaan hamaaraa lo aaj vaqt badalaa saaraa jahaan hamaaraa hai hai ye zamiin hamaarii threedots  ham jis taraf chale hain duniyaa badal gaii hai tuufaan hat gayaa hai aandhii sambhal gaii hai karataa hai naaz khud par har ek javaan hamaaraa lo aaj vaqt badalaa threedots  kashtii ko le chale maujon pe ham kushii kii aavaaz aa rahii hai kaanon men zindagii kii roke nahiin rukegaa ab kaaravaan hamaaraa lo aaj vaqt badalaa threedots  ye chimaniyaan milon kii ye taaj kii miinaaren gangaa kii bahatii mauj jamanaa ke tej dhaare dharatii kaa zarraa zaraa hai raazadaan hamaaraa lo aaj vaqt badalaa threedots  paigaam de rahe hain ham sabako dostii kaa dankaa bajaa rahe hain ham duniyaa men shaanti kaa insaaniyat kaa jhandaa hai ab nishaan hamaaraa lo aaj vaqt badalaa threedots

Title: april fool banaayaa to unako gussaa aayaa
Lyrics: april fool banaayaa to unako gussaa aayaa to meraa kyaa qasuur zamaane kaa qasuur jisane dastuur banaayaa  2  dilabar o jaanejaanaan gusse ke ruup men lagatii ho aur hasiin 2 terii qaatil adaa ne maar hii daalaa kar lo tum isakaa yaqiin 2  dil se dil kii pahachaan huii jaagii muhabbat gaane lagii zindagii 2 hamane duniyaa men aa kar vo ruup dharaa zindaa huii aashiqii 2

Title: tum hamen pyaar karo yaa na karo
Lyrics: tum hamen pyaar karo yaa na karo ham tumhen pyaar kie jaaenge chaahe qismat men kushii ho ke na ho gam uthaakar hii jie jaaenge tum hamen pyaar threedots  ham nahiin vo jo gameishq se ghabaraa jaaen ho ke maayuus zubaan par koii shikavaa laaen chaahe kitanaa hii badhe dardejigar apane honthon ko sie jaaenge tum hamen pyaar threedots  tum salaamat ho to ham chain bhii paa hii lenge kisii suurat se lagii dil kii bujhaa hii lenge pyaar kaa jaam mile yaa na mile ham to aansuu bhii pie jaaenge tum hamen pyaar threedots  tod dii aas to phir itanaa hii ehasaan karo dil men rahanaa jo na chaaho to nazar hii men raho thes lagatii jo hai dil par to lage gam uthaakar hii jie jaaenge tum hamen pyaar threedots

Title: tum jo aao to pyaar aa jaae
Lyrics: tum jo aao to pyaar aa jaae zindagii men bahaar aa jaae  kyaa kahuun tumase kah nahiin sakataa bin tumhaare main rah nahiin sakataa tumako gar aitabaar aa jaae zindagii men bahaar aa jaae  dil pe mujhako to aitabaar nahiin yah vo shay hai jise qaraar nahiin dil pe gar ikhtiyaar aa jaae zindagii men bahaar aa jaae  jab tamannaa shabaab par aae har taraf ik kumaar saa chhaae zaheqismat jo yaar aa jaae zindagii men bahaar aa jaae

Title: terii yaad dil se bhulaane chalaa huun
Lyrics: terii yaad dil se bhulaane chalaa huun ke khud apanii hastii mitaane chalaa huun  2 terii yaad threedots  ghataaon tumhen saath denaa padegaa  2 main phir aaj aansuu bahaane chalaa huun bahaane chalaa huun terii yaad threedots  kabhii is jagah khvaab dekhe the maine  2 vahii kak apanii udaane chalaa huun udaane chalaa huun terii yaad threedots

Title: phir thes lagii dil ko phir yaad ne tadapaayaa
Lyrics: phir thes lagii dil ko phir yaad ne tadapaayaa phir bahane lage aansuu dil dard se bhar aayaa phir thes lagii threedots  duniyaa tere gulashan se ik phuul chunaa hamane 2 ik phuul chunaa hamane afasos ki daaman ko kaanton se bharaa paayaa phir thes lagii threedots  ik vo hain kudaa rakhe jo bhuul gae hamako 2 jo bhuul gae hamako ik ham hain ki honthon par shiqavaa naa kabhii aayaa phir bahane lage threedots

Title: jo pyaar tuune mujhako diyaa thaa
Lyrics: jo pyaar tuune mujhako diyaa thaa vo pyaar teraa main lautaa rahaa huun ab koii tujhako shikavaa na hogaa terii zindagii se chalaa jaa rahaa huun jo pyaar tuune threedots  hamako khabar bhii hone nahiin dii kis mod par laa ke dil tuune todaa apanaa banaanaa rahaa duur tuune auron ke ho jaaen aisaa naa chhodaa terii jafaa kaa charchaa hii kaisaa apanii vafaa pe main sharamaa rahaa huun jo pyaar tuune threedots  piichhe na ab koii aayegaa tere ab koii tujhako na aavaaz degaa mud kar kise dekhataa hai mere dil teraa kaun hai jo tujhe rok legaa tujhako mubaarak zamaane kii khushiyaan mitanaa hai mujhako mitaa jaa rahaa huun jo pyaar tuune threedots

Title: main ne kahaa thaa aanaa sunday ko sunday ko
Lyrics: tung  tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung  tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung tung le banaanaa  aa main ne kahaa thaa aanaa sunday ko sunday  ko     monday ko chale aae kyuun ra  milanaa jo chaahe dil tumase jii tumase jii     tumase to bolo kyaa karuun  aa rozroz aanaa bhii achchhaa nahiin itanaa sataanaa bhii achchhaa nahiin ra  isiiliye kahataa huun jaanejigar dil kaa jalaanaa bhii achchhaa nahiin 2 aa e pyaar kiyaa to jal ke jii jal ke jii jal ke darate ho kyuun ra  milane ke jhuuthe vaade hamase jii hamase jii hamase karate ho kyuun aa main ne kahaa thaa aanaa suhnday ko muhnday ko     muhnday ko chale aae kyuun ra  baarbaar detii ho taanaa mujhe samajho na itanaa begaanaa mujhe aa isiiliye kahatii huun jaanejigar tumane abhii tak na jaanaa mujhe 2 ra  khuub samajh liyaa tumako jii tumako jii tumase kyaa kahuun aa vaade pe aayaa karo apane jii apane jii apane main kah to rahii huun aa main ne kahaa thaathreedots

Title: pahale mile the sapanon men aur aaj saamane paayaa
Lyrics: pahale mile the sapanon men aur aaj saamane paayaa haay qurbaan jaauun tum sang jiivan aise kategaa jaise dhuupsang chhaayaa haay qurbaan jaauun  ai saanvalii hasiinaa dil meraa tuune chhiinaa madahosh manzilon par tuune sikhaayaa jiinaa ek jhalak se meraa muqaddar tuune aaj chamakaayaa haay qurbaan jaauun threedots  zulfen jo munh pe daalo to din men shaam kar do aur benaqaab nikalo to qatleaam kar do vo hii bachegaa jisako milegaa tere pyaar kaa saayaa haay qurbaan jaauun threedots  gar jhuumake chalo tum ai jaanezindagaanii patthar kaa bhii kalejaa ho jaae paaniipaanii gore badan par kaalaa aanchal aur rang le aayaa haay qurbaan jaauun threedots

Title: tum ek baar muhabbat kaa imtahaan to lo
Lyrics: tum ek baar muhabbat kaa imtahaan to lo mere junuun merii vahashat kaa imtahaan to lo tum ek baar   threedots  salaameshauq pe ranjish bharaa payaam na do mere koluus ko firaasohavas kaa naam na do merii vafaa kii haqiikat kaa imtahaan to lo tum ek baar   threedots  na taktotaaj na laaloguhar kii hasarat hai tumhaare pyaar tumhaarii nazar kii hasarat hai tum apane husn kii azamat kaa imtihaan to lo tum ek baar   threedots  main apanii jaan bhii de duun to aitabaar nahiin ke tum se badhake mujhe zindagii se pyaar nahiin yuun hii sahii merii chaahat kaa imtihaan to lo tum ek baar   threedots

Title: vikal moraa manavaa tum bin haay
Lyrics: ham gavanavaa naa jaibe ho binaa jhuulanii ambuvaa kii daarii pad rahii buundiyaa acharaa se ulajhe lahariyaa lahariyaa ho binaa jhuulanii ham gavanavaa naa jaibe ho binaa jhuulanii  sakal bana gagana pavana chalata puravaaii rii maaii 2 ritu basanta aaii phuulan chhaaii belariyaa daar daar ambuvan kii kohariyaa rahii pukaar aur meghavaa buundan jharanaaii sakal bana gagana pavana chalata puravaaii rii  vikal mora manava tum bin hay ae na sajana ritu biti jae vikal mora manava tum bin hay  bhor pavan chali bujh gae dipak chali gai rain shrringar ki kaise viraha ki dhup dhali ari ai kali ankhiyan ki padi kumhalae vikal mora manava   yug se khule hain pat nainan ke mere yug se andhera mora angana suraj chamaka na chand khila ari ai jala rahi apana tan man haay vikal mora manava

Title: paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro
Lyrics: paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro saanvalii suuratiyaa honth laallaal haayhaay malamal kaa kurataa malamal ke kurate pe chhiint laallaal paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro   hamane mangaaii suramedaanii le aayaa zaalim banaaras kaa zaradaa  2 aa apanii hii duniyaa men khoyaa rahe wo hamare dil kii na puuchhe bedardaa puuchhe bedardaa  paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro hoyhoy saanvalii suuratiyaa honth laallaal haayhaay malamal kaa kurataa malamal ke kurate pe chhiint laallaal paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro   bagiyaa gungun paayal chhunchhun chupake se aaii hai rut matavaalii  2 aa khil gaiin kaliyaan duniyaa jaane lekin na jaane bagiyaa kaa maalii bagiyaa kaa maalii  paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro hoyhoy saanvalii suuratiyaa honth laallaal haayhaay malamal kaa kurataa malamal ke kurate pe chhiint laallaal paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro   khaa ke gilorii shaam se uunghe so jaaye wo diiyaabaatii se pahale  2 haa aanganataarii men ghabaraaii doluun chorii ke dar se dil moraa dahale dil moraa dahale  paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro saanvalii suuratiyaa honth laallaal haayhaay malamal kaa kurataa malamal ke kurate pe chhiint laallaal paan khaaye sainyaan hamaaro

Title: kyaa buraa kiyaa hai huzuur maine haan thodii sii pii hai
Film: dil bhi teraa hum bhi tere
Lyrics: kyaa buraa kiyaa hai huzuur maine haan thodii sii pii hai zaruur maine kyaa buraa kiyaa threedots  samajhatii hai duniyaa sharaabii mujhe yah kahatii hai kaanaakaraabii mujhe na jaane kyaa kiyaa qasuur maine haan thodii sii pii threedots  ye thodii sii piinaa balaa ho gayaa zamaanaa bhii mujhape kafaa ho gayaa yah pahalaa kiyaa hai qusuur maine kyaa buraa kiyaa hai threedots  kyaa qusuur kiyaa hai huzuur maine

Title: woh aaii subahaa ke  kudaa nigehabaan ho tumhaaraa
Lyrics: waqterukhsat stanza the lp version has both the stanzas but doesnt have the prelude woh aaii subahaa ke parade se maut kii aawaaz kisii ne tod diyaa jaise zindagii kaa saaz  kudaa nigehabaan ho tumhaaraa  2 dhadakate dil kaa payaam le lo  2 tumhaarii duniyaa se jaa rahen hain utho hamaaraa salaam le lo  2  hai waqteruksat gale lagaa lo kataaen bhii aaj baksha daalo  2 bichadane waale kaa dil na todo zaraa mohabbat se kaam le lo  2  tumhaarii duniyaa se jaa rahen hain utho hamaaraa salaam le lo  uthe janaazaa jo kal hamaaraa qasam hai tumako na denaa kaandhaa  2 na ho mohabbat hamaarii rusawaa ye aansuon kaa payaam le lo  2  kudaa nigehabaan ho tumhaaraa dhadakate dil ka payaam le lo

Title: kaamosh zindagii ko aavaaz de rahe ho
Lyrics: kaamosh zindagii ko aavaaz de rahe ho tuute hue haathon men kyuun saaz de rahe ho kaamosh zindagii ko threedots  benuur merii aankhen aur duur kaa safar hai uthate hain paanv lekin  gir jaane kaa bhii dar hai  2 par kaat ke kisii ke paravaaz de rahe ho kaamosh zindagii ko threedots  aankhon se bahataa dariyaa honthon pe aah lekar saahil pe ham khade hain  saahil kii chaah lekar  2 barbaad mohabbat ko nae andaaz de rahe ho kaamosh zindagii ko threedots

Title: kaise manaauun piyavaa gun mere ekahuu naahiin
Lyrics: kaise manaauun piyavaa gun mere ekahuu naahiin aaii milan kii belaa ghabaraauun man maahiin kaise manaauun piyavaa threedots  saajan mere aae dhadakan badhatii jaae nainaa jhukate jaaen ghuunghat khulataa jaae tujhase hii sharamaae aaj merii parachhaaiin kaise manaauun piyavaa threedots  main anajaan paraaii dvaar tihaare aaii tuune mujhe apanaayaa priit kii riit nibhaaii haay re man kii kaliyaan phir bhii khil naa paaiin kaise manaauun piyavaa threedots

Title: ghar aajaa ghir aaye badaraa saanvariyaa
Lyrics: ghar aajaa ghir aaye badaraa saanvariyaa moraa jiyaa dhakdhak re chamake bijuriyaa  suunaasuunaa ghar mohe dasane ko aaye re khidakii pe baithebaithe saarii rain jaaye re tap tip sunat main to bhaii re baavariyaa  thaharaake aaye havaa divalaa bujhaaye re laage more angavaa badan kaanp jaaye re chutakii lai puuchhe kaahe aaye naa saanvariyaa  kasamas jiyaraa kasak morii duunii re pyaasiipyaasii ankhiyon kii galiyaan hai suunii re jaane mohe laagii kis bairan kii najariyaa

Title: mausam ye pukaare mastii men lekar matavaale dil kaa kaaravaan
Lyrics: ta mausam ye pukaare mastii men lekar matavaale dil kaa  kaaravaan la sar pe hai hamaare chaahat kaa aanchal kadamon ke niiche aasamaan la mausam ye pukaare  la tan ko udaayen havaa matavaalii ta dil ko chhuune hai ghataa kaalii kaalii  2 la ritu beqaraar beqaraar hai shamaa ta mausam ye pukaare mastii men lekar matavaale dil kaa kaaravaan la sar pe hai hamaare chaahat kaa aanchal kadamon ke niiche aasamaan donno  mausam ye pukaare  la din hai ki raat ye kaun bataaye ta zindaa rahe terii palkon ke saaye  2 la sochenge phir kabhii hai zindagii kahaan donno mausam ye pukaare mastii men lekar matavaale dil kaa kaaravaan         sar pe hai hamaare chaahat kaa aanchal kadamon ke niiche aasamaan         mausam ye pukaare

Title: aavaaraa ai mere dil
Lyrics: aavaaraa ai mere dil jaane kahaan hai terii manzil aavaaraa ai mere dil  viiraanon men saharaaon men aatii jaatii in raahon men tere ishaaron par naachii main jiivan bhar aavaaraa threedots  ab to batalaa ai dil mere baakii hain ab kitane phere ab to ruke ye safar meraa bhii ho koii ghar aavaaraa threedots  raat aur din ke ye do chahare kaun hai apanaa ye to kah de main kaun huun main kyaa huun sach huun yaa saayaa huun aavaaraa threedots  kaise kaise tuufaan aaye bijalii chamkii baadal chhaaye par naa ruke ham tum par naa jhuke ham tum aavaaraa threedots

Title: jin raaton kii bhor nahiin hain aaj aisii hii raat aaii
Lyrics: jin raaton kii bhor nahiin hai aaj aisii hii raat aai jo jis gam men duub gayaa hai saagar kii hai gaharai  raat ke taaron tum hii bataao merii vo manzil hai kahaan paagal banakar jisake liye main kho baithaa huun dono jahaan jin raaton threedots  raah kisii kii huii naa roshan jalanaa meraa bekaar gayaa luut gaii taqadiir mujhe main jiit ke baazii haar gayaa jin raaton kii bhor nahiin hai threedots

Title: aap kii khuubasuurat aankhon men samaa sakataa huun
Lyrics: dev aap kii khuubasuurat aankhon men samaa sakataa huun kyaa main andar aa sakataa huun  aashaa  aaiye aapakaa thaa hamen intazaar  2 aanaa thaa aa gaye hm threedots kaise nahin aate sarakaar  2 aaiyethreedots  dev  apani mahafil men jise chaahe bulaa sakate hain aap ham bhalaa kyaa hain sitaaron ko jhukaa sakate hain aap  aasha  hansithreedots ham naa kahate the nigaahon se khiche aaenge aap  2 raat bhar jaagenge tadapenge machal jaaenge aap nind nahi aaegi  2 aankh lad jaegi hame yun naa thukaraaiethreedots aaiyethreedots  hansithreedots aaiye naathreedots  aaiye aapakaa thaa hame intazaar aanaa thaa aa gaye hothreedots kaise nahin aate sarakaar aanaa thaa aa gaye hm threedots kaise nahin aate sarakaar aaiyethreedots  dev  mausam suhaanaa hai dilakash zamaanaa hai phir bhi udaasi hai ye raat pyaasi hai  aasha  hay threedots ek to ham tum akele phir samaa ye raat kaa  2 dekhataa sunataa nahin koi hai dar kis baat kaa aake zaraa baahon men  2 basake nigaahon men dil zaraa dhadakaiye aaiyethreedots  hansithreedots aaiye naathreedots  aaiye aapakaa thaa hame intazaar aanaa thaa aa gaye aanaa thaa aa gaye he threedots kaise nahin aate sarakaar aaiyethreedots

Lyrics: ra 	sang basantii ang basantii rang basantii chhaa gayaa 	mastaanaa mausam aa gayaa ko 	sang basantii ang threedots  la  dharatii kaa hai aanchal piilaa jhuume ambar niilaaniilaa 	sab rangon men hai rangiilaa rang basantii ko 	sang basantii ang threedots  ra 	laharaae ye teraa aanchal saavan ke jhuulon jaisaa 	dil meraa le gayaa hai ye teraa ruup gorii sarason ke phuulon jaisaa 	o laharaae teraa aanchal saavan ke jhuulon jaisaa ko 	dil meraa le gayaa threedots ra 	jab dekhuun jii chaahe meraa naam basantii rakh duun teraa la 	chhodochhedo naa ko 	ho ho la 	terii baaten raam duhaaii manavaa luutaa niind churaaii 	sainyaa terii priit se aaii tang basantii 	sang basantii ang threedots ra 	mastaanaa mausam aa gayaa  la 	ho sun lo deshavaasiyon 2 	aaj se is desh men 	chhotaabadaa koii na hogaa saare ek samaan honge 	sun lo deshavaasiyon 	koii na hogaa bhuukhaapyaasaa puurii hogii sabakii aashaa 	ham hain raajaa ra 	tum ho kaun nagar ke raaje chhotaa munh badii baat na saaje 	jhuumo naacho gaao baaje sang  basantii ko 	sang basantii ang threedots

Title: mahafil se uth jaanevaalon tum logon par kyaa ilzaam
Lyrics: mahafil se uth jaanevaalon tum logon par kyaa ilzaam  tum aabaad gharon ke basi main aavaaraa aur badanaam  mere sathi mere sathi mere sathi khaalii jaam  mere sathi khaalii jaam   do din tum ne pyaar jataayaa do din tum se mel rahaa  achchhaa khaasaa vaqt kataa aur achchhaa khaasaa khel rahaa  hii hii hollow laughter  achchhaa khaasaa khel rahaa  ab us khel kaa fikr hii kaisaa vakt kataa aur khel tamaam  mere sathi threedots  tum ne dhuundhii sukh kii daulat mainne paalaa gam kaa rog  kaise banataa kaise nibhaataa ye rishtaa aur ye sanjog  main ne dil ko dil se tola tum ne maange pyaar ke daam  mere sathi threedots  tum duniyaa ko behatar samajhe main pagal khaarakhaar  hua  tum ko apana nahiin nikalaa tha khud se bhi bezaar rahaa  hii hii hollow laughter again  khud se bhi bezaar rahaa  dekh liyaa barkhaast  tamaashaa jaan liyaa apanaa anjaam  mere sathi threedots mere sathi khaalii jaam

Title: yaad men terii jaagjaag ke ham raat bhar karavaten lataa
Lyrics: yaad men teri jaagjaag ke ham raat bhar karavaten badalate hain  har ghadii dil men teri ulfat ke dhiime dhiime chiraag jalate hain   jabase tune nigaah pherii hai din hai suunaa to raat andherii hai  chaand bhi ab najar nahiin ata ab sitaare bhi kam nikalate hain  yaad men teri jaagjaag ke ham threedots  lut gayii vo bahaar ki mahafil chhut gayii hamase pyaar ki manzil  zindagii ki udaas rahon men  teri yaadon ke sath chalate hain  yaad men teri jaagjaag ke ham threedots  tujhako paakar hamen bahaar milii tujhase chhutakar magar ye baat khulii  baagabaan hii chaman ke phuulon ko apane pairon se khud masalate hain  yaad men teri jaagjaag ke ham threedots  kya kahen tujhase kyuun huii duurii ham samajhate hain apanii majabuurii  tujhako maaluum kya ke tere liye dil ke gam aansuon men dhalate hain  yaad men teri jaagjaag ke ham threedots

Title: bachche man ke sachche
Lyrics: bachche man ke sachche saarii jag ke aankh ke taare ye vo nanhe phuul hain jo bhagavaan ko lagate pyaare  khud ruuthe khud man jaaye phir hamajolii ban jaaye jhagadaa jisake saath karen agale hii pal phir baat karen inakii kisii se bair nahiin inake liye koii gair nahiin inakaa bholaapan milataa hai sabako baanh pasaare bachche man ke sachche   threedots  insasaan jab tak bachchaa hai tab tak samajh kaa kachchaa hai jyon jyon usakii umar badhe man par jhuuth ka mail chadhe krodh badhe nafarat ghere laalach kii aadat ghere bachapan in paapon se hatakar apanii umar guzaare bachche man ke sachche   threedots  tan komal man sundar hain bachche badon se behatar inamen chhuut aur chhaat nahiin jhuuthii jaat aur paat nahiin bhaashhaa kii taqaraar nahiin mazahab kii diivaar nahiin inakii nazaron men ek hain mandir masjid gurudvaare bachche man ke sachche   threedots

Lyrics: la 	saiyaan chhod de baiyaan merii patalii kalaiyaan mud jaaegii mu 	teraa haath na chhoduun teraa saath na chhoduun kahaan jaaegii  la 	dekho jii dekho kahiin dekhe na zamaanaa 	pyaar hamaaraa ban jaae na fasaanaa mu 	achchhaa nikaalaa hai ye jaane kaa bahaanaa la 	saiyaan chhod de threedots  la 	tum mere kaun ho ye duniyaa na jaane mu 	apanii balaa se koii maane yaa na maane la 	pyaar men itane bhii bano na diivaane la 	saiyaan chhod de threedots

Title: tum se achchhaa kaun hai dil lo jigar lo jaan lo
Lyrics: ho tum se achchhaa kaun hai dil lo jigar lo jaan lo ham tumhare hain sanama tum hame pahachaana lo   2 	 main huun vo jhonkaa masta havaakaa sanga tumhaare chalataa rahuungaa jaba se huii hai tum se mohabbata milataa rahaa huun milataa rahuungaa   2 huthreedots tum se achchhaa kauna hai threedots 	 siine men dila hai dila men tumhii ho tuma men hamaarii chhotii sii jaana hain tuma ho salaamata ham ko nahiin gama tum se hamaarii duniyaa javaana hain   2 huthreedots tum se achchhaa kauna hai threedots 	 mara ke bhii dekhaa mar naa sake ham dilakii lagii ne hamako bachaayaa terii nazara kaa jaaduu hai shaayada jisane hame phira zindaa banaayaa huthreedots tum se achchhaa kauna hai threedots 	 ho tum se achchhaa kaun hai dila lo jigara lo jaana lo ham tumhaare hain sanama tuma hame pahachaana lo

Title: raajuu kaa hai ek kvaab raajuu raajaa saahab
Lyrics: raajuu kaa hai ek kvaab raajuu raajaa saahab raajuu kaa hai ek threedots raaj hai naa taaj hai phir bhii main huun raajaa saahab raajuu kaa hai ek threedots  mere honthon pe jo hain dukh bharii kahaaniyaan mujhako inase pyaar hai ye hain merii raaniyaan are ye hain merii raaniyaan meraa bhii nahiin javaab raajuu kaa hai ek threedots  main raahon men hii sahii main manzil pe naa sahii achchhaa maanaa thiik hai mere dil pe naa sahii are mere dil pe naa sahii mere gam pe hai shabaab raajuu kaa hai ek threedots  merii mahafil men suno afasaane hain dard ke majabuurii kii mastiyaan paimaane hain dard ke are paimaane hain dard ke aansuon kii hai sharaab raajuu kaa hai ek threedots jinakii qismat men kaante vo kvaab na dekhen kaliyon ke kaliyaan mahalon kii raunak aur kaante raahii galiyon ke raajuu kaa thaa ek kvaab raajuu raajaa raajaa saahab 2 raaj thaa naa taaj thaa phir bhii main thaa raajaa saahab raajuu kaa thaa ek threedots

Title: duniyaa banaane vaale kyaa tere man men samaaii
Lyrics: duniyaa banaane vaale  kyaa tere man men samaai  kaaheko duniyaa banaai tuune kaaheko duniyaa banaai    2  kaahe banaae tuune maatii ke putale dharatii ye pyaarii pyaarii mukhade ye ujale kaahe banaayaa tuune duniyaa kaa khelaa  2 jisamen lagaayaa javaanii kaa melaa gupchup tamaashaa dekhe vaah re terii khudaai kaaheko duniyaa banaai tuune kaaheko duniyaa banaai  threedots  tuu bhii to tadapaa hogaa man ko banaakar tuufaan ye pyaar kaa man men chhupaakar koi chhavi to hogii aankhon men terii   2 aansuu bhii chhalake honge palakon se terii bol kyaa suujhii tujhako kaaheko priit jagaai kaaheko duniyaa banaai tuune kaaheko duniyaa banaai  threedots  priit banaake tuune jiinaa sikhaayaa hansanaa sikhaayaa ronaa sikhaayaa jiivan ke path par miit milaae   2 miit milaake tuune sapane jagaae sapane jagaake tuune kaahe ko de dii judaai kaaheko duniyaa banaai tuune kaaheko duniyaa banaai  threedots

Title: vo chup rahen to mere dil ke daag jalate hain
Lyrics: vo chup rahen to mere dil ke dag jalate hain jo bat kar len to bujhate charag jalate hain  kaho bujhen ke jalen ham apani rah chalen ya tumhari rah chalen kaho bujhen ke jalen bujhen to aise ke kisi garib ka dil kisi garib ka dil jalen to aise ke jaise charag jalate hain  yah khoi khoi nazar kabhi to hogi ya sada rahegi udhar yah khoi khoi nazar udhar to ek sulagata hua hai virana hai ek virana magar idhar to baharon men bag jalate hain  jo ashq pi bhi lie jo honth si bhi lie to sitam ye kisape kie jo ashq pi bhi lie kuchh aj apani sunao kuchh aj meri suno kamoshion se to dil aur dimag jalate hain

Title: ye baat hotii hai paidaa janaab barason men
Lyrics: ye baat hotii hai paidaa janaab barason men kudaa banaataa hai aisaa shabaab barason men ye baat hotii hai threedots  bahaar aatii hai aur rangruup milate hain 2 chaman men vaise to har roz phuul khilate hain  chaman men khilataa hai  2 tum saa gulaab barason men kudaa banaataa hai threedots  nahiin ye baat ke tumasaa hasiin nahiin hogaa 2 yahaan nahiin to vo jahaan men kahiin hogaa magar milegaa tumhaaraa javaab barason men kudaa banaataa hai threedots  teraa kyaal hai har vaqt yaad ke qaabil 2 magar ye merii nazar bhii hai daad ke qaabil  kiyaa hai jisane  2 tumhen intikaab barason men kudaa banaataa hai threedots

Title: pavan diivaanii
Lyrics: haay  pavan diivaanii pavan diivaanii na maane  udaave moraa ghunghataa aalii pavan diivaanii   ulajhii lat hamaarii lipatii morii saarii path pe koii jaise maare pichakaarii ulajhii lat hamaarii chhed chhed jaae chanchal mastaanii mastaanii pavan diivaanii   saa nii dha ma ga ga ma dha nii pa nii dha nii nii saa  ankhiyaan tarase morii dagarii nahiin suujhe kit chalii main gorii bairan sab buujhe ankhiyaan tarase morii jhuumjhuum roke phir bhii marjaanii marjaanii pavan diivaanii   haay re usakii bainyaan  dharane nahiin paauun chutakii bhar liitii bharane nahiin paauun haay re usakii bainyaan  nahiin bhulaa hii detii usakii manmaanii manmaanii pavan diivaanii

Title: kabhii pahale dekhaa nahiin  yahaan main ajanabii huun
Lyrics: kabhii pahale dekhaa nahiin ye samaan ye main bhuule se aa gayaa huun kahaan  yahaan main ajanabii huun 2 main jo huun bas vahii huun 2 yahaan main ajanabii huun 2  kahaan shaamosahar the kahaan dinraat mere bahut rusavaa hue hain yahaan jazbaat mere naii tahaziib hai ye nayaa hai ye zamaanaa magar main aadamii huun vahii sadiyon puraanaa main kyaa jaanuun ye baaten zaraa insaaf karanaa merii gustaakiyon ko kudaaraa maaf karanaa yahaan main ajanabii threedots  terii baanhon men dekhuun sanam gairon kii baanhen main laauungaa kahaan se bhalaa aisii nigaahen ye koii raqs hogaa koii dastuur hogaa mujhe dastuur aisaa kahaan manzuur hogaa bhalaa kaise ye meraa lahuu ho jaae paanii main kaise bhuul jaauun main huun hindostaanii yahaan main ajanabii threedots  mujhe bhii hai shikaayat tujhe bhii to gilaa hai yahii shiqave hamaarii mohabbat kaa silaa hain kabhii magarib se mashariq milaa hai jo milegaa jahaan kaa phuul hai jo vahiin pe vo khilegaa tere uunche mahal men nahiin meraa guzaaraa mujhe yaad aa rahaa hai vo chhotaa saa shikaaraa yahaan main ajanabii threedots

Title: main kaun huun main kahaan huun
Lyrics: main kaun huun main kahaan huun mujhe ye hosh nahiin kidhar main aaj ravaan huun mujhe ye hosh nahiin main kaun huun threedots  mujhe na haath lagaao ke mar chukaa huun main 2 khud apane haath se ye kuun kar chukaa huun main phir aaj kaise yahaan huun mujhe ye hosh nahiin kidhar main aaj ravaan threedots  main apanii laash uthaae yahaan chalaa aayaa koii bas itanaa bataa de kahaan chalaa aayaa ye kyaa jagah hai jahaan huun mujhe ye hosh nahiin kidhar main aaj ravaan threedots  koii na aae yahaan ye mazaar meraa hai khadaa huun kab se mujhe intazaar meraa hai ye kyaa kahaan main yahaan huun mujhe ye hosh nahiin kidhar main aaj ravaan threedots

Title: jaane vo kaun hai kyaa naam hai un aankhon kaa
Lyrics: jaane vo kaun hai kyaa naam hai un aankhon kaa  dil pe anjaanii sii ik tasviir banaa detii hain bujh ke rah jaatii hai jab koii tamannaa dil men ek chiraag aur bhii chupake se jalaa detii hain jaane vo kaun hai threedots  mujhako bahalaatii hain naashaad jo hotaa huun kabhii niind men rang milaatii hain jo sotaa huun kabhii  jaagataa huun to  2 kaii kvaab dikhaa detii hain jaane vo kaun hai threedots  jab bhii uthatii hain chhalakatii hain gulaabon kii tarah der tak main bahakataa huun sharaabii kii tarah kyaa kahuun chupake se kyaa chiiz pilaa detii hain jaane vo kaun hai threedots  roz milatii hain vo tanahaa nahiin rahane detiin ye hai baat aur ki apanaa nahiin kahane detiin  aur kah duun to  2 palak hans ke jhukaa detii hain jaane vo kaun hai threedots

Title: mausam hai javaan nuur men
Lyrics: kaash tum mere paas hote  mausam hai javaan nuur men duube hain nazaare aise men har ik dil hai kisii dil ke sahaare kaash tum mere paas hote  ye phuulon kii vaadii ye bahaaron kaa jahaan hai hansataa huaa gaataa huaa rangiin samaan hai tum duur ho phir bhii hain idhar ehasaas tumhaare kaash tum mere paas hote  ye jhiil kii maujon ke machalane kaa nazaaraa ye duur se takataa huaa kaamosh kinaaraa jaise koii in donon kii tasviir utaare kaash tum mere paas hote

Title: maangane se jo maut mil jaatii
Lyrics: maangane se jo maut mil jaatii kaun jiitaa is zamaane men dard hotaa naa bekalii  hotii dam naa ghutataa yuun viiraane men maangane se jo maut mil jaatii kaun jiitaa is zamaane men  aansuuon kii shamaa se gar gam kii taariikiyaan mitatii2 tujh ko kushiyon kii raushanii hotii zindagii ke is fasaane men maangane se jo maut mil jaatii kaun jiitaa is zamaane men  aarazuuon ke janaaze ko leke kaandhe pe ham ghuume2 chalke manzil jo aaii milane ko ham hii na rahe is zamaane men maangane se jo maut mil jaatii kaun jiitaa is zamaane men

Title: ham ne tujh ko pyaar kiyaa hai jitanaa
Lyrics: ham ne tujh ko pyaar kiyaa ham ne tujh ko pyaar kiyaa hai jitanaa kaun karegaa itanaa2  roye bhii to dil hii dil men mahafil men musakaaye tujh se hii ham teraa ye gam barason rahe chhupaaye pyaar men tere chhupake chhupake2 jalate rahe ham jitanaa kaun jalegaa itanaa2 ham ne tujh ko pyaar kiyaa hai jitanaa kaun karegaa itanaa2  pyaar pe mere naaz tumhe thaa yaad karo vo nazaaraa haath pe apane likh lete the jab tum naam hamaaraa terii adaa ke bhole pan pe2 mitate rahe ham jitanaa kaun mitegaa itanaa2 ham ne tujh ko pyaar kiyaa hai jitanaa kaun karegaa itanaa2

Lyrics: bachche  aamadanii atthannii khachraa rupaiyaa           aamadanii atthannii khachraa rupaiyaa           bhaiyyaa na puuchho na puuchho haal           natiijaa than than gopaal  daadaa   ek do tiin chaar paanch chhh saat aath hmmm bachche  aamadanii atthannii khachraa rupaiyaa           bhaiyyaa na puuchho na puuchho haal           natiijaa than than gopaal  daadaa   jo kuchh apane paas hai bachchon us se kaam chalaao bachche  jo kuchh apane paas hai mummy us se kaam chalaao           daddy us se kaam chalaao bahuen  tum ho bachche akal ke kachche ham ko na samajhaao           jaao ham ko na samajhaao           bolo bolo  ab kya bole daadaa   jo kuchh nahiin hai us ke khaatir jo hai vo na khonaa bachche  jo kuchh nahiin hai us ke khaatir jo hai vo na khonaa           dekho jo hai vo se rahate daadaa   har jo chiiz chamakatii hai usako sonaa nahiin kahate           haan usako sonaa nahiin kahate bete     aap pitaajii buudhe ho gaye fashion kaise bhaaye           baapuu fashion bhaaye halavaa puurii aapako rotii daal bachche  natiijaa than than gopaal  bete     jo hogaa dekhaa jaayegaa do din mauj udaa len           haan haan do din mauj udaa len bachche  ghar men bijalii nahiin to kyaa ghar ko aag lagaa len           bolo ghar ko aag lagaa len daadaa   bolo bolo chup kyon ho gaye bete     tum kyaa jaano baapuu duniyaa badale shaamsavere           duniyaa badale Title: aajaa re aajaa  kho die hain sanam terii talaash men
Lyrics: aajaa re  2  aajaa  3 kho die hain sanam terii talaash men pichhale kaii janam 2 aajaa re threedots  is dil ko dard kii vo aag tuune dii sadiyon se ye chitaa  jalakar nahiiin bujhii  2 kho die hain sanam threedots  aankhon se ashqegam suukhe nahiin abhii aajaa ke baant len  shiqavegile sabhii  2 kho die hain sanam threedots  tere lie milaa ye aakharii janam mumaqin kahaan milen  phir isake baad ham  2 kho die hain sanam threedots

Title: kaajal vaale nain milaa ke kar  are re re luut liyaa re
Lyrics: kaajal vaale nain milaa ke kar daalaa bechain kisii matavaalii ne are re re luut liyaa re jhaanjhar vaalii ne  zulfen gaalon ko chuum rahii thiin ik ghataa sii jhuum rahii thii panaghat se haay chalii aa rahii thii ithalaate hue tarasaate hue dil se nikalii haay mujhe jab dekhaa nain jhukaae gulon kii daalii ne are re re luut liyaa threedots  chaand sii gorii shok hasiinaa haay mushkil kar gaii maranaajiinaa ek jhalak men huaa ye haal ki main diivaanaa banaa mastaanaa banaa paravaanaa banaa main kho baithaa hosh mujhe yuun kar daalaa madahosh nashe kii pyaalii ne are re re luut liyaa threedots  kal sapane men phir aae thii  ham donon the tanhaaii thii ghuunghat men haay chhupii jaa rahii thii vo sharmaate hue ghabaraate hue muskaate hue biite saarii raat na samajhii mere dil kii baat bholiibhaalii ne are re re luut liyaa threedots

Title: kabhii tum bhii ham se the aashanaa tumahen yaad ho ki na yaad ho
Lyrics: kabhii tum bhii ham se the aashanaa tumahen yaad ho ki na yaad ho kabhii tum ko ham se bhii pyaar thaa tumahen yaad ho ki na yaad ho  karo yaad kvaab saa vo samaan mere paas bethe the tum yahaan liyaa haath meraa jo haath men gaiin tuut kaanch kii chuudiyaan to gale se mujh ko lagaa liyaa tumahen yaad ho ki na yaad ho  vo milan kii raat jo kat gaii vo kushii jo aake palat gaii kabhii tum ne pyaar se chhuu liyaa kabhii laaj se men simit gaii mujhe yaad hai vo zaraa zaraa tumahen yaad ho ki na yaad ho

Title: kaun ho tum kaun ho
Lyrics: 1 milan  nava madiraa jaisii anchakhii nava madiraa jaisii angiindhaa muurtii jaane kisakii milan raat par chamakegii ye banjyotii aa aa aa  kaun ho tum kaun ho 2 kaun ho  kavi kii madhur kalpanaa ho tum yaa gaayak kii madhurim taan yaa saritaa jal kii tarang ho arun kamal kii madhu muskaan  kaun ho tum kaun ho 2 kaun ho  ritu basant kii pratham kalii ho saavan kii pahalii barasaat yaa chir virahii do hridayon ke madhur milan kii pahalii raat  kaun ho tum kaun ho 2 kaun ho  pranaya giit kii pratham pankti ho yaa manu kii pahalii santaan nav yauvan kii pratham drishtii ho nayanon kii pahalii pahachaan  kaun ho tum kaun ho 2 kaun ho  2 viraha  kaun ho tum kaun ho o o aa aa aa kaun ho tum kaun ho 2 kaun ho  tum ashaadh kii prathama ghataa ho  yaa pahalaa bijalii kaa baan 2 yaa rimajhim pahalii puhaar kii 2 virahii nayan kii ashru samaan  kaun ho tum kaun ho 2 kaun ho  vikal sindhu men karun bindu ho 2 ghan ghuunghat men indu samaan muuk hridaya kii chhupii huuk ho 2 dukhii jagat ke kampit praan  kaun ho tum kaun ho 2 kaun ho

Title: haae re haae ye mere haath men teraa haath  merii jaan balle balle
Lyrics: rafi haae re haae ye mere haath men teraa haath nae jazbaat        merii jaan balle balle asha oe oe hoe oe oe oe        haae re haae yahii jazbaat rahen din raat to phir kyaa baat        merii jaan balle balle rafi o oe hoe oe oe oe  rafi o o oe        jab se dil men terii tasviir banii hai        yuun lagataa hai jaise taqadiir banii hai asha o o oe        jab se tuu is dil kaa mehamaan huaa hai        jiivan men kushiyon kaa saamaan huaa hai rafi jitanii duur nazar main daaluun chaaron or bahaar hai asha haae re haae        yahii jazbaat rahen din raat threedots merii jaan balle balle rafi oe oe hoe oe oe oe  rafi o o oe        tere ghar shahanaaii jis raat bajegii        terii merii jodii kyaa kuub sajegii asha o o oe        puure honge dil ke aramaan hamaare        aanchal men bhar lenge ham chaand sitaare rafi tere aage chaand sitaare o gorii kyaa chiiz hai asha haae re haae        yahii jazbaat rahen din raat threedots merii jaan balle balle rafi oe oe hoe oe oe oe  rafi o o oe        terii suurat pyaarii are jo bhii dekhe        sach kahataa huun apanaa iimaan hii kho de asha o o oe        terii aankhon men bhii are wo jaaduu hai        jab se aankh milii hai dil beqaabuu hai rafi kud ko kho kar tujhako paayaa kyaa merii taqadiir hai asha haae re haae        yahii jazbaat rahen din raat threedots merii jaan balle balle  rafi oe oe hoe oe oe oe        haae re haae ye tere haath men meraa haath nae jazbaat        merii jaan balle balle asha oe oe hoe oe oe oe        haae re haae yahii jazbaat rahen din raat to phir kyaa baat        merii jaan balle balle

Title: aaj chhedo mohabbat kii shahanaaiyaan
Lyrics: aaj chhedo mohabbat kii shahanaaiyaan dil ke tukade hue aur jigar lut gayaa gam kisii ko milaa aur kisii ko kushii ek ghar bas gayaa ek ghar lut gayaa dil ke tukade hue threedots  ek taraf apane duube sitaaron kaa gam ek taraf apanii lutatii bahaaron kaa gam dil ke lutane kii kisase shiqaayat karuun kuchh idhar lut gayaa kuchh udhar lut gayaa dil ke tukade hue threedots  kisako apanaa kahuun ab main jaauun kahaan koii dekhe muhabbat kii majabuuriyaan dil lagaayaa to dil kii kushii mit gaii sar jhukaayaa jo maine to sar lut gayaa dil ke tukade hue threedots  bujh gayaa dil ab roshanii kyaa karuun le ke ujadii huii zindagii kyaa karuun dil kii qismat men likhii thiin naakaamiyaan laakh maine bachaayaa magar lut gayaa dil ke tukade hue threedots

Title: ajanabii se ban ke karo na ishaaraa
Lyrics: ki  ajanabii se ban ke karo na kinaaraa      khudaaraa idhar bhii dekho      idhar bhii khudaaraa la  aap kaa to dil hai diivaanaa bechaaraa      ishaaraa na samajhegaa ye      nazar kaa ishaaraa  la  ham na padenge nazaron kii chaah men ki  phir chal rahii ho kyon merii raah men la  bekhudii men ham ko mausam ne thaa pukaaraa ki  ajanabii se ban ke threedots  ki  betaab dil hai aisii bhii chaal kyaa la  dil hai tumhaaraa ham jaane haal kyaa ki  dekhiye nazar men afasaanaa hai hamaaraa      aanabii se ban ke threedots

Title: thodii der ke lie mere ho jaao
Lyrics: thodii der ke lie mere ho jaao mere dil merii saanson men kho jaao mere pyaar kii chhaanv men kho jaao mile phir na mile kabhii ham haay thodii der ke lie   le raat koii angadaaii bane saans merii shahanaaii dil meraa lage qismat jage tum baithe adaa se muskaao haay thodii der ke lie   ban jaao shamaa mahafil kii khidakii to khule koii dil kii ghar suunaasuunaa dar suunaasuunaa tumhiin ek chiraag jalaao haay thodii der ke lie

Title: muhabbat jis ko kahate hain vo ik dhadakan puraanii hai
Lyrics: la muhabbat jis ko kahate hain vo ik dhadakan puraanii hai he muhabbat jis ko kahate hain vo ik dhadakan puraanii hai     ye qissaa har nazar kaa hai ye har dil kii kahaanii hai la ye qissaa har nazar kaa hai ye har dil kii kahaanii hai    la kabhii to ye gariibon ke bhii sar pe taaj dharatii hai he kabhii ye baadashaahon ke dilon pe raaj karatii hai la usiike dam pe duniyaa hai isii se zindagaanii hai threedots     la kabhii ye ek bijalii hai kabhii shabanam kaa motii hai he kabhii honthon pe hansatii hai kabhii aankhon men rotii hai  la kabhii ye aag sholaa hai kabhii ye aag paanii hai threedots

Title: jaanejaanaan tumhaare pyaar men shaitaan ban gayaa huun
Lyrics: jaanejaanaan tumhaare pyaar men shaitaan ban gayaa huun kyaakyaa bananaa chaahaa thaa beiimaan ban gayaa huun jaanejaanaan tumhaare threedots  ham to diivaane hain tere naam ke dil lutaa baithe hain jigar thaam ke ishq ne hamako nikammaa kar diyaa varanaa ham bhii the aadamii kaam ke itanaa main gir chukaa huun ki haivaan ban gayaa huun kyaakyaa bananaa threedots  ab to bas patthar kii ek tasviir huun yaa samajh lo ek butepiir huun apane pairon men bandh gaii jo pyaar men aisii ek ulajhii huii zanjiir huun haalat ko dekh ke hairaan ban gayaa huun kyaakyaa bananaa threedots

Title: jay raghunandan jay siyaaraam
Lyrics: ra shriiraamachandraashritapaarijaatah     samastakalyaanagunaabhiraamah      siitaamukhaambhoruhachanchariikah     nirantaranmangalamaatanotu      aa           jay raghunandan jay siyaaraam do jay raghunandan jay siyaaraam aa he dukhabhanjan tumhen pranaam do he dukhabhanjan tumhen pranaam     jay raghunandan jay siyaaraam 2   aa bhraatbhraat ko he parameshvar sneh tumhiin sikhalaate     aa aa aa beautiful alaap here     bhraatbhraat ko he parameshvar sneh tumhiin sikhalaate   ra narnaarii ke prem kii jyoti jag men tumhiin jalaate do o naiyaa ke khevanahaare japuun main tumharo naam     jay raghunandan threedots   ra tum hii dayaa ke saagar prabhu jii tum hii paalanahaare aa chain tumhiin se paae bekal manavaa saanjhsakaare do jo bhii tumharii aas lagaae bane usii ke kaam     jay raghunandan threedots

Title: chham chham naachat aaii bahaar
Lyrics: chham chham naachat aai bahaar      2 paat paat ne lii angadaai jhuum rahii hai daar daar chham chham naachat aai bahaar      2  mahak rahii hai phulavaarii  nikharii kyaarii kyaarii          2 phuul phuul par joban aayaa kalii kalii ne kiyaa singaar chham chham naachat aai bahaar      2  man matavaaraa dole   jaane kyaa kyaa bole        2 nai navelii aashaa jaagii jhuumat manavaa baar baar chham chham naachat aai bahaar      2

Title: thaane kaajaliyo banaalayuun mhaare nainaa men ramaalyuun
Lyrics: la thaane kaajaliyo banaalayuun mhaare nainaa men ramaalyuun 2     raaj palakaan men band kar raakhuunlii     ho ho ho raaj palakaan men band kar raakhuunlii  mu gorii palakaan men niind kaiyaan aavelii     gorii palakaan men niind kaiyaan aavelii aavelii     gorii palakaan men niind kaiyaan aavelii  la mhaarii palakaan paalaniye jhulaavelii jhulaavelii     jhulaavelii palakaan paalaniye jhulavelii     ho mhaare nainaa suun duurduur kaiyaan jaavolaa jii     dholaa kaiyaan jaavolaa jii     thaane chandan haar banaayaluun     thaane chandan haar banaayaluun mhaare hirade suun lagaaluun     chundadii men lhukaae thaane raakhunlii     ho ho ho chundadii men lhukaae thaane raakhunlii  mu gorii chundadii lahar laharaavelii     gorii chundadii lahar laharaavelii laharaavelii     gorii chundadii lahar laharaavelii  la dholaa praanaan men priit jagaavelii     praanaan men priit jagaavelii     ho mhaare hivade sun duurduur kaiyaan jaavolaa jii      dholaa kaiyaan jaavolaa jii				2     thaane motiido banaalyuun     thaane motiido banaalyuun mhaare hotaa suun lagaalyuun     raaj nathanii men baandhakar raakhunlii     thaane kaajaliyo banaalayuun mhaare nainaa men ramaalyuun

Title: saath jiyenge saath marenge  naa jaa mere saathii naa jaa
Lyrics: ra 	saath jiyenge saath marenge 	ye waadaa kyuun tod diyaa 	kud to tum chal pade akele 	hamen raah men chhod diyaa  	naa jaa mere saathii naa jaa 3  	aisii ek aag jagegii 2 	duniyaa shamashaan lagegii 	taare angaare honge 	dharatii kii ruuh jalegii 	phuul kaa rang udegaa 	ambar kaa chaand chhupegaa 	tere bin jiivan saathii 	jiiwan kaa diip bujhegaa  	naa jaa mere saathii naa jaa 3  	aisaa tuufaan uthegaa 2 	ghan ghan baadal garajegaa 	kad kad bijalii kadakegii 	saaraa sansaar jalegaa 	ye dil ab zahar piyegaa 	tere bin kaun jiyegaa 	tuutaa jab jiiwan dhaagaa 	kaise koii zakm siyegaa  	naa jaa mere saathii naa jaa 3

Title: pyaar kii manzil mast safar tum ho hasiin
Lyrics: pyaar kii manzil mast safar tum ho hasiin ham hain javaan saamane tum ho phir bhii hamen hosh nahiin ham hain kahaan pyaar kii manzil threedots  yuun hii sataauungaa din aur raat jab tak na dogii tum haathon men haath 2 ye zid bhii hai kitanii hamako dekhanaa hai pyaar kii manzil threedots  dam se hamaare hai tum par bahaar ehasaan maano jo kiyaa tumase pyaar 2 jalave to laakhon hain kaun puuchhataa hai pyaar kii manzil threedots  maano yaa na maano jii tum ho hasiin ajii dil kii baaton kaa kar lo yaqiin 2 mere dil ko tere dil se pyaar ho gayaa hai pyaar kii manzil threedots

Title: haay re tere chanchal nainavaa
Lyrics: haay re tere chanchal nainavaa kuchh baat karen ruk jaaen  khulake ye baaten kam karen chupake hii chupake sitam karen bas dolen na kuchh bolen palakon pe muskaaen  ulajhe ham se har baar dil kuchh aisaa hai beqaraar dil kuchh tum bhii to samajhaao ham kyaakyaa samajhaaen  ham to chaahat men jal gae tum vaadaa karake badal gae ham kaise jii tum jaise anajaane ban jaaen

Title: kaun aayaa ki nigaahon men chamak jaag uthii
Lyrics: kaun aayaa ki nigaahon men chamak jaag uthii dil ke soe hue taaron men khanak jaag uthii 2 kaun aayaa  kisake aane kii kabar le ke havaaen aaiin 2 jism ke phuul chatakane kii sadaaen aaiin 2 o o o aa  ruuh khilane lagii  2 saanson men mahak jaag uthii dil ke soe hue threedots  kisane ye merii taraf dekh ke baanhen kholiin 2 shok jazbaat ne siine men nigaahen kholiin 2 o o o aa  honth tapane lage  2 zulfon men lachak jaag uthii dil ke soe hue threedots  kisake haathon ne mere haathon se kuchh maangaa hai 2 kisake kvaabon ne merii raaton se kuchh maangaa hai 2 o o o aa  saaz bajane lage  2 aanchal men khanak jaag uthii dil ke soe hue threedots

Title: main to tere hasiin kyaalon men kho gayaa
Lyrics: main to tere hasiin kyaalon men kho gayaa duniyaa ye kah rahii hai ki diivaanaa ho gayaa main to tere threedots  ye husn teraa khilataa huaa saa gulaab hai aankhen terii hasiin gazal kaa shabaab hain tuu laajavaab hai vo kushanasiib hai terii mahafil men jo gayaa main to tere threedots  koii na jisako samajhaa tuu ek aisaa raaz hai mujhako bhii aaj apane muqaddar pe naaz hai tuu dilnavaaz hai aashiq huun terii zulf ke saae men so gayaa main to tere threedots  daaman chhudaa ke jaao naa itane guruur se kyaa hai qasuur puuchhate hain ham huzuur se dekho na duur se kar do kataa muaaf jo honaa thaa ho gayaa main to tere threedots

Title: bahut hasiin hain tumhaarii aankhen
Lyrics: ra 	bahut hasiin hain tumhaarii aankhen kaho to main inase pyaar kar luun la 	badaa hai dhokhaa terii nazar men main kis tarah aitabaar kar luun  ra 	ye bhiinii bhiinii havaa kii kushbuu mahak hai tere hii tan badan kii la 	sambhal ke bolo chatak naa jaae koii navelii kalii chaman kii ra 	merii kalii tum agar kaho to main zindagii ko bahaar kar luun 	bahut hasiin hain threedots  la 	hazaar baaten hain aisii dil men jo ruk gaiin hain zubaan pe aake ra 	jo baat lab pe machal rahii hai vo aaj kah duun nazar milaa ke la 	kisii ke hoke ye chain kho ke main dil ko kyuun beqaraar kar luun 	bahut hasiin hain threedots  la 	ginon naa ab dhadakanen hamaarii naa aur lo imtehaan hamaaraa ra 	ise naa samajho tum aajamaaish yahii to ulfat kaa ishaaraa la 	agar ye sach hai to marate dam tak main aapakaa intazaar kar luun 	bahut hasiin hain threedots

Title: duniyaa kare savaal to ham kyaa javaab den
Lyrics: duniyaa kare savaal to ham kyaa javaab den tumako na ho kayaal to ham kyaa javaab den duniyaa kare savaal   threedots  puuchhe koii ki dil ko kahaan chhod aaye hain kis kis se apanaa rishtaaejaan tod aaye hain mushakil ho arzehaal to ham kyaa javaab den tumako na ho kayaal to   threedots  puuchhe koii ki dardevafaa kaun de gayaa raaton ko jaagane kii sazaa kaun de gayaa kahane se ho malaal to ham kyaa javaab den tumako na ho kayaal to   threedots

Title: chalo jhuumate sar pe baandhe kafan
Lyrics: chalo jhuumate sar pe baandhe kafan lahuu maangatii hai zamiinevatan 2  chalo jhuumate   jahaan ham jiye jahaan ham pale zamiin hai wo dushman ke qadamon tale  2  zamiin mat kaho hai wo apanaa badan apanaa badan  chalo jhuumate sar pe baandhe kafan lahuu maangatii hai evatan chalo jhuumate  mukaalif kaii harik aashiyaan kahiin par baguule kahiin aandhiyaan are lut na jaaye hamaaraa chaman hamaaraa chaman   chalo jhuumate sar pe baandhe kafan lahuu maangatii hai evatan  chale sar liye hathelii pe ham shahiidon ke zindaa lahuu kii qasam ki maranaa vatan pe hamaaraa chalan   chalo jhuumate sar pe baandhe kafan lahuu maangatii hai evatan

Title: jogii jabase tuu aayaa mere dvaare
Lyrics: jogii jabase tuu aayaa mere dvaare mere rang gae saanjh sakaare tuu to ankhiyon men jaanejii kii batiyaan tujhase milanaa hii zulm bhaayaa re o jogii jabase threedots  dekhii saanvalii suurat ye mainaa judaae dekhii saanvalii suurat terii chhabii dekhii jabase re terii chhabii dekhii jabase re nainaa judaae bhae bin kajaraa ye kajaraare  o jogii jabase threedots  jaake panaghat pe baithuun main raadhaa diivaanii jaake panaghat pe baithuun main bin jal lie chalii aayuun bin jal lie chalii aayuun raadhaa diivaanii o jogii jabase tuu threedots  miithii miithii agan ye sah na sakuungii miithii miithii agan ye main to chhuiimuii abalaa re main to chhuiimuii abalaa re sah na sakuungii mere aur nikat mat aa re o jogii jabase tuu threedots

Title: kyaa kyaa na sahe ham ne sitam aap kii khaatir
Lyrics: teraa cheharaa kanval samajhataa huun chaandanii kaa badal samajhataa huun terii aankhen nahiin do misren hain terii aankhen gazal samajahtaa huun  teraa cheharaa subah kaa suuraj hai tujhase milane kii aas rahatii hai tere jalave kahiin bhii roshan ho roshanii dil ke paas rahatii hai  kyaa kyaa na sahe ham ne sitam aap kii khaatir ye jaan bhii jaayegii sanam aap kii khaatir  tadape hain sadaa apanii qasam aap kii khaatir nikalegaa kisii roz ye dam aap kii khaatir  ik aap jo mil jaayen to mil jaaye khudaaii manzuur hain duniyaan ke alam aap kii khaatir  ham aap kii tasaviir nigaahon men chhupaakar jaagaa kiye aqsar shabegam aap kii khaatir  logon ne hamen aap kaa diivaanaa bataayaa aise bhii hue ham pe karam aap kii khaatir  ham raahevafaa se kabhii piichhe na hatenge sun liijiye mit jaayenge ham aap kii khaatir

Title: phir terii kahaanii yaad aaii phir teraa fasaanaa yaad aayaa
Lyrics: phir terii kahaanii yaad aai phir teraa fasaanaa yaad aayaa phir aaj hamaarii aankhon ko phir aaj hamaarii aankhon ko ek kvaab puraanaa yaad aayaa phir terii kahaanii yaad aai threedots  jalate hain chiraagon kii suurat har shaam terii ham yaadon men jab subah ko shabanam rotii hai kho jaate hain ham fariyaadon men      2 jab dil ne koi aavaaz sunii jab dil ne koi aavaaz sunii  teraa hii taraanaa yaad aayaa phir terii kahaanii yaad aai threedots  shaayad kabhii milanaa ho jaae baithen hain isii aramaan men ham tuune to kinaare paa hii liye ulajhe hain magar tuufaan men ham ai jaanevafaa phir aaj hamen ai jaanevafaa phir aaj hamen pichhalaa vo zamaanaa yaad aayaa phir terii kahaanii yaad aai threedots

Title: mil ke bhii ham mil na sake
Lyrics: ta 	mil ke bhii ham mil na sake 2 	kyaa milaa phir pyaar men 2 la 	ham to sanam phuul hain vo 2 	lut gae jo bahaar men 2  ta 	hamane ik diip jalaayaa aandhiyaan chalane lagiin 	bujh gayaa dil dil men laakhon  hasaraten jalane lagiin  2 la 	ham to sanam phuul threedots  la 	dil pe khaa ke chot phir kaamosh rahanaa pyaar hai 	gar kiyaa shiqavaa to samajho  do dilon kii haar hai  2 ta 	mil ke bhii ham threedots

Title: meraa naam hai chamelii
Lyrics: meraa naam hai chamelii main huun maalan alabelii chalii aaii main akelii biikaaner se 2 o daarogaa baabuu bolo jaraa darawajjaa to kholo khadii huun main darawajje pe badii der se meraa naam hai  main baagon se chun chun ke laaii champaa kii kaliyaan 2 ye kaliyaan bichhaake main sajaa duun terii galiyaan re ankhiyaan milaa merii ankhiyon se ho main phuulon kii raanii main bahaaron kii sahelii meraa naam hai  meraa manawaa aise dhadake jaise dole naiyaa 2 o bedardii o harajaaii o baanke sipahiyaa re ghunghataa meraa tainne kyuun kholaa ho main aisii sharmaaii jaise dulhan nayii navelii meraa naam hai

Title: nagamaaosher kii saugaat kise pesh karuun
Lyrics: nagamaaosher kii saugaat kise pesh karuun ye chhalakate hue jazabaat kise pesh karuun  shok aankhon ke ujaalon ko lutaauun kis par mast zulfon kii siyah raat kise pesh karuun  garm saanson men chhipe raaz bataauun kisako narm hothon men dabii baat kise pesh karuun  koi hamaraaz to paauun koi hamadam to mile dil kii dhadakan ke ishaarat kise pesh karuun

Title: mushkil nikalaa dil kaa sambhalanaa
Lyrics: mushkil nikalaa dil kaa sambhalanaa hamane dekhaa laakh sambhal ke 2 unase miliin jab aankhen apanii saagar apane aap hii chhalake mushkil nikalaa dil kaa sambhalanaa  haay fizaa wo mahakiimahakii haay adaa wo bahakiibahakii haay wo rangat dahakiidahakii haay wo aanchal dhalakdhalake 2 mushkil nikalaa dil kaa sambhalanaa  unake wo andaaz hain goyaa saazen beaawaaz hain goyaa unakii nigaahen giit salone unakii adaayen sher gazal ke 2 mushkil nikalaa dil kaa sambhalanaa hamane dekhaa laakh sambhal ke unase miliin jab aankhen apanii saagar apane aap hii chhalake mushkil nikalaa dil kaa sambhalanaa

Title: tum to kahate the  laut aao mere paradesii bahaar aaii hai
Lyrics: tum to kahate the bahaar aayii to laut aauungaa laut aao laut aao    laut aao mere paradesii bahaar aaii hai laut aao laut aao dhru  terii yaadon ne mere kwaabon ko mahakaayaa hai meraa har kwaab teraa mahakaa huaa saayaa hai har tamannaa merii simatii huii angadaaii hai laut aao mere paradesii bahaar aaii hai laut aao laut aao 1  kabhii tanhaaii men jab teraa kayaal aataa hai aap hii aap ye dil meraa dhadak jaataa hai aap hii aap kabhii aankh bhii sharamaaii hai laut aao mere paradesii bahaar aaii hai laut aao laut aao 2  hijr ke dard bhare lamhe guzaaruun kaise ruthanewaale bataa tujhako pukaaruun kaise tuune kyon mujhase na milane kii qasam khaaii hai laut aao mere paradesii bahaar aaii hai laut aao laut aao 3  jis jagah dil meraa dhadakaa thaa terii qurbat men main wahaan ashk bahaatii huun terii furqat men merii rusawaaii tere pyaar kii rusawaaii hai laut aao mere paradesii bahaar aaii hai laut aao laut aao 4  aarazuu ujadii huii maang kisii dulhan kii justajuu suukhii huii badalii koii saawan kii zindagii dard men duubii huii shahanaaii hai laut aao mere paradesii bahaar aaii hai laut aao laut aao 5
