Title: naache man moraa magan dhiigadhaa dhiigi dhiigi
Lyrics: aa aa aathreedots  naache man moraa magan dhiigadhaa dhiigii dhiigii 2 badaraa ghir aaye rut hai bhiigii bhiigii naache man moraa magan dhiigadhaa dhiigii dhiigii 2 dhiigadhaa dhiigii dhiigii dhiigadhaa  kuhuke koyaliyaa kuhuke koyaliyaa kahiin duur papiihaa pukaare jhuulaa jhuulen sakhiyaan jhuulaa jhuulen sakhiyaan ke ghar aajaa baalam hamaare ghir aaye badaraa ghir aaye rut hai bhiigii bhiigii naache man moraa magan dhiigadhaa dhiigii dhiigii naache re man moraa re naache man moraa maganthreedots  yahiin ruk jaaye yahiin ruk jaaye ye shaam aaj dhalane na paaye tuute na ye sapanaa tuute na ye sapanaa koii ab mujhe na jagaaye ghir aaye badaraa ghir aaye  rut hai bhiigii bhiigii naache re man moraa dhiigadhaa dhiigii dhiigii e naache man moraa re naache man moraa maganthreedots  chhup chhup aise men chhup chhup aise men koii madhur giit gaaye giiton ke bahaane giiton ke bahaane chhupii baat honthon pe aaye ghir aaye badaraa ghir aaye  rut hai bhiigii bhiigii naache re man moraa dhiigadhaa dhiigii dhiigii e naache man moraa aa aa naache man moraa maganthreedots

Title: resham kii dorii
Lyrics: rafii resham kii dorii hoy resham kii dorii kahaan jaiiho nindiyaa churaake choriichorii resham kii dorii hoy resham kii dorii hoa o kahaan jaiiho nindiyaa churaake choriichorii lataa ki resham kii dorii haay resham kii dorii kahaan jaauungii main tuu hai chandaa main chakorii piipal kii chhainyaa hoa piipal kii chhainyaa ho o o teriimerii ek jindadii o mere sainyaa piipal kii chhainyaa hoa piipal kii chhainyaa rafii o o o o chhoduun main zamaanaa main naa chhoduun terii bainyaa piipal kii chhainyaa haay piipal kii chhainyaa  lataa imalii ke buute hoa imalii ke buute kal kyuun na aae main na boluun jaao jhuuthe   2 rafii badaa mazaa aae main manaauun aur tuu ruuthe aur tuu ruuthe kothe pe aa rii haay kothe pe aa rii tere naam kar duun jiyaa le aa patavaarii lataa kaisaa patavaarii hoa kaisaa patavaarii e tuu meraa main teriiye to jaane duniyaa saarii kaisaa patavaarii hoa kaisaa patavaarii  lataa parbat pe jharanaa hoa parbat pe jharanaa koii sun legaa chupakechupake baaten karanaa  2 rafii pyaar kiyaa to badanaamii se kyaa daranaa kyaa daranaa lataa kurtaa malamal kaa hoa kurtaa malamal kaa aaj to jaatii huun main lele vaadaa kal kaa kurtaa malamal kaa haay kurtaa malamal kaa rafii o o o o kal kaa bharosaa kyaa bharosaa nahiin pal kaa kurtaa malamal kaa haay kurtaa malamal kaa  rafii ambar pe taare haay ambar pe taare jiine nahiin denge tere nainaa kajaraare  2 lataa jiinaa ho jise vo aae kyuun priitam ke dvaare priitam ke dvaare rafii misarii kii daliyaan haay misarii kii daliyaan pyaar men kaante hain ziyaadaa thodii kaliyaan lataa misarii kii daliyaan hoa misarii kii daliyaan o o o o kaante ho yaa kaliyaan pii kii galiyaan pii kii galiyaana rafii gunagunaanaa lataa gunagunaanaa donon gunagunaanaa

Title: kyaa kabar thii terii mahafil se nikalanaa hogaa
Lyrics: kyaa kabar thii terii mahfil se nikalanaa hogaa dil  na  chaahe  gaa  magar aag pe chalanaa hogaa  shamaa ik raat jalaa kartii hai lekin mujh ko umr bhar ke liye chup chaap pighalanaa  hogaa  chhiin lii payaar kii thandak to zamaane ne kahaa tujh ko ik aatishegumanaam men jalanaa hogaa  band hain maut kii raahen bhii asiiron ke liye jaane is  qaid  se  ab  kaise   nikalanaa   hogaa  aasamaan vaalaa agar meraa  kudaa hai to  use apanii duniyaa ke rivaajon ko badalanaa hogaa

Title: kabhii raazemohabbat  dil kii kahaanii rang laaii hai
Lyrics: kabhii raazemohabbat   dil kii kahaanii rang laaii hai 2 allaa duhaaii hai duhaaii hai 2  saanse hain halkiihalkii aankhen hain chhalakiichhalakii 2 aaj to jaan pe ban aaii hai allaa duhaaii hai threedots  kisii ko bhii muhabbat ke na phande men kudaa daale ye jab chaahe banaa daale ye jab chaahe mitaa daale koii isakaa bharosaa hai na kuchh isakaa thikaanaa hai  koii isakaa  2 bharosaa hai na kuchh isakaa thikaanaa hai kisii ko zindagii dede kisii kaa ghar jalaa daale kyuunki vallaah ye badii harajaaii hai allaa duhaaii hai threedots  hameshaa zindagii se khelate hain ishq ke maare ye apaniiapanii qismat hai koii jiite koii haare are taubaa ye dastuuremohabbat bhii qayaamat hai  are taubaa  3 ye dastuuremohabbat bhii qayaamat hai raho kaamosh to dil ko jalaaen gam ke angaare aur aahen bharo to rusavaaii hai allaa duhaaii hai threedots

Title: mujhe kitanaa pyaar hai tum se apane hii dil se puuchho tum
Lyrics: ra 	mujhe kitanaa pyaar hai tum se apane hii dil se puuchho tum 	jise dil diyaa hai vo tum ho merii zindagii tumhaarii la 	mujhe kitanaa pyaar threedots  ra 	chaahat ne terii mujhako kuchh is tarah se gheraa 	din ko hain tere charche raaton ko kvaab teraa la 	tum ho jahaan vahiin par rahataa hai dil bhii meraa 	bas ik kyaal teraa kyaa shaam kyaa saveraa ra 	mujhe kitanaa pyaar threedots  la 	ye duniyaa kaise badalii kuchh bhii samajh na aae 	kyuun ho gae hain apane kal tak the jo paraae ra 	dil kii lagan ho sachchii phir kyon na rang laae 	mere the tum sadaa se par ab qariib aae la 	mujhe kitanaa pyaar threedots  ra 	merii vafaa ko ab to yuun aajamaanaa chhodo 	dil ko churaa ke mere aankhen churaanaa chhodo la 	mujhako banaa ke apanaa baaten banaanaa chhodo 	main kab na thii tumhaarii ab to sataanaa chhodo ra 	mujhe kitanaa pyaar threedots do 	mujhe kitanaa pyaar threedots

Title: madahosh havaa matavaalii fizaa  dil apanaa diivaanaa lagataa hai
Lyrics: madahosh havaa matavaalii fizaa sansaar suhaanaa lagataa hai kar len na kisii se pyaar kahiin dil apanaa diivaanaa lagataa hai madahosh havaa threedots  raahii huun nayaa anajaan dagar pyaaraa hai badaa jiivan kaa safar 2 nikalaa huun main apanii mastii men maaluum nahiin manzil hai kidhar ye badhate hue bechain qadam paaenge thikaanaa lagataa hai kar len na kisii se threedots  honthon pe hansii aankhon men namii kis baat kii hai duniyaa men kamii jiinaa bhii yahiin maranaa bhii yahiin taqadiir sabhii ko ek milii main jinakii kahaanii dil se sunuun apanaa hii fasaanaa lagataa hai kar len na kisii se threedots kar len na kisii se pyaar kahiin dil apanaa diivaanaa lagataa hai madahosh havaa matavaalii fizaa sansaar suhaanaa lagataa hai madahosh havaa threedots  pal bhar ko na ham aaraam karen do haath hazaaron kaam karen 2 qismat kii shikaayat kyaa karanaa bhagavaan ko kyon badanaam karen ik roz hamaare haathon se badalegaa zamaanaa lagataa hai kar len na kisii se threedots  jo aag tumhaare dil men lage us aag men meraa dil bhii jale dhanavaan ho yaa nirdhan ho koii daataa kii nazar men ek hue insaan se rishtaa insaan kaa is jagah puraanaa lagataa hai kar len na kisii se threedots kar len na kisii se pyaar kahiin dil apanaa diivaanaa lagataa hai madahosh havaa matavaalii fizaa sansaar suhaanaa lagataa hai madahosh havaa threedots  nazaren hain kahiin zulfen hain kahiin har baat javaan har baat hasiin mitataa hai meraa dil mit jaae tuu apanii adaaen rok nahiin andaazejavaanii kyaa kahie thokar men zamaanaa lagataa hai  tum apanii nazar kii bechainii samajhogii nahiin kamasin ho abhii aataa hai mazaa ab jiine men badh jaae hamaarii dil kii lagii dekhaa jo tumhen to yaad aayaa ye dard puraanaa lagataa hai

Title: farishton kii nagarii men main aa gayaa huun main
Lyrics: farishton kii nagarii men main aa gayaa huun main aa gayaa huun main ye raanaaiiyaan dekh chakaraa gayaa huun main aa gayaa huun main   yahaan basane waale bade hii niraale bade siidhe saade bade bhole bhaale patiipatnii mehanat se karate hain khetii to daadaa ko potii sahaaraa hai detii yahaan shiiriin farahaad kandhaa milaa kar hain le aate jhiilon se nadiyaan bahaa kar ye chaandii kii nadiyaan bahe jaa rahii hain kuchh apanii zubaan men kahe jaa rahii hain farishton kiithreedots   kanhaiyaa chalaa dhor ban men charaane to raadhaa chalii saath bansii bajaane bajii baansurii niir aankhon se chhalakaa mujhe ho gayaa hai nashaa halkaa halkaa parinde mere saath gaane lage hain ishaaron se baadal bulaane lage hain hasiin dekh kar muskuraane lage hain kadam ab mere dagamagaane lage hain farishton kiithreedots   are waah lagaa hai yahaan koii melaa to phir is tarah main phiruun kyuun akelaa main jhuule pe baithuungaa chuusuungaa gannaa kisii kaa to huun main bhii hariyaalaa bannaa o bhaiyyaa jii lo ye duannii sanbhaalo chalo maamaa utaro mujhe baithane do farishton kiithreedots

Title: kaliyon ne ghuunghat khole har phuul pe bhanvaraa dole
Lyrics: kaliyon ne ghuunghat khole har phuul pe bhanvaraa dole lo aayaa pyaar kaa mausam gulogulazaar kaa mausam kaliyon ne ghuunghat threedots  o hoy jab tuu chaman men aae har gunchaa muskaraae 2 hai behijaab teraa shabaab ham ho gae diivaane lo aayaa pyaar kaa mausam tere diidaar kaa mausam kaliyon ne ghuunghat threedots  o hoy harsuu teraa nashaa hai har zarraa pii rahaa hai 2 tuu aafataab jaameshabaab roshan hue maikaane lo aayaa pyaar kaa mausam visaaleyaar kaa mausam kaliyon ne ghuunghat threedots  o haay jaanebahaar aa jaa dil ke qaraar aa jaa 2 ye shab ye kvaab ye maahataaab ab to lage tadapaane lo aayaa pyaar kaa mausam mere diladaar kaa mausam kaliyon ne ghuunghat threedots

Title: us ko nahiin dekhaa ham ne kabhii par isakii zaruurat kyaa hogii
Lyrics: mahe   us ko nahiin dekhaa hamane kabhii par isakii zaruurat kyaa hogii dono   ai maan ai maan terii suurat se alag bhagavaan kii suurat kyaa hogii kyaa hogii us ko nahiin dekhaa hamane kabhiithreedots  man    inasaan to kyaa devataa bhii aanchal men pale tere hai svarg isii duniyaa men kadamon ke tale tere mamataa hii lutaaye jisake nayan hothreedots dono   mamataa hii lutaaye jisake nayan aisii koii muurat kyaa hogii ai maan ai maan teriithreedots  mahe   kyon dhuup jalaaye dukhon kii kyon gam kii ghataa barase ye haath duaaon vaale rahate hain sadaa sar pe tuu hai to andhere path men hamen hothreedots dono   tuu hai to andhere path men hamen suuraj kii zaruurat kyaa hogii ai maan ai maan teriithreedots  dono   kahate hain terii shaan men jo koii uunche bol nahiin bhagavaan ke paas bhii maataa tere pyaar kaa mol nahiin ham to yahii jaane tujhase badii hothreedots ham to yahii jaane tujhase badii sansaar kii daulat kyaa hogii ai maan ai maan teriithreedots

Title: ik thaa bachapan
Lyrics: ik thaa bachapan ik thaa bachapan chhotaa saa nanhaa saa bachapan ik thaa bachpan bachapan ke ik baabuujii the achchhe sachche baabuujii the donon kaa sundar thaa bandhan ik thaa bachapan  tehanii par chadhake jab phuul bulaate the haath usake vo tehanii tak naa jaate the bachapan ke nanhe do haath uthaakar vo phuulon se haath milaate the ik thaa bachapan ik thaa bachapan  chalate chalate chalate chalate jaane kab in raahon men baabuujii bas gaye bachapan ki baahon men mutthi men band hain vo suukhe phuul bhii khushabuu hai jiine kii chaahon men ik thaa bachapan ik thaa bachapan  honthon par unakii awaaz bhii hai mere honthon par unakii awaaz bhii hai saanson men saunpaa vishwaas bhii hai jaane kis mod pe kab mil jaayenge wo puuchhenge bachapan kaa ehasaas bhii hai ik thaa bachapan ik thaa bachapanthreedots

Title: teraa meraa pyaar amar phir kyon mujhako lagataa hai dar
Lyrics: teraa meraa pyaar amar phir kyon mujhako lagataa hai dar mere jiivan saathii bataa dil kyon dhadake rahrah kar  kyaa kahaa hai chaand ne jisako sunake  chaandanii har lahar pe jhuumake kyon ye naachane lagii chaahat kaa hai harasuu asar phir kyon mujhako lagataa hai dar  kah rahaa hai meraa dil ab ye raat na dhale khushiyon kaa ye silasilaa aise hii chalaa rahe tujhako dekhuun dekhuun jidhar phir kyon mujhako lagataa hai dar  hai shabaab par umang har khushii javaan hai merii donon baahon men jaise aasmaan hai chalatii huun main taaron par phir kyon mujhako lagataa hai dar

Title: hamen kaale haiin to kyaa huaa dilavaale haiin
Lyrics: hamen kaale haiin to kyaa huaa dilavaale haiin 2 hamen tere tere tere chaahane vaale haiin ham kaale hain to threedots  ye gore gaalaan tandaanaa ye reshamii baalaan tandaanaa ye solaa saalaan tandaanaa haay tere kayaalaan tandaanaa hamen tere tere tere chaahane threedots  aankhaan naarangii kii phaankaan baataan jyuun aise saarangii chaalaan jaise mast sharaabii haalat rangbirangii hamen tere tere tere chaahane threedots  hamen maanaa gariib hain tandaanaa suurat se ajiib hain tandaanaa par phir bhii nasiib hain tandaanaa ke tere kariib hain tandaanaa hamen tere tere tere chaahane threedots   tumen kidhar ko jaataaiin tandaanaa kyuun paas na aataaiin tandaanaa jaanmaar ye bataan tandaanaa diltod ye ghaataan tandaanaa hamen tere tere tere chaahanevaale haiin   aankhaan naarangii kii phaankaan

Title: bahaarehusn terii  jahaan tuu hai vahaan phir chaandanii
Lyrics: bahaarehusn terii  jahaan tuu hai vahaan phir chaandanii ko kaun puuchhegaa 2 teraa dar ho to jannat kii galii ko kaun puuchhegaa jahaan tuu hai threedots  kalii ho haath men le kar bahaaron se na sharamaanaa zamaanaa tujh ko dekhegaa kalii ko kaun puuchhegaa jahaan tuu hai threedots  farishton ko pataa denaa naa apanii rahaguzaaron kaa vo qaafir ho gae to bandagii ko kaun puuchhegaa jahaan tuu hai threedots  kisii ko muskaraa ke kuubasuurat maut naa denaa qasam hai zindagii kii zindagii ko kaun puuchhegaa jahaan tuu hai threedots

Title: dil meraa tumhaarii adaaen le gaiin
Lyrics: dil meraa tumhaarii adaaen le gaiin 2 dil chhiin lene vaalii nigaahen le gaiin dil meraa tumhaarii threedots  mukhade pe giratii ye zulfen sambhaalie naazuk hai dil meraa yuun naa uchhaalie jaan merii ye qaatil jafaaen le gaiin dil meraa tumhaarii threedots  faslebahaar hai din hain shabaab ke paanv zamiin par nahiin padate janaab ke bahaaren to badhake balaaen le gaiin dil meraa tumhaarii threedots  bijalii giraaoge yaa fitane jagaaoge ghabaraa ke merii hii baanhon men aaoge ye baazii to merii duaaen le gaiin dil meraa tumhaarii threedots

Title: itanaa husn pe huzuur naa guruur kiijie
Lyrics: itanaa husn pe huzuur naa guruur kiijie dil ke maaron kaa kyaal kuchh zaruur kiijie  yuun na pherie nazar mud ke dekhie idhar kahie jo bhii chaahie itanii arz hai magar jo hain aapake unhen yuun na duur kiijie itanaa husn pe huzuur threedots  roko zulf ko yahiin qaabuu dil pe ab nahiin ye diivaanaa aapakaa zulfen chhuu na le kahiin yuun na ruuth ke hamen majabuur kiijie itanaa husn pe huzuur threedots  yah to jaanate hain ham gussaa tum nahiin sanam jaatejaate aapake ab to ruk gae qadam  kahie hai naa dil kii baat  2 manzuur kiijie itanaa husn pe huzuur threedots

Title: tere chehare se hate aankh to duniyaa dekhuun
Lyrics: tere chehare se hate aankh to duniyaa dekhuun saamane tuu hai tujhe dekh ke ab kyaa dekhuun  raat zulfon men terii din tere rukasaaron men ek hii vaqt ye dinraat kaa jalavaa dekhuun tere chehare se hate threedots  tere jalavon kii bahaar bhii tamaashaaii banii main bhii dil thaam ke kab tak ye tamaashaa dekhuun tere chehare se hate threedots  dekhataa huun ki nazaare bhii tujhe dekhate hain tuu hii batalaa de ki main kisakaa nazaaraa dekhuun tere chehare se hate threedots

Title: kuchh dil ne kahaa kuchh bhii nahiin
Lyrics: kuchha dila ne kahaa kuchha bhii nahiin  2 aisii bhii baaten hotii hain  2 kuchha dila ne kahaa kuchha bhii nahiin  letaa hai dila angadaaiyaan isa dila ko samajhaaye koi aramaana naa aankhen khola den rusavaa naa ho jaaye koi palakon kii thandii seja para sapanon kii pariyaan sotii hain aisii bhii baaten hotii hain  2 kuchha dila ne kahaa kuchha bhii nahiin  dila kii tassalii ke liye jhuuthii chamaka jhuuth nikhaara jiivana to suunaa hii rahaa saba samajhe aayii bahaara kaliyon se koii puuchhataa hansatii hain yaa rotii hain aisii bhii baaten hotii hain  2 kuchha dila ne kahaa kuchha bhii nahiin

Title: ban ke chakorii gorii jhuumjhuum naacho rii
Lyrics: ban ke chakorii gorii jhuumjhuum naacho rii ban ke chakorii gorii jhuumjhuum  rut laharaae aanchal ban ke taare hanse jab paayal chhanake jhaanke baadal se chandaa daare nainon kaa phandaa ulajhii zulfon kii dorii jhuum jhuum naacho rii threedots  jhuum rahii hai har raat kii gangaa diipak naache gaae patangaa aankhon ne daalaa gheraa phir bhii matavaalaa teraa aayaa hai chorii chorii jhuum jhuum naacho rii threedots  kabhii chale tan ke kabhii jhuk jaae niil gagan dole ruk jaae naach jaa kaajal vaalii rainaa hai kaalii kaalii o gorii gorii chhorii jhuum jhuum naacho rii threedots

Title: kyaa jaanuun saajan hotii hai kyaa gam kii shaam
Lyrics: kyaa jaanuun saajan hotii hai kyaa gam kii shaam jal uthe sau diye jab liyaa teraa naam kyaa jaanuun saajan threedots  kaanton men main khadii  nainon ke dvaar pe nis din bahaar ke dekhuun sapane chehare kii dhuul kyaa  chandaa kii chaandanii utarii to rah gaii mukh pe apane kyaa jaanuun saajan threedots  jabase milii nazar  maathe pe ban gaye bindiyaa nayan tere dekho sajanaa dhar lii jo pyaar se  merii kalaayiyaan piyaa terii ungaliyaan ho gaii kanganaa kyaa jaanuun saajan threedots

Title: duniyaa men mohabbat vaalon kii taqadiir
Lyrics: duniyaa men mohabbat vaalon kii taqadiir badalatii rahatii hai 2 shiishaa to vahii rahataa hai magar tasviir badalatii rahatii hai duniyaa men mohabbat threedots  khoe the kushii ke kvaab men ham jab aankh khulii kuchh bhii naa rahaa 2 ulfat ke sunahare kvaabon kii taabiir badalatii rahatii hai shiishaa to vahii threedots  duniyaa hai ye vo duniyaa jisamen ek dard mite ek dard mile 2 qaidii to vahii rahataa hai magar zanjiir badalatii rahatii hai shiishaa to vahii threedots  ham to ye duaaen karate the aabaad rahe duniyaa apanii 2 lekin ye hamen maaluum na thaa taasiir badalatii rahatii hai shiishaa to vahii threedots

Title: bagaawat kaa  jay jananii jay bhaarat maan
Lyrics: bagaawat kaa khulaa paigaam detaa huun jawaanon ko are utho uth kar mitaa do tum gulaamii ke nishaanon ko jay jananii jay bhaarat maan 3  utho gangaa kii godii se utho sataluj ke saahil se utho dakkhan ke siine se utho bangaal ke dil se nikaalo apanii dharatii se bideshii hukmaraanon ko  utho uth kar mitaa do tum gulaamii ke nishaanon ko jay jananii jay bhaarat maan 3  kizaan kii qaid se ujadaa chaman aazaad karanaa hai hamen apanii zamiin apanaa chaman aazaad karanaa hai jo gaddaarii sikhaayen khiinch lo unakii zabaanon ko  utho uth kar mitaa do tum gulaamii ke nishaanon ko jay jananii jay bhaarat maan 3  ye saudaagar jo is dharatii pe qabzaa kar ke baithe hain hamaare kuun se apane kazaane bhar ke baithe hain inhen kah do ke ab waapas karen saare kazaanon ko  utho uth kar mitaa do tum gulaamii ke nishaanon ko jay jananii jay bhaarat maan 3  jo in kheton kaa daanaa dushmanon ke kaam aanaa hai jo in kaanon kaa sonaa ajanabii deshon ko jaanaa hai to phuunko saarii faslon ko jalaa do saarii kaanon ko  utho uth kar mitaa do tum gulaamii ke nishaanon ko jay jananii jay bhaarat maan 3  bahut jheliin gulaamii kii balaayen ab na jhelenge chadhenge phaansiyon par goliyon ko hans ke jhelenge unhiin par mod denge unakii topon ke dahaanon ko  utho uth kar mitaa do tum gulaamii ke nishaanon ko

Title: sajan laagii torii lagan man maa
Lyrics: sajan laagii torii lagan man maa laaj mohe aae haay re haae lagaaii taine kaisii agan man maa sajan laagii threedots  har aahat par dhadake manavaa chhanake paayal morii dhanake kanganavaa tore bin rasiyaa more manabasiyaa pal pal hove chubhan man maa sajan laagii threedots  milane kii rainaa mahake sajariyaa mahake sajariyaa raamaa bahake kajariyaa sautan dwaare jaiyo naa saanwariyaa jal jal jaaye dulhan man maa sajan laagii threedots

Title: raat aur din diyaa jale mere man men phir bhii andhiyaaraa hai
Lyrics: raat aur din diyaa jale mere man men phir bhii andhiyaaraa hai jaane kahaan hai vo saathii tuu jo mile jiivan ujiyaaraa hai raat aur dinthreedots  pag pag man meraa thokar khaae chaand suuraj bhii raah na dikhaae aisaa ujaalaa koii man men samaae jisake piyaa kaa darshan mil jaae raat aur dinthreedots  gaharaa ye bhed koii mujhako bataae kisane kiyaa hai mujhapar anyaay jisakaa hii diip vo bujh nahiin paae jyoti diye kii duuje ghar ko sajaae raat aur dinthreedots  khud nahiin jaanuun dhuundhe kisako nazar kaun dishaa hai man kii dagar kitanaa ajab hai ye dil kaa safar jiyaraa men aae jaise koii lahar raat aur dinthreedots

Title: taaron kii thandii chhainyaa  saiyaan yaad rahe
Lyrics: su 	taaron kii thandii chhainyaa hamtum mile 	o saiyaan yaad rahe o saiyaan yaad rahe mu 	bhiigiibhiigii miithii ratiyaan pyaariipyaarii batiyaan 	sajanii yaad rahe o sajanii yaad rahe  su 	piihuupiihuu bole kahiin duur se papiiharaa jii duur se papiiharaa 	piyaapiyaa bole moraa matavaaraa jiyaraa 	kaliyon pe bhanvaraa dole haulehaule 	saiyaan yaad rahe threedots  mu 	laten ghungharaalii kaalii goraagoraa ruup hai jo goraagoraa ruup hai 	kaisaa ye jaaduu dekhaa chhaanv men ghuup hai 	ghuunghat men chhup ke jhaanke nain tore baanke 	sajanii yaad rahe threedots  su 	laharon pe chhamchham naache chandaa kii chandaniyaa 	banthan ke aaii dekho raat kii dulhaniyaa 	taaron kii baaraat aaii baaje shahanaaiyaan 	saiyaan yaad rahe threedots

Title: chale ho kahaan sarakaar hamen beqaraar kar ke
Lyrics: ra 	chale ho kahaan sarakaar hamen beqaraar kar ke la 	hamaarii kushii koii roke hai kyon taqaraar kar ke  ra 	kuchh to bataao udaae lie jaatii hai kisakii lagan la 	jaane merii paayal ki jaane mere nainaa yaa jaane meraa man ra 	magar kuchh hamase bhii kaho to sahii la 	hamaarii kushii koii threedots  	kaho paradesii iraadaa kisii ulte safar kaa hai kyaa ra 	ye kaam terii tiikhii nazar kaa hai kyaa la 	main samajhii nahiin phir se kaho to sahii ra 	chale ho kahaan threedots  	khud kare chorii uupar se munhzorii adaa hai kisakii la 	mat ulajhanaa hamaare piichhe aanaa khataa hai kisakii ra 	hamiin se huii galatii suno to sahii la 	hamaarii kushii koii threedots

Title: jab se ham tum bahaaron men ho baithe gum nazaaron men
Lyrics: jab se ham tum bahaaron men ho baithe gum nazaaron men jaise ye zindagii pyaasii aankhon kaa kvaab hai  honthon pe pyaar kii miithii sii raaginii chahare pe aarazuu kii dhiimiidhiimii roshanii merii dhadakan terii baaten tere jalave merii aankhen jaise ye roshanii jaagii aankhon kaa kvaab hai  jo nainaa mod ke do nainaa jod de jo itanaa shokh hai vo sharmaanaa bhii chhod de ye shokhii sii nigaahon kii ye chorii sii adaaon kii jaise ye dillagii jaagii aankhon kaa kvaab hai

Title: qasam kudaa kii yaqiin  tumhen mohabbat hai
Lyrics: qasam kudaa kii yaqiin  aa 	tumhen mohabbat hai hamase maanaa bataao isakaa sabuut kyaa hai 2 ra 	ye haath siine pe rakh ke dekho na puuchho isakaa sabuut kyaa hai aa 	tumhen mohabbat hai threedots  	ye dil kii dhadakan ye sard aahen yahii shiqaayat hai har kisii ko 2 	naii balaa ko jab bhii dekhaa to pyaar karane lage usii se 	naii bhalaa isamen baat kyaa hai ki ye fasaanaa bahut sunaa hai ra 	ye haath siine pe threedots aa 	tumhen mohabbat hai threedots  ra 	jo aag siine men hai hamaare tumhaare hotii to jaan lete 2 	bagair koii sabuut maange hamaarii chaahat ko maan lete 	tumhaarii aankhon men kaash hotaa hamaarii aankhon men jo nashaa hai 	ye haath siine pe threedots aa 	tumhen mohabbat hai threedots  	yahii nashaa jo rahe hameshaa to ham bhii chaahat kaa jaam pii len 2 	ye dauresaagar yuun hii chalegaa to le ke saaqii kaa naam pii len 	magar ye ham par qaram kii nazaren badal na jaaengii kyaa pataa hai ra 	ye haath siine pe threedots aa 	tumhen mohabbat hai threedots  ra 	hamen to saaqii se vaastaa hai suraahii badale yaa jaam badale 2 	tere diivaane kabhii na badalenge chaahe saaraa nijaam badale 	tere hii qadamon men jaan denge ye dil tujhe jab de diyaa hai aa 	tumhen mohabbat hai threedots

Title: jaan pahachaan ho
Lyrics: jaan pahachaan ho jiinaa aasaan ho dil ko churaanevaalon aankh na churaao naam to bataao jaan pahachaan ho   threedots  haay aaj kii ye shaam javaan yuun na chalii jaaye phir se na aayegii ye kisiike bulaaye yaa yaa jaan pahachaan ho   threedots  bolo ye na bolo tum ho gaye ishaare siidhii siidhii chot huii dil pe hamaare yaa uu haa haa jaan pahachaan ho   threedots  chupchup dekhaa  dekhii nazaren diivaanii zaraa sii ye baat ban jaaye na kahaanii haay uu ah ah jaan pahachaan ho   threedots

Title: ai dil kisii kii yaad men hotaa hai beqaraar kyuun
Lyrics: ai dil kisii kii yaad men hotaa hai beqaraar kyuun jisane bhulaa diyaa tujhe usakaa hai intazaar kyuun  wo na milegaa ab tujhe jisakii tujhe talaash hai raahon men aaj bekafan terii wafaa kii laash hai ye to zaraa bataa mujhe tuune kiyaa thaa pyaar kyuun ai dil kisii kii yaad men hotaa hai beqaraar kyuun  aansuu jo hain ruke huye hans ke inhen bahaa bhii de kitane hain daag pyaar ke ro kar inhen mitaa bhii de tuune hai phir banaa liyaa gam ko gale kaa haar kyuun ai dil kisii kii yaad men hotaa hai beqaraar kyuun  aayegii tujhamen roshanii ab na kisii ke naam se tuu wo diyaa hai mere dil jo ke bujhaa ho shaam se phuutegii phir koii kiran tujhako hai aitabaar kyuun  ai dil kisii kii yaad men hotaa hai beqaraar kyuun jisane bhulaa diyaa tujhe usakaa hai intazaar kyuun

Title: huzuurevaalaa jo ho ijaazat to ham ye saare jahaan se kah den
Lyrics: huzuurevaalaa jo ho ijaazat  to ham ye saare jahaan se kah den tumhaarii adaaon pe marate hain ham ye kisane kahaa hai ki darate hain ham huzuurevaalaa threedots  kyon na kah den mohabbat khudaa hai ye haqiiqat nahiin hai to kyaa hai o dil vaale daanv lagaa le kar diyaa dil ko tere havaale badaa lutf chhup chhup ke jalane men hai mazaa tiir khaake sambhalane men hai huzuurevaalaa threedots  dekhiye to zaraa muskuraa ke kaun baithaa hai pahaluu men aake o dil vaale daanv lagaa le kar diyaa dil ko tere havaale ye niichii nigaahen gazab kar gain pataa naa chalaa zulm kab kar gain huzuurevaalaa threedots

Title: na kisii kii aankh kaa nuur huun
Lyrics: na kisii kii aankh kaa nuur huun na kisii ke dil kaa qaraar huun jo kisii ke kaam na aa sakaa main vo ek mushtegubaar huun  na to main kisii kaa habiib huun na to main kisii kaa raqiib huun jo bigad gayaa vo nasiib huun jo ujad gayaa vo dayaar huun jo kisii ke threedots  meraa rangruup bigad gayaa meraa yaar mujhase bichhad gayaa jo chaman fizaan men ujad gayaa main usii kii faslebahaar huun jo kisii ke threedots

Title: ham to tere aashiq hain sadiyon puraane
Lyrics: ham to tere aashiq hain sadiyon puraane chaahe tuu maane chaahe na maane  ham bhii zamaane se hain tere diivaane chaahe tuu maane chaahe na maane  aaii hain yuun pyaar se javaaniyaan aramaan dil men hai dil mushkil men hai jaanetamannaa tere isii pyaar kii kahaaniyaan har mahafil men hain sabake dil men hain jaanetamannaa chhedate hain sab mujhako apane begaane chaahe tuu maane threedots  socho mohabbat men kabhii haath se daaman chhuute to do dil ruuthe to to phir kyaa ho aisaa na ho kaash kabhii pyaar men vaade tuute to do dil ruuthe to to phir kyaa ho ham to chale aaen sanam tujhako manaane chaahe tuu maane threedots  mast nigaahon se is dil ko mast banaae jaa aur pilaae jaa pyaar ke saagar dil pe bade shauk se sitamagar thes lagaae jaa tiir chalaae jaa yaad rahe par tiir kabhii ban jaate hain khud nishaane chaahe tuu maane threedots

Title: tujhe milii roshanii mujhako andheraa
Lyrics: tujhe milii roshanii mujhako andheraa 2 saaraa jahaan hai badagumaan koii nahiin meraa yahaan tujhe milii roshanii threedots  chale the basaane do dil ik din javaanjavaan naiinaii duniyaa mujhe to milaa naa raastaa koii ho tumhiin badhe chale gae tanahaa ab tuu kahaan aur main kahaan main huun zamiin tuu aasamaan tujhe milii roshanii threedots  ghadiighadii chaahaa main mar jaauun ghadiighadii tuune mujhe rokaa aaii terii yaaden aise chhupake kabhiikabhii huaa teraa dhokhaa dekhaa jahaan teraa nishaan gaane lagii tanahaaiyaan tujhe milii roshanii threedots

Title: aankhon se kaajal kii lekar siyaahii  mere pahalepahale pyaar
Lyrics: aankhon se kaajal kii lekar siyaahii likhaa hai ye kat sanam tere naam mere pahalepahale pyaar mere pahalepahale pyaar tujhe meraa salaam  2 aankhon se kaajal kii lekar siyaahii  aa haa haa  dil ko banaayaa kaagaz kaa tukadaa us par likhaa mainne furaqat kaa dukhadaa  2 tum bin na subah merii tum bin na shaam  mere pahalepahale pyaar mere pahalepahale pyaar tujhe meraa salaam aankhon se kaajal kii lekar siyaahii  aa haa haa  parades jis din se tum ho sidhaare raaten guzaaruun main gingin ke taare  2 ashqon ke vaastaa yaa aahon se kaam  mere pahalepahale pyaar mere pahalepahale pyaar tujhe meraa salaam aankhon se kaajal kii lekar siyaahii likhaa hai ye kat sanam tere naam mere pahalepahale pyaar mere pahalepahale pyaar tujhe meraa salaam aankhon se kaajal kii lekar siyaahii

Title: likhopadhoge to aage badhoge
Singer: lata rafi sheikh mukhtar honey irani chorus
Lyrics: b se bolo kyaa hotaa hai bahaadur   likhopadhoge to aage badhoge sitaaron se uunchaa tumhaaraa hogaa naam  2 samajhe naa  chhuttii mile to khilaunon se khelo 2 jaldii se phir tum kitaabon ko le lo 2 jii naa churaao baaten naa banaao jaahil rahoge to hoge badanaam  likhopadhoge to aage badhoge sitaaron se uunchaa tumhaaraa hogaa naam  alif se bolo kyaa hotaa hai ulluu an an imaan duniyaa men dekho imaanadaar rahanaa 2 jhuuth nahiin achchhaa sadaa sach kahanaa 2 dil ko kisii ke tum na dukhaanaa aisii hii nekii karo subahshaam  likhopadhoge to aage badhoge sitaaron se uunchaa tumhaaraa hogaa naam  achchhaa bolo b se kyaa hotaa hai bandar bahaadur banake bahaadur tum apane vatan ke 2 nigehabaa haan rahanaa tum apane chaman ke 2 isako sambhaalo gale se lagaa lo ho aazaad ab to na honaa phir gulaam  likhopadhoge to aage badhoge sitaaron se uunchaa tumhaaraa hogaa naam  achchhaa munnaa bolo te se kyaa hotaa hai tiitar taqadiir taqadiir kyaa hai tum isako bhulaa do 2 ilm hunar se andhere mitaa do 2 badhate chalo tum qadam ko milaa ke phir aayegii manzil karegii salaam  likhopadhoge to aage badhoge sitaaron se uunchaa tumhaaraa hogaa naam  m se bolo kyaa hotaa hai murgaa mazaduur mazaduur nikale hain taan ke siinaa 2 tum bhii karo kuchh aur siikh lo jiinaa 2 mehanat karoge samajhe haan to phal bhii milegaa badon ne kahaa hai aaraam hai haraam   likhopadhoge to aage badhoge sitaaron se uunchaa tumhaaraa hogaa naam  2   kuchh to bataao kahaan kho gaye ho 2 baat kyaa huii jo kafaa ho gaye ho 2 munh na chhipaao suratiyaa dikhaao sun lo hamaare ye dil kaa payaam  shiin se bolo kyaa hotaa hai munnaa jawaab do sher

Title: moko piihar men mat chhed re baalam
Film: mujhe jeene do cry for life
Lyrics: moko piihar men mat chhed re baalam bhar le dhiire jigariyaa men  bharii jawaanii morii dekhake baalam mohe chhedo na 2 raajaa biich dagariyaa men  tumaro sasuro maay ko mero vo to jag rahii 2 bhaavaj kothariyaa men  bhor hot tore sang chaluungii phir rahuungii main2 raajaa  tumharii atariyaa men

Title: lagii tumase lagan saathii chhuute na
Lyrics: lagii tumase lagan saathii chhuute na naataa janam janam kaa tuute na  chaahe qisamat hamako thukaraaye chaahe duniyaa dushaman ban jaaye chaahe sab ruuth jaaye lagii tumase lagan   threedots  ye priit ke hain naazuk dhaage duniyaa kii nazar na lage koii pyaar hamaaraa luute na lagii tumase lagan   threedots

Title: yahii vo jagah hai yahii vo fizaa hai
Lyrics: yahii vo jagah hai yahii vo fizaa hai yahin par kabhi ap hamase mile the inhen ham bhala kis tarah bhul jayen yahin par kabhi ap hamase mile the yahi vo jagah hai threedots  yahin par mera hath hathon men lekar kabhi na bichhadane ka vada kiya tha sada ke liye ho gae ham tumhare gale se laga kar hamen ye kaha tha kabhi kam na hongi hamari vafaen yahin par kabhi ap hamase mile the yahi vo jagah hai threedots  yahin par vafa ka naya rang bhar ke banai thi chahat ki tasavir tumane yahin ki baharon se phulon ko chun kar sanvari thi ulafat ki taqadir tumane vo dil apako yad kaise dilaye yahin par kabhi ap hamase mile the yahi vo jagah hai threedots

Title: chale the saath mil kar chalenge saath mil kar
Lyrics: chale the saath mil kar chalenge saath mil kar 2 tumhen rukanaa padegaa merii aavaaz sun kar chale the saath threedots  hamaarii jaan le lengii tumhaarii ye adaaen hamen jiine na dengii tumhaarii ye nigaahen samajh lo baat dil kii tumhen denge duaaen chale the saath threedots  badaa pyaasaa hai ye dil ise madahosh kar do bhadak uthe hain shole inhen kaamosh kar do hamaaraa hosh le lo hamen behosh kar do chale the saath threedots

Title: meraa pyaar bhii tuu hai ye bahaar bhii tuu hai
Lyrics: meraa pyaar bhii tuu hai ye bahaar bhii tuu hai tuu hii nazaron men jaanetamannaa tuu hii nazaaron men  tuu hii to meraa niil gagan hai pyaar se raushan aankh uthaaye aur ghataa ke ruup men tuu hai kaandhe pe mere sar ko jhukaaye mujhape laten bikharaye meraa pyaar threedots  manzil mere dil kii vahii hai saayaa jahaan diladaar hai teraa parbat parbat terii baahen gulashan gulashan pyaar hai teraa mahake hai aanchal meraa meraa pyaarthreedots  jaagii nazar kaa khvaab hai jaise dekh milan kaa din ye suhaanaa aankh to mere jalavon men gum hai dekhuun tujhe yaa dekhuun zamaanaa bekhud hai diivaanaa meraa pyaarthreedots  main huun akelaa kab se magar tuu aaj bhii mere saath ho jaise yaad men terii yuun bhii huaa hai haath men teraa haath ho jaise bhuul sakuun to kaise meraa pyaarthreedots

Title: mere bhaiyaa mere chandaa mere anamol ratan
Lyrics: mere bhaiyaa mere chandaa  mere anamol ratan  tere badale main zamaane kii  koii chiiz na luun 2  terii saanson kii kasam khaake havaa chalatii hai tere chahare kii khalak paake bahaar aatii hai ek pal bhii merii nazaron se tuu jo ojhal ho har taraf merii nazar tujhako pukaar aatii hai  mere bhaiyaa mere chandaa  mere anamol ratan  tere badale main zamaane kii  koii chiiz na luun 2  tere chahare kii mahakatii huii ladiyon ke lie anaginat phuul ummiidon ke chune hain mainne vo bhii din aaen ki un kvaabon ke taabiir milen tere kaatir jo hasiin kvaab bune hain mainne  mere bhaiyaa mere chandaa  mere anamol ratan  tere badale main zamaane kii  koii chiiz na luun 2

Title: vo chale jhatak ke daaman merii aarazuu mitaa ke
Lyrics: vo chale haan vo chale vo chale jhatak ke daaman merii aarazuu mitaa ke mitaa ke meraa dil vo le gae hain mujhe raah men bithaa ke bithaa ke  koii unase itanaa kah de main unhiin kaa ho chukaa huun 2 unhen kyaa milegaa aakir mujhe is tarah jalaa ke jalaa ke vo chale jhatak ke threedots  na bujhegii baadalon se na bujhegii aansuon se 2 mere dil kii dhadakanon men gae aag jo lagaa ke lagaa ke vo chale jhatak ke threedots  ye qadam bahak rahe hain mujhe do koii sahaaraa 2 vo nazarnazar se mujhako gae jaane kyaa pilaa ke pilaa ke vo chale jhatak ke threedots

Title: ghuunghat hataa na denaa goriye
Lyrics: ghuunghat hataa na denaa goriye chandaa sharam se duubegaa ho kahiin muskuraa na denaa baliye chandaa sharam se duubegaa kajaraarii matawaarii rasabharii ankhiyon se ui sthaayii  dekh ke tere gaal gulaabii bhanwaraa dhokhaa khaaye tere tiir kaa maaraa mukh se paanii maang na paaye ye ghuunghat 2 ye ghuunghat hataa na denaa goriye 1  chadhatii umar machalatii nadiyaa mastii men laharaaye kuul kinaaraa kuchh na dekhe bahaa ke sab le jaaye ye ghuunghat 2 ye ghuunghat hataa na denaa goriye 2  bol tere misarii se miithe jo sun le lut jaaye jagmag ruup kare ujiyaalaa diipak kaun jalaaye ye ghuunghat 2 ye ghuunghat hataa na denaa goriye 3

Title: khanake to khanake kyon khanake meraa kanganaa
Lyrics: aa khanake to khanake kyon khanake jab raat ko chamake taare      meraa kanganaa haay haayare meraa kanganaa ra are samajho to samajho yun samajho ye ham ko karen ishaare      teraa kanganaa haae haayare teraa kanganaa  aa kanganaa thaamun paayal bole aanu kaun bahaane se      aanu kaun bahaane se ey ra jin ko milanaa hai yaaron se darate nahiin zamaane se      darate nahiin zamaane se      roke to duniyaa kyaa roke      o roke to duniyaa kyaa roke jab ham hai pyaar ke maare      teraa kanganaa haay haayare teraa kanganaa aa khanake to khanake threedots  tidir taadilaa lidilar lidilar tidir tadilaa hoi hoi  ra aaye javaanii jab mastaanii roke laaj ke pahare naa      roke laaj ke pahare naa hoi aa ghunghat ke pat khul khul jaaye sar pe aanchal thahare naa      sar pe aanchal thahare naa      soche to soche kyaa soche      are soche to soche kyaa soche jab nain mile matavaare      meraa kanganaa haae haayare meraa kanganaa ra are samajho to samajho  threedots  aa a aa a aa o o o o o  aa pyaar hai dhokhaa jaane duniyaa phir dil dhokhaa khaae kyon      phir dil dhokhaa khaae kyon o o ra tu hii bataa de dekh ke ham ko nazar terii sharamaae kyon      nazar terii sharamaae kyon      sarake to sarake kyon sarake      are sarake to sarake kyon sarake aanchal tere sar se pyaare      teraa kanganaa haae haayare teraa kanganaa aa   khanake to khanake threedots  tidir taadilaa lidilar lidilar tidir tadilaa hoi hoi 4

Title: ye rang na chhuutegaa ulfat kii nishaanii hai
Lyrics: ye rang na chhuutegaa ulfat kii nishaanii hai kuchh teraa fasaanaa hai kuchh merii kahaanii hai ye rang na chhuutegaa threedots  laharaa ke uthaa mausam rut banake qaraar aaii aaii to magar kitanaa tarasaa ke bahaar aaii tarasaa ke bahaar aaii par kitanii suhaanii hai ye rang na chhuutegaa threedots  aankhen hain tumhaarii yaa chhalakaa huaa paimaanaa apanaa to muhabbat men dil ho gayaa diivaanaa yaa ham hii diivaane hain yaa rut hii diivaanii hai ye rang na chhuutegaa threedots  dekho na bhulaa denaa in pyaar ke vaadon ko tum bhii na badal denaa chaahat ke iraadon ko jab priit lagii tumase kuchh maine bhii thaanii hai ye rang na chhuutegaa threedots

Title: chaand zard zard hai
Lyrics: chaand zard zard hai chaand zard zard hai mere dil men pyaar kaa halkaa halkaa dard hai  dil hii jaane kitanii kushnasiib huun aaj tere kis qadar qariib huun tuu meraa hai main terii nasiib huun main nasiib huun 2 chaand zard zard hai  threedots  teraa pyaar pyaar hai ki kvaab hai kis qadar ye pyaar behisaab hai tuu mere savaal kaa javaab hai ho javaab hai 2 haay chaand zard zard hai  threedots

Title: koii shiqavaa bhii nahiin koii shiqaayat bhii nahiin
Lyrics: koii shiqavaa bhii nahiin koii shiqaayat bhii nahiin 2 aur tumhen hamase vo pahale sii mohabbat bhii nahiin koii shiqavaa bhii threedots  pyaar ke vaade vafaa hone ke din aae hain 2 ye na samajho kafaa hone ke din aae hain ruuth jaaoge to kuchh duur qayaamat bhii nahiin aur tumhen hamase threedots  ham vahii apanii vafaa apanii mohabbat bhii vahii 2 tum jahaan baith gae apanii jo jannat hai vahii aur duniyaa men kisii chiiz kii chaahat bhii nahiin aur tumhen hamase threedots

Title: khudaaebartar
Lyrics: khudaaebartar terii zamiin par zamiin kii khaatir ye jang kyon hai har ek fatahozafar ke daaman pe khuneiinsaan kaa rang kyon hai khudaaebartar threedots  zamiin bhii terii hain ham bhii tere ye milkiyat kaa savaal kyaa hai ye katlokuun kaa rivaaz kyon hai ye rasmejangojadaal kyaa hai jinhe talab hai jahaan bhar kii unhii kaa dil itanaa tang kyon hai khudaaebartar threedots  gariib maano shariif behanon ko amnoizzat kii zindagii de jinhe ataa kii hai tu ne taaqat unhe hidaayat kii roshanii de saron men kibroguruur kyon hain dilon ke shiishe pe zang kyon hai khudaaebartar threedots  kazaa ke raste pe jaanevaalon ko bach ke aane kii raah denaa dilon ke gulashan ujad na jaae muhabbaton ko panaah denaa jahaan men jashnevafaa ke badale ye jashnetiirotafang kyon hai khudaaebartar threedots  khudaaebartar terii zamiin par zamiin kii khaatir ye jang kyon hai har ek fatahozafar ke daaman pe khuneinsaan kaa rang kyon hai khudaaebartar threedots

Title: mujhe gale se lagaa lo bahut udaas huun main
Lyrics: mujhe gale se lagaa lo bahut udaas huun main gamejahaan se chhudaa lo bahut udaas huun main      yuun intazaar kaa dukh ab sahaa nahiin jaataa tadap rahii hai muhabbat rahaa nahiin jaataa tum apane paas bulaa lo bahut udaas huun main mujhe gale se lagaa lo  bhatak chukii huun bahut zindagii kii raahon men mujhe ab aa ke chhupaalo tum apanii baahon men meraa sawaal naa taalo bahut udaas huun main mujhe gale se lagaa lo  har ek saans men milane kii pyaas palatii hai sulag rahaa hai badan aur ruuh jalatii hai bachaa sako to bachaa lo bahut udaas huun main  game jahaan se chhudaa lo bahut udaas huun main mujhe gale se lagaalo

Title: hoke majabuur mujhe usane bhulaayaa hogaa
Lyrics: hoke majabuur mujhe usane bhulaayaa hogaa zahar chupake se davaa jaanake khaayaa hogaa hoke majabuurthreedots  bhuupindar dil ne aise bhii kuchh afasaane sunaae honge ashq aankhon ne piye aur na bahaae honge band kamare men jo khat mere jalaae honge ek ik harf jabiin par ubhar aayaa hogaa  rafii usane ghabaraake nazar laakh bachaaii hogii dil kii lutatii huii duniyaa nazar aaii hogii mez se jab merii tasviir hataaii hogii har taraf mujhako tadapataa huaa paayaa hogaa hoke majabuurthreedots  talat chhed kii baat pe aramaan machal aae honge gam dikhaave kii hansii ne na chhupaae honge naam par mere jab aansuu nikal aae honge  2 sar na kaandhe se sahelii ke uthaayaa hogaa  mannaa de zulf zid karake kisii ne jo banaaii hogii aur bhii gam kii ghataa mukhade pe chhaaii hogii bijalii nazaron ne kaii din na giraaii hogii rang chahare pe kaii roz na aayaa hogaa hoke majabuurthreedots

Lyrics: tuu nahiin aur sahii aur nahiin aur sahii2 tuu hai harajaai to apanaa bhii yahii aur sahii tuu nahiin aur sahii aur nahiin aur sahii tuu nahiin aur sahii  badii lambii hai zamiin milenge laakh hasiin2 saari duniyaa men sanam tuu akelaa hii nahiin2 jaam aankhon ke bahut hain kahiin ek daur sahii tuu nahiin aur sahii aur nahiin aur sahii tuu nahiin aur sahii  mujhase tuu aankh milaa kyaa kamii hai ye bataa2 tujh pe ummiidevafaa ban gaii ek khataa2 pyaar auron kaa salaamat hai teraa jaur sahii tuu nahiin aur sahii aur nahiin aur sahii tuu nahiin aur sahii2

Lyrics: jiivan jyot jale kouu na jaane kab nikase din aur kab raat dhale jiivan jyot jale   bhor bhae to man musakaae saanjh bhae to niir bahaae ek pal maan kare sansaarii ek pal haath male jiivan jyot jale   man maalaa men daar vo motii jisamen jalii ho prem kii jyoti usii kii naiyaa paar hai jag men jaake kaaj bhale jiivan jyot jale

Title: jhilamil jhilamil laharon kaa aanchal udataa hai chanchal
Lyrics: jhilamil jhilamil laharon kaa aanchal udataa hai chanchal palpal man laharaae yah kaisii halachal  jiivan kalakal man bhii kalakal jhal jhal jhal jhal jhal jhalake sukh kaa saagar pyaasii abhilaashii palakon men chhal chhal chhal chhal chhal chhal chhalake madhu kaa gaagar rimajhim rimajhim barase re tan men man men ras ke baadar pal pal man laharaae yah kaisii halachal  buunden giratiin kaliyaan khilatiin 2 saritaaen saagar se milatiin talamala talamala talamala talamala talamala talamala mere man kii duniyaa hilatii jhiramira jhiramira jhuume re tan men man men bhramaron ke dal palpal man laharaae yah kaisii halachal  jhilamil jhilamil laharon kaa aanchal udataa hai chanchal palpal man laharaae yah kaisii halachal

Title: main ye sochakar usake dar se uthaa thaa
Lyrics: main ye sochakar usake dar se uthaa thaa  ke vo rok legii manaa legii mujhako  havaaon men laharaataa aataa thaa daaman ke daaman pakadakar bithaa legii mujhako  kadam aise andaaz se uth rahe the ke aavaaz dekar bulaa legii mujhako  magar usane rokaa na usane manaayaa na daaman hii pakadaa na mujhako bithaayaa na aavaaz hii dii na vaapas bulaayaa  main aahistaa aahistaa badhataa hii aayaa yahaan tak ke usase judaa ho gayaa main threedots

Title: aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage sapane sachche
Lyrics: aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage sapane sachche lagane lage ahaa aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage sapane sachche lagane lage nain saarii rain jagane lage  ke aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage sapane sachche lagane lage nain saarii rain jagane lage ke aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage sapane sachche lagane lage  baaten yahii hone lagiin gaanv men ho baaten yahii hone lagiin gaanv men chhupatii phiruun main dhuup men chhaanv men zanjiiren faulaad kii hain paanv men magar chhanchhananan ghungharuu bajane lage  ahaa aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage nain saarii rain jagane lage ke aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage sapane sachche lagane lage  ankhiyon ko bhed kholanaa aa gayaa haay ankhiyon ko bhed kholanaa aa gayaa mere man ko bhii dolanaa aa gayaa kaamoshii ko bolanaa aa gayaa dekho giit mere mukh pe sajane lage  ahaa aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage nain saarii rain jagane lage ke aap mujhe achchhe lagane lage sapane sachche lagane lage

Title: kushii bhii milii hamako to gam se bharii
Lyrics: raat kaamoshii se aatii hai chalii jaatii hai zindagii dard ke saanche men dhalii jaatii hai  kushii bhii milii hamako to gam se bharii ajab hai ye qismat kii jaaduugarii kushii bhii milii hamako to gam se bharii ajab hai ye qismat kii jaaduugarii  khoii khoii aajakal dil kii har umang hai jaane zindagii kaa ye kaisaa rang hai kabhii hai andheraa kabhii roshanii kushii bhii milii hamako to gam se bharii ajab hai ye qismat kii jaaduugarii  hasaraten bujhiin bujhiin hausale thake thake milake bhii kisii se ham mil nahiin sake khilii na bahaaron men dil kii kalii kushii bhii milii hamako to gam se bharii ajab hai ye qismat kii jaaduugarii  pyaar kii kushii hamen mil sakii naa pyaar men kitane din guzar gaye intazaar men kahaanii hamaarii adhuurii rahii kushii bhii milii hamako to gam se bharii ajab hai ye qismat kii jaaduugarii

Title: akelaa huun main is duniyaa men
Lyrics: akelaa huun main is duniyaa men koii saathii hai to meraa saayaa akelaa huun man threedots  na to paravaanaa aur na diivaanaa main kisii mahafil kaa soonii soonii raahen thaamatii hain baahen gam kise manzil kaa main to huun raahii dil kaa saathii hai to meraa saayaa akela huun main threedots  jaise kabhi pyaare jhiil ke kinaare hans akelaa nikale vaise hii dekhojii yah man maujii maujon ke siine pe chale chaand sitaron ke tale saathii hai to meraa saayaa akela huun main threedots

Title: zindagii aaj mere naam se sharamaatii hai
Lyrics: zindagii aaj mere naam se sharamaatii hai apane haalaat pe mujhe khud hii hansii aatii hai zindagii aaj mere threedots  ek gam chain se jiine nahiin detaa mujhako 2 ek ulajhan hai jo aksar mujhe tadapaatii hai zindagii aaj mere threedots  is tarah chhod ke nikalaa huun main apanii manzil jaise hasarat koii siine se nikal jaatii hai zindagii aaj mere threedots  raah chalate hue kuchh soch ke ruk jaataa huun 2 har qadam par koii bhuulii huii yaad aatii hai zindagii aaj mere threedots

Title: are o re dharatii kii tarah har dukh sah le
Lyrics: are o re 2 dharatii kii tarah har dukh sah le suuraj kii tarah tuu jalatii jaa 2 sinduur kii laaj nibhaane ko chupchaap tuu aag pe jalatii jaa 2 are o re threedots  dekhii na kushii tuune re koii 2 jiivan se pyaar bhii ruuth gayaa jis ghar ko mandir maanaa thaa vo ghar bhii tujhase chhuut gayaa are o re threedots  apane yug kii har siitaa ko 2 sholon pe bithaayaa jaataa hai daaman kitanaa hii paavan ho par dosh lagaayaa jaataa hai 2 are o re threedots  sansaar tujhii se chalataa hai 2 terii kokh se maut bhii haarii hai bhagavaan kii tarah mahaan hai tuu kahane ko abalaa naarii hai are o re threedots

Title: mere nasiib men ai dost teraa pyaar nahiin
Lyrics: khiza ke phuul pe ati kabhi bahaar nahiin  mere nasiib men ai dost tera pyaar nahiin  mere nasiib men ai dost tera pyaar nahiin threedots  na jane pyaar men kab main zubaan se phir jaaun  main banake aansuu khud apanii nazar se giir jaaun teri qasam hai meraa koi aitabaar nahiin  mere nasiib men threedots  main roz lab pe nai ek aah rakhataa huun  main roz ek naye gam kii raah takataa huun  kisii khushii ka mere dil ko intazaar nahiin  mere nasiib men threedots  gariib kaise mohabbat kare amiiron se  bichhad gaye hain kaii raanjhe apanii hiron se  kisii ko apane muqaddar pe ikhtiyaar nahiin  mere nasiib men threedots  khiza ke phuul pe ati kabhi bahaar nahiin  mere nasiib men ai dost tera pyaar nahiin

Title: haay ruuthe sainyaa hamaare sainyaa kyon ruuthe
Lyrics: haay ruuthe sainyaa ruuthe sainyaa hamaare sainyaa kyon ruuthe naa to ham bevafaa naa to ham jhuuthe ruuthe sainyaa hamaare threedots  chain na aayaa hamen niind na aaii dete rahe saarii rain duhaaii koii unakii bhii haay raam koii unakii bhii yuun hii nindiyaa luute ruuthe sainyaa hamaare threedots  kaise na tadape dil ye diivaanaa sach hii to kahataa hai saaraa zamaanaa laagii chhuute naa chaahe duniyaa chhuute ruuthe sainyaa hamaare threedots  unako manaayaa har ek adaa se haay magar taubaa unakii balaa se  vo naa maane  3 kisii kaa chaahe dil tuute ruuthe sainyaa hamaare threedots

Title: ye raat ye fizaayen phir aaye yaa na aaye
Lyrics: ye raat ye fizaayen phir aaye yaa na aaye aao shamaa bujhaa ke ham aaj dil jalaayen  ye narm sii khaamoshii ye reshamii andheraa kahataa hai zulf kholo ruk jaayegaa saveraa jugunuu se mil ke chamake taare se jhilamilaayen aao shamaa bujhaa ke threedots  bhiigii huii havaayen ab raat dhal rahii hai aise men do dilon kii ik shammaa jal rahii hai ye pyaar kaa ujaalaa mil ke amar banaayen aao shamaa bujhaa ke threedots

Title: aaj hai karavaa chauth sakhii rii
Lyrics: aaj hai karavaa chauth sakhii rii maang le sukh kaa daan apane sapanon ke svaamii kaa dhar kar man men dhyaan  janmjanm tak maang kaa terii rang pade naa phiikaa jab tak chamaken chaandsitaare tab tak chamake tiikaa bandhe rahen manabhaate priitam ke praanon se praan aaj hai karavaa chauth threedots  jo koii maange aaj lagan se yugyug kaa sukh paae saath saphal ho prem amar ho jiivan men ras aae aaj har ik naarii ko prabhu se milataa hai varadaan aaj hai karavaa chauth threedots

Title: terii suurat se nahiin milatii kisii kii suurat
Lyrics: terii suurat se nahiin milatii kisii kii suurat ham jahaan men terii tasviir lie phirate hain terii suurat se threedots  kuub cheharaa hai teraa donon jahaan hain paagal saamane tere hai phiikaa vo hasiin taaj mahal terii zulfon ne sanam dil meraa baandh liyaa tuune ai jaanesitam pyaar kaa jaam diyaa zulf kii ham javaan zanjiir lie phirate hain terii suurat se threedots  ye to duniyaa hai yahaan ek nahiin laakh hasiin jo adaa dekhii hai tujh men vo kisii men bhii nahiin saamanaa teraa jab hogaa to qayaamat bhii hogii aankh jab tujhase milegii to mohabbat bhii hogii pyaar kii ham ajab taabiir lie phirate hain terii suurat se threedots  chaandanii raat bhii zaalim terii parachhaaiin hai aur suuraj ne tere gaalon se chamak paaii hai gar tujhe dekh le kashmiir to sharamaa jaae aur farishtaa jo agar dekh le lalachaa jaae ham nae rang kii ik hiir lie phirate hain terii suurat se threedots

Title: ruk jaa ho ruk jaa rokataa hai ye diivaanaa
Lyrics: ruk jaa ho ruk jaa rokataa hai ye diivaanaa ruuth kar mujhase naa jaanaa dekhane vaale samajhenge ke tuu hai merii mahabuubaa haan ho ruk jaa   ye mausam ye nazaare in phuulon ke ishaare terii suurat ke aashiq ye saare sanam  2 kabhii mast havaa chhedegii tujhe kabhii ham aa jaaenge ruk jaa threedots   baithii hai hasiinaa tuu sabase judaa kyon ai shokadaa kuchh jhuum zaraa naa jal hamaare pyaar pe  2 bikharaa zulfen maayuus naa ho koii tujhase bhii kahegaa ruk jaa threedots   zulf na aise ulajhe duniyaa galat naa samajhe mashahuur ho naa jaae afasaanaa koii  2 ai jaanevafaa are apanaa hai kyaa tujhe chhedegaa zamaanaa ruk jaa threedots

Title: vo hain zaraa khafaa khafaa to nain yuun milaae hain ki ho ho
Lyrics: vo hain zaraa khafaa khafaa to nain yuun milaae hain ki ho ho naa bol duun to kyaa karuun vo hans ke yun bulaae hain ki ho ho  1 hans rahi hai chaandani machal ke ro naa duun kahiin aise koi ruthataa nahin ye teraa khayaal hai kariib aa mere hansiin mujhako tujhase kuchh gilaa nahiin baat yun banaae hain ki o ho threedots vo hain threedots  2 aise mat sataaiye zaraa taras to khaaiye dil ki dhadakan mat jagaaiye kuchh nahin kahungaa main naa ankhiyaan jhukaaiye sar ko kandhe se uthaaiye aise niind aae hai ki ham threedots vo hain threedots

Title: vahaan kaun hai teraa musaafir jaaegaa kahaan
Lyrics: vahaan kaun hai teraa musaafir jaaegaa kahaan dam le le ghadii bhar ye chhaiyaan paaegaa kahaan vahaan kaun hai tera   biit gae din pyaar ke palchhin sapanaa banii vo raaten bhuul gae vo tuu bhii bhulaa de pyaar kii vo mulaaqaaten 2 sab duur andheraa musaafir jaaegaa kahaan   koii bhii terii raah na dekhe nain bichhaaye naa koii dard se tere koii na tadapaa aankh kisii kii naa royii 2 kahe kisako tuu meraa musaafir jaaegaa kahaan   tuune to sabako raah bataaii tuu apanii manzil kyuun bhuulaa sulajhaake raajaa auron kii ulajhan kyuun kachche dhaagon men jhuulaa 2 kyuun naache saperaa kyuun naache saperaa musaafir jaaegaa kahaan   kahate hain gyaanii duniyaa hai faanii paanii pe likhii likhaaii hai sabakii dekhii hai sabakii jaanii haath kisii ke na aayii 2 kuchh teraa naa meraa musaafir jaaegaa kahaan

Title: tum se izahaarehaal kar baithe bekhuudii men kamaal kar baithe
Lyrics: aaj furakat ka khvaab tuut gayaa  mil gaye tum hijaab tuut gayaa   tum se izahaarehaal kar baithe  bekhudii men kamaal kar baithe  tum se izahaarehaal threedots  kho gaye husn ki bahaaron men  kah diyaa raazedil ishaaron men  kaam ham bemisaal kar baithe  bekhudii men kamaal kar baithe  tum se izahaarehaal threedots  kitane majabuur ho gaye dil se  soche samajhe bagair qaatil se  zindagii ka savaal kar baithe  bekhudii men kamaal kar baithe  tum se izahaarehaal threedots  ye adaaen ye shokhiyaan taubaa  bas khudaa hii khudaa hai us dil ka  jo tumhaaraa khayaal kar baithe  bekhudii men kamaal kar baithe  tum se izahaarehaal threedots

Title: raakhii dhaagon kaa tyauhaar
Lyrics: raakhii dhaagon kaa tyauhaar 2 bandhaa huaa ikik dhaage men bhaaiibahan kaa pyaar raakhii dhaagon kaa threedots  kitanaa komal kitanaa sundar bhaaiibahan kaa naataa is naate ko yaad dilaane ye tyauhaar hai aataa bahan ke man kii aashaaen raakhii ke ye taar raakhii dhaagon kaa threedots  bahan kahe mere viir tujhe naa burii najariyaa laage mere raajaa bhaiyyaa tujhako merii umariyaa laage dhan huun paraayaa phir bhii miluungii saal men to ik baar raakhii dhaagon kaa threedots  bhaaii kahe o bahan main terii laaj kaa huun rakhavaalaa guunthuungaa main pyaar se tere aramaanon kii maalaa bhaaiibahan kaa pyaar rahegaa jab tak hai sansaar raakhii dhaagon kaa threedots

Title: bujhaa die hain khud apane haathon
Lyrics: bujhaa die hain khud apane haathon muhabbaton ke diye jalaake merii vafaa ne ujaad dii hain ummiid kii bastiyaan basaake  tujhe bhulaa denge apane dil se ye faisalaa to kiyaa hai lekin na dil ko maaluum hai na ham ko jienge kaise tujhe bhulaake  kabhii milenge jo raaste men to munh phiraakar palat padenge kahiin sunenge jo naam teraa to chup rahenge nazar jhukaake  na sochane par bhii sochatii huun ki zindagaanii men kyaa rahegaa terii tamannaa ko dafn karake tere khayaalon se duur jaake

Title: mere piichhe ik diivaanaa kuchh alabelaa masataanaa
Lyrics: mere piichhe ik diivaanaa kuchh alabelaa masataanaa koii roko re mujh ko sataaye hai  mere aage ik diivaanii hai jisakaa naam javaanii koii dekho re dil ko churaaye hai  machale jo dil teraa kayaa hai qusuur meraa chhodo jii chhodo pichhaa ab to huzuur meraa aisii adaaon pe to koii lutaa jaaye hai  aisii bhii jaladii kayaa hai ham ko bhii saath lelo jaane do gussaa ab to haathon men haath lelo dekho diivaanaa kaisii batiyaan banaaye hai  mujh men janaab bolo aisii kayaa baat dekhii gaalon men din dekhaa baalon men raat dekhii aise naa dekho meraa jiyaa ghabaraaye hai

Title: mohabbat se dekhaa kafaa ho gae hain
Lyrics: mohabbat se dekhaa kafaa ho gae hain hasiin aajakal ke kudaa ho gae hain hasiin aajakal ke threedots  adaaon men thii saadagii ab se pahale vallaah kahaan rang the ye sunahare rupahale o  nazar milate hii  2 kyaa se kyaa ho gae hain hasiin aajakal ke threedots  kisii mod pe ban ke suuraj nikalanaa taubaa kahiin dhuup men chaandanii ban ke chalanaa o  jidhar dekho jalavaa  2 numaan ho gae hain hasiin aajakal ke threedots  yahaan to lagaa dil pe ek zakm gaharaa o yahaan to lagaa dil pe ek zakm gaharaa haay vahaan sirf unakaa ye andaaz thaharaa o kataa kar ke bhii  2 bekataa ho gae hain hasiin aajakal ke threedots
