Title: nazar mere dil ke paar huii
Film: jab pyar kisi se hota hai
Lyrics: nazar mere dil ke paar huii dekho na aise dekho  merii haar huii  2 nazar mere dil threedots  vahii jaanataa hai ke dard kyaa hai kabhii bhuul se jisane  dil kho diyaa  2 nazar mere dil threedots  nigaahen milii aur vo muskaraae bas itane men sab ho gayaa haay haay haay ye kyaa ho gayaa nazar mere dil threedots

Title: payaameishq muhabbat hamen pasand nahiin
Lyrics: payaameishq muhabbat hamen pasand nahiin ye dillagii ye sharaarat hamen pasand nahiin  bajaa nahiin thaa izahaar beqaraarii kaa lihaaz kuchh to kiyaa hotaa pardaadaarii kaa hayaa se itanii bagaavat hamen pasand nahiin payaameishq muhabbat hamen pasand nahiin  hamiin ko hans ke sitaaron ne bhii nahiin dekhaa nazar milaa ke bahaaron ne bhii nahiin dekhaa kisii nigaah se dilat hamen pasand nahiin ye dillagii ye sharaarat hamen pasand nahiin  jo taktotaaj ke vaaris hain un kaa pyaar hii kyaa badalane vaalii nigaahon kaa aitabaar hii kyaa hazuur kii ye inaayat hamen psand nahiin payaameishq muhabbat hamen pasand nahiin

Title: yuun chaal chalo na matavaalii is dil pe qayaamat
Lyrics: ra 	yuun chaal chalo na matavaalii is dil pe qayaamat aatii hai 	naagin ko bhii dhokhaa hotaa hai jab zulf terii laharaatii hai 	yuun chaal chalo na threedots  	shaanon pe giraa do zulfon ko dopahar kii garmii kyaa shay hai 2 	suuraj pe siyaahii chhaa jaae jab zulf terii 	taubaataubaa jab zulf terii laharaatii hai 	yuun chaal chalo na threedots  ladakii 	sab jhuuth hai  ra 	yuun ham pe hansanaa thiik nahiin duniyaa kii nazar lag jaaegii 2 	koii phuul samajh kar chuum na le terii hansii 	vaahvaah jab terii hansii khil jaatii hai 	yuun chaal chalo na threedots  ladakii 	lo nahiin hansate  ra 	qurabaan nahiin ke kahane par aise hii zubaan se haan kah do 2 	chhotaa saa ye lafzemohabbat hai tasqiin badii 	allaah tasqiin badii mil jaatii hai 	yuun chaal chalo na threedots

Title: muqaabalaa hamase naa karo
Lyrics: ra 	muqaabalaa hamase naa karo 2 	ham tumhen apane rang men rang daalenge ek hii pal men 2 la 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots aa 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots  	hamaare saamane kisakaa chiraag jalataa hai la 	hamaare saamane suuraj bhii haath malataa hai 2 ra 	hamaare saamane jalave bhii sar jhukaate hain 	ye husn vaale hamiin se hii haar jaate hain do 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots ra 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots  aa 	tadapane lagate hain dil jis taraf guzar jaaen 2 la 	jinhen ho naaz zaraa mere saamane aaen 2 ra 	hamaare pyaar kii qismat ko tum sanvaaroge 	tumhaaraa cheharaa hii kahataa hai dil ko haaroge do 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots ra 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots  aa 	hamen na chhedo ke ham to hain naaz ke paale 2 la 	tumhaare jaise bahut dekhe chaahane vaale 2 ra 	ye mere pyaar kaa daavaa hai intaqaam nahiin 	tumhen apanaa na banaayaa to meraa naam nahiin do 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots ra 	muqaabalaa hamase threedots 	ham tumhen threedots

Title: ruup tumhaaraa aankhon se pii luun
Lyrics: ruup tumhaaraa aankhon se pii luun kah do agar tum mar ke bhii jii luun ruup tumhaaraa threedots  aankhon se chhalake terii amrit kii dhaaraa teraa saath gorii mujh ko jiivan se pyaaraa mile donon ham tum jaise lahar se kinaaraa ruup tumhaaraa threedots  nigaahen jhukaa ke phir se zaraa muskuraa do kaanpate labon se dil kii kahaanii sunaa do kyaa hai tumhaare dil men hamen bhii bataa do ruup tumhaaraa threedots

Title: bijalii giraa ke aap kud  dil teraa diivaanaa
Lyrics: bijalii giraa ke aap kud bijalii se dar gae ham saadagii pe aapakii lillaah mar gae  dil teraa diivaanaa hai sanam jaanate ho tum kuchh naa kahenge ham muhabbat kii qasam 2 dil teraa diivaanaa threedots  pyaar ke alabele yah hamasafar chal denge le jaaegaa dil jidhar raah men kho jaaenge aaj manzil kahaan hai hamen kyaa kabar	 dil teraa diivaanaa threedots  kuchh chaahat kaa asar kuchh mausam kaa asar terii aankh men jo saruur hai saaraa usii kaa to qasuur hai saiyaan anajaanii nagarii pyaar kii naadaan yah dil meraa majabuur hai jiivan men ek baar kud ho jaataa hai pyaar dil teraa diivaanaa threedots  kyaa kiije koii man bhaa gayaa dil men hamaare vah samaa gayaa hans ke kisii ne dekhaa ik baar dil kii muraaden koii paa gayaa saanson men miithii aag honthon pe miithaa raag jagaa gayaa dil teraa diivaanaa threedots

Title: sau saal pahale mujhe tum se pyaar thaa
Lyrics: sau saal pahale mujhe tum se pyaar thaa aap bhii hai aur kal bhii rahegaa sadiyon se tujh se milane jiyaa beqaraar thaa aaj bhii hai aur kal bhii rahegaa   tum ruuthaa na karo merii jaan merii jaan nikal jaatii hai tum hansatii rahatii ho to ik bijalii sii chamak jaatii hai mujhe jiite jii o dilabar teraa intazaar thaa aaj bhii hai aur aur kal bhii rahegaa sau saal threedots   is dil ke taaron men madhur jhankar tumhii se hai aur yah hasiin jalavaa yah mast bahaar tumhii se hai dil to meraa sanam teraa talabagaar thaa aaj bhii hai aur aur kal bhii rehegaa sau saal threedots   in pyaar kii raahon men kaho to ab dil ko lutaa duun main o chaandii ke qadamon men dhadakate dil ko bichhaa duun main tujhe mere jiivan par sadaa iktiyaar thaa aaj bhii hai aur aur kal bhii rehegaa sau saal threedots

Title: maan mujhe apane aanchal men chhipaa le
Lyrics: maan mujhe apane aanchal men chhipaa le gale se lagaa le ki aur meraa koii nahiin phir na sataauungaa kabhii paas bulaa le gale se lagaa le ki aur meraa koii nahiin maan mujhe apane threedots  bhuul merii chhotii sii bhuul jaao maataa aise koii apanon se ruuth nahiin jaataa ruuth gayaa huun main tuu mujhako manaa le gale se lagaa le ki aur meraa koii nahiin maan mujhe apane threedots  god men terii aaj tak main palaa huun ungalii pakad ke terii maan main chalaa huun tere binaa mujhako ab kaun sambhaale gale se lagaa le ki aur meraa koii nahiin maan mujhe apane threedots

Title: dil to hai diivaanaa naa
Lyrics: dil to hai diivaanaa naa maanegaa bahaanaa na ruk jaanaa dil kii baaton men na aanaa diivaanaa to diivaanaa dil to hai diivaanaa na threedots  rukatii hai kahaan dil kii angadaaiyaan jhuum jaa mil ke gale zaraa dhiire kaho man kii shahanaaiyaan pagale koii sun na le karegaa koii kyaa merii jaan kaho haan chup kyon chup dil to hai diivaanaa na threedots  daratii huun koii tuufaan na uthe koii shor karuun yaa chup rahuun ham to thahare naadaan tum to nahiin khud samajh lo kyaa kahuun tum ho bade vo merii jaan kaho haan chup to chup dil to hai diivaanaa na threedots

Title: chaahuungaa main tujhe saanjh savere
Lyrics: chaahuungaa main tujhe saanjh savere phir bhii kabhii ab naam ko tere aavaaz main na duungaa aavaaz main na duungaa  dekh mujhe sab hai pataa sunataa hai tuu man kii sadaa   2 mitavaa threedots mere yaar tujhako baar baar aavaaz main na duungaa aavaaz main na duungaa chaahuungaa main tujhe saanjh savere  dard bhii tuu chain bhii tuu daras bhii tu nain bhii tuu mitavaa threedots mere yaar tujhako baar baar aavaaz main na duungaa aavaaz main na duungaa

Title: chaand sii mahabuubaa ho merii kab aisaa mainne sochaa thaa
Lyrics: chaand sii mahabuubaa ho merii kab aisaa mainne sochaa thaa haan tum bilakul vaisii ho jaisaa mainne sochaa thaa  1 naa rasmen hain naa kasamen hain naa shikave hain naa vaade hain ik surat bholii bhaalii hai do nainaa siidhe saade hain  2 aisaa hii ruup khayaalon men thaa jaisaa mainne sochaa thaa haan threedots  2 merii khushiyaan hii naa baante mere gam bhii sahanaa chaahe dekhe naa khvaab vo mahalon ke mere dil men rahanaa chaahe is duniyaa men kaun thaa aisaa jaisaa mainne sochaa thaa haan threedots

Title: sharm aatii hai magar aaj ye kahanaa hogaa
Lyrics: sharm aatii hai magar aaj ye kahanaa hogaa ab hamen aap ke qadamon hii men rahanaa hogaa  aap se ruuth ke ham jitanaa jiye kaak jiye kaii ilzaam liye aur kaii ilzaam diye aaj ke baad magar kuchh bhii na kahanaa hogaa  aap ke pyaar kaa biimaar hamaaraa dil hai aap ke gam kaa khariidaar hamaaraa dil hai aap ko apanaa koii dard na sahanaa hogaa

Title: dil kii girah khol do chup na baitho koii giit gaao
Lyrics: dil kii girah khol do chup na baitho koi giit gaao aa aa aa aa mahafil men ab kaun hai ajanabii tum mere paas aao dil kii girah khol do threedots  milane do ab dil se dil ko  mitane do majabuuriyon ko shiishe men apane dubodo sab faasalon duuriyon ko ankhon men main muskuraauun tumhaare jo tum muskuraao aa aa aa aa mahafil men ab kaun hai ajanabii tum mere paas aao threedots  ham tum na ham tum rahen ab  kuchh aur hii ho gae ab sapano ke jhilamil nagar men jaane kahaan kho gae ab ham raah puuchhen kisiise na tum apanii manzil bataao aa aa aa aa mahafil men ab kaun hai ajanabii tum mere paas aao threedots  kal hamase puuchhe na koii kyaa ho gayaa kal thaa tumhe kal mudakar nahiin dekhate ham dil ne kahaa hai chalaa chal jo duur piichhe kahiin rah gae ab unhen mat bulaao aa aa aa aa mahafil men ab kaun hai ajanabii tum mere paas aao threedots

Title: na na karate pyaar tumhiin se kar baithe
Lyrics: na na karate pyaar tumhiin se kar baithe karanaa thaa inkaar magar iqaraar tumhiin se kar baithe na na karate pyaar tumhiin se kar baithe   threedots  chhodo rahane bhii do ye jhuuthe afasaane aisaa kyaa hai tum men      jaa jhuuthii aisaa kyaa hai tum men ki ham ho diivaane phir bhii tumane kvaabon men aanaa nahiin chhodaa tiir nazaron se chalaanaa nahiin chhodaa ye shiqavaa sarakaar hazaaron baar tumhiin se kar baithe na na karate   threedots  ham ko thaa pataa jo tumhaarii daastaan thii honthon pe to na thii      achchhaa honthon pe to na thii magar dil men haan thii koii dil na degaa anaadii anajaan ko hamane de diyaa hai to maano ehasaan ko ham bhuule ik baar ki aankhen chaar tumhiin se kar baithe na na karate   threedots

Title: vaadiyaan meraa daaman
Lyrics: laa laa laa laa laa laa o o o oho  vaadiyaan meraa daaman raaste merii baanhen jaao mere sivaa tum kahaan jaaoge vaadiyaan meraa daaman raaste merii baanhen jaao mere sivaa tum kahaan jaaoge vaadiyaan meraa daaman 	 jab hansegii kalii rangavaalii koii 2 aur jhuk jaaegii tum pe dalii koii sar jhukaae hue tum mujhe paaoge vaadiyaan meraa daaman raaste merii baanhen jaao mere sivaa tum kahaan jaaoge vaadiyaan meraa daaman 	 chal rahe ho jahaan is nazar se pare 2 vo dagar to guzaratii hai dil se mere dagamagaate hue tum yahiin aaoge vaadiyaan meraa daaman raaste merii baanhen jaao mere sivaa tum kahaan jaaoge  vaadiyaan meraa daaman raaste merii baanhen jaao mere sivaa tum kahaan jaaoge vaadiyaan meraa daaman

Title: tujhe jiivan kii dor se baandh liyaa hai terii zulmositam
Lyrics: rafii tujhe jiivan kii dor se baandh liyaa hai baandh liyaa hai tere zulmositam sar aankhon par lataa maine badale men pyaar ke pyaar diyaa hai pyaar diyaa hai terii khushiyaan aur gam sar aankhon par rafii tujhe jiivan kii threedots  apsaraa koi aae to dekhuun nahiin    koi bahakaaye hansake to bahakuun nahiin     2 tore matavaare nainon ne jaaduu kiyaa o threedots tore matavaare nainon ne jaaduu kiyaa terii ulfat sanam sar aankhon par threedots   mere jiivan kii anamit kahaanii hai tuu merii taqadiir aur zindagaanii hai tuu    2 liye firate hain sabase chhupaaye hue o threedots liye firate hain sabase chhupaaye hue terii tasaviir ham sar aankhon par threedots  chaand suuraj bhii hain terii parachhaaiyaan tujh se roshan huii dil kii gaharaaiyaan tere chehare kii jhilamil se manzil milii o tere chehare kii jhilamil se manzil milii aisii pyaarii puunam sar aankhon par threedots  dono tujhe jiivan kii dor se baandh liyaa hai baandh liyaa hai tere zulmositam sar aankhon par

Title: kal kii daulat aaj kii kushiyaan  asalii kyaa hai naqalii kyaa hai
Lyrics: kal kii daulat aaj kii kushiyaan unakii mahafil apanii galiyaan asalii kyaa hai naqalii kyaa hai puuchho dil se mere  2 asalii kyaa hai threedots   tod ke jhuuthe naate rishte aayaa main dilavaalon men sach kahataa huun chor the jyaadaa daulat ke rakhavaalon men  2 asalii kyaa hai threedots   us duniyaa ne baat na puuchhii is duniyaa ne pyaar diyaa baithaa man ke raajamahal men sapanon kaa sansaar diyaa  2 asalii kyaa hai threedots

Title: kal ke sapane aaj bhii aanaa
Lyrics: kal ke sapane aaj bhii aanaa priitam ko bhii saath men laanaa kal ke sapane threedots  aaj bhii din hai madhur suhaanaa baaj rahii hai man kii baansuriyaa nainon ke tat pe prem ke path pe laut ke ab to aajaa saanvariyaa main bhii sunaauun dil kaa taraanaa 2 kal ke sapane threedots  jhuumate baadal gaate jharane aaj kisii ko dhuundh rahe hain main to ye jaanuun saare nazaare sajanaa tumako dhuundh rahe hain aaj mujhe bhii daras dikhaanaa 2 kal ke sapane threedots  merii nagariyaa aa more rasiyaa dagardagar main ankhiyaan bichhaauun dil men bithaa ke nain milaa ke janamjanam kii pyaas bujhaauun tohe sikhaauun priit nibhaanaa 2 kal ke sapane threedots

Title: badalii se nikalaa hai chaand
Lyrics: badalii se nikalaa hai chaand paradesii sainyaa laut ke tuu ghar aa jaa ghar aa jaa badalii se nikalaa hai threedots  puuchhe pataa teraa thandii havaaen chup mujhe dekh ke chup ho jaaen laaen to kaise tujhe dhuundh ke laaen ho dhuundh ke laaen badalii se nikalaa hai threedots  aa ke guzar gaiin kitanii bahaaren aur baras gaiin kitanii phuhaaren aajaa tujhe ham kab se pukaaren ho kab se pukaaren badalii se nikalaa hai threedots

Title: tum apanaa ranjogam apanii pareshaanii mujhe de do
Lyrics: tum apanaa ranjogam apanii pareshaanii mujhe de do  tumhen gam kii qasam is dil kii viiraanii mujhe de do  ye maanaa main kisii qaabil nahiin huun in nigaahon men 2  buraa kyaa hai agar ye dukh ye hairaanii mujhe de do  tum apanaa   main dekhuun to sahii duniyaa tumhen kaise sataatii hai 2  koii din ke liye apanii nigahabaanii mujhe de do  tum apanaa   vo dil jo mainne maangaa thaa magar gairon ne paayaa thaa 2  badii shai hai agar usakii pashemaanii mujhe de do  tum apanaa

Title: chale jaanaa zaraa thaharo kisii kaa dam nikalataa hai
Lyrics: mu 	chale jaanaa zaraa thaharo kisii kaa dam nikalataa hai 	ye manzar dekhakar jaanaa shaa 	chale jaanaa zaraa threedots  mu 	abhii aae ho baitho to ye mausam bhii suhaanaa hai 	abhii to haaledil tumako nigaahon se sunaanaa hai 	nazar pyaasii ye dil pyaasaa 	kisii kaa dam threedots  shaa 	hasiin jharanon ke saaye men akelaa chhod jaate ho 	hamaare dil ko aakir kisalie tum tod jaate ho 	zaraa dam lo kahaa maano  	kisii kaa dam threedots  mu 	hamaarii jaan ho tum bhii agar chal diin to kyaa hogaa 	tumhaare bin bahaaron men kushii kyaa hai mazaa kyaa hai 	o jaaneman na jaao tum 	kisii kaa dam threedots   shaa 	qasam khaatii huun main apanii tumhen ab naa sataauungii 	tumhaarii baat jo bhii ho vahii main maan jaauungii 	bharii aankhen jhukii palaken 	kisii kaa dam threedots do 	chale jaanaa zaraa threedots

Title: bhuul sakataa hai bhalaa kaun
Lyrics: bhuul sakataa hai bhalaa kaun ye pyaarii aankhen rang men duubii huii niind se bhaarii aankhen bhuul sakataa hai bhalaa kaun threedots  merii har sos ne har soch ne chaahaa hai tumhen jab se dekhaa hai tumhen tab se saraahaa hai tumhen bas gaii hain merii aankhon men tumhaarii aankhen rang men duubii huii niind se bhaarii aankhen bhuul sakataa hai bhalaa kaun threedots  tum jo nazaron ko uthaao to sitaare jhuk jaayen tum jo palkon ko jhukaao to zamaane ruk jaayen kyuun na ban jaayen in aankhon kii pujaarii aankhen rang men duubii huii niind se bhaarii aankhen bhuul sakataa hai bhalaa kaun threedots  jaagatii raaton ko sapanon kaa khazaanaa mil jaaye tum jo mil jaao to jiine ka bahaanaa mil jaaye apanii qismat pe kare naaz hamaarii aankhen bhuul sakataa hai bhalaa kaun ye pyaarii aankhen rang men duubii huii niind se bhaarii aankhen bhuul sakataa hai bhalaa kaun threedots

Title: ek teraa saath hamako do jahaan se pyaaraa hai
Lyrics: ra 	 ek teraa saath  2 hamako do jahaan se pyaaraa hai 	tuu hai to har sahaaraa hai la 	naa mile sansaar teraa pyaar to hamaaraa hai 	tuu hai to har sahaaraa hai  ra 	ham akele hain shahanaaiyaan chup hain 	to kanganaa bolataa hai 	tuu jo chalatii hai chhote se aangan men chaman saa dolataa hai 	 aaj ghar hamane  2 milan ke rang se sanvaaraa hai 	tuu hai to har threedots la 	naa mile sansaar threedots  	dekh aanchal men chaandanii rut ke nazaare bhar gaii hai 	nain se tere is maang men jaise sitaare bhar gaii hai 	 pyaar ne is raat  2 ko aakaash se utaaraa hai 	tuu hai to har threedots

Title: ye dard bharaa afasaanaa sun le anajaan zamaanaa zamaanaa
Lyrics: ye dadr bhara afasana sun le anjaan zamana zamana main huun ek paagal premi mera dadr na koii jaana  2  koii bhii vada yaad na aaya koii qasam bhii yaad na aaii merii duhaaii sun le khudaaii mere sanam ne kii bevafaaii dil tuut gayaa diivaana sun le anjaan zamana zamana main huun ek paagal premi threedots  phuulon se main ne daaman bachaayaa raaho men apanii kaante bichhaaye main huun diivaanaa diivaanagii ne ik bevafaa se nehaa lagaaye jo pyaar ko na pahachaanaa sun le anajaan zamaanaa zamaanaa   threedots  yaaden puraanii aane lagiin kyaa aankhen jhukaa liin kyaa dil men aaii dekho nazaaraa dilavar hamaaraa kaisii hamarii mahafil me aaii hai saath koii begaanaa sun le anjaan zamana zamana main huun ek paagal premi threedots

Title: khuliikhulii zulfon ko baandh bhii lo
Lyrics: mu 	khuliikhulii zulfon ko baandh bhii lo 	ho jaae na duniyaa men shaam kahiin uu 	 yuun na dekho  2 tum mujhako 	ho jaaen na ham badanaam kahiin  	aankhen kyon jhukane lagii hain aanchal kyon dhal jaataa hai 	kuchh to bataao ai jaaduugar ye jaaduu kyon chal jaataa hai mu 	 bholii  3 baaten chhod bhii do 	ho jaae na baaten ye aam kahiin uu 	yuun na dekho threedots  mu 	jaam churaakar in aankhon ke aaj nashe men chuur huun main 	chor nahiin main jaanetamannaa aadat se majabuur huun main uu 	 chorii  3 kii ye baat karo na aa jaae na koii ilzaam kahiin mu 	khuliikhulii zulfon threedots  uu 	jaan tumhaare bas men kar dii dil nazaraanaa de daalaa 	tum bhii sanam kyaa yaad karoge hamane kyaakyaa de daalaa mu 	ai jii hamape naa ehasaan karo ho jaaen na ham niilaam kahiin uu 	yuun na dekho threedots

Title: duniyaa paagal hai yaa phir main diivaanaa
Lyrics: duniyaa paagal hai yaa phir main diivaanaa mujhako chaahatii hai zulfon men ulajhaanaa duniyaa paagal hai   threedots  ye baahen jinako tum gale kaa haar samajhe ho gesu ki jinako tum mahakataa pyaar samajhe ho haar hai phandaa pyaar hai khanjar tum ho nishaanaa     jiyo mere shaagidr      thank you  duniyaa paagal hai   threedots  aazaadii hai to tum ho shahazaade mere pyaaron shaadii huii to samajho bhikhaarii ban gaye yaaron jo hai akelaa vo alabelaa usakaa zamaanaa     shaabaash mere shaagidr      thank you  duniyaa paagal hai   threedots  chuudii jo chhanake to kaho talavaar chhanakii hai paayal baje bhaago ki ye khatare kii ghantii hai padane na paaye husn kaa saayaa dekho bachaanaa     are vaahvaah mere shaagidr      thank you  duniyaa paagal hai   threedots

Title: maang men bhar le rang sakhii rii
Film: mujhe jeene do cry for life
Lyrics: maang men bhar le rang sakhii rii aanchal bhar le taare milan ritu aa gaii jaaegii tuu un sang sakhii rii jo tohe laage pyaare milan ritu aa gaii milan ritu aa gaii threedots  koii chaandii ke rath men aayaa hai mere baabul mere baabul kii raajadhaanii men main use dekhatii huun chhupchhup kar ek halachal sii hai jawaanii men tadake ikik ang sakhii rii aaj kushii ke maare milan ritu aa gaii milan ritu aa gaii threedots  surk chuudaa hai merii baahon men surk jodaa mere badan par hai sab kii nazaren hain mere chahare par aur merii nazar sajan par hai machalii jaae umang sakhii rii dhadakan kare ishaare milan ritu aa gaii milan ritu aa gaii threedots  merii dolii sajaa rahe hain kahaar phuul bikhare hue hain raahon men jinakii baahon kii aarazuu thii mujhe jaa rahii huun main unakii baahon men anganaa laage tang sakhii rii piyaa jab baanh pasaare milan ritu aa gaii milan ritu aa gaii threedots

Title: kuchh huaa haasil na ab tak
Lyrics: koii ummid bar nahiin aatii koii suurat nazar nahiin aatii  kuchh huaa haasil na ab tak koshishebekaar se 2 dekh lenge sar bhii takaraa kar darodiiwaar se 2 kuchh huaa haasil na ab tak koshishebekaar se kuchh huaa haasil  naaz thaa jin kaaranaamon par kabhii hamako bahot jaane kyuun wo ab nazar aate hain kuchh bekaar se kuchh huaa haasil  siidhesaade raaste par kyaa uthaayen ham kadam paanv lipate jaa rahe hain raahenaahamagaar se  kuchh huaa haasil na ab tak koshishebekaar se kuchh huaa haasil

Title: tujhe chaand kahuun yaa phuul kahuun
Lyrics: mu 	tujhe chaand kahuun yaa phuul kahuun 	mere pyaar kaa koii naam nahiin haay naam nahiin la 	main terii nazar men bas jaauun 	duniyaa se mujhe koii kaam nahiin haay kaam nahiin  mu 	zulfon kii chamak ye kahatii hai 	tuu koii sunaharii naagin hai la 	har saans men sholaa tadape hai 	har giit men dil kii dhadakan hai mu 	aankhon men nashaa saa chhaayaa hai 	aur haath men mere jaam nahiin haay jaam nahiin la 	main terii nazar threedots  	dochaar ghadii kaa milanaa ye 	ab saarii umar kaa bandhan hai mu 	tum naam vafaa kaa lete ho 	duniyaa to vafaa kii dushman hai la 	do pyaar bhare dilavaalon ko 	duniyaa men kahiin aaraam nahiin mu 	tujhe chaand kahuun threedots la 	main terii nazar threedots

Title: naa jaa o mere hamadam
Lyrics: aa naa jaa naa jaa naa jaa aa naa jaa naa jaa aa aa  naa jaa o mere hamadam naa jaa o mere hamadam  suno wafaa kii pukaar chhodake meraa pyaar naa jaa o mere hamadam  main akelii huun zamaane men merii duniyaa se jaao naa mere honthon ko hansii deke hansii hansii men udaao naa gaii baaton ko bhulaa bhii de o mere sanam naa jaa o mere hamadam suno wafaa kii pukaar chhodake meraa pyaar naa jaa o mere hamadam  tere dil kii udaasii ko  zulfon se main hansaa duungii terii suunii suunii baahon men goraa mukhadaa sajaa duungii ab aayenge jo lautake tere qadam naa jaa o mere hamadam suno wafaa kii pukaar chhodake meraa pyaar naa jaa o mere hamadam

Title: sun le tuu dil kii sadaa
Lyrics: sun le tuu dil kii sadaapyaar se pyaar sajaa 2 sun le tuu dil kii sadaa  merii aavaaz kaa tiirjaayegaa dil ko bhii jiir 2 khoye nafaratlaaye ulafat ye asar hai meharabaan sun le tuu dil kii sadaa threedots  pyaar rastaa hai meraaaisaa raahi huun teraa 2 na rahuun mainna rahe tuu par rahegii daastaan sun le tuu dil kii sadaa threedots  do dilon kii ye laganjaane dharatii aur gagan 2 tuu jahaan haimain vahaan huun jism do haiek jaan sun le tuu dil kii sadaa threedots  sun le tuu dil kii sadaapyaar se pyaar sajaa 2 sun le tuu dil kii sadaa  aaj tak jo bhii huaajhuute jagadon ne kiyaa aaj tak jo bhii huaa aaj tak jo bhii huaajhuute jagadon ne kiyaa pyaar hotaa to kuchh naa hotaanaa ujadate aashiyaan sun le tuu dil kii sadaa threedots  pyaar jisane naa kiyaakhaak duniyaa men jiyaa pyaar jisane naa kiyaa pyaar jisane naa kiyaakhaak duniyaa men jiyaa usaka jiivan koii jiivanjaise viiraan bastiyaan sun le tuu dil kii sadaa threedots  pyaar jis dil men javaansamajho bhagavaan vahaan pyaar jis dil men javaan pyaar jis dil men javaansamajho bhagavaan vahaan maan le tuu aur samajh ledhadakanon kii ye zubaan sun le tuu dil kii sadaa threedots

Title: jiyaa le gayo jii moraa saanvariyaa laagii man men lagan
Lyrics: jiyaa le gayo jii moraa saanvariyaa laagii man men lagan huii baavariyaa  pa ni ni  ni re re  re ma ma  ma dha pa ma pa re ni re re  re ma ma  ma dha dha  dha saa ni dha ni pa  o papiihe o papiihe tuune papiihe nahiin dekhe more sainyaa dekhe to lelegaa unakii balaiyaan jaa re divaane maar naa taane piyaa kii sun jaake baansuriyaa  saamane aae to main aankhon men chhupaa luun thaamake bainyaa unhen dilamen bithaa luun shaam savere saath ho mere gorii ke sang jaise gaagariyaa  aaj kisii ne mujhe apanaa banaayaa saath rahuungii jaise piyaa kii main chaayaa thandii havaaon tum bhii to gaao priit kii dekho baaje jhaanjhariyaa

Title: jaaduugar qaatil haazir hai meraa dil
Lyrics: aa aaaa jaaduugar qaatil haazir hai meraa dil tuu dil men bhar de pyaar bhalaa ho teraa tujhako terii naujavaanii kii qasam haay jaaduugar qaatil haazir hai meraa dil tuu dil men bhar de pyaar bhalaa ho teraa tujhako terii naujavaanii kii qasam  aa aaaaa dil kaa sitaar hai nagmaa hai pyaar hai faslebahaar hai mere lie 2 jaaduu jagaauungii naachuungiigaauungii duniyaa lutaauungii tere lie 2 haay jaaduugar qaatil threedots  aa aaaaa jiivan kii raaganii chandaa kii chaandanii main huun suhaaganii terii balam 2 dil meraa thaam le ulfat kaa naam le himmat se kaam le mere sanam 2 haay jaaduugar qaatil threedots

Title: mast bahaaron kaa main aashiq main jo chaahen yaar karuun
Lyrics: uu uu mast bahaaron kaa main aashiq main jo chaahen yaar karuun chaahen gulon ke saae se kheluun chaahen kalii se pyaar karuun saaraa jahaan hai mere lie mere lie uu uu mast bahaaron kaa threedots  main huun vo diivaanaa jisake sab diivaane haan kisako hai zaruurat terii ai zamaane haan meraa apanaa raastaa duniyaa se kyaa vaastaa mere dil men tamannaaon kii duniyaa javaan hai mere lie uu uu mast bahaaron kaa threedots  merii aankhon se zaraa aankhen to milaa de haan merii raahen rok le nazaren to bichhaa de haan tere sar kii hai kasam main jo chalaa gayaa sanam to ye rut bhii chalii jaaegii ye to yahaan hai mere lie uu uu mast bahaaron kaa threedots  sabako ye bataa do kah do har nazar se haan koii bhii mere sivaa guzare naa idhar se haan batalaa do jahaan ko samajhaa do kizaan ko aae jaae yahaan naa koii ye gulistaan hai mere lie uu uu mast bahaaron kaa threedots

Title: aaj kii raat nahiin shikave shikaayat ke liye
Lyrics: aaj kii raat nahiin shikave shikaayat ke liye aaj har lamhaa har ek pal hai muhabbat ke liye reshamii sej hai mahakii huii tanhaaii hai aaj kii raat muraadon kii baaraat aaii hai aaj kii raat threedots  har gunaah aaj muqaddas hai farishton kii tarah kaanpate haathon ko mil jaane do rishton kii tarah aaj milane men na ulajhan hai na rusavaaii hai aaj kii raat muraadon kii baaraat aaii hai aaj kii raat threedots  apanii zulfen mere shaane pe bikhar jaane do is hasiin raat ko kuchh aur nikhar jaane do subah ne aaj na aane kii qasam khaaii hai aaj kii raat muraadon kii baaraat aaii hai aaj kii raat threedots

Title: mujhe pyaar kii zindagii dene vaale
Lyrics: rafi	mujhe pyaar kii zindagii dene vaale 	kabhi gam na dena khushi dene vaale 	mujhe pyaar kii zindagii dene vaale  	muhabbat ke vaade bhulaa to na doge 	kahin mujhase daman chhudaa to na doge   2 	mere dil ki duniya hai tere havaale 	mujhe pyar ki threedots  asha	zamane men tumase nahin koi pyaara 	ye jaan bhii tumhari ye dil bhi tumhara 	jo na ho yakin to kabhi aazamaa le 	mujhe pyar ki threedots  rafi	bharosa hai hamako muhabbat pe teri asha	to phir hansake dekho nigahon men merii rafi	ye dar hai zamana judaa kar na daale dono 	mujhe pyar ki threedots

Title: mohe na yuun ghuurghuur kar dekho
Film: mujhe jeene do cry for life
Lyrics: mohe na yuun ghuurghuurakar dekho najar lag jaaegii haay raam lag jaaegii suno jii more saas nanadii bade julmii khabar lag jaaegii haay raam lag jaaegii najar lag jaaegii  aaii main biich dagar odhakar laal chunar ghungharuu waalii ghaghar ghuumatii ghumarghumar dolatii idharudhar morii resham kii kamar mohe na yuun dekho 2 yuun na dekho jii najar lag jaaegii lag jaaegii threedots  moraa baankaa re sajan jisane jiitaa moraa man karuun kyon use jatan dekho chhuunaa na badan main huun chandaa kii kiran kahiin laage na grahan mohe na yuun dekho 2 yuun na dekho jii najar lag jaaegii lag jaaegii threedots

Title: atakan batakan dahii chatokan raajaa gae dillii
Lyrics: atakan batakan dahii chatokan raajaa gae dillii saat katorii laaye ek katorii tuut gaii munne kaa dil luut gaii 2  chandaa kii gend tujhe laa duungii munaa laa duungii munaa bijalii kaa ballaa mangaa duungii munnaa mangaa duungii munnaa munnaa meraa le legaa phir to ghar men khelegaa 2  gend loge yaa balaa ballaa jugjug jiyo mere lallaa atakan batakan dahii chatokan raajaa gae dillii saat katorii laaye ek katorii tuut gaii munne kaa dil luut gaii 2  baadal kaa haathii hawaaon kaa ghodaa hawaaon kaa ghodaa baithegaa munnaa lgaayegaa kodaa lgaayegaa kodaa haathii phir to jhuumegaa desh desh men ghuumegaa 2  ghodaa loge yaa haathii haathii main munne kii saathii atakan batakan dahii chatokan raajaa gae dillii saat katorii laaye ek katorii tuut gaii munne kaa dil luut gaii 2  taaron kii jhilamil topii banaa ke topii banaa ke shabanam ke motii usamen lagaa ke usamen lagaa ke tujhako main pahanaauungii teraa byaah rachaauungii 2  motii loge yaa taaraa taaraa meraa laal badaa hii pyaaraa atakan batakan dahii chatokan raajaa gae dillii saat katorii laaye ek katorii tuut gaii munne kaa dil luut gaii 2  atakan batakan dahii chatokan raajaa gae dillii saat katorii laaye ek katorii tuut gaii munne kaa dil luut gaii 2

Title: maut kitanii bhii sangadil ho magar
Lyrics: maut kitanii bhii sangadil ho magar zindagii se to meharabaan hogii  nit nae ranj dil ko detii hai zindagii har kushii kii dushman hai maut sabase nibaah karatii hai zindagii zindagii kii dushman hai kuchh na kuchh to sakuun paaegaa maut ke bas men jisakii jaan hogii maut kitanii bhii sangadil threedots  rang aur nasl naam aur daulat zindagii kitane farq maanatii hai maut hadabandiyon se uunchii hai saarii duniyaa ko ek jaanatii hai jin usuulon pe mar rahe hain ham un usuulon kii kadrdaan hogii maut kitanii bhii sangadil threedots  maut se aur kuchh mile na mile zindagii se to jaan chhuutegii muskuraahat nasiib ho ke na ho aansuon kii ladii to tuutegii ham na honge to gam kise hogaa katm har gam kii daastaan hogii maut kitanii bhii sangadil threedots

Title: ye kisakaa lahuu hai kaun maraa
Lyrics: dharatii kii sulagatii chhaatii ke bechain sharaare puuchhate hain  ye kisakaa lahuu hai kaun maraa 2 ai rahabar mulqoqaum bataa ye kisakaa lahuu hai kaun maraa  ye jalate huye ghar kisake hai ye katate huye tan kisake hain taqsiim ke andhe tuufaan men lutate huye gulashan kisake hain badbakt kizaayen kisakii hain barabaad nasheman kisake hain kuchh ham bhii sunen hamako bhii sunaa  ai rahabar mulqoqaum bataa ye kisakaa lahuu hai kaun maraa  kis kaam ke hain ye diin dharam jo sharm kaa daaman chaak karen kis tarah ke hain ye desh bhagat jo basate gharon ko kaak karen ye ruuhen kaisii ruuhen hain jo dharatii ko naapaak karen aankhen to uthaa nazaren to milaa  ai rahabar mulqoqaum bataa ye kisakaa lahuu hai kaun maraa  jis raam ke naam pe kuun bahe us raam kii izzat kyaa hogii jis diin ke haathon laaj lute us diin kii qiimat kyaa hogii inasaan kii is zillat se pare shaitaan kii zillat kyaa hogii ye ved hataa quraan uthaa  ai rahabar mulqoqaum bataa ye kisakaa lahuu hai kaun maraa

Title: man meraa udataa jaae
Lyrics: man meraa udataa jaae baadal ke sang duur gagan men aaj nashe men gaataa giit milan ke re rim jhim rim jhim rim jhim  aas ke pankh lagaakar panchhii mastaanaa pii kii nagariyaa aaj chalaa dil diivaanaa ghana ghana baadal garaje to kyaa chama chama bijalii chamake to kyaa chanchal man to rukanaa kahiin na jaane re man meraa udataa jaae threedots  uthatii hain jaise saagar men kala kala chhala chhala karatii tarangen  man men vaise hii jaag rahiin pal pal vyaakul mast umangen  aaj na roko pyaar ke is diivaane ko haathon se dil jaataa hai to jaane do tod chalaa ye bandhan saare  jahaan sajan kaa pyaar pukaare paagal hai man kab ye kisii kii maane re man meraa udataa jaae threedots

Title: aankhon men terii yaad lie jaa rahaa huun main
Lyrics: aankhon men terii yaad lie jaa rahaa huun main dil se tujhe duaaen die jaa rahaa huun main aankhon men terii threedots  main vo nahiin ki aa ke chalaa jaauun khaalii haath dochaar harasaten to lie jaa rahaa huun main aankhon men terii threedots  jo merii zindagii the merii jaan the gae phir kis kushii men aur jie jaa rahaa huun main aankhon men terii threedots  ai maut haath thaam le mujh badanasiib kaa kabase tujhe aavaaz die jaa rahaa huun main aankhon men terii threedots

Title: din javaanii ke chaar yaar pyaar kie jaa
Lyrics: din javaanii ke chaar yaar pyaar kie jaa kahaan baarbaar aataa hai dil diivaanaa ik baar yaar pyaar kie jaa  badii mushkil se fursat pyaar kii milatii hai dilabar khel zaraa sii pyaar kii baazii nikale aramaan saare jab tak ye bahaar yaar pyaar kie jaa din javaanii ke threedots  umariyaa dhal gaii lekin abhii tak dil javaan hai samajho socho agar tum aazamaaoge to bologe ki haan hai chiiz badii hai pyaar mohabbat umr men kyaa rakhaa hai pyaare ab to kar le ikaraar yaar pyaar kie jaa din javaanii ke threedots  agar mud ke dekho mere maasuum qaatil 2 to jaanoge ki ham hii hain tumhaare dil ke qaabil ruup badal ke chaahane vaalaa muddat se thaa paas tumhaare lele baanhon ke haar yaar pyaar kie jaa din javaanii ke threedots

Title: ai merii zindagii tuu nahiin ajanabii
Lyrics: ra 	ai merii zindagii tuu nahiin ajanabii 	tujhako dekhaa hai pahale kabhii la 	ai mere hamasafar mujhako pahachaan le 	main vo hii huun vo hii 2  ra 	tuu mere paas rahakar bhii kyuun duur hai la 	isalieki tujhe khud ye manzuur hai 	main tere paas huun main tere saath thii 	main vo hii huun vo hii threedots  ra 	dil men padatii to hain terii parachhaaiyaan 2 	duur hotii nahiin phir bhii tanahaaiyaan 2 la 	dil ke aaiine men dekh le jhaank kar 	main vo hii huun vo hii threedots  ra 	ai merii zindagii tuu nahiin ajanabii 	tuu vo hii hai jo mere kyaalon men thii la 	main madiraa huun jo tere kyaalon men thii 	kaun huun kyaa huun ab to pahachaan le 	main vo hii huun vo hii threedots

Title: koraa kaagaz thaa ye man meraa likh liyaa naam is pe teraa
Lyrics: ki koraa kaagaz thaa ye man meraa likh liyaa naam is pe teraa la suunaa aangan thaa jiivan meraa bas gayaa pyaar jis pe teraa  ki tuut naa jaaye sapane main darataa huun nit din sapanon men dekhaa karataa huun  2 nainaa kajaraare matavaare ye ishaare khaalii darapan thaa ye man meraa rach gayaa ruup is men teraa  la koraa kaagaz thaa ye man meraa likh liyaa naam is pe teraa  la chain ganvaayaa maine nindiyaa ganvaai saarii saarii raat jaaguun duun main duhaai kahuun kyaa main aage nehaa laage jii naa laage koii dushman thaa ye man meraa  ban gayaa miit jaa ke teraa  ki koraa kaagaz thaa ye man meraa likh liyaa naam is pe teraa  ki baagon men phuulon ke khilane se pahale la tere mere nainon ke milane se pahale ki kahaan kii ye baaten  la mulaakaaten  ki aisii raaten la tuutaa taaraa thaa ye man meraa ki ban gayaa chaand hoke teraa  ki la koraa kaagaz thaa ye man meraa likh liyaa naam is pe teraa

Title: mittii men mil gayaa hai  nazar uthane se pahale
Lyrics: mittii men mil gayaa hai teraa naam dekh le chhotii sii ek bhuul kaa anzaam dekh le  nazar uthane se pahale hii jhukaa letii to achchhaa thaa 2 tuu apane aap ko paradaa banaa letii to achchhaa thaa nazar uthane se pahale threedots  tere honthon kii ye surkii tere chehare kii raunak hai 2 ye surkii maang men apane sajaa letii to achchhaa thaa nazar uthane se pahale threedots  tere shaane pe laharaate hue aanchal kaa kyaa kahanaa 2 isii aanchal se ik ghuunghat banaa letii to achchhaa thaa nazar uthane se pahale threedots  jo kaanton se ulajhakar phuul tode bhii to kyaa tode 2 samajh kar soch kar daaman bachaa letii to achchhaa thaa nazar uthane se pahale threedots  idhar rangiiniyaan thiin aur udhar maanbaap kii kushiyaan 2 unhen kush karake tuu unakii duaa letii to achchhaa thaa nazar uthane se pahale threedots

Title: merii daastaan mujhe hii meraa dil sunaa ke roe
Lyrics: merii daastaan mujhe hii meraa dil sunaa ke roe kabhii ro ke muskaraae kabhii muskaraa ke roe merii daastaan mujhe threedots  mile gam se apane furasat to main haal puuchhuun unakaa shabegam se koii kah de kahiin aur jaa ke roe merii daastaan mujhe threedots  hamen vaastaa tadap se hamen kaam aansuon se tujhe yaad karake roe yaa tujhe bhulaa ke roe merii daastaan mujhe threedots  vo jo aajamaa rahe the merii beqaraariyon ko mere saathsaath vo bhii mujhe aajamaa ke roe merii daastaan mujhe threedots

Title: bade miyaan diivaane aise naa bano
Lyrics: bade miyaan diivaane aise naa bano hasiinaa kyaa chaahe hamase suno bade miyaan diivaane threedots  sabase pahale suno miyaan karake varjish bano javaan cheharaa polish kiyaa karo thodii maalish kiyaa karo ai kibalaa ujale baalon ko rang daalo ban jaao gulafaam bade miyaan diivaane threedots  hasiinaa kyaa chaahe jau 	yahii to maaluum nahiin hamase suno  siikho karatab naenae fashion ke dhang naenae dhiilaadhaalaa libaas kyon resham pahano kapaas kyon fan ye jaaduugarii kaa hai aramaan tujhako parii kaa hai to kibalaa maaro mantar tedhii  ban kar nikalo vaqteshaam bade miyaan diivaane threedots  tanhaaii men agar kahiin aa jaae vo nazar kahiin kahie haathon men haath daal e gulcheharaa pariijamaal muddat se dil udaas hai tere honthon kii pyaas hai ai dilabar mere lab par kab chhalakegaa tere lab kaa jaam bade miyaan diivaane threedots

Title: gumanaam hai koii badanaam hai koii
Lyrics: gumanaam hai koii badanaam hai koii kisako kabar kaun hai vo anajaan hai koii gumanaam hai koii threedots  kisako samajhen ham apanaa kal kaa naam hai ik sapanaa 2 aaj agar tum zindaa ho to  kal ke lie  2 maalaa japanaa gumanaam hai koii threedots  pal do pal kii mastii hai bas do din kii hastii hai 2 chain yahaan par mahangaa hai aur  maut yahaan  2 par sastii hai gumanaam hai koii threedots  kaun balaa tuufaanii hai maut ko kud hairaanii hai 2 aae sadaa viiraanon se jo  paidaa huaa  2 vo faanii hai gumanaam hai koii threedots

Title: jab se ham tum bahaaron men version ii
Lyrics: jab se ham tum bahaaron men ho baithe gum nazaaron men jiase ye zindagii jaagii aankhon kaa kaab hai  milanaa to thaa hamen is dil kii raah men afasaanaa ban gaye diivaane jinakii chaah men  2 afasaane the kisii din ke diivaane the kisii din ke jaise ye raaginii jaagii aankhon kaa kvaab hai  chaahat ke naam kaa chaahat kaa jaam hai halakii halakii nashiilii bhiigii bhiigii shaam hai  2 mere sapane terii raahen tere  merii baahen jaise ye bekudii jaagii aankhon kaa kvaab hai

Title: terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii
Lyrics: terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii hasiin hai lekin is pe qurbaan merii jaanehaziin hai lekin ye merii zakmii umangon kaa madaavaa to nahiin  haaledil is butekaafir ko sunaauun kaise isake ruksaaron kii shaadaabii ko chheduun kyonkar isake honthon ke tabassum ko jagaauun kaise terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii threedots  yahii tasaviir tasavvur men utar jaane par chaand kii kiranon se go badhake nikhar jaatii hai dard palakon se lipat jaataa hai aansuu ban kar merii ehasaas kii duniyaa hii bikhar jaatii hai  is liye terii tasavvur se nahiin kud tujhase iltijaa karataa huun bas itanaa bataa de mujhako kyaa merii dil kii tadap kaa tujhe ehasaas bhii hai 2 varnaa phir merii hii vahashat men sulaa de mujhako  terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii hasiin hai lekin is pe qurbaan merii jaanehaziin hai lekin ye merii zakmii umangon kaa madaavaa to nahiin

Title: biit gaii hai aadhii raat chaandaniyaa dhiiredhiire
Lyrics: ra 	 biit gaii hai aadhii raat  2 chaandaniyaa dhiiredhiire aanaa 2 la 	kaise kahuun main dil kii baat jiyaa tere binaa hai diivaanaa 2  ra 	pyaar meraa jaage zamaanaa soyaasoyaa 	jhuume tere aage diivaanaa khoyaakhoyaa la 	 chhiin lii tuune munh kii baat  2 jiyaa tere binaa hai diivaanaa ra 	biit gaii hai aadhii raat threedots  la 	jalate hue taaron ke diiyon ko bujhaatii 	aaii tere anganaa men chhupatii chhupaatii ra 	de ke mere haathon men haath chaandaniyaa dhiiredhiire aanaa la 	kaise kahuun main threedots  ra 	aa ke mere dil se guzar mat jaanaa 	kar to liyaa vaadaa muqar mat jaanaa la 	 main to rahuungii tere saath  2 jiyaa tere binaa hai diivaanaa ra 	biit gaii hai aadhii raat threedots

Title: chaa chaa  udhar vo chaal chalate hain
Lyrics: chaa chaa chaa udhar vo chaal chalate hain idhar ham jaan lete hain nazar pahachaanane vaale nazar pahachaan lete hain 2 udhar vo chaal threedots  agar tum hans ke dekhoge to ham phir muskaraa lenge bachaakar aankh nikaloge nazar ham bhii phiraa lenge tum apanaa raastaa loge ham apanaa raastaa lenge na ham ehasaan karate hain na ham ehasaan lete hain nazar pahachaanane threedots  tumhen hamase mohabbat hai zaruurat kyaa jataane kii inhen parade men rahane do ye baat hai chhupaane kii hamen aadat nahiin jhuuthii qasam khaanekhilaane kii na ham iimaan dete hain na ham iimaan lete hain  nazar pahachaanane threedots

Title: niind ud jaae terii chain se sone vaale
Singer: suman kalyanpur mubarak begum krishna bose
Lyrics: niind ud jaae terii chain se sone vaale ye duaa maangate hain nain ye rone vaale  mainne kiyaa in zulfon ko saayaa tere liye aankhon men kaajal lagaayaa dil ne dhadak ke diyaa vaade tujhe nahiin aanaa thaa tuu nahiin aayaa merii aankhon ke kaajal ko ashq hain dhone vaale niind ud jaae terii threedots  mainne kii hain jafaaen mujhase kyon ho vafaaen lag rahiin mujhako mere pyaar kii badduaaen tuu vafaa karataa ham to the 2   bevafaa hone vaale niind ud jaae terii threedots  koii tujhape tohamat dharane nahiin dii dil ko shikaayat karane nahiin dii kar liyaa dil kaa kuun bhii hamane aankh sitamagar bharane nahiin dii aaj lekin naa maanenge 2	royenge rone vaale  niind ud jaae terii threedots

Title: kahanaa hai kahanaa hai
Lyrics: kahanaa hai kahanaa hai  slow  kahanaa hai kahanaa hai aaj tumase ye pahalii baar ho tum hii to lai ho jivan men mere pyaar pyaar pyaar  2   tumase kahane vaalii aur bhi hain pyaarii baaten saamane sabake kaise kah duun main vo pyaarii baaten  aaj mujhe bas itanaa hii ab karanaa hai iqaraar  tum hii to lai ho threedots  kab se dil ne mere maan liyaa hai tujhako apanaa  aankhen meri dekh rahi hain sote uthate ye sapanaa  mere gale men daal rahi ho tum baahon ka haar tum hii to lai ho threedots

Title: tujhamen ishvar  bachche men hai bhagavaan
Lyrics: tujhamen ishvar allaah tujhamen tujhamen jiisas paayaa  bachche men hai bhagavaan bachche men hai rahamaan bachchaa jiisas kii shaan giitaa isamen baaiibal isamen isamen hai quraan bolo bachchaa hai mahaan jag men bolo bachchaa hai mahaan  mandir maszid aur giraje men jisakaa nuur samaayaa ek nanhiin sii jaan chhupaa ke vo apane ghar aayaa paapii man ko paavan karatii isakii har muskaan  gyaanii jag men phuut karaaen bachchaa mel karaae ham jaise bhuulebhatakon ko siidhii raah dikhaae diindharm aur jaatpaat kaa bachchaa bhed na jaane apane ko sabakaa samajhe sabako apanaa maane ishvar ko paanaa chaahe to bachche ko pahachaan

Title: jhumakaa giraa re
Lyrics: from surajit a bose sbosesaintmarysedu date 20010301 165405 pst  jhumakaa giraa re haay jhumakaa giraa re barelii ke bazaar men jhumakaa giraa jhumakaa giraa jhumakaa giraa haay haay haay jhumakaa giraa re threedots  sainyaan aaye nain jhukaaye ghar men chorii chorii 2 bole jhumakaa main pahanaa duun aajaa baankii chhorii main bolii naa naa naa baabaa naa kar joraajorii laakh manaayaa sainyaan ne kalaiyaa naahiin chhodii haay kalaiyaa naahiin chhodii phir phir jhumakaa giraa re ham donon kii takaraar men jhumakaa giraa re threedots  ghar kii chhat pe main khadii galii men dilabar jaanii 2 hansake bole niiche aa ab niiche aa diiwaanii yaa anguuthii de apanii yaa chhallaa de nishaanii ghar kii chhat pe khadiikhadii main huii sharam se paanii haay huii sharam se paanii daiyaa phir jhumakaa giraa re ham donon ke is pyaar men jhumakaa giraa re threedots  bagiyaa men balamaa ne merii lat ulajhii sulajhaaii 2 thaamake aanchal bole gorii tuu mere man bhaaii aankh jhukaake kuchh naa bolii kuchh naa bolii haay haay haay aankh jhukaake kuchh naa bolii dhiire se musakaaii sainyaan ne jab chhedaa mujhako ho gaii haathaapaayii haay ho gaii haathaapaayii phir jhumakaa giraa re main kyaa boluun bekaar men jhumakaa giraa re threedots

Title: pavan chale to uthe nadii men lahar sii
Lyrics: aa pavan chale to uthe nadii men lahar sii ko are merii beliyaa nadii men lahar sii aa ham jo chalen to uthe chunnii men lahar sii ko are merii beliyaa chunnii men lahar sii aa phir bhii ye puuchhe hai tujhase jiyaa kaise man men lahar uthe bol mundeyaa ko kaise man men lahar uthe bol mundeyaa kaise man men lahar uthe aa  ra man men lahar uthe kisii kii adaaon se ko  kisii kii adaaon se ra bijalii chamak jaae gaharii ghataaon se ko  gaharii ghataaon se ra phir bhii bataao bin baadala ke kaise bijalii chamak jaae bol kudiye ko kaise bijalii chamak jaae bol kudiye kaise bijalii chamak jaae aa  aa bijalii chamak jaae goriyon kii chaal se ko are merii beliyaa goriyon kii chaal se aa sholaa saa bhadak jaaye ghungharuu kii taal se ko are merii beliyaan ghungharuu kii taal se aa phir bhii ye puchhe hai tujhase jiyaa kaise ghungharuu kii taal pade bol mundeyaa ko kaise ghungharuu kii taal pade bol mundeyaa kaise ghungharuu kii taal pade aa  ra ghungharuu kii taal pade dil pe jigar pe ko  dil pe jigar pe ra kisii kii nazar mile kisii kii nazar se ko  kisii kii nazar se ra aage to phir kyaa nazar milake     kachhu kahaa nahiin jaae tuu hii bol kudiye ko ra kachhu kahaa nahiin jaae tuu hii bol kudiye kachhu kahaa nahiin jaae tuu hii bol aa  aa kahaa nahiin jaae kachhu duniyaa ke dar se ko are merii beliyaa duniyaa ke dar se aa sun jo kaho to suno kisii kii nazar se ko are merii beliyaa kisii kii nazar se aa phir bhii ye puuchhe hai tujhase jiyaa  terii samajha men aayaa kachhu bol mundeyaa ko terii samajha men aayaa kachhu bol mundeyaa terii samajha men aayaa kachhu bol aa

Title: pyaasii hiranii banban dhaae
Lyrics: kahaan hai tuu tuu kahaan hai aa jaa ai mere sapanon ke raajaa  pyaasii hiranii banban dhaae koii shikaarii aae re choriichorii phandaa daale baanh pakad le jaae re  naiinaii kalii khilii chun le na koii aisii vaisii baaten dil kii sun le na koii nanhaa saa jiyaa moraa jaane kyaa gaae re choriichorii phandaa daale threedots  chalatechalate ruk jaauun main chal nahiin paauun palpal dhadake tan men agni kaise bujhaauun lagii naa bujhe kahiin jii ko jalaae re choriichorii phandaa daale threedots  ik to main huun bholiibhaalii duuje akelii kaise buujhii jaae mose man kii pahelii chalii hai havaa naii jiyaa ghabaraae re choriichorii phandaa daale threedots

Title: ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam
Lyrics: phir tumhaarii yaad aaii ai sanam ai sanam ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam allaah qasam allaah qasam allaah qasam  mannaa de haaledil yaar ko likhuun kaise haath dil se judaa nahiin hotaa kis tarah unako bataaen apanaa gam ai sanam ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam  saadat khaan tum mere dil men merii aankhon men ho tum mere kvaabon merii aahon men ho duur rahakar bhii judaa honge na ham ai sanam ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam  rafii jabase dekii suurat unakii ham shamaa jalaanaa bhuul gae rukasaar kii surkhii kyaa kahie phuulon kaa fasaanaa bhuul gae bas itanii kahaanii hai apanii jab aankh milii behosh hue daaman se havaa tum kar na sake ham hosh men aanaa bhuul gae kitane pyaare hain mohabbat ke sitam ai sanam  kyaa lutf aa rahaa thaa  3 dilabar kii dillagii se nazaren bhii thii mujhii par paradaa bhii thaa mujhii se kyaa hasiin tasaviir thii allaah qasam ai sanam ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam allaah qasam allaah qasam allaah qasam

Title: rone se aur ishq men bebaak ho gaye
Lyrics: rone se aur ishq men bebaak ho gaye dhoye gaye ham aise ki bas paak ho gaye  kahataa hai kaun naalaaebulabul ko beasar parade men gul ki laakh jigar chaak ho gaye  karane gaye the usase tagaaful kaa ham gilaa kii ek hii nigaah ki bas kaak ho gaye  is rang se uthaaii kal usane asad kii laash dushman bhii jisako dekhake gamanaak ho gaye

Title: nigaahenaaz ke maaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa
Lyrics: adaa bijalii badan sholaa bhanve khanjar nazar qaatil galat kyaa hai hamen kahatii hai ye duniyaa agar qaatil to phir  nigaahenaaz ke maaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa na bach sake to bechaaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa   hamii ne ishq ke zaraa dekho qaabil banaa diyaa hai tumhe hamii na ho to nazaaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa  hamaare husn kii bijalii chamakne vaalii hai na jaane aaj hazaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa  bahaarehusn salaamat khizaa se puuchh zaraa kyaa ke chaar din men bahaaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa  rang par naaz na kar kyon kii rang badal jaataa hai ye vo mahamaan hai jo aaj aataa hai kal jaataa hai ishq par naaz kare koi to kuchh baat bhii hai husn kaa naaz hii kyaa husn to dhal jaataa hai baharehusn salaamat khizaa se puuchh zaraa ke chaar din men bahaaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa   ham apane chehare se padraa uthaa to de lekin gariib chaandsitaaron kaa haal kyaa hogaa  muqaabalaa hai to phir der kyaa hai tiir chalaa

Title: tuu laakhon men hai ek sanam
Lyrics: tuu laakhon men hai ek sanam 2 tujh sii hasiinaa dekhii kabhii naa saare jahaan men terii qasam haay terii qasam tuu laakhon men threedots  kyuun ghuunghat ne daale ghere kyuun baithe ho nazaren phere ruuthii ho kyuun hamase hasiinaa  aao manaaen ham  2 tuu laakhon men threedots  yaad tumhaarii paas bulaa ke rakh luun apane dil men chhupaa ke isii bahaane jaanetamannaa  saath raho haradam  2 tuu laakhon men threedots

Title: kuchh aur zamaanaa kahataa hai
Lyrics: kuchh aur zamaanaa kahataa hai kuchh aur hai zidd mere dil kii main baat zamaane kii maanuun yaa baat sunuun apane dil kii kuchh aur zamaanaa kahataa hai   threedots  duniyaa ne hamen berahamii se thukaraa jo diyaa achchhaa hii kiyaa naadaan ham samajhe baithe the nibhatii hai yahaan dil se dil kii kuchh aur zamaanaa kahataa hai   threedots  inasaaf muhabbat sachchaaii vo rahamoqaram ke dikhalaave kuchh kahate zubaan sharamaatii hai puuchho na jalan mere dil kii kuchh aur zamaanaa kahataa hai   threedots  go bastii hai insaanon kii insaan magar dhuundhe na milaa patthar ke buton se kyaa kiije fariyaad bhalaa tuute dil kii kuchh aur zamaanaa kahataa hai   threedots

Title: mujhe bhuul jaanaa agar ho sake
Lyrics: mujhe bhuul jaanaa agar ho sake 2 na phir yaad aanaa agar ho sake mujhe bhuul jaanaa threedots  meraa pyaar guzare zamaane kii hai baat rahe yaad kyuun bhuul jaane kii baat nahiin koii aansuu bahaane kii baat na aansuu bahaanaa agar ho sake mujhe bhuul jaanaa threedots  mujhe maaf karanaa mere hamasafar kahiin kho gayaa main tumhen chhod kar tumhen maine aansuu die hain magar sadaa muskaraanaa agar ho sake mujhe bhuul jaanaa threedots

Title: nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim
Lyrics: nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim piyaa tore aavan kii aas nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim nainaa barasen barasen barasen  vo din merii nigaahon men  vo yaaden merii aahon men	2 ye dil ab tak bhatakataa hai terii ulfat kii raahon men suuniisuunii raahen sahamiisahamii baahen aankhon men hai barason kii pyaas nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim nainaa barasen barasen barasen  nazar tujh bin machalatii hai  mohabbat haat malatii hai	2 chalaa aa mere paravaane vafaa kii shamaa jalatii hai o mere hamaraahii phiratii huun ghabaraaii jahaan bhi hai aa jaa mere paas nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim nainaa barasen barasen barasen  adhuuraa huun main afasaanaa jo yaad aauun chale aanaa meraa jo haal hai tujh bin vo aakar dekhate jaanaa bhiigiibhiigii palaken chhamchham aansuu chhalaken khoiikhoii aankhen hain udaas nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim nainaa barasen barasen barasen  ye laakhon gam ye tanahaaii  mohabbat kii ye rusavaaii	2 katii aisii kaii raaten na tum aae na maut aaii ye bindiyaa kaa taaraa jaise ho angaaraa mahandii mere haathon kii udaas nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim piyaa tore aavan kii aas nainaa barasen rimajhim rimajhim nainaa barasen barasen barasen

Title: vafaaen dekh liin  sab pyaar kii baaten karate hain
Lyrics: vafaaen dekh liin patthar jigar zaalim zamaane kii qasam khaaii hai ab hamane kisii se dil lagaane kii  sab pyaar kii baaten karate hain par karanaa aataa pyaar nahiin hai matalab kii duniyaa saarii yahaan koii kisii kaa yaar nahiin kisii ko sachchaa pyaar nahiin  sukh men sab aaaa kar apane  rishtenaate hain batalaate  2 bure dinon men dekhaa hamane  aankh bachaa kar hain jaate  2 thokar khaa kar sambhalane vaale jiit hai terii haar nahiin hai matalab kii duniyaa threedots   ai bande bhagavaan se dar  2 insaan se mat dar muhar lagii hai usakii tere  haq ke daanedaane par  2 usakii marzii binaa tere chubh sakataa koii kaar nahiin hai matalab kii duniyaa threedots

Title: jahaan daaldaal par sone kii chidiyaan karatii hain baseraa
Lyrics: jahaan daaldaal par sone kii chidiyaan karatii hain baseraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa  guruurbrahmaa guruurvishnu guruurdevo maheshwarah guruuh saakshaath parabrahmaa tasmai shrii gurave namah  jahaan daaldaal par sone kii chidiyaan karatii hain baseraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa jahaan satya ahinsaa aur dharm kaa pagpag lagataa deraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa jay bhaaratii  4  ye dharatii vo jahaan rishimuni japate prabhu naam kii maalaa hari aum  4 jahaan har baalak ek mohan hai aur raadhaa ekek baalaa aur raadhaa ekek baalaa jahaan suuraj sabase pahale aakar daale apanaa pheraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa  jahaan gangaa jamunaa krishnaa aur kaaverii bahatii jaaen jahaan uttardakshin puurabpashchim ko amrit pilavaaen ye amrit pilavaaen kahiin ye to phal aur phuul ugaaen kesar kahiin bikheraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa  alabelon kii is dharatii ke tyohaar bhii hain alabele kahiin divaalii kii jagamag hai holii ke kahiin mele holii ke kahiin mele jahaan raagrang aur hansiikhushii kaa chaaron or hai gheraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa  jahaan aasamaan se baaten karaten mandir aur shivaale kisii nagar men kisii dvaar par koii na taalaa daale koii na taalaa daale aur prem kii bansii jahaan bajaataa aae shaamsaveraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa jahaan satya ahinsaa aur dharm kaa pagpag lagataa deraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa vo bhaarat desh hai meraa jay bhaaratii  4

Title: mitavaa laut aaye ri
Lyrics: aa ta na om mitavaa aa jaao  mitavaa laut aaye rii aaj mero jiyaraa kyon na aaye subh din dashran paaye mitavaa laut aaye rii  nainaa jo the niir bhare piyaa ko dekh phir se muskaaye aaye rii aaye rii aaye mitavaa laut aaye rii  divaa laa de bujhaaye koii jaaguun priit kii jyot jagaaye aaye rii aaye rii aaye rii mitavaa laut aaye rii  mitavaa laut aaye rii aaj mero jiyaraa kyon na gaaye subh din dashran paaye mitavaa laut aaye mitavaa laut aaye mitavaa laut aaye

Title: meraa naam raajuu gharaanaa anaam
Film: jis desh mein gangaa behti hai
Lyrics: meraa naam raajuu gharaanaa anaam bahatii hai gangaa jahaan meraa dhaam meraa naam raajuu   threedots  kaam naye nit giit banaanaa giit banaa ke jahaan ko sunaanaa koii na mile to akele men gaanaa kaviraaj kahe na ye taaj rahe na ye raaj rahe na ye raajgharaanaa priit aur priit kaa giit rahe kabhii luut sakaa na koii ye khazaanaa meraa naam raajuu   threedots  dhuul kaa ik baadal alabelaa nikalaa huun apanii safar men akelaa chhupchhup dekhuun main duniyaa kaa melaa kaahe maan kare abhimaan kare naadaan tujhe ik din to hai jaanaa dafalii uthaa aavaaz milaa gaa mil ke mere sang prem taraanaa meraa naam raajuu   threedots

Title: tohe saanvariyaa naahii khabariyaa
Lyrics: tohe saanvariyaa naahii khabariyaa tumare kaaran apane des men balam ham ho gae paradesii paradesii ham ho gae paradesii  naa jaane kaun saa apanaa anganaa kaun sii atariyaa apane hii gaanv kii galiyon men bhuule phirate hain ham dagariyaa aao ghar apane hamen chhod aao 2 ke ham ho gae paradesii threedots  ye duniyaa laaj sapanaa chain nindiyaa pyaar javaanii apanaa kyaa rah gayaa tumhare naam kar dii jab jindagaanii haay sab apane hamen bahut yaad aae 2 ke ham ho gae paradesii threedots

Title: terii yaad na dil se jaa sakii
Lyrics: terii yaad na dil se jaa sakii 2 aatii thii niind kabhiikabhii aaj to vo bhii na aa sakii terii yaad na dil se jaa sakii threedots  taaron ke saaye men kitane sapane  dekhe the milake hamane tumane ruuth gae tum sapane bhii ruuthe  un ko bhii main na manaa sakii terii yaad na dil se jaa sakii threedots  raaten vo raaten na din vo din hain manzil hai muskhil raahen kathin hain nis din roke bhii main apane man kii  aag na haay bujhaa sakii terii yaad na dil se jaa sakii threedots

Title: ye duniyaa gol hai
Lyrics: ye duniyaa gol hai uupar se khol hai 2 andar jo dekho pyaare bilakul polampol hai ye duniyaa gol hai   jitane hain duniyaa vaale phirate hain jholii daale koii muraad maange koii aulaad maange koii muhabbat chaahe koii huquumat chaahe koii taqadiir maange koii tasviir maange 2 sabake gale men bhaiyaa aramaanon kaa dhol hai ye duniyaa gol hai   chaandii sonaa naa maanguun rupayaa paisaa naa maanguun  kholii bangalaa naa maanguun kapadaa lattaa na maanguun ghodaa gaadii naa maanguun kurtaa dhotii naa maanguun paravardigaar mere usakaa diidaar de de 2 jaldii milaa de merii duniyaa daanvaadol hai ye duniyaa gol hai   mere maulaa bulaa lo madiine mujhe lage maut ke aane pasiine mujhe mere maulaa bulaa lo madiine ise ise nahiin baabaa mujhe achchhaa betaa achchhaa lambii umar ho uupar se khol hai andar jo dekho pyaare bilakul polampol hai ye duniyaa gol hai bhaaii

Title: ehasaan teraa hogaa mujhapar dil chaahataa hai vo kahane do
Lyrics: ehasaan teraa hogaa mujhapar dil chaahataa hai vo kahane do mujhe tumase muhabbat ho gai hai mujhe  palakon kii chhaano men rahane do  tumane mujhako hansanaa sikhaayaa  2 rone kahoge ro lenge ham aansuu kaa hamaare gam naa karo vo bahate hain to bahane do threedots  chaahe banaa do chaahe mitaa do  2 mar bhii gae to denge duaaen udud ke kahegii kaak sanam ye dardemuhabbat sahane do threedots

Title: ik hasiin shaam ko dil meraa kho gayaa
Lyrics: ik hasiin shaam ko dil meraa kho gayaa pahale apanaa huaa karataa thaa ab kisiikaa ho gayaa  muddaton se aarazuu thii mere dil me koii aaye suunii suunii zindagii men ek shammaa jhilamilaaye vo jo aaye to roshan zamaanaa ho gayaa ik hasiin threedots  mere dil ke kaaravaan ko le chalaa hai aaj koii shabanamii sii jisakii aankhen thodii jaagii thodii soyii unako dekhaa to mausam suhaanaa ho gayaa ik hasiin threedots

Title: dekhane men bholaa hai dil kaa salonaa
Lyrics: dekhane men bholaa hai dil kaa salonaa bambaii se aayaa hai baabuu chinnannaa  galii galii gaanv kii re jaagii hai sote sote phir se laage hai aisaa hue ham chhote chhote sang leke aayaa hai meraa bachapanaa bambaii se threedots  nikii munnii nuur begam use na banaanaa jii hasiinon kaa shahzaadaa hai hansii naa udanaa jii dil uda le jaayegaa chodo bachapanaa bambaii se threedots  suno magar shahzaade jii kahiin bhuul mat jaanaa burii hain yah nainon vaale banaate hain diivaanaa gaanv hai yah pariyon kaa dil ko bachaanaa bambaii se threedots

Title: mere chandaa mere nanhe
Lyrics: mere chandaa mere nanhe tujhe apane siine se kaise lagaauun suunii godii men kaise uthaauun chhup gaye laadale aanchalon men raat pariyon kaa paigaam laaii kis tarah so gayaa tuu akele kis tarah bin mere niind aaii mere chandaa threedots  tere sapane men aa to gaii main apanii majabuuriyaan kyaa bataauun buund bhii tan men baaqii nahiin hai bhuukh terii main kaise mithaauun mere chandaa threedots  aadamii bhii hai bhagavaan bhii hai phir bhii phirataa hai tuu besahaaraa kaun tujh ko gale se lagaaye pattharon kaa hai ye shahar saaraa mere chandaa threedots  duur jaanaa hai nanhe musaafir raasate men kahiin thak na jaanaa thaamake merii aahon kii dorii dhuund le tuu hii apanaa thikaanaa mere chandaa threedots

Title: dil tuu bhii gaa pyaar men muskaraa
Lyrics: dil tuu bhii gaa pyaar men muskaraa sapane men jo aate hain akasar mahafil men unako bulaa ke laa dil tuu bhii gaa kal jo huaa so huaa bhuul jaa  vo bhii na bole ham bhii na bole aankh milii pahachaan huii koii chalaa jab saath safar men hamako dagar aasaan huii  ruupnagar kii bhiid men hamane kud ko bhulaanaa siikh liyaa hai  dard balaa kaa dard hai lekin hosh nahiin to kuchh bhii nahiin aaj jahaan ko ham duniyaa ko chhod ke aae duur kahiin

Title: zaraa haullehaulle chalo more saajanaa
Lyrics: haulehaule saajanaa dhiiredhiire baalamaa o ho ho ho ho ho threedots  zaraa haulehaule chalo more saajanaa ham bhii piichhe hain tumhaare kaisii bhiigiibhiigii rut hai suhaanii   kaise pyaare nazaare zaraa haulehaule threedots  pad gai janaab main to aap ke gale ab to nibhaae bagair naa chale     2 pyaar ke safar men hote hii rahenge jhagade hazaar sanam pyaar ke diivaane chalate hii rahenge phir bhii milaake kadam sajanaa hote hii rahenge niichii nazar ke miithemiithe ishaare zaraa haulehaule threedots  dekhalii huzuur maine aap kii vafaa baaton hii baaton men ho gaye khafaa    2 dil ko to dilabar le hii chuke ho dil kaa karaar na lo mujhe meraa pyaar do duniyaa sanvaar do jiine kii baat karo sajanaa tum jo nahiin to kaise lagegii jiivan nayyaa kinaare zaraa haulehaule threedots

Title: o dilabar jaanie tere hain ham tere
Lyrics: o dilabar jaanie tere hain ham tere 2 chhupaa lenge in aankhon men sanam ham gam tere o dilabar jaanie threedots  yuun baat baatbaat pe tum ruuthaa na karo dil tod todtod mazaa luutaa naa karo o jaanejaanaan ye to hai rusvaaii pyaar kii in baaton se badh jaaegii mahangaaii pyaar kii dhuundhe nahiin paaogii tum baazaar men aashiq daudenge fifty sixty kii raftaar se aashiq phir naam le ke pyaar kaa tum gaayaa karogii sar phod ke diivaaron se  chillaayaa karogii  3 o dilabar jaanie threedots  o bevafaa tuune mujhe kahiin kaa na chhodaa tuu gussaa jo karatii hai karale pyaar bhii thodaa tere binaa jiinaa meraa jiinaa hai kyaa jiinaa tadapuungaa main jab aaegaa saavan kaa mahiinaa ye husn bhii kyaa husn hai jo ishq naa jaane diladaar ko aur yaar ko bilkul naa pahachaane merii vafaa ek din aisaa rang laaegii ye naazaniin zaalim  hasiinaa maan jaaegii  3 o dilabar jaanie threedots  o dilabar sonie tere hain ham tere

Title: meraa pyaar vo hai ke mar kar bhii tum ko
Lyrics: mera pyar vo hai ke mar kar bhi tum ko slow juda apani bahon se hone na dega  mera pyar vo  hai ke mar kar bhi tum ko juda apani bahon se hone na dega  mili mujhako jannat to jannat ke badale khuda se meri jan tumhen mang lega mera pyar vo hai  zamana to karavat badalata rahega nae zindagi ke tarane banenge mitegi na lekin muhabbat hamari mitane ke sau sau bahane banenge haqikat hamesha haqikat rahegi kabhi bhi na isaka fasana banega mera pyar vo hai ke threedots  tumhen chhin le meri bahon se koi mera pyar yun besahara nahin hai tumhara badan chandani ake chhule mere dil ko ye bhi gavara nahin hai khuda bhi agar tumase ake milega tumhari qasam hai mera dil jalega mera pyar vo hai ke threedots

Title: phul gendawaa na maaro lagat karejawaa men chot
Lyrics: haay ajii phul gendawaa na maaro na maaro lagat karejawaa men chot  phul gendawaa na maaro na maaro 2 lagat karejawaa men chot  duungii main duhaaii kaahe chatur banat chhichhorii karat harajaaii  phul gendawaa na maaro na maaro lagat karej t karej 3 gat karejawaa men chot  he dahakaa huaa ye angaaraa angaaraa haan dahakaa huaa ye angaaraa jo gendawaa kahalaaye hai ajii tan par jahaan gire paapii wahiin daag pad jaaye hai angang moraa piir kare aur kar ke kahe phul gendawaa na maaro phul gendawaa na maaro na maaro lagat karejawaa men chot  he phul gendawaa na maaro ajii phul gendawaa na maaro phul gendawaa na maaro 2 maika na maaro 3 phul gendawaa na maaro na maaro lagat karejawaa men chot  ruk jaao 5 na sataao mohe julamii balam o balam 2 maan jaao binatii abalaa kii dekhodekho ab duungii main duhaaii kaahe chatur banat chhichhorii karat harjaaii  phul gendawaa na maaro na maaro na maaro na pa pa dha  dha dha dha ni dha pa ma dha pa ma ga ma ga re sa sa sa sa sa sa sa  phul gendawaa na maaro  na maaro 6 lagat karejawaa men chot karejawaa men chot 2 sa ga ga re re sa sa ma pa ma ga ga re sa sa ni  sa dha dha dha sa pa pa pa sa pa sa pa sa  pa ni ma phul gendawaa na 3 na maaro 3  arre phul gendawaa na maaro na maaro lagat karejawaa men chot  duungii main duhaaii kaahe chatur banat chhichhorii karat harjaaii  phul gend dawaa dawaa dawaa dawaa dawaa dawaa dawaa dawaa dawaa na maaro na maaro lagat karejawaa men chot

Title: lo aa gayii unakii yaad vo nahiin aaye
Lyrics: lo aa gayii unakii yaad vo nahiin aaye  dil unako dhundhataa hai gam kaa singaar kar ke aankhen bhii thak gayii hain ab intazaar kar ke 2 ik saans rah gayii hai vo bhii na tuut jaaye lo aa gayii unakii yaad   threedots  rotii hain aaj ham par tanahaaiyaan hamaariin vo bhii na paaye shaayad parachhaaiyaan hamaariin badhate hii jaa rahe hain maayuusiyon ke saaye lo aa gayii unakii yaad   threedots  lau tharatharaa rahii hai ab shammezindagii kii ujadii huii muhabbat mehamaan hai do ghadii kii mar kar hii ab milenge jii kar to mil na paaye lo aa gayii unakii yaad   threedots

Title: dil todane vaale tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai
Lyrics: lataa dil todane vaale tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai aavaaz de tuu kaun sii nagarii men chhupaa hai dil todane vaale threedots  tuu ham ko jo mil jaae to haal apanaa sunaaen kud roen kabhii aur kabhii tujhe rulaaen vo daag dikhaaen jo hamen tuune diyaa hai  rafii ai dil ke sahaare tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai siine men terii yaad kaa tuufaan uthaa hai ai dil ke sahaare  dil men to ye hasarat hai tere paas main aauun nazaron se giraa huun to nazar kaise milaauun nazar kaise milaauun badanaam huun naakaam huun kyaa mujh men rahaa hai ai dil ke sahaare tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai  lataa dikhalaa ke kinaaraa mujhe mallaah ne luutaa kashtii bhii gaii haath se patavaar bhii chhuutaa patavaar bhii chhuutaa ab aur na jaane merii taqadiir men kyaa hai dil todane vaale tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai  rafii bechain udhar tuu hai to majabuur idhar ham baithe hain chhupaae hue ashqon men teraa gam ashqon men teraa gam har chot ubhar aaii hai har zakm haraa hai  lataa dil todane vaale tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai tujhe dil dhuundh rahaa hai

Title: hue hain tum pe aashiq ham bhalaa maano buraa maano
Lyrics: hue hain tum pe aashiq ham bhalaa maano buraa maano  ye chaahat ab naa hogii kam bhalaa maano buraa maano   ye ruuthii sii nazar ye maathe kii shikan  2  libaaserang men ye bal khaataa badan  hai pyaasaa pyaar kaa ye saaraa baankapan  2 ho ho ho pyaar kyaa hai jaanetamannaa ab to pahachaano  hue hain tum pe threedots  aji ik ham to kyaa ho tum aise hasiin  2  farishtaa bhii tumhe agar dekhe kahin  to jannat bhuul ke bahak jaaye yahiin  2  ho ho ho pyaar kyaa hai threedots hue hain tum pe threedots  tumhi ko chun liyaa nazar kii baat hai  2  liyaa gam aapakaa jigar kii baat hai  ho tum phir bhii khafaa asar kii baat hai  2  ho ho ho pyaar kyaa hai threedots hue hain tum pe  threedots

Title: kahiin qaraar na ho aur kahiin kushii na mile
Lyrics: kahiin qaraar na ho aur kahiin kushii na mile hamaare baad kisii ko ye zindagii na mile  siyaahnasiib koii unase badhake kyaa hogaa 2 jo apanaa ghar bhii jalaa den to roshanii na mile hamaare baad kisii ko threedots   yahii suluuk hai gar aadamii se duniyaa kaa 2 to kuchh ajab nahiin duniyaa men aadamii na mile hamaare baad kisii ko threedots  ye bebasii bhii kisii badduaa se kam to nahiin ke khul ke jii naa sake aur maut bhii na mile hamaare baad kisii ko threedots

Title: pattaapattaa buutaabuutaa
Lyrics: pattaapattaa buutaabuutaa haal hamaaraa jaane hai2 jaane naa jaane gul hii naa jaane2 baag to saaraa jaane hai pattaapattaa buutaabuutaa  phool kii aankhon men hai aansuu koyal kuuke kuuhuu kuu hamako har ek dilawaalaa dukh dard kaa maaraa jaane hai pattaapattaa buutaabuutaa haal hamaaraa jaane hai  biit rahii hai dil pe jo mere usako bhalaa kyaa jaane tuu raat kate hai merii kaise ekek taaraa jaane hai jaane naa jaane gul hii naa jaane baag to saaraa jaane hai pattaapattaa buutaabuutaa haal hamaaraa jaane hai

Title: ai dil machal machal ke yuun
Lyrics: ai dil machal machal ke yuun rotaa hai zaar zaar kyaa ai dil machal machal ke yuun rotaa hai zaar zaar kyaa apanaa chaman ujad gayaa aayegii ab bahaar kyaa apanaa chaman ujad gayaa aayegii ab bahaar kyaa ai dil machal machal ke yuun rotaa hai zaar zaar kyaa  pahale zaraa hansaa diyaa jii bhar ke phir rulaa diyaa pahale zaraa hansaa diyaa jii bhar ke phir rulaa diyaa qismat pe iktiyaar kyaa qismat kaa aitabaar kyaa apanaa chaman ujad gayaa aayegii ab bahaar kyaa ai dil machal machal ke yuun threedots  tuutaa hai is taraha se dil kaanp uthii hai zindagii kaanp uthii hai zindagii tuutaa hai is taraha se dil kaanp uthii hai zindagii kaanp uthii hai zindagii jiite jii ham to mar gaye maut kaa intazaar kyaa apanaa chaman ujad gayaa aayegii ab bahaar kyaa ai dil machal machal ke yuun rotaa hai zaar zaar kyaa

Title: hamase na puuchho ham kahaan chale
Lyrics: hamase na puuchho ham kahaan chale ye dil jahaan le chalaa vahaan chale nazaare piichhepiichhe bahaaren piichhepiichhe diivaanon kaa jidhar kaaravaan chale hamase na puuchho threedots  duniyaa hai shahar aramaanon kaa bikharebikhare afasaanon kaa fasaane ye sunaate chale hain ham gaate ki jaise nagmon kaa kaaravaan chale hamase na puuchho threedots  sapanon kaa chaman hai rang lie dharatii hai gagan ko sang lie daalii pe kalii jhuulen banake jaise phuul qadam tale jaise aasamaan chale hamase na puuchho threedots  naiyaa pe chale jab haule se paanii men bahak gae shole se nazar ko milaae jo ham laharaae to laharon ne puuchhaa kaho kahaan chale hamase na puuchho threedots

Title: khat likh de saanvariyaa ke naam baabuu
Lyrics: threedots ab ke baras bhii biit na jaaye  ye saavan kii raaten dekh le merii ye bechainii  aur likh de do baaten threedots  khat likh de saanvariyaa ke naam baabuu kore kaagaz pe likh de salaam baabuu vo maan jaaenge pahachaan jaaenge kaise hotii hai subah se shaam baabuu   2 khat likh de threedots  saare vaade nikale jhuuthe saamane ho to koii unase ruuthe le gai bairan shahar piyaa ko raam kare ki aisii naukarii chhuute  unhen jisane banaayaa gulaam baabuu kore kaagaz pe likh de salaam baabuu vo jaan jaaenge pahachaan jaaenge kaise hotii hai subah se shaam baabuu  jab aaenge sajanaa mere khan khan khanakenge kanganaa mere paas gali men ghar hai mera us din tu bhi ana anganaa mere kuchh tujhako main dungi inam babu kore kagaz pe likh de salam babu vo jan jaaenge pahachaan jaaenge kaise hotii hai subah se shaam baabuu khat likh de threedots  aur bahut kuchh hai likhavaanaa kaise bataa duun tujhe tuu begaanaa sharm se aankhen jhuk jaaengii dhadak uthegaa moraa dil diivaanaa bas aage nahiin teraa kaam baabuu kore kaagaz pe likh de salaam baabuu vo maan jaaenge pahachaan jaaenge kaise hotii hai subah se shaam baabuu khat likh de threedots

Title: lo cheharaa surk sharaab huaa aankhon ne saagar
Lyrics: lo cheharaa surk sharaab huaa aankhon ne saagar chhalakaayaa 2 ye gussaa haay ye gussaa teraa subhaanallaah ik husn kaa dariyaa chadh aayaa lo cheharaa surk sharaab threedots  ye garm nigaah taubaataubaa patthar men bhii aag bhadak uthe  us dil kaa kudaa hii haafiz hai  2 jo terii nazar se takaraayaa ye gussaa threedots  dekho to zaraa tum mausam ko mausam bhii larazataa hai dar se vo kauf se bijalii kaanp uthii baadal kaa josh utar aayaa ye gussaa threedots  kyon aaga babuulaa hote ho ab chhodo aise gusse ko honthon kii laalii kahatii hai ik sholaa lab tak badh aayaa ye gussaa threedots

Title: dilarubaa maine tere pyaar men  dil diyaa dard liyaa
Lyrics: dilarubaa maine tere pyaar men kyaakyaa naa kiyaa dil diyaa dard liyaa 2 kabhii phuulon men guzaarii kabhii kaanton pe jiyaa dil diyaa dard liyaa 2  zindagii aaj bhii hai bekhudii aaj bhii hai pyaar kahate hain jise vo kushii aaj bhii hai maine dinraat mohabbat kaa terii jaam piyaa dil diyaa dard liyaa 2 dilarubaa maine tere threedots  kyaa kahuun tere lie maine aansuu bhii pie kabhii kaamosh rahaa kabhii shikave bhii kie kar liyaa chaaq garebaan kabhii daaman ko siyaa dil diyaa dard liyaa 2 dilarubaa maine tere threedots  pyaar kii aan hai tuu dil kaa aramaan hai tuu kaun duniyaa se dare jab nigehabaan hai tuu apanii kashtii ko sahaare pe tere chhod diyaa dil diyaa dard liyaa 2 dilarubaa maine tere threedots

Title: ghodaa pishorii meraa taangaa laahorii  main huun alabelaa
Lyrics: ghodaa pishorii meraa taangaa laahorii meraa baitho miyaan jii baitho laalaa main huun alabelaa taange vaalaa 2 ghodaa peshaavarii meraa threedots  taangen thakengii yaaron taange men aao garamii badii hai pyaaron paidal naa jaao hogaa  gulaabii rang kaalaa  2 main huun alabelaa threedots  bachanaa o jaane vaale main tujhape vaarii takaraa naa jaae kahiin shaahii savaarii rotaa  phiregaa gharavaalaa  2 main huun alabelaa threedots  mehanat majuurii karuun rukanaa naa jaanuun aandhii tuufaan ke aage jhukanaa naa jaanuun apanaa  saanii hai rakhavaalaa  2 main huun alabelaa threedots

Title: ham bahanon ke lie mere bhaiyaa aataa hai ek din
Lyrics: ham bahanon ke lie mere bhaiyaa aataa hai ek din saal men 2 aaj ke din main jahaan bhii rahuun chale aanaa vahaan har haal men 2 ham bahanon ke lie mere bhaiyaa aataa hai ek din saal men 2  kitane din aur kitanii rainen  is aangan men rahanaa hai mainne	2 paradesii hotii hain bahanen baabul jaane bhej de merii dolii kab sasuraal men chale aanaa vahaan har haal men  ham bahanon ke lie mere bhaiyaa aataa hai ek din saal men 2 aaj ke din main jahaan bhii rahuun chale aanaa vahaan har haal men 2

Title: ham terii lagan men magan bahut din bhatake
Lyrics: ham terii lagan men magan bahut din bhatake dukh paayaa ham ne naam sanam kaa rat ke ham terii lagan men magan bahut din bhatake  dil hai ki nahiin aataa hai bahalaane men2 kyaa jaane kyaa ho gayaa ye anjaane men ye khel khel men dekh prem ke latake dukh paayaa ham ne naam sanam kaa rat ke ham terii lagan men magan bahut din bhatake  man men hai kuchh miithii miithii tadapan sii badhatii jaatii hai chhaatii kii dhadakan sii dil tod na daale prem panth ke jhatake dukh paayaa ham ne naam sanam kaa rat ke ham terii lagan men magan bahut din bhatake  laharon men bahakar ho gaye nyaare nyaare2 ham se naiyya naiyya se duur kinaare aramaan na jaane kahaan kahaan jaa bhatake dukh paayaa ham ne naam sanam kaa rat ke ham terii lagan men magan bahut din bhatake

Title: maangii hain duaaen hamane sanam
Lyrics: maangii hain duaaen hamane sanam is dil ko dhadakanaa aa jaae ik nazareinaayat ho ham par kuchh hamako bahakanaa aa jaae maangii hain duaaen threedots  tum hamase mohabbat karate ho 2 ye baat agar tum kah do kabhii 2 phuulon ko barasanaa aa jaae 2 bijalii ko chamakanaa aa jaae maangii hain duaaen threedots  ham pii ke sharaabeishq agar 2 mahafil men kisii din aa jaaen 2 saaqii ko bahakanaa aa jaae 2 saagar ko chhalakanaa aa jaae maangii hain duaaen threedots

Title: saanjh bhaii jhaanjh bhed jiyaraa ke khole re
Lyrics: saanjh bhaii jhaanjh bhed jiyaraa ke khole re saanjh bhaii  thandii puravaiyaa kii thandiithandii chhaanv men thandiithandii chhaanv men kahataa hai koii chal sapanon ke gaanv men pii kii suuratiyaa pii kii suuratiyaa hiyaa men aaj dole re hiyaa men aaj dole  ambuvaa kii daalii pe papiihaa pukaare piyaa piyaa mere piyaa ab naa sataa re taal nahiin baat taal nahiin baat aaj sang sang hole mere sang sang ho le  saanjh bhaii

Title: diivaanaa mujhako log kahe main samajhuun jag hai diivaanaa

Title: ye raat bahut rangiin sahii
Lyrics: ye raat bahut rangiin sahii ye raat bahut rangiin sahii is raat men gam kaa zahar bhii hai nagamon kii khanak men duubii huii fariyaadofugaan kii lahar bhii hai ye raat bahut rangiin sahii  tum raqs karo main sher padhuun matalab to hai kuchh kairaat mile is qaum ke bachchon kii kaatir kuchh sikkon kii saugaat mile sikke to karodon dhaldhalakar takasaal se baahar aate hain kin vaaron men kho jaate hain kin pardon men chhup jaate hain  ye zulm nahiin to phir kyaa hai paise se to kaale dhandhe hon aur mulk kii vaaris naslon kii taaliim kii kaatir chande hon ab kaam nahiin chal sakane kaa raham aur kairaat ke naare se is des ke bachche anapadh hain daulat ke galat bantavaare se  badale ye nizaamezaradaarii badale ye nizaamezaradaarii   kah do ye siyaasatadaanon se ye masaalaa hal hone kaa nahiin kaagaz pe chhape elaanon se ye masaalaa hal hone kaa nahiin kaagaz pe chhape elaanon se  ye raat bahut rangiin sahii is raat men gam kaa zahar bhii hai ye raat bahut rangiin sahii

Lyrics: ko maambo jaambo maambo jaambo maambo jaambo maambo jaambo maambo jaambo maambo jaambo maambo jaambo maambo jaambo  mu ai dil dekhe hain hamane bade bade sangadil ko aa aa aa aa  mu manzil milii jo hamako badal gaii mahafil ko aa aa aa aa 2 mu ai dil ko aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa  mu kitanii ajab hai dekho duniyaa begaanii 2 patthar ko hiiraa bole duniyaa diivaanii kitanii ajab hai dekho  sachchaa kabhii na haaraa chamakaa zamiin kaa taaraa  sun lo ye kahanaa hamaaraa 2  mu ai dil dekhe hain hamane bade bade sangadil ko aa aa aa aa mu manzil milii jo hamako badal gaii mahafil ko aa aa aa aa mu ai dil ko aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa  mu dil kii nazar se dekho apanon ko jaano 2 gairon kii baaten chhodo kud ko pahachaano dil kii nazar se dekho dil men samaanaa siikho sapanon men aanaa siikho apanaa banaanaa siikho 2  mu ai dil dekhe hain hamane bade bade sangadil ko aa aa aa aa  mu manzil milii jo hamako badal gaii mahafil ko aa aa aa aa 2 mu ai dil

Title: ye dil tum bin kahiin lagataa nahiin ham kyaa karen
Lyrics: lataa ye dil tum bin kahiin lagataa nahiin ham kyaa karen ye dil tum bin kahiin lagataa nahiin ham kyaa karen tasavvur men koi basataa nahiin ham kyaa karen tumhii kah do ab ai jaanevafaa ham kyaa karen  rafi lute dil men diyaa jalataa nahiin ham kyaa karen tumhi kah do ab ai jaaneadaa ham kyaa karen  lataa ye dil tum bin kahiin lagataa nahiin ham kyaa karen  kisii ke dil men bas ke dil ko tadapaanaa nahin achchhaa  2 nigaahon ko chhalakate dekh ke chhup jaanaa nahiin achchhaa ummidon ke khile gulashan ko jhulasaanaa nahiin achchhaa hamen tum bin koi janchataa nahiin ham kyaa karen tumhi kah do ab ai jaanevafaa ham kyaa karen  rafi lute dil men diyaa jalataa nahiin ham kyaa karen  muhabbat kar to len lekin muhabbat raas aaye bhi  2 dilon ko bojh lagate hain kabhi zulfon ke saaye bhi hazaaron gam hain is duniyaa men apane bhi paraaye bhi muhabbat hi kaa gam tanhaa nahiin ham kyaa karen tumhi kah do ab ai jaaneadaa ham kyaa karen  lataa ye dil tum bin kahiin lagataa nahiin ham kyaa karen  bujhaa do aag dil ki yaa ise khul kar havaa de do  2 rafi jo isakaa mol de paaye use apani vafaa de do lataa tumhaare dil men kyaa hai bas hamen itanaa pataa de do ke ab tanhaa safar katataa nahiin ham kyaa karen rafi lute dil men diyaa jalataa nahiin ham kyaa karen lataa ye dil tum bin kahin lagataa nahiin ham kyaa karen

Lyrics: likhe jo kat tujhe vo terii yaad men hazaaron rang ke nazaare ban gae  saveraa jab huaa to phuul ban gae jo raat aaii to sitaare ban gae  koii nagamaa kahiin guunjaa kahaa dil ne ke tuu aaii kahiin chatakii kalii koii main ye samajhaa tuu sharamaaii koii kushabuu kahiin bikarii lagaa ye zulf laharaaii  fizaa rangiin adaa rangiin ye ithalaanaa ye sharamaanaa ye angadaaii ye tanahaaii ye tarasaa kar chale jaanaa banaa de naa kahiin mujhako javaan jaaduu ye diivaanaa  jahaan tuu hai vahaan main huun mere dil kii tuu dhadakan hai musaafir main tuu manzil hai main pyaasaa huun tuu saavan hai merii duniyaa ye nazaren hain merii jannat ye daaman hai

Title: mujhako apane gale lagaa lo ai mere hamaraahii
Lyrics: mujhako apane gale lagaa lo ai mere hamaraahii tumako kyaa batalaauun main ki tumase kitanaa pyaar hai mujhako apane gale lagaa lo   jab tum mujhase duur rahate ho jiyaa meraa ghabaraataa hai niind aankhon se ud jaatii hai chaand agan barasaataa hai donon pahaluu jal jaate hain aag men aag lagaataa hai jaise tadape bin jal machhalii pyaar mujhe tadapaataa hai  pyaar mujhe tadapaataa hai is ulajhan se mujhako bachaa lo ai mere hamaraahii tumako kyaa batalaauun main   jin raahon par hansake chalo tum phuul vahaan khil jaate hain dam lene ko jahaan ruko tum madhushaale ban jaate hain tumako chhuukar pavan jhakore khushabuu lekar jaate hain lekin ham to dekhake suurat dil thaame rah jaate hain  dil thaame rah jaate hain dil se dil ke taar milaa lo ai mere hamaraahii tumako kyaa batalaauun main   jab tak tumako main na dekhuun chain mujhe kab aataa hai khoj men terii man kaa panchhii duur kahiin kho jaataa hai jab tum mujhako mil jaatii ho dard davaa ban jaataa hai varanaa tum bin saaraa jiivan suunaa ban kahalaataa hai suunaa ban kahalaataa hai har manzil par mujhako sanbhaalo ai mere hamaraahii tumako kyaa batalaauun main
