Lyrics: mujhe duniyaa vaalon sharaabii na samajho main piitaa nahiin huun pilaayii gayii hai   2 jahaan bekhudii men kadam ladakhadaaye vahii raah mujhako dikhaayii gayii hai mujhe duniyaa vaalon sharaabii na samajho main piitaa nahiin huun pilaayii gayii hai  nashe me huun lekin mujhe ye khabar hai ke is zindagii men sabhii pii rahen hai kisii ko mile hain chhalakate piyaale kisiiko nazar se pilayii gayii hai mujhe duniyaa vaalon threedots  zamaane ke yaaron chalan hain niraale yahaan tan hain ujale magar dil hain kaale ye duniyaa hai duniyaa yahan mar dar ke dilon kii kharaabii chhupaayii gayii hai mujhe duniyaa vaalon threedots

Title: ik musaafir ko duniyaa men kyaa chaahie
Lyrics: ik musaafir ko duniyaa men kyaa chaahie sirf thodii sii dil men jagah chaahie baith jaauun  o mote laalaa tuune kiyaa hai kaisaa chhal khisak zaraa pyaare sarak zaraa pyaare 2 aisii body men dil bhii badaa chaahie ik musaafir ko threedots  o lambii daadhii vaale tuu gussaa mat kar hamen bhii jagah dede zaraa kudaa se dar khisak zaraa pyaare sarak zaraa pyaare 2 teraa photo na teraa pataa chaahie ik musaafir ko threedots  ham par bhii kar do zaraa inaayat kii nazar kushii se kat jaae hamaaraa bhii safar khisak zaraa pyaare sarak zaraa pyaare 2 yuun kisii kaa na dil todanaa chaahie ik musaafir ko threedots

Lyrics: na tel aur na baatii na kaabuu havaa par diye kyon jalaaye chalaa jaa rahaa hai  ujaalon ko tere siyaahii ne gheraa nigal jaayegaa roshani ko andheraa chiragon kii lau par dhuaan chaa rahaa hai diye kyon jalaaye chalaa jaa rahaa hai na tel aur threedots  na de dosh bhagavaan ko bhole bhaale khushii kii tamannaa men gam tuune paale tuu apane kiye kii sazaa paa rahaa hai diye kyon jalaaye chalaa jaa rahaa hai na tel aur threedots  tere bhuul par kal yah duniyaa hansegii nishaanii har ik daag banakar rahegii tuu bharane kii khaatir mitaa jaa rahaa hai diye kyon jalaaye chalaa jaa rahaa hai na tel aur threedots

Title: isako bhii apanaataa chal
Film: nai umar ki nai fasal new crop of the new age
Lyrics: isako bhii apanaataa chal usako bhii apanaataa chal raahii hain sab ek dagar ke sab par pyaar lutaataa chal isako bhii apanaataa chal usako bhii apanaataa chal  idhar kafan tak nahiin laash par udhar numaayish resham kii yahaan swayanvar kare chaandanii vahaan na raat kate gam kii dharatii kankar patthar maare ambar ugale angaare koii puuchhe baat na is bagiyaa men dukhiyaa shabanam kii  sukh kii umr badhaataa chal dukh ko kafan odhaataa chal mile jahaan bhii mahal use kutiyaa ke paas bulaataa chal isako bhii apanaataa chal usako bhii apanaataa chal  bikaabikii sab or machii hai aane yaa do aanon par ismat bike doraahon par to pyaar bike duukaanon par dagardagar par mandir masjid qadam qadam par gurudvaare bhagavaanon kii bastii men hai zulm bahut inasaanon par  khidakii har khulavaataa chal saantal  har katavaataa chal is par bhii roshanii na ho to dil kaa diyaa jalaataa chal isako bhii apanaataa chal usako bhii apanaataa chal  ridarde ke biich khaaiyaan lahuu bichhaa maidaanon men ghuum rahe hain yuddh sadak par shaanti chhipii shamashaanon men zanjiiren kat gaiin magar aazaad nahiin inasaan abhii duniyaa bhar kii kushii qaid hai chaandii jade makaanon men  tattat raas rachaataa chal panaghatpanaghat gaataa chal pyaasaa hai har praan nayan kaa gangaa jal chhalakaataa chal isako bhii apanaataa chal usako bhii apanaataa chal  nayannayan tarase sapanon ko aanchal tarase phuulon ko aangan tarase tyohaaron ko galiyaan tarasen jhuulon ko kisii honth par baje na bansii kisii haath men biin nahiin umar samundar kii de daalii kis ne chand babuulon ko  soii kiran jagaataa chal ruuthii subahen manaataa chal pyaar naqaabon men na band ho har ghuunghat khulavaataa chal isako bhii apanaataa chal usako bhii apanaataa chal

Title: mere mahabuub tuu mujhako
Lyrics: meraa qaraar hai tuu  merii zindagii hii tuu hai na koii gair huun main na ajanabii hii tuu hai   mere mahabuub tuu mujhako na banaa aur diiwaanaa  2 tuu wahii merii shammaa hai main wahii teraa parawaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako na banaa aur diiwaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako  o o o   pyaar kaa rishtaa koii na jaane main samajhuun yaa tuu pahachaane  2 hamane guzaariin thiin bahaaren kabhii milake yaad karo wo zamaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako na banaa aur diiwaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako   dekh wo merii pichhalii wafaaen aankhon se terii chhalakii jaayen  2 khel nahiin hai rok lenaa dil kaa tuufaan ye bhii na tuune jaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako na banaa aur diiwaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako  o o o  pyaar pe mere mujhako yaqiin hai maanuun main kaise tuu wo nahiin hai  2 merii hii yaaden hai chhupaae dil ye teraa laakh bane anjaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako na banaa aur diiwaanaa tuu wahii merii shammaa hai main wahii teraa parawaanaa mere mahabuub tuu mujhako

Title: affuu khudaayaa
Lyrics: affuu khudaayaa  vaahvaahvaahvaah vaahvaahvaahvaah is diivaane dil ne kyaa jaaduu chalaayaa tumako hamape pyaar aayaa pyaar aayaa oy hamako tumape pyaar aayaa pyaar aayaa affuu khudaayaa  jii diyaa main ne jii liyaa main ne ab chaahe mujhako zamaanaa golii maar de raajaa ke shikaare ko bhanvar men utaar de aage jii ke kyaa lenaa hai mere dil ne jo bhii maangaa thaa vo paayaa tumako hamape pyaar aayaa pyaar aayaa affuu khudaayaa  dil men ye aaii deke duhaaii pattharon se sar takaraauun main diivaanaa jal jaauun banake shamaa kaa paravaanaa maranaajiinaa khaanaapiinaa hansanaaronaa nahaanaadhonaa sonaauthanaa chalanaaphiranaa aanaajaanaa ham diivaane ne muhabbat men bhulaayaa hamako tumape pyaar aayaa pyaar aayaa affuu khudaayaa

Title: do rang duniyaa ke aur do raaste
Lyrics: do rang duniyaa ke aur do raaste 2 do ruup jiiwan ke jiine ke waaste do rang duniyaa ke aur do raaste  soch samajh ke paanv rakhe samajhaa do har diiwaane ko 2 ik rastaa mandir ko jaaye ik jaaye maikaane ko 2 raastaa bhuul na jaaye raahii dhokhaa naa khaaye  do rang duniyaa ke aur do raaste do ruup jiiwan ke jiine ke waaste do rang duniyaa ke aur do raaste  ek hain aise log jo auron kii kaatir jiite hain 2 duusare wo jo apanii kaatir apanon kaa kuun bhii piite hain 2 koii phuul khilaaye koii kaante bikharaaye  do rang duniyaa ke aur do raaste do ruup jiiwan ke jiine ke waaste do rang duniyaa ke aur do raaste aur do raaste 3

Title: sab men shaamil ho magar sabase judaa rahatii ho
Lyrics: sab men shaamil ho magar sabase judaa rahatii ho sirf hamase nahiin khud se bhii kafaa lagatii ho sab men shaamil threedots  aankh uthatii hai na jhukatii hai kisii kii kaatir 2 saans chadhatii hai na rukatii hai kisii kii kaatir jo kisii dar pe na thahare vo havaa lagatii ho sirf hamase nahiin threedots  zulf laharaae to aanchal men chhupaa letii ho 2 honth tharraaen to daanton men dabaa letii ho jo kabhii khul ke na barase vo ghataa lagatii ho sirf hamase nahiin threedots  jaagiijaagii nazar aatii ho na soiisoii 2 tum jo ho apane kyaalaat men khoiikhoii kisii maayuus musavvir kii duaa lagatii ho sirf hamase nahiin threedots

Title: koii jab raah na paae mere sang aae
Lyrics: koii jab raah na paae mere sang aae ke pag pag diip jalaae merii dostii meraa pyaar  jiivan kaa yahii hai dastuur pyaar binaa akelaa majabuur dostii ko maane to sab dukh duur koi kaahe thokar khaae mere sang aae threedots  dono ke hain ruup hazaar par merii sune jo sansaar dostii hai bhaaii to bahanaa hai pyaar koi mat chain churaae mere sang aae threedots  pyaar kaa hai pyaar hii naam kahiin miiraa kahiin ghanashyaam dostii kaa yaaro nahiin koi daam koi kahiin duur naa jaae mere sang aae threedots

Title: na jaao sainyaa chhudaa ke bainyaa
Lyrics: na jaao sainyaa chhudaa ke bainyaa qasam tumhaari main ro paduungii ro paduungii machal rahaa hai suhaag meraa jo tum na ho to main kyaa karuungii kyaa karuungii  ye bikharii zulfen ye ghulataa kajaraa ye mahakii chunarii ye man kii madiraa ye sab tumhaare liye hai priitam main aaj tum ko na jaane duungii jaane na duungi  main tumharii daasii janam kii pyaasii tumhin ho meraa shhringaar priitam tumhaarii raste kii dhuul le kar main maang apanii sadaa bharuungii sadaa bharuungii  jo mujh se akhiyaan churaa rahe ho to merii itanii araj bhii sun lo piyaa ye merii araj bhii sun lo tumhaarii qadamon men aa gayii huun yahiin jiyuungii yahiin maruungii yahiin maruungii

Title: aa matalab kaa tuu miit  toraa man badaa paapii
Lyrics: aa matalab kaa tuu miit bedardii garaz kii raakhe priit dukhiyaa man ko ghaayal karanaa samajhe tuu apanii jiit aa  toraa man badaa paapii saanvariyaa re 2 milaae chhalbal se najariyaa re 2 toraa man badaa threedots  tuu sangadil hai terii zindagii men pyaar nahiin tere chaman men hai sabkuchh magar bahaar nahiin tujhe qasam hai na yuun muskaraa ke dekh hamen teirii nazar kaa bhii zaalim kuchh aitabaar nahiin haan milaae chhalbal se threedots  sitamagaron kii inaayat se berukii achchhii jo tere saath naa guzare vo zindagii achchhii garaz kaa yaar hai matalab kaa tuu hai diivaanaa na terii dostii achchhii na dushmanii achchhii haan milaae chhalbal se threedots  jahaan men ho jise jiinaa vo tujhase duur rahe jo maranaa chaahe vo aakar tere huzuur rahe ye kyaa gazab hai ki ham aah karake hon badanaam tuu laakh zulm kare phir bhii beqasuur rahe haan milaae chhalbal se threedots

Title: chhedaa mere dil ne taraanaa tere pyaar kaa
Lyrics: chhedaa mere dil ne taraanaa tere pyaar kaa jisane sunaa kho gayaa puuraa nashaa ho gayaa chhedaa mere dil ne threedots  aankhen banii paimaane dil hue mastaane raahen badii matavaalii gaane lage diivaane milaa mere giit men fasaanaa tere pyar kaa jisane sunaa kho gayaa puuraa nashaa ho gayaa chhedaa mere dil ne threedots  gesuu banii zanjiiren qaid huiin taqadiiren naach rahii hain javaaniyaan jaise terii tasviiren hai teraa naam bhii shaguufaa hai bahaar kaa jisane sunaa kho gayaa puuraa nashaa ho gayaa chhedaa mere dil ne threedots  bhole bhaale qaatil jiinaa kar diyaa mushkil jab bhii tuu sharmaaii dil huaa meraa bismil khaalii nahiin jaataa nishaanaa tere vaar kaa milane tujhe jo gayaa zakmii vahii ho gayaa chhedaa mere dil ne threedots

Title: ai dil pyaar kii manzil ab hai muqaabil dekh to le
Lyrics: ai dil pyaar kii manzil ab hai muqaabil dekh to le aanchal dhal gayaa sar se chaand ko apane dekh to le ai dil pyaar kii manzil threedots  aaj ke jaisii raat na hogii ye halachal ye baat na hogii dekhane vaale dekhate jaa tuu roz to ye barasaat na hogii ai dil pyaar kii manzil threedots  tab ek sapanaa dekh rahaa thaa ab ek sapanaa dekh rahaa huun kyaa hai nazaaraa kyaa batalaauun dekh lo kyaakyaa dekh rahaa huun ai dil pyaar kii manzil threedots  saamane mere vo jo vahaan hain jinakii nazar mere donon jahaan hain kaash koii ye puuchh le unase kal vo kahaan the aaj kahaan hain ai dil pyaar kii manzil threedots

Title: ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin
Lyrics: ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin  ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin 5 ye rangruup kaa chaman ye husnoishq kaa vatan yahii to vo maqaam hai jahaan avadh kii shaam hai javaanjavaan hasiinhasiin ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin	2  shabaabosher kaa ye ghar ye ahleilm kaa nagar hai manzilon kii god men yahaan har ek raahguzar ye shahar laalaazaar hai yahaan dilon men pyaar hai jidhar nazar uthaaiye bahaar hii bahaar hai kaliikalii hai naazaniin ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin	2  yahaan kii sab ravaayaten adab kii shaahakaar hain amiir ahledil yahaan gariib jaannisaar hain har ek shaakh par yahaan hain bulabulon ke chahachahe galiigalii men zindagii qadamqadam pe kahakahe har ik nazaaraa dilanashiin ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin   yahaan ke dost baawafaa muhabbaton se aashanaa kisii ke ho gae agar rahe usii ke umra bhar nibhaaii apanii aan bhii badhaaii dil kii shaan bhii hain aise meharabaan bhii kaho to de den jaan bhii jo dostii kaa ho yaqiin ye lakhanauu kii sarzamiin

Title: badale badale mere sarakaar nazar aate hain
Lyrics: badale badale mere sarakar nazar aate hain ghar kii barabaadii ke aasaar nazar aate hain  mere maalik ne muhabbat kaa chalan chhod diyaa kar ke barabaad ummiidon kaa chaman chhod diyaa phuul bhii ab to kaar nazar aate hain ghar kii barabaadii ke   duube rahate the mere pyaar men jo shaamosahar mere chehare se nahiin hatatii thii kabhii jinakii nazar merii suurat se hii bezaar nazar aate hain ghar kii barabaadii ke

Title: ham bhii agar bachche hote  happy birthday to you
Lyrics: ham bhii agar bachche hote 2 naam hamaaraa hotaa gabaluu babaluu khaane ko milate ladduu aur duniyaa kahatii happy birthday to you  koii laataa gudiyaa motar rel to koii laataa phirakii lattuu koii chaabii kaa tattuu aur duniyaa kahatii happy birthday to you   kitanii pyaarii hotii hai ye bholii sii umar na naukarii kii chintaa na rotii kii phikar  2 nanhemunne hote ham to dete sau hukum piichhepiichhe papamummy banake naukar aur duniyaa kahatii happy birthday to you   kaisekaise nakare karate gharawaalon se ham pal men hansate pal men rote karate naak men dam  2 akkadbakkad lukkachhupii kabhii chhuaachhuu karate din bhar hallaagullaa dangaa aur udham aur kabhii zid par ad jaate jaise adiyal tattuu aur duniyaa kahatii happy birthday to you   ab to ye hai haal ke jab se biitaa bachapan maan se jhagadaa baap se takkar biiwii se anaban  2 kolhuu ke ham bail bane hain dhobii ke gadhe duniyaa bhar ke dande sar pe khaayen danaadan bachapan apanaa hotaa to na karate dhenchuudhenchuu aur duniyaa kahatii happy birthday to you

Title: baad muddat ke yah ghadii aaii
Lyrics: ra baad muddat ke yah ghadii aaii     aap aae to zindagii aaii     ishq mar marake kaamayaab huaa     aaj ek zarraa aaftaab huaa  su shukriyaa ai huzuur aane kaa     vaqt jaagaa gariibkhaane kaa     ek zamaane ke baad iid huii     iid se pahale merii diid huii  ra iid kaa chaand aaj dekhaa hai     iid kaa kyon na aitabaar aae     haath uthaakar duaa yah karataa huun     iid phir aisii baarbaar aae      din zamaane kaa raat apanii hai     is ghadii qaayanaat apanii hai     ishq par husn kii inaayat hai     mere pahaluu men merii jannat hai  su faasale vaqt ne mitaa hii diye     dil tadapate hue milaa hii diye     kaash is vaqt maut aa jaae     zindagaanii pe aake chhaa jaae  donon baat muddat ke threedots

Title: aayaa hai mujhe phir yaad vo zaaliim guzaraa zamaanaa bachapan kaa
Lyrics: aayaa hai mujhe phir yaad vo zaalim  guzaraa zamaanaa bachapan kaa  haay re akele chhod ke jaanaa  aur na aanaa bachapan kaa  aayaa hai mujhe phir yaad vo zaalim   vo khel vo saathii vo jhuule  vo daud ke kahanaa aa chhu le ham aaj talak bhi na bhuule  2 vo khvaab suhaanaa bachapan ka  aayaa hai mujhe phir yaad vo zaalim   isakii sabako pahachaan nahiin  ye do din ka mehamaan nahiin  mushkil hai bahut aasaan nahiin  2 ye pyaar bhulaanaa bachapan ka  aayaa hai mujhe phir yaad vo zaalim   mil kar roye fariyaad karen  un biite dinon kii yaad karen  ai kaash kahiin mil jaaye koi  2 vo miit puraanaa bachapan ka  aayaa hai mujhe phir yaad vo zaalim

Lyrics: ai jaanebahaaraan jaanekaram mit jaaen sabhii duniyaa ke sitam chhaa jaaen jahaan par ham hii ham gar teraa sahaaraa mil jaae  ham pyaar ke raahii aakir ko ab aa hii gae is manzil pe jalave to hazaaron dekh lie dekhaa nahiin tujhasaa mahafil men aa jaae zamaanaa zereqadam gar teraa sahaaraa threedots  ho jaae jo gar ham par ek nazar us ek nazar kaa kyaa kahanaa ho jaae jigar men dard bhii kam gar teraa sahaaraa threedots

Title: pagadii sambhaal jattaa
Lyrics: pagadii sambhaal oy pagadii sambhaal oy aa  pagadii sambhaal jattaa pagadii sambhaal oy pagadii sambhaal teraa lut gayaa maal oy  tuu dharatii kii maang sanvaare soye khet jagaaye saare jag kaa pet bhare tuu annadaataa kahalaaye phir kyon bhuukh tujhe khaatii hai aur tuu bhuukh ko khaaye lut gayaa maal teraa lut gayaa maal oy pagadii sambhaal jattaa threedots  deke apanaa khuun pasiinaa tuune fasal ugaayii aandhii dekhii tuufaan jhele bipadaa sabhii uthaayii fasal katii to le gaye zaalim terii nek kamaayii lut gayaa maal teraa lut gayaa maal oy pagadii sambhaal jattaa threedots  uth aur uth ke khaaq se zarre ek sitaaraa ban jaa bujhaa bujhaa kyon dil hai teraa ik angaaraa ban jaa o sadiyon ke thahare paanii bahatii dhaaraa ban jaa lut gayaa maal teraa lut gayaa maal oy pagadii sambhaal jattaa threedots

Title: zindagii ke mod par jo koii raastaa milaa
Lyrics: zindagii ke mod par jo koii raastaa milaa terii galii se jaa milaa 2  aaj khaate hain thokaren shahar men zindagii ke ham 2 tujhase chale the duurduur gam kii sharaab pii ke ham 2 terii taraf bahak gae 2 aisaa hamen nashaa milaa  teraa kyaal chhod ke badh gaiin aur ulajhanen tere hii naam kii sadaa detii hai dil kii dhadakanen 2 ab ye hii sochate hain ham ruuth ke tujhase kyaa milaa 2  tujhase koii garaz nahiin phir bhii hai terii aarazuu dil ne tujhe bhulaa diyaa phir bhii hai dil men tuu hii tuu 2 tujhase bichhad gae to ab 2 teraa hamen pataa milaa 2 terii galii se jaa threedots

Title: baithen hain kyaa us ke paas aaiinaa mujh saa nahiin
Lyrics: baithen hain kyaa us ke paas aaiinaa mujh saa nahiin merii taraf dekhiye  aaiine kii nazar men aisii mastii kahaan hai mastii merii nazar kii itanii sachchii kahaan hai baithe hain kyaa us ke paas  threedots  ye lab ham kyuun chhuu le yuun hii aahen bharen kyaa ham se bhii khuubasuurat tum ho ham bhii karen kyaa baithen hain kyaa us ke paas  threedots  biitii hai raat kitanii ye sab kuchh bhuul jaayen jalatii shammen bujhaa ke aao ham dil jalaayen baithen hain kyaa us ke paas  threedots

Title: phir vo bhuulii sii yaad aaii hai
Lyrics: koii mere dil se puuchhe tere tiireniimakash ko vo kalish kahaan se uthatii jo jigar ke paar hotaa   phir vo bhuulii sii yaad aaii hai 2 ai gamedil terii duhaaii hai phir vo bhuulii sii threedots  baat itanii sii hai kahaanii men 2 ham bhii maare gae javaanii men 2 aag siine men khud lagaaii hai ai gamedil terii threedots  aankh men buund bhar jo paanii hai 2 pyaar kii ik yahii nishaanii hai 2 rote biitii hai jo bitaaii hai ai gamedil terii threedots

Title: sambhal ke karanaa jo bhii karanaa naazuk haathon vaale
Lyrics: sambhal ke karanaa jo bhii karanaa naazuk haathon vaale lachak na jaae naram kalaaii pad na jaaen chhaale sambhal ke karanaa threedots  hataa ke parade nikal pade ho muqaabalaa kyaa tum hii bade ho magar ai jaanaan idhar to dekho ham bhii hain dilavaale 2 sambhal ke karanaa threedots  salonii chitavan adaaen qaatil vo lut gayaa jo huaa muqaabil ye tirachhiitirachhii nazar tumhaarii hamako maar na daale 2 lachak na jaae threedots  tane hain tevar chadhaa hai paaraa tumhaaraa gussaa bhii jaan se pyaaraa ruup kaa jaaduu jab chadh jaae dil ko kaun sambhaale 2 sambhal ke karanaa threedots

Title: ham tumase judaa ho ke mar jaaenge roro ke
Lyrics: ham tumase judaa ho ke mar jaaenge roro ke 2 mar jaaenge roro ke  duniyaa badii zaalim hai dil tod ke hansatii hai 2 ik mauj kinaare se milane ko tarasatii hai kah do na koii roke 2 ham tumase judaa threedots  vaade nahiin bhuulenge kasamen nahiin todenge 2 ye tay hai ki ham donon milanaa nahiin chhodenge jo rok sake roke 2 ham tumase judaa threedots  sochaa thaa kabhii do dil milakar na judaa honge maaluum na thaa ham yuun naaqaamevafaa honge qismat nen die dhokhe ham tumase judaa threedots

Title: yuun zindagii ke raaste sanvaarate chale gae
Lyrics: yuun zindagii ke raaste  sanvaarate chale gae  2 qadamqadam pe ham tumhen  pukaarate chale gae  2  jo pyaar men guzar gaii vo zindagii thii zindagii us zindagii ko pyaar se nikhaarate chale gae 2 qadamqadam pe ham threedots  chalaa hai raahii pyaar kaa havaaon de do raastaa qasam tumhen hai pyaar kii hai do dilon kaa vaastaa ye do dilon kii bastiyaan magar bhanvar men kashtiyaan utaarate chale gae 2 qadamqadam pe ham threedots  kyaal teraa saath hai aur yaad terii saath hai milenge zindagii men ham abhii talaq ye aas hai o soniyaa 2 o sonii sonii soniyaa

Title: kah do kah do jahaan se kah do ishq par zor nahiin
Lyrics: ra 	kah do kah do jahaan se kah do ishq par zor nahiin 	mar jaaenge ik duuje par machegaa koii shor nahiin  su 	teraa tasavvur saat rang subahoshaam 	pyaar bharaa tuufaan uthaae subahoshaam 	sapane suhaane dikhaae subahoshaam 	dil kii zubaan par rahataa hai teraa naam 	haay tumasaa kahaan se laauun 	jahaan men koii aur nahiin 	mar jaaenge ik duuje threedots  ra 	diip kahiin jale patangaa vahiin jaae 	chaand kahiin khile chakoraa vahiin jaae 	phuul kahiin mahake to bhanvaraa vahiin jaae 	dil kaa papiihaa tere hii paas jaae 	meraa dil hai vo paagal panchhii 	ke aisaa to chakor nahiin 	mar jaaenge ik duuje threedots  su 	pyaar kii agan men jale hain do badan 	kam nahiin hogii ye pyaar kii lagan 	pyaar hai vo sholaa bujhegaa naa kabhii 	chaahe kitanaa paanii giraae ye gagan 	pyaar itanii hasiin zindagii hai 	ki aisaa koii daur nahiin 	mar jaaenge ik duuje threedots

Title: kaal kaa pahiyaa ghuume bhaiyaa
Lyrics: moviechanda aur bijli printitle  kaal kaa pahiyaa ghuume bhaiyaa laakh tarah insaan chale le ke chale baaraat kabhii to kabhii binaa saamaan chale  raam krishhn hari threedots   janak kii betii avadh kii raanii siitaa bhatake ban ban men raah akelii raat andherii magar ratan hain daaman men saath na jis ke chalataa koii us ke saath bhagavaan chale   raam krishhn hari threedots   haay rii qismat krishhn kanhaiyaa svaad na jaane maakhan kaa hansii churaaye phuulon kii vo kans hai maalii upavan kaa bhuul na paapii magar paap kii jyaadaa nahiin dukaan chale   raama krishhn hari threedots   ajab hai kaisii prabhu kii maayaa maalaa se bichudaa daanaa dhuundhe jise man saamane hai vo jaaye na lekin pahachaanaa kaise vo maalik dikhe tujhe jab saath tere abhimaan chale   raama krishhn hari threedots   karm agar achchhaa hai teraa qismat terii daasii hai dil hai teraa saaf to pyaare ghar men mathuraa kaashii hai sachchaaii kii raah chalo re jab tak jiivan praan chale   raama krishhn hari threedots

Title: main terii nazar kaa suruur huun
Lyrics: main teri nazar ka suruur huun tujhe yaad ho ke na yaad ho  tere paas rahake bhi dur huun  tujhe yaad ho ke na yaad ho  main teri nazar ka suruur huun   mujhe aankh se to giraa diyaa  kaho dil se bhi kya bhulaa diyaa   2 teri aashiqii ka guruur huun  tujhe yaad ho ke na yaad ho  main teri nazar ka threedots  teri zulf hai mere haath men  ke tu aaj bhi mere saath hai   2 tere dil men bhi main zaruur huun  tujhe yaad ho ke na yaad ho  main teri nazar ka threedots

Title: ek thaa gul aur ek thii bulabul dono chaman men rahate the
Lyrics: ek thaa gul aur ek thi bulabul  2 dono chaman men rahate the hai ye kahaani bilakul sachchii mere naanaa kahate the ek thaa gul aur threedots  bulabul kuchh aise gaati thii jaise tum baaten karati ho vo gul aise sharmaataa thaa jaise main ghabaraa jaataa huun bulabul ko maalum nahi thaa gul aise kyon sharamaataa thaa vo kyaa jaane usakaa nagamaa gul ke dil ko dhadakaataa thaa dil ke bhed naa aate lab pe ye dil men hi rahate the ek thaa gul aur threedots  lekin aakhir dil ki baaten aise kitane din chhupati hain ye vo kaliyaan hai jo ik din bas kaante banake chubhati hain ik din jaan liyaa bulabul ne vo gul usakaa divaana hai tumako pasand aayaa ho to boluun phir aage jo afasaanaa hai  ik duje kaa ho jaane par vo dono majabuur hue un dono ke pyaar ke kisse gulashan men mashahuur hue saath jiyenge saath marenge vo dono ye kahate the ek thaa gul aur threedots  phir ik din ki baat sunaauun ik sayyaad chaman men aayaa le gaye vo bulabul ko pakadake aur divaanaa gul murajhaayaa  2 shaayar log bayaan karate hain aise unaki judaai ki baaten gaate the ye git vo dono saiyaan binaa nahi katati raaten  2 mast bahaaron kaa mausam thaa aankh se aansuu bahate the ek thaa gul aur threedots  aati thi aavaaz hameshaa ye jhilamil jhilamil taaron se jisakaa naam muhabbat hai vo kab rukati hai divaaron se ik din aah gulobulabul kii us pinjare se jaa takarai tuutaa pinjaraa chhuutaa kaidii detaa rahaa sayyaad duhaai rok sake naa usako milake saaraa zamaana saari khudaai gul saajan ko git sunaane bulabul baag men vaapas aae  yaad sadaa rakhanaa ye kahaanii chaahe jinaa chaahe maranaa tum bhi kisi se pyaar karo to pyaar gulobulabul saa karanaa  4

Title: laal chhadii maidaan khadii kyaa khuub ladii kyaa khuub ladii
Lyrics: laal chhadii maidaan khadii kyaa khuub ladii kyaa khuub ladii ham dil se gae ham jaan se gae bas aankh milii aur baat badhii  vo tiikhe tiikhe do nainaa us shok se aankh milaanaa thaa dede ke qayaamat ko daavat ek aafat se takaraanaa thaa   2 mat puuchho ham par kyaa guzarii bijalii sii girii aur dil pe padii ham dil se gae  haay ham jaan se gae threedots  tan tanakar zaalim ne apanaa har tiir nishaane par maaraa hai shukr kii ab tak zindaa huun   main dil kaa ghaayal bechaaraa  2 use dekhake laal dupatte men  maine naam diyaa hai laal chhadii ham dil se gae haay ham jaan se gae threedots  ham ko bhii naa jaane kyaa suujhii  jaa pahunche usakii tolii men har baat men usakii thaa vo asar  jo nahiin banduuk kii golii men  2 ab kyaa hogaa ab kyaa kiije har ek ghadii mushkil kii ghadii ham dil se gae haay ham jaan se gae threedots

Title: aankhon men mastii sharaab kii
Lyrics: aankhon men mastii sharaab kii kaalii zulfon men aanhen shabaab kii jaane aaii kahaan se tuutake mere daaman men pankhudii gulaab kii haae aankhonthreedots  chaand kaa tukadaa kahuun yaa husn kii duniyaa kahuun priit kii saragam kahuun yaa pyaar kaa sapanaa kahuun sochataa huun kyaa kahuun sochataa huun kyaa kahuun is shok ko main kyaa kahuun aankhonthreedots  chaal kahatii hai na ho pahalii ghataa barasaat kii har adaa apanii jagah taariif ho kis baat kii aarazuu kitane dinon se aarazuu kitane dinon se thii hamen is raat kii aankhonthreedots

Title: main ne shaayad tumhen pahale bhii kahiin dekhaa hai
Lyrics: main ne shaayad tumhen pahale bhii kahiin dekhaa hai  ajanabii sii ho magar gair nahiin lagatii ho vaham se bhii jo ho naazuk vo yakiin lagatii ho haay ye phuul saa cheharaa ye ghanerii zulfen mere sheron se bhii tum mujhako hansiin lagatii ho  dekhakar tumako kisii raat kii yaad aatii hai ek kaamosh mulaaqaat kii yaad aatii hai jahaan men husn kii thandak kaa asar jagataa hai aanch detii hui barasaat kii yaad aatii hai  jisakii palaken merii aankhon pe jhukii rahatii hain tum vahii mere kayaalon kii parii ho kii nahiin kahiin pahale kii tarah phir to na kho jaaogii jo hameshaa ke liye ho vo khushii ho kii nahiin

Title: hai bas ke har ek unake ishaare men nishaan aur
Lyrics: hai bas ke har ek unake ishaare men nishaan aur 2 karate hain muhabbat to guzarataa hai gumaan aur hai bas ke har ek unake  yaa rab na vo samajhe hain na samajhenge merii baat 2 de aur dil unako jo na de mujhako zabaan aur hai bas ke har ek unake  tum shahar men ho to hamen kyaa gam jab uthenge 2 le aayenge baazaar se jaakar dilojaan aur hai bas ke har ek unake  hain aur bhii duniyaa men sukhanavar bahut achchhe aa hain aur bhii duniyaa men sukhanavar bahut achchhe 2 kahate hain ke gaaliib kaa hai andaazebayaan aur 2 hai bas ke har ek unake ishaare men nishaan aur hai bas ke har ek unake

Title: aa haa aaii milan kii belaa dekho aaii
Lyrics: ra 	aa haa aaii milan kii belaa dekho aaii 	ban ke phuul har kalii muskuraaii aa 	aa haa aaii milan kii belaa dekho aaii 	unase nain mile main sharamaaii 	aa haa aaii milan kii threedots  	jaane kyon tez huii jaatii hai dil kii dhadakan 	chutakiyaan letii hai kyon siine men miithii sii chubhan ra 	pyaar jo karate hain hotaa hai yahii haal unakaa 	dekhie kyaakyaa dikhaaegii abhii dil kii lagan 	aa haa aaii milan kii threedots  	aaj duniyaa mujhe kuchh aur nazar aatii hai 	jis taraf dekhie taqadiir muskuraatii hai aa 	pyaar ke rang men rang jaate hain jab dilavaale 	dekhatedekhate har chiiz badal jaatii hai 	aa haa aaii milan kii threedots  	aaj sar se meraa aanchal kyon udaa jaataa hai 	meraa dil kyon mere pahaluu se khinchaa jaataa hai ra 	muntazir hogaa koii yaad kar rahaa hogaa 	dard saa uthataa hai jab yaad kiyaa jaataa hai 	aa haa aaii milan kii threedots

Title: merii nigaah ne kyaa kaam laajawaab kiyaa
Lyrics: merii nigaah ne kyaa kaam laajawaab kiyaa2 unhiin ko laakhon hasiinon me intakwaab kiyaa  wo aae ghar me bahaar aake ruk gaii jaise2 fizaa me phuul ki daalii sii jhuk gaii jaise kuchh is adaa se kisii shok ne hijaab kiyaa2 merii nigaah ne kyaa  wo zulfenaaz khulii khul ke kuchh dhalak sii gaii sitaare tuut pade chaandanii chhalak sii gaii jo mainne cheharaaejaanaa ko benaqaab kiyaa merii nigaah ne kyaa kaam laajawaab kiyaa merii nigaah ne kyaa  ye mere giit men jo rang hai nazaakat hai2 ye sab usii nigaahenaaz kii inaayat hai ke mujhase zarre ko chamakaa ke aafataab kiyaa merii nigaah ne kyaa threedots

Title: haan jii baabaa  haan jii baabaa
Lyrics: koras haan jii baabaa  haan jii baabaa  aashaa haan jii haanji haanji are haanji baabaa  mere sanam se meraa milane kaa vaadaa  koras haan jii baabaa haan jii baabaa  rafii haan jii baabaa haan jii baabaa   aashaa kyon na dikhaauun jaane tamannaa jab hain nazar vaale   phir na milenge saath men itane dardejigar vaale    2 haan jii haan jii haan jii threedots koras haan jii haan jii haan jii baabaa  rafii haan jii haan jii haan jii baabaa   aashaa  rang jamaa hai merii adaaon kii gulakaarii kaa   tod de jaa ke aankh bachaa ke jaal shikaarii kaa   2 koras haan jii haan jii haan jii baabaa  rafii haan jii haan jii haan jii baabaa

Title: baar baar tohe kyaa samajhaaye
Lyrics: baarbaar tohe kyaa samajhaaye paayal kii jhankaar  kyaa tere bin saajan laage na jiyaa hamaar  chhupchhup ke karataa hai ishaare chandaa sausau baar  kyaa aa tohe sajanii le chaluun nadiyaa ke paar  tere bin saajan threedots  chalatechalate ruk gaye kyon sajan mere milatemilate jhuk gaye kyon nayan tere jhukejhuke nainaa karate hain tum se ye iqaraar  kyaa tere bin saajan laage na jiyaa hamaar aa tohe sajanii le chaluun nadiyaa ke paar  dariyaa uupar chaandanii aaii sanbhalsanbhal in laharon par man meraa gayaa machalmachal ek baat kahataa huun tum se na karanaa inkaar  kyaa aa tohe sajanii le chaluun nadiyaa ke paar tere bin saajan laage na jiyaa hamaar  na biite ye raat ham milate hii rahen bas taaron kii chhaanv men chalate hii rahen naam teraa lele kar gaaye dhadakan kaa har taar  kyaa o tere bin saajan laage na jiyaa hamaar  baarbaar tohe kyaa samajhaaye paayal kii jhankaar tere bin saajan laage na jiyaa hamaar aa tohe sajanii le chaluun nadiyaa ke paar

Title: o panchhii pyaare
Lyrics: do nainan ke milan ko do nainaa bulaaen jab nainaa hon saamane to nainaa jhuk jaaen   o panchhii pyaare saanjha sakhaare  bole tuu kaun sii bolii bataa re  bole tuu kaun sii bolii  2   main to panchhii pinjare kii mainaa pankh mere bekaar  biich hamaare saat re saagar  kaise chaluun us paar 2 o panchhii pyaare threedots   phaagun mahiinaa phuulii bagiyaa  aam jhare amraaii main khidakii se chup chup dekhuun  ritu basant kii aaii 2  o panchhii pyaare threedots

Lyrics: mu 	merii jaan kuchh bhii kiijie 	chaahe jaan merii liijie 	par dil hamiin ko diijie 2 la 	kabhii yaad hamen bhii kiijie 	kabhii naam hamaaraa liijie 	sapanon men aayaa kiijie 2  mu 	kabhii to hamase kar lo do baaten pyaaraa mukhadaa mod ke 	tum kaho to dharatii pe laa den chaandtaare tod ke 	par ye vaadaa hamase kar lo jaaoge naa chhod ke la 	kabhii yaad hamen threedots  	yaad aakar terii jo tadapaae to koii kyaa kare 	teraa daaman na haathon men aae to koii kyaa kare 	chaand bhii aag ban jaae to koii kyaa kare mu 	merii jaan kuchh threedots  	dil kisii ko ek din to dogii kyuun hamen detii nahiin 	paas aakar ye to bataa de kyaa ham bure hain o hasiin 	chaudahaviin kaa chaand ho tum ham bhii tujhase kam nahiin la 	kabhii yaad hamen threedots mu 	merii jaan kuchh threedots

Title: aap kii nazaron ne samajhaa
Lyrics: aap kii nazaron ne samajhaa pyaar ke kaabil mujhe dil kii ai dhadakan thahar jaa mil gaii manzil mujhe aap kii nazaron ne samajhaa  jii hamen manzuur hai aapakaa ye faisalaa	 2 kah rahii hai har nazar bandaaparavar shukariyaa do jahaan kii aaj khushiyaan ho gaiin haasil mujhe aap kii nazaron ne samajhaa threedots  aap kii manzil huun main merii manzil aap hain      2 kyuun main tuufaan se daruun mere saahil aap hain koii tuufaanon se kah de mil gayaa saahil mujhe aap kii nazaron ne samajhaa threedots  pad gaii dil par merii aap kii parchhaaiyaan         2 har taraf bajane lagiin saikadon shahanaaiyaan hansake apanii zindagii men kar liyaa shaamil mujhe aap kii nazaron ne samajhaa threedots

Title: naa milate ham to kaho tum kidhar gae hote
Lyrics: mu 	naa milate ham to kaho tum kidhar gae hote la 	tumhaaraa pyaar na milataa to mar gae hote  	agar aise men ham naa tumhen paa jaate 	chhupaae munh ko andhere men ashq barasaate ham ashq barasaate mu 	vo ashq to merii aankhon men bhar gae hote la 	tumhaaraa pyaar na threedots  mu 	hamen to furaqat men isii gam ne maaraa 	merii bahaar bhatakatii phiregii aavaaraa phiregii aavaaraa la 	tumhaarii raah men hote jidhar gae hote mu 	naa milate ham to threedots  la 	jaane phir kyaa hotaa ye na puuchho hamase 	zamaanaa chhiin hii letaa hamen agar tumase 2 mu 	diivaane phir to koii kaam kar gae hote la 	tumhaaraa pyaar na threedots

Title: phir tumhaarii yaad aayii ai sanam
Singer: rafi manna dey saadat khan chorus
Lyrics: rafi o o o o o      aa aa       phir tumhaarii yaad aaii ai sanam ai sanam 2      ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam koras ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam koras aa aa  manna de      haaledil yaar ko likhuun kaise       haath dil se judaa nahiin hotaa      kis tarah unako bataaen apnaa gam ai sanam 2  koras ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam 2       saadat kaan      tum mere dil men merii aankhon men ho      tum mere kwaabon merii aahon men ho      duur rahakar bhii judaa honge na ham ai sanam 2 koras ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam       allaah qasam allaah qasam allaah qasam  rafi      jab se dekhii suurat unakii ham shamaa jalaanaa bhuul gaye      ruksaar kii surkii kyaa kahiye phuulon kaa fasaanaa bhuul gaye      bas itanii kahaanii hai apanii jab aankh milii behoaaash hue      daaman se hawaa tum kar na sake ham hosh men aanaa bhuul gaye      kitane pyaare hain muhabbat ke sitam ai sanam 2 koras ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam 2 koras aa aa aa aa        manna kyaa lutf aa rahaa thaa saadat kyaa lutf aa rahaa thaa rafi aaaa      kyaa lutf aa rahaa thaa dilabar kii dillagii se     nazaren bhii thiin mujhii par     pardaa bhii thaa mujhii se     o o o o aa aa aa aa koras kyaa hasiin tasaviir thii allaah qasam ai sanam 2     ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam     allaah qasam allaah qasam allaah qasam           phir tumhaarii yaad aayii ai sanam ai sanam     ham na bhuulenge tumhen allaah qasam 2

Title: baahoshohavaas main diivaanaa
Lyrics: baahoshhavaas main diivaanaa ye aaj vasiiyat karataa huun ye dil ye jaan mile tumako main tumase muhabbat karataa huun  mere jiite jii yaar tumhe merii saarii jaagiir mile vo kvaab jo main ne dekhe hain un kvaabon kii taabiir mile har ek tamannaa ke badale men aaj ye hasarat karataa huun ye dil ye jaan mile tumako   threedots  merii aankhon men niind nahiin mere honthon par pyaas nahiin har chiiz tumhaare naam huii ab kuchh bhii mere paas nahiin tumane to luut liyaa mujhako main tumase shiqaayat karataa huun ye dil ye jaan mile tumako   threedots

Title: do sitaaron kaa zamiin pe hai milan aaj kii raat
Lyrics: rafii do sitaaron kaa zamiin par hai milan aaj kii raat  2     muskuraataa hai ummiidon kaa chaman aaj kii raat lataa rang laaii hai mere dil kii lagan aaj kii raat     saarii duniyaa nazar aatii hai dulhan aaj kii raat donon do sitaaron kaa zamiin par hai milan aaj kii raat     aaj kii raat  rafii husn vaale terii duniyaa men koii aayaa hai     tere diidaar kii hasarat bhii koii laayaa hai     tod de tod de parde kaa chalan aaj kii raat     muskuraataa hai ummiidon kaa chaman aaj kii raat donon do sitaaron kaa zamiin par   lataa jinase milane kii thii tamannaa vohii aate hain     chaand taare merii raahon men bichhe jaate hain     chuumataa hai mere qadamon ko gagan aaj kii raat     saarii duniyaa nazar aatii hai dulahan aaj kii raat donon do sitaaron kaa zamiin par

Title: phuul saa cheharaa chaand sii rangat chaal qayaamat
Lyrics: phuul saa cheharaa chaand sii rangat chaal qayaamat kyaa kahie jo bhii dekhe ho jaae paagal apanii to haalat kyaa kahie  apanii adaa se aap simatanaa saae se apane aap jhijhakanaa haath lage to kumhalaa jaao aisii nazaaqat kyaa kahie phuul saa cheharaa threedots  ek nazar se dekh lo jisako bemaut vo to maaraa hii jaae uupar se bholii andar se qaatil aisii sharaarat kyaa kahie phuul saa cheharaa threedots  jisako zamaanaa kahataa hai suuraj ye to tumhaaraa naqsheqadam hai mil jaae jisako tujh sii hasiinaa usakii to haalat kyaa kahie phuul saa cheharaa threedots

Lyrics: bhiigii bhiigii fazaa san san san ke jiyaa zulfen udaatii hai kushabuu churaatii hai paagal chanchal mast havaa bhiigii bhiigii fazaa san san san ke jiyaa   koyal ban men bole nas nas men ras ghole koii natakhat jaise ghuunghat chorii chorii khole koii aayaa nahiin bhaayaa nahiin kisakaa saayaa saath chalaa bhiigii bhiigii fazaa threedots  pal pal jhonkaa aaye aanchal sarakaa jaaye tan man meraa jiivan meraa dhiire dhiire gaaye dekho dekho hansii dil kii kalii dil men aisaa dard uthaa bhiigii bhiigii fazaa threedots  hansate hain diivaane banate hain afasaane dil kii baaten dil kii ghaaten kaise koii jaane mujhe roko nahiin toko nahiin main ne rastaa dhuundh liyaa bhiigii bhiigii fazaa threedots

Lyrics: mujhe kahate hain mujhe kahate hain kalluu kavvaal kalluu kavvaal ki teraa meraa teraa meraa saath rahegaa  main huun thumarii to tuu hai kayaal  teraa meraa teraa meraa saath rahegaa ho mujhe kahate hain threedots  raajaa main giiton kaa tuu sur kii raanii tuu sur kii raanii gaa ke sunaaen ham apanii kahaanii apanii kahaanii tuu mere giiton kii hai zindagaanii tere giiton men tere giiton men hai vo kamaal o kalluu kavvaal teraa meraa threedots  suurat se pahachaane mujhako zamaanaa mujhako zamaanaa aavaaraa chhaliyaa anaadii diivaanaa anaadii diivaanaa kaisaa huun dil kaa kisii ne na jaanaa nahiin duniyaa men nahiin duniyaa men terii misaal o kalluu kavvaal teraa meraa threedots

Title: unakii zulfen unake chehare se  merii zindagii men aate
Lyrics: unakii zulfen unake chehare se hataa sakataa nahiin dil kii betaabii kisii suurat chhupaa sakataa nahiin kitanii dilakash hain muhabbat kii javaan majabuuriyaan saamane manzil hai aur paanv badhaa sakataa nahiin  merii zindagii men aate  to kuchh aur baat hotii  2 ye nasiib jagamagaate  to kuchh aur baat hotii  2  kaii baar mil chukii hain ye hasiinhasiin nigaahen 2 vo hii beqaraariyaan hain na milii kushii kii raahen mere dil se dil milaate  to kuchh aur baat hotii  2 merii zindagii men threedots  mujhe kyaa garaz kisii se hanse phuul yaa sitaare 2 hain merii nazar men phiike ye javaanjavaan nazaare agar aap muskaraate  to kuchh aur baat hotii  2 merii zindagii men threedots  ye kushii rahe salaamat yuun hii jashn ho suhaanaa 2 jise sun rahii hai duniyaa mere dil kaa hai taraanaa mere saath tum bhii gaate  to kuchh aur baat hotii  2 merii zindagii men threedots

Title: ham pe ilzaam ye kyuun hai ki mohabbat kii hai
Lyrics: ham pe ilzaam ye kyuun hai ki mohabbat kii hai  2 hamane to aapako puujaa hai ibaadat kii hai ham pe ilzaam ye kyuun hai ki mohabbat kii hai   hamane kab aapase maangaa hai wafaaon kaa silaa  2  kab sunaa aapane hamase koii shiqawaa yaa gilaa  2  hamane kab dil ke tadapane kii shiqaayat kii hai  2  hamane to aapako puujaa hai ibaadat kii hai   gam nahiin isakaa agar aap hamaare naa huye  2  gam to ye hai ke tumhaare bhii tumhaare na huye  2  aapane jinake liye aaj ye haalat kii hai  2  hamane to aapako puujaa hai ibaadat kii hai ham pe ilzaam ye kyuun hai ki mohabbat kii hai

Lyrics: jaane kahaan gaii 2 dil meraa le gaii le gaii jaane kahaan threedots  dekhatedekhate kyaa se kyaa ho gayaa 2 dhadakanen rah gaiin dil judaa ho gayaa 2 haay jaane kahaan threedots  aaj tuutaa huaa dil kaa ye saaz hai 2 ab vo nagmen kahaan sirf aavaaz hai 2 haay jaane kahaan threedots  ghutataa rahataa na dam jaan to chhuutatii 2 kaash kahataa koii vo muhabbat na thii 2 haay jaane kahaan threedots  haal kyaa hai meraa aake kud dekh jaa 2 ab tere haath hai jiinaa maranaa teraa 2 haay jaane kahaan threedots

Title: maare gaye gulafaam ajii haan
Lyrics: maare gaye gulafaam ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam  2 ulfat bhii raas naa aaii ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam  ik sabzaparii dekhii aur dil ko ganvaa baithe  mastaanaanigaahon par phir hosh lutaa baithe  2 phir hosh lutaa baithe kaahe ko main muskuraaii  ajii haan maare gae gulafaam maare gaye gulafaam ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam  abaruu kii kataarii se nainon kii dodhaarii se  wo ho ke rahe zakmii ik baadebahaaarii se  2 ik baadebahaaarii se ye zulf kyon laharaaii  ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam maare gaye gulafaam ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam  is pyaar kii mahafil men wo aaye muqaabil men  wo tiir chale dil par halachal sii huii dil men  2 halachal sii huii dil men chaahat kii sazaa paaii  ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam maare gaye gulafaam ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam ulfat bhii raas naa aaii ajii haan maare gaye gulafaam

Title: qayaamat aaegii ek roz  zulfon kaa rangiin saayaa hai
Lyrics: qayaamat aaegii ek roz  zulfon kaa rangiin saayaa hai taubaa kudaayaa tumhaarii ye javaanii salaamat rahe zulfon kaa rangiin saayaa threedots  bhiigii fizaaen dekho chanchal havaaen dekho dil kii sadaa hai yahii chup naa raho jaage hain aramaan mere mukhade pe gesuu tere din hai ki raat bolo kuchh to kaho bolo na bolo hamase kahenge ye tumase tumhaarii ye javaanii threedots  duniyaa men honge kaii dil ko churaane vaale tumasaa na dekhaa koii maahenaqaab duniyaa banaane vaalaa tujhako banaa ke gorii ruup banaanaa haay bhuul gayaa tumhaaraa hai zamaanaa banaa do diivaanaa tumhaarii ye javaanii threedots  haay ye adaaen terii tujhase bahaaren merii gul bhii pukaare tujhe baadesabaa bigadii banaanaa siikho dil ko lagaanaa siikho zulfen banaanaa chhodo jaanevafaa labon pe sadaa aaen hamaarii duaaen tumhaarii ye javaanii threedots

Title: dil kaa dard niraalaa
Lyrics: dil kaa dard nirala  dil kaa dard nirala20 kisko sunaoon koi nahin hai  aaj samjhane wala  dil kaa dard nirala   khilte hue ek phool ko jaise apni mahal maloom na ho jalte hue deep ko jaise apni chamal maloom na ho20 dil mein yoonhi tere pyar kaa thaa ek anjana ujiyala  dil kaa dard nirala   main hoon sanam apradhi tera maut bhi manzoor mujhe20 par woh sazaa main sah na sakoonga kar de jo tujhse door mujhe dil se bhulaade meri khatayen tod de ghum kaa jalaa  dil kaa dard nirala kisko sunaoon koi nahin hai aaj samjhane wala

Title: phir koii muskaraayaa phir ek phuul khilaa
Lyrics: phir koii muskaraayaa phir ek phuul khilaa koii bulaae aur koii aae ab dil chaahe kyaa phir koii muskaraayaa threedots  zindagii phir vahii giit gunagunaane lagii is galii jhuumatii bahaar aane lagii phir koii muskaraayaa threedots  dil mere jhuum le yaad kar ke is shaam ko bahake ham jis ghadii pii ke pyaar ke jaam ko phir koii muskaraayaa threedots  honaa hai aaj phir apane sabr kaa imtihaan luutanaa hai tumako phir aaj meraa dil merii jaan phir koii muskaraayaa threedots  phir se vahii halachal hasaraten machalane lagiin phir vo shokiyaan nagmaa ban ke dhalane lagiin phir koii muskaraayaa threedots

Title: jaatejaate ik nazar bhar dekh lo dekh lo
Lyrics: jaatejaate ik nazar bhar dekh lo dekh lo 2  subah kaa vaqt huaa aaii gulashan men sabaa chhid gayaa saajechaman guunjii aavaazechaman naalaa bulabul ne kiyaa khul gayaa raazechaman phuul muskaraane lage ishq faramaane lage aahebulabul se magar phailii gulashan men kabar ishq badanaam huaa chal gayaa sabako pataa baagabaan aa hii gayaa pyaar kii dene sadaa phuul shaakhon se chune naale bulabul se sune haar kuchh guunth lie hansate dil tod die aansuu shabanam ke bahe aur kaamosh rahe haar phuulon ke jo gulashan se lekar vo chalaa apane phuulon se machalatii huii bulabul ne kahaa kyaa jaatejaate ik nazar bhar threedots  shamaa ne jalave lutaae jo shabistaanon men shauq jal jaane kaa paidaa huaa paravaanon men 2 sar hathelii pe lie ishq ke jaanbaaz chale aag siine men chhupaae hue hamaraaz chale shamaa ne dekhaa jo aate hue paravaanon ko bolii bithalaauun kahaan ishq ke mehamaanon ko kaun samajhaaegaa in chaaqgarebaanon ko siraphiraa kahatii hai duniyaa mere diivaanon ko aise diivaane ki marane kii qasam khaae hue ishq kii aag men jalane ke lie aae hue kahate hain jaatejaate ik nazar bhar threedots  munh phiraauungii to mahafil se nikal jaaenge unako siine se lagaauungii to jal jaaenge bole paravaane hamen ishq men jal jaane de jaan ke saath ye aramaan nikal jaane de kah ke shauq men diivaane pe diivaanaa giraa ishq kii aag men paravaane pe paravaanaa giraa ahaledil jalavaaejaanaan pe fidaa hone lage shamaa kii lau se gale mil ke judaa hone lage ishq men dekh kar qurbaanii in diivaanon kii shamaa ne itanaa kahaa laash pe paravaanon kii kyaa jaatejaate ik nazar bhar threedots

Title: ham tere pyaar men saaraa aalam kho baithe
Lyrics: ham tere pyaar men saaraa aalam kho baithe hain kho baithe tum kahate ho ki aise pyaar ko bhuul jaao bhuul jaao ham tere pyaar men saaraa aalam   panchhii se chhudaakar usakaa ghar tum apane ghar par le aae ye pyaar kaa pinjaraa man bhaayaa ham jii bharbhar kar musakaae jab pyaar huaa is pinjare se tum kahane lage aazaad raho ham kaise bhulaaen pyaar teraa tum apanii zubaan se ye na kaho ab tumasaa jahaan men koii nahiin hai ham to tumhaare ho baithe tum kahate ho ki   is tere charan kii dhuul se hamane apanii jiivanmaang bharii jab hii to suhaagan kahalaaii duniyaa kii nazar men pyaar banii tum pyaar kii sundar muurat ho aur pyaar hamaarii puujaa hai ab in charanon men dam nikale bas itanii aur tamannaa hai ham pyaar ke gangaajal se balamajii tanman apanaa dho baithe tum kahate ho ki   sapanon kaa darpan dekhaa thaa sapanon kaa darpan tod diyaa ye pyaar kaa aanchal hamane to daaman se tumhaare baandh liyaa ye aisii gaanth hai ulfat kii jisako na koii bhii khol sakaa tum aan base jab is dil men dil phir to kahiin naa dol sakaa o pyaar ke saagar ham terii laharon men naav dubo baithe tum kahate ho ki

Title: main to tum sang nain milaa ke
Lyrics: main to tum sang nain mila ke slow har gai sajana ho har gai sajana main to tum sang nain mila ke har gai sajana ho har gai sajana  kyun jhuthe se prit lagai  2 kyun chhaliye ko mit banaya kyun andhi men dip jalaya main to tum sang threedots  sapane men jo bag lagae nind khuli to virane the ham bhi kitane divane the main to tum sang threedots  na milatin ye bairan ankhiyan chain na jata dil bhi ne rota kash kisi se pyar na hota main to tum sang threedots

Title: merii duniyaa hai maan tere aanchal men
Lyrics: o maa maa maan merii duniya hai maa tere aanchal men 2 shiital chaaya jo dukh ke jangal men merii duniyaa hai maan tere aanchal men  o merii raahon ke diip terii do ankhiyaan 2 o mujhe giita se kahiin  terii jo batiyaan 2 yug men milataa yug men milataa hai so milaa pal men merii duniyaa hai maan tere aanchal men  o maine aansuu bhii diye par tuu roii naa 2 o merii nindiyaa ke liye barasuun soyii naa 2 mamataa gaatii o mamataa gaatii rahii gam kii hulchul men merii duniyaa hai maan tere aanchal men  maa maa o kaahe naa dhoke terii ye charan tere maa 2 o devataa pyaalaa liye dar pe khade maa 2 amrit sabakaa amrit sabakaa hai is gangaa jal men merii duniyaa hai maan tere aanchal men

Title: milatii hai zindagii men mohabbat kabhiikabhii
Lyrics: milatii hai zindagii men mohabbat kabhiikabhii hotii hai dilbaron kii inaayat kabhiikabhii  sharmaa ke munh na pher nazar ke savaal par laatii hai aise mod par qismat kabhiikabhii  khulate nahiin hain roz dariche bahaar ke aatii hai jaaneman ye qayaamat kabhiikabhii  tanahaa na kat sakenge javaanii ke raaste pesh aaegii kisiikii zaruurat kabhiikabhii  phir kho na jaaen ham kahiin duniyaa kii bhiid men milatii hai paas aane kii muhalat kabhiikabhii  hotii hai dilbaron kii inaayat kabhiikabhii milatii hai zindagii men mohabbat kabhii kabhii threedots

Title: kabhii khud pe kabhii haalaat pe ronaa aayaa
Lyrics: kabhii kud pe kabhii haalaat pe ronaa aayaa baat nikalii to har ik baat pe ronaa aayaa  ham to samajhe the ki ham bhuul gae hain unako kyaa huaa aaj ye kis baat pe ronaa aayaa  kisa liye jiite hain ham kisake liye jiite hain baarahaa aise savaalaat pe ronaa aayaa  kaun rotaa hai kisii aur kii kaatir ai dost sabako apanii hii kisii baat pe ronaa aayaa

Title: kachchii hai umariyaa korii hai chunariyaa
Lyrics: kachchii hai umariyaa korii hai chunariyaa mohe bhii rang detaa jaa mohe bhii rang detaa jaa more sajanaa mohe bhii rang detaa jaa  pag morii bahake ang morii dahake kabhii to sudh letaa jaa kabhii to sudh letaa jaa more sajanaa kabhii to sudh letaa jaa  agan lagaaye lagan lagaaye ye madamaatii ghadiyaan ye madamaatii ghadiyaan tan bhii sambhaalaa man bhii sambhaalaa sambhale na nainon kii jhadiyaan sambhale na nainon kii jhadiyaan gaayen morii sakhiyaan roye morii akhiyaan kabhii to sudh letaa jaa threedots  kah bhii na paauun rah bhii na paauun priit kaa dard chhupaake priit kaa dard chhupaake rang ras barase jiyaa moraa tarase tapan bujhaa jaa aa ke tapan bujhaa jaa aa ke chaahe kaun sukh hai mohe teraa dukh hai kabhii to sudh letaa jaa threedots

Title: o nanhe se farishte tujh se ye kaisaa naataa
Lyrics: o nanhe se farishte tujh se ye kaisaa naataa  kaise ye dil ke rishte o nanhe se farishte   1 tujhe dekhane ko tarase kyon har ghadii nigaahen  bechain sii rahatii hain tere liye ye baahen  mujhe khud pataa nahiin hai mujhe tujhase pyaar kyuun hai  o nanhe threedots  2 naazuk saa phuul hai tuu kisii aur ke chaman kaa  khushabuu se terii mahake kyon baag mere man kaa  merii zindagii men chhaaii tujhase bahaar kyuun hai  o nanhe threedots  3 tuu kuchh nahiin hai meraa phir bhii ye tadap kaisii  tujhe dekhate hii khuun men uthatii hai ik lahar sii  har vakt mujhako rahataa teraa intazaar kyuun hai  o nanhe threedots

Title: vo dekho dekhaa dekh rahaa thaa papiihaa
Lyrics: vo dekho dekhaa dekh rahaa thaa papiihaa papiihaa dekho dekh rahaa thaa papiihaa papiihaa jaa ke sab se kahegaa papiihaa papiihaa bhalaa chup kyon rahegaa papiihaa papiihaa dekho dekh rahaa thaa threedots  rim jhim jhim badariyaa barase 2 aise men jaiyo nahiin ghar se 2 tum bin jiyaa bharamaaye tum bin rahaa na jaaye vo dekho dekhaa dekh rahaa thaa papiihaa threedots  thar thar thar chale sard havaayen 2 phuul hanse kaliyaan musakaayen 2 ham ko ye samajhaayen ham mil kar naache gaayen vo dekho dekhaa dekh rahaa thaa papiihaa threedots  tim tim tim karate hain sitaare 2 aap hue hain jab se hamaare 2 ham phuule nahiin samaaye ham ghadii ghadii musakaaye  vo dekho dekhaa dekh rahaa thaa papiihaa threedots

Title: ho re ho jhanan ghuunghar baaje moraa man jhuume piyaa
Lyrics: ho o ho ho o ho ho re ho re jhanan ghuunghar baaje moraa man jhuume piyaa torii dagar chuume piyaa aajaa ghar aajaa 2  dil kii umang jaage moraa gaae jiyaa aas mohe laagii torii aajaa piyaa ritu rangiilii din milan ke madhurmadhur sapane more man ke balam jaage ho re ho jhanan threedots  bahiyaan pakad chheden mohe sakhiyaan morii vinatii karen laaj bharii akhiyaan morii pagpag chhalake man kii madiraa sanansanan dole pavan badaraa ghumad naache moraa man jhuume threedots

Title: teraa husn rahe meraa ishq rahe
Lyrics: teraa husn rahe meraa ishq rahe                  to ye subah ye shaam rahe na rahe chale pyaar kaa naam zamaane men                  kisii aur kaa naam rahe na rahe teraa husn rahe threedots ye shaam rahe na rahe  merii pyaas kaa koii hisaab nahiin                  terii mast nazar kaa jawaab nahiin  2 isii mast nazar se pilaae jaa  2                  mere saamane jaam rahe na rahe teraa husn rahe threedots ye shaam rahe na rahe  main bahakane lagaa huun samhaal zaraa                  mere paas hii rah kahiin duur na jaa koii thiik nahiin ki bahaaron kaa                  yahaan aur qiyaam rahe na rahe  jo nigaah uthii to payaam milaa jo nigaah jhukii to salaam milaa isii waqt bujhaa de lagi dil kii ye payaamsalaam rahe na rahe teraa husn rahe threedots ye shaam rahe na rahe  teraa husn rahe meraa ishq rahe                  to ye subah ye shaam rahe na rahe chale pyaar kaa naam zamaane men kisii aur kaa naam rahe na rahe teraa husn threedots ye shaam rahe na rahe

Title: apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye
Lyrics: dhiire    khudagazr duniyaa men ye inasaan kii pahachaan hai jo paraaii aag men jal jaaye vo inasaan hai  tez    apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye  2 tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye  baazaar se zamaane ke kuchh bhii na ham khariidenge  2 haan bechakar khushii apanii logon ke gam khariidenge bujhate diye jalaane ke liye  2 tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye  apanii khudii ko jo samajhaa usane khudaa ko pahachaanaa   2 aazaad fitarate inasaan andaaz kyon gulaamaanaa sar ye nahiin jhukaane ke liye  2 tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye  himmat buland hai apanii patthar sii jaan rakhate hain   2 kadamon tale zamiin to kyaa ham asamaan rakhate hain girate huon ko uthaane ke liye tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye  chal aafataab lekar chal chal mahataab lekar chal   2 tuu apanii ek thokar men sau inqalaab lekar chal zulm aur sitam mitaane ke liye tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye  2  naakaamiyon se ghabaraa ke tum kyon udaas hote ho main hamsafar tumhaaraa huun tum kyon udaas hote ho hansate raho hansaane ke liye tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye  2   naakaamiyon se ghabaraa ke tum kyon udaas hote ho main hamasafar tumhaaraa huun tum kyon udaas hote ho hansate raho hansaane ke liye tuu jii ai dil zamaane ke liye apane liye jiye to kyaa jiye

Title: main chalii main chalii dekho pyaar kii galii
Lyrics: main chalii main chalii dekho pyaar kii galii koii roke na mujhe main chalii main chalii na na naa merii jaan dekho jaanaa na vahaan koii pyaar kaa luteraa luute na merii jaan main chalii main chalii threedots  ye fizaa ye havaa ye nazaare ye samaa ab pyaar na huaa to phir kab hogaa koii khel to nahiin ye hai pyaar merii jaan tujhe pataa bhii na chalegaa ye jab hogaa main chalii main chalii threedots  kahiin aankh na mile kahiin dil na lage to pyaar kaa zamaanaa kis kaam aayaa  to ye rut ye ghataa bolo sochegii kyaa main chalii main chalii threedots

Title: main to karkar binatii haar gaii
Lyrics: main to karkar binatii haar gaii piyaa haath chhudaa kar chale gaye mainne ankhiyaan bichhaaiin raahon men 2 wo nazaren bachaakar chale gaye  main to bebas thii man paagal pe mujhe pyaar thaa udate baadal se 2 merii aas bandhaane aaye the 2 merii pyaas badhaakar chale gaye  ab tak jo kabhii dekhaa na sunaa wo zulm bhii mainne dekh liyaa 2 kud shamaa ko apane haathon se 2 parawaane bujhaa kar chale gaye  piyaa jab se mile sautaniyaa se dil bhar gayaa meraa duniyaa se main jaagatii aankhon soii thii 2 wo niind churaa kar chale gaye  main to karkar binatii haar gaii piyaa haath chhudaa kar chale gaye

Title: o tuu kyaa jaane dinraat ham jiite hain
Lyrics: o tuu kyaa jaane dinraat ham jiite hain o teraa naam le ke 2 o terii nazaron ke jaam ham piite hain o teraa naam threedots  terii hii baaten karate hain ham saarii raat sitaaron se yah puuchh le shok nazaaron se yah puuchh le mast bahaaron se ki zindagii ke subahshaam kaise biite hain o teraa naam threedots  terii maasuum nigaahon ne badalii qismat dilavaalon kii jab se hamane daulat paaii tere rangiin kyaalon kii har haarii huii baazii ham jiite hain o teraa naam threedots  ham terii yaad men soe nahiin jaane kitanii hii raaton se le bas ham ab chup ho jaate hain mat ruutho hamaarii baaton se na kahenge kuchh aur lab siite hain o teraa naam threedots

Title: dil mera ek aas kaa panchhi
Lyrics: dil meraa ek aasa kaa panchhii udataa hai unche gagan par pahunchegaa ek din kabhii to chaand kii ujalii jamiin par   2 dil meraa ek aasa kaa panchhii  ye duniyaa hai naujavaanon kii zamaanaa hai naujavaanon kaa havaayen bhii gunagunaatii hain taraanaa ham naujavaanon kaa    2 badalegii ek din ye hastii chamakegaa ek din muqaddar aayegaa jhumataa saberaa jiivan men roshanii ko lekar dil meraa ek aasa kaa panchhii udataa hai unche gagan par pahunchegaa ek din kabhii to chaand kii ujalii jamiin par dil meraa ek aasa kaa panchhii  kabhii manzil bhii mila jaayegii abhii to har aasa baakii hai ummmiidon par naubahaaren hai jahaan taka ye saansa baakii hai    2 puurii hogii har tamannaa chhuu luungaa aasamaan ko badhkar chaahe to ruka naa sakegaa duniyaa ke raaston pe chalakar dil meraa ek aasa kaa panchhii udataa hai unche gagan par pahunchegaa ek din kabhii to chaand kii ujalii jamiin par dil meraa ek aasa kaa panchhii

Lyrics: baag men kalii khilii bagiyaa mahakii par haay re abhii idhar bhanvaraa nahiin aayaa raah men nazar bichii bahakiibahakii aur bevajah ghadii ghadii ye dil ghabaraayaa haay re kyon na aayaa kyon na aayaa kyon na aayaa  baithe hain ham to aramaan jagaaye siine men laakhon tuufaan chhupaaye mat puuchh man ko kaise manaayaa baag men threedots  sapane jo aaye tadapaake jaaye dil kii lagii ko dahakaake jaaye mushkil se ham ne har din bitaayaa baag men threedots  ik miithii aganii men jalataa hai tanman baat aur bigadii aayaa jo saavan bachapan ganvaake main ne sab kuchh ganvaayaa baag men threedots

Lyrics: ma senoraa senoraa senoraa senoraa senoraa senoraa yaa baa baa baa baa bu baa baa bu baba baa baa bu baa   yaaro hamaaraa kyaa chal den jidhar chaahen botal kii garadan me daale huye baanhen ma bhuu  naa naa naa naa hamaaraa koii poraa naa hamaarii koii joruu 2 maa  are that can be found mio pire  bhuu  yaaro hamaaraa kyaa chal den jidhar chaahen botal kii garadan me daale hue baanhen  ma he he he ham nahiin sunate baat kisii kii faadar ho yaa maamaa aa gaye pahan ke kisii kaa ho paajamaa ma bhuu laa la laa laa la laa laa la la la laa bhuu  are ham nahiin sunate baat kisii kii faadar ho yaa maamaa aa gaye pahan ke kisii kaa ho paajamaa ma are taai kisii kii gale baandh ke phirate hain aawaaraa do taai kisii kii gale baandh ke phirate hain aawaaraa naa naa naa naa hamaaraa koii poraa threedots  bhuu sone kii zanjiir badan pe naa mutthii men paise are phir koii dilarubaa ruke paas to kaise ma sone kii zanjiir badan pe naa mutthii men paise are phir koii dilarubaa ruke paas to kaise are dilabar hamako gaye chhod ke ab tak to das baaraa ma bhuu dilabar hamako gaye chhod ke ab tak to das baaraa naa naa naa naa hamaaraa koii poraa threedots  ma he he he maal jidhar hai yaar abhii to haath udhar phenkenge sar pe hii pad gayii tabhii to phiir dekhenge ma bhuu laa la laa laa la laa laa la la la laa bhuu are maal jidhar hai yaar abhii to haath udhar phenkenge sar pe hii pad gayii tabhii to phiir dekhenge ma are aaj talak to guzar rahii hai karake lappaa laaraa ma bhuu aaj talak to guzar rahii hai karake lappaa laaraa naa naa naa naa hamaaraa koii poraa threedots

Title: dil jo bhii kahegaa maanenge  dil hii to hai
Lyrics: dil jo bhii kahegaa maanenge duniyaa men hamaaraa dil hii to hai har haal men jisane saath diyaa vo ek bichaaraa dil hii to hai  koii saathii na koii sahaaraa koii manzil na koii kinaaraa ruk gaye jis jagah dil ne rokaa chal diye jis taraf dil pukaaraa ham pyaar ke pyaase logon kii 2 manzil kaa ishaaraa dil hii to hai  duniyaa men hamaaraa dil hii to hai dil jo bhii kahegaa maanenge duniyaa men hamaaraa dil hii to hai  haar maanii nahiin zindagii se hans ke milate rahe har kisii se kyuun na is dil pe qurbaan jaayen sah liye jisane gam bhii kushii se sukh men jo na khele ham hii to hain 2 dukh se jo na haaraa dil hii to hai  duniyaa men hamaaraa dil hii to hai  apanii zindaadilii ke sahaare hamane din zindagii ke guzaare  waranaa is bemuravvat jahaan men aur kabze men kyaa hai hamaare har chiiz hai daulat waalon kii 2 mufalis kaa sahaaraa dil hii to hai  duniyaa men hamaaraa dil hii to hai

Title: ham ne to dil ko aapake kadamon pe rakh diyaa
Lyrics: ra ham ne to dil ko aapake kadamon pe rakh diyaa  2 is dil kyaa karenge ye ab aap sochiye   aa ham aap ke vafaa kii kasam khaa rahe hain aaj  2 ahadevafaa karenge ye ab aap sochiye   ra jab dil se ham ne jod liyaa dil kaa silasilaa  2 aage hai kyaa nasiib men jaane merii balaa  jodaa jab aap hii se muhobbat kaa faisalaa  kyaa faisalaa karenge ab aap sochiye  ham ne to dil ko aapake threedots  aa chaahat kaa aitabaar hai kitanaa hasiin khvaab  aise men kaun maange kisii baat kaa javaab  jab aap hii ke haath hai taqadir kii kitaab  kyaa kyaa likha karenge ab aap sochiye  ra ham ne to dil ko aapake threedots aa ham aap kii vafaa ki threedots

Lyrics: rang aur nuur kii baaraat kise pesh karuun ye muraadon kii hansiin raat kise pesh karuun kise pesh karuun  maine jazabaat nibhaae hain usuulon kii jagah    2 apane aramaan piro laayaa huun phuulon kii jagah tere sehare kii threedots tere sehare kii ye saugaat kise pesh karuun ye muraadon kii hasiin raat kise pesh karuun kise pesh karuun  ye mere sher mere aakhirii nazaraane hain       2 main un apanon main huun jo aaj se begaane hain betaaaluk sii mulaakaat kise pesh karuun ye muraadon kii hansiin raat kise pesh karuun kise pesh karuun  surkh jode kii tabotaab mubaarak ho tujhe       2 terii aankhon kaa nayaa kvaab mubaarak ho tujhe ye merii kvaahish ye kayaalaat kise pesh karuun ye muraadon kii hansiin raat kise pesh karuun kise pesh karuun  kaun kahataa hai chaahat pe sabhii kaa haq hai      2 tuu jise chaahe teraa pyaar usii kaa haq hai mujhase kah de threedots mujhase kah de main teraa haath kise pesh karuun ye muraadon kii hansiin raat kise pesh karuun kise pesh karuun  rang aur nuur kii threedots

Lyrics: jo ham pe guzaratii hai tanahaa kise samajhaaen tum bhii to nahiin milate jaaen to kidhar jaaen threedots  samajhaa hai na samajhegaa is gam ko yahaan koii bedardon kii bastii hai hamadard kahaan koii jo sirf tumhaaraa hai vo dil kise dikhalaaen  jo ham pe guzaratii hai threedots  jab jaanevafaa terii furaqat naa sataaegii vo subah kab aaegii vo shaam kab aaegii kab tak dilenaadaan ko ham vaadon se bahalaaen tum bhii to nahiin milate threedots  aajaa ki muhabbat kii mitane ko hain tasaviiren pahare hain nigaahon pe aur paanv men zanjiiren bas men hii nahiin varanaa ham udake chale aaen jo ham pe guzaratii hai threedots

Lyrics: maine rang lii aaj chunariyaa sajanaa tore rang men 2 maine rang lii threedots  jiyaa moraa chaahe main bhii kheluun o sajanavaa holii aise raadhaa ne kanhaiyaa se prem kii holii khelii jaise prem ke main rang phenkuun bin tumhaare kuchh na dekhuun maine rang lii threedots  kitane jatan se ye ruup sajaayaa maine sajanaa soe hue sapane ko phir jagaayaa maine sajanaa main to duubii prem ras men ab nahiin main apane bas men maine rang lii threedots  jaldii se aa merii baavarii ankhiyaan terii pyaasii charanon men tere piyaa svarg basaa le tere daasii tum bataa do mere kyaa ho main to jaanuun devataa ho maine rang lii threedots

Title: hasiin vaadiyon fizaaon se kah do havaaon se
Lyrics: hasiin vaadiyon fizaaon se kah do havaaon se kah do meraa yaar meraa pyaar le ke aayaa hai hasiin vaadiyon threedots  suurat hai bholii sii qaatil har ek adaa dilojaan se huaa huun main to usape fidaa koii jaane naa jaane koii maane naa maane main to kahataa huun unako kudaaon kaa kudaa meraa yaar meraa pyaar 2 vo to aankhon men khumaar le ke aayaa hai hasiin vaadiyon threedots  kalii se hai naazuk phuulon se bhii hasiin mere yaar jaisaa koii bhii zamaane men nahiin us jaisii naazaniin us jaisii dilanashiin diyaa le ke bhii dhuundhon to milegii na kahiin meraa yaar meraa pyaar 2 vo to dil kaa qaraar le ke aayaa hai hasiin vaadiyon threedots  daalii jaise to lachakatii hai patalii qamar sharamaae bhii zaraa ghabaraae bhii zaraa abhii pyaar kii raahon men nayaanayaa hai safar meraa yaar meraa pyaar 2 vo to ummiidon kaa nikhaar le ke aayaa hai hasiin vaadiyon threedots

Title: jii chaahataa hai chuum luun apanii nazar ko main
Singer: asha sudha malhotra balbir bande hasan
Lyrics: aaaaaa  na khanjar uthegaa na talavaar tumase aaa ye baazuu mere aazamaaye hue hain  aur pahachaanataa huun khuub tumhaarii nazar ko main bhai jaane na duungaa haath se dil aur jigar ko main  dil aisii shah nahiin hai jo kaabuu men rah sake bhai samajhaauun kis tarah ye kisii bekhabar ko main  aayii hai unake chaand se chahare ko chuum kar bhai jii chaahataa hai chuum luun apanii nazar ko main  go zulm behisaab kiyaa is nigah ne rusavaa kiyaa kharaab kiyaa is nigah ne ik kaam laajavaab kiyaa is nigah ne jo tujhako intakhaab kiyaa is nigaah ne bhai jii chaahataa hai chuum luun apanii nazar ko main  ishq par zor nahiin hai ye vo aatish fitanaa ke lagaaye na lage aur bujhaaye na bane  ab tum hii kaho ki kyaa jii chaahataa hai  vo sadaa duur duur rahataa hai naasihaa tuu durust kahataa hai usape marane se kuchh nahiin haasil aah bharane se kuchh nahiin haasil bemuravvat hai bevafaa hai vo mere dushaman kaa aashanaa hai vo ab use chodanaa hii behatar hai ye bharam todanaa hii behatar hai maanate hain tere nasiihat ko haay par kyaa karen tabiiyat ko bhai jii chaahataa hai  pichhale pahar jab os pade aur thandii pavan chale birahaa agan moraa tan man phuunke suunii sej jale sab sakhiyaan chalii pii ko rijhaane more sajan hain duur thikaane aur meraa bhii jii chaahataa hai  kyon aag pe marate ye ham nahiin kah sakate suurat kaa savaal hai na siirat kii baat hai ham tum pe mar mite ye tabiiyat kii baat hai bhai jii chaahataa hai  jii chaahataa hai chuum luun apanii nazar ko main

Title: abhii to raat baaqii hai ye dhal jaaye to so jaanaa
Lyrics: abhii to raat baaqii hai ye dhal jaae to so jaanaa ghadii bhar ko dilenaadaan sanbhal jaae to so jaanaa abhii to raat baaqii hai ye dhal jaae to so jaanaa  ye jalate honth aur ye niind men duubii huii aankhen  2 mujhe sone nahiin detiin tumhaarii adhakhulii aankhen zaraa thaharo mujhe bhii niind aa jaae to so jaanaa abhii to raat baaqii hai threedots  hasiin ho tum tumhen kya gam tumhen to niind pyaarii hai  2 hamaaraa haal mat puuchho ki ham par raat bhaarii hai hamaare sar qayaamat hai ye tal jaae to so jaanaa abhii to raat baaqii hai threedots

Title: meharabaan mahabuub dilabar jaaneman
Lyrics: meharabaan mahabuub dilabar jaaneman aaj ho jaae koii diivaanaapan  pyaar kii thandii aag lagaa do tan man men ik dhuum machaa do tum pe vaare mere kajaraare nayan meharabaan mahabuub dilabar jaaneman  jaam banuun aur lab tak aauun aankh men mastii ban laharaauun raat raanii banake aaii hai dulhan meharabaan mahabuub dilabar jaaneman  kahatii hai angadaaii kahaanii chhalakii jaae mast javaanii aaj phuulon kii tarah tuute badan

Lyrics: chal hat rii hawaa ghuunghat naa uthaa2 meraa mukhadaa baalam dekhegaa chal hat rii hawaa ghuunghat naa uthaa  koii aa basaa mere dhyaan men2 merii jaan aaii hai jaan men2 tuu ulajhatii hai kyaa merii lat naa udaa2 meraa mukhadaa baalam dekhegaa chal hat rii hawaa ghuunghat naa uthaa  mere dil men nagame hain pyaar ke2 naa sunaa taraane baahaar ke2 chal chal jaa jaa mujhe kuch naa sunaa2 meraa mukhadaa baalam dekhegaa chal hat rii hawaa ghuunghat naa uthaa  jo milenge seharaa uthaa ke wo2 do hansenge aankhen milaa ke wo2 nahiin tujh ko pataa mere dil men hai kyaa2 meraa mukhadaa baalam dekhegaa chal hat rii hawaa ghuunghat naa uthaa meraa mukhadaa baalam dekhegaa chal hat rii hawaa ghuunghat naa uthaa

Title: ye dil nahiin ki jisake sahaare jiite hain
Lyrics: ye dil nahiin ki jisake sahaare jiite hain lahuu kaa jaam hai jo subahoshaam piite hain ye dil nahiin hai threedots  chhupaayaa laakh magar ishq nahiin chhupataa yuun ashq aankh men aayaa huaa nahiin rukataa ki aag lagatii hai jab aansuon ko piite hain lahuu kaa jaam hai threedots  tadaptadap ke nikaalenge dil ke aramaan ham karenge ranj se paidaa kushii ke samaan ham ki gamon kii nok se dil ke zakm siite hain lahuu kaa jaam hai threedots  kabhii qaraar na aaegaa hamako jiine se ilaaj zahar kaa hotaa hai zahar piine se ki sar pe maut kaa saayaa hai phir bhii jiite hain lahuu kaa jaam hai threedots

Title: aapane yuun hii dillagii kii thii ham to dil kii lagii samajh baithe
Lyrics: aapane yuun hii dillagii kii thii ham to dil kii lagii samajh baithe aapane bhii hamen na samajhaayaa aap bhii to hansii samajh baithe  aapako yaad bhalaa kyaa rahataa ham to yuun hii mile the raahon men dil hamaare men aap the lekin ham na the aapakii nigaahon men kyaa huaa aapane na pahachaanaa aur hamen ajanabii samajh baithe aapane yuun hii threedots  pyaar apanaa to ek tamaashaa thaa aur ham kud hii the tamaashaaii aaj diivaanagii hamen apanii yaad aaii to aankh bhar aaii jal rahaa thaa vo dil hamaaraa hii ham jise chaandanii samajh baithe aapane yuun hii threedots

Title: maar daalegaa dardejigar koii isakii davaa kiijiye
Lyrics: maar daalegaa dardejigar koii isakii davaa kiijiye  2 ye wafaaen bahut ho chukii  2 aaj koii jafaa kiijiye are maar daalegaa dardejigar koi isakii davaa kiijiye  chand aisii bhii hotii hain baaten haan jo log kahate nahiin chand aisii bhii aatii hain raaten ki duur rahate nahiin aaj aisii hii ik raat hai saath guzare duaa kiijiye are maar daalegaa threedots  aaa arrta arra aaa aaa arrta arra aha arra arra arrra aha  tadapake yuun kahenge ham ki kyaa sitam huaa sanam diyaa hai dil kiyaa hai pyaar na niind hai na hai qaraar aap se ham shikaayat karen aap hamase gilaa kiijiye are maar daalegaa threedots

Title: raat suhaanii jaag rahii hai dhiiredhiire chupakechupake
Lyrics: raat suhaanii jaag rahii hai dhiiredhiire chupakechupake choriichorii ho prem kahaanii jaag rahii hai dhiiredhiire threedots  chal rahe hain jaaduu tham gayaa zamaanaa dil churaa rahaa hai ye samaan suhaanaa paalakii chaman men phuulon kii utaar ke ye bahaar gaa rahii hai giit pyaar ke o aur javaanii jaag rahii hai dhiiredhiire threedots  chaand kar rahaa hai pyaar ke ishaare ye hamaare nayanaa ban gae hain taare niind ne na aane kii uthaaii hai qasam o niind kaise aae man ke dvaar pe sanam o priit diivaanii jaag rahii hai dhiiredhiire threedots  ek pahelii tum mujhase puuchho aa gae kahaan ham ye kisii se puuchho ye zamiin lag rahii hai aasamaan sii dil kii dhadakanon men pad gaii hai taan sii o zindagaanii jaag rahii hai dhiiredhiire threedots

Lyrics: aa jaa piyaa tohe pyaar duun gorii baiyaan tope vaar duun kis liye tu itanaa udaas sukhe sukhe honth ankhiyon me pyaas kis liye kis liye ho aa jaa piyaa tohe pyaar duunthreedots  rahane de re jo vo julmii hai path tere gaaon ke palakon se chun daalungii main kaante teri raahon ke ho sukh meraa lele main dukh tere lelun tu bhii jiye main bhii jiyuun ho aa jaa piyaathreedots  jal chuke hain badan kaii piyaa isii aag men thake hue in haathon ko dede mere haath men ho lat bikharaae chunariyaa bichhaae baithii hun tere liye ho aa jaa piyaathreedots  apanii to jab ankhiyon se bah chalii dhaar sii khil padii bas ek hansii piyaa tere pyaar kii ho main jo nahiin haarii saajan zaraa socho kis liye kis liye ho aa jaa piyaathreedots

Title: sakhii re meraa man ulajhe tan dole
Lyrics: sakhii rii meraa man ulajhe tan dole ab chain pade tab hii jab unase milan ho le sakhii rii meraa man ulajhe tan dole   laakh jatan karuun dhyaan bante naa ye rasavantii rain kate naa pavan agan sii ghole ab chain pade tab hii jab unase milan ho le sakhii ri meraa man ulajhe tan dole   saans bhii luun to aanchsii aaye kanchan kaayaa pighalii jaaye adharon men trishnaa bole ab chain pade tab hii jab unase milan ho le sakhii rii meraa man ulajhe tan dole   alaken bikharen aanchal dhalake angang se madiraa chhalake yauvan baanhen khole ab chain pade tab hii jab unase milan ho le sakhii rii meraa man ulajhe tan dole

Lyrics: aii aii aa suukuu suukuu aii aii aa karuun main kyaa suukuu suukuu kho gayaa dil meraa suukuu suukuu  koii mastaanaa kahe koii diivaanaa kahe koii paravaanaa kahe jalane ko beqaraar chaahat kaa mujhape asar main duniyaa se bekabar chalataa huun apanii dagar manzil hai merii pyaar aii aii aa threedots  chaunko mat ai doston yuun hii mujhase mat daro mere bhole pyaar ko naadaanii naa samajho haathon men jo haath hai jiivan bhar kaa saath hai siidhiisachchii baat hai kahaanii na samajho aii aii aa threedots  merii aankhon men nashaa merii baaton men nashaa merii saanson men nashaa bahakaa main bin pie ghutatiighutatii bebasii sahamiisahamii har ghadii bin chaahat kyaa zindagii jiitaa main kisalie aii aii aa threedots

Title: muhabbat chiiz hai kyaa muhabbat karake dekhenge
Lyrics: muhabbat chiiz hai kyaa muhabbat karake dekhenge 2 qazaa kahate hain kisako kisii par mar ke dekhenge muhabbaat chiiz hai threedots   badaa hii kuubasuurat dil se vaadaa kar liyaa hamane ki tum par jaan dene kaa iraadaa kar liyaa hamane  2  kahaan hai pyaar kii suulii  2 ye suulii chadh ke dekhenge qazaa kahate hain threedots   tumhaare dar pe dil apanaa muhabbat kaa savaalii hai nashiilii aankh se dekho suraahii dil kii khaalii hai  2  chhalak jaatii hai kaise  2 suraahii bhar ke dekhenge qazaa kahate hain threedots   liyaa jaaegaa kab tak jaaneman imtahaan apanaa sunaa do muskuraa kar faisalaa kuchh meharabaan apanaa  2  tumhaare faisale par  2 kushii se mar ke dekhenge qazaa kahate hain threedots

Title: diivaanaa kah ke aaj mujhe phir pukaarie
Lyrics: diivaanaa kah ke aaj mujhe phir pukaarie haazir huun koii tiirenazar dil pe maarie diiwaanaa kah ke threedots  lag jaae aapako naa kisii kii nazar kahiin  2 ghar jaa ke apane husn kaa sadakaa utaarie haazir huun koii threedots  zulfen sanvaarane se banegii na koii baat 2 uthie kisii gariib kii qismat sanvaarie haazir huun koii threedots  ik baar kar hii diijie is dil kaa faisalaa 2 rahrah ke yuun nigaah kaa kanzar naa maarie haazir huun koii threedots

Title: ye shamaa to jalii roshanii ke lie
Lyrics: ye shamaa to jalii roshanii ke lie is shamaa se kahiin aag lag jaae to ye shamaa kyaa kare ye havaa to chalii saans le har koii ghar kisii kaa ujad jaae aandhii men to ye havaa kyaa kare  chal ke puurab se thandii havaa aa gaii uth ke parvat ke kaalii ghataa chhaa gaii ye ghataa to uthii pyaas sabakii bujhe aashiyaan pe kisii ke giriin bijaliyaan to ye ghataa kyaa kare ye shamaa to jalii threedots  puuchhataa huun main sabase koii de javaab naakudaa kii bhalaa kyaa kataa hai janaab naakudaa le ke saahil ke jaanib chalaa duub jaae safiinaa jo manjhadhaar men to naakudaa kyaa kare ye shamaa to jalii threedots  vo jo ulajhan sii tere kyaalon men hai vo ishaaraa bhii mere savaalon men hai ye nigaah to milii dekhane ke lie par kahiin ye nazar dhokhaa khaa jaae to ye nigaah kyaa kare ye shamaa to jalii threedots

Title: salaamehasarat qubuul kar lo
Lyrics: salaamehasarat qubuul kar lo merii muhabbat qubuul kar lo salaamehasarat qubuul kar lo   threedots  udaas nazaren tadap tadap kar tumhaare jalavon ko dhuundhatii hain jo kvaab kii tarah kho gaye un hasiin lamhon ko dhuundhatii hain agar na ho naagavaar tumako to ye shiqaayat qubuul kar lo salaamehasrat qubuul kar lo   threedots  tumhiin nigaahon kii justajuu ho tumhiin khayaalon kaa muddaa ho tumhiin mere vaaste sanam ho tumhiin mere vaaste khudaa ho merii parastish kii laaj rakh lo merii ibaadat qubuul kar lo salaamehasarat qubuul kar lo   threedots  tumhaarii jhukatii nazar se jab tak na koii paigaam mil sakegaa na ruuh tasqiin paa sakegii na dil ko aaraam mil sakehgaa gamejudaaii hai jaan levaa ye ik haqiikat qubuul kar lo salaamehasarat qubuul kar lo   threedots

Title: umariyaa bin khevak kii naiyyaa
Lyrics: umariyaa bin khevak kii naiyyaa paal nahiin patavaar nahiin aur tej chale puravaiyyaa  chhin uchhare chhin gotaa khaaye naa duube naa paar lagaae bhatake itut bhanvar men jaise bichhadii saanjh chiraiyyaa umariyaa bin khevak kii naiyyaa  dhaar ajaanii nadii ajaanii chaaron or paanii hii paanii dubegii yaa paar lagegii  jaane raam rakhaiyyaa umariyaa bin khevak kii naiyyaa

Title: tujhe suuraj kahuun yaa chandaa
Lyrics: tujhe suuraj kahuun yaa chandaa tujhe diip kahuun yaa taaraa meraa naam karegaa raushan jag men meraa raaj dulaaraa  meraa ghar thaa khaalii khaalii chhaaii thii ajab udaasii jiivan thaa suunaa suunaa har aas thii pyaasii pyaasii tere aate hii khushiyon se bhaar gayaa hai jiivan saaraa meraa naam karegaa raushan threedots  main kab se taras rahaa thaa mere aangan men koii khele nanhii sii hansii ke badale merii saarii duniyaa le le tere sang jhuul rahaa hai merii baahon men jag saaraa meraa naam karegaa raushan threedots  aaj ungalii thaam ke terii tujhe main chalanaa sikhalaauun kal haath pakadanaa meraa jab main buudhaa ho jaauun tuu milaa to main ne paayaa jiine kaa nayaa sahaaraa meraa naam karegaa raushan threedots  mere baad bhii is duniyaa men zindaa meraa naam rahegaa jo bhii tujh ko dekhegaa tujhe meraa laal kahegaa tere ruup men mil jaayegaa mujh ko jiivan dobaaraa meraa naam karegaa raushan threedots
