Lyrics: mu 	 kyon jhukiijhukii hain palaken  2 merii jaan ye baat kyaa hai la 	mere dil main kaise kah duun mujhe pyaar ho gayaa hai mu 	kyon jhukiijhukii threedots  la 	ye ghataa bhii aaj ham par motii lutaa rahii hai 	hamen dekh kar kalii bhii sar ko jhukaa rahii hai mu 	mere dil kii baat sunane ye havaa bhii aa rahii hai la 	ye gagan bhii dekhataa hai mu 	dekhe to harj kyaa hai 	kyon jhukiijhukii threedots  	ye sharam na hamase kiije ham bhii to hain tumhaare 	kiranon se maang bhar den kar do agar ishaare la 	dil gaa rahaa hai nagamaa bas men nahiin hamaare mu 	mausam bhii jhuumataa hai la 	jhuumen to harj kyaa hai 	mere dil main kaise threedots mu 	kyon jhukiijhukii threedots

Title: jaao re jogii tum jaao re
Lyrics: jaao re jogii tum jaao re ye hai premiyon kii nagarii yahaan prem hii hai puujaa jaao re threedots  prem kii piidaa sachchaa sukh hai prem binaa ye jiivan dukh hai  2 jaao re threedots  jiivan se kaisaa chhutakaaraa hai nadiyaa ke saath kinaaraa  2 jaao re threedots  gyaan ki to hai siimaa gyaanii gaagar men saagar kaa paanii  2 jaao re threedots

Title: rut javaan javaan raat meharabaan
Lyrics: rut javaan javaan raat meharabaan chhedo koii daastaan                 2 rut javaan javaan  kuchh jhukiijhukii nazar kahe kuchh chhupaachhupaasaa dar kahe jo kahe vo raatabhar kahe phir bhii na ho kuchh bayaan rut javaan javaan threedots  husn kii shikaayaten bajaa hai idhar tadap udhar gilaa kaamoshii hai dard kii sadaa aankhen banii hain zubaan rut javaan javaan  threedots  gam kushiikushii chhupaa liyaa dard ko bhii dil banaa liyaa zindagii ne aazamaa liyaa tum to na lo imtihaan rut javaan javaan  threedots

Title: vo mohabbat vo wafaaen kis tarah ham bhuul jaaen
Lyrics: vo mohabbat vo wafaaen kis tarah ham bhuul jaaen e gamedil jii rahe hain tujhako de kar ham duaaen vo mohabbat vo threedots  jab se luutaa gardishon ne ishq tanahaa rah gayaa hai unakii yaadon ke alaavaa ab yahaan kyaa rah gayaa hai 2 hamase ruuthaa hai kudaa bhii kisako apanaa gam dikhaaen vo mohabbat vo threedots  naam unakaa guunjataa hai ab bhii dil kii dhadakanon men pad gaii hai zindagaanii haay kitanii ulajhanon men 2 kaash kvaabon men vo aakar haalatedil dekh jaaen vo mohabbat vo threedots  chand aahon kaa sahaaraa chand ashqon par guzaaraa ye bhii koii zindagii hai ai mere paravaradigaaraa 2 khud hii bakshaa pyaar tuune khud hii hamako diin sazaaen vo mohabbat vo threedots

Title: shikavaa nahiin kisii se
Lyrics: shikavaa nahiin kisii se kisii se gilaa nahiin qismat men hii nahiin thaa jo mujhako milaa nahiin 2 shikavaa nahiin kisii se  tuu mil sakaa naa mujhako tasallii to mil gayii 2 2 mere lie bahut hai ke tuu bewafaa nahiin qismat men hii nahiin thaa jo mujhako milaa nahiin shikavaa nahiin kisii se  aakir tumhaarii raah men majabuuriyaan bhii thiin 2 2 waadaa nibhaa sake naa agar tum gilaa nahiin qismat men hii nahiin thaa jo mujhako milaa nahiin shikavaa nahiin kisii se

Title: o jaanevaale ho sake to laut ke aanaa
Lyrics: o jaanevaale ho sake to laut ke aanaa ye ghaat tuu ye baat kahiin bhuul na jaanaa  bachapan ke tere miit tere sang ke sahaare dhuundhenge tujhe galiigalii sab ye gam ke maare puuchhegii har nigaah kal teraa thikaanaa o jaanevaalethreedots  hai teraa vahaan kaun sabhii log hain paraae parades kii garadish men kahiin tuu bhii kho naa jaae kaanton bharii dagar hai tuu daaman bachaanaa o jaanevaalethreedots  de de ke ye aavaaz koii har ghadii bulaae phir jaae jo us paar kabhii laut ke na aae hai bhed ye kaisaa koii kuchh to bataanaa o jaanevaalethreedots

Title: more nayan paakhii bechaare
Lyrics: more nayan paakhii bechaare mere nainaa bechaare tere liye chhatpat chhatpat din rainaa ye akulaayen na ud paayen nayan paakhii bechaare   threedots  ahaa re nain sakhaa re terii ik jhalakii ko tarase re ahaa re yaad men terii nit saavan bhaadon barase re aajaa ki ab to tujh bin rahaa nahiin jaaye aajaa ki lag jaaye na tujhe inakii haay tere liye chhatpat chhatpat din rainaa ye akulaayen na ud paayen

Title: tuu aap hai apanaa chor kaahe rapat kare
Lyrics: tuu aap hai apanaa chor kaahe rapat kare kotavaalii 2  mukhadaa teraa saahuu jaisaa manavaa teraa luteraa 2 dayaa dharam kii galii kabhii naa daalaa tuune pheraa  vahii bagiichaa luutaa re tuune  2 thaa tuu jisakaa maalii kaahe rapat kare threedots  ped lagaayaa paap kaa maange badale men naarangii 2 laakh chhipaae resham se kaayaa terii nangii  bharii rahegii terii tijorii  2 haath rahenge khaalii kaahe rapat kare threedots  tuu samajhe tuu badaa sayaanaa main samajhuun diivaanaa 2 sachche thaanedaar ko ab tak naa pahachaanaa jis par baithaa muurakh kaat rahaa vahii daalii kaahe rapat kare threedots

Title: uthegii tumhaarii nazar dhiire dhiire
Lyrics: uthegii tumhaarii nazar dhiire dhiire 3 muhabbat karegii asar dhiire dhiire  ye maanaa khalish hai abhii halkii halkii khabar bhii nahiin hai tum ko mere dardedil kii kahabar ho rahegii magar dhiire dhiire uthegii tumhaarii nazar threedots  milegaa jo koii hasiin chupake chupake merii yaad aa jaayegii vahiin chupake chupake sataayegaa dardejigar dhiire dhiire uthegii tumhaarii nazar threedots  sulagate hain kab se isii chaah men ham pade hain nigaahen daale isii raah men ham ki aaoge tum bhii idhar dhiire dhiire uthegii tumhaarii nazar threedots

Title: hamen kaash tum se muhabbat na hotii
Lyrics: hamen kaash tum se muhabbat na hotii kahaanii hamaarii haqiikat na hotii  na dil tum ko dete na majabuur hote na duniyaa na duniyaa ke dastuur hote qayaamat se pahale qayaamat na hotii  hamiin badh gaye ishq men had se aage zamaane ne thokar lagaayii to jaage agar mar bhii jaate to hairat na hotii  tumhiin phuunk dete nasheman hamaaraa muhabbat pe ahasaan hotaa tumhaaraa zamaane se koi shikaayat na hotii

Title: ye jhukejhuke nainaa ye lat balakhaatii
Lyrics: ye jhukejhuke nainaa ye lat balakhaatii to dil kyuun naa meraa diivaanaa ho teraa ye jhukejhuke threedots  ye sharam se dahake gaal chain ke dushman ho gae ye ulajheulajhe baal dilon kii ulajhan ho gae tere gaalon kii kair tere baalon kii kair 2 kyon na zulmii o zaalim lajaanaa ho teraa ye jhukejhuke threedots  terii zulf kaa saathii banataa agar main gajaraa hotaa terii ankhiyon men bas jaataa agar main kajaraa hotaa tere kajare kii kair tere gajare kii kair 2 jo dekhe to kyuun naa diivaanaa ho teraa ye jhukejhuke threedots  kaii dekhe mor chakor chal naa aisii dekhii ye qamar lachakatii daal daal naa aisii dekhii ye rang ye ruup jaise chadhatii ho dhuup 2 gorii phir kyon naa zaalim zamaanaa ho teraa ye jhukejhuke threedots

Title: dar bhii thaa  tumase hii ghar ghar kahalaayaa
Lyrics: dar bhii thaa thiin diivaaren bhii tumase hii ghar ghar kahalaayaa  suunaa mandir thaa man meraa bujhaa diip thaa jiivan meraa pratimaa ke paavan charanon men main diipak banakar muskaayaa tumase hii ghar ghar threedots  devaalay ban gayaa suhaavanaa maan tumase meraa gharaangan aanchal kii mamataa maayaa men paaii paaii sukh kii shiital chhaayaa tumase hii ghar ghar threedots  kaise ho gunagaan tumhaaraa jo kuchh bhii hai varadaan tumhaaraa tumane hii mere jiivan ke sapanon ko sach kar dikhalaayaa tumase hii ghar ghar threedots  aankhen merii jyoti tumhaarii rah na gaiin raahen andhiyaarii rahane do mere maathe par maan tumane jo haath badhaayaa tumase hii ghar ghar threedots

Title: tum duur jaaoge kaise daaman bachaaoge kaise
Lyrics: tum duur jaaoge kaise daaman bachaaoge kaise hamen tum bhulaa na sakoge  2 tum duur jaaoge kaise threedots  jitanaa bhulaaoge tum utanaa hii yaad aaenge niinden churaa lenge ham kvaabon men ghul jaaenge kvaabon men ghul jaaenge tadapenge tadapaaenge tum duur jaaoge kaise threedots  dil kii lagii banake ham dil men sulag jaaenge palakon men aakar kabhii ashkon men laharaaenge ashkon men laharaaenge daaman men kho jaaenge tum duur jaaoge kaise threedots

Title: chhotiisii ye duniyaa pahachaane raaste hain
Lyrics: chhotiisii ye duniyaa pahachaane raaste hain  tum kabhii to miloge kahiin to miloge to puuchhenge haal  chhotiisii ye duniyaa   ham to ye samajhenge hamane ek patthar ko puujaa  lekin tumako apane jaisaa nahiin milegaa duujaa nahiin milegaa duujaa  chhotiisii ye duniyaa   siikhaa nahiin hamaare dil ne pyaar men dhiiraj khonaa  aag men jalake bhii jo nikhaare hai vahii sachchaa sonaa hai vahii sachchaa sonaa  chhotiisii ye duniyaa   dil kii daulat mat thukaraao dekho pachhataaoge aaj chale jaate ho jaise laut ke bhii aaoge laut ke bhii aaoge  chhotiisii ye duniyaa     chhotiisii ye duniyaa pahachaane raaste hain  tum kabhii to miloge kahiin to miloge to puuchhenge haal  chhotiisii ye duniyaa   siikhaa nahiin hamaare dil ne pyaar men dhiiraj khonaa  aag men jalake bhii jo nikhaare vahii hai sachchaa sonaa vahii hai sachchaa sonaa  chhotiisii ye duniyaa   meraa pahalaa pyaar aakharii bhii hai is jiivan kaa ek baar hotaa hai jag men rishtaa man se man kaa rishtaa man se man kaa chhotiisii ye duniyaa

Title: ai rii jaane na duungii
Lyrics: aalii rii roko naa koii karane do mujhako manamaanii aaj mere ghar aaye vo priitam jinake liye sab nagarii chhaanii aaj koii bandhan naa bhaaye aaj hai khul khelan kii thaanii  e rii jaane na duungii e rii jaane na duungii main to apane rasik ko nainon men rakh luungi palaken muund muund e rii jaane na duungii threedots  alakon men kundal daalo aur deh sugandh rachaao jo dekhe mohit ho jaaye aisaa ruup sajaao aaj sakhii dha pa ma re pa  ma pa dha ni dha pa dha pa pa saa dha  re saa dha pa re  aaaa aaj sakhii pii daaluungii  main darshanjal kii buund buund e rii jaane na duungii threedots   madhur milan kii durlabh belaa yuun hii biit na jaaye aisii rain jo vyarth gavaaye jiivan bhar pachhataaye sej sajaao dha pa ma re pa  ma pa dha ni dha pa dha pa pa saa dha  re saa dha pa re  aaaa sej sajaao mere saajan kii le aao kaliyaan guund guund  e rii jaane na duungii threedots

Title: baar baar dekho hazaar baar dekho ke dekhane kii chiiz hai
Lyrics: baar baar dekho  hazaar baar dekho ke dekhane kii chiiz hai  hamaaraa dilarubaa  taalii ho taalii ho  taalii ho  haan jii haan  aur bhii honge diladaar yahaan laakhon dilon kii bahaar yahaan  par ye baat kahaan      2 ye bemisaal husn laajavaab ye aadaa  taalii ho taalii ho  taalii ho  dil milaa ek jaanemahafil milaa  yaa chiraagemanzil milaa  ye na puuchho ke kahaan       2 nayaa nayaa ye aashiqii kaa raaz hai mera  taalii ho taalii ho  taalii ho  balle balle uthake mistar kyon chale  pyaar pe mere kaho kyon jale  baith bhii jaao meharabaan         2 duaa karo mile tumhen bhii aisaa dilarubaa  taalii ho taalii ho  taalii ho

Title: aansuu chhupaae aankh men kuunejigar piyaa karuun
Lyrics: aansuu chhupaae aankh men kuunejigar piyaa karuun aahon bhare jahaan men majabuur main jiyaa karuun  jalataa huaa chiraag huun par ab vo roshanii kahaan jo aandhiyon men raat bhar roshan jahaan kiyaa karuun  manzil kii chaah men merii raahen badalbadal gaiin har mod par rukaarukaa kud se gile kiyaa karuun

Title: haulehaule jiyaa dole
Lyrics: haulehaule jiyaa dole 2 sapanon ke ban men papiihaa man kaa piipii bole  mile mujhe rasiyaa balam man basiyaa 2 khushiyon ke din aa gae aaii merii duniyaa men jhuumatii bahaaren 2 rang anokhe chhaa gae 2 laage bechain se nainon men madiraa koii ghole  jhuume meraa manavaa kamal khile dil ke 2 duniyaa suhaanii ho gaii piyaa se lagan kii sunii jo mainne batiyaan 2 main to diivaanii ho gaii 2 laage bechain se saiyaan ghuunghatavaa moraa khole

Title: ye kaun aayaa roshan ho gaii mahafil kisake naam se
Lyrics: ye kaun aayaa roshan ho gaii mahafil kisake naam se mere ghar men jaise suuraj nikala hai shaam se ye kaun aayaa  yaaden hain kuchh aaii sii yaa kiranen laharaaii sii dil men soe giiton ne lii hai phir angadaaii sii armaanon kii madiraa chhalake ankhiyon ke jaam se ye kaun aayaa  kyaa kahie is aane ko aayaa hai tarasaane ko dekhaa usane hans hans ke har apane begaane ko lekin kitanaa beparvaah hai mere hii salaam se ye kaun aayaa

Title: morii baali re umariyaa ab kaise
Lyrics: lakadii jal koyalaa bhayii 2 koyalaa jal bhayii raakh main paapan aisii jalii na koyalaa bhayii naa raakh  morii baalii re umariyaa ab kaise biite raam 2 ro roke bolii raadhaa 2 mohe tajake gayo shyaam morii baalii re umariyaa  jo chhodake hii jaanaa thaa tuune kaahe ko priit lagaaii mere miit teraa kyaa bigadaa merii ho gaii jagat hansaaii 2 ab to saarii re nagariyaa kare mujhako badanaam 2 morii baalii re umariyaa ab kaise biite raam  jiitejii o bedardii main sej agan kii soii kyaa holii aur diivaalii main har tyohaar men royii 2 morii suunii re atariyaa pe har din koharaam 2 morii baalii re umariyaa ab kaise biite raam  tum aise des sidhaare jahaan pahunch sake naa paatii tuune achchhaa saath nibhaayaa o mere jiivan saathii 2 kisakii laagii re najariyaa mose bighalaa bhayii baam 2 morii baalii re umariyaa ab kaise biite raam

Title: gorii tere chalane pe meraa dil qurbaan
Lyrics: gorii tere chalane pe meraa dil qurbaan 2 teraa chalanaa teraa rukanaa teraa mudanaa taubaa gorii tere chalane threedots  paayal bajaanaa us pe laharaanaa lachakanaa 2 zulfen udaanaa aur meraa duur se takanaa mujhe dar hai lut naa jaae kahiin meraa iimaan meraa dil qurbaan threedots  teraa diivaanaa terii aarazuu karataa hai teraa diivaanaa teraa saudaaii tere naam pe marataa hai zaraa tham jaa zaraa ruk jaa teraa hogaa ehasaan meraa dil qurbaan threedots

Title: aap yuun hii agar hamase milate rahe
Lyrics: ra aap yuun hii agar hamase milate rahe    dekhie ek din pyaar ho jaaegaa aa aisii baaten na kar ai hasiin jaaduugar    meraa dil terii nazaron men kho jaaegaa  ra piichhepiichhe mere aap aatiin hain kyon 2    merii raahon men aankhen bichhaatii hain kyon    aap aatii hain kyon threedots aa kyaa kahuun aapase ye bhii ek raaz hai    ek din isakaa izahaar ho jaaegaa  ra kaisii jaaduugarii kii are jaaduugar 2    tere chahare se hatatii nahiin ye nazar    hai ye nazar threedots aa aisii nazaron se dekhaa agar aapane    sharm se rang gulanaar ho jaaegaa  ra main mohabbat kii raahon se anjaan huun 2    kyaa karuun kyaa kyaa karuun pareshaan huun    main pareshaan huun threedots aa aapakii ye pareshaaniyaan dekhakar    meraa dil bhii pareshaan ho jaaegaa

Title: ik baar zaraa phir kah do mujhe sharmaake tum diivaanaa
Lyrics: he ik baar zaraa phir kah do    mujhe sharmaake tum diivaanaa la aisii miithiimiithii baaten karake    kahaan siikhaa hai dil kaa lubhaanaa he o jaanejaan    ik baar zaraa phir kah do    mujhe sharmaake tum diivaanaa la uunhuun                oye hoy mar jaawaan   he dil lekar raho duur huzuur na hamase    karo itanaa guruur na hamase la o sajanaa meraa haar singaar tumhiin ho    meraa dam hai tumhaare hii dam se he tum shamaa ho to main huun parvaanaa la aisii miithiimiithii baaten karake    kahaan siikhaa hai dil kaa lubhaanaa he o jaanejaan    ik baar zaraa phir kah do    mujhe sharmaake tum diivaanaa la uunhuun                oye hoy mar jaawaan      he suno dilbar ye jo diip khushii kaa jalaa hai    meraa pyaar isii men dhalaa hai la meraa dil bhii piyaa leke tumhaaraa sahaaraa    naii raah pe aaj chalaa hai he diaa tumhiin ne ummiidon ko thikaanaa la aisii miithiimiithii baaten karake    kahaan siikhaa hai dil kaa lubhaanaa he o jaanejaan    ik baar zaraa phir kah do    mujhe sharmaake tum diivaanaa la uunhuun                oye hoy mar jaawaan      he tum chaaho to main todake laa duun sitaare    ki ho tum mujhe jaan se pyaare la kyaa maanguun jab mil gae tum mujhe sajanaa    main to aa gaii bas men tumhaare he meraa dil hai tumhaaraa nazaraanaa la aisii miithiimiithii baaten karake    kahaan siikhaa hai dil kaa lubhaanaa he o jaanejaan    ik baar zaraa phir kah do    mujhe sharmaake tum diivaanaa  he kaho na la diivaanaa he phir kaho la diivaanaa he phir kaho la diivaana

Title: zaraa jhuumane do  mujhe dekhie main koii daastaan huun
Lyrics: zaraa jhuumane do ke masaruur huun main yahaan huun yahaan se bahut duur huun main  mujhe dekhie main koii daastaan huun 2 bahut kuchh hai dil men magar bezubaan huun mujhe dekhie main threedots  jinhen yaad huun main bhulaaenge kaise mujhe bazm se vo  uthaaenge kaise  2 jalii to shamaa thii bujhii to dhuaan huun mujhe dekhie main threedots  abhii chaahatii huun zaraa muskaraanaa kabhii phir karuungii bayaan ye fasaanaa mujhe jaan legaa  kisii din zamaanaa  3 bahaarechaman huun ke daurekizaan huun mujhe dekhie main threedots  shiqastemuhabbat bhalaa kaise maanuun ajii dardedil ko davaa kaise maanuun ki main ek but ko  kudaa kaise maanuun  2 buton kii kudaaii pe main badagumaan huun mujhe dekhie main threedots

Title: jab jaag uthe aramaan to kaise niind aaye
Lyrics: jab jaag uthe aramaan to kaise niind aae ho ghar men hasiin mehamaan to kaise niind aae niind aae jab jaag uthe aramaan to kaise niind aae  ye raat ye dil kii dhadakan ye badhatii huii betaabii    ik jaam kii khaatir jaise bechain ho koii sharaabii   2 sholon men girii ho jaan to kaise niind aae jab jaag uthe aramaan to kaise niind aae  nazadiik bahut hai manzil phir bhii hai gazab kii duurii  ai dil ye tuu hii batalaa de ye kaun sii hai majabuurii   2 jab soch men ho inasaan to kaise niind aae ho ghar men hasiin mehamaan to kaise niind aaye niind aae jab jaag uthe aramaan to kaise niind aae

Title: kar lo pranaam ai logo
Lyrics: kar lo pranaam ai logo vo vandaniiya hain bahanen is desh ke liye jinhonne vidhavaa ke kapade pahane  pranaam un dulhanon ko meraa jinhonne apanaa sab kuchh ganwaayaa vatan ye zindaa rahe isaliye apanaa suhaagsinduur lutaayaa pranaam un dulhanon ko meraa  ye hain wahii dulhanen jinhonne siimaa par priitam khoye hain saaraa bhaaratavarsh jagaake inake sage abhii soye hain  kud ko mitaakar in bahanon ne is maatii kaa qarz chukaayaa vatan ye  ik din samay badal jaayegaa mulk men aayegii kushahaalii par sarahad pe bhatakatii rahegii inakii aankhen kaalii kaalii  tirange kii roshanii kii kaatir inhonne ghar kaa diyaa bujhaayaa vatan ye

Title: tuu aae na aae magar jaane vaale terii yaad
Lyrics: tuu aae na aae magar jaane vaale terii yaad aa aa kar rulaayaa karegii jo dekhegaa rotaa hai koii akelaa 2 to khud bhii aansuu bahaayaa karegii tuu aae na aae threedots  jidhar se gayaa tuu ye raahen hameshaa tarasatii rahengii terii vaapasii ko udhar se havaa bhii jo aayaa karegii 2 teraa naam lekar sataayaa karegii tuu aae na aae threedots  jo raaton ko taare ye puuchhenge mujhase bataa tuu bhii kyon raat bhar jaagatii hai kahuungii merii niind bas men nahiin hai 2 ye birahan bahaane banaayaa karegii tuu aae na aae threedots  jahaan merii aankhon kaa paanii giregaa terii yaad ke phuul khilate rahenge saveresavere jo aaegii shabanam 2 to dil thaam kar laut jaayaa karegii tuu aae na aae threedots

Title: kushii kii vo raat aa gaii koii giit jagane do
Lyrics: kushii kii vo raat aa gaii koii giit jagane do gaao re jhuumjhuum 2 kahiin koii kaantaa lage jo pag men to lagane do naacho re jhuumjhuum 2  aaj hansuun main itanaa ki merii aankh lage rone aaj main itanaa gaauun ki man men dard lage hone o maze men savere talaq yahii giit bajane do naacho re jhuum threedots  dhuul huun main vo pavan basantii kyon meraa sang dhare merii nahiin to aur kisii kii paiyaa men rang bhare o do nainon men aansuu lie dulhaniyaa ko sajane do naacho re jhuum threedots

Title: merii muhabbat javaan rahegii
Lyrics: merii muhabbat javaan rahegii sadaa rahii hai sadaa rahegii tadap tadap kar yahii kahegii sadaa rahii hai sadaa rahegii  na tum saa koii zamaane bhar men o o tumheen ko chaahaa merii nazar ne tumhen chunaa hai tumhen chunegii sadaa rahii hai sadaa rahegii  jo aag dil men lagii huii hai o o yahii to manzil kii roshanii hai na yah bujhii hai na yah bujhegii sadaa rahii hai sadaa rahegii  tumharii pahaloo men gar mare ham o o to maut kitanii hasiin hogii chitaa men jal kar bhii naa mitegii sadaa rahii hai sadaa rahegii

Title: mahataab teraa cheharaa
Lyrics: mahataab teraa cheharaa kis khvaab men dekhaa thaa ai husn zaraa batalaa tuu kaun main kaun huun  khvaabon men mile aqsar ik raah chale milakar phir bhii hai yahii behatar mat puuchh main kaun huun mahataab teraa cheharaa   husnoishq hain terii jahaan dil kii dhadakanen terii zubaan aaj zindagii tujhase javaan aagaaz hai kyaa meraa anjaam hai kyaa meraa hai meraa muqaddar kyaa batalaa ki main kaun huun  kyon ghirii ghataa tuu hii bataa kyon hansii fizaa tuu hii bataa phuul kyon khilaa tuu hii bataa kis raah pe chalanaa hai kis gaah pe rukanaa hai kis kaam ko karanaa hai batalaa ki main kaun huun  zindagii ko tuu giit banaa dil ke saaz pe jhuum ke gaa is jahaan ko tuu pyaar sikhaa mahataab teraa cheharaa

Title: dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa
Lyrics: dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa meraa dil karataa  aisaa kuchh kar paayen yaadon men bas jaayen dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa meraa dil karataa ho sadiyon jahaan men ho charchaa hamaaraa dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa meraa dil karataa  jalatii mashaalen leke mele men  kii raaton men aage aage ham chalen yaaron ki baraaton men hanse koii bholii bhaalii apanii bhii baaton men kisii kii kalaaii aae apane bhii haathon men ho sadiyon jahaan men ho charchaa hamaaraa dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa meraa dil karataa    	   nit naii dhuumen machen nit naye mele hon pariyon men ghire rahen kabhii na akele hon gam kii ghataayen hon ki kushiyon ke rele hon donon se nibhaanewaale ham alabele hon ho sadiyon jahaan men ho charchaa hamaaraa dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa meraa dil karataa   	   ham sa jiyaalaa koii mile na hazaaron men mare chaahe jiiye rahen agali kataaron men jhalake hamaaraa lahuu kal kii bahaaron men ashkon kaa tohafaa ho ki bant jaaye yaaron men ho sadiyon jahaan men ho charchaa hamaaraa dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa meraa dil karataa  aisaa kuchh kar paayen yaadon men bas jaayen dil karataa o yaaraa diladaaraa meraa dil karataa

Title: kyaa se kyaa ho gayaa bevafaa tere pyaar men
Lyrics: kyaa se kyaa ho gayaa bevafaa aaa tere pyaar men chaahaa kyaa kyaa milaa bevafaa aaa tere pyaar men  chalo suhaanaa bharam to tuutaa jaanaa ke husn kyaa hai ho o o chalo suhaanaa bharam to tuutaa jaanaa ke husn kyaa hai kahatii hai jisako pyaar duniyaa kyaa chiiz kyaa balaa hai dil ne kyaa naa sahaa bevafaa aaa tere pyaar men chaahaa kyaa threedots  tere mere dil ke biich ab to sadiyon ke faasale hain ho o o tere mere dil ke biich ab to sadiyon ke faasale hain yaqiin hogaa kise ki ham tum ik raah sang chale hain honaa hai aur kyaa bevafaa aaa tere pyaar men chaahaa kyaa threedots

Title: sudh bisar gayii aaj
Lyrics: sudh bisar gayii aaj apane gunan kii aa hii gayii baat biite dinan kii  bikhare sapan saare vidhanaa se ham haare asuvon men duubii hain palaken nayan kii palaken nayan kii sudh bisar gayii aaj   threedots  jiyaraa gayo tuut gayii preranaa ruuth ghut ghut gayii suukh saritaa suran kii saritaa suran kii sudh bisar gayii aaj   threedots  sa ri sa ma ma ga ma dha dha ma dha sa ni sa ga sa ni sa ni dha ni dha ma dha ma ga ma dha ma dha ni sa ni dha pa ma ni dha pa ma ni dha pa ma sudh bisar gayii aaj   threedots  haay re kalakaar jaane na sansaar har raag men piir hai kis ke man kii haay kis ke man kii sudh bisar gayii aaj   threedots  sudh bisar gayii aaj apane gunan kii aa hii gayii baat biite dinan kii  sudh bisar gayii aaj apane gunan kii

Title: ai dil kahaan terii manzil
Lyrics: ai dil kahaan teri manzil naa koii diipak hai naa koii taaraa hai gum hai zamiin duur aasamaan ai dil kahaan teri manzil  dhal gaye naadaan vo aanchal ke saaye rah gaye raste men apane paraaye rah gaye apane paraaye saathii bhii chhuutaa bandhan bhii tuutaa naa hamasafar naa kaaravaan ai dil kahaan terii manzil threedots  kis liye mil mil ke dil chhutate hain kis liye ban ban mahal tuutate hain kis liye dil tuutate hain patthar se puuchhaa shiishe se puuchhaa kaamosh hai sab ki zabaan ai dil kahaan terii manzil threedots

Title: haay terii aankh men vo qamaal hai
Lyrics: haay 5 terii aankh men vo qamaal hai o terii har adaa bemisaal hai o meraa dil huaa udanchhuu haay haay threedots  bade shauq se o maine pyaar kii o bhejii arjiyaan  are bevafaa  2 tuune ghar bulaa khilaa dii mirchiyaan ik aag sii o tuune phuunk dii o meraa dil huaa threedots  tere pyaar kaa chakkar buraa haay chal gayaa  terii ye hansii  2 dil men dhansii main to mar gayaa mat muskuraa o tujhe kyaa pataa o meraa dil huaa threedots

Title: aaj ronaa padaa to samajhe
Lyrics: aaj ronaa padaa to samajhe hansane kaa mol kyaa hai apanaa sapanaa khonaa padaa to samajhe   2  kvaabon kii haqiiqat kyaa thii aramaanon kii qiimat kyaa thii apanon kii muhabbat kyaa thii gair honaa padaa to samajhe  aaj ronaa padaa to samajhe threedots  sukh milataa hai kis mushkil se kyaa karatii hai duniyaa dil se is rang bharii mahafil se duur honaa padaa to samajhe   aaj ronaa padaa to samajhe threedots  nikale the jinhen apanaane vo log the sab begaane is baat ko ham diivaane chain khonaa padaa to samajhe  aaj ronaa padaa to samajhe hansane kaa mol kyaa hai apanaa sapanaa khonaa padaa to samajhe

Title: tum kamasin ho  main kamasin huun
Lyrics: tum kamasin ho naadaan ho naazuk ho bholii ho sochataa huun main ki tumhen pyaar naa karuun  madhosh adaa ye alhadapan bachapan to abhii ruuthaa hii nahiin ehasaas hai kyaa aur kyaa hai tadap is soch men dil duubaa hii nahiin  tum aahen bharo aur shikave karo ye baat hamen manzuur nahiin tum taare gino aur niind ude vo raat hamen manzuur nahiin     main kamasin huun naadaan huun naazuk huun bholii huun thaam lo mujhe main yahii iltijaa karuun  hai dil kii lagan main phuul banuun aur hansake tere pahaluu men rahuun tuu dekhe mujhe main dekhuun tujhe aur pyaar men tere kho jaauun  jis manzil kaa raahii na koii vo seharaa hai manzil to nahiin jis dil men koii dhadakan hii na ho vo patthar hai koii dil to nahiin

Title: jaaneman ik nazar dekh le
Lyrics: jaaneman ik nazar dekh le tere sadake idhar dekh le  2  ye bahaaren ye chaman sab kushii se hain magan chuumen qadamon ko tere chaand kii pahalii kiran jaanejaan raahevafaa dil haii diivaanaa teraa chaahen apanaa naa samajh miithii nazaren to uthaa gair hii jaan kar dekh le jaaneman ik nazar threedots  jo bhii marajii hai terii hai vahii merii kushii merii jaanib se tujhe ho mubaarak ye ghadii zulf kii chhaanv tale pyaar kaa daur chale shaamefuraqat men agar koii jalataa hai jale tuu kushii kii sahar dekh le jaaneman ik nazar threedots  husneyusuf kii qasam dagamagaate hain qadam jii men aataa hai yahii chhiin luun teraa sanam lekin haay mast adaa maan ehasaan meraa maine har jazbaaedil tujhape qurbaan kiyaa meraa dil aur jigar dekh le jaaneman ik nazar threedots

Title: aa jaa o jaanejaan mere meharabaan
Film: geet gaya pattharon ne a poem in stone
Lyrics: aa jaa o jaanejaan mere meharabaan aa jaa o jaanejaan nainaa kaa kajaraa bulaae dil kaa ye acharaa bulaae baanhon kaa gajaraa bulaae aa jaa o jaanejaan threedots  jab se gayaa tuu ghar se merii muhabbat tarase palakon se saavan  barase  2  chandaa  3 chandaa na guzare idhar se har saans dil ko dukhaae zakmon ne aansuu bahaae aa jaa o jaanejaan threedots  ghungharuu men nagmaa tumhaaraa aankhon men jalavaa tumhaaraa phuulon men mukhadaa  tumhaaraa  2  taaron men  3 hansanaa tumhaaraa merii nazar lalachaae honthon se nikale haay aa jaa o jaanejaan threedots

Title: tum puuchhate ho ishq balaa hai ke nahiin hai
Lyrics: tum puuchhate ho ishq balaa hai ke nahiin hai  kya jaane tumhen khaufekhudaa hai ke nahiin hai   jiine ka hunar sabako sikhaataa hai yahii ishq  insaan ko insaan banaataa hai yahii ishq  bande ko khudaa karake dikhataa hai yahii ishq  is ishq kii tauhiin kataa hai ke nahiin hai   maanaa hai badi dard bharii ishq ki ruudaad  hoti nahiin mitakar bhi mohabbat kabhi barabaad  har daur men majanuu hue har daur men farahaad  har saaz men aaj unakii sada hai ke nahiin hai   gam phuulanephalane ka bhulaakar kabhi dekho  sar ishq ke qadamon pe jhukaakar kabhi dekho  gharabaar mohabbat men lutaakar kabhi dekho  khone men bhi paane ka mazaa hai ke nahiin hai   jab ho hii gayaa pyaar to sansaar ka dar kyaa  hai kaun bhalaa kaun buraa isakii khabar kyaa  dil men na utar jaaye to ulfat ki nazar kyaa  ham dil ke pujaarii hain pataa hai ke nahiin hai

Title: dil beqaraar saa hai
Lyrics: dil beqaraar saa hai mujhako kumaar saa hai jab se tujhe dekhaa sanam haay dil beqaraar saa hai   mausam nashe men chuur hai kuchh pii ke aayii hai ghataa bas kuchh na puuchho aaj kyaa paigaam laayii hai ghataa ab mainne jaanaa pyaar kyaa hai terii zulfon kii qasam dil beqaraar saa hai   matalab to ab samajhaa huun main dhadakan bharii aavaaz kaa ehasaan mere sar pe hai terii nigaahenaaz kaa ab mainne jaanaa pyaar kyaa hai terii aankhon kii qasam dil beqaraar saa hai   haathon men aanchal thaam ke vo munh chhupaane kii adaa diivaanaa kar degaa hamen vo muskuraane kii adaa ab mainne jaanaa pyaar kyaa hai tere honthon kii qasam dil beqaraar saa hai

Title: kaanton pe chal ke  kahiin se maut ko laao
Lyrics: kaanton pe chal ke paanv ke chhaalon se kyaa gilaa maangii thii khud hii raat ujaalon se kyaa gilaa  kahiin se maut ko laao ke gam kii raat kate meraa hii sog manaao ke gam kii raat kate kahiin se maut ko threedots  kare na piichhaa meraa zindagii ko samajhaa do 2 ye raah usako bhulaa do ke gam kii raat kate kahiin se maut ko threedots  kaho bahaaron se ab shaakedil na hogii harii 2 kizaan ke giit sunaao ke gam kii raat kate kahiin se maut ko threedots  na chaaraagar kii zaruurat na kuchh davaa kii hai duaa ko haath uthaao ke gam kii raat kate kahiin se maut ko threedots

Title: jaane kaahe jiyaa moraa dole re
Lyrics: jaane kaahe jiyaa moraa dole re 2 koii kaliyon kaa ghuunghat khole mere sapanon kii duniyaa dole dole re jaane kaahe jiyaa moraa threedots  hawaa dhaanii chunariyaa udaae moraa chanchal jiyaa laharaae  2 puravaiyaa bahe haulehaule daaliidaalii pe bela phuule phuule re jaane kaahe jiyaa moraa threedots  phuul chunchun ye kis par chadhaauun sakhii man mandir men kis ko bithaauun sakhii  2 aa jaa piyaa moraa dole jiyaa 2  dole re jaane kaahe jiyaa moraa threedots

Title: koii hamadam naa rahaa koii sahaaraa na rahaa
Lyrics: koii hamadam naa rahaa koii sahaaraa na rahaa ham kisii ke na rahe koii hamaaraa na rahaa koii hamadam naa rahaa threedots  shaam tanhaaii kii hai aaegii manzil kaise 2 jo mujhe raah dikhaae vahii taaraa na rahaa koii hamadam naa rahaa threedots  ai nazaaron naa hanso mil naa sakuungaa tumase 2 tum mere ho naa sake main tumhaaraa naa rahaa koii hamadam naa rahaa threedots  kyaa bataauun main kahaan yuun hii chalaa jaataa huun 2 jo mujhe phir se bulaae vo ishaaraa naa rahaa koii hamadam naa rahaa threedots

Title: laakh chhupaao chhup na sakegaa
Lyrics: laakh chhupaao chhup na sakegaa raaj ho kitanaa gaharaa dil kii baat bataa deta hai asalii naqalii cheharaa  phuul men khushabuu dil men chaahat kabhii n chhipane paaii hai aankh se dhalakii banakar surkhii jab jab aakar davaaii hai sach baaton par lag nahiin sakataa khaamoshii kaa paharaa dil kii baat bataa detaa hai asalii naqalii cheharaa  ab n ham ko aur bataao hamane to pahachaan liyaa saagar se bhii gahare nikale hamane tum ko jaan liyaa jis ke man men chor chhipaa ho saamane kavi vah thaharaa dil kii baat bataa detaa hai asalii naqalii cheharaa  log to dil ko khush rakhne ko kyaa kyaa dhong rachaate hai bheshh badal kar is duniyaa men baharuupiye ban jaate hain man darapan men mukhadaa dekho utaraa rang sunaharaa dil kii baat bataa detaa hai asalii naqalii cheharaa

Title: ek chatur naar kar ke singaar
Lyrics: ek chatur nar kar ke singar  mere man ke dvar ye ghusat jaat  ham marat jaat are he he he  yak chatur nar kar ke singarthreedots   pa re sa sa sa sa ni dh sa sa re sa dha dha pa  pa dha sa re sa sa re ga dha pa   yak chatur nar kar ke singaathreedots r  ki ummm  dham  mah ayyo   ki are dham o dham o dham dham dham ruk  o a aa i ii u u e ai o au an a vowels  um nam nam nam nam nam nam  nam nam lama lama lama lama la  um bal bal bal bal re  bal bal bal bal re bal bal bal bal re  om   ek chatur nar badi hoshiyar  2  apane hi jaal men phasat jaat  ham hasat jaat are ho ho ho ho ho   ek chatur nar badi hoshiyar   su tuu kyonthreedots  mah chhi re   kare lakh lakh duniya chaturai  chhutti kar dunga main usaki  abake jo avaz lagai  chhutti kar dunga aa aa aathreedots ta jum taka jum taka num yaka jum  tak tankidiathreedots  ki padh ke botan chir bi chakkar  2  har bud khudibudi khud kar  2 chhitake to rere mon makhan  2 sab chale gaye sab chale gaye chidamudh chiting chitubud  chitubud gaay chitubud gaay chitubud haay haay haay   ja re jaa re kare kaga  ka ka ka kyon shor machaaye  us nari ka das na ban jo  rah chalat ko rah bulae   kaalaa re jaa re jaa re  are nale men jaake tuu munh dhoke aa  kaalaa re ga re ga re   mah ye gadabad ji ki o ga re ga re  mah ye sur badala  ki o ga re ga re  mah ye hamako mataka bola  ki  o ga re ga re  mah ye sur kidhar hai ji ye surthreedots yethreedots ennaya idhu tamil  yek chatur naarthreedots am chhodega nahiin ji  yek chatur naarthreedots am pakadake rakhega ji   ye ghusat jaat  ham marat jaat are aa aa aa   tuu kya jane kya hai nari  jis tan laage more naina  usape sari duniya vari   mah nach na jaane angan tedha  teeedha tedha tedha tedha tedha  4 naach na jaane aangan tedha tedha tedha tedha tedha  4 us sang lage more naina  abake jo avaz lagai  ki o tedhe  mah oy  ki o kede  mah o ya  ki are sidhe ho jaa re  sidhe ho jaa re  sidhe ho jaa  vah ri chandaniya vah re chakore  ram banai ye kaisii jodi  kare nachaya ta ta thaiyya  tal pe naache langadi ghodi  are dekhi  are dekhi teri chaturai  mah ye phir gadabad ki are dekhi teri chaturaai mah phir bhatakaya  ki tujhe suron ki samajh nahiin aai tune kori ghas hi khai  are ghode  mah ye ghoda bola  ki o nigode  mah ye gaali diya  ki are dekhi teri chaturai mah yek chatur naarthreedots ki ghode dekhi teri chaturai mah yek chatur naarthreedots ki
