ghusat jaat  mah ham marat jaat marat jaat mahmood gets stuck  ye atak gayaa    ki sa re ga ma pa he aa aathreedots he threedots threedots

Title: lag jaa gale ki phir ye hasiin raat ho na ho
Lyrics: lag jaa gale ki phir ye hasiin raat ho na ho shaayad phir is janam men mulaaqaat ho na ho lag jaa gale se threedots  hamako milii hain aaj ye ghadiyaan nasiib se jii bhar ke dekh liijiye hamako qariib se phir aapake nasiib men ye baat ho na ho phir is janam men mulaaqaat ho na ho lag jaa gale ki phir ye hasiin raat ho na ho  paas aaiye ki ham nahiin aaenge baarbaar baahen gale men daal ke ham ro len zaarzaar aankhon se phir ye pyaar ki barasaat ho na ho shaayad phir is janam men mulaaqaat ho na ho  lag jaa gale ki phir ye hassiin raat ho na ho shaayad phir is janam men mulaaqaat ho na ho lag jaa gale ki phir ye hassiin raat ho na ho

Title: nain kaa chain churaakar le gaii
Lyrics: nain ka chain churaakar le gai  kar gai niind haraam  chandramaa saa mukh tha usakaa  chandramukhi tha naam  nain ka chain churaakar le gai threedots   ankhiyaan niilii aur nashiilii  dil men bas gai vo lajiilii   chaandanii thi mad bharii thi  gagan se utarii parii thi  yaad hai vo din suhaanaa  2 vo suhaanii shaam  nain ka chain churaakar le gayii threedots   sun rahaa huun vo paijaniyaa  ban men naachii ek hiraniyaa  yaad khoi phir jaagii thi  jaanii pahachaanii lagi thi  nain milate hii nayan se  2 man hua badanaam  nain ka chain churaakar le gayii threedots  kaisii thii vo kyaa kahuun main is liye chupchup rahuun main pyaar kaa singaar thii vo svapn kaa saakaar thii vo us vidhaataa kii kalaa kii 2 thii vo puurna viraam nain kaa chain churaakar le gaii threedots

Title: kahaan chal diye idhar to aao
Lyrics: kahaan chal diye idhar to aao mere dil ko na thukaraao bhole sitamagar maan bhii jaao maan bhii jaao kahaan chal diye   threedots  hamaarii jaan jaatii hai adaa kahate ho tum isako bade masuum qaatil ho sazaa dete ho tum mujhako kahaan chal diye   threedots  khilaunaa jaan kar hamadam mere dil ko na todo tum main raahii huun muhabbat kaa akelaa ab na chhodo tum kahaan chal diye   threedots  mere dil men chale aao ki ye ghar bhii tumhaaraa hai tumhaaraa pyaar hii ab mere jiine kaa sahaaraa hai kahaan chal diye   threedots

Title: aaj shiishe men baarbaar  dil men ek jaanetamannaa
Lyrics: aaj shiishe men baarbaar unhen dil kii suurat dikhaaii detii hai apanii suurat nazar nahiin aatii merii suurat dikhaaii detii hai  dil men ek jaanetamannaa ne jagah paaii hai aaj gulashan men nahiin ghar men bahaar aaii hai  aa gayaa aa gayaa mere tasavvur men koii paradaanashiin 2 aaj har chiiz nazar aatii hai mujhako hasiin kyaa karuun main badii dilakash merii tanhaaii hai aaj gulashan men nahiin threedots  bahakiibahakii nashaaehusn men khoiikhoii jaise kyaalon kii rangiin rubaaii koii dil ke shiishe men parii ban ke utar aaii hai aaj gulashan men nahiin threedots  husn ke saamane izahaarevafaa hai mushkil 2 kaash chhup kar hii vo sun le meraa naalaaedil jisane pyaar kii manzil mujhe dikhalaaii hai aaj gulashan men nahiin threedots

Title: aao baadal chain se royen
Lyrics: aao baadal chain se royen jalatii dhuup jalatii dhuup  jalatii dhuup men main huun akelaa kush rahen kush rahen  kush rahen ye duniyaa waale katm huaa meraa melaa main huun aaj akelaa aao baadal chain se  aramaan the dil men mere kitane chandaa ke haay chandaa ke saathii taare jitane duuba dil ab naav bhii duube tuufaan kaa dekhaa relaa main huun aaj akelaa aao baadal chain se  din the chaar jo biit gaye mere honge duhkh ke ab dere dar nahiin par hannse bhii kaise gam se ab tak khelaa main huun aaj akelaa aao baadal chain se  aa gaye to phuut bhii pado re kam hain aansuu to mujh se maang lo re 2 siine men kyaa tadap nahiin yaa duhkh kabhii nahiin jhelaa

Title: diivaalii aaii  daiiyaa re daiiyaa laaj mohe laage
Lyrics: diivaalii aaii gharghar diip jale   daiiyaa re daiiyaa laaj mohe laage 2 paayal morii baaje saas morii jaage daiiyaa re daiiyaa threedots  aauun main kaise dagar torii mitavaa chhupchhup dekhe hain ghar ke logavaa pag thahare to man moraa bhaage 2 daiiyaa re daiiyaa threedots  chuudiyaan khanaken to dardar jaauun jhaanjhar jhanake to marmar jaauun bandhe pag men sharam ke dhaage 2 daiiyaa re daiiyaa threedots  nanadii roke devar moraa toke chalen naa bahaane chalen naa koii dhokhe badii mushqil hai aaj more aage 2 daiiyaa re daiiyaa threedots

Title: meraa rang de basantii cholaa
Lyrics: o meraa rang de basantii cholaa meraa rang de hai o meraa rang de basantii cholaa oy rang besamaan hai basantii cholaa maai rang de basantii cholaa  2 mera rang de basantii cholaa  dam nikale is desh kii khaatir bas itana armaan hai 2 ek baar is raah men maranaa sau janmon ke samaan hai dekh ke viiron kii qurabaanii apana dil bhii bolaa meraa rang de basantii cholaa o meraa rang de basanti cholaa meraa rang de o meraa rang de basanti cholaa oy rang de basantii cholaa maai rang de basantii cholaa  jis chole ko pahan shivaajii khele apanii jaan pe jise pahan jhaansii kii raanii mit gai apanii aan pe aaj usii ko pahan ke nikalaa pahan ke nikalaa aaj usii ko pahan ke nikalaa ham maston kaa tolaa meraa rang de basantii cholaa o meraa rang de basantii cholaa meraa rang de o meraa rang de basantii cholaa oy rang de basantii cholaa maai rang de basantii cholaa   2

Title: l o v e love love kaa matalab hai pyaar
Lyrics: pyaar dilon kaa qaraar 2  baat ek nazar kii khel ek adaa kaa gul khilaane vaalaa pyaar jhonkaa havaa kaa dil milaakar dil se dekho kyaa hai rangebahaar 2   ek hansii honthon pe ik hayaa aankhon men jo vafaa na ho to ye dil do ghadii kaa khumaar  kuubasuurat baaten aur khud bhii hasiin ho tum bhii saare jahaan men kisii se kam nahiin ho husn dhokhaa aankh kaa hai aise dhokhe hazaar 2

Title: main kud huun chandramukhii  akelii huun main piyaa aa
Lyrics: main kud huun chandramukhii chamak se daratii huun apane mukhade kii anokhii damak se daratii huun ye solahavaan jo lagaa saal isane maar diyaa ab to paayal kii zaraa sii chhamak se daratii huun  aa akelii huun main piyaa aa  ruupnagar kii kunvarii tarase  2 raajaa priit nibhaa akelii huun main threedots  ruup kii dhuup men main jaluun saiyaan kar de pyaar kii shiital chhaiyaan ab mat aur jalaa akelii huun main threedots  jabjab dekhuun main darpan men aag sii lagatii naazuk tan men kaa karuun tuu hii bataa akelii huun main threedots

Title: terii nigaahon men tere hii baahon men
Lyrics: terii nigaahon men tere hii baahon men rahane ko jii chaahataa hai dil men chhupaa yahii baat sajan se kahane ko jii chaahataa hai terii nigaahon men threedots  dil ye hamaaraa ghar hai tumhaaraa aao jii aa ke bas jaao jii nain hamaare dekhe kvaab tumhaare zaraa kvaabon men aa ke hans jaao jii jaan se pyaaraa hamen ghar ye tumhaaraa yahaan rahane ko jii chaahataa hai terii nigaahon men threedots  dekho jii dekho aur kisii ko dil men na apane basaanaa jii pyaar bharaa ye vaadaa ham to na bhuule piyaa tum bhii ise na bhulaanaa jii priit hamaarii rahe duniyaa se nyaarii yahii kahane ko jii chaahataa hai terii nigaahon men threedots

Title: janamjanam kaa saath hai nibhaane ko
Lyrics: janamjanam kaa saath hai nibhaane ko sausau baar maine janam liye  3   pyaar amar hai duniyaa men pyaar kabhii nahiin marataa hai  2 maut badan ko aatii hai ruh kaa jalawaa rahataa hai   janamjanam kaa saath hai nibhaane ko sausau baar maine janam liye  2   o shahjaadii sapanon kii itanii tuu hairaan na ho  2 main bhii teraa sapanaa huun jaan mujhe anjaan na ho   janamjanam kaa saath hai nibhaane ko sausau baar maine janam liye  2   tuu manzil main raahii huun ek din tujhako paauungaa  2 kaun mujhe ab rokegaa haradam yuunhii aauungaa  janamjanam kaa saath hai nibhaane ko sausau baar maine janam liye

Title: tadap ye din raat kii kasak ye bin baat kii
Lyrics: tadap ye din raat kii kasak ye bin baat kii bhalaa ye rog hai kaisaa sajan ab to bataa de ab to bataa de bataa de 2 tadap ye din threedots  binaa kaaran udaasii kyon achaanak ghir ke aatii hai thakaa jaatii hai kyon mujhako badan kyon toda jaatii hai 2 tadap ye din threedots  hain aakir kaun se bandhan jo mujhase khul nahiin paate ye baadal bebasii ke kyon baras kar dhul nahiin jaate 2 tadap ye din threedots  tadap ye din raat kii kasak ye bin baat kii bhalaa ye rog hai kaisaa sajan ab to bataa de  ab to bataa de bataa de

Title: zulfon ko hataale chehare se
Lyrics: zulfon ko hataale chehare se thodaa saa ujaalaa hone de suuraj ko zaraa sharmindaa kar munh raat kaa kaalaa hone de zulfon ko hataale chehare se   ho jo mausam ko pataa ye terii zulf hai kyaa chuum le maang terii jhuk ke saawan kii ghataa  2 zulf laharaaye laharaa ke baadal bane jo bhii dekhe tujhe teraa paagal bane aisaa bhii nazaaraa hone de zulfon ko hataale chehare se threedots   dekh naaraaz naa ho mere maasuum sanam main koii gair nahiin terii aankhon kii qasam  2 de ijaazat ki tere qadam chuum luun saath main bhii tere do ghadii jhuum luun halkaa saa ishaaraa hone de zulfon ko hataale chehare se threedots

Title: baabul kii duaaen letii jaa
Lyrics: baabul kii duaaen letii jaa jaa tujhako sukhii sansaar mile maike kii kabhii naa yaad aae sasuraal men itanaa pyaar mile baabul kii duaaen threedots  naazon se tujhe paalaa maine kaliyon kii tarah phuulon kii tarah bachapan men jhulaayaa hai tujhako baanhon ne merii jhuulon kii tarah 2 mere baag kii ai naazuk daalii tujhe har pal naii bahaar mile baabul kii duaaen threedots  jis ghar se bandhe hain bhaag tere us ghar men sadaa teraa raaj rahe honthon pe hansii kii dhuup khile maathe pe kushii kaa taaj rahe 2 kabhii jisakii jot na ho phiikii tujhe aisaa ruupsingaar mile baabul kii duaaen threedots  biiten tere jiivan kii ghadiyaan aaraam kii thandii chhaanvon men kaantaa bhii na chubhane paae kabhii merii laadalii tere paanvon men 2 us dvaar se bhii dukh duur rahen jis dvaar se teraa dvaar mile baabul kii duaaen threedots

Title: beqasii had se jab guzar jaae
Lyrics: beqasii had se jab guzar jaae koii ai dil jie ki mar jaae  zindagii se kaho dulahan ban ke 2 aaj to do ghadii sanvar jaae koii ai dil threedots  unako jii bhar ke dekh lene de 2 dil kii dhadakan zaraa thahar jaae koii ai dil threedots  ham hain apanii jaan ke dushman 2 kyon ye iljaam unake sar jaae koii ai dil threedots  mere nagamon se unakaa dil na dukhe 2 gam nahiin mujhape jo guzar jaae koii ai dil threedots

Title: dhadakate dil kii tamannaa ho meraa pyaar ho tum
Lyrics: dhadakate dil kii tamannaa ho meraa pyaar ho tum mujhe qaraar nahiin  2  jab se beqaraar ho tum  2 dhadakate dil kii tamannaa ho meraa pyaar ho tum  khilaao phuul kisii ke kisii chaman men raho  2  jo dil kii raah se guzarii hai vo bahaar ho tum  2  zahenasiib ataa kii jo dard kii saugaat  2 vo gam hasiin hai jis gam ke zimmedaar ho tum 2 dhadakate dil kii tamannaa ho meraa pyaar ho tum  chadaauun phuul yaa aansuu tumhaare qadamon men merii vafaaon ke ulfat kii yaadagaar ho tum  2 dhadakate dil kii tamannaa ho meraa pyaar ho tum

Title: main kahiin kavi na ban jaauun tere pyaar men ai kavitaa
Lyrics: main kahiin kavi na ban jaauun tere pyaar men kavitaa  tujhe dil ke aaine men main ne baar baar dekhaa terii akhiyon men dekhaa to chhalakataa pyaar dekhaa teraa dard main ne dekhaa to jigar ke paar dekhaa main kahiin kavi na ban jaauun  threedots  teraa rang hai salonaa tere ang men lachak hai terii baat men hai jaaduu tere bol men khanak hai terii har adaa muhabbat tuu zamiin kii dhanak hai main kahiin kavi na ban jaauun  threedots  meraa dil lubhaa rahaa hai teraa ruup saadaa saadaa ye jhukii jhukii nigaahen kare pyaar aur jyaadaa main tujhii pe jaan duungaa hai yahii meraa iraadaa main kahiin kavi na ban jaauun  threedots

Title: zaraa sii aahat hotii hai to dil sochataa hai
Lyrics: zaraa sii aahat hoti hai to dil sochataa hai  kahiin ye vo to nahiin kahiin ye vo to nahiin  zaraa si aahat hoti hai threedots   chhup ke siine men koi jaise sadaa detaa hai  shaam se pahale diyaa dil ka jalaa detaa hai  hai usii kii ye sadaa hai usii kii ye adaa  kahiin ye vo to nahiin threedots   shakl phiratii hai nigaahon men vohii pyaarii si  meri nasnas men machalane lagi chingari si  chhuu gai jism meraa kisake daaman kii havaa  kahiin ye vo to nahiin threedots

Title: apanii to har aah ik tuufaan hai
Lyrics: apanii to har aah ik tuufaan hai kyaa kare vo jaan kar anjaan hai  uupar vaala jaan kar anjaan hai  apanii to har aah ik tuufaan hai uupar vaala jaanakar anjaan hai apanii to har aah ik tuufaan hai   ab to hansake apanii bhii qismat ko chamakaa de kaanon men kuchh kah de jo is dil ko bahalaa de ye bhii mushakil hai to kyaa aasaan hai uupar vaala jaan kar anjaan hai threedots   sar pe mere tuu jo apanaa haath hii rakh de phir to bhatake raahii ko mil jaayenge raste dil kii bastii bin tere viiraan hai uupar vaala jaanakar anjaan hai threedots   dil hii to hai is ne shaayad bhuul bhii kii hai zindagii hai bhuul kar hii raah milatii hai maaf kar bandaa bhii ik insaan hai uupar vaala jaan kar anjaan hai apanii to har aah ik tuufaan hai

Title: thandii havaa ye chaandanii suhaanii
Lyrics: thandii havaa ye chaandanii suhaanii  ai mere dil sunaa koi kahani  lambi si ek dagar hai zindagaanii  ai mere dil sunaa koi kahani   saare hasiin nazaare sapanon men kho gaye  sar rakh ke aasamaan pe parvat bhi so gaye  mere dil tu sunaa koi aisi daastaan  jisako sunakar mile chain mujhe meri jaan manzil hai anjaanii threedots  aise main chal rahaa huun pedon kii chhaanv men jaise koii sitaaraa baadal ke gaanv men mere dil tu sunaa koi aisi daastaan  jisako sunakar mile chain mujhe meri jaan manzil hai anjaanii threedots  thodii si raat biitii thodii si raah gai khaamosh rut na jaane kya baat kah gai  mere dil tu sunaa koi aisi daastaan  jisako sunakar mile chain mujhe meri jaan manzil hai anjaanii  thandii havaa ye chaandanii suhaanii  ai mere dil sunaa koi kahani  lambi si ek dagar hai zindagaanii  ai mere dil sunaa koi kahani

Title: dhal chukii shaamegam muskaraa le sanam
Lyrics: dhal chukii shaamegam muskaraa le sanam ik naii subah duniyaa men aane ko hai pyaar sajane lagaa saaj bajane lagaa zindagii dil ke taaron pe gaane ko hai dhal chukii shaamegam threedots  aaj paayal bhii hai nagmaaedil bhii hai rangeulfat bahaaron men shaamil bhii hai aa gaii hai milan kii suhaanii ghadii vaqt kii taal pe  naachatii hai kushii  2 ghungharuon kii sadaa rang laane ko hai dhal chukii shaamegam threedots  jhuumate aa rahe hain zamaane nae hasaraten gaa rahii hain taraane nae aaj dil kii tamannaa nikal jaaegii giit hogaa vahii  lay badal jaaegii  2 ik nayaa raag qismat sunaane ko hai dhal chukii shaamegam threedots

Title: kisii ne jaaduu kiyaa main karuun kyaa
Lyrics: kisii ne jaaduu kiyaa main karuun kyaa meraa man moh liyaa main karuun kyaa 2 kisii ne jaaduu kiyaa threedots  kar ke ghaayal vo mujhe bekabar hain merii aahen bhii vahaan beasar hain kuub hai ye adaa main karuun kyaa kisii ne jaaduu kiyaa threedots  raat mushkil se kate din hai bhaarii sadaa aankhon men rahe chhab vo pyaarii  jiinaa ab unake binaa huaa mushkil jaan hai unamen basii unhiin kaa dil mujhe kyaa ho chalaa main karuun kyaa kisii ne jaaduu kiyaa threedots  pyaar chhupataa nahiin main kyaa chhupaauun kahe to chiir ke dil main dikhaauun husn de ke bhalaa main karuun kyaa kisii ne jaaduu kiyaa threedots

Title: hamen kyaa jo har suu ujaale hue hain
Lyrics: hamen kyaa jo har suu ujaale hue hain ke ham to andheron ke paale hue hain 2 hamen kyaa jo threedots  hamaarii nahiin hai ye chiraagon kii duniyaa hamaarii to hai dil ke daagon kii duniyaa yahii daag jaljal ke chhaale hue hain hamen kyaa jo threedots  bahaaron ne jaane kahaan phuul baante hamaare chaman men khile sirf kaante ye insaaf bhii kyaa niraale hue hain hamen kyaa jo threedots  kisii aur kaa dil jo yuun tuut jaataa to shaayad kudaa se bhii vo ruuth jaataa hamiin hain jo ye gam sambhaale hue hain hamen kyaa jo threedots

Title: mere pyaar men tujhe kyaa milaa
Lyrics: mere pyaar men tujhe kyaa milaa mere dil kaa phuul na khil sakaa mere pyaar men threedots  teraa rangruup ujad gayaa ye hasiin cheharaa utar gayaa na bahaar hai na singaar hai na koii kushii na qaraar hai mujhe apane aap se hai gilaa mere pyaar men threedots  rahii dil kii dil men hii hasaraten baniin zahar pyaar kii raahaten merii majabuuriyaan baniin terii bediyaan tujhe khaa gaiin ye kaamoshiyaan ke gamon pe kuchh bhii na bas chalaa mere pyaar men threedots  mere dil yahaan se tuu chal kahiin mujhe koii jiine kaa haq nahiin main karuungaa teraa hii kaatmaa tere saath apanaa bhii kaatmaa meraa aaj hai  yahii faisalaa  3 mere pyaar men threedots

Title: kar chale ham fidaa jaanotan saathiyon
Lyrics: kar chale ham fidaa jaanotan saathiyon  ab tumhaare havaale vatan saathiyon          2  saans thamatii gaii nabz jamatii gaii phir bhii badhate kadam ko na rukane diyaa kat gaye sar hamaare to kuchh gam nahiin sar himaalay kaa hamane na jhukane diyaa marate marate rahaa baankaapan saathiyon ab tumhaare threedots  zindaa rahane ke mausam bahut hain magar jaan dene kii rut roz aatii nahiin husn aur ishq donon ko rusavaa kare  vo javaanii jo khuun men nahaatii nahiin baandh lo apane sar par kafan saathiyon ab tumhaare threedots  raah qurbaaniyon kii na viiraan ho tum sajaate hii rahanaa naye qaafile fatah kaa jashn is jashn ke baad hai zindagii maut se mil rahii hai gale aaj dharatii banii hai dulhan saathiyon ab tumhaare threedots  khiinch do apane khuun se zamiin par lakiir is taraf aane paaye na raavan koii tod do haath agar haath uthane lage chhuune paaye na siitaa kaa daaman koii raam bhii tum tumhiin lakshman saathiyon ab tumhaare threedots

Title: pyaar kii daastaan
Lyrics: sun le merii jaan kah rahii zubaan pyaar kii daastaan mainne sun liyaa dil ne chun liyaa tum ko meharabaan  rahe ye haath haath men na chhuute umr bhar kabhii na katm ho hamaare pyaar kaa safar ruke na dilarubaa chale yuun hii sadaa apanaa kaaravaan  gawaah aasamaan hai aur ye zamiin hai dagaa na doge tum kabhii mujhe yaqiin hai qasam terii sanam judaa na honge ham jiite jii yahaan

Title: teraa man meraa man mile priit yuun khile
Lyrics: la 	teraa man meraa man mile priit yuun khile ki duur andhere hon 	mujhe to aisaa lage ki bas tum mere ho mu 	teraa man meraa man threedots la 	ajii tum mere ho  	paayal kii merii runajhun ho maathe kii merii kumakum ho 	jisako dhuundhate the nainaa bolo ajii kyaa vahii tum ho 	man pe jaaduu kiyaa rang bhar diyaa re chatur chitere ho 	mujhe to aisaa lage ki threedots  mu 	dekhii jhalak aankhon men milatii nahiin vo laakhon pe 	tere jitane rang kahaan titalii kii chanchal paankho men 	pahale to ruup sajaa ke jii ab yuun lajaa ke kyuun mukhadaa phere ho 	mujhe to aisaa lage ki threedots

Title: mere mahabuub men kyaa nahiin kyaa nahiin
Lyrics: la mere mahabuub men kya nahiin kya nahiin  mere mahabuub men kya nahiin  vo to laakhon men hai ek hasiin  vo to laakhon men hai ek hasiin ek hasiin   aa mere mahabuub men kya nahiin kya nahiin  mere mahabuub men kya nahiin  bholii suurat ada naazaniin  bholii suurat ada naazaniin naazaniin  mere mahabuub men kya nahiin kya nahiin  mere mahabuub men kya nahiin   la aa a a 	meraa mahabuub ek chaand hai  	husn apana nikhaare hue  aa o a a la aasamaan ka farishtaa hai vo  	ruup insaan ka dhare hue  aa o a a la rashkejannat hai vo mahazabiin  	rashkejannat hai vo mahazabiin mahazabiin  	mere mahabuub men kya nahiin kya nahiin   aa aa a a 	maah ho anjum ho ya kaikashaan 	sabase pyaaraa hai meraa sanam  la aa a a aa usake jalavon men hai vo asar  	hosh ud jaaye allaah qasam  la aa a a aa dekhale gar use tu kahiin  	dekhale gar use tu kahiin tu kahiin  	mere mahabuub men kya nahiin kya nahiin  	mere mahabuub men kya nahiin   la meraa mahabuub hai jaaneman  	karavaa kadamaah ruuh gulabadan  aa meraa dilavar hai aisa javaan  	ho bahaaron men jaise chaman  la usakii chaalon men aisi lachak  	jaise phuulon ki daalii hile  aa usakii aavaaz men vo khanak  	jaise shiishe se shiishaa mile  	usake andaaz hai dilanashiin  dono bholii suurat ada naazaniin naazaniin  	mere mahabuub men kya nahiin kya nahiin  	mere mahabuub men kya nahiin   aa tere afasaanon men meri jaan  	hai jhalak meri afasaanon ki  la daastaanen hai milatii huiin  	allaah ham dono paravaanon  dono paravaanon kii dono ek hii shamaa ho na kahiin  	vo to laakhon men hai ek hasiin ek hasiin  	mere mahabuub men kya nahiin kya nahiin  	mere mahabuub men kya nahiin

Title: saaz ho tum aavaaz huun main tum biinaa ho main huun taar
Lyrics: saz ho tum avaz hun main tum bina ho main hun tar rok sako to rok lo apani payal ki jhankar saz ho tum threedots  mere git ko git ne samajho pyar ki hai saragam mere rag ke har ek sur pe ghungharu bole chham chham prit ki lay par jhum ke nacho ab na karo inakar rok sako to rok lo apani payal ki jhankar saz ho tum threedots  prem tarana rang pe aya rup ne li angadai tal pe man ki jhanjhar jhanaki patali kamar balakhai sudhbudh khokar besudh hokar nach uthi gulanar rok sako to rok lo apani payal ki jhankar saz ho tum threedots  tan man jhume gagan to chume prit hui matavali aj mila jivan se jivan pyar ne manzil pai dil ki baji jit ke mainne jit liya sansar rok sako to rok lo apani payal ki jhankar saz ho tum threedots

Title: dil nagamon se bhar jaataa hai
Lyrics: dil nagamon se bhar jaataa hai2 jab hotaa hai pyaar kisii se2 dil nagamon se   threedots  kwaab adhure giit adhure2 jitane the sab ho gaye puure mil gaye man ke taar kisii se  dil nagamon se bhar jaataa hai  shokii bhuulii mastii bhuulii phuulii  main to apanii hastii bhuulii maan gayii huun haar kisii se  dil nagamon se bhar jaataa hai  saath jiyuungii saath maruungii duniyaa waalon se naa daruungii aaj huaa iqaraar kisii se  dil nagamon se bhar jaataa hai jab hotaa hai pyaar kisii se dil nagmon se bhar jaataa hai  threedots  humming

Title: haaledil yuun unhen sunaayaa gayaa
Lyrics: haaledil yuun unhen sunaayaa gayaa aankh hii ko zubaan banaayaa gayaa  zindagii kii udaas raaton ko aapakii yaad men sajaayaa gayaa haaledil yuun threedots  ishq kii vo bhii ik manzil thii har qadam par fareb khaayaa gayaa haaledil yuun threedots  dil pe ek vah bhii haadasaa guzaraa 2 aaj tak dil se na chhupaayaa gayaa haaledil yuun threedots  laakh tuufaan samet kar yaa rab 2 kisalie ek dil banaayaa gayaa haaledil yuun threedots

Title: gam uthaane ke liye main to jiye jaauungaa
Lyrics: gam uthaane ke liye main to jiye jaauungaa saans kii lay pe teraa naam liye jaauungaa  haay  tuune mujhe ulfat ke sivaa kuchh na diyaa aur maine tujhe nafarat ke sivaa kuchh na diyaa tujhase sharamindaa huun ai merii vafaa kii devii teraa mujarim huun musiibat ke sivaa kuchh na diyaa gam uthaane ke liye main to jiye jaauungaa threedots  tuu kayaalon men merii ab bhii chalii aatii hai apanii palakon pe un ashkon kaa janaazaa lekar tuune niinden kariin qurabaan merii raahon men main nashe men rahaa auron kaa sahaaraa lekar gam uthaane ke liye main to jiye jaauungaa threedots

Title: tasqiin ko ham naa royen jo zaukenazar mile
Lyrics: tasqiin ko ham naa royen jo zaukenazar mile 2 huuraanekuld men terii suurat magar mile tasqiin ko ham naa royen jo zaukenazar mile  saaqiigarii kii sharam karo aaj varanaa ham 2 har shab piyaa hii karate hain may jis qadar mile 3 tasqiin ko ham naa royen jo zaukenazar mile  tujhase kuchh kalaam nahiin lekin ai nadiim 2 meraa salaam kahiyo agar naamaabar mile 3  tasqiin ko ham naa royen jo zaukenazar mile huuraanekuld men terii suurat magar mile 2 tasqiin ko ham naa royen jo zaukenazar mile

Title: ye mausam rangiin samaa thahar zaraa o jaanejaan
Lyrics: ye mausam rangiin samaan thahar zaraa o jaanejaan teraa meraa meraa teraa pyaar hai to phir kaisaa sharamaanaa ruk to main jaauun jaanejaan mujhako hai inakaar kahaan teraa meraa meraa teraa pyaar sanam na ban jaae afasaanaa  ye chaand ye sitaare kahate hain mil ke saare aajaa pyaar karen ye chandaa bairii dekhe aise men bolo kaise iqaraar karen dil men hai kuchh kahe zubaan pyaar yahii hai jaanejaan teraa meraa   ye pyaar kii lambii raahen baahon men daale baahen kahiin duur chalen baithe hain gheraa daale ye zaalim duniyaa vaale hamen dekh jale jalataa hai to jale jahaan thahar zaraa o jaanejaan teraa meraa

Title: kaise rahuun chup ki maine pii hii kyaa hai
Lyrics: kaise rahuun chup ki maine pii hii kyaa hai hosh abhii tak hai baaqii aur zaraa sii dede saaqii aur zaraa sii aur kaise rahuun chup threedots  muddaton kii pyaas aaj ek jaam ban gaii ye kushii kii shaam shaameintaqaam ban gaii jo baat hamamen tumamen thii vo baat aam ban gaii kaise rahuun chup threedots  pataa hai tumako raaz kyaa hai mere is suruur kaa ke is suruur men zaraa saa rang hai guruur kaa jo maine pii to kyon nashaa utar gayaa huzuur kaa kaise rahuun chup threedots

Title: in bahaaron men akele na phiro
Lyrics: in bahaaron men akele na phiro raah men kaalii ghataa rok na le mujh ko ye kaalii ghataa rokegii kyaa ye to kud hai merii zulfon ke tale  ye fizaayen ye nazaare shaam ke saare aashiq hain tumhaare naam ke phuul kahatii hai o ho ho ho phuul kahatii hai tumhen baadesabaa tumhen baadesabaa dekhanaa baadesabaa rok na le in bahaaron men akele threedots  merii kadamon se bahaaron kii galii meraa cheharaa dekhatii hai har kalii jaanate hain sab o ho ho ho jaanate hain sab mujhe gulzaar men mujhe gulzaar men rang sab ko mere honthon se mile in bahaaron men akele threedots

Title: ek samay par do barasaaten
Lyrics: ek samay par do barasaaten 2 baadal ke sang aankh bhii bharase chaaron or hai jalthal jalthal 2 phir bhii pyaasaa manawaa tarase ek samay par do barasaaten   umadghumad jab chhaayiin ghataayen niir barasegaa sabane jaanaa  2 koii na jaane dil men tuufaan kab aa jaaye aur kidhar se ek samay par do barasaaten   aag lagii hai dil men lekin dekh rahaa hai aankh kaa paanii  2 sholon ke sang bahatii nadiyaa nikal rahii hai ek hii ghar se  ek samay par do barasaaten baadal ke sang aankh bhii bharase chaaron or hai jalthal jalthal phir bhii pyaasaa manawaa tarase ek samay par do barasaaten

Title: chaand aahen bharegaa phuul dil thaam lenge husn kii baat chalii to
Lyrics: chaand aahen bharegaa phuul dil thaam lenge husn kii baat chalii to sab teraa naam lenge  								     1 aankhen naazuk sii kaliyaan baat mishrii kii daliyaan honth gangaa ke saahil zulfen jannat kii galiyaan terii khaatir farishte sar pe ilzaam lenge 2 husn kii baatthreedots 									 2 kuchh kahegii havaa bhii kuchh kahegii ghataa bhii aur mumakin hai teraa zikr kar de khudaa bhii phir to patthar hii shaayad jabt se kaam lenge 2 husn kii baatthreedots 									 chaand aahen bharegaa phuul dil thaam lengethreedots

Title: aao tumhen pyaar karanaa sikhaauun
Lyrics: aao tumhen pyaar karanaa sikhaauun hansanaa sikhaauun ronaa sikhaauun phuulon kii tarah muskaraanaa sikhaauun kaanton men rah kar jiinaa sikhaauun aao tumhen pyaar threedots  tumhaare hii haathon men qismat tumhaarii zamaane ko jiitegii himmat tumhaarii hamaaraa to kyaa hai rahen na rahen ham zamaane ko hogii zaruurat tumhaarii aao tumhen pyaar threedots  suno laadalo tum ye dil kii kahaanii aaegii zindagii men nashiilii javaanii zamaane ko dekho chalanaa sambhal ke bitaanii hai tumako yah zindagaanii kyon bachchon samajhe aao tumhen pyaar threedots

Title: har aas ashkabaar hai har saans beqaraar hai
Lyrics: har aas ashkabaar hai har saans beqaraar hai tere bagair zindagii ujadii huii bahaar hai  main jaanatii huun bevafaa tuu lautakar na aaegaa phir bhii na jaane kyon mujhe teraa hii intezaar hai  kisako sunaauun main gilaa hai bebasii kii imtehaan naa tujh pe iktiyaar hai naa dil pe iktiyaar hai

Title: suunii raat men kho gae
Lyrics: suunii raat men kho gae chaand ke saaye  do akele chal rahe hain raat akelii chaand akelaa hamasafar do ajanabii the raat akelii chaand akelaa  aawaaraa safar jaaegaa kahaan viiraan hai zamiin viiraan aasamaan do kinaare chal rahe hain raat akelii chaand akelaa  aawaazon men hai sannaaton kii dhun nagmon kii zubaan kaamoshii hai sun do ishaare chal rahe hain raat akelii chaand akelaa  do akele chal rahe hain threedots

Title: chale jaa rahe hain
Lyrics: chale jaa rahe hain mohabbat ke maare kinaare kinaare kinaare kinaare  na saahil kii paravaah na tuufaan kaa dar hai na zulmon kaa shikavaa na gam kaa asar hai ummiidon ke bal par dilon ke sahaare chale jaa rahe hain kinaare kinaare  tamannaa yahii hai ki laharon se khelen nasiibon kii gardish ko hanshansake jhelen umangon kii raah men bichhaakar sitaare chale jaa rahe hain kinaare kinaare  chale jaa rahe hain threedots

Title: dil ke jharokhe men tujhako bithaakar
Lyrics: dil ke jharokhe men tujhako bithaakar yaadon ko terii main dulhan banaakar rakhuungaa main dil ke paas  mat ho merii jaan udaas  kal tere jalave paraaye bhii honge lekin jhalak mere khvaabon men honge phulon kii dolii men hogii tu rukhasat lekin mahak merii saanson men hogii dil ke jharokhe men threedots  ab bhii tere surkh hothon ke pyaale   mere tasavvur men saaqii bane hain ab bhii terii zulf ke mast saaye birahaa kii dhuup men saathii bane hain dil ke jharokhe men threedots  merii muhabbat ko thukaraa de chaahe main koi tujhase naa shikavaa karungaa aankhon men rahatii hain tasviir terii   saarii umar terii puujaa karungaa dil ke jharokhe men threedots

Title: aahaa re magan meraa chanchal man
Lyrics: aahaa re magan meraa chanchal man nis din gungun kuchh apanii hii dhun men gaaye 2 pag paayal baaje runjhunjhun sajanaa mere sun tujh bin ab rahaa nahiin jaaye  jab se dil men tuu aayaa hai ik jaaduu saa mujhape chhaayaa hai 2 ik lahar terii aayii hai tere giiton men dil laharaayaa hai mere ghar men chandaa utar aayaa hai  aahaa re magan meraa threedots  chaand jab dikh jaataa hai mujhe terii hii yaad dilaataa hai 2 niind phir ud jaatii hai tere sapanon men dil kho jaataa hai naa jaane mujhe kyaa ho jaataa hai  aahaa re magan threedots  ye jo din chale jaayenge phir mudake kabhii nahiin aayenge 2 tum sajan pachhataaoge aur ham bhii bahut pachhataaenge ye aramaan dil men hii rah jaayenge  aahaa re magan threedots

Title: gaaegii duniyaa giit mere
Lyrics: aalaap gaaegii duniyaa giit mere2 suriile ang mainne niraale rang mainne bhare hain armaanon men gaaegii duniyaa giit mere  bol mere anmol kazaane2 mol koii dilvaalaa jaane2 inase dilon men pyaar bhare2 suriile ang mainne niraale rang mainne bhare hain armaanon men gaaegii duniyaa giit mere  kitnii raaten jaag guzaariin kitnii khushiyaan in par vaariinin par vaariin giiton men tab ye bol dhale suriile ang mainne niraale rang mainne bhare hain armaanon men gaaegii duniyaa giit mere  kaise jalate hain paravaane ye andaaz koii kyaa jaane jaane vohii jo aap jale suriile ang mainne niraale rang mainne bhare hain armaanon men gaaegii duniyaa giit mere

Title: chiraag dil kaa jalaao bahut andheraa hai
Lyrics: chiraag dil kaa jalaao bahut andheraa hai 2 kahiin se laut ke aao bahut andheraa hai chiraag dil kaa threedots  kahaan se laauun vo rangat gaii bahaaron kii 2 tumhaare saath gaii roshanii nazaaron kii mujhe bhii paas bulaao bahut andheraa hai chiraag dil kaa threedots  sitaaron tum se andhere kahaan sambhalate hain 2 unhiin ke naqsheqadam se chiraag jalate hain unhiin ko dhuundh ke laao bahut andheraa hai chiraag dil kaa threedots

Title: havaa se motii baras rahe hain
Lyrics: havaa se motii baras rahe hain fazaa taraane sunaa rahii hai dagar dagar hai tamaam sahraa kalii kalii muskuraa rahii hai  jahaan kii har shaam ek devii jahaan kii har subhaa ek raanii jahaan barastaa hai rang dhaanii udhar mudii hai merii javaanii har ek saagar khanak rahaa hai har ek shai gungunaa rahii hai  mere machalte hue lahuu men kushii kaa dariyaa ubal rahaa hai kalii mere dil kii khil rahii hai bataao phuulo ye baat kayaa hai ye kaun merii taraf badhaa hai ye kis kii aawaaz aa rahii hai  tamaam jangal mahak rahaa hai hyaa se pindaa dahak rahaa hai dupattaa sar se dhalak rahaa hai payaalaa jaise chhalak rahaa hai ye dil are kyon dhadak rahaa hai ye sharm kyon mujh ko aa rahii hai

Title: kis vidhi karuun bakhaan  ajab terii kaariigarii karataar
Lyrics: ra 	kis vidhi karuun bakhaan prabhuu tere kotikoti upakaar 	kal tak thii khaalii jholii aaj bhare bhandaar 	ajab terii kaariigarii karataar 2 kri 	samajh na aae maayaa terii badale rang hazaar do 	ajab terii kaariigarii threedots  ra 	dene vaale tuune ye ghar kushiyon se bhar daalaa ko 	o kushiyon se bhar daalaa kri 	tuu sabase badaa hai daanii terii liilaa kisane jaanii ra 	jag sochsoch gayaa haar 	ajab terii kaariigarii threedots  kri 	chhotaa saa sansaar hamaaraa svarg banaae rakhanaa ko 	haan svarg banaae rakhanaa ra 	is bagiyaa men sadaa kushii ke phuul khilaae rakhanaa 	chaahe raajaa ho yaa bhikhaarii kri 	tuune vipadaa sabakii taarii ra 	are vaah re paalanahaar 	ajab terii kaariigarii threedots ra 	ghar vaale ghar se nikale hokar aaj paraae 	teraa kaisaa ye sansaar 	ajab terii kaariigarii threedots  	kisakii nazar lagii is ghar ko bikhar gae sab tinake 	murajhaaii hain ye kaliyaan khilane ke din the jinake 	koii yuun na ho laachaar 	ajab terii kaariigarii threedots

Title: gangaa aaye kahaan se
Lyrics: gangaa aaye kahaan se gangaa jaaye kahaan re aaye kahaan se jaaye kahaan re laharaaye paanii men jaise dhuupchhaanv re  gangaa aaye kahaan se gangaa jaaye kahaan re laharaaye paanii men jaise dhuupchhaanv re  raat kaarii din ujiyaaraa mil gaye donon saaye saanjh ne dekho rang rupp ke kaise bhed mitaaye laharaaye paanii men jaise dhuupchhanv re   threedots  kaanch koii maatii koii rangbirange pyaale pyaas lage to ek baraabar jis men paanii daale laharaaye paanii men jaise dhuupchhanv re   threedots  naam koii bolii koii laakhon ruup aur chehare khol ke dekho pyaar kii aankhen dabate re sang mere  laharaaye paanii men jaise dhuupchhanv re   threedots

Title: rukh se zaraa naqaab uthaa do mere huzuur
Lyrics: apane rukh pe nigaah karane do khuubasuurat gunaah karane do rukh se pardaa hataao jaanehayaa aaj dil ko tabaah karane do  rukh se zaraa naqaab uthaa do mere huzuur jalvaa phir ek baar dikhaa do mere huzuur  tum hamasafar mile ho mujhe is hayaat men 2 mil jaae chaand jaise koii suunii raat men jaage tum kahaan ye bataa do mere huzuur rukh sethreedots  husnojamaal aapakaa shiishe men dekh kar 2 madahoshh ho chukaa huun main jalavon kii raah par gar ho sake to hosh men laa do mere huzuur rukh sethreedots  vo marmarii se haath vo mahakaa huaa badan 2 takaraayaa mere dil se muhabbat kaa ek chaman mere bhii dil kaa phuul khilaa do mere huzuur rukh sethreedots

Title: juuhii kii kalii merii laadalii
Lyrics: juuhii kii kalii merii laadalii naazon kii palii merii laadalii o aaskiran jugjug tuu jiie nanhii sii parii merii laadalii o merii laadalii  dharatii pe utar aayaa chandaa teraa chaharaa banaa champii kaa salaunaa guladastaa tan teraa banaa o merii laadalii komal titalii merii laadalii hiire kii kanii merii laadalii o aaskiran jugjugthreedots  sharmaae diivaalii taaron kii tere nainon se koyal ne churaaii hai pancham tere bainon se o merii laadalii gudiyaa sii dhalii merii laadalii mohe laage bhalii merii laadalii o aaskiran jugjugthreedots  har bol teraa sikhalaae hamen dukh se ladanaa muskaan terii kahatii hai sadaa dhiiraj dharanaa o merii laadalii gangaa kii lahar merii laadalii chanchal saagar merii laadalii o aaskiran jugjugthreedots

Title: ye din din hain kushii ke
Lyrics: ma ye din din hain kushii ke aajaa re aajaa mere saathii zindagii ke  ye hai suhanaa samaan pyaar kaa saarii zindagii men aitabaar kaa sun le sur ye baansurii ke aajaa re aajaa mere saathii zindagii ke  biite jo yuun hii intazaar men phir kya mazaa hai is bahaar men ye pal haay bekasii ke aajaa re aajaa mere saathii zindagii ke  masu main saaz tuu merii aavaaz hai tuu merii zindagii kaa raaz hai kuchh din kyaa karenge jii ke aajaa re aajaa mere saathii zindagii ke

Title: tum bin jiivan kaise biitaa puuchho mere dil se puuchho mere dil se
Lyrics: tum bin jiivan kaise biitaa puuchho mere dil se  puuchho mere dil se  saavan ke din aae  biitii yaaden laae kaun jhukaakar aankhen  mujhako paas bithaae kaisaa thaa pyaaraa ruup tumhaaraa puuchho mere dil se  puuchho mere dil se tum bin jiivan threedots  prem kaa saagar haay chaaron taraf laharaae jitanaa aage jaauun  gaharaa hotaa jae gam ke bhanvar men  kyaa kyaa duubaa puuchho mere dil se  puuchho mere dil se tum bin jiivan threedots  jaise juganuu ban men  tuu chamake ansuvan men ban kar phuul khilii ho  jaane kis bagiyan men mai apanii qismat pe royaa puuchho mere dil se  puuchho mere dil se tum bin jiivan threedots

Title: jab chhaaye kabhii saawan kii ghataa
Lyrics: jab chhaae kabhii saawan kii ghataa ro ro ke na karanaa yaad mujhe ai jaanetamannaa gam teraa kar de na kahiin barabaad mujhe jab chhaae kabhii saawan kii ghataa  jo mast bahaaren aaii thiin vo ruuth gaiin us gulashan se 2 jis gulashan men do din ke lie qismat ne kiyaa aabaad mujhe jab chhaae kabhii saawan kii ghataa  vo raahii huun pal bhar ke lie jo zulf ke saae men thaharaa2 ab leke chalii hai duur kahiin ai ishq terii bedaad mujhe jab chhaae kabhii saawan kii ghataa  ai yaadesanam ab laut bhii jaa kyon aa gaii tuu samajhaane ko 2 mujhako ye meraa gam kaafii hai tuu aur na kar naashaad mujhe  jab chhaae kabhii saawan kii ghataa ro ro ke na karanaa yaad mujhe ai jaanetamannaa gam teraa kar de na kahiin barabaad mujhe jab chhaae kabhii saawan kii ghataa

Title: zulfen ulajhii hain mere kanganaa se
Lyrics: zulfen ulajhii hain mere kanganaa se aake chhudaa de sanam haay re merii zulfen threedots  haath meraa zaalim chuume chalii jaae bikharii huii naagan se jhuumii chalii jaae 2 tuu ise pyaar se sanvaar de sanam haay re merii zulfen threedots  priit banii jaae lambii kahaanii sulajhe nahiin ulajhii chalii jaae diivaanii 2 main gaii haar tere pyaar kii qasam haay re merii zulfen threedots  dukh men morii saiyaan kab se padii huun tum ho khade paas to phir sunate nahiin kyon ke badii der se pukaaruun main sanam haay re merii zulfen threedots

Title: meraa to dil dil dil ghabaraae re
Lyrics: la 	meraa to dil dil dil ghabaraae re 	merii to jaan jaan jaan chalii  jaae re  5  	dil kii sadaa sun lo zaraa aaii huun saj ke tere lie 	kuchh na hamen apanii kabar jaaduu ham pe tuune kie ra 	raat ye javaan hai chaand vo kahaan hai laae dil ham jisake lie  la 	mukhadaa meraa kyaa hai buraa tuu hii bataa de mere sanam 	merii adaa tujhape fidaa yuun naa tarasaa merii qasam ra 	tuu vo nahiin hai vo to hasiin hai pyaar men jisake paagal hain ham  la 	jaanejigar tere lie tadapuun haradam shaamosahar 	yaaden terii aatii mujhe tujhamen zaalim kyaa hai asar ra 	tuu to idhar hai bol vo kidhar hai kaun se dil men hai usakaa ghar la 	meraa to dil threedots

Title: dam se gaye hamdam ke liye
Lyrics: ham dam se gaye hamdam ke liye hamdam kii qasam hamdam na milaa dam se gaye threedots  phir bhii kahe jaa tuu apanaa afasaanaa saathii mil jaayegaa na ruk jaanaa o dil terii kalii abhii to nahiin khilii abhii vo mausam na milaa dam se gaye threedots  ai dil chamakaa tuu apane daagon ko roshan kiye jaa bujhe chiraagon ko tuu gaaye jaa merii jaan ye duniyaan hai yahaan kisii ko maraham na milaa dam se gaye threedots

Title: aa chal ke tujhe main le ke chaluun
Lyrics: aa chal ke tujhe main le ke chaluun ik aise gagan ke tale jahaan gam bhii na ho aansuu bhii na ho bas pyaar hii pyaar pale ik aise gagan ke tale  suuraj kii pahalii kiran se aashaa kaa saveraa jaage  2 chandaa kii kiran se dhul kar ghanaghor andheraa bhaage  2  kabhii dhuup khile kabhii chhaanv mile lambii sii dagar na khale jahaan gam bhii no ho  aansuu bhii na ho threedots  jahaan duur nazar daud aae aazaad gagan laharaae jahaan rang birange panchhii aashaa kaa sandesaa laaen   2 sapano me palii hansatii ho kalii jahaan shaam suhaanii dhale jahaan gam bhii na ho  aansuu bhii na ho threedots aa chal ke tujhe main le ke chaluun threedots  sapanon ke aise jahaan men jahaan pyaar hii pyaar khilaa ho ham jaake wahaan kho jaaen shikawaa naa koii gilaa ho koii bair na ho koii gair na ho sab milake yuun chalate chalen jahaan gam bhii na ho  aansuu bhii na ho threedots aa chal ke tujhe main le ke chaluun threedots

Title: je hamtum chorii se bandhe ek dorii se
Lyrics: mu 	je hamtum chorii se bandhe ek dorii se 	jaiyo kahaan ai huzuur la 	are ii bandhan hai pyaar kaa 	je hamtum chorii threedots  mu 	kajaraa vaalii phir tuu aise kaahe nihaare 	ii chitavan ke gorii maane to samajhaa jaa re la 	matalabavaa ek hai ek hai nainan pukaar kaa 	je hamtum chorii threedots do 	ai huzuur mu 	je hamtum chorii threedots  la 	dekho baadar aae pavan ke pukaare 	ulfat merii jiitii anaadii piyaa haare mu  aaegaa re majaa re majaa ab jiithaar kaa do 	je hamtum chorii threedots  mu 	ghuunghat men se mukhadaa diikhe abhii adhuuraa 	aa bainyaa men aajaa milan to ho puuraa la 	ii milanaa to nahiin to nahiin kuchh ek baar kaa 	je hamtum chorii threedots

Title: khaaii  hai re hamane qasam
Lyrics: khaaii hai re hamane qasam sang rahane kii aayegaa re udake meraa hans paradesii  pahalaa milan mose nahiin re sajan kaa rahegaa sadaa milanaa dharatii gagan kaa yug se vo hai meraa main usakii re khaaii  hai re hamane qasam sang rahane kii aayegaa re udake meraa hans paradesii  aise to nahiin usake rang men dhalii main piyaa ang lag lag ke bhaii saanvalii main mere tan pe chhaanv hai usii kii re khaaii  hai re hamane qasam sang rahane kii aayegaa re udake meraa hans paradesii meraa hans paradesii hun hun hun hun hun hun hun hun  hans paradesii

Title: aaj andhere ko mitaanaa  ai mere soye hue pyaar
Lyrics: aaj andhere ko mitaanaa hogaa ik nayaa diip jalaanaa hogaa aaj kuchh bhuulii huii yaadon ko apanii paayal se jagaanaa hogaa  ai mere soye hue pyaar zaraa hosh men aa 2 ho chukii niind bahut jaag zaraa hosh men aa  ye udaasii to naa thii terii aankhon men kabhii giit gaane ke hain din kyuun udaasii hai lagii apane honthon pe zaraa pyaar ke giiton ko bhii laa ai mere soye hue threedots  kyaa huii terii hansii kyaa huii terii adaa terii mahafil kaa samaan kabhii aisaa to na thaa phir vo hii dhuum machaa phir vo hii andaaz dikhaa ai mere soye hue threedots  vaastaa pyaar kaa yuun dekh le ek nazar yaa mujhe itanaa bataa merii manzil hai kidhar terii duniyaa hai jahaan merii duniyaa bhii vahaan chhod kar dar ye teraa aur jaauun main kahaan yaa to khud hosh men aa yaa mujhe behosh banaa 2 ai mere soye hue threedots

Title: baadal to aae laharaa ke chhaae
Lyrics: baadal to aae laharaa ke chhaae o aane vaale par tum to na aae  tum zindagii men kyuun merii aa kar gum ho gae ho aise mujhako bhulaa kar main pyaar teraa dil men sajaa kar baithii huun kab se aas lagaa kar dukh mere dil ke honthon pe aae o aane vaale par threedots  aavaaz merii aa jaao sun ke todo na sapane haay mere nayan ke is baar tumase kisii bhii jatan se main raaz apane saare kah duungii man ke kaamosh rah ke ye dard paae o aane vaale par threedots

Title: mil jaa re jaanejaanaan
Lyrics: mil jaa re jaanejaanaan mil jaa mil jaa  aankhon kaa nuur tuu hai dil kaa qaraar tuu hai apanaa tujhe banaa luun merii ye aarazuu hai aa merii zindagii kii raahon ko jagamagaa de vallaah qadamqadam par terii hii justajuu hai mil jaa mil jaa mil jaa re threedots  jii chaahataa hai tujh par sadaqe bahaar kar duun terii kushii pe apanii duniyaa nisaar kar luun vo pyaar kii ghadii jo tere huzuur guzare usako qasam kudaa kii main yaadagaar kar luun mil jaa mil jaa mil jaa re threedots

Title: o bedardii kyuun tadapaae  o madhubainii kaahe lubhaae
Lyrics: gii 	o bedardii kyuun tadapaae jiyaraa moraa rijhaay ke 	o niradardii main pachhataaii tujhase nehaa lagay ke ma 	o madhubainii kaahe lubhaae miithii taan sunaay ke 	o mriganayanii kaahe rijhaae nainan baan chalaay ke gii 	o bedardii kyuun tadapaae threedots  gii 	jab se dekhaa tujhe sajanavaa main sapanon men kho gaii 	o nirmohii chupake chupake main to terii ho gaii 	mujhase nain churaae balamavaa dil kaa chain churaay ke 	o bedardii kyuun tadapaae threedots  ma 	indradhanush sii torii chunariyaa hiraday par chhaa jaae re 	sanvar sanvar kar gorii gujariyaa jag jaise chhal jaae re 	tohan mantar kaahe chalaae madhur madhur muskaay ke 	o madhubainii kaahe lubhaae threedots  gii 	badaa nithur hai moraa sanvariyaa jo na pasiije pyaar men 	pyaar binaa main jiuun re kaise chhaliyaa is sansaar men 	birahin main ban jaauun joganiyaa duniyaa ko thukaraay ke 	o bedardii kyuun tadapaae threedots  ma 	priit terii pahachaan na paayaa jiyaa moraa anajaan re 	tujhase meraa neh sajaniyaa karuun nichhaavar praan re 	prem kaa naataa jod le tuu biitii batiyaan bisaraay ke 	o madhubainii kaahe lubhaae threedots

Title: raat kii mahafil suunii suunii
Lyrics: raat kii mahafil suunii suunii aankhen puranam dil naakaam sahame sahame aramaanon kaa honaa hii thaa ye anjaam threedots  bhuul gaye the apanii hastii tujhako vafaa ke josh men ham sab kuchh khokar bebas hokar ab aaye hain hosh men ham kaise rah gaye dil ke armaan tuutaa saaqii tuutaa jaam honaa hii thaa ye anjaam threedots  sar ko jahaan takaraaye jaake aisii koii diivaar nahiin haaye rii qismat ham duniyaa men pyaar ke bhii haqadaar nahiin dil hotaa jo apane bas men lete na ham pyaar kaa naam honaa hii thaa ye anjaam threedots  raat ki mahafill suunii suunii threedots

Title: raat se kaho ruke zaraa
Lyrics: raat se kaho ruke zaraa 2 merii javaanii kaa raqs vo dekhale zaraa raat se kaho threedots  e mere meharabaanon ye merii baat maano phir naa kabhii ye raat aaegii aaii bhii jo raat naa ye baat aaegii main aaj huun kal kahaan raat se kaho threedots  ai muskaraane vaalon jii bhar ke muskaraa lo jaane phir dil kaa qaraar ho naa ho ye jalavaa ye raqsebahaar ho naa ho jo aaj hai kal kahaan raat se kaho threedots

Title: basant rut aaii aajaa jiyaa naa lage
Lyrics: basant rut aaii aajaa jiyaa naa lage he 2 basant rut aaii jiyaa naa lage moraa jiyaaraa jale 2 basant rut aaii aajaa jiyaa naa lage he basant rut aaii  ho raajaa raahon men torii mainne nain bichaae nain bichaae ho raajaa palakon pe mainne aajaa diip jalaae diip jalaae aajaa re aajaa piyaa shaam dhale basant rut aaii aajaa jiyaa naa lage he basant rut aaii  ho raajaa pal bhii tumhaare sang chal naa sakii main chal naa sakii main ho raajaa priit men torii haae dhal naa sakii main dhal naa sakii main aajaa pukaaruun tohe ambavaa tale basant rut aaii aajaa jiyaa naa lage he  basant rut aaii jiyaa naa lage moraa jiyaaraa jale 2 basant rut aaii aajaa jiyaa naa lage he basant rut aaii

Title: ai aasamaan ke raahii  haay saavan ban gae nain
Lyrics: ai aasamaan ke raahii tuu hii gavaah rahanaa thamataa nahiin hai kabase in aansuon kaa bahanaa teraa agar guzar ho is desh kii taraf se koii tadap rahaa hai itanaa hii unase kahanaa  haay saavan ban gae nain saavan ban gae nain piyaa bin saavan ban gae nain  suunaasuunaa ghar hai balam bin suune hain dinrain ho puuchho na jii ke bain saavan ban gae threedots  nain hamaare gangaajamanaa baadal se ye haragiz kam naa mushqil hai ansuvan kaa thamanaa katatii nahiin mose birahaa kii rain saavan ban gae threedots  dil ke chhaale phuut gae hain pyaar ke taare tuut gae hain chor mere man luut gae hain milataa nahiin mujh abhaagan ko chain saavan ban gae threedots

Title: mat puuchh meraa hai kaun vatan aur main kahaan
Lyrics: mat puuchh meraa hai kaun vatan  2 aur main kahaan kaa huun saaraa jahaan hai meraa main saare jahaan kaa huun mat puuchh meraa hai threedots  main chiin men huun chiinii jaapaan men jaapaanii landan men huun angrejii indiyaa men hindustaanii main jis ghadii jahaan bhii huun samajho vahaan kaa huun mat puuchh meraa hai threedots  main pyaar kaa huun jaaduu jo sar pe chadh ke bole ik phuunk se udaa duun sau etamon ke gole qismat jo badal de duniyaa kii us aasamaan kaa huun mat puuchh meraa hai threedots

Title: haay re insaan kii majabuuriyaan
Lyrics: haay re insaan kii majabuuriyaan 2 paas rah kar bhii hain kitanii  duuriyaan  2 haay re insaan kii threedots  kuchh andhere men nazar aataa nahiin koii taaraa raah dikhalaataa nahiin jaane ummiidon kii manzil hai kahaan 2 haay re insaan kii threedots  shamaa ke anjaam kii kisako kabar katm hogii yaa jalegii raat bhar jaane ye sholaa banegii yaa dhuaan 2 haay re insaan kii threedots

Title: shiishaaedil itanaa naa uchhaalo
Lyrics: koras  haa haa haa haa haa  ahaa haa haa haa  lataa  shiishaaedil itanaa naa uchhaalo 2 ye kahiin tuut jaaegaa ye kahiin phuut jaaegaa shiishaaedil itanaa naa uchhaalo koras  shiishaaedil itanaa naa uchhaalo ye kahiin tuut jaaegaa ye kahiin phuut jaaegaa shiishaaedil itanaa naa uchhaalo la la la la la la la laa la la la la la la la laa la la laa la la la laa la la laa la la la laa la la la la la la la laa  lataa  machalatiijhuumatii thandhii havaaen kahatii hain tadapatii maujon kii chanchal adaaen kahatii hain sanvaaro zulf ko kaalii ghataaen kahatii hain ye bhiigiibhiigii suhaanii fazaaen kahatii hain koras  tumhiin se aaj tumhaarii nigaahen kahatii hain 2 lataa  o o o o  shiishaaedil  threedots  lataa  nazaare ho gae qurbaan in nazaaron par machalake aa gaiin laharen bhii ab ishaaron par adaa se tairate phirate hain ham to dhaaron par karenge pyaar kaa jaaduu javaan bahaaron par koras  ye kahane aaii hain sau machhaliyaan kinaaron par 2 lataa  o o o o shiishaaedil threedots  lataa  sanbhaalo hosh ke dariyaa kaa gaharaa paanii hai na duub jaao kahiin bekabar javaanii hai javaan bahaar kinaaron pe aaniijaanii hai zaraa kayaal rahe dil ajab nishaanii hai koras  abhii to pyaar kii duniyaa tumhen basaanii hai  2 lataa  o o o o shiishaaedil threedots

Title: chiil chiil chillaake kajarii sunaaye
Lyrics: ki yaa yaa yaa ba ga yaa yuun yaa ba ga uun aa rahe the ishkool se raste men hamane dekhaa ek khel saste men  koii kyaa betaa kyaa   ki aan maan chiilchiil chillaa ke kajarii sunaaye jhuumjhuum kauvaa bhii dholak bajaaye 2  are vaah vaah vaah 2 are   ko vaah vaah vaah are   ko vaah vaah vaah vaah chiilchiil chillaa ke kajarii sunaaye jhuumjhuum kauvaa bhii dholak bajaaye  ko are vaah vaah vaah  4 vaah  e latoo baaku aa baaku 4  chhukchhukchhuk chalii jaatii hai rel chhukchhukchhukchhukchhuk chalii jaatii hai rel chhupchhupchhup totaa mainaa kaa mel pyaar kii pakaudii miithii baaton kii bhel 2 thodaa nuun thodii mirch thodii sonth thodaa tel  ko are vaah vaah vaah  4 vaah bol bachchaa chiilchiil chillaa ke kajarii sunaaye  ale vaa le betaa bachchaa jhuumjhuum kauvaa bhii dholak bajaaye  ko are vaah vaah vaah  4 vaah  gol mol gol mote laalaa shaukeen 2 tond men chhupaaye hain chiraagealaadiin tiin ko hameshaa karate aaye saadhe tiin 2 zaraa naap zaraa tol ise loot usase chhiin are  ko vaah vaah vaah 2 ko are vaah vaah vaah  4 vaah  e chiilchiil chillaa ke kajarii sunaaye jhuumjhuum kauvaa bhii dholak bajaaye  ko are vaah vaah vaah  4 vaah  koii mujhe chor kahe koii kotavaal 2 kisape yaqeen karuun mushkil savaal duniyaa men yaaro hai badaa hii golamaal 2 kahiin dhol kahiin pol siidhii baat tedhii chaal are  ko vaah vaah vaah 2 ko are vaah vaah vaah  4 vaah  e chiilchiil chillaa ke kajarii sunaaye jhuumjhuum kauvaa bhii dholak bajaaye  are ko vaah vaah vaah  4 vaah  uun uun baabaa man kii aankhen khol

Title: kyaa miliye aise logon se jinakii fitarat chhupii rahe
Lyrics: kyaa miliye aise logon se jinakii fitarat chhupii rahe nakalii cheharaa saamane aae asalii suurat chhupii rahe  khud se hii jo khud ko chhupaae kyaa unase pahachaan karen kyaa unake daaman se lipaten kyaa unakaa aramaan karen jinakii aadhii niiyat ubhare aadhii niiyat chhupii rahe nakalii threedots  diladaarii kaa dhong rachaakar jaal bichhaae baaton kaa jiite jii kaa rishtaa kahakar sukh dhuundhe kuchh raaton kaa ruuh kii hasarat lab pe aae jism kii hasarat chhupii rahe nakalii threedots

Title: aajaa mere pyaar ke sahaare abhiiabhii
Lyrics: aajaa mere pyaar ke sahaare abhiiabhii hote hain ye pyaar ke nazaare kabhiikabhii  2 dekho dekho dekho kyaa samaan hai aajaa ke abhii to dil jawaan hai aajaa mere pyaar ke sahaare abhiiabhii hote hain ye pyaar ke nazaare kabhiikabhii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa   main bhii zaraa jaanuun ke wo kaun bewafaa hai jisake kayaal men tuu aisaa kho gayaa hai  2 o o o o o o o o o o  dekho dekho dekho kyaa samaan hai aajaa ke abhii to dil jawaan hai aajaa mere pyaar ke sahaare abhiiabhii hote hain ye pyaar ke nazaare kabhiikabhii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa   jitane bhii gam hain tumhaarii zindagii men chaaho to badal duun main pyaar kii kushii men  2 aha ha ha aha ha ha o o o o  dekho dekho dekho kyaa samaan hai aajaa ke abhii to dil jawaan hai aajaa mere pyaar ke sahaare abhiiabhii hote hain ye pyaar ke nazaare kabhiikabhii  dekho dekho dekho kyaa samaan hai aajaa ke abhii to dil jawaan hai aajaa mere pyaar ke sahaare abhiiabhii hote hain ye pyaar ke nazaare kabhiikabhii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa

Title: kuchh sher sunaataa huun main
Lyrics: kuchh sher sunaataa huun main  jo tujhase mukhatib hai ik husn parii dil men hai ye unase mukhatib hai  kuchh sher sunaataa huun men threedots   sikhii hai tumase phuul ne hansane kii har ada  sikhii havaa ne tumase hii chalane kii har ada  aaiinaa tumako dekh ke hairaan ho gayaa  ik bezubaan tumase pashemaan ho gayaa  kitanii bhi taarif karuun rukatii nahiin zubaan  rukati nahiin zubaan  kuchh sher sunaataa huun main threedots  hathon ki loch ras bharii shaakhon kii daastaan  naazuk hatheliyon pe vo mehandii ka gulsitaan  pad jaye tumape dhuup to sanvalaaye goraa tan  makhamal pe tum chalo to chhile paaon gulabadan  kitanii bhi taarif karuun rukatii nahiin zubaan  rukatii nahiin zubaan  kuchh sher sunaataa huun main threedots   aankhen agar jhuken to mohabbat machal uthe  nazaren agar uthen to qayaamat machal uthe  andaaz main huzuur ka saanii nahiin koi  donon jahaan men aisi javani nahiin koi  kitanii bhi taarif karuun rukatii nahiin zubaan  rukatii nahiin zubaan  kuchh sher sunaataa huun main threedots

Title: saathii hai alabelaa  hamen to hai shikavaa mausam se
Lyrics: saathii hai alabelaa phir bhii koii akelaa kisii se ham kuchh bhii nahiin kahate hamen to hai shikavaa mausam se saathii hai alabelaa threedots  sunataa nahiin zamaanaa raahii kaa afasaanaa rastaa nayaa manzil naii tanhaa hai diivaanaa kisii ko kyaa lenaa phir hamase hamen to hai shikavaa threedots  siine men sulagaaen sholaa saa ye havaaen phir bhii agar dil se mere daaman ko vo bachaaen to koii kyon bijalii ban chamake hamen to hai shikavaa threedots  dil dekhie hamaaraa maangaa nahiin sahaaraa inako nahiin unako nahiin tumako nahiin pukaaraa to koii kyon ulajhe tham tham ke hamen to hai shikavaa threedots

Title: uii itanii badii mahafil aur ik dil kisako duun
Lyrics: uii itanii badii mahafil aur ik dil kisako duun dil kisako duun ye dil ye vo dil jisako paalaa thaa hamane bade naaz se koii to bataaye koii samajhaaye dil isako duun yaa usako duun  hai yahaan aaj to ek dhuum paravaano men phans gayii jaan merii beshumaar diivaano men roke hain log raahen merii thaame hasiin baahen merii uii tan ke ye ujale man ke ye kaale dil isako duun yaa usako duun  jab mile ik nazar ik nazar se bijalii gire main jahaan chal paduun mere saath duuniyaan chale mushakil to ye hai kisakii sunuun apanaa yahaan pe kisakoo chunuun uii ruup ke lutere pyaar na jaane dil isako duun yaa usako duun   threedots

Title: ye kalii jab talak phuul ban ke khile
Lyrics: l ye kalii jab talak phuul ban ke khile  intazaar intazaar intazaar karo intazaar karo  rafii intazaar vo bhalaa kyaa kare tum jise  bekaraar bekaraar bekaraar karo  l intazaar karo   m pyaar men pyaar kii bhii izaazat nahiin 2  berukhii hai ajii ye muhaubbat nahiin  l aa rahaa hai mazaa tum shikaayat yahii  baar baar baar baar baar baar karo intazaar karo   l husn pe to asar hone vaalaa nahiin 2  ishq tum ko na kar de divaanaa kahiin  m hai ye diivaanagii bhii qubuul tum agar  hamase pyaar hamase pyaar hamase pyaar karo  l intazaar karo   m roz hamane bayaan ye fasaanaa kiyaa 2  roz tumane nayaa ek bahaanaa kiyaa  l ye bahaanaa magar aakhirii hai sanam  aitabaar aitabaar aitabaar karo intazaar karo

Title: dil ke viiraane men ik shammaa hai
Lyrics: aa aa dil ke viiraane men ik shammaa hai ab tak roshan 2 koii parawaanaa magar ab na idhar aayegaa 2  zindagii biit gaii pyaar men jalatejalate koii ummiid paraaii na koii dost banii jagamagaayaa na sitaaraa koii aramaanon kaa hamane dil ko bhii jalaayaa to siyaah raat banii dilajalon par koii mahashar saa guzar jaayegaa  koii parawaanaa magar ab na idhar aayegaa  kitane gaate hue aramaanon kii barasaat ke baad aas kii jhiil men laharaaye the kuchh niilkanwal kyaa kabar thii ke wo mahafil hii ujad jaayegii jisamen gaaii thii kabhii hamane mohabbat kii gazal apanaa har nagamaa kalaaon men bikhar jaayegaa koii parawaanaa magar ab na idhar aayegaa  itane behis to huaa karate nahiin ahalewafaa jaane kyaa soch ke tauhiinewafaa kii tuune koii jhonkaa bhii jise chhuu na sakaa tere bagair apane haathon se wahii shammaa bujhaa dii tuune kyaa kabar thii teraa ahasaas bhii mar jaayegaa koii parawaanaa magar ab na idhar aayegaa 2

Title: husnejaanaa idhar aa
Lyrics: husne jaana idhar aa aaena hoon main tera main sawaroonga tujhe saare ghum de de mujhe bhigi palken na jhukaaaena hoon main tera   kitne hi daagh uthaye tu ne mere din raat sajaye tu ne chum loon aa mein teri palkon ko de doon ye umar teri zulfon ko leke aankhon ke diye muskura mere liye meri tasveere vafaaaena hoon main tera   teri chahat hai ibadat meri dekhta rahta hoon surat teri ghar tere dum se hai mandir mera tu hai devi mein pujari tera sajde sau bar karoonaa tujhe pyar karoon meri aaghosh men aaaaena hoon main tera husne jaana idhar aa

Title: giit meraa sulaaye jagaaye tujhe
Lyrics: giit meraa sulaaye jagaaye tujhe pyaar ke paalane men jhulaaye tujhe  bhor kii pahaliipahalii vo suuraj kiran aake jis vaqt chuume ye goraa badan baanh banakar  baanh banakar gale se lagaaye tujhe  bhiid men zindagii kii rahe paas ye aur akele men tujhase kare baat ye raah jiivan  raah jiivan kii haradam dikhaaye tujhe  mere saanson kii sangiit tham jaaye jab merii aavaaz tujh tak nahiin aaye jab terii dhadakan  terii dhadakan ye nagmaa sunaaye tujhe

Title: aasamaan ke niiche ham aaj apane piichhe
Lyrics: aasamaan ke niiche ham aaj apane piichhe pyaar kaa jahaan basaa ke chale kadam ke nishaan banaa ke chale aasamaan  threedots  tum chale to phuul jaise aanchal ke rang se saj gai raahen saj gai raahen paas aao mai pahanaa duun chaahat kaa haar ye khulii khulii baahen khulii khulii baahen jis kaa ho aanchal khud hii chaman kahiye vo kyuun haar baahon ke daale aasamaan threedots  bolatii hain aaj aankhen kuchh bhii na aaj tum kahane do hamako kahane do hamako bekhudii badhatii chalii hai ab to kaamosh hii rahane do hamako rahane do hamako ik baar ek baar mere liye kah do khanaken laal honthon ke pyaale aasamaan threedots  saath mere chal ke dekho aai hain duur se ab kii bahaaren ab kii bahaaren har galii har mod pe vo donon ke naam se hamako pukaare tumako pukaare kah do bahaaron se aae na idhar un tak uthakar ham nahiin jaane vaale aasamaan threedots

Title: yaad torii aaii main to chhamchham roii re
Lyrics: yaad torii aaii main to chhamchham roii re priit bhare aansuon ne chunarii bhigoii re chunarii bhigoii  2 yaad torii aaii threedots  hazaar pahare lage hon magar o mere saathii  milen jo pankh to  2 panchhii se pahale main aatii tose bichhad ke main to pal bhar na soii re priit bhare aansuon threedots  tadap ke aaj tujhe haaledil likhaa maine  sambhal ke kholanaa  2 kat isamen dil rakhaa maine chhote se dil men saarii duniyaa samoii re priit bhare aansuon threedots

Title: sharamaa ke yuun na dekh adaa ke maqaam se
Lyrics: sharamaa ke yuun na dekh adaa ke maqaam se ab baat badh chukii hai nazar ke maqaam se sharma ke yuun na threedots  tasviir khiinch lii hai tere shok husn kii merii nazar ne aaj kataa ke maqaam se sharamaa ke yuun na threedots  duniyaa ko bhuul kar merii baanhon men jhuul jaa aavaaz de rahaa huun vafaa ke maqaam se sharamaa ke yuun na threedots  dil ke muaamale men natiize kii fiqr kyaa aage hai ishq zurmosazaa ke maqaam se sharamaa ke yuun na threedots

Title: khoyaakhoyaa chaand khulaa aasamaan
Lyrics: khoyaakhoyaa chaand khulaa aasamaan aankhon men saarii raat jaaegii tumako bhii kaise niind aaegii ho khoyaakhoyaa threedots  mastii bharii havaa jo chalii khilkhil gaii ye dil kii kalii man kii galii men hai khalabalii ki unako to bulaao o ho threedots khoyaakhoyaa chaand threedots  taare chale nazaare chale sangsang mere vo saare chale chaaron taraf ishaare chale kisii ke to ho jaao o ho threedots khoyaakhoyaa chaand threedots  aisii hii raat bhiigii sii raat haathon men haath hote vo saath kah lete unase dil kii ye baat ab to naa sataao o ho threedots khoyaakhoyaa chaand threedots  ham mit chale jinake liye bin kuchh kahe vo chupchup rahe koii zaraa ye unase kahe na aise aajamaao o ho threedots khoyaakhoyaa chaand threedots

Title: nazar na lag jaae kisii kii raahon men
Lyrics: nazar na lag jaae kisii kii raahon men chhupaa ke rakh luun aa tujhe nigaahon men tuu kho na jaae nazar na lag jaae threedots  dekhakar terii taraf bahaar aaj ho rahii hai beqaraar chhuu rahe hain phuul yuun tujhe jaise ho inhen bhii tujhase pyaar ye ho na jaae nazar na lag jaae threedots  ai merii hasiin dularubaa mere dil men chhup ke baith jaa tujhamen mujhamen fark naa rahe aa qariib aa qariib aa tuu kho na jaae nazar na lag jaae threedots  saamane jo ek tuu na ho dil men koii aarazuu na ho manzilen hazaar hon magar manzilon kii justajuu na ho ye ho na jaae nazar na lag jaae threedots

Title: chandaa se hogaa vo pyaaraa
Lyrics: shri chandaa se hogaa vo pyaaraa  phuulon se hogaa vo nyaaraa  la naachegaa aangan men chhamchham  nanhaasaa munnaa hamaaraa  donon   la chandaa se hogaa vo pyaaraa  phuulon se hogaa vo nyaaraa  shri mmhm hm hmhm hm hmhm  mmhm hm hmhm hm hmhm    shri naachegaa aangan men chhamchham  nanhaasaa munnaa hamaaraa  la mmhmhm hmhm hm hmhm  mmhmhm hmhm hm hmhm     la aaaa aaaa aaaa shri aahaa aahaa aahaa shri khilatii ho jaise kalii sii hogii zabaan totalii sii la khilatii ho jaise kalii sii hogii zabaan totalii sii tutalaate hue ie lispingly paapaa o maamaa o babaa pakalenge ham chaandtaalaa donon   la chandaa se hogaa vo pyaaraa  phuulon se hogaa vo nyaaraa  shri mmhm hm hmhm hm hmhm  mmhm hm hmhm hm hmhm    shri naachegaa aangan men chhamchham  nanhaasaa munnaa hamaaraa  la mmhmhm hmhm hm hmhm  mmhmhm hmhm hm hmhm   shri  ab tak chhupaa hai vo aise  siipii men motii ho jaise  2  la pariyon ki nagarii se chalakar  aataa hii hogaa dulaaraa  donon  chandaa se hogaa vo pyaaraa  phuulon se hogaa vo nyaaraa  naachegaa aangan men chhamchham  nanhaa saa munnaa hamaaraa  mmhm hm hmhm threedots

Title: mere himaalay ke paasabaano
Lyrics: mere himaalay ke paasabaano mere gulistaan ke baagabaano uthon ki sadiyon kii niind taj kar tumhen watan phir pukaarataa hai 2  mere himaalay ke paasabaano mere gulistaan ke baagabaano   hawaaon ke dil dahal rahe hain gulaab neharuu ke jal rahe hain  2 zamiin to kyaa hai 2 falaq ke aansuu nikal rahe hain  qasam tumhen maan ke duudh kii hai qasam shahiidon ke duudh kii hai zamiin se usakaa nishaan mitaa do jo baag apanaa ujaadataa hai  mere himaalay ke paasabaano mere gulistaan ke baagabaano   ham apane kuun men nahaa chuke hain safiinaa apanaa dubaa chuke hain  2 khilophalo tum ai ahalemanzil ham apanii manzil pe aa chuke hain  hai aakirii ye salaam apanaa hai aakirii ye payaam apanaa jo jaagataa hai nahiin samay par wo jiitii baazii ko haarataa hai  mere himaalay ke paasabaano mere gulistaan ke baagabaano

Title: honthon pe sachchaaii rahatii hai jahaan dil men safaaii rahatii hai
Film: jis desh mein ganga behti hai
Lyrics: honthon pe sachchaaii rahatii hai  jahaan dil men safaaii rahatii hai ham us desh ke vaasii hain ham us desh ke vaasii hain jis desh men gangaa bahatii hai   2  mehamaan jo hamaaraa hotaa hai vo jaan se pyaaraa hotaa hai   2 zyaadaa kii nahiin laalach hamako  thode me guzaaraa hotaa hai  2 bachchon ke liye jo dharatii maan  sadiyon se sabhii kuchh sahatii hai ham us desh ke vaasii hain ham us desh ke vaasii hain jis desh men gangaa bahatii hai  kuchh log jo zyaadaa jaanate hain  insaan ko kam pahachaanate hain   2 ye puurab hai puurab vaale  har jaan kii qiimat jaanate hain  2 miljulke raho aur pyaar karo  ek chiiz yahii jo rahatii hai ham us desh ke vaasii hain ham us desh ke vaasii hain jis desh men gangaa bahatii hai  jo jisase milaa siikhaa hamane  gairon ko bhii apanaayaa hamane   2 matalab ke liye andhe hokar  rotii ko nahiin puujaa hamane  2 ab ham to kyaa saarii duniyaa  saarii duniyaa se kahatii hai ham us desh ke vaasii hain ham us desh ke vaasii hain jis desh men gangaa bahatii hai  ham kal kyaa the ham aaj hain kyaa isakaa hii nahiin abhimaan hamen  2 jis raah pe aage badhanaa hai hai usakii bhii pahachaan hamen  2 is dhaaraa ko kisane rokaa ye bandhake bhalaa kab rahatii hai ham us desh ke vaasii hain ham us desh ke vaasii hain jis desh men gangaa bahatii hai  honthon pe sachchaaii rahatii hai  jahaan dil men safaaii rahatii hai ham us desh ke vaasii hain ham us desh ke vaasii hain jis desh men gangaa bahatii hai

Title: koii matavaalaa aayaa mere dvaare
Lyrics: koii matavaalaa aayaa mere dvaare akhiyon se kar gayaa ajab ishaare koii matavaalaa aayaa mere dvaare   threedots  kyaa man usake main kyaa jaanuun chhaliyaa ko main kyaa pahachaanuun jaane kyon meraa naam pukaare aa koii matavaaraa aayaa mere dvaare    threedots  jab se gayaa hai bholaa bachapan akhiyaan chanchal natakhat hai man ab nahiin kuchh bhii bas men hamaare aa koii matavaaraa aayaa mere dvaare    threedots

Title: dhaanii chunarii pahan sajake banake dulhan kaanch kii chuudiyaan
Lyrics: dhaanii chunarii pahan sajake banake dulhan jaaungii unake ghar man men unakii lagan giit men meraa man threedots kuchh na boluungii main mukh na kholuungii main  baj uthengii hare kaanch kii chuudiyaan  2 kaanch kii chuudiyaan   3  chhuute maataa pitaa chhuute vo baalaapan khelii main jinake sang puure solah saavan deke tan aur man threedots deke tan aur man main manaauun sajan  terii baahon men ho meraa jiivan maran vaadaa lengii hare kaanch kii chuudiyaan baj uthengii hare kaanch kii chuudiyaan  do salone vachan tumako merii qasam ye qasam pyaar kii ye rasam pyaar kii ab nibhaanaa sajan threedots ab nibhaanaa sajan mat bhulaanaa sajan jaao parades to jaldii aanaa sajan vaadaa lengii hare kaanch kii chuudiyaan baj uthengii hare kaanch kii chuudiyaan

Title: raaton ko choriichorii bole moraa kanganaa
Film: mohabbat zindagi hai love is life
Lyrics: raaton ko choriichorii bole moraa kanganaa abake jo barakhaa aaii aaenge sajanaa  2 raaton ko chorii threedots  kaisii anokhii pyaarii hongii vo raaten jabake piyaa se hongii manavaa kii baaten do chaand chamakenge morii atariyaa 2 ik to gagan men hogaa duujaa more anganaa raaton ko chorii threedots

Title: chalo sajanaa jahaan tak ghataa chale
Lyrics: chalo sajanaa jahaan tak ghataa chale lagaakar mujhe gale chalo sajanaa jahaan tak ghataa chale  sundar sapanon kii hai manzil kadam ke niiche fursat kisako itanii dekhe jo mudake piichhe tum chalo ham chalen ham chalen tum chalo saavan kii havaa chale chalo sajanaa jahaanthreedots  dhadakan tumare dilakii ulajhii hamaarii lat men tumare tan kii chhaayaa kaajal banii palak men ek hain do badan do badan ek hain aanchal ke taletale chalo sajanaa jahaanthreedots  patthariilii raahon men tum sang main jhuum luungii khaaoge jab thokar honthon se chuum luungii pyaar kaa aaj se aaj kaa pyaar se hamase silasilaa chale chalo sajanaa jahaanthreedots

Title: jab gameishq sataataa hai to hans letaa huun
Lyrics: jab gameishq sataataa hai to hans letaa huun 2 haadasaa yaad yah aataa hai to hans letaa huun  jazbaaeishq ke anjaam pe is duniyaa men 2 jab koii ashk bahaataa hai to hans letaa huun haadasaa yaad yah aataa threedots  merii ujadii huii duniyaa men tamannaa kaa chiraag 2 jab koii aa ke jalaataa hai to hans letaa huun  koii daavaa nahiin fariyaad nahiin tang nahiin 2 raham jab apane pe aataa hai to hans letaa huun 2 jab gameishq threedots

Title: ek banjaaraa gaae jiivan ke giit sunaae
Lyrics: ek banjaaraa gaae jiivan ke giit sunaae ham sab jiine vaalon ko jiine kii raah bataae  zamaane vaalo kitaabegam men khushii kaa koi fasaanaa dhuundho ho o o o threedots aankhon men aansuu bhii aae vo aakar muskaae  sabhii ko dekho nahiin hotaa hai nasiibaa raushan sitaaron jaisaa sayaanaa vo hai jo patajhad men bhii sajaa le gulashan bahaaron jaisaa ho o o o threedots kaagaz ke phuulon ko bhii jo mahakaa kar dikhalaae

Title: jaae jahaan merii nazar kaliyaan vahaan jaaen bikhar
Lyrics: jaae jahaan merii nazar  kaliyaan vahaan jaaen bikhar phir bhii hai dil beqaraar 2  kahe koii chhaliyaa tuu hai hasiin kahe koii rasiyaa maahajabiin koii kahe dilarubaa koii rangiilaa chhail chhabiilaa mujhako pukaare piyaa phir bhii hai dil beqaraar 2  jaae jahaan merii nazar threedots  koii kahe zaalim tuu hai parii koii kahe haay  terii jaaduugarii koii kahe luut liyaa koii alabelaa saanjh kii belaa mujhako pukaare piyaa phir bhii hai dil beqaraar 2  jaae jahaan merii nazar threedots

Title: laage na moraa jiyaa sajanaa nahiin aaye haay
Lyrics: laage na moraa jiyaa sajanaa nahiin aaye haay laage na moraa jiyaa threedots  dekh liye piya tere irade jhuth nikale ja tere vade tadapattadapat yad men teri nain nir bhar ae hay laage na moraa jiyaa threedots  tune meri sudh bisarai bedardi tohe laj na ai bhul gae kya o harajai jake des parae hay laage na moraa jiyaa threedots

Title: matavaale ham matavaale tum chalate rahen
Lyrics: matavaale ham matavaale tum chalate rahen yuun hii qadam dilavaale ham dilavaale tum badhate rahen yuun hii qadam matavaale ham threedots  auron ke kaam aa jaa hilmil ke jhelataa jaa mushkil jo raahon men hai matavaalaa jaam hai mastii se kaam hai mastii nigaahon men hai dil jab dole machalmachal ke phir kyaa chalanaa sambhalsambhal ke dil hai javaan kaahe kaa gam matavaale ham threedots  saare rangiin nazaare apane dam se hain pyaare hamako nazaaron se kyaa har dil ke pyaar ham sabakii bahaar ham ham ko bahaaron se kyaa sabase nainaa milaamilaa ke dil kii kaliyaan khilaakhilaa ke chalate chalen laharaa ke ham matavaale ham threedots  kaisaa jiinaa akele gairon kaa dard le len apanaa to kaam yahii apanaa to sin yahii apanaa to din yahii apanii to shaam yahii girate jan ko uthaauthaa ke har rote ko hansaahansaa ke gaae jaa tuu jabtak hai dam matavaale ham threedots

Title: chaahaa thaa banuun pyaar kii raahon kaa devataa
Lyrics: chaahaa thaa banuun pyaar kii raahon kaa devataa mujhako banaa diyaa hai gunaahon kaa devataa  ye zindagii to kvaab hai jiinaa bhii hai nashaa do ghuunt maine pii lie to kyaa buraa kiyaa rahane do jaam saamane sab kuchh yahii to hai har gamazadaa ke aansuon kaa devataa mujhako banaa diyaa threedots  qismat to chal rahii hai hamase chaal har qadam ek chaal ham bhii chal die to ho gayaa sitam ab to chalenge chaal ham qismat ke saath bhii aisaa banaa sansaar kii raahon kaa devataa mujhako banaa diyaa threedots  hogaa jahaan bhii ruup to puujaa hii jaaegaa chaahe jahaan bhii phuul ho man ko lubhaaegaa hokar rahegaa zindagii men pyaar ek baar bas kar rahegaa dil men nigaahon kaa devataa mujhako banaa diyaa threedots

Title: merii baat rahii mere man men
Lyrics: merii baat rahii mere man men kuchh kah na sakii ulajhan men mere sapane adhuure hue nahiin puure aag lagii jiivan men merii baat rahii mere man men   threedots  o rasiyaa man basiyaa rag rag men ho tum hii samaaye mere nainaa kare bainaa meraa dard na tum sun paaye jiyaa moraa pyaasaa rahaa saavan men merii baat rahii mere man men   threedots  kuchh kahate kuchh sunate kyon chale gaye dil ko masal ke merii duniyaa huii suunii bujhaa aas kaa diipak jal ke chhaayaa re andheraa merii akhiyan men merii baat rahii mere man men   threedots  tum aao ki na aao piyaa yaad tumhaarii mere sang hai tumhe kaise ye bataauun merii priit kaa niraalaa ek rang hai laagaa ho ye nehaa jaise bachapan men merii baat rahii mere man men   threedots

Title: sau baar janam lenge sau baar fanaa honge
Lyrics: sau baar janam lenge sau baar fanaa honge ai jaanevafaa phir bhii ham tum na judaa honge  qismat hame milane se rokegii bhalaa kab tak in pyaar kii raahon men bhatakegii vafaa kab tak qadamon ke nishaan khud hii manzil kaa pataa honge  ye kaisii udaasii hai jo husn pe chhaaii hai ham duur nahiin tum se kahane ko judaaii hai aramaan bhare do dil phir ek jagah honge

Title: dil thaam chale ham aaj kidhar koii dekhe
Lyrics: dil thaam chale ham aaj kidhar  koii dekhe  2 bechain jigar betaab nazar  koii dekhe  2  bhiigii sii havaa kalii sii ghataa detii hai terii zulfon kaa pataa o ho aa haa mausam hai hasiin kyon naa ho yaqiin ab duur nahiin vo jaanevafaa namaqiin samaan rangiin safar  koii dekhe  2 dil thaam chale ham threedots   chotii pe vahaan ik abrejavaan dekho to zaraa kyon jhukane lagaa mausam kii sharaarat kaa manzar  koii dekhe  2 dil thaam chale ham threedots  yuun rel chale naagin kii tarah laharaatii huii balakhaatii huii o ho aa haa phuulon se bhare in raston pe har mod pe ye samajhaatii huii ye ishq bhii to hai ik chakkar  koii dekhe  2 dil thaam chale ham threedots

Title: is tarah todaa meraa dil
Lyrics: is tarah todaa meraa dil kyaa meraa dil dil na thaa 2 ye to kah jaate tumhaare pyaar ke qaabil na thaa is tarah todaa threedots  aapako apanaa samajh kar apanii qismat saunp dii apane aramaan de die apanii mohabbat saunp dii 2 kisalie vo kvaab dekhe jinase kuchh haasil na thaa is tarah todaa threedots  jaatejaate kuchh gilaa koii shiqaayat to huii ham bhii raahon men pade the par inaayat naa huii 2 ek thokar hii lagaate ye to kuchh mushqil na thaa is tarah todaa threedots

Title: ye kyaa kiyaa re duniyaa vaale jahaan ke gam
Lyrics: ye kyaa kiyaa re duniyaa vaale jahaan ke gam tuune sabhii mujhako de daale ye kyaa kiyaa re threedots  o re bedardii o harajaaii dekh lii maine terii kudaaii pahale hii meraa dil ghaayal thaa aur bhii us par chot lagaaii tuune rulaa ke mujhe dardar phiraa ke mujhe kab ke ye aramaan nikaale ye kyaa kiyaa re threedots  subah kaa suuraj raat ke taare ban gae sab ke sab angaare aas ke bandhan tod ke tuune chhiin lie sabhii sangsahaare mere lahuu kii qasam aur bhii kar le sitam aag tuu dil kii bujhaa le ye kyaa kiyaa re threedots

Title: nanhaa munnaa raahii huun desh kaa sipaahii huun
Lyrics: nanhaa munnaa raahii huun desh kaa sipaahii huun bolo mere sang jay hind jay hind jay hind threedots  raste pe chaluungaa na dardar ke chaahe mujhe jiinaa pade marmar ke manzil se pahale naa luungaa kahiin dam aage hii aage badhaaungaa kadam daahine baaen daahine baaen tham  nanhaa threedots  dhuup men pasiinaa bahaaungaa jahaan harebhare khet laharaaenge vahaan dharatii pe faake na paaenge janam aage hii aage threedots  nayaa hai zamaanaa merii naii hai dagar desh ko banaaungaa mashiinon kaa nagar bhaarat kisii se na rahegaa kam aage hii aage threedots  badaa ho ke desh kaa sitaaraa banuungaa duniyaa kii aankhon kaa taaraa banuungaa rakhuungaa uunchaa tirangaa haradam aage hii aage threedots  shaanti ki nagarii hai meraa ye vatan sabako sikhaauungaa pyaar kaa chalan duniyaa men girane na duungaa kahiin bam aage hii aage threedots

Title: phuulon se dostii hai kaanton se yaarii hai
Lyrics: phuulon se dostii hai kaanton se yaarii hai aise maze kii hoy aise maze kii pyaare zindagii hamaarii hai  samajhaa kushii ko kushii gam ko na gam maut ke bhii naam se na ghabaraae ham kashtii sadaa hii manjhadhaar men utaarii hai aise maze kii pyaare threedots  chaahe zamiin ho yaa ho aasamaan thokar men apanii hain donon jahaan jitanii guzaarii isii shaan se guzaarii hai aise maze kii pyaare threedots  apanii khataaon pe bhii naaz hai judaa saarii duniyaa se andaaz hai pii bhii nahiin hai phir bhii khumaarii hai aise maze kii pyaare threedots

Title: sochaa thaa pyaar ham naa karenge
Lyrics: sochaa thaa pyaar ham naa karenge suurat pe yaar ham naa marenge phir bhii kisii pe dil aa gayaa sochaa thaa pyaar threedots  bahut kaaq duniyaa kii chhaanii thii hamane ab tak kisii kii na maanii thii hamane 2 dhokhe men dil kaise aa gayaa sochaa thaa pyaar threedots  yahaan tak to aaye the daaman bachaa ke jaa na sake phir tere dar pe aa ke 2 jaaduu mohabbat kaa chhaa gayaa sochaa thaa pyaar threedots  agar dil na dete badaa naam karate magar pyaar men badaa kaam karate 2 dil ko yahii kaam bhaa gayaa sochaa thaa pyaar threedots

Title: o yaa qurbaan  o sabaa kahanaa mere diladaar ko
Lyrics: o yaa qurbaan  vo aankhen thii dilabar kii yaa nargisemastaanaa dekhe hue us but ko ab ho gayaa zamaanaa o sabaa kahanaa mere diladaar ko dil tadapataa hai tere diidaar ko o sabaa kahanaa threedots  o yaa qurbaan dekhenge kab vo suurat jis pe bahaar sadake ye dil to kyaa hai yaaron kaabul qandhaar sadake kis tarah bhuule nigaaheyaar ko dil tadapataa hai tere diidaar ko o sabaa kahanaa threedots  o yaa qurbaan kaisii hai ye qayaamat o tuu hii bataa kudaayaa jitanaa bulaayaa us ko utanaa vo yaad aayaa kyaa qaraar aaye tere biimaar ko dil tadapataa hai tere diidaar ko o sabaa kahanaa threedots

Title: ho tamannaa aur kyaa jaanetamannaa aap hai
Lyrics: ho tamannaa aur kyaa jaanetamannaa aap hai kyaa karuungii le ke duniyaa merii duniyaa aap hai  sharm aatii hai mujhe apane se bhii kahate hue aap se kaise kahuun mere liye kyaa aap hai ho tamannaa aur kyaa jaanetamannaa aap hai  aap se pahale nazar men kuchh na thaa apane sivaa ab jidhar bhii dekhatii huun jalawaa parawaa aap hai  ho tamannaa aur kyaa jaanetamannaa aap hai kyaa karuungii le ke duniyaa merii duniyaa aap hai

Title: niind parii lorii gaae
Lyrics: niind parii lorii gaae maan jhulaae jhuulana so jaa mere laalana 2 miithemiithe sapanon me  kho jaa mere laalana niind parii lorii gaae threedots  tuune mere madabhare sapnon ko rang daala terii dono aankhon me duniyaa kaa ujiyaalaa 2 ujiyaalaa tum jo hanse jhilmilaae diipamaalaa niind parii lorii gaae threedots   tuu naa hotaa zindagii me aahen hotiin suuniisuunii phailiiphailii mamataa kii baahen hotiin suuniisuunii 2 suuniisuunii hotiin mere dil kii raahen suuniisuunii niind parii lorii gaae threedots

Title: insaan kii zindagii hai
