Title: saajan saajan pukaaruun galiyon men
Lyrics: saajan saajan pukaaruun galiyon men kabhii phuulon men dhuundhuun kabhii kaliyon men saajan saajan threedots  aise ruuthaa hai bedardii kahaa naa maane mere jii kii merii jaan kii qadar naa jaane main usii zulmii ke nainaa mastaane kabhii phuulon men threedots  bulabul samajhe hai phuulon kaa dil mastaanaa bhanvare samajhe hain kaliyon se meraa yaaraanaa main to apanaa ruuthaa saajan diivaanaa kabhii phuulon men threedots  mujhase kahatii hai parvat pe kaalii ghataa chhaachhaa ke ho raamaa hansatii hai puurab se havaa aaaa ke vo chhupaa hai dil men aur main jaajaa ke kabhii phuulon men threedots

Title: koii ummiid bar nahiin aatii
Lyrics: koii ummiid bar nahiin aatii 2 koii suurat nazar nahiin aatii koii ummiid bar nahiin aatii  maut kaa ek din muaiyyan hai 2 niind kyuun raat bhar nahiin aatii koii ummiid bar nahiin aatii  aage aatii thii haaledil pe hansii 2 ab kisii baat par nahiin aatii koii ummiid bar nahiin aatii  marate hain aarazuu men marane kii 2 maut aatii hai par nahiin aatii koii ummiid bar nahiin aatii

Title: dil kaa afasaanaa sunaate hain  chalenge tiir jab dil par
Lyrics: dil kaa afasaanaa sunaate hain sunaane vaale kaash samajhen naa mohabbat ko mitaane vaale pyaar kaa naam bhii lete hue dar lagataa hai tiir khenche hue baithe hain zamaane vaale  chalenge tiir jab dil par to aramaanon kaa kyaa hogaa tutegaa ghar to phir is ghar ke mehamaanon kaa kyaa hogaa  sunaa hai ishq men aate hain din aahon ke naalon ke abhii tak to salaamat hai garebaan ishq vaalon ke agar fasalebahaar aaii to diivaanon kaa kyaa hogaa chalenge tiir jab threedots  uthaa hai shoremaatam shamaa tere jaannisaaron men abhii to dil hii jalate hain mohabbat ke sharaaron men kisii ne par jalaa daale to paravaanon kaa kyaa hogaa chalenge tiir jab threedots  adhuure hain abhii puure nahiin kisse mohabbat ke abhii to dil men poshiidaan hain afasaane qayaamat ke haqiiqat ho gaii zaahir to afasaanon kaa kyaa hogaa chalenge tiir jab threedots  sunaa hai jaameulfat men balaa kaa josh hai saaqii abhii to dil hai qaabuu men abhii to hosh hai baaqii agar pii kar bahak uthe to mastaanon kaa kyaa hogaa chalenge tiir jab threedots

Title: tum pyaar se dekho ham pyaar se dekhen
Lyrics: mu 	tum pyaar se dekho ham pyaar se dekhen 	jiivan ke andhere men bikhar jaae ujaalaa shaa 	tum pyaar se dekho threedots  mu 	ham tum par jo bhaarii the vo din biit gae hain 	matavaalii dagar pe jo mile miit nae hain shaa 	kushiyon kii lahar aur chaand jod gaii hai 	ham pyaar karane vaalon kii duniyaa hii naii hai 2 mu 	tum pyaar se dekho shaa 	ham pyaar se dekhen do 	jiivan ke andhere threedots ko 	tum pyaar se dekho threedots  mu 	phir aaj dhadakataa huaa dil bol rahaa hai 	phir se kahiin ud jaane ko par khol rahaa hai shaa 	nagarii javaan aramaanon kii ye premanagar hai 	har dil uchhal rahaa hai mohabbat kaa asar hai mu 	tum pyaar se dekho shaa 	ham pyaar se dekhen do 	jiivan ke andhere threedots ko 	tum pyaar se dekho threedots

Title: ai husnpariicheharaa kyon itanii dardamand ho
Lyrics: ai husnpariicheharaa kyon itanii dardamand ho duniyaa kii manzilon par tum hii mujhe pasand ho  shabanam ke dil kii dhadakan mahasuus kar rahii ho tum kitanii narmdil ho aahen sii bhar rahii ho ai husnpariicheharaa threedots  itanaa kyaal koii karataa nahiin kisii kaa tumane badal diyaa hai ruk merii zindagii kaa ai husnpariicheharaa threedots  sab kuchh thaa paas mere lekin na ye kushii thii puurii huii hai tumase jiivan men jo kamii thii ai husnpariicheharaa threedots

Title: mujhe huzuur tum se pyaar hai
Lyrics: printitle  mujhe huzuur tum se pyaar hai  tumhii pe zindagii nisaar hai  mere kariib aa ke dekh lo mujhe gale lagaa ke dekh lo huzuur aazamaake dekh lo nazar kaa tiir dil ke paar hai mujhe huzuur tum se pyaar hai threedots  khushii ke saaz hain chhede hue dilon ke raag hain khule hue sabhii ye husn par lute hue zamaanaa aaj beqaraar hai mujhe huzuur tum se pyaar hai threedots  idhar ye raat kii javaaaniiyaan  udhar tumhaarii meherbaaniyaan banii hai pyaar kii kahaaniiyaan ye raat ek yaadagaar hai mujhe huzuur tum se pyaar hai

Title: koii saagar dil ko behalaataa nahiin
Lyrics: koii saagar dil ko bahalaataa nahiin      2 bekhudii men bhii qaraar aataa nahiin koi saagar threedots  main koi patthar nahiin inasaan huun     2 kaise kah duun gam se ghabaraataa nahiin koi saagar threedots  kal to sab the kaaravaan ke saath saath     2 aaj koi raah dikhalaataa nahiin koi saagar threedots  zindagii ke aaine ko tod do      2 isamen ab kuchh bhii nazar aataa nahiin koi saagar threedots

Title: zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii vo barasaat ki raat
Lyrics: zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii vo barasaat kii raat ek anjaan hasiinaa se mulaakaat kii raat zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii threedots  haay vo reshamii zulfon se barasataa paanii phuul se gaalon pe rukane ko tarasataa paanii dil men tuufaan uthaate hue  dil men tuufaan uthaate hue haalaat kii raat  zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii threedots  dar ke bijalii se achaanak vo lipatanaa usakaa aur phir sharm se balakhaake simatanaa usakaa  kabhii dekhii na sunii aisii ho kabhii dekhii na sunii aisii tilismaat ki raat zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii threedots  surkh aanchal ko dabaakar jo nichodaa usane dil pe jalataa huaa ek tiir saa chhodaa usane  aag paanii men lagaate hue aag paanii men lagaate hue jazabaat ki raat zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii threedots  mere nagmon men jo basati hai vo tasvir thi vo naujavani ke hasin kvaab ki tabir thi vo aasmanon se utar aai thi jo raat ki raat zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii threedots   lataa zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii vo barasaat kii raat ek anjaan musaafir se mulaaqaat kii raat zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii   haay jis raat mere dil ne dhadakanaa siikhaa shokh jazabaat ne siine men bhadakanaa siikhaa merii taqadiir men nikharii huii ho merii taqadiir men nikharii huii saramaat kii raat zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii   dil ne jab pyaar ke rangiin fasaane chhede aankhon aankhon ne vafaaon ke taraane chhede soz men duub gaii aaj vahii soz men duub gaii aaj vahii naghamaat kii raat zindagii bhar nahiin bhuulegii   rafii ruuthanevaalii ruuthanevaalii merii baat pe maayuus naa ho bahake bahake khayaalaat se maayuus naa ho khatma hogii naa kabhii tere ho khatma hogii naa kabhii tere mere saath kii raat zindagii bhar nahiin

Title: dil ko na mere tadapaao ab to hamaare ho jaao
Lyrics: dil ko na mere tadapaao ab to hamaare ho jaao 2  chhodo chalan nafarat kaa rasmemohabbat siikho 2 dil ko dhadak lene do pyaar kii aadat siikho dil jo kisii kaa churaao pyaar ko bhii apanaao ab to hamaare ho threedots  pyaar kii daulat leke laut jo ham jaaenge laakh bulaao phir tum mud ke nahiin aaenge phir vo jhalak dikhalaao aankhon se dil men samaao ab to hamaare ho threedots

Title: mere saajan hain us paar main man maar huun us paar
Lyrics: o re maajhii o re maajhii o o mere maajhii mere saajan hain us paar main man maar huun is paar o mere maajhii abakii baar le chal paar le chal paar mere saajan hain us paarthreedots  ho man kii kitaab se tuu meraa naam hii mitaa denaa gun to na thaa koii bhii avagun mere bhulaa denaa mujhako terii bidaa kaathreedots mujhako terii bidaa kaa mar ke bhii rahataa intazaar mere saajanthreedots  mat khel jal jaaegii kahatii hai aag mere man kii mat khelthreedots mat khel jal jaaegii kahatii hai aag mere man kii main bandinii piyaa kii chir sanginii huun saajan kii meraa khiinchatii hai aanchalthreedots meraa khiinchatii hai aanchal man miit terii har pukaar mere saajan hain us paar o re maajhii o re maajhii o o mere maajhii mere saajan hain us paarthreedots

Title: ab chaar dinon kii chhuttii hai
Lyrics: zamiin kaagaz kii ban jaaye samundar roshanaai kaa bayaan phir bhii na hogaa hamase yah kissaa judaai kaa   chaar dinon kii chhutti hai aur unase jaa kar milanaa hai jis maang ne dil ko maang liyaa us maang men taare bharana hai  ko  ab chaar dinon kii chhutti hai aur unase jaa kar milanaa hai      jis maang ne dil ko maang liyaa us maang men taare bharana hai   dil apanaa abhii se dhadake hai dekhenge unhen to kyaa hogaa ham hosh bhii apane kho denge mastii se bharaa jalavaa hogaa vah saamane ho phir aaye mazaa kuchh kahanaa hai kuchh sunanaa hai  ko  ab chaar dinon kii chhutti hai aur unase jaa kar milanaa hai      jis maang ne dil ko maang liyaa us maang men taare bharana hai   vo bhii to hamaarii raahon men zulfon ko sanvaare aayenge aur phuul chamelii ke gajare khush ho ke hamen pahanaayenge ab chaand kii tarah chamakanaa hai suuraj kii tarah se nikalanaa hai   ko  ab chaar dinon kii chhutti hai aur unase jaa kar milanaa hai      jis maang ne dil ko maang liyaa us maang men taare bharana hai   aankhon men javaan shiqave honge honthon pe hansii laharaayegii saagar se milegii jab nadiyaa tuufaan pe raunak aayegii ab baadal banake barasanaa hai maujon kii tarah se ubharanaa hai  ko  ab chaar dinon kii chhutti hai aur unase jaa kar milanaa hai      jis maang ne dil ko maang liyaa us maang men taare bharana hai   vah hamase kahenge sharamaake parades gaye the kyaa laaye ham unase kahenge jaanejahaan dil apanaa bachaa ke le aaye ab aankh milaao baat karo ham saamane hain kyaa padraa hai  ko  ab chaar dinon kii chhutti hai aur unase jaa kar milanaa hai      jis maang ne dil ko maang liyaa us maang men taare bharana hai

Title: machalatii aarazuu khadii baanhen pasaare
Lyrics: o ho machalatii aarazuu khadii baanhen pasaare o mere saajanaa re dhadakataa dil pukaare aa jaa ho machalatii aarazuu threedots  meraa aanchal pakadpakad ke kah rahaa meraa dil zamaane kii nigaahon se yahaan chhupchhup ke mil yahiin tanhaaii men dil kii kalii jaaegii khil ho machalatii aarazuu threedots  ajab mastii men duubaa giit gaatii hai havaa dupattaa meraa rahrah ke udaatii hai havaa karuun kyaa aatejaate chhed jaatii hai havaa ho machalatii aarazuu threedots  milan ke madabhare chanchal kyaalon men magan main to takatii huun terii raah o mere sajan bahaaron ki lie muntazir jaise chaman ho machalatii aarazuu threedots

Title: mere mahabuub na jaa aaj kii raat na jaa
Lyrics: mere mahabuub na jaa na jaa na jaa mere mahabuub na jaa aaj kii raat na jaa honevaalii hai sahar thodii der aur thahar mere mahabuub na jaa   dekh kitanaa hasiin mausam hai har taraf ek ajiib aalam hai zarre is taraha aaj nikhare hain jaise taare zamiin pe bikhare hain mere mahabuub na jaa   mainne kaate hain intazaar ke din tab kahiin aaye hain bahaar ke din yuun na jaa dil kii shamaa gul karake abhii dekhaa nahiin hai jii bharake mere mahabuub na jaa   jab se zulfon kii chhaanv paaii hai beqaraarii ko niind aaii hai is qayaamat ko yuun hii sone de raat dhalane de subah hone de mere mahabuub na jaa   is tarah pherakar nazar mujhase duur jaaegaa tuu agar mujhase chaandanii se bhii aag barasegii shamaa bhii raushanii ko tarasegii mere mahabuub na jaa   dhadakanon men yahii taraane hain tere rukane ke sau bahaane hain mere dil kii zaraa sadaa sun le pyaasii nazaron kii iltajaa sun le mere mahabuub na jaa

Title: jaake susaraal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa
Lyrics: jaake susaraal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa2 jaake susaraal gorii  saas nanad se ghul mil rahanaa ghul mil rahanaa ek hai maiiyaa ek hai bahanaa ek hai bahanaa rakhanaa kayaal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa jaake susaraal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa jaake susaraal gorii  nain churaanaa jeth susar se jeth susar se dekh chunariyaa dhalake jo sar se dhalake jo sar se lenaa sambhaal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa jaake susaraal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa jaake susaraal gorii  baat badon kii hansakar sahanaa hansakar sahanaa kadave sunakar miithii kahanaa miithii kahanaa banake misaal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa jaake susaraal gorii maike kii laaj rakhanaa jaake susaraal gorii

Title: terii aankh kaa jo ishaaraa na hotaa
Lyrics: terii aankh kaa jo ishaaraa na hotaa to bismil kabhii dil hamaaraa na hotaa terii aankh kaa threedots  agar phuul terii hansii na churaate to bechaare baagon ke dil tuut jaate nazar kii ye mahafil na aabaad hotii bahaaron kaa aisaa nazaaraa na hotaa terii aankh kaa threedots  na hote agar gesuon ke ye saae kahaan jaate ham chot dil kii dabaae mohabbat kii raahon men bhatakate hii rahate terii zulf kaa jo sahaaraa na hotaa terii aankh kaa threedots  teraa saath hai to safar hai suhaanaa terii hii badaulat hasiin hai zamaanaa agar haath men teraa daaman na aataa kahiin bhii hamaaraa guzaaraa na hotaa terii aankh kaa threedots

Title: nainon se nainon kii baat huuii
Lyrics: nainon se nainon kii baat huuii chhupchhup ke tumase mulaaqaat huii nahiin jaan sake tum nahiin jaan sake ham phir bhii ghungharuu ne bol diyaa chhamchhamchham nainon se nainon kii threedots  tum jo mile phuul khile dil ke aramaan hile dharatii gagan donon lage jhuumane nainon se milate hii nayan chalane lagaa mand pavan bhanvar lage kaliyon ko chuumane pahale milan kii ye karaamaat huii chandaa bin puunam kii raat huii nahiin jaan sake tum threedots  chanchal palakon ke tale nazaron ke tiir chale baazii lagii do dilon ke khel kii tum bhii chale ham bhii chale dekh ke sab log jale badhane lagii bel madhur mel kii apanii muhabbat kii shuruaat huii jiit idhar aur udhar maat huii nahiin jaan sake tum threedots

Title: bahaaron thaam lo ab dil meraa mahabuub aataa hai
Lyrics: mu 	bahaaron thaam lo ab dil meraa mahabuub aataa hai la 	ho sharaarat kar na naazuk dil sharam se duub jaataa hai mu 	bahaaron thaam lo ab threedots  la 	qahar andaaz hain tere qayaamat hain terii baaten 	ho merii to jaan le lengii ye baaten ye  mulaaqaaten  2 mu 	sanam sharamaae jab aise mazaa kuchh aur aataa hai la 	ho sharaarat kar na threedots  la 	labon par ye hansii qaatil gazab jaaduu nigaahon men 	qasam tujhako mohabbat kii machal na  aise raahon men  3 mu 	machal jaataa hai dil jab ruubaruu diladaar aataa hai la 	ho sharaarat kar na threedots

Title: lat ulajhii sulajhaa re baalam
Lyrics: lat ulajhii sulajhaa jaa re baalam main naa lagaaungii haath re chaand se mukade ko naagan zulafen chaahe dasen saarii raat re lat ulajhii sulajhaa jaa re baalam threedots  pahle ham ko chhed rahii thii julmii havaa masataanii man kii batiyaan likhane bethii jal gaii ye diivaanii bairan lat kayaa tod sake gii teraa meraa saath re lat ulajhii sulajhaa jaa re baalam threedots  jaise chanchal maujon se jab chandanii milane aae dekh sake na kaari badariyaa chaan d ke aade aae sun o paglii payaar ke dushaman khaa jaate hain maat re lat ulajhii sulajhaa jaa re baalam threedots  aaj ye mere man ko jalaae merii ek na maane kal ye tere bas men hogii baanwarii ye naa jaane re is nutkhat ko sau bal denaa aae jo tere haath re lat ulajhii sulajhaa jaa re baalam threedots

Title: baagon men khilate hain phuul qasam terii
Lyrics: ta 	baagon men khilate hain phuul qasam terii aankhon kii khaa ke 2 la 	aaii samajh men jo bhuul gire tere qadamon men aa ke 2  ta 	 ghuunghat ke piichhe ye ruup saadaa 	badalii men jaise ho chaand aadhaa  2 la 	tum mere sapanon ke natakhat kanhaiyaa 2 	main huun tumhaare kvaabon kii raadhaa ta 	ho baagon men khilate hain threedots  la 	 aankhon men rakhanaa dil men basaanaa 	dharatii ke zarre ko taaraa banaanaa  2 ta 	jiivan kii raahon ke maasuum saathii 2 	terii nazar pe lutaa duun zamaanaa 	o o baagon men khilate hain threedots

Title: ai vatan ai vatan hamako terii qasam
Lyrics: tuu na rona ke tu hai bhagat sinh kii maan  mar ke bhi laal tera maregaa nahiin  dolii chadhake to laate hai dulhan sabhii  hansake har koi phaansii chadhegaa nahiin   jalate bhii gaye kahate bhii gaye  aazaadii ke paravaane  jiinaa to usiikaa jiinaa hai  jo maranaa desh par jaane   jab shahiidon kii dolii uthe dhuum se  deshavaalon tum aansuu bahaanaa nahiin  par manaao jab aazaad bhaarat ka din  us ghadii tum hamen bhuul jaanaa nahiin   ai vatan ai vatan hamako terii qasam  terii rahon main jaan tak lutaa jaayenge  phuul kyaa chiiz hai tere kadamon pe ham  bhent apane saron kii chadhaa jaayenge  ai vatan ai vatan   koii panjaab se koii mahaarashhtr se  koii yuu pii se hai koii bangaal se  terii puujaa kii thaalii men laaye hain ham  phuul har rang ke aaj har daal se  naam kuchh bhii sahii par lagan ek hai  jot se jot dil kii jagaa jaayenge  ai vatan ai vatan threedots  terii jaanib uthii jo kahar kii nazar us nazar ko jhukaa ke hii dam lenge ham terii dharatii pe hai jo kadam gair kaa us kadam kaa nishaan tak mitaa denge ham jo bhii diivaar aayegii ab saamane thokaron se use ham giraa jaayenge

Title: jhuume morii beliyaa priit re
Lyrics: la jhuume morii beliyaa priit re aaye aaye more manamiit re  saare diip raat ke jal uthe lau aap jhuumate aa hii gaye aaj bhiinii havaa ke raag par gaao jhuuum jhuum ab more baavare jhuume morii beliyaa priit re  ma ho jii aao bhii manahar baavare ab jiivan men ruup bhare bhaav liye merii bholii sii aavan priit re gorii jaaye na umar morii biit re aise phuul ras bhare giit re la jhuume morii beliyaa priit re  tum ruup mere bhole praan mere tum prem biin le aao re  ma teraa ruup bhulaa bhii sajaauun main aisii chhab par vaarii vaarii jaauun re la jhuume morii beliyaa priit re aaye aaye more manamiit re ma naache bhuul ras bhare giit re naii naii kar ab diip re  la jhuume morii beliyaa priit re

Title: zubaaneyaarman turkii
Lyrics: terii talaash  mujh ko laaii kahaan kahaan se sun le meraa fasaanaa ab to merii zubaan se main ne vahiin vahiin par sajade kiye hain tujhako zulfon ko tuu udaatii guzarii jahaan jahaan se  iraan ham ne dekhaa dekhaa hai chiin ham ne lekin kahiin naa dekhaa tujh saa hasiin ham ne koii bhii jab na payaa tere muqabale kaa awaaz tujh ko dii hai o naazaniin ham ne  o yaar zulfon vaale diladaar zulfon vaale zulfon ne mujhako maaraa kamdaar zulfon vaale  zubaaneyaarman turkii naa man turkii namii daanam namii daanam namii daanam namii daanam oae zubaaneyaarman turkii  o bevafaa hasiinaa hathon men haath lele kaam aaegaa ye tere diivaanaa saath lele diivaanaa koii mujh saa tujh ko nahiin mile gaa chaae to ik nazar men kul kaaynaat lele o yaar zulfon vaale diladaar zulfon vaale zulfon ne mujhako maaraa kamdaar zulfon vaale zubaaneyaarman turkii  mastii men har qadam par gir kar teraa sanbhalanaa bal khaanaa bankapan se zulfon kaa ye machalanaa main to har ik adaa ko aankhon se chuum luun gaa duniyaa buhat burii hai duniyaa se bachake chalanaa o yaar zulfon vaale diladaar zulfon vaale zulfon ne mujhako maaraa kamdaar zulfon vaale zubaaneyaarman turkii  terii zubaan judaa hai merii zubaan judaa hai par dil ko kayaa karuun men dil tujh pe aa gayaa hai ik ishq hai ki jisakaa mazahab nahiin hai koii har rang aashaqii men ik rang ho gayaa hai o yaar zulfon vaale diladaar zulfon vaale zulfon ne mujhako maaraa kamdaar zulfon vaale diladaar zulfon vaale zubaaneyaarman turkii

Title: nainaa to dukhan laage  chandaa re morii patiyaan le jaa
Lyrics: la 	nainaa to dukhan laage 	chandaa re morii  patiyaan le jaa  2 saajan ko pahunchaa de re 	vo likh sake javaab unhen tuu meraa pataa bataa de re 	chandaa re mu 	chandaa re morii  patiyaa le jaa  2 sajanii ko pahunchaa de re 	vo likh sake javaab threedots  la 	palakon kii hai kalam banaaii kaajal bah kar banii siyaahii 	kaise likhuun kahaanii gam kii tuu hii mujhe bataa de re 	chandaa re threedots  mu 	ham kush hain gam diyaa hai tuune ye ehasaan kiyaa hai tuune 	jahaan raho kush raho merii is duaa kaa asar dikhaa de re 	chandaa re threedots  do 	o aakaash ke sundar darpan tuu hii sajanii tuu hii saajan 	bichhade dilon ko phir se milaa de rotaa chaman hansaa de re 	chandaa re threedots

Title: choriichorii jo tumase milii  ajii ise pyaar kahenge
Lyrics: choriichorii jo tumase milii to log kyaa kahenge ajii ise pyaar kahenge galii galii ye baat chalii to log kyaa kahenge ajii ise pyaar kahenge  teraa khyaal mere dil men jab se aayaa hai qadam sambhalate nahiin aur nashaa saa chhaayaa hai qaraar kho ke hii dil ne qaraar paayaa hai dhiire dhiire ye baat badhii to log kyaa kahenge ajii ise pyaar kahenge threedots  kitanii zaalim ye mulaaqaat huii jisase darate the vahii baat huii badh gaii pyaas tamannaaon kii is tarah pyaar kii barasaat huii qasam tumhaarii mere dil kii baat kah daalii chhodo chhodo ye dillagii ki log kyaa kahenge ajii ise pyaar kahenge threedots

Title: mujhe dardedil kaa pataa na thaa mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye
Lyrics: mujhe dardedil kaa pataa na thaa 	mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye 	main akele yuun bhii maze men thaa  	mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye 	 	yuun hii apane apane safar men gum  	kahiin duur main kahiin duur tum 	kahiin duur tum 	chale jaa rahe the judaa judaa 	mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye 	main akele yuun bhii maze men thaa 	mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye 	 	na main chaand huun kisii shaam kaa 	na chiraag huun kisii baam kaa 	kisii baam kaa 	main to raaste kaa huun ek diyaa 	mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye 	main akele yuun bhii maze men thaa 	mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye 	 	mujhe dardedil kaa pataa na thaa 	mujhe aap kis liye mil gaye

Title: main ne ek kvaab saa dekhaa hai
Lyrics: main ne ek kvaab saa dekhaa hai kaho sun ke sharamaa to nahiin jaaogii nahiin tum se nahiin  main ne dekhaa hai ki phuulon se ladii shaakhon men tum lachakatii huii yuun merii qariib aaii ho jaise muddat se yuun hii saath rahaa ho apanaa jaise ab kii nahiin sadiyon kii shanaasaaii ho  main ne bhii kvaab saa dekhaa hai kaho tum bhii kaho khud se itaraa to nahiin jaaoge nahiin khud se nahiin  main ne dekhaa ki gaate hue jharanon ke qariib apanii betaabiiejazabaat kahii hai tum ne kaanpate honthon se rukatii huii aavaaz ke saath jo mere dil men thii vo baat kahii hai tum ne  aanch dene lagaa qadamon ke tale barf kaa farsh aaj jaanaa ki muhabbat men hai garmii kitanii sangamaramar kii tarah sakt badan men tere aa gayii hai mere chhuu lene se narmii kitanii  ham chale jaate hon aur duur talak koii nahiin sirf patton ke chatakane kii sadaa aatii hai dil men kuchh aise kayaalaat ne karavat lii hai mujh ko tum se nahiin apane se hayaa aatii hai  main dekhaa hai ki kohare se bharii vaadii men main ye kahataa huun chalo aaj kahiin kho jaayen main ye kahatii huun ki khone kii zaruurat kyaa hai odh kar dhundh kii chaadar ko yahiin so jaayen

Title: jannat kii tasviir  kashmiir na denge
Lyrics: jannat kii tasviir na denge haathon men kisii gair ke taqadiir na denge kashmiir hai bhaarat kaa kashmiir na denge  dhamakii se kisii zulm kii ham dar nahiin sakate samajhautaa kisii desh se ham kar nahiin sakate kyaa chhalegaa tuu phuut yah ghar hai kabiir kaa jhagadaa nahiin ho sakataa hai tulasii se miir kaa jo phuul chaman kaa hai chaman men hii khilegaa abdul hii apane desh par mar mitegaa lutane kabhii aazaadii kii jaagiir na denge kashmiir hai bhaarat kaa threedots  parades se tuune hathiyaar mangavaae kalaur se net sebarajet giraae hathiyaaron se kar sakataa nahiin dil pe tuu qabzaa taaqat se badaa desh kii kidamat kaa hai jazbaa gaddaar hai vah hind kaa jo pyaar tujhe de vah aman kaa dushman hai jo hathiyaar tujhe de diivaane ke ham haath men kashmiir na denge kashmiir hai bhaarat kaa threedots

Title: har tarah ke jazbaat kaa ailaan hain aankhen
Lyrics: har tarah ke jazbaat kaa ailaan hain aankhen shabanam kabhii sholaa kabhii tuufaan hain aankhen  aankhon se badii koii taraazuu nahiin hotii 2 tulataa hai bashar jisamen vo miijaan hain aankhen har tarah ke jazbaat threedots   aankhen hii milaatii hain zamaane men dilon ko 2 anajaan hain hamtum agar anajaan hain aankhen har tarah ke jazbaat threedots  lab kuchh bhii kahen isase haqiiqat nahiin khulatii inasaan ke sachjhuuth kii pahachaan hain aankhen har tarah ke jazbaat threedots  aankhen na jhuken terii kisii gair ke aage 2 duniyaa men badii chiiz merii jaan hain aankhen har tarah ke jazbaat threedots  us mulq kii sarahad ko koii chhuu nahiin sakataa 2 jis mulq kii sarahad kii nigehabaan hain aankhen har tarah ke jazbaat threedots

Title: suuraj ke jaisii golaaii  laii laii terii dhuum har kahiin
Lyrics: suuraj ke jaisii golaaii chandaa sii thandak bhii paaii khanake to pyaare duhaaii terii dhuum har kahiin tujhasaa yaar koii nahiin laii laii hamako to pyaare tuu sabase pyaaraa laii laii terii dhuum har kahiin threedots  duniyaa kii gaadii kaa pahiyaa tuu chor tuu hii sipahiyaa raajon kaa raajaa rupaiyaa 2 laii laii terii dhuum har kahiin threedots  aurat ke maathe kaa tiikaa thumarii aur kajarii se miithaa tuu raaz hai zindagii kaa 2 laii laii terii dhuum har kahiin threedots  buudhon kii tuu hii javaanii bachapan kii dilakash kahaanii tere binaa duudh paanii 2 laii laii terii dhuum har kahiin threedots  daulat kaa mazahab chalaa ke ham ek mandir banaa ke puujenge tujhako bithaa ke 2 laii laii terii dhuum har kahiin threedots

Title: bhanvaraa badaa naadaan haay
Lyrics: bhanvaraa badaa naadaan haay bagiyan kaa mehamaan haay phir bhii jaane na jaane na jaane na kaliyan kii musakaan haay bhanvaraa badaa naadaan threedots   kabhii ud jaaye kabhii mandaraaye bhed jiyaa ke khole na saamane aaye nain milaaye  mukh dekhe kuchh bole na vo mukh dekhe kuchh bole na bhanvaraa badaa naadaan haay threedots   akhiyon men rajake chale bach bachake jaise ho koii begaanaa  rahe sang dil ke mile nahiin milake banake rahe vo anjaanaa ho banake rahe vo anjaanaa bhanvaraa badaa naadaan haay threedots   koii jab roke koii jab toke  gun gun karataa bhaage re na kuchh puuchhe na kuchh buujhe  kaisaa anaadii laage re vo kaisaa anaadii laage re bhanvaraa badaa threedots

Title: kalpanaa ke ghana barasate
Lyrics: la kalpanaa ke ghana barasate giit giile ho rahe bhaava rimajhim kar rahe hain svara rasiile ho rahe  naachatiin shyaamal ghataaen thirakatii barasaat hai ma ik kahaanii banake aaii ye suhaanii raat hai jhuumataa phirataa pavan la ho jhuumataa phirataa pavan jhonke nashiile ho rahe kalpanaa ke ghana barasate  la kis pranay ke aag men jal giit gaataa hai pavan 2 giit gaataa hai pavan ma maang bharataa hai dulhan kii motiyon se ye gagan 2 jhuk rahe tere nayan 2 kitane sharmiile ho rahe kalpanaa ke ghana barasate

Title: chhuo na alabele mere sainyaan
Lyrics: sa 	chhuo na chhuo na alabele mere sainyaan 	main to naazuk badan chhuiimuii  mu 	tuu qariib aa na hamen sataa tere ho chuke tujhe dil diyaa sa 	ajii jaao na lalachaao na miithiimiithii baaton se bharamaao na mu 	ho tuu qariib aa threedots  	har nazar madabharii har adaa terii jaaduubharii sa 	rahane do apanii yah jaaduugarii 	ho o ajii jaao na lalachaao threedots  mu 	raat yuun hii dhal na jaae yah ghadii tal na jaae sa 	hamase to puuchho din kaise bitaae 	ajii jaao na lalachaao threedots

Title: tuu ruup kii raanii main choron kaa raajaa
Film: roop ki rani choron ka raja
Lyrics: ta tuu ruup ki rani main choron kaa raajaa      ho teraa meraa pyaar niraalaa  la bas ek najar aur ek muskaan men      jaane tuune kyaa kar daalaa   ta duniyaa men hasiin bhii dekhe hain      vo ruup kahaan jo tujhamen hai 2 la suuraj kii kiran men garamii hai      vo dhuup kahaan jo tujhamen hai  2  ta tuu dharatii kaa taaraa main zaraa aavaaraa     ke teraa meraa threedots  ta baalon men suhaane andhere hain      gaalon pe chamakate savere hain  2  la is dil men ujaale tere hain      haay raam ye nain lutere hain  2  ta tuu chanchal dhaaraa main jhumataa kinaaraa     ke teraa meraa threedots  ta tuu naach ke jis paldam laharaaye      bijalii kii adaa bhii sharamaaye  2  la tuu jhuum ke jis dam muskaaye      kaliyon ko pasiinaa aa jaaye  2  ta tuu priit kii vinaa main nagamaa tihaaraa     ke teraa meraa threedots

Lyrics: vaqt se din aur raat vaqt se kal aur aaj vaqt kii har shah gulaam vaqt kaa har shah pe raaj  vaqt kii paaband hain aate jaate raunake vaqt hai phuulon kii sej vaqt hai kaanton kaa taaj vaqt se din aur raat   threedots  aadamii ko chaahiye vaqt se dar kar rahe kaun jaane kis ghadii vaqt kaa badale mijaaz vaqt se din aur raat   threedots

Title: ham hain nashe men
Lyrics: ham hain nashe men tum ho nashe men aankhen miliin hain usii kaa nashaa hai ham hain nashe men   threedots  kal raat dekhaa thaa alabelaa sapanaa man chaahe baalam ko paayaa thaa apanaa phir main na soyii sapanon men khoyii aahen bhariin hain usii kaa nashaa hai ham hain nashe men   threedots  nashaa pyaar kaa hai umar bhar rahegaa ulfat ke maujon men ye dil bahegaa main ban ke nadiyaa laharaa rahii huun laharen uthiin hain usii kaa nashaa hai ham hain nashe men   threedots

Title: sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door
Lyrics: sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four un hun sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four  yaad hai tujhe chaupatii kaa vo footpath huii thii hamaarii jahaan pahalii mulaaqaat dekhuun zaraa tuu hai vo hii yaa hai koii aur sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four un hun sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four  main huun teraa husband tuu hai merii wife yahii afasos to rahegaa saarii life   ain kyaa kahaa sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four un hun sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four  yaad hai tujhe vo meraa kaantod taan kaun thaa kahegaa vo thii murge kii baang tuune usii baang pe kahaa thaa once more sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four un hun sun gorii khol zaraa ghuunghat kaa door hone bhii de zaraa akhiyaan four

Lyrics: jiivan ke doraahe pe khade sochate hain ham jaaen to kidhar jaaen 2 taane hai dil idhar ko to khiinche udhar qadam jaaen to kidhar threedots  tere sivaa duniyaa men koii  nahiin apanaa  2 kyaa jaagate kyaa sote dekhaa  teraa sapanaa  2 ab aise tuu aankhon men hai jaise koii bharam jaaen to kidhar threedots  har mod pe detaa hai ye  sansaar duhaaii  2 har gaam pe detaa hai meraa  pyaar duhaaii  2 is raaste mandir hai to us raaste dharam jaaen to kidhar threedots

Title: saanuun nahar vaale pul te bulaa ke
Lyrics: saanuun nahar vaale pul te bulaa ke te kaure maahii kitthe rah gayaa saadii akkhaan vicchon niindaraan udaa ke te kaure maahii kitthe rah gayaa  udadaa dupattaa meraa malamal daa dil utte zor channaan naiin chaladaa aaven te manaavaangii main hath jod ke maahii ve tuun gussaa kitaa kahdii gal daa saade peraan vich bediyaan paa ke te kaure maahii kitthe rah gayaa  thak gaii paaniyaan nuun punpun ke gallaan ais dil diyaan sunsun ke daahdaa saanuun kitaa ai tuun tang sajanaan badale lavaangii taithon chunchun ke saanuun pyaar vaalii paudii te chadhaa ke te kaure maahii kitthe rah gayaa  rut tere pyaar vaalii rangrang dii dil tainuun chum daa te akh sang dii mul kahdaa payaa ve tuun saade pyaar daa har vaile teriyaan main kairaan mangadii saanuun pyaar de pulekhe vich paa ke te kaure maahii kitthe rah gayaa

Title: vo aae ghar hamaare  churaa ke dil ban rahe hain bhole
Lyrics: vo aae ghar hamaare kudaa kii qudarat hai kabhii ham unako kabhii apane ghar ko dekhate hain  churaa ke dil ban rahe hain bhole  jaise kuchh  2 jaanate nahiin koii bataao ki ham karen kyaa vo hamen pahachaanate nahiin churaa ke dil threedots  abhii chand roz pahale pahalii mulaaqaat men vo kuchh kah rahe the hamase haath le ke haath men daal gae jaaduu haay jaaduu baatbaat men churaa ke dil threedots  aaj bhii suruur chhaayaa kal bhii suruur thaa itanaa saa farq lekin kahane ko zaruur thaa kal piine vaalaa mayaqade se duurduur thaa churaa ke dil threedots  vo bhii ek raat pyaar kii ye bhii ek raat hai aur hii thii baat tab aaj aur baat hai jaane vo kahaan hai jo yahaan mere saath hai churaa ke dil threedots

Title: raftaa raftaa vo hamaare dil ke armaan ho gae
Lyrics: raftaa raftaa vo hamaare dil ke armaan ho gae pahale jaan phir jaanejaan phir jaanejaanaan ho gae raftaa raftaathreedots  raftaa raftaa vo merii taskiin kaa saamaan ho gae pahale dil phir dilrubaa phir dil ke mehamaan ho gae raftaa raftaathreedots  raftaa raftaa un kii aankhon kaa nashaa badhane lagaa  pahale may phir maikadaa phir may kaa tuufaan ho gae raftaa raftaa threedots  raftaa raftaa husn nikharaa aur nikharataa hii gayaa pahale gul phir gulbadan phir gul badaamaan ho gae raftaa raftaa threedots

Lyrics: la 	bol merii taqadiir men kyaa hai mere hamasafar ab to bataa 	jiivan ke do pahaluu hain hariyaalii aur raastaa mu 	kahaan hai mere pyaar kii manzil tuu batalaa tujhako hai pataa 	jiivan ke do threedots  la 	jahaan ham aa ke pahunche hain vahaan se lautakar jaanaa 	nahiin mumakin magar mushkil hai duniyaa se bhii takaraanaa 2 mu 	tere lie ham kuchh bhii sahenge teraa dard ab dard meraa 	jiivan ke do threedots la 	bol merii taqadiir threedots  	jahaan jis haal men bhii hon rahenge ham tumhaare hii 	nadii saagar se milatii hai nahiin milate kinaare hii 2 mu 	apanaaapanaa hai ye muqaddar aaj karen ham kisase gilaa 	jiivan ke do threedots 	kahaan hai mere threedots

Title: tuu hii hai meraa sahaaraa
Lyrics: anganaa men suuraj muskaayaa godii men svagr utar aayaa sab kuchh kho ke tujhe paayaa tuu hii hai meraa saharaa   threedots  merii andhiyaarii raaton men tuu chamakaa banake diyaa re saare sahaare tuute tab tuune janam liyaa re jhuume maan kaa jiyaa re ab dukhadon kaa ant aayaa patajhad men bhii basant aayaa sab kuchh khoke tujhe paayaa tuu hii hai meraa sahaaraa   threedots  laal mere pratipaal mere ab terii aas lagaauun nanhii nanhii haathon men tere apane haath thamaauun man ko dhiir bandhaauun jiivan saagar laharaayaa banake kinaaraa tuu aayaa sab kuchh khoke tujhe paayaa tuu hii hai meraa sahaaraa   threedots

Title: gar tum bhulaa na doge
Lyrics: gar tum bhulaa na doge sapane ye sach hii honge hamtum judaa na honge hamtum judaa na honge  2  maalik ne apane haathon jis dam hamen banaayaa daalii dilon men dhadakan aur dil se dil milaayaa phir pyaar kaa farishtaa duniyaa men le ke aayaa  gar tum bhulaa na doge sapane ye sach hii honge hamtum judaa na honge hamtum judaa na honge  jiivan ke har safar men ham saath hii rahenge duniyaa kii har dagar par ham saath hii chalenge ham saath hii jiyenge ham saath hii marenge   gar tum bhulaa na doge sapane ye sach hii honge hamtum judaa na honge hamtum judaa na honge  2

Title: tumhen aur kyaa duun main dil ke sivaa
Lyrics: tumhen aur kyaa duun main dil ke sivaa tumako hamaarii umar lag jaae 2 tumhen aur kyaa threedots  muraaden hon puurii saje har tamannaa muhabbat kii duniyaa ke tum chaand bananaa bahaaron kii manzil pe hansanaahansaanaa kushii men hamaarii bhii aavaaz sunanaa kabhii zindagii men koii gam na aae tumako hamaarii umar threedots  mujhe jo kushii hai tumhen kyaa bataauun bhalaa dil kii dhadakan ko kaise chhupaauun kahiin ho na jaauun kushii se main paagal tumhen dekh kar aur bhii muskaraauun kudaa dilajalon kii nazar se bachaae tumako hamaarii umar threedots  sitaaron se uunchaa ho rutabaa tumhaaraa bano tum har ik zindagii kaa sahaaraa tumhen jisase ulfat ho mil jaae tumako samajh lo hamaarii duaa kaa ishaaraa muqaddar tumhaaraa sadaa jagamagaae tumako hamaarii umar threedots

Title: aankhon aankhon men har ik raat guzar jaatii hai
Lyrics: aankhon aankhon men har ik raat guzar jaatii hai	2 tum nahiin aate ho to yaad bhii kyon aatii hai aankhon aankhon men har ik raat guzar jaatii hai  ham khayaalon men bulaa lete hain aksar tumako	2 jab tabiiyat zaraa tanahaaii se ghabaraataa hai		2 aankhon aankhon men har ik raat guzar jaatii hai  har ik aahat pe yuun ham chaunk uthaa karate hain	2 jis tarahaa bijalii ghataaon men chamak jaatii hai tum nahiin aate ho to yaad bhii kyon aatii hai aankhon aankhon men har ik raat guzar jaatii hai

Title: zindagii seharaa bhii hai aur zindagii gulashan bhii hai
Lyrics: zindagii seharaa bhii hai aur zindagii gulashan bhii hai 2  pyaar men kho jaaoge  2 zindagii madhuban bhii hai zindagii seharaa bhii threedots  raat mit jaatii hai hotaa hai savere kaa janam dhiiredhiire tuut jaataa hai andheron kaa bhii dam  hansate suuraj kii tarah se  2 zindagii roshan bhii hai zindagii seharaa bhii threedots  paar utaregaa vahii khelegaa jo tuufaanon se mushqilen daratii rahii hain naujavaan insaanon se  mil hii jaaenge sahaare  2 zindagii daaman bhii hai zindagii seharaa bhii threedots

Title: ek savaal main karuun ek savaal tum karo
Lyrics: ek savaal main karuun ek savaal tum karo har savaal kaa savaal hii javaab ho ek savaal main karuun   threedots  pyaar kii belaa saath sajan kaa phir kyon dil ghabaraaye naiihar se ghar jaatii dulhan kyon nainaa chhalakaaye hai maaluum ki jaanaa hogaa duniyaan ek saraay phir kyon jaate vaqt musaafir roye aur rulaaye      phir kyon jaate vaqt musaafir roye aur rulaaye ek savaal main karuun   threedots  chaand ke maathe daag hai phir bhii chaand ko laaj na aaye usakaa ghatataa badhataa cheharaa kyon sundar kahalaaye kaajal se nainon kii shobhaa kyon dugunii ho jaaye gore gore gaal pe kaalaa til kyon man ko bhaaye      gore gore gaal pe kaalaa til kyon man ko bhaaye ek savaal main karuun   threedots  gaa gaa gaa re gaa re   threedots  ujiyaare men jo parachhaaii piichhe piichhe aaye vahii andheraa hone par kyon saath chhod chhup jaaye sukh men kyon ghere rahate hain apane aur paraaye burii ghadii men kyon har koii dekh ke bhii qataraaye      burii ghadii men kyon har koii dekh ke bhii qataraaye ek savaal main karuun   threedots

Title: zindagii mujhako dikhaa de raastaa
Lyrics: zindagii mujhako dikhaa de raastaa 2 tujhako merii hasaraton kaa vaastaa 2 zindagii mujhako dikhaa threedots  bojh gam kaa chalaa jaataa nahiin bebasii kaa dukh sahaa jaataa nahiin saaraa aalam ajanabii hai kyaa karuun 2 ulajhanon men kuchh nazar aataa nahiin o zindagii mujhako dikhaa threedots  mayakadaa jaauun merii aadat nahiin haath phailaanaa merii fitarat nahiin ab chalaa huun to manzil paauungaa 2 main nahiin yaa ab merii qismat nahiin o zindagii mujhako dikhaa threedots

Title: suno bhaaii hamane pii lii hai thodii
Film: roop ki rani choron ka raja
Lyrics: suno bhaaii hamane pii lii hai thodii 2 duniyaa kii baaton kii parawaa chhodii chaand aur taaron se mastii nichodii suno bhaaii hamane pii lii hai thodii 2  rahate hain ham to aazaad gam se 2 duniyaa waale darate hain ham se maanaa bure hain par dil to badaa hai hamane gariibon se taqadiir jodii suno bhaaii hamane pii lii hai thodii suno bhaaii hamane thodii sii pii hai  gaataa hai gaane dil kaa ye baajaa haa haa haa haa hii hii hii hii gaataa hai gaane dil kaa ye baajaa apanii hii dhun ke ham to hain raajaa laakhon tuufaan takaraae hamase jiine kii phir bhii aas na chhodii  suno bhaaii hamane pii lii hai thodii 2 duniyaa kii baaton kii parawaa chhodii chaand aur taaron se mastii nichodii suno bhaaii hamane pii lii hai thodii 2

Title: chadhe chandaa to tum bhii chale aanaa
Lyrics: la 	chadhe chandaa to tum bhii chale aanaa sajan tumhen pyaar kii qasam mu 	jahaan bolo diivaanaa chalaa aae ki dilebeqaraar kii qasam  	tere hii dam se to phuulon pe nikhaar hai 	tuu hai agar to kizaaon men bahaar hai la 	ulfat kii raahon men mahakii fizaaon men 	aa jaanaa chupake se jhuumake balam 	chadhe chandaa to tum threedots  la 	aajaa main baithii huun sapane sajaa ke 	rakhuungii dil men tujhako bithaa ke mu 	jab tak ye taare hain ham to tumhaare hain 	tujhape lutaa denge jaan bhii sanam 	jahaan bolo diivaanaa chalaa threedots  mu 	dil jo diyaa hai to kyaa paradaa jahaan se la 	mitanaa hii hai to mitenge badii shaan se mu 	hogaa jo honaa hai la 	kaahe kaa ronaa hai mu 	hans ke hii sahane hain pyaar ke sitam la 	chadhe chandaa to tum threedots

Title: dil kii mahafil sajii hai chale aaie
Lyrics: dil kii mahafil sajii hai chale aaie 2 aapakii bas kamii hai chale aaie dil kii mahafil threedots  husn vaalon kaa koii bharosaa nahiin kyaa aptaa aap aate bhii hain yaa nahiin 2 aankh dar pe lagii hai chale aaie dil kii mahafil threedots  dil dukhaane lagii dillagii aapakii maar daalegii ye berukii aapakii 2 jaan par ban gaii hai chale aaie dil kii mahafil threedots  kyaa suhaanaa samaan kyaa hasiin raat hai vaadaa kar ke na aanaa burii baat hai 2 ab to had ho chukii hai chale aaie dil kii mahafil threedots

Title: mast aankhon men sharaarat kabhii aisii to na thii
Lyrics: mast aankhon men mast aankhon men sharaarat kabhii aisii to na thii 2 yuunhii sharamaane kii aadat kabhii aisii to na thii 2  ho koii bijalii hai ki nasnas men jo laharaatii hai mujhe kyaa jaane kahaan le ke udii jaatii hai 2 shok angadaaii qayaamat kabhii aisii to na thii 3  dil dhadakataa hai to chehare pe nikhaar aataa hai wo to wo hai use apane pe pyaar aataa hai 2 jaisii ab hai merii haalat kabhii aisii to na thii 3  ho bahakiibahakii huii nazaron kaa salaam aataa hai dilebetaab thahar unakaa payaam aataa hai 2 hai jo ab mujhape inaayat kabhii aisii to na thii 3  mast aankhon men mast aankhon men sharaarat kabhii aisii to na thii

Title: saiyaan le gaii jiyaa terii pahalii nazar
Lyrics: saiyaan le gaii jiyaa terii pahalii nazar 2 kaisaa jaaduu kiyaa tuune mope o jaaduugar saiyaan le gaii threedots   pahale lagat ik sapanaa saa ab to lagat mohe apanaa saa  2 le chal haath pakad ke sajanaa chaahe jidhar saiyaan le gaii threedots   aa gaii balam terii baaton men kyaa hai na jaane terii aankhon men  2 bhuul gaii main pyaar men tere apanii dagar saiyaan le gaii threedots   jaanuun ki tuu harajaaii hai sochuun kyuun aankh milaaii hai  2 lekin tujhako dekh rahii naa apanii kabar saiyaan le gaii threedots

Title: jhanak jhanak torii baaje paayaliyaa
Lyrics: lyricshasrat  jhanak jhanak torii baaje paayaliyaa priit ke giit sunaaye paayaliyaa  rang mahal aur rain suhaanii chham chham naache mast javaanii main laharon men khoyaa jaauun aisii dhuum machaaye paayaliyaa  ye kajaraarii chanchal ankhiyaan honth gulaabii phuul kii patiyaan lat bikhare to gaal pe thahare hosh jiyaa ke udaaye paayaliyaa  indradhanush saa loch kamariyaa brindaaban kii jaise gujariyaa baanvarii ras pe kar de jaaduu aag men aag lagaaye paayaliyaa

Title: aa haa haa phuulon tale ham tum se mile
Lyrics: aa haa haa haaa o ho ho hoa aa haa haa haa  aa haa haa phuulon tale ham tum se mile yuun uthe qadam jaise koii piike chale haay uthe qadam jaise koii piike chale aa haa haa phuulon tale  dekho merii duniyaa aaj kitanii hasiin hai 2 hosh kahiin hai dil zaalim kahiin hai 2 kalii kalii hamko dekhe aankhen male yuun uthe qadam jaise koii piike chale  aa haa haa phuulon tale threedots  jab se tum aaye merii zindagii men 2 haal na puuchho meraa bekudii men 2 dhalaa mere sar se aanchal gesuu khule yuun uthe qadam jaise koii piike chale  aa haa haa phuulon tale threedots  milii hain nigaahen pyaar kaa jaam leke 2 kho gaye ham teraa naam leke 2 hamen ab sanbhaale koii ham to chale yuun uthe qadam jaise koii piike chale  aa haa haa phuulon tale threedots

Title: parde men rahane do pardaa na uthaao
Lyrics: padre men rahane do padraa na uthaao padraa jo uth gayaa to bhed khul jaayegaa allaah merii taubaa allaah merii taubaa   threedots  mere padre men laakh jalave hain kaise mujhase nazar milaaoge jab zaraa bhii naqaab uthaauungii yaad rakhanaa kii jal hii jaaoge padre men rahane do padraa na uthaao   threedots  husn jab benaqaab hotaa hai vo samaan laajavaab hotaa hai khud ko khud kii khabar nahiin rahatii hosh vaalaa bhii hosh khotaa hai padre men rahane do padraa na uthaao   threedots  haay jisane mujhe banaayaa hai vo bhii mujhako samajh na paayaa hai mujhako sajade kiye hain insaan ne in farishton ne sar jhukaayaa hai padre men rahane do padraa na uthaao   threedots

Title: maayuus to huun vaade se tere kuchh aas nahiin
Film: barsaat ki raat the rainy nights saathi
Lyrics: maayuus to huun vaade se tere kuchh aas nahiin kuchh aas bhii hai main apane kyaalon ke sadake tuu paas nahiin aur paas bhii hai maayuus to huun threedots  hamane to kushii maangii thii magar jo tuune diyaa achchhaa hii diyaa jis gam kaa taaalluuq ho tujhase vo raas nahiin aur raas bhii hai main apane kyaalon ke threedots  palakon se larajate ashqon se tasviir jhalakatii hai terii 2 diidaar kii pyaasii aankhon ko ab pyaas nahiin aur pyaas bhii hai main apane kyaalon ke threedots

Title: sambhal to le dil diiwaanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa
Lyrics: thahar jaanaa sambhal to le dil diwaanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa 2 abhii na saamane aanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa sambhal to le  main guzarii umr ko vaapas zaraa pukaar to luun main apane aap ko thodaa bahut sanwaar to luun libaas gam kaa nigaahon se main utaar to luun samaan to ho le suhaanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa abhii na saamane aanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa sambhal to le  kushii bhii itanii achaanak main sah na paauungii main apane aap men bas aaj rah na paauungii jo tum se kahanaa hai mujhako wo kah na paauungii main yaad kar luun fasaanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa abhii na saamane aanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa sambhal to le dil diwaanaa zaraa thahar jaanaa sambhal to le

Title: salaam aapakii miithii nazar ko salaam
Lyrics: salaam aapakii miithii nazar ko salaam kiyaa hamape jaaduu asar ko salaam o salaam salaam salaam salaam aapakii miithii threedots  kudaa bhii kyaalon men laayaa hai tumako kud haathon se apane banaayaa hai tumako falaq ne bhii dil men bithaayaa hai tumako hamaarii zamiin pe bhii laayaa hai tumako salaam o sunaharii sahar ko salaam o salaam threedots  ye bhiigaa saa mausam fizaa jhuumatii hai havaa mere dil ko masalane lagii hai nazar kyaa milii zindagii mil gaii hai merii raah men chaandanii khil gaii hai kiyaa hamape jaaduu threedots  ye jii chaahataa hai na jaauun yahaan se ye ghar aapakaa kam nahiin aasamaan se huaa main tumhaaraa aur aayaa kahaan se mujhe to mohabbat milii hai yahaan se salaam aapake sangedar ko salaam kiyaa hamape jaaduu threedots

Title: abhii na paradaa giraao thaharo
Lyrics: abhii na paradaa giraao thaharo ki daastaan aage aur bhii hai ki ishq guzaraa hai ik jahaan se ik jahaan aage aur bhii hai  abhii to tuutii hai kachchii mittii abhii to bas jism hii gire hain abhii kaii baar maranaa hogaa abhii to ehasaas jii rahe hain  abhii na paradaa giraao thaharo threedots  dilon ke bhatake hue musaafir abhii bahut duur tak chalenge kahiin to anjaam ke siron se ye justajuu ke sire milenge  abhii na paradaa giraao thaharo threedots

Title: mile na phuul to kaanton se dostii kar lii
Lyrics: mile na phuul to kaanton se dostii kar lii isii tarah se basar hamane zindagii kar lii  ab aage jo bhii ho anjaam dekhaa jaaegaa kudaa talaash liyaa aur bandagii kar lii  nazar milii bhii na thii aur unako dekh liyaa zabaan khulii bhii na thii aur baat bhii kar lii  vo jinako pyaar hai chaandii se ishq sone se vahii kahenge kabhii hamane kudakashii kar lii

Title: dekho bijalii dole bin baadal kii
Lyrics: dekho bijalii dole bin baadal kii 2 chamcham chamake maathe kii bindiyaa chhananchhanan dhun paayal kii dekho bijalii dole threedots  rang rupahalaa jalave sunahare 2 thaharen to kaise pag nahiin thaharen jhalak dikhaate hue kaii bal khaae daare nazar halkiihalkii dekho bijalii dole threedots  giratiisambhalatii chalii matavaarii 2 hans ke uchhal padii jaise chingaarii girii kab dil pe gaii kab dil se duniyaa rahii re ankhiyaan malatii dekho bijalii dole threedots

Title: ai dil ab kahiin na jaa
Lyrics: ai dil ab kahiin na jaa na kisii kaa main na koii meraa  jab chale ham raah ulajhii pyaar duniyaa ne kiyaa raah siidhii jab milii to sab ne thukaraa diyaa ai dil   threedots  na kisii ko chaah merii na kisii ko intazaar kis liye phir mud ke piichhe dekhanaa baarbaar ai dil   threedots

Title: o ho o o o dharatii kahe pukaar ke
Lyrics: o ho o o o dharatii kahe pukaar ke o mujhako chaahane vaale kisalie baithaa haar ke meraa sab kuchh usii kaa hai jo chhuu le mujhako pyaar se dharatii kahe threedots   hai ajab sii baat jis par  2 mujhako hansanaa aae jo mujhii se hai vo merii maatii se sharamaae aa paas mere matavaale bharam ye kyon bekaar ke meraa sab kuchh usii threedots  hal chale ek haath se ik haath kalam ko thaame phir shiish jhukenge saare hii sansaar ke meraa sab kuchh usii threedots

Title: merii pyaarii binduu
Lyrics: mere bhole balam mere pyaare balam meraa jiivan tere binaa o mere piyaa hai vo diyaa jisamen tel na ho ke jisame tel na ho threedots meraa jiivan tere binaa vo ek baag hai bahaar jisase hatakar guzare duur duur se guzare threedots o mujhe apanaa banaa le o bhole apanaa banaa le haay re bhole apanaa bana le haay tere kadamon men meraa pyaar meraa sansaar merii kismat hai mujhe apanaa banaa le     2 		  merii pyaarii bindu merii bholii bindu merii matherii bindu merii sinduurii bindu merii bindurii bindu  merii prem kii naiyaa biich bhanvar men gud gud gote khaae jhatpat paar lagaa de jhatpat paar lagaa de threedots  terii baiyaan gale men daal ban jaa mere gale kaa haar jhuule prem hindole o jhuule prem hindole  mere jiivan kii aashaa padh le mere nainon kii bhaashhaa mujhe man men basaa le pal pal palakon men chhupaa le threedots  tuu jhatpat aakar chhatpat mere andhe kuen men diip jalaa ke kar de ujaalaa o zaraa kar de ujaalaa threedots  bindu reeee bindu reee bindu reee threedots

Title: saaraa moraa kajaraa chhudaayaa tuune
Lyrics: aa 	saaraa moraa kajaraa chhudaayaa tuune 	garavaa se kaise lagaayaa tuune 	o rasiyaa manbasiyaa ra 	tiikhaatiikhaa kajaraa lagaayaa tuune 	kaahe ko jaaduu jagaayaa tuune 	o sajanii sukhrajanii aa 	o rasiyaa manbasiyaa  	tuune pyaas bujhaa ke naii aas jagaa ke 	moraa angang tadapaayaa ra 	kahe saaraa zamaanaa mohe teraa diivaanaa 	teraa ruup sahaa nahiin jaae aa 	saaraa moraa kajaraa threedots  	huii priit puraanii huii terii diivaanii ra 	hue nayan rasiile hue honth gulaabii 	adaa bhii sharaabii

Title: tumhen zindagii ke ujaale mubaarak andhere hamen
Lyrics: tumhen zindagii ke ujaale mubaarak andhere hamen aaj raas aa gae hain tumhen paa ke ham kud se duur ho gae the tumhen chhodakar apane paas aa gae hain tumhen zindagii ke threedots  tumhaarii vafaa se shiqaayat nahiin hai nibhaanaa to koii ravaayat nahiin hai jahaan tak qadam aaa sake aa gae hain andhere hamen aaj threedots  chaman se chale hain ye ilzaam lekar bahut jii lie ham teraa naam lekar muraadon kii manzil se duur aa gae hain andhere hamen aaj threedots

Title: bandaa paravar thaam lo jigarphir vahii dil laayaa huun
Lyrics: bandaa paravar thaam lo jigar ban ke pyaar phir aayaa huun kidamat men aapake huzuur phir vahii dil laayaa huun  jis kii tadap se rukh pe tumhaare aayaa nikhaar gazab kaa jisake lahuu se aur bhii chamakaa rang tumhaare lab kaa gesuu khule zanjiir bane aur bhii tum tasaviir bane aainaa diladaar kaa nazaraanaa pyaar kaa phir vahii dil laayaa huun   threedots  merii nigaaheshauq se bachakar yaar kahaan jaaoge paanv jahaan rakh doge adaa se dil ko vahiin paaoge jaauun kahiin ye kayaal kahaan rahuun judaa ye majaal kahaan aainaa diladaar kaa nazaraanaa pyaar kaa phir vahii dil laayaa huun   threedots

Title: tel maalish buut paalish
Lyrics: mu 	tel maalish buut paalish 	ek aanaa buut paalish do aanaa tel maalish  	gaadhe pasiine kii ye apanii kamaaii hai 	naa to kisii kii chorii naa koii siinaazorii 	haathon se rotii jo kamaaii hai to khaaii hai ko 	ek aanaa buut paalish threedots  	bangale men rahate nahiin rahate hain chaal men 	kush hii rahe hain yaaron rahen jis haal men 	phaaqe bhii kaate par maangii nahiin paaii hai ko 	ek aanaa buut paalish threedots  	laakhon kii tamannaa hai na mahalon kaa kyaal hai 	subahshaam rotii mile itanaa savaal hai 	to bhii na jiine de ye duniyaa duhaaii hai ko 	ek aanaa buut paalish threedots  	duniyaa men chhotaa nahiin koii chhote kaam se 	chhotaa hai jo pet bhare kisii khote kaam se 	haathon kii mehanat men kaun sii buraaii hai ko 	ek aanaa buut paalish threedots

Title: mere tuute hue dil se koii to aaj ye puuchhe
Lyrics: mere tuute hue dil se koii to aaj ye puuchhe ke teraa haal kyaa hai ke teraa haal kyaa hai mere tuutethreedots  kismat terii riit niraalii o chhaliye ko chhalane vaalii phuul khilaa to tuutii daalii jise ulafat samajh baithaa merii nazaron kaa dhokhaa thaa kisii kii kyaa khataa hai mere tuutethreedots  maangii muhabbat paaii judaaii duniyaa mujhako raas na aaii pahale kadam par thokar khaaii sadaa aazaad rahate the hamen maaluum hii kyaa thaa muhabbat kyaa balaa hai mere tuutethreedots

Title: tum laakh chhupaanaa chaahoge par pyaar chhupaa naa paaoge
Lyrics: ra 	tum laakh chhupaanaa chaahoge par pyaar chhupaa naa paaoge 	kachche dhaage se bandhe sarakaar chale aaoge 2 la 	tum laakh jataanaa chaahoge par pyaar jataa naa paaoge 	dil ko thaame haathon se kaamosh chale aaoge  ra 	tumhaare chehare kii rangat to ye bataatii hai 	kisii kii yaad tumhen har ghadii sataatii hai 	yah ulajheulajhe baal muhabbat kaa raaz kahate hain 	kamal se nain kyaalon men duube rahate hain 	tumhaarii chaal men shokii hai aur sharaarat hai 	zaruur tumako kisii na kisii se ulfat hai 	lo raaz khul gayaa ab kis lie chhupaate ho 	zamaanaa jaan gayaa hamako kyon banaate ho 	tum laakh chhupaanaa threedots  la 	tumhaare honthon pe har baat kaanp jaaegii 	lagii ye dil kii zubaan par kabhii na aaegii 	bataao kaise jataaoge pyaar phir apanaa 	na hogaa puuraa kabhii aarazuu kaa ye sapanaa 	tumhen yah pyaar kii hasarat bahut sataaegii 	kabhii rulaaegii tumako kabhii hansaaegii 	hamaare kuuche men aashiq hazaar aate hain 	magar jo aate hain vo hosh bhuul jaate hain 	tum laakh chhupaanaa threedots  ra 	hamaare hizr men tumako na niind aaegii 	akelaa paa ke judaaii tumhen sataaegii 	ham apanii aah se patthar ko mom karate hain 	ham apane pyaar se gulashan men rang bharate hain 	hamaaraa jazbaaemohabbat ye rang laaegaa 	tumhaare dar se tumhen badh ke khiinch laaegaa 	gulon kii qaid men kushbuu to ruk nahiin sakatii 	isii tarah qaid muhabbat chhup nahiin sakatii 	tum laakh chhupaanaa threedots

Title: tarkeulfat kaa silaa paa bhii liyaa hai main ne
Lyrics: tarkeulfat kaa silaa paa bhii liyaa hai main ne ab to aajaa ke tujhe yaad kiyaa hai main ne ab to aa jaa  aa sakii terii judaaii na kabhii raas mujhe2 tujh se bichhadaa to ye hone lagaa ehasaas mujhe apane haathon se koii zahar piyaa hai main ne ab to aa jaa  gunagunaatii hai vafaa ruuh men rimjhim kii tarah2 saamane apane khadaa huun kisii mujarim kii tarah aaj to sharam se muunh dhaanp liyaa hai main ne ab to aa jaa  jo bhii shikavaa hai bhulaanaa hii padegaa tujhako2 ik na ik roz to aanaa hii padegaa tujhako dil ka daravaazaa khulaa chhod diyaa hai main ne ab to aajaa ke tujhe yaad kiyaa hai main ne ab to aa jaa

Title: qariib aa ye nazar phir mile mile naa mile
Lyrics: qariib aa ye nazar phir mile mile naa mile ye aarazuu kaa chaman phir khile khile na khile qariib aa ye nazar threedots  bhatak rahii huun sadiyon se terii raahon men panaah de kisii ghaayal ko apanii baanhon men ye dil kaa zakm kabhii phir phir khile khile naa khile qariib aa ye nazar threedots  taras rahaa hai ye dil terii ik nazar ke lie bas ek nazar terii kaafii hai umr bhar ke lie nazar se pyaar jataa lab hile hile naa hile qariib aa ye nazar threedots  nazar uthaa ke tere saamane bahaar khadii koii hasiinaa nigaahon men le ke pyaar khadii phir is adaa kii kalii khile khile naa khile qariib aa ye nazar threedots

Title: terii aankh ke aansuu pii jaauun aisii merii taqadiir kahaan
Lyrics: teraa gamakvaar huun lekin main tujh tak aa nahiin sakataa main apane naam terii bekasii likhavaa nahiin sakataa  terii aankh ke aansuu pii jaauun aisii merii taqadiir kahaan tere gam men tujhako bahalaauun aisii merii taqadiir kahaan  ai kaash jo mil kar rote kuchh dard to halake hote bekaar na jaate aansuu kuchh daag jigar ke dhote phir ranj na hotaa itanaa hai tanahaai men jitanaa ab jaane ye rastaa gam kaa hai aur bhii lambaa kitanaa haalaat kii ulajhan sulajhaauun aisii merii taqadiir kahaan terii aankh ke aansuu pii jaauun  kyaa terii zulf kaa leharaa hai ab tak vohii sunaharaa kyaa ab tak tere dar pe detii hen havaaen paharaa lekin hai ye khaamokhayaalii terii zulf banii hai savaalii mohataaj hai ek kalii kii ik roz thii phuulon vaalii vo zulfen pareshaan mahakaauun aisii merii taqadiir kahaan terii aankh ke aansuu pii jaauun

Title: zaraa sii baat pyaar kii zubaan se nikal gayii
Lyrics: zaraasii baat pyaar kii zubaan se nikal gaii huzuur kyaa khataa huii nigaah kyon badal gaii  zaraa idhar to dekhie nigaahen to milaaie  ye narm honth is tarah na daanton men dabaaie  ye honth kyaa dabe yahaan to jaan hii nikal gaii  huzuur kyaa khataa huii nigaah kyon badal gaii   hamaare pyaar kaa javaab gairon ko na diijie  zaraa sanbhal ke baithie pasiinaa ponchh liijie  ye aap kyaa chale yahaan chhuriisii dil pe chal gaii huzuur kyaa khataa huii nigaah kyon badal gaii   zaraa shariif ladakiyon se baat karanaa siikhie phir usake baad aaiine men apanii shaql dekhie hamaare mehamaan the to baat aake tal gaii nahiin to log puuchhate ki shaql kyon badal gayii

Title: dil jo naa kah sakaa vahii raazedil kahane kii raat
Lyrics: dil jo naa kah sakaa vohii raazedil kahane kii raat aai dil jo naa kah sakaa  taubaa ye kis ne anjuman sajaa ke tukade kiye hain gunchaevafaa ke  2 uchhaalo gulon ke tukade ke rangiin fizaaon men rahane kii raat aai dil jo naa kah sakaa  chaliye mubaarak ye jashn dostii kaa daaman to thaamaa aap ne kisii kaa  2 hamen to khushii yahii hai tumhen bhii kisii ko apanaa kahane kii raat aai dil jo naa kah sakaa  saagar uthaao dil kaa kis ko gam hai aaj dil kii qiimat jaam se bhii kam hai  2 piyo chaahe khuunedil ho ke piite pilaate hii rahane kii raat aai dil jo naa kah sakaa

Title: tuu kitanii achchhii hai  o maan
Lyrics: tuu kitanii achchhii hai tuu kitanii bholii hai pyaariipyaarii hai o maan o maan ye jo duniyaa hai ye ban hai kaanton kaa tuu phulavaarii hai o maan o maan tuu kitanii achchhii threedots  duukhan laagiin maan terii ankhiyaan 2 mere lie jaagii hai tuu saariisaarii ratiyaan merii nindiyaa pe apanii nindiyaa bhii tuune vaarii hai o maan o maan tuu kitanii achchhii threedots  apanaa nahiin tujhe sukhdukh koii 2 main muskaayaa tuu muskaaii main royaa tuu roii mere hansane pe mere rone pe tuu balihaarii hai o maan o maan tuu kitanii achchhii threedots  maan bachchon kii jaan hotii hai 2 vo hote hain qismat vaale jinakii maan hotii hai kitanii sundar hai kitanii sushiil  hai nyaariinyaarii hai o maan o maan tuu kitanii achchhii threedots

Title: dost dost naa rahaa pyaar pyaar naa rahaa
Lyrics: dost dost naa rahaa pyaar pyaar naa rahaa zindagii hamen teraa aitabaar naa rahaa aitabaar naa rahaa   amaanaten main pyaar kii gayaa thaa jisako saunp kar vo mere dost tum hii the tumhiin to the jo zindagii kii raah men bane the mere hamasafar vo mere dost tum hii the tumhiin to the saare bhed khul gae raazadaar naa rahaa zindagii hamen teraa aitabaar naa rahaa   gale lagii sahamsaham bhare gale se bolatii vo tum na thii to kaun thaa tumhiin to thii safar ke vaqt men palak pe motiyon ko tolatii  vo tum na thii to kaun thaa tumhiin to thii nashe kii raat dhal gayii ab khumaar naa rahaa zindagii hamen teraa aitabaar naa rahaa   vafaa kaa leke naam jo dhadak rahe the har ghadii vo mere neknek dil tumhiin to ho jo muskuraake rah gae zahar kii jab suii gadii vo mere neknek dil tumhiin to ho ab kisii kaa mere dil intazaar naa rahaa zindagii hamen teraa aitabaar naa rahaa

Title: naam meraa nimmo mukaam ludhiyaanaa
Lyrics: lataa naam meraa nimmo mukaam ludhiyaanaa sang liye doluun main pyaar kaa kazaanaa ho rahuungii terii laa dil nazaraanaa yuunhii re yuunhii tuu mat lalachaanaa aahaa re  manna  dwijen aahaa jhuumatii navelii la aahaa re ma  dwi aahaa naar alabelii la aahaa re ma  dwi aahaa pyaar kii pahelii la aahaa re ma  dwi aahaa naar alabelii  la aahaa aahaa aahaa aahaa aahaa 2  naam meraa nimmo mukaam ludhiyaanaa sang liye doluun main pyaar kaa kazaanaa  ma o dekh dekh zaalim na ab tarasaa dil na jalaa dil na jalaa dwi are main ne tujhe chaahaa kyaa yah bhii hai kataa sach batalaa sach batalaa 2  la aadat hai mardon kii pichhe pad jaanaa jhuuthmuuth karate hain pyaar kaa bahaanaa mujhako re tuune nahiin pahachaanaa yuunhii re yuunhii tuu mat lalachaanaa  ma  dwi aahaa re la aahaa jhuumatii navelii ma  dwi aahaa re la aahaa naar alabelii ma  dwi aahaa re la aahaa pyaar kii pahelii ma  dwi aahaa re la aahaa naar alabelii  aahaa aahaa aahaa aahaa aahaa naam meraa nimmo mukaam ludhiyaanaa sang liye doluun main pyaar kaa kazaanaa  la main ne jis pe ye nazar daalii matawaalii matawaalii ma aiyyo bhuul gayaa dil kii vo rakhawaalii oy laalii oy laalii la main ne jis pe ye nazar daalii matawaalii matawaalii ma arere bhuul gayaa dil kii vo rakhawaalii oy laalii oy laalii  dwi maan gaye tujhako hai teraa hii zamaanaa dwi iltijaa yahii hai miton ko naa mitaanaa ma  dwi jaise aayii chham se chalii mat jaanaa la yuunhii re yuunhii tuu mat lalachaanaa  la aahaa re m aahaa jhuumatii navelii la aahaa re m aahaa naar alabelii la aahaa re m aahaa pyaar kii pahelii la aahaa re m aahaa naar alabelii  la aahaa aahaa aahaa aahaa aahaa  naam meraa nimmo mukaam ludhiyaanaa sang liye doluun main pyaar kaa kazaanaa

Title: ek rritu aae ek rritu jaae
Lyrics: ek rritu aae ek rritu jaae diip jalaae diip bujhaae kabhii hansaae kabhii rulaae  jiyaa naahiin laage kaa karuun sajanaa tujh bin suunaa laage anganaa aae na more nainon men nindiyaa saaje na more maathe pe bindiyaa baaje na more paanvon men paayaliyaa  ghir aaii kaarii kaarii badariyaa dhadake jiyaraa chamake bijuriyaa aise laage sagare badaraa jaise tore nainon kaa kajaraa chhodo saanvariyaa  khil gaiin kaliyaan khil gaiin kaliyaan nainaa dhuundhen saajan ki galiyaan khil gaiin 3 kaliyaan khil gaiin

Title: rokaa kaii baar mainne dil kii umang ko
Lyrics: ra ho ho ho o aahaa  aa ho ho ho o aahaa   ra rokaa kai baar mainne dil kii umang ko  kyaa karuun main apani nigaahon kii pasand ko  o jaane jaan tuu hii mere pyaar kaa jahaan hai ho threedots aa rokaa kai baar mainne dil kii umang ko  kyaa karuun main apani nigaahon kii pasand ko  o jaane jaan tuu hii mere pyaar kaa jahaan hai ho threedots   aa  dekho merii aankhen tumhaaraa hii khumaar hai   hothon kii ye laali sanam teraa pyaar hai   2  dil ko lagaayaa mujhe to iqaraar hai  ra rokaa kai baar threedots  ra maanaa teraa anchal hathon se abhii dur hai   baahon men uthaa luun ye aramaan zuruur hai   2 maano na maano divaanaa bekusuur hai  aa rokaa kai baar threedots  aa  dekhi terii suurat jo itane kariib se   ghir gayii main to khayaalon men ajiib se   2 dil pe kyaa biti na puuchho ye garib se   haay kyaa garib hai are ek tuu hii dhanavaan hai gori  ra rokaa kai baar threedots  aa rokaa kai baar threedots

Title: jurmeulfat pe hamen log sazaa dete hain
Singer: lata kamal barot ira nagrath sudha malhotra
Lyrics: apane chehare se vo paradaa jo uthaa dete hain rang gulazaar ke phuulon kaa udaa dete hain  maikade unakii nigaahon men base rahate hain vo jise dekh len mastaanaa banaa dete hain  bewafaaii se vafaaon kaa silaa dete hain kaise bedard hain kyaa lete hain kyaa dete hain  aise baithe hain ki jaise hamen dekhaa hii nahiin yahii andaaz to diivaanaa banaa dete hain  laalogauhar se hasiinon ko sajaa dete hain qadradaan yuun hii muhabbat kaa silaa dete hain  ishq kyaa hai ye shahanshaahon se puuchhe koii husn ko takhtehuquumat pe bithaa dete hain  aap daulat ke taraazuu men dilon ko tolen ham muhabbat se muhabbat kaa silaa dete hain   jurmeulfat pe hamen log sazaa dete hain kaise naadaan hain sholon ko havaa dete hain   hamase diivaane kahiin tarkevafaa karate hain  jaan jaae ki rahe baat nibhaa dete hain   takht kyaa chiiz hai aur laalojavaahar kyaa hain ishq vaale to khudaaii bhii lutaa dete hain   hamane dil de bhii diyaa ahadevafaa le bhii liyaa aap ab shauq se de len jo sazaa dete hain

Title: bahut din hue  samaa alabelaa
Singer: lata manna dey mahendra kapoor chorus
Lyrics: mahendra bahut din hue taaron ke desh men chandaa kii nagariyaa men rahate the ik raajaa baj rahaa thaa duur duur unakii jay kaa baajaa baithe the partaapii raajaa vaise unakii raanii jaisaa ruup rang paayaa vaisii gyaanii daanii donon kii dulaarii ik bitiyaa thii pyaarii phuul jaisii naazuk thii vo naam thaa phuul kumaarii  andhii taqadiir ne andher kiyaa bhaarii chhiinii usake honthon se hansii vo pyaarii pyaarii phuul kumaarii bhuul gaii hansanaa muskuraanaa luut liyaa bhaag ne kushii kaa vo khazaanaa  magar ye kaun ye kaisii aawaaz   mannaa leke dil kaa saaz ham giit gaane aa gaye he dil ke kaliyon ne kahaa din suhaane aa gae  gam ke baadal hat gae khul gayaa niilaa gagan har kalii ko pyaar se chhuu gaii suuraj kiran muskuraa lo jhuum lo o zamaane aa gaye leke dil kaa saaz ham giit gaane aa gae  lataa samaa alabelaa din hain milan ke priit leke aae dekho miit mere man ke  piyaapiyaa gaaye jiyaa naache man moraa merii unakii jodii jaise chaand aur chakoraa nainon men chhupaaye phiruun sapane sajan ke samaa alabelaa threedots  jinhen mainne dil diyaa vo bhii rahe mere man men manaauun main saanjh aur savere  jiite jii na tuutegii ye bandhan jiivan ke samaa alabelaa threedots  mahendra jaise unake achhe din phir se laut aae maalik aise sabakii sune sabake din lautaae

Title: mehandii lagii mere haath re
Lyrics: mehandii lagii mere haath re mehandii lagii mere haath bhuul jaa isako e dil ye to sapanon kii thii baat re mehandii lagii mere threedots  anajaane men main baavariyaa likh baithii tere naam umariyaa nibh na sakegii baat re mehandii lagii mere threedots  maang bhii ujadii dil bhii tuutaa mehandii kaa rang bhii nikalaa jhuuthaa ansuan se dhoe haath re mehandii lagii mere threedots  unakii galii kaa pheraa chhodaa aap hii apane dil ko todaa ban gaii aisii baat re mehandii lagii mere threedots  dvaar bajii thii jo shahanaaii vah shahanaaii thii harajaaii chhod gaii meraa haath re mehandii lagii mere threedots
