Lyrics: jinhen ham bhuulanaa chaahen vo aksar yaad aate hain  buraa ho is mohabbat kaa  2 vo kyuun kar yaad aate hain jinhen ham bhuulanaa threedots  bulaaen kis tarah unako kabhii pii thii un aankhon se 2  chhalak jaate hain jab aansuu  2 vo saagar yaad aate hain jinhen ham bhuulanaa threedots  kisii ke surk lab the yaa die kii lau machalatii thii 2  jahaan kii thii kabhii puujaa  2 vo manzar yaad aate hain jinhen ham bhuulanaa threedots  rahe ai shammaa tuu roshan duaa detaa hai paravaanaa 2  jinakii qismat men jalanaa hai  2 vo jal kar yaad aate hain jinhen ham bhuulanaa threedots

Title: chaand tuu yahaan hai aur
Lyrics: chaand tuu yahaan hai aur chaand tuu vahaan itanaa bas bataa de mujhe man meraa kahaan man meraa kahaan chaand tuu yahaan threedots  haath se nikal gayaa hai meraa bholaa man aankhon men samaa gayaa hai kisakaa bholaapan niind nahiin aatii mujhe raat hai javaan raat hai javaan chaand tuu yahaan threedots  bekalii badhii hai badhii tan kii aas bhii chaand mujhase duur chaand dil ke paas bhii jaauungii kushii se vahaan dil gayaa jahaan dil gayaa jahaan chaand tuu yahaan threedots  baadalon kii paalkii men chaandanii chalii chaandanii chalii mainne abhii dekhii nahiin chaand kii galii chaand kii galii chaand tuu kahaan main terii chaandanii yahaan chaandanii yahaan chaand tuu yahaan threedots

Title: ye tanhaaii haay re haay re jaane phir aae naa aae
Lyrics: ye tanhaaii haay re haay re jaane phir aae naa aae  thaam lo baahen thaam lo baahen   1 jhuum jhuum gaauun pyaar se sharamaauun  ek nashaa saa mujhe ho chalaa  terii merii chaahen roz badhii jaaen  aur na tuute kabhii silasilaa  dekh terii merii hai ek dagariyaa thaam lo baahen threedots  2 aaj apane saathii dip aur baatii  jagamaaii merii zindagii  paake terii saae kaun aage jaae  tuu milaa to milii har khushii  tan man chamake hai jaise bijuriyaa thaam lo baahen threedots  3 aaj samay aayaa main ne tujhe paayaa  main nashaa huun tere pyaar kii  phuul naae laauun tujhako mahakaauun  main kalii huun tere haar kii  pyaar kii hamaare amaravaa umariyaa thaam lo baahen threedots

Title: maayaa kaa aanchal jale
Lyrics: maayaa kaa aanchal jale kaayaa kaa abhimaan jo aayaa vo jaaegaa honii hai balavaan  o pagale o pagale der na hogii palachhin kii ke jis din chal chal chal hogii threedots  jis jag par bharamaayaa muurakh pal do pal kaa deraa praanii pal do pal kaa deraa ye duniyaa kab huii kisii kii 2 chidiyaa rain baseraa praanii chidiyaa rain baseraa  o pagale o muurakh yaad to kar us din kii ke jis din chal chal chal hogii threedots   maayaa kaa aanchal jale kaayaa kaa abhimaan jo aayaa vo jaaegaa honii hai balavaan  tuutegii jab saans kii dorii bikhar jaaenge sapane tere bikhar jaaenge sapane tujhe uthaa shamashaan chalenge 2 jo hain tere apane 2 praanii jo hain tere apane  o pagale o muurakh dhuul udegii jiivan kii ke jis din chal chal chal hogii threedots

Title: chandaa jaa re jaa re
Lyrics: laa laa laa laa laa laa chandaa jaa chandaa jaa re jaa re 2 kaahe aayaa hai akelaa tujhe maanuun alabelaa mere piyaa ko bhii sang le aa  chandaa jaa threedots  aa tujhako pahachaan bataa duun vo lagataa hai kaisaa nadiyaa men mukh dekh le apanaa vo bhii hogaa waisaa vo jo aaye to bindiyaa sajaa duun kaaliikaalii ye lat bikharaa duun meraa itanaa sandesaa de aa  chandaa jaa threedots  dekh use kahanaa merii nindiyaa ho gaii sautan merii mere sangsang bairan hogii baat takat hai terii chandaa denaa tuu merii gawaahii ham donon hain pyaar ke raahii bas itanaa to saath nibhaa  chandaa jaa threedots

Title: sarafaroshii kii tamannaa ab hamaare dil men hai
Lyrics: karataa nahiin kyon duusaraa kuchh baat chiit dekhataa huun main jise vo chup terii mahafil men hai  sarafaroshii kii tamannaa ab hamaare dil men hai dekhanaa hai zor kitanaa baazueqaatil men hai  vaqt aane par bataa denge tujhe o aasamaan ham abhii se kyaa bataayen kyaa hamaare dil men hai  khainch kar laayii hai qatl hone kii ummiid aashiqon kaa aaj jamaghat kuuchaaeqaatil men hai

Title: aa gayaa lab pe afasaanaaeaashiqii
Lyrics: aa gayaa lab pe afasaanaaeaashiqii ab kisii bhii fasaane kii paravaah nahiin ham to unase mohabbat kie jaayenge ab hamen is zamaane kii paravaah nahiin  aaj ai ishq saayaa teraa sar pe hai taaj qadamon men hai takt thokar pe hai mil gaii hain hamen pyaar kii daulaten ab kisii bhii kazaane kii paravaah nahiin  zindagii men bahaaren rahengiin sadaa hamane ulfat ke gulashan men paa lii jagah chaahe bijalii gire yaa chalen aandhiyaan ab hamen aashiyaane kii paravaah nahiin  bandagii kar rahe hain mohabbat kii ham ye nahiin jaanate kyaa hai dairoharam jhuk gaii hai jabiin husn ke saamane ab kahiin sar jhukaane kii paravaah nahiin

Title: bhuule se mohabbat kar baithaa  dil hii to hai
Lyrics: bhuule se mohabbat kar baithaa naadaan thaa bechaaraa dil hii to hai har dil se kataa ho jaatii hai bigado na kudaaraa dil hii to hai duniyaa men hamaaraa dil hii to hai   is tarah nigaahen mat phero aisaa na ho dhadakan ruk jaae  2 siine men koii patthar to nahiin 2 ehasaas kaa maaraa dil hii to hai duniyaa men hamaaraa threedots   bedaadagaron kii thokar se sab kvaab suhaane chuur hue  2 ab dil kaa sahaaraa gam hii to hai 2 ab gam kaa sahaaraa dil hii to hai duniyaa men hamaaraa threedots

Title: merii laaj raakho giradhaarii
Lyrics: merii laaj raakho giradhaarii main laakh jatan kar haarii re merii laaj raakho threedots  bahut sahaa ab sahaa na jaae aur kisii se kahaa na jaae charanon men do ashru chadhaane aaii sharan tihaarii merii laaj raakho threedots  suunii kokh kalank ban gaii madhur drishti kyon dank ban gaii kyon maan kaa man diyaa mujhe dii aanchal men chingaarii merii laaj raakho threedots  chiranjiiv ho nanhaa kanhaiyaa rahe shiish par sukh kii chhainyaa main na rahuun par rahe khelataa ghar aangan banavaarii merii laaj raakho threedots

Title: kaahe itanaa gumaan chhorie ye melaa do din kaa
Lyrics: ra 	kaahe itanaa gumaan chhorie ye melaa do din kaa 2 aa 	kaahe karataa hai pyaar chhoravaa ye melaa do din kaa 	jaajaa dore na daal chhoravaa ye melaa do din kaa  ra 	are sunsun aa 	are jaajaajaa ra 	o chal thumakthumak zaraa thumakthumak  	terii kaatir khol ke rakhaa hai dil kaa daravaazaa 	paiyaan ham nahiin padane vaale marazii ho to aajaa aa 	badaa aayaa diladaar chhoravaa ye melaa do din kaa 	kaahe karataa hai pyaar threedots  aa 	dekh zaraa ye kaaliikaalii zulfon kii zanjiiren 	bandhii huii hai inamen tere jaison kii taqadiiren ra 	lut jaaegaa jahaan chhorie ye melaa do din kaa 	kaahe itanaa gumaan threedots

Title: na jhatako zulf se paanii  yah motii tuut jaayenge
Lyrics: naa jhatako sulf se paanii yah motii tuut jaayenge tumhaaraa kuchh na bigadegaa magar dil tuut jaayenge naa jhatako sulf se paanii   ye bhiigi raat ye bhiigaa badan ye husn kaa aalam ye sab andaaz mil kar do jahaan ko luut jaayenge naa jhatako sulf se paanii   yah naazuk lab hain yaa aapas men do lipatii hui kaliyaan zaraa inako alag kar do tarannum phuut jaayenge naa jhatako sulf se paanii   hamaarii jaan le legaa yah niichii aankh ka jaduu chalo achchha huaa mar kar jahaan se chhuut jaayenge naa jhatako sulf se paanii

Title: ab ke baras bhej bhaiyaa ko baabul
Lyrics: ab ke baras bhej bhaiyaa ko baabul saavan ne liijo bulaay re lautengii jab mere bachapan kii sakhiiyaan dejo sandeshaa bhiyaay re ab ke baras bhej bhiiyako baabul threedots  ambuvaa tale phir se jhuule padenge rimajhim padengii phuhaaren lautengii phir tere aangan men baabul saavan kii thandii bahaaren chhalake nayan moraa kasake re jiyaraa bachapan kii jab yaad aae re ab ke baras bhej bhiiyako baabul threedots  bairan javaanii ne chiine khilaune aur merii gudiyaa churaaii baabul kii main tere naazon kii paalii phir kyon huii main paraaii biite re jag koii chithiyaa na paatii na koii naihar se aaye re ab ke baras bhej bhiiyako baabul threedots

Title: vo dil kahaan se laauun terii yaad jo bhulaade
Lyrics: vo dil kahaan se laauun terii yaad jo bhulaade2 mujhe yaad aane vaale koii raasataa bataade vo dil kahaan se laauun terii yaad jo bhulaade  rahane de mujhako apane qadamon kii kaak banakar2 jo nahiin tujhe gavaaraa mujhe kaak men milaade vo dil kahaan se laauun terii yaad jo bhulaade  mere dil ne tujhako chaahaa kyaa yahii merii kataa hai2 maanaa khataa hai lekin aisii to naa sazaa de vo dil kahaan se laauun terii yaad jo bhulaade mujhe yaad aane vaale koii raasataa bataade vo dil kahaan se laauun terii yaad jo bhulaade

Title: chalo chalen re saajan
Lyrics: la chalo chalen re saajan dhiiredhiire     balam dhiiredhiire safar hai pyaar kaa he khoii khoii hai ye raat rangiilii     nazar hai nashiilii samaa iiqaraar kaa threedots  la aankhon men khushii kii laharen     aur dil men muhabbat bhii javaan he do dil hain basaane     ik pyaar kii duniyaa aaj yahaan do ik pyaar kii duniyaa aaj yahaan threedots  he gumsum sii hai ye duniyaa saarii     khaamosh nadii ke kinaare hain la hai chaand mere pahaluu men     daaman men chamakate taare hain do daaman men chamakate taare hain threedots

Title: aavaaz deke hamen tum bulaao mohabbat men itanaa naa hamako sataao
Lyrics: lataa	aavaaz deke hamen tum bulaao mohabbat men itanaa naa hamako sataao  abhii to merii zindagii hai pareshaan kahiin mar ke ho khaak bhii na pareshaan diye kii tarah se na hamako jalaao mohabbat men itanaa naa hamako sataao  rafii	main saanson ke har taar men chhup rahaa huun main dhadakan ke har raag men bas rahaa huun zaraa dil kii jaanib nigaahen jhukaao mohabbat men itanaa naa hamako sataao  lataa	naa honge agar ham to rote rahoge sadaa dil kaa daaman bhigote rahoge jo tum par mitaa ho use naa mitaao mohabbat men itanaa naa hamako sataao  rafii	aavaaz deke hamen tum bulaao mohabbat men itanaa naa hamako sataao

Title: thumak thumak thumak haay chalii hai tuu kidhar
Lyrics: ye jhijhakane ye thithakane ye lubhaane kii adaa tuu vohii hai kah rahii hai sar jhukaane kii adaa thumak thumak thumak thumak thumak haay chalii hai tuu kidhar kab se terii kaatir phirataa main dar badar thumak thumak thumak haai chalii hai tuu kidhar  muu chupaanaa zulm dhaanaa aazamaanaa chhod de2 mil gaye dil khil gaye dil ab sataanaa chhod de thumak thumak thumak thumak haay chalii hai tuu kidhar kab se terii kaatir phirataa main dar badar thumak thumak thumak haai chalii hai tuu kidhar  tuu hasiin hai naazanii hai ye to hai dil ko yakiin2 aankh uthaakar dekh dil bar kuchh bure ham bhii nahiin thumak thumak thumak thumak haay chalii hai tuu kidhar kab se terii kaatir phirataa main dar badar thumak thumak thumak haai chalii hai tuu kidhar  gunagunaatii musakuraatii laut aaii hai bahaar2 le gaii jii ek kalii aur phuul laaii hai bahaar thumak thumak thumak thumak haay chalii hai tuu kidhar kab se terii kaatir phirataa main dar badar thumak thumak thumak haai chalii hai tuu kidhar tuu tuu chalii hai tuu kidhar

Title: aisaa hotaa to nahiin aisaa ho jaaye agar
Lyrics: aisaa hotaa to nahiin aisaa ho jaaye agar tumhiin mil jaao  vaadaa nahiin koii koii qasam nahiin magar intezaar hai hamen intezaar aawaaz dete hain anajaan aankhon par hamen aitabaar hai hamen aitabaar aisaa hotaa to nahiin  bechain hokar jab koii akelaa thaa charaagon kii mahafil jalaaye bujhaaye kaamosh vaadon kii aawaaz men koii bulaaye tumhiin ko tumhiin ko bulaaye aisaa hotaa to nahiin

Title: hato kaahe ko jhuutiii banaao batiyaan
Lyrics: hato kaahe ko jhuutiii banaao batiyaan  gair kaa saath hai aur roz mulaaqaaten hain pyaar hai us ke liye aur ham se faqat baaten hain jaao jaao jaao jhuuthii baat na banaao jal rahii virah men sainyaa aur na jalaao  hato kaahe ko jhuutii threedots  ye udii udii sii rangat ye khule khule se gesu terii subah kah rahii hai terii raat kaa fasaanaa dekho jii kisii kaa pyaar ham se na chhupaao sab hamen pataa hai pyaare nain na jhukaao suno kahatii hai kyaa kyaa tumharii akhiyaan hato kaahe ko jhuutii threedots

Title: tumhaarii nazar kyon khafaa ho gaii
Lyrics: tumhari nazar kyon khafa ho gai khata bakhsh do gar khata ho gai hamara irada to kuchh bhi na tha tumhari khata khud saza ho gai tumhari threedots  saza hi sahi aj kuchh to mila hai saza men bhi ik pyar ka silasila hai   2 mohabbat ka kuchh bhi anjam ho mulaqat hi iltaja ho gai tumhari threedots  mulaqat pe itane magarur kyon ho hamari khushamad pe majabur kyon ho   2 manane ki adat kahan pad gai khataon ki talim kya ho gai tumhari threedots  a threedots satate na ham to manate hi kaise tumhen apane nazadik late hi kaise   2 kisi din ki chahat amanat ye thi vo aj dil ki avaz ho gai  tumhari threedots

Title: sonavaa ke pinjaraa men band bhaiil
Film: ganga maiya tohe piyri chadhaibo bhojpurifilm
Lyrics: sonavaa ke pinjaraa men band bhaiil haay raam chiraii ke jiyaraa udaas tuut gaiil daaliyaan chhitar gaiil chhotabaa chhuut gaiil niil re aakaash sonavaa ke pinjaraa maan threedots  chhalchhal nainnaa nihaare chupake rahii chalalii bidesavaa re maiiyaa ke duaar 2 aansuon ke motiyaan nisaanii more baabulaa 2 dhaarii gaiinii hamako re paar sonavaa ke pinjaraa maan threedots  chhalchhal rah gaiilii sang ki saheliyaan le gaii baandh ke nithur re baheliyaa 2 more man mitavaa bhulaa de ab hamaraa ke 2 chhod de milan kii tuu aas sonavaa ke pinjaraa maan threedots

Title: na chhedo kal ke afasaane karo is raat kii baaten
Lyrics: na chhedo kal ke afasaane karo is raat kii baaten chhalakane do ye paimaane karo is raat kii baaten na chhedo kal ke afasaane  na phir ye raat aaegii na dil uchhalegaa siine men 2 na hogii rang pe mahafil na aisaa rang jiine men milenge kab ye diivaane karo is raat kii baaten na chhedo kal ke afasaane  har ek din kal kaa jhagadaa hai har ek din kal kaa hai ronaa 2 ye ghadiyaan raat kii tum bhii na auron kii tarah khonaa jo kal hogaa kudaa jaane karo is raat kii baaten na chhedo kal ke afasaane  karo vo baat jisase bojh dil kaa duur ho jaae 2 karo vo zikr jisase bekasii kaafuur ho jaae mile hain dil ko bahalaane karo is raat kii baaten na chhedo kal ke afasaane

Title: badaraa chhaae ki jhuule  ki aayaa saavan ho jhuum ke
Lyrics: ra 	badaraa ho badaraa chhaae ki jhuule pad gae haay 	ki mele lag gae mach gaii dhuum re 	ki aayaa saavan ho jhuum ke la 	badaraa ho badaraa chhaae ki jhuume parvat haay 	re kajaraarii badariyaa ko chuum re 	ki aayaa saavan ho jhuum ke ki aayaa saavan jhuum ke  	kaahe saamane sabake baalamavaa tuu chhede jaalamavaa ra 	kaahe phenke nazar kii dorii tuu lukchhup ke gorii la 	kajaraa ho kajaraa haay re bairii bikharaa jaae re 	meraa kajaraa ki mach gaii dhuum re 	ki aayaa saavan jhuum threedots  ra 	jaane kisako kisakii yaad aaii ke chalii puravaaii la 	jaane kis birahan kaa man tarasaa ke paanii barasaa ra 	kanganaa ho kanganaa laae ki ghar laut ke aae 	paradesii bidesavaa se ghuum ke 	ki aayaa saavan threedots  la 	tere sehare kii hain ye ladiyaan ki saavan kii jhadiyaan ra 	ye hain mast ghataaon kii tolii ki terii hai dolii la 	dhadakaa jaae dhadakaa jaae re meraa manavaa haay 	saajanavaa ki mach gaii dhuum re ko 	ki aayaa saavan threedots

Title: nigaahemehar hamase  sitam bhii tumhaare
Lyrics: nigaahemehar hamase aaj betaqasiir phiratii hain kisii kii kuchh nahiin chalatii jab taqadiir phiratii hai  sitam bhii tumhaare karam bhii tumhaare pukaaren sitamaqash to kisako pukaaren  zabaan par kaamoshii nazar se ishaare jo yuun chot khaae vo kisako pukaare sitam bhii tumhaare threedots  zamaane kii karavat badal degaa saahil chalaachal chalaachal kinaarekinaare sitam bhii tumhaare threedots  nazar usane badalii jo dil ko lubhaa kar pukaar uthii qismat burii haar haare sitam bhii tumhaare threedots

Title: suno jii suno hamaarii bhii suno
Lyrics: suno jii suno hamaarii bhii suno ajii maharbaan threedots hamarii bhii suno na tappaa na thumarii gazal hai na kajarii yah raaginii hai pyaar kii suno jii suno ajii maharbaan hamaarii bhii suno  taraanaa hamaaraa zamaane se nyaaraa har ek sur men dil hai dhadakataa huaa har ek bol pyaaraa ki jaise sitaaraa akelaa gagan men chamakataa huaa suno jii suno threedots  ishaaron men boluun zubaan tak na kholuun nigaahon se kah duun samajh lo agar na yah bekudii hai na diivaanagii hai mujhe to lagii hai tumhaarii nazar suno jii suno threedots  suno mere jii kii merii aarzuu kii tamannaa yahii thii ke tum ho kariib yah chilman hataa do vah jhalkii dikhaa do ki ab to jagaa do hamaare nasiib suno jii suno threedots

Title: tumhen paa ke hamane jahaan paa liyaa hai
Lyrics: aa 	tumhen paa ke hamane jahaan paa liyaa hai 2 	zamiin to zamiin aasamaan paa liyaa hai ra 	tumhen paa ke threedots  aa 	mitaa na sakegii jise ab kizaan bhii 	jalaa na sakengii ab bijaliyaan bhii 	mohabbat kaa vo aashiyaan paa liyaa hai 	tumhen paa ke threedots  ra 	zamaane ke gam pyaar men dhal gae hain 2 	ummiidon ke laakhon die jal gae hain 2 	ke jabase tumhen meharabaan paa liyaa hai 	tumhen paa ke threedots  aa 	jahaan se mohabbat kii raahen milii hain ra 	vahiin se merii gardishen tham gaii hain do 	na bichhadenge ham kaaravaan paa liyaa hai 	tumhen paa ke threedots

Title: haa mujhase puuchhe binaa dil men  ye to kaho kaun ho tum
Lyrics: haa mujhase puuchhe binaa dil men aane lage ye to kaho  kaun ho tum  2 miithii nazaron se bijalii giraane lage ye to kaho  kaun ho tum  2  raat bhii niraalii ye rut bhii niraalii rang barasaae umang matavaalii 2 pyaar bharii nazaron ne jaal hain bichhaae kaise koii dil kii karegaa rakhavaalii 2 ye to kaho threedots  mastiyon ke mele ye khoiikhoii raaten aankh kare aankhon se ras bharii baaten bholebhaale hain vo magar dekhane men mujhase kyaa chhupengii ye luutane kii ghaaten 2 ye to kaho threedots  tumhiin to nahiin ho jo sapanon men aake chhup gae apanii jhalak dikhalaa ke tumhiin to nahiin ho main dhuundhaa kiyaa jinako phir bhii tum na aae main thak gayaa bulaa ke 2 ye to kaho threedots

Title: din saaraa guzaaraa tore anganaa  mere yaar shabbakair

Title: o mere sanam o mere sanam
Lyrics: o mere sanam o mere sanam  do jism magar ek jaan hain ham  ek dil ke do aramaan hain ham  o mere sanam o mere sanam   tan saunp diyaa man saunp diyaa  kuchh aur to mere paas nahiin  jo tum se hai mere hamadam  bhagavaan se bhi vo aas nahiin  2 jis din se hue ek duje ke  is duniya se anajaan hai ham  ek dil ke do aramaan hain ham  o mere sanam o mere sanam   sunate hain pyaar kii duniya men  do dil mushkil se samaate hain  kya gair vahaan apanon tak ke  sang bhi na aane paate hain  2 hamane aakhir kya dekh liyaa  kya baat hai kyon hairaan hai ham  ek dil ke do aramaan hain ham  o mere sanam o mere sanam   mere apane apana ye milan  sangam hai ye ganga jamunaa ka  jo sach hai saamane aya hai  jo bit gayaa ek sapanaa tha   2 ye dharatii hai insaanon kii  kuchh aur nahiin insaan hain ham  ek dil ke do aramaan hain ham  o mere sanam o mere sanam

Title: muqaddar aajamaanaa chaahataa huun
Lyrics: muqaddar aajamaanaa chaahataa huun tumhen apanaa banaanaa chaahataa huun muqaddar aajamaanaa threedots  mujhe bas pyaar kaa ik jaam de do main sab kuchh bhuul jaanaa chaahataa huun muqaddar aajamaanaa threedots  ghadii bhar ko mere nazadiik aao zaraa aankhon se aankhen to milaao main haaledil sunaanaa chaahataa huun muqaddar aajamaanaa threedots  banaanaa hai mujhe ek aashiyaanaa 2 jo tum chaaho to mil jaae thikaanaa tumhaare dil men aanaa chaahataa huun muqaddar aajamaanaa threedots

Title: nain lad jaii hai
Lyrics: laagaa gorii gujariyaa se nehaa hamaar hoi gavaa saaraa chaupat moraa rojagaar o  nain lad jainhe to manavaa men kasak hoibe karii prem kaa chhuti hai pataakhaa to dhamak hoibe karii nain lad jainhe   threedots  ruup ko manamaa basaibaa to buraa kaa hoii hai tohuu se priit lagaibaa to buraa kaa hoii hai prem kii nagarii ma kuchh hamaraa bhii haq hoibe karii nain lad jainhe   threedots  hoii gavaa man maa more tichhrii najar kaa hallaa gorii ko dekhe binaa nindiyaa na aavai hamakaa phaans lagii hai to karejavaa ma khatak hoibe karii nain lad jainhe   threedots  thaik thaik thai thai thai dhaak dhinak dhin taak tinak tin dhaak dhinak dhin dhaak dhinak dhin dhaa  aankh mil gayii hai sajaniyaa se to naachan lagii hai pyaar kii miithii gajal manavaa bhii gaavan lagii hai jhaanjh bajii hai to kamariyaa ma lachak hoibe karii nain lad jainhe   threedots  nainaa jab ladii hai to bhaiyyaa man men kasak hoibe karii thaik thaik tik thaa  hoy hoy hoy  man le gayii re dhobaniyaa raamaa kaisaa jaaduu daar ke kaisaa jaaduu daar ke re kaisaa tonaa daar ke man le gayii re dhobaniyaa raamaa kaisaa jaaduu daar ke man le gayii re dhobaniyaa raamaa kaisaa jaaduu daar ke

Title: raahii huun alabelaa main dil kaa nahiin mailaa
Lyrics: raahii huun alabelaa main dil kaa nahiin mailaa yaaron kahate hain log mujhe chhailaa chhailaa baabuu kahate hain log mujhe chhailaa ruup kii shahajaadii hai yaaron merii lailaa yaaron kahate hain threedots  sairsapaate karataa main jaa pahunchaa phir khet men chaand sii ujalii ladakii baithii thii thandii ret men are dekh ke merii suurat pahale to gussaa le aaii chaal jo merii dekhii kuchh sharamaaii kuchh muskaaii kahane lagii vo main terii mere saajan chhailaa raahii huun alabelaa threedots  pyaar kii dhun pe maine jab chhedii apanii raaginii sun ke meraa gaanaa phir chham se aaii kaaminii are hans ke hamako dekhaa ik jalavaa phenkaa duur se dil kii baat ko maine phir kah daalaa us huur se mil hii gaii mastaanii merii dilarubaa chhailaa ruup kii shahajaadii hai threedots

Title: jaane kaise sapanon men kho gaii ankhiyaan
Lyrics: jaane kaise sapanon men kho gaii ankhiyaan  main to huun jaagii morii so gaii ankhiyaan   ajab diivaanii bhaii mose anajaanii bhaii pal men paraaii dekho ho gaii ankhiyaan  main to huun jaagii morii so gaii ankhiyaan   barasii ye kaisii dhaaraa kaanpe tanman saaraa  rang se ang bhigo gaii ankhiyaan  jaane kaise sapanon men kho gaii ankhiyaan   man ujiyaaraa chhaayaa jag ujiyaaraa chhaayaa jagamag diip sanjo gaii ankhiyaan  main to huun jaagii morii so gaii ankhiyaan    koii man bhaa gayaa jab vo chalaa gayaa man ke do motiyaan piro gaii ankhiyaan jaane kaise sapanon men kho gaii ankhiyaan

Title: gamehastii se bas begaanaa hotaa
Lyrics: gamehastii se bas begaanaa hotaa kudaayaa kaash main diiwaanaa hotaa gamehastii se bas begaanaa  chalii aatii qayaamat anjuman men2 gulon ko aag lag jaatii chaman men alag baithaa alag baithaa koii mastaanaa hotaa kudaayaa kaash main diiwaanaa hotaa gamehastii se bas begaanaa  jo dekhaa hai sunaa hai zindagii men wo banake dard rah jaataa naa jii men faqat ek kwaab faqat ek kwaab ek afasaanaa hotaa kudaayaa kaash main diiwaanaa hotaa gamehastii se bas begaanaa  usii diiwaanagii men bekudii men2 na khulatii aankh saarii zindagii men sadaa gardish men sadaa gardish men ik paimaanaa hotaa kudaayaa kaash main diiwaanaa hotaa gamehastii se bas begaanaa hotaa kudaayaa kaash main diiwaanaa hotaa

Title: pankh hote to ud aatii rasiyaa o zaalimaa
Lyrics: pankh hote to ud aatii rasiyaa o zaalimaa  tujhe dil kaa daag dikhalaatii   kiranen ban ke baahen phailaayii  aas ke baadal pe jaake laharaayii  duur se dekhaa mausam hasiin thaa  aanevaale tuu hii nahiin thaa  rasiyaa o zaalimaa tujhe dil kaa daag dikhalaatii threedots  yaadon men khoyii pahunchii gagan men  panchhii ban ke sachchii lagan men  jhuul chukii main vaade kaa jhuulaa  tuu to apana vaadaa hii bhuulaa  rasiyaa o zaalimaa tujhe dil kaa daag dikhalaatii threedots

Title: terii kaatir jal rahen hain
Lyrics: terii kaatir jal rahen hain kab se parawaane pyaar kyaa hai kyaa bataaen tujh ko diiwaane 2  laakh terii berukii ham pe sitam dhaatii rahii jis qadar tujhako bhulaayaa terii yaad aatii rahii ho gae tere liye ham sab se begaane pyaar kyaa hai kyaa bataaen tujh ko diiwaane terii kaatir jal rahen hain threedots  dil lutaakar bhii terii duniyaa men rah sakate nahiin 2 ham tere hoke bhii tujhako apanaa kah sakate nahiin dil men rah jaaenge yuun hii dil ke afasaane pyaar kyaa hai kyaa bataaen tujh ko diiwaane  terii kaatir jal rahen hain kab se parawaane pyaar kyaa hai kyaa bataaen tujh ko diiwaane terii kaatir jal rahen hain threedots

Title: hai duniyaa usii kii zamaanaa usii kaa

Title: mele hain chiraagon ke rangiin diiwaalii hai
Lyrics: mele hain chiraagon ke rangiin diiwaalii hai mahakaa huaa gulashan hai hansataa huaa maalii hai  2   is raat koii dekhe dharatii ke nazaaron ko sharamaate hain ye diipak aakaash ke taaron ko  2 is raat kaa kyaa kahanaa 2 ye raat niraalii hai  mahakaa huaa gulashan hai hansataa huaa maalii hai  mele hain chiraagon ke rangiin diiwaalii hai mahakaa huaa gulashan hai hansataa huaa maalii hai   khaa jaaye nazar dhokhaa juganuu hain yaa phulajhadiyaan  baaraat hai taaron kii yaa rang bharii ladiyaan 2 honthon pe taraane hain 2 bajatii huii taalii hai  mahakaa huaa gulashan hai hansataa huaa maalii hai  mele hain chiraagon ke rangiin diiwaalii hai mahakaa huaa gulashan hai hansataa huaa maalii hai

Title: jaag dilediivaanaa rut jaagii vasleyaar kii
Lyrics: jaag dilediivaanaa rut jaagii vasleyaar kii basii huii zulf men aaii hai sabaa pyaar kii  jaag dilediivaanaa   do dil ke kuchh leke payaam aaii hai chaahat ke kuchh leke salaam aaii hai dar pe tere subah khadii huii hai diidaar kii jaag dilediivaanaa   ek parii kuchh shaadsii naashaadsii baithii huii shabanam men terii yaad kii bhiig rahii hogii kahiin kaliisii gulazaar kii jaag dilediivaanaa   o mere dil ab khvaabon se munh mod le biitii huii sab raaten yahiin chhod de tere to dinraat hai ab aankhon men diladaar kii jaag dilediivaanaa

Title: nainon vaalii ne haay meraa dil luutaa
Lyrics: nainon vaali ne haay meraa dil luuta  nainon vaali ne bholi bhaali ne ik matavaale ne  haay meraa dil luuta  nainon vaali ne o bholi bhaali ne  haay meraa dil luuta haay meraa dil luuta dil meraa luuta   suniil haay aise men terii aavaaz kahiin se aaii jaise parbat kaa jigar chiirke jharanaa phuute yaa zamiinon kii muhabbat men tadap kar naadaan aasmaanon se koii shok sitaaraa tuute  saadhanaa hanh chorii ke sher hain aap to kuchh yuun kahate  muskaate ithalaatii gaati aayi zulfen khole koyaliyaa chup ho jaaye jab usaki paayal bole  mujhe dikhaa ke pyaar bhare do nainaa bholebhole  aha nainon vaali ne   suniil puurii hongii unakii sab farmaaishen ek bhii hamase na taalii jaayegii aa padaa hai aashiqii se vaastaa ab tabiiyat kyaa sambhaalii jaayegii  saadhanaa kyaa aap kahate zaraa sun liijiye aap  qaid men usakii jo aa jaaye vo qaidii naa chhute laakhon bandhan tuute lekin ye bandhan naa tuute niind churaa lii mujhase karake vaade jhuutejhuute nainon vaalii ne threedots  saadhanaa chup kyon ho  suniil na jaane aaj main kyaa baat kahane vaalaa huun zabaan khush hai aavaaz rukatii jaatii hai  saadhanaa agar mujhase pyaar hotaa to aise na kahate  naazo adaa se chaand ke aage ghuunghat jab sarakaaye    ye mue nazoandaaz hii to hain husn ke khanjar chaand tadap kar usake gore kadamon pe gir jaaye  taare puuchhe huaa hai kyaa to chaand ye bole  haay nainon vale ne haay nainon vale

Title: meraa kyaa sanam merii kushii hai tumhaarii
Lyrics: a meraa kyaa sanam merii kushii hai tumhaarii  are hansate ho jab tum muskuraatii huun main  are piite ho jab tum dagamagaatii huun main 2   a hoy dil ko hai tumase hii kaam huunvahaa  are hoy tumase hii zulfon kii shaam huunvahaa  are tumape gorii baanhon ke nigaahon ke  kazaane lutaatii huun main 2  main aa aa  meraa kyaa sanam threedots   a hoy husn kii aag men pal ke huunvahaa  are hoy roshanii karatii huun jalake huunvahaa  are jo milate nahiin taare to angaaron se  tan ko sajaatii huun main 2  main aa aa aahaa haa  meraa kyaa sanam threedots   ma he galii galii liye tedaa pyaad huunvahaa  ade he kahaan kahaan dhuundhaa tujhe yaad huunvahaa  badii mushkiil se tujhe paayaa medii jaan  ab na kahanaa ki jaatii huun main 2  main main   a aur ma he he aahaa haa haa   a meraa kyaa sanam threedots

Title: jaago sone vaalon suno merii kahaanii
Lyrics: jaago sone vaalon suno merii kahaanii 2 kyaa amiirii kyaa gariibii bhuulo baaten puraanii jaago sone vaalon threedots  tuutaa jo aaj dil kaa vo saaz rone lagaa ek badanasiib hansane lage duniyaa ke log koii huaa barbaad jaago sone vaalon threedots  ye uunch niich duniyaa ke biich aakir ye kyon bolo koii jo hai bhalaa vo kyon buraa ham to na samajhe ye raaz jaago sone vaalon threedots  aapas men gam baanten jo ham phir na rahen aise sitam kahane ko insaan hain vo insaaniyat kahaan hai jaago sone vaalon threedots

Title: gaal gulaabii kisake hain nain sharaabii kisake hain
Lyrics: gaal gulaabii kisake hain nain sharaabii kisake hain baalon men kisake raat base dekh ke jisako subah hanse bolo  kaun  6 shaqiilaa gaal gulaabii kisake hain threedots  lambii baahen kisakii hain tez nigaahen kisakii hain chuum ke jisako havaa chale dekh ke jisako chaand jale bolo  kaun  6 jamiilaa lambii baahen kisakii hain threedots  phuul barasate baaton se dil ko luute ghaaton se jo bijalii ko sharmaae dekh pasiinaa aa jaae bolo  kaun  6 liilaa phuul barasate baaton se threedots  rang damakataa kisakaa hai ang chamakataa kisakaa hai jalavaa jaaduu karataa hai shimalaa jis pe marataa hai bolo  kaun  6 shiilaa rang damakataa kisakaa hai threedots  gaal gulaabii nain sharaabii lambii baahen tez nigaahen rang damakataa bolo  kaun  6 soniyaa

Title: tujhe pyaar karate hain karate rahenge
Lyrics: ra 	tujhe pyaar karate hain karate rahenge 	ki dil banake dil men dhadakate rahenge su 	teraa naam lele ke jiite rahenge 2 	teraa naam lele ke marate rahenge 2 ra 	tujhe pyaar karate threedots  	 tujhe bhuul jaauun ye mumakin nahiin hai 	kahiin bhii rahuun meraa dil to yahiin hai  2 	guzarane ko ye din guzarate rahenge 	ki dil banake dil threedots  su 	 hasiin phuul kii zindagaanii bhii kyaa hai 	abhii hans rahaa thaa abhii ro rahaa hai  2 	jo guzare kushii men vahii zindagii hai 	nahiin to ye duniyaa badii besurii hai 	terii dhun men banate sanvarate rahenge	 	teraa naam lele ke jiite threedots ra 	tujhe pyaar karate threedots  	 agar mar gayaa ruuh aayaa karegii 	tujhe dekh kar giit gaayaa karegii  2 	mujhe dekh kar tum na aansuu bahaanaa 	bas itanii gujaarish hai tum muskaraanaa 	tere pyaar men rang bharate rahenge 	ki dil banake dil threedots

Title: main tuutii huii ik naiyaa huun mujhe chaahe jidhar le jaao
Lyrics: main tuutii huii ik naiyaa huun mujhe chaahe jidhar le jaao 2 jo chaaho duubo do maujon men yaa saahil pe le jaao main tuutii huii threedots  ek tum hii sahaaraa ho meraa jiivan kii andherii raaton men duniyaa kii kushii taqadiir kaa gam sab kuchh hai tumhaare haathon men ab chaahe idhar le jaao mujhe yaa chaahe udhar le jaao main tuutii huii threedots  maayuus nazar majabuur qadam ujadaa huaa aalam hai dil kaa jiinaa bhii ye koii jiinaa hai munh dekh sakuun naa manzil kaa biite hue din mil jaaen jahaan mujhe aisii dagar le jaao 2 main tuutii huii threedots  aansuu na bahaao mere lie gam mujhako akele sahane do tuute na tumhaaraa naazuk dil ye dard mujhii tak rahane do ab chhod do mujhako raahon men yaa duur nagar le jaao main tuutii huii threedots

Title: ankhiyaan apanii chhupaa ke rakh gorie
Lyrics: ankhiyaan apanii chhupaa ke rakh gorie zamaanaa sharaabii ban jaaegaa ankhiyaan apanii chhupaa threedots  main to dekhuun mukh yaar kaa main mar gayaa allaah zulfen ruk se hataa ke rakh gorie zamaanaa sharaabii ban jaaegaa  ankhiyaan apanii chhupaa threedots  dekh ke tere husn kaa aalam dil hai diivaanaa tere naam kaa main mar gayaa allaah palaken yuun na jhukaa ke rakh gorie zamaanaa sharaabii ban jaaegaa ankhiyaan apanii chhupaa threedots  dekh ke tere husn kaa aalam terii galii men aanaa jaanaa kaam yahii hai subah shaam kaa main mar gayaa allaah jalave kuchh bachaa ke rakh gorie zamaanaa sharaabii ban jaaegaa ankhiyaan apanii chhupaa threedots

Title: ek jaaniib shammemahafil
Lyrics: rafi aa aa aa ek jaanib shammemahafil ek jaanib shammemahafil ek jaanib ruuhejaanaan ho girataa hai dekhen kahaan parawaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil  manna ek jaanib shammemahafil ho ek jaanib ruuhejaanaan ho girataa hai dekhen kahaan parawaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil  rafi ek su ek sholaa charaagon kii anjuman men ek su rangejalawaa kisii but ke baankapan men manna ek sholaa ek jalawaa aur isamen ik diivaanaa  ek jaanib shammemahafil ho ek jaanib ruuhejaanaan ho girataa hai dekhen kahaan parawaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil  manna usakii kyaa hai manziil nahiin itanaa bekabar bhii aayaa dilabaron men to hai kaafii ek nazar bhii rafi kahiin nazaron ko yaaro kyaa jaanuun main anajaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil ek jaanib ruuhejaanaan ho girataa hai dekhen kahaan parawaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil  manna hmm hmm hmm aahaa  rafi laa laa lalaa laa laa lalaa   rafi kyaa kyaa rang nikale hasiinon kii saadagii se  manna hoaa  itanii hai shikaayat  ke milate hain ajanabii se rafi jo aisaa beparawaa kyaa usase dil ulajhaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil manna ho ek jaanib ruuhejaanaan donon ho girataa hai dekhen kahaan parawaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil ek jaanib ruuhejaanaan ho girataa hai dekhen kahaan parawaanaa ek jaanib shammemahafil

Title: mere man kii gangaa aur tere man kii jamunaa kaa
Lyrics: mere man kii gangaa aur tere man kii jamunaa kaa bol raadhaa bol sangam hogaa kii nahiin are bol raadhaa bol sangam hogaa kii nahiin     nahiin kabhii nahiin  kitanii sadiyaan biit gaiin hain haay tujhe samajhaane men mere jaisaa dhiiraj vaalaa hai koii aur zamaane men man kaa badhataa bojh kabhii kam hogaa kii nahiin bol raadhaa bol sangam hogaa kii nahiin     jaa jaa  do nadiyon kaa mel agar itanaa paavan kahalaataa hai kyon na jahaan do dil milate hain svarg vahaan bas jaataa hai patthar pighale dile teraa nam hogaa kii nahiin bol raadhaa bol sangam hogaa kii nahiin     unh  terii kaatir main tarasaa yuun jaise dharatii saavan ko raadhaa raadhaa ek ratan hai saans kii aavan jaavan ko har mausam hai pyaar kaa mausam hogaa kii nahiin bol raadhaa bol sangam hogaa kii nahiin     jaao na kyon sataate ho hogaa hogaa hogaa

Title: aajakal hamase ruuthe hue hain sanam
Lyrics: aajakal hamase ruuthe hue hain sanam pyaar men ho rahe hain sitam pe sitam lekin kudaa kii qasam honge jis roz ham aamanesaamane saare shiqave gile duur ho jaaenge aajakal hamase ruuthe threedots  unake har naaz kii hamane taariif kii shukriyaa bhii na kahane kii taqaliif kii hamane dekhaa to parade men vo chhup gae kyaa pataa thaa vo magaruur ho jaaenge aajakal hamase ruuthe threedots  hamako apanii nigaahon pe hai aitabaar ek din unako kar denge ham beqaraar jis tarah ham muhabbat men majabuur hain is tarah vo bhii majabuur ho jaaenge aajakal hamase ruuthe threedots

Title: laakhon hai nigaahon men zindagii kii raah men
Lyrics: laakhon hain nigaah men zindagii kii raah men sanam hasiin javaan hothon men gulaab hai  aankhon men sharaab hai lekin vo baat kahaan  lat hai kisii kii jaaduu kaa jaal rang daale kisii pe kisii kaa jamaal    2 taubaa ye nigaahen ke rokatii hai raahen   le leke tiir kamaan laakhon hain nigaah men threedots  jaanuun naa diivaanaa main dil kaa kaun hai khayaalon kii malikaa    2 bhiigii bhiigii rut kii chhaaon tale man ko kahiin vo aan mile kaise pahachaanuun  ki naam nahiin jaanuun dhuundhe mere aramaan laakhon hain nigaah men threedots  kabhii kabhii vo ek mahajabiin dolatii hai dil ke paas kahiin    2 ke hain jo yahii baaten to hongii mulaakaaten kabhii vahaan nahiin to yahaan  haay  laakhon hain nigaah men threedots

Lyrics: aa dilenaadaan tujhe huaa kyaa hai 2 aakir is dard kii davaa kyaa hai dilenaadaan tujhe huaa kyaa hai  ham hain mushtaaq aur vo bezaar 2 yaa ilaahii ye maajaraa kyaa hai dilenaadaan tujhe huaa kyaa hai  aa ham bhii munh men zabaan rakhate hain ham bhii munh men aa ham bhii munh men zabaan rakhate hain kaash puuchho kii muddaaa kyaa hai dilenaadaan tujhe huaa kyaa hai  aa ham ko unase wafaa kii hai ummiid jo nahiin jaanate wafaa kyaa hai 2 dilenaadaan tujhe huaa kyaa hai

Lyrics: lagataa nahiin hai jii meraa ujade dayaar men kis kii banii hai aalamenaapaayedaar men  bulabul ko baagabaan se na saiyyaad se gilaa qismat men qaid thii likhii fasalebahaar men  umredaraaz maang ke laaye the chaar din do aarazu men kat gaye do intazaar men  kah do in hasaraton se kahiin aur jaa basen itanii jagah kahaan hai diledaagadaar men  hai kitana badanasiib zafar dafn ke liye do gaz zamiin bhii na milii kueyaar men

Lyrics: raat nikharii huii zulf bikharii huii  har adaa terii phuulon kii daalii  aaj subah nahiin hone vaalii  aaj subah nahiin hone vaalii				 2  yah samaa tham gayaa ye hasiin adaaen dekhake  	 2 dhadakanen so gaiin ye nashiilii aankhen dekhake  threedots dekhake threedots raat nikharii huii threedots raat nikharii huii threedots  rang bharii mastiyaan ye bahaaron ke kaafile	 2 ham chale tum chale koii saath saath chal diye  threedots chal diye threedots raat nikharii huii threedots raat nikharii huii threedots

Title: dhiire re chalo morii baankii hiraniyaa
Lyrics: dhiire re chalo morii baankii hiraniyaa kamar na lachake haay sajaniyaa dhiire re chalo threedots  terii bikharii zulfen dekh dekh ye mast ghataa sharamaaii ho dekho mast ghataa sharamaaii teraa ruup jo dekhaa jhuum jhuum lii bijalii ne angadaaii ho lii bijalii ne angadaaii kaale baal goraa ruup jaise saae men ho dhuup tujhe dekh jiyaa bharamaa hii gayaa ho dhiire re chalo threedots  kyuun dil kii raahen chhod chhod ye phuul chalaa kaaron pe ye phuul chalaa kaaron pe teraa pighale aise ruup ki jaise mom ho angaaron pe jaise mom ho angaaron pe teraa mukhadaa gulaabii terii chaal sharaabii mujhe raam kasam nashaa aa hii gayaa ho dhiire re chalo threedots

Title: ai jaanechaman teraa goraa badan
Lyrics: ai husnebekabar tujhe takane ko ek nazar jhukataa to hogaa roz tere ghar pe maahataab  ai jaanechaman teraa goraa badan jaise khilataa huaa gulaab zaalim terii jawaanii qayaamat teraa shabaab ai jaanechaman 2 ai jaanechaman threedots  malmal ke jism itanaa bhii paanii men mat nahaa 2 dar hai kahiin ye paanii bhii ban jaae naa sharaab ai jaanechaman teraa goraa badan threedots ai jaanechaman threedots  baagon ke aas paas bhii jaanaa na bhuul ke 2 hogaa bharii bahaar men phuulon kaa jii karaab ai jaanechaman teraa goraa badan threedots ai jaanechaman threedots  tujhako banaanewaalaa bhii sau koshishen kare 2 laa na sakegaa dhuundh ke teraa koii jawaab ai jaanechaman teraa goraa badan threedots 2 ai jaanechaman threedots

Title: thii shubha suhaaga kii raat madhur
Lyrics: thi subh suhaag ki raat madhur madhu chalak rahaa thaa kan kan mem sapane jagate the nainom mem aramaan machalate the man mem  saradaar magan man jhum rahaa pal pal har amg phadakataa thaa hothom par pyaas mahakati thi praanom mem pyaar dhadakataa thaa  tab hi ghunghat mem muskaati  pag paayal cham cham chamakaati raani anthapur mem ayi kuch sakuchaati kuch saramaati  memhadi se haath rache donom maathe par kumakum kaa tikaa goraa mukhadaa muskaa de to punam kaa chaand lage fikaa  dhire se badh chudaavat ne 2 raani kaa ghunghat pat kholaa nas nas mem kaumdh gi bijali pipal patte saa tan dolaa  adharom se adhar mile jab tak lajjaa ke tute chand bandh ran bigul dvaar par gunj uthaa 2 sahanaai kaa svar hua mand  bhujabandhan bhulaa alimgan alimgan bhul gayaa chumban chumban ko bhul gi saansem  saansom ko bhul gi dhadakan  sajakar suhaag ki sej saji 2 bolaa n yuddh ko jaaungaa teri kajaraari alakom mem man moti aj bithaaungaa  pahale to raani rahi maun phir jvaal jvaal si bhadak uthi bin badaal bin barakhaa maano kyaa bijali koi tadap uthi  ghaayal naagan si bhaunh taan ghunghat ukaadakar yun boli talavaar mujhe de do apani tum pahan raho chudi choli  pinjade mem koi band sher 2 sahasaa sote se jaag uthe yaa andhi andar liye hue jaise pahaad se ag uthe  ho gayaa khadaa tan kar raanaa haathom mem bhaalaa uthaa liyaa har har bam bam bam mahaadev 2 kah kar ran ko prasthaan kiyaa  dekhaa jab pati kaa vir vesh pahale to raani harshaai  phir sahami jhijhaki akulaai ankhom mem badali ghir ai  baadal si gi jharokhe par 2 parakati hansini thi adhir ghode par chadhaa dikhaa raanaa jaise kamaan par chadhaa tir  donom ki ankhem hui chaar chudaavat phir sudhabudh khoi sandes pathaakar raani ko  mangavaayaa premachihn koi  sevak jaa pahunchaa mahalom mem raani se maangi sainaani raani jhijhaki phir chikh uthi boli kah de mar gaii raani  le khadg haath phir kahaa thahar le sainaani le sainaani ambar bolaa le sainaani dharati boli le sainaani  rakh kar chaandi ki thaali mem  sevak bhaagaa le sainaani raanaa adhir bolaa badhakar laa laa laa laa laa sainaani  kapadaa jab magar uthaayaa to rah gayaa khadaa murat banakar lahuluhaan raani kaa sir hansataa thaa rakhaa thaali par  saradaar dekh kar chikh uthaa haa haa raani meri raani adbhut hai teri kurbaani tu sachamuch hi hai xatraani  phir ed lagaai ghode par dharati boli jay ho jay ho haadi raani teri jay ho o bhaarat maan teri jay ho 4

Title: jaane kitane dukh sah kar  dekhii terii duniyaa are
Lyrics: jaane kitane dukh sah kar patthar hiiraa banataa hai barason kii qurbaanii se insaan farishtaa banataa hai  dekhii terii duniyaa are dekhe tere kaam kisii ghar men subah kisii ghar men shaam dekhii terii duniyaa threedots  ye duniyaa hai miit kushii kii dukh men shaamil koii nahiin sab hain ghaayal karane vaale inamen ghaayal koii nahiin jo auron ke dard men tadape kyaa aisaa dil koii nahiin hai 2 dekhii terii duniyaa threedots  ik aangan men ujalii kiranen ik aangan men hai andhiyaaraa ik daaman men mahakii kaliyaan ik daaman men hai angaaraa apanaa sukh jo sabako baante dardar bhatake vo dukhiyaaraa 2 dekhii terii duniyaa threedots  siidhaa rastaa chalane vaalaa har manzil pe thokar khaae sach ko duniyaa dhokhaa samajhe jhuuth ke aage sar ko jhukaae sabakaa hamadam sabakaa saathii is duniyaa men kuchh naa paae 2 dekhii terii duniyaa threedots  dorangii chaal samay kii dukh men thahare sukh men bhaage chaahe dukh ho chaahe sukh ho dil hai vahii jo nisdin jaage jo karataa hai jag men aisaa vo aataa hai usake aage dekhii terii duniyaa threedots

Title: aap ke paas jo aaegaa pighal jaaegaa
Lyrics: aap ke bhiige hue jisam se aanch aatii hai dil ko garmaatii hai jazbaat ko bhadakaatii hai  aap ke paas jo aaegaa pighal jaaegaa is haraarat se jo ulajhegaa vo jal jaaegaa  aap kaa husn vo shabanam hai jo sholon men pale garm khushbuon men tapate hue rangon men dhale kisakaa dil hai jo sambhaale se sambhal jaaegaa  honth hain yaa kisii shaayar kii duaaon kaa javaab zulf hain yaa kisii saavan ke talabagaar kaa kvaab aise jalavon ko jo dekhegaa machal jaaegaa  is kadar husn zamaane men na dekhaa na sunaa usakaa kyaa kahanaa jise aapane hamaraaz chunaa usakii taqadiir kaa iinaam badal jaaegaa

Title: is duniyaa men jiinaa ho to sun lo merii baat
Lyrics: is duniyaa men jiinaa ho to sun lo merii baat gam chhod ke manaa lo rang relii aur maan lo jo kahe kittii kelii  jiinaa usaka jiinaa hai jo hansate gaate jiile zulfon kii ghanaghor ghataa men nain ke baadal piile aish ke bandon aish karon tum chhodo ye kaamoshii aaii hain rangiin bahaaren lekar din rangiile  main alabelii chingaarii huun naachuun aur laharaauun daaman daaman phuul khilaauun aur kushiyaan barasaauun duniyaa vaalon tum kyaa jaano jiine kii ye baaten aao merii mahafil men main ye do baaten samajhaauun

Title: mujhe mil gayaa bahaanaa terii diid kaa
Lyrics: mujhe mil gayaa bahaanaa teri diid ka  kaisi khushii leke aya chaand iid ka  mujhe mil gayaa bahaanaa teri diid ka  2  zulf machalake khul khul jaaye  chaal men mastii ghul ghul jaaye ghul ghul jaaye  aisi khushi aaj milii aaj milii aisi khushi  aankhon main naam nahiin niind ka  mujhe mil gayaa bahaanaa threedots  jaagatii aankhen bunatii hain sapane  tujhako bithaake pahaluu men apane pahaluu men apane  dil kii lagi aisi badii aisi badi dil kii lagi  aankhon main naam nahiin niind ka  mujhe mil gayaa bahaanaa teri diid ka  kaisi khushii leke aya chaand iid ka  mujhe mil gayaa bahaanaa teri diid ka

Title: kush raho ahalechaman ham to
Lyrics: kush raho ahalechaman ham to chaman chhod chale kush raho ahalechaman kaaq parades kii chhaanenge vatan chhod chale kush raho ahalechaman threedots  bhuul jaanaa hamen ham yaad ke qaabil hii nahiin 2 kyaa pataa den ki hamaarii koii manzil hii nahiin apanii taqadiir ke dariyaa kaa to saahil hii nahiin kush raho ahalechaman threedots  koii bhuule se hamen puuchhe to samajhaa denaa ek bujhataa huaa diipak use dikhalaa denaa aankh jo usakii chhalak jaae to bahalaa denaa kush raho ahalechaman threedots  roz jab raat ke aanchal men sitaare honge 2 ye samajh lenaa ki vo ashq hamaare honge aur kis haal men ham dard ke maare honge kush raho ahalechaman threedots

Title: kaise kahuun tujhase jiyaa kii main batiyaan
Lyrics: kaise kahuun kaise kahuun tujhase jiyaa kii main batiyaan sharmaae man tore aage morii laajon men kho jaaen ankhiyaan  jabjab tere paas aauun nain milate hii sudhbudh ganvaauun 2 rahrahake dil meraa dhadake piyaa main tujhase kuchh kah na paauun main tujhase kuchh kah na paauun morii laagii na jaane tuu saiyaan  balamaa nahiin tujhase duurii phir bhii aashaa nahiin hotii puurii 2 aisaa hai kuchh haal dil kaa jaise chhaae bahaaren adhuurii chhaae bahaaren adhuurii jaise khilane se ruk jaae kaliyaan

Title: balamaa khulii havaa men
Lyrics: balamaa khulii havaa men mahakii huii fizaa men dil chaahataa hai meraa bahakanaa idhar udhar   pag pag chaluun balakhaatii  khud bhii na jaanuun kahaan kahataa hai ye dil matavaalaa  aaj apanaa hai saaraa jahaan ho ho ho threedots balamaa khulii havaa men threedots   chhun chhun bole morii paayal  aajaa kahe saajanaa  aajaa ke ye saare nazaare  sainyaa phiike hain tere binaa ho ho ho threedots balamaa khulii havaa men threedots

Title: ishq diivaanaa husn bhii ghaayal donon taraf ik
Lyrics: ishq diivaanaa husn bhii ghaayal donon taraf ik dardejigar hai dil kii tadap kaa haal na puuchho jitanii idhar hai utanii udhar hai ishq diivaanaa husn bhii threedots  apane fasaane dil ke taraane yaa tum samajho yaa ham jaanen tumako hamaare dil kaa pataa hai hamako tumhaare dil kii kabar hai ishq diivaanaa husn bhii threedots  bikharii zulfen aanchal dhalakaa lab pe tabassum halkaahalkaa pyaar men ham to khoe hain lekin aaj tumhen bhii hosh kidhar hai dil kii tadap kaa threedots  chaandsitaare shok nazaare sab hain tumhaare husn ke ghaayal husn ko rakhanaa apane bachaa ke dekho tumhiin par sabakii nazar hai ishq diivaanaa husn bhii threedots

Title: pyaar kii daastaan tum suno to kahen
Lyrics: pyaar kii daastaan tum suno to kahen kyaa karegaa sunake jahaan tum suno to kahen                                                                                  do dilon ke milane se sau diye jal jaate hain aarzuu kii manzil tak raaste sab aate hain ham kahaan se aae kahaan tum suno to kahen                                                                                  bas yahii to puuchhaa thaa ek din kuchh sharmaake kyon gagan yuun milataa hai is zamiin se ghabaraake ho gae sab aramaan jawaan tum suno to kahen

Title: allaahoakabar banaae jaa bigaade jaa
Lyrics: allaahoakabar 2 banaae jaa bigaade jaa bigaade jaa banaae jaa ki ham tere chiraag hain jalaae jaa bujhaae jaa 2  har qadam pe saath hain andhere bhii ujaale bhii kaisii tere shaan hai giraae bhii sambhaale bhii jo naa kabhii dekhe vo tamaashe tuu dikhaae jaa ki ham tere chiraag threedots  sar pe saayaa maut kaa hai aur hamako jiinaa hai apane haathon apane hii dil ke zakm siinaa hai jo tujhe manzuur hai vo kaam tuu karaae jaa ki ham tere chiraag threedots  maanaa ye sab khel hai qismat kii lakiiron kaa phir bhii tere haath hai faisalaa taqadiiron kaa duniyaa kii taqadiiron ko jagaae jaa sulaae jaa ki ham tere chiraag threedots

Title: chandramaa jaa un se kah de
Lyrics: chandramaa jaa un se kah de naa bano itane kathor baat takate ho gaii giilii mere palakan kii kor 2 chandramaa jaa un se kah de  la kahanaa tujh bin adhakhilaa maathe kaa tiikaa hai ma kahanaa tujh bin ye meraa sansaar phiikaa hai la ho chandramaa jaa un se kah de  la kahanaa ab naa sah sakuungii virah kii jvaalaa ma tuut jaae naa kahiin merii saans kii maalaa la ho chandramaa jaa un se kah de  la ye basantii raat kaate nahiin katatii  ma ye ghadii nishthur ghadii ghatate nahiin ghatatii la un charan kii raah men ye nain bhatake hai ma unake darshan ke liye ye praan takate hain la ho chandramaa jaa un se kah de

Title: tukade hain mere dil ke ai yaar tere aansuu
Lyrics: tukade hain mere dil ke e yaar tere aansuu   dekhe nahiin jaate hain diladaar tere aansuu   2  katare nahiin chhalake ye aankhon ke piyaalon se  motii hain muhobbat ke in phuul se gaalon pe in phuul  bahane nahiin duungaa bekaar tere aansuu  dekhe nahiin jaate   ashkon se bharaa dekhuun kaise terii aankhon ko  ai jaan ye sulagataa gam de de merii aankhon ko de de merii palakon pe uthaa luungaa sau baar tere aansuu  dekhe nahiin jaate

Title: diivaanon se ye mat puuchho
Lyrics: diivaanon se ye mat puuchho diivaanon pe kyaa guzarii hai haan unake dilon se ye puuchho aramaanon pe kyaa guzarii hai diivaanon se ye mat puuchho   threedots  auron ko pilaate rahate hain aur kud pyaase rah jaate hain ye piine vaale kyaa jaane paimaanon pe kyaa guzarii hai diivaanon se ye mat puuchho   threedots  maalik ne banaayaa inasaan ko inasaan muhabbat kar baithaa vo uupar baithaa kyaa jaane inasaanon pe kyaa guzarii hai diivaanon se ye mat puuchho   threedots

Title: main kyaa karuun raam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa
Lyrics: main kyaa karuun raam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa haay haay buddhaa mil gayaa  main gudiyaa hasiin merii moranii sii chaal hai sar men safed usake daadaa jii saa baal hai bigadegaa har kaam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa main kyaa karuun raam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa   threedots  sab jo gaye baag meraa buddhaa bhii chalaa gayaa sab to laaye phuul buddhaa gobhii le kar aa gayaa main ho gaii badanaam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa main kyaa karuun raam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa   threedots  pariyon ke desh mujhe buddhaa le kar aa gayaa main ne jo uthaayaa ghuunghat buddhaa gussaa khaa gayaa ab kyaa hogaa anjaam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa main kyaa karuun raam mujhe buddhaa mil gayaa   threedots

Lyrics: chaahe laakh karo tum puujaa tiirath karo hazaar 	diindukhii ko thukaraayaa to sabkuchh hai bekaar  	gariibon kii suno vo tumhaarii sunegaa 2 	tum ek paisaa doge vo das laakh degaa do 	gariibon kii suno threedots  ra 	bhuukh lage to ye bachche aansuu pii kar rah jaate hain 	haay gariibon kii majabuurii kyaakyaa ye sah jaate hain 	ye bachapan ke din hain ghadii khelane kii aa 	umar ye nahiin aise dukh jhelane kii ra 	taras khaao inape ai aulaad vaalon 	uthaa lo inhen bhii gale se lagaa lo aa 	uthaa lo inhen bhii gale se lagaa lo ra 	murajhaae naa phuul kahiin ye aandhii aur barasaat men do 	gariibon kii suno threedots  aa 	badaqismat biimaar ye buudhaa qadamqadam par girataa hai 	phir bhii in bachchon kii kaatir haath pasaare phirataa hai ra 	kahiin inakaa ye saath naa chhuut jaae aa 	anaathon kii ye aas bhii tuut jaae ra 	kahaan jaaenge ye muqaddar ke maare 	ye bujhate die timatimaate sitaare aa 	ye bujhate die timatimaate sitaare ra 	in beghar bechaaron kii qismat hai tumhaare haath men do 	gariibon kii suno threedots

Title: ai sanam jisane tujhe chaand sii suurat dii hai
Lyrics: ai sanam jisane tujhe chaand sii suurat dii hai usii maalik ne mujhe bhii to mohabbat dii hai ai sanam jisane tujhe threedots  phuul uthaa le to kalaaii men lachak aa jaae tujh hasiinaa ko kudaa ne vo nazaaqat dii hai main jise pyaar se chhuu luun vo hii ho jaae meraa usii maalik ne threedots  main guzarataa hii gayaa terii hasiin raahon se ik tere pyaar ne kyaakyaa mujhe himmat dii hai mere dil ko bhii zaraa dekh kahaan tak huun main usii maalik ne threedots  tuu agar chaahe to duniyaa ko nachaa de zaalim chaal dii hai tujhe maalik ne qayaamat dii hai main agar chaahuun to patthar ko banaa duun paanii usii maalik ne threedots

Title: mujhe dekh kar aapakaa muskaraanaa
Lyrics: threedots aapakaa muskaraanaa mujhe dekh kar aapakaa muskaraanaa muhabbat nahiin hai to phir aur kyaa hai ho threedots  mujhe dekh kar aapakaa muskaraanaa  o ho ho threedots mujhe tum begaanaa kah lo yaa ke diivaanaa magar ye diivaanaa jaane dil kaa fasaanaa banaavat men dil kii haqiiqat chupaanaa muhabbat nahiin hai to phir aur kyaa hai ho threedots  mujhe dekh kar aapakaa muskaraanaa  o ho ho threedots khayaalon men khoyii khoyii rahatii ho aise musaafir kii chalatii phiratii tasaviir jaise adaa aashiqii kii nazar shaayaraanaa muhabbat nahiin hai to phir aur kyaa hai ho threedots  mujhe dekh kar aapakaa muskaraanaa

Title: jo vaadaa kiyaa vo nibhaanaa padegaa
Lyrics: jo vaadaa kiyaa vo nibhaanaa padegaa roke zamaanaa chaahe roke khudaaii tumako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots  tarasatii nigaahon ne aavaaz dii hai muhabbat kii raahon ne aavaaz dii hai jaanehayaa jaaneadaa chhodo tarasaanaa tumako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots  ye maanaa hamen jaan se jaanaa padegaa par ye samajh lo tumane jab bhii pukaaraa hamako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots  ham apanii vafaa pe naa ilazaam lenge tumhen dil diyaa hai tumhe jaan bhii denge jab ishq kaa saudaa kiyaa phir kyaa ghabaraanaa tumako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots  chamakate hain jab tak ye chaand aur taare na tuutenge ab ehadopaimaan hamaare ik duusaraa jab de sadaa hoke diivaanaa hamako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots   hamaarii kahaanii tumhaaraa fasaanaa hameshaa hameshaa kahegaa zamaanaa kaise bhalaa kaisii sazaa dede zamaanaa hamako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots  sabhii ehaleduniyaa ye kahatii hai hamase ki aataa nahiin koii mudake adam se aaj zaraa shaanevafaa dekhe zamaanaa tumako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots  bahut jii lagaayaa zamaane se hamane bahut vaqt kaataa bahaane se hamane jab se huaa tumase judaa ye dil na maanaa tumako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaa kiyaa  ham aate rahe hain ham aate rahenge muhabbat kii rasamen nibhaate rahenge jaanevafaa tum do sadaa fir kyaa thikaanaa hamako aanaa padegaa jo vaadaathreedots

Title: aankh men shokii lab pe tabassum
Lyrics: mannaa aankh men shokii lab pe tabassum        dil men sharaarat taubaa taubaa       gaal pe laalii chaal matavaalii       is pe nazaaqat taubaa taubaa       aankh men shokii aa aa o o mmmm  suman chaal men jaaduu ho yaa nazaaqat       aap se ham ko pyaar nahiin       aur kisii par daaliye dore       kah to diyaa sau baar nahiin       ajii kah to diyaa sau baar nahiin mannaa terii naa naa naa men haan haan haan kaa       rangemuhabbat taubaa taubaa       aankh men shokii threedots  suman bandaaparavar dekhiye ab to       haath bhii ham ne jod diye       jin raahon men lailaa bhatakii       ham ne vo raste chhod diye       ajii ham ne vo raste chhod diye manna ajii sun sun sun mujhe chun chun chun       terii zid hai qayaamat taubaa taubaa       aankh men shokii threedots  suman pyaar karen yaa ham naa karen ye       soch ke ham batalaaenge       itanaa ham ne jaan liyaa hai       aap nahiin baaz aaenge       ajii aap nahiin baaz aaenge manna chalii chham chham chham arii tham tham tham       haay kar naa bagaavat taubaa taubaa       aankh men shokii threedots

Title: phir miloge kabhii is baat kaa vaadaa karalo
Lyrics: rafii  phir miloge kabhii is baat kaa vaadaa karalo  hamase ek aur mulaakaat kaa vaadaa karalo      2  dil har baat adhuurii hai adhuurii hai abhii apanii ek aur mulaakaat zaruurii hai abhii      2 chand lamhon ke liye saath kaa vaadaa karalo hamase ek aur mulaakaat kaa vaadaa karalo phir miloge kabhii is baat kaa vaadaa karalo  aashaa  aap kyuun dilakaa hansiin raaz mujhe dete hain kyuun nayaa nagamaa nayaa saaz mujhe dete hain main to huun duubii huii pyaar kii tuufaanon men aap saahil se hii aavaaz mujhe dete hain kal bhii honge yahiin jazabaat ye vaadaa karalo rafii  hamase ek aur mulaakaat kaa vaadaa karalo phir miloge kabhii is baat kaa vaadaa karalo hamase ek aur mulaakaat kaa vaadaa karalo

Title: dhokhaa khaaegii naa yaaron kii nazar
Lyrics: loshe   dhokhaa khaaegii naa yaaron kii nazar jii haan ye hai diladaaron kii nazar 2 laakh chhupo tum dhuundh hii lenge ham tumako dilabar baakudaa  dhokhaa khaaegii naa yaaron kii nazar jii haan ye hai diladaaron kii nazar  are loshe   diivaane mastaane ham jidhar jaaen halachal machaaen chhaa jaaen mahafilon par har aramaan ik tuufaan sachchaa hai pyaar pahalii hai baar jaaduu kare dilon par baakudaa baakudaa baakudaa  e dhokhaa khaaegii naa yaaron kii nazar jii haan ye hai diladaaron kii nazar  o qurbaan   tadapaake tarasaake tum aaj chaahe banake paraae thukaraa do pyaar meraa ai phuulo are mat bhuulo ginatii ke chaar din kii bahaar har shab kaa hai saveraa baakudaa baakudaa baakudaa  e he dhokhaa khaaegii naa yaaron kii nazar jii haan ye hai diladaaron kii nazar  o loshe loshe   dil meraa alabelaa chaahataparast rahataa hai mast jis haal men jahaan hai tum aksar vaade kar jaate ho bhuul ye kyaa usuul ye bhii koii zubaan hai baakudaa baakudaa baakudaa  e he dhokhaa khaaegii naa yaaron kii nazar jii haan ye hai diladaaron kii nazar

Title: shiishe se pii yaa paimaane se pii
Lyrics: shiishe se pii yaa paimaane se pii yaa merii aankhon ke maikaane se pii par pii diivaane kushii se jii diivaane 2 shiishe se pii yaa paimaane se pii  husn khadaa hai terii raahon men daal de baahen zaraa baahon men 2 raat suhaanii hai bahakii javaanii pii le nigaahon hii nigaahon men  jaan le aankhon ke ishaaron ko luut le duniyaa kii bahaaron ko 2 main huun sanam terii tujhako qasam merii chhed le tuu bhii dil ke taaron ko  dekh ye ghadii phir naa aayegii zulfon kii ghataa phir naa chhaayegii baat samajh merii kal ye umar terii mausam kii tarah biit jaayegii

Title: ham diivaane tere dar se nahiin talane vaale
Lyrics: aa ham diivaane tere dar se nahiin talanevaale ham diivaane haay hum diivaane tere ham diivaane tere dar se nahiin talanevaale aur machalenge abhii tujhape machalanevaale 2 aur machalenge are machalenge machalenge machalenge aur machalenge abhii tujhape machalanevaale ham diivaane tere dar se nahiin talanevaale  phuul saa rang bhii hai husn bhii hai ruup bhii hai are phuul saa rang bhii hai aur husn bhii hai ruup bhii hai spoken aa phir mere ishq kaa suuraj bhii hai aur dhuup bhii hai phir mere ishq kaa suuraj bhii hai aur dhuup bhii hai recited  ab to ye pyaar ke saaye nahiin dhalane vaale aur machalenge abhii tujhape machalanevaale ham diivaane tere dar se nahiin talanevaale  berukhii ne tere zaalim hamen barabaad kiyaa berukhii ne tere zaalim hamen barabaad kiyaa    recited  aise bhuule ke na bhuule se hamen yaad kiyaa aise bhuule ke na bhuule se hamen yaad kiyaa yaad kiyaa yaad kiyaa phuulse dil ko nigaahon se masalanevaale aa ham diivaane tere dar se nahiin talanevaale

Lyrics: ra 	merii pahalii aarazuu kaa ye salaam yaad rakhanaa 	meraa naam hai mohabbat meraa naam yaad rakhanaa aa 	jahaan dil se dil mile the vo muqaam yaad rakhanaa 	meraa naam hai tamannaa meraa naam yaad rakhanaa ra 	merii pahalii aarazuu threedots  aa 	ye khiliikhilii fizaaen ye jhukiijhukii ghataaen 	ye rukiirukii sii baaten ye dabiidabii sadaaen ra 	yahii subah pyaar kii hai yahii shaam yaad rakhanaa ra 	merii pahalii aarazuu threedots  ra 	mere dil pe chhaa gayaa hai tere ruup kaa saveraa 	nae chaand se hai roshan terii zulf kaa andheraa aa 	mere pyaar ke jahaan kaa ye payaam yaad rakhanaa ra 	merii pahalii aarazuu threedots  aa 	terii har adaa men dekhiin maine jannaton kii raahen ra 	mere dil men bas gaii hain terii madabharii nigaahen aa 	yahii daur yaad rakhanaa yahii jaam yaad rakhanaa ra 	merii pahalii aarazuu threedots

Lyrics: sunje dil waale buuhe aje main naiyon dhoe ve tuun jam jam aaven channan taaryaan dii loe  sunje viraan buuhe doors aje abhii tak dhonaa to close loelight from lo  khile sadhraan de jode lekhiin gunjalaan ne piyaan pal vii palak naa lagadii niindaan udpud gaiyaan kaure kinne jagaraate mere naal naal roe  gunjalaanknots kaure kabar nahiinnot knownuncertain kinnehow manyungint jagaraatesleepless nights  kambade hunjuwaan de diive hauke lendii ai havaa raahiin vichhiyaan ne akhiyaan ghadriyaan ginade ne saah shaalaa jind daa akiir tere peraan ch hoe  ch is short for vichmen saahsaans
