Title: kaliikalii mandalaae bhanwaraa
Lyrics: kaliikalii mandalaaye bhanwaraa kahiin bhii chain na paae sabhii se nain milaae pagalaa harajaaii kahalaae  naye navele pyaar ke mele isake man ko bhaae ham dukhiyaare birahaa ke maare chhup chhup niir bahaae hamen rulaataa jaaye bhanwaraa aap naye sukh paae  miit hai kisake giit ye isake jhuuthii hain sab taane kyaa hotii hai pyaar bharii lay harajaaii kyaa jaane haath lagaane aae bhanwaraa baat bane ud jaae  ghun ghun gaaye ruup churaae dekar pyaar kii lorii laakh sataaye phir bhii lubhaae is chhaliye kii chorii kaash meraa ban jaae bhanwaraa aur kahiin naa jaae  sabhii se nain milaae pagalaa harajaaii kahalaae

Title: phuul tumhen bhejaa hai khat men
Lyrics: phuul tumhen bhejaa hai kat men phuul nahiin meraa dil hai priiyatam mere tum bhii likhanaa kyaa ye tumhaare qaabil hai pyaar chhipaa hai kat men itanaa jitane saagar men motii chuum hii letaa haath tumhaaraa paas jo mere tum hotii phuul tumhen bhejaa hai kat men threedots  niind tumhen to aatii hogii kyaa dekhaa tumane sapanaa aankh khulii to tanhaaii thii sapanaa ho na sakaa apanaa tanhaaii ham duur karenge le aao tum shehanaaii priit lagaa ke bhuul na jaanaa priit tumhiin ne sikhalaaii phuul tumhen bhejaa hai kat men threedots  kat se jii bharataa hii nahiin ab nain mile to chain mile chaand hamaarii anganaa utare koii to aisii rain mile milanaa ho to kaise mile ham milane kii suurat likh do nain bichhaaye baithe hain ham kab aaoge kat likh do phuul tumhen bhejaa hai kat men threedots

Title: koii bechaaraa dil ko khokar
Lyrics: date 2 aug 2004 141557 0700 from asroyusyahoocom arunabha s roy     koii bechaaraa koii bechaaraa dil ko khokar khoj rahaa hai chaahat kaa maaraa  jaise jaise buund buund chaand ghulegaa ankhiyon men ek aur kaab ghulegaa roshanii kii duur duur dhuul udegii dhiire dhiire raastaa ye raaz khulegaa ek diiwaanaa jaag rahaa hai sapanon kaa maaraa koii bechaaraa threedots  mat jaao os ke shiishon se paanv na kat jaaen zaraa raahon se ye kaanch uthaa luun bairii chaandanii kii aanch bujhaa luun mat jaao os ke shiishon se paanv na kat jaaen  jhuk gayii hai aankh to salaam kiyaa hogaa dil ne shaayad hansake tera naam liyaa hogaa kal kyaa hogaa aaj na jaane raahii banjaaraa koii bechaaraa threedots

Title: vo parii kahaan se laauun terii dulhan jise banaauun
Lyrics: vo parii kahaan se laauun terii dulhan jise banaauun ki gorii koii pasand na aae tujhako ki chhorii koii pasand na aae tujhako  ye to merii hai sahelii dilavaalii alabelii jaise motiyaa chamelii jaise pyaar kii pahelii   solah saal kii umar kokokole sii kamar   rattii bhar bhii qasar kahiin aaye na nazar   kuchh huaa hai asar gol juude men ye venii aur venii men ye tahanii kaise juudiyon se ped ugaae ye gangaaraam kii samajh men na aae   vo parii kahaan se laauun     aankh jisakii hai billii naam yisakaa hai lillii aise kajare kii dhaar jaise tiikhii talavaar   o dekh honthon kaa ye rang dekh chalane kaa dhang   kate angrezii baal baandhaa reshamii rumaal   bolo kyaa hai khayaal ise jab liyaa taq meraa rang huaa faq chhorii hoke ye hajaamat karaae ye gangaaraam kii samajh men na aae   vo parii kahaan se laauun       naam isakaa kamal jaise ganne kii fasal jaise khilaa hai gulaab dekh puuraa hai panjaab   dekh ruup kii vumang jaise hiranii kaa ang   jaise miithii ho khajuur aisaa mukhade pe nuur   bol hai manzuur ye to naache chhamchham meraa nikale hai dam ise bhangadaa kaun nachaae ye gangaaraam kii samajh men na aae   vo parii kahaan se laauun       ye to sindh se hai aaii padhii ba kii padhaaii tang kurataa paijaamaa ye to chhokarii hangaamaa   jaise titalii ke ang jaise vudatii patang   jaise koyal kii kuu jaise khilii khushabuu   kahatii i love you he pirabhu he pirabhu tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu aise nakhare kaun uthaae ye gangaaraam kii samajh men na aaye   vo parii kahaan se laauun     na ye dil kii hai chhotii na ye pyaar kii hai khotii zaraa ho gaii hai motii tab bhii lagatii hai chhotii   dekh isakii muscle ghii khaatii hai asal   tere kheton men ye jaaen tere hal bhii chalaaen   tere bade kaam aae mujhe karo na hairaan ye to lage pahalwaan ise kasarat kaun karaae ye gangaaraam kii samajh men na aaye   vo parii kahaan se laauun       chhodo ye to hai naadaan kare sab ko hairaan nahiin samajhegaa pyaar bilakul hai ganvaar   ise rahane do kanvaaraa phirane do maaraamaaraa   aao ham sab jaaen mazaa isakaa jataaen   hosh isake udaaen ye honth jab khole baarbaar yahii bole gangaaraam kii samajh men na aaye   ye gangaaraam kii samajh

Title: dil kii tamannaa thii mastii men manzil se sad version
Lyrics: dil kii tamannaa thii mastii men manzil se bhii duur nikalate apanaa bhii koii saathii hotaa ham bhii bahakate chalatechalate dil kii tamannaa   saathii milaa yuun to magar raste men thaa chaandii kaa nagar  2 chaandii kii nagarii bhaaii use ham rah gae aankhen malatemalate dil kii tamannaa   usane ye dil thukaraa diyaa shiishaa hii thaa sonaa to na thaa  2 sikkon kii jhanakaar men kho gaye giit vafaa ke dhalatedhalate dil kii tamannaa   yaadon kii dhuul aankhon men hai daaman kii hasarat haathon men hai  2 khwaabon ke viiraane men tanahaa thak gayaa raahii chalatechalate dil kii tamannaa

Title: dhuundhe nazarnazar meraa chaand hai kidhar
Lyrics: dhuundhe nazarnazar meraa chaand hai kidhar aa jagamagaake yuun muskuraake mujhako rahe na apanii khabar  dole kadamkadam banaa husn bhii sitam dil ko bachaake kud ko chhupaake aakhir kahaan ab le jaaen ham  aajaa ke main huun tere vaaste aankhon kii shamaa jalaae hue vo shokh nazaren jo piichhaa karen badhate kadam dagamagaae hue dil ko bachaakethreedots  kah do hamako na dekhe koii aise ke ye dil dhadakane lage main kyaa karuun mere siine men jab ek aag miithii bhadakaane lage dil ko bachaake threedots

Title: un kaa badhaa jo haath yahaan dil lutaa diyaa
Lyrics: vo saadagii kahen ise diivaanagii kahen un kaa badhaa jo haath yahaan dil lutaa diyaa  aanchal ki ot ho na ho ab nasiib men ab nasiin men mainne charaag aaj havaa men jalaa diyaa un kaa badhaa jo haath yahaan dil lutaa diyaa  ye kaun sochataa hai ke sajadaa qubuul ho sajadaa qubuul ho ye kaun sochataa hai kahaan sar jhukaa diyaa un kaa badhaa jo haath yahaan dil lutaa diyaa  pahale pahal ke dard kii lazzat na puuchhiye lazzat na puuchhiye uthii jo dil men huuk to main muskuraa diyaa un kaa badhaa jo haath yahaan dil lutaa diyaa

Title: vafaa jinase kii bevafaa ho gae vo vaade mohabbat ke kyaa ho gae
Lyrics: ho gae do roz men aabaad bhii barabaad bhii ab tamannaa hai yahii aae na unakii yaad bhii  vafaa jinase kii bevafaa ho gae vo vaade mohabbat ke kyaa ho gae  jo kahate the ham ko sadaa hain tumhaare zamaane men sabase jinhe ham the pyaare vo hii aaj hamase judaa ho gae  vo itanaa bataa den kabhii paas aake milaa kyaa unhen hai hamen yuun mitaake kataa kyaa thii jo vo kafaa ho gae  mere saamane bhii agar ab vo aaen na dikhengii unako ye bebas nigaahen vo jinake lie ham fanaa ho gae

Title: sajanaa sajanaa kaahe bhuul gae din pyaar ke
Lyrics: sajanaa sajanaa kaahe bhuul gae din pyaar ke sajanaa sajanaa main to haar gaii re pukaarake sajanaa ho a a  baithii rahii main sapane sajaake bindiyaa lagaake piyaa mehandii rachaake 2 taras na aayaa tujhe gayaa tadapaake sajanaa sajanaa kaahe threedots  baat takuun main saanjh savere auron kii to raaten mere din bhii andhere 2 saaraa jag suunaa suunaa laage bin tere sajanaa sajanaa kaahe threedots  duniyaa ne to dard na jaanaa tuu bhii huwaa hai kaahe mujhase begaanaa 2 aajaa re bulaaye tujhe guzaraa zamaanaa sajanaa sajanaa kaahe threedots

Title: vo bijalii hain ham sholaa aaj naa jaane kyaa hogaa
Lyrics: vo bijali hain ham sholaa aaj na jaane kyaa hogaa  chaand se takkar suuraj kii lo aayaa din qayaamat kaa  ho ho ho yaaron husn kii ishk se ye pahali mulaakaat hai  aa haa haa vallaah kyaa baat hai oh ho ho vallaah kyaa baat hai   hote hain kaafir yuun to allaahallaah kahate hain dilabar jinako  dil ko udaa len hans ke taubaataubaa aataa hai jaaduu inako  lekin hamase jo aankh milii to khaa gaye vo bhii chakkar  sab naaz vo apane bhuul gaye aur bhuul gaye sab akad  unako paanii piinaa padaa ye hai naazuk vaqt badaa  chaand se takkar suuraj kii lo aayaa  aisii bhii kyaa madahoshi dekhodekho hosh nahiin anchal kaa  kahati hai saaf nigaahen allaah kasam haal buraa hai dil kaa  hai baat abhii to aankhon tak aage zaalim kyaa hogaa  jab dil ko chhuu legii najar jaane aalam kyaa hogaa  chaand se takkar suuraj kii lo aayaa

Title: rangolii sajaao re  terii paayal mere giit
Film: rungoli a colourful pattern of life
Lyrics: rangolii sajaao re rangolii sajaao 2 terii paayal mere giit aaj banenge donon miit  2 rangolii sajaao threedots  niilgagan par chamakaa taaraa maine samajhaa teraa ishaaraa ban gaii dhadakan premsandesaa shaayad mujhako tuune pukaaraa tere dar par laaii priit 2 rangolii sajaao threedots  dard ke sur men raag hai meraa pyaar kii lay par naach hai teraa jiivan biinaa baaje suriilii jo sur bole naam le teraa arpan tujh par har sangiit rangolii sajaao threedots

Title: duur bahut aabaadii se ishq kii rangiin vaadii se
Lyrics: la 	aa haa aa mu 	 duur bahut aabaadii se ishq kii rangiin vaadii se 	ye kaun sadaa detaa hai la 	pyaar bharaa ik dil hogaa yaa koii bismil hogaa 	jo apanaa pataa detaa hai  2  la 	aa haa aa mu 	laharaatii sii ye raahen na jaane kisako chaahen 2 la 	kisake diidaar kii pyaasii hain inakii khulii nigaahen 2 	aas lagaaye baithe rahanaa bhii to mazaa detaa hai mu 	duur bahut aabaadii se ishq kii rangiin vaadii se 	ye kaun sadaa detaa hai la 	pyaar bharaa ik dil hogaa yaa koii bismil hogaa 	jo apanaa pataa detaa hai  la 	aa haa aa mu 	ye parabat uuncheuunche kaamoshii ke afasaane 2	 la 	kyuun duur khade bastii se honge ye bhii diiwaane 2 	jaane kiskis ko diiwaanaa pyaar banaa detaa hai  mu 	duur bahut aabaadii se ishq kii rangiin vaadii se 	ye kaun sadaa detaa hai la 	pyaar bharaa ik dil hogaa yaa koii bismil hogaa 	jo apanaa pataa detaa hai

Title: naach re man badkammaa thumakthumak badakammaa
Lyrics: naach re man badkammaa thumakthumak badakammaa main bhii naachuun tuu bhii naache har koii naache badakammaa naach re man threedots  paayal merii bole laaj ke ghuunghat khole paayal merii bole o jo dekhe rah jaae dil kii duniyaa dole 2 naach re man threedots  ho mausam hai matavaalaa ho niind udaane vaalaa ho mausam hai matavaalaa aa tanman rangataa jaae ikik rang niraalaa 2 naach re man threedots  dil lut jaanaa chaahe mitmit jaanaa chaahe ho dil lut jaanaa chaahe ho aaj kisii ke dil se dil takaraanaa chaahe 2 naach re man threedots

Title: buraa lagataa hai lage duniyaa ko
Lyrics: buraa lagataa hai lage duniyaa ko apanii marajii se jiyuungaa main to  2  siidhii chaal chaluun yaa tedhii main manamaujii diivaanaa bhare hue ko chhoduun le luun khaalii paimaanaa jis haal men huun achchhaa huun kyaa lenaa mujhe duniyaa se buraa lagataa hai lage threedots  kushiyaan merii gam bhii mere duniyaa kaa ehasaan na luun bikataa hai jo baazaaron men main aisaa iimaan na luun meraa dard mubaarak mujhako duniyaa kii jhuuthii davaa se buraa lagataa hai lage threedots

Title: chale jaa chale jaa chale jaa jahaan pyaar mile
Lyrics: chale jaa chale jaa chale jaa  jahaan pyaar mile  2  itane bade jahaan men koii to miit hogaa is gam kii baansurii men koii to giit hogaa chale jaa chale jaa threedots  chalanaa hii zindagii hai rukanaa hai maut terii ai zindagii ke raahii kis baat kii hai derii chale jaa chale jaa threedots  aavaaz de rahii hai manzil tujhe suhaanii badhataa hii chal musaafir har saans ik kahaanii chale jaa chale jaa threedots

Title: paayal vaalii dekhanaa
Lyrics: lachakat chamakat chalat kaaminii dadhigun damakat chapal daaminii o baanvarii o saanvarii arii o chanchal palchhin ruk jaa ruk jaa ruk jaa  paayal vaalii dekhanaa yahiin pe kahiin dil hai pag tale aaye naa  jaise daamaniyaa badaraa men ude kuchh duur chale phir jaa ke mude uthaa re nayan kajaraare par itanaa samajh le kisii kii lage haaye na paayal vaalii dekhanaa threedots  kit jhuum chalii madiraa sii piye matavaarii pavan acharaa men liye zamaanaa hai yuun hii mastaanaa dekho jii rut binaa kaalii ghataa chhaaye na paayal vaalii dekhanaa threedots  kahiin aisaa na ho koii baat bane angadaaii merii teraa naach bane naacho rii na ban ke chakorii ghuunghar kahiin dhadakan merii ban jaaye na paayal vaalii dekhanaa threedots

Title: jazbaaeishq jo salaamat hai
Lyrics: ra 	jazbaaeishq jo salaamat hai to inshaaallaah 	kachche dhaage men chale aaenge sarakaar bandhe  	ishq men jab shikave lab talaq aaenge 	dil to dil patthar bhii sun ke hil jaaenge 	 ishq kii ham pe  2 inaayat hai to inshaaallaah 	kachche dhaage men threedots  su 	jazbaaeishq jo salaamat hai inshaaallaah 	kachche dhaage men threedots  	ishq men jab shikave lab talaq aaenge 	dil to dil patthar bhii sun ke hil jaaenge 	 ishq kii ham pe  2 inaayat hai to inshaaallaah 	kachche dhaage men threedots  	ham pukaaren lekin aap ruk jaate hain 	do qadam chalane men paanv dukh jaate hain 	 ye adaaon kii  2 nazaakat hai to inshaaallaah 	kachche dhaage men threedots  ra 	dil ko kyaa rokoge dil to beqaabuu hai su 	haay badaa hii zaalim pyaar kaa jaaduu hai ra 	aapako hamase su 	aapako hamase do 	aapako hamase mohabbat hai to inshaaallaah 	kachche dhaage men threedots

Title: rokanaa hai agar rok liije magar chaand chhupane se pahale
Lyrics: rokanaa hai agar rok liije magar chaand chhupane se pahale chalii jaauungii 2 duur hai meraa ghar mujhako duniyaa kaa dar  chaand chhupane se threedots  chaand nikalaa magar chaandanii kho gaii har taraf husn kii roshanii ho gaii aap chaand hain agar chaand ko dekh kar chaand chhupane se threedots  aap shaamil hain yuun merii aavaaz men jaise nagamen hon do ek hii saaz men main gazal chhed kar ishq ke saaz par chaand chhupane se threedots  bahakiibahakii nigaahen nahiin hosh men pyaar sharamaae aankhon ke aagosh men hans ke siine pe sar rakh to duungii magar chaand chhupane se threedots

Title: ham tumhaare ho chuke hain
Lyrics: ham tumhaare ho chuke hain hamako tumase pyaar hai zindagii men tum nahiin to zindagii bekaar hai  ye hamaare dil kii baaten tumane kaise jaan liin yuun samajh lo dil ne dil kii dhadakanen pahachaan liin kaun jaane ye hamaarii jiit hai yaa haar hai  merii duniyaa jagamagaa dii tumane apane nuur se tumane merii maang bhar dii pyaar ke sinduur se dil se ab dil kaa judaa honaa bahut dushwaar hai

Title: piyaa aiso jiyaa men samaay gayo re
Lyrics: piyaa aiso jiyaa men samaay gayo re  ki main tan man kii sudh budh gavaan baithii   2 har aahat pe samajhii vo aay gayo re jhat ghuunghat men mukhadaa chhupaa baithii piyaa aiso jiyaa men samaay gayo re threedots  more anganaa men jab puravayyaa chalii  more dvaare kii khul gai kivaadiyaan     2 o daiyaa dvaare kii khul gai kivaadiyaan maine jaanaa ki aa gaye saanvariyaa more    2 jhat phuulan kii sejiyaa pe jaa baithii piyaa aiso jiyaa men samaay gayo re threedots  maine sinduur se maang apanii bharii  ruup saiyaan ke kaaran sajaayaa      2 o maine saiyaan ke kaaran sajaayaa is dar se kisii kii nazar na lage      2 jhat nainan men kajaraa lagaa baithii piyaa aiso jiyaa men samaay gayo re threedots

Title: aap ko bhuul jaaen ham
Lyrics: aap ko bhuul jaaen ham itane to bewafaa nahiin aap se kayaa gilaa karen aap se kuchh gilaa nahiin  ham to samajh rahe the ye tum mile payaar mil gayaa ik tere dard ke sivaa ham ko to kuchh milaa nahiin  shishaaedil ko todanaa unakaa to ek khel hai ham se hii bhuul ho gaii unakii koii kataa nahiin  kaash vo apane gam mujhe deden to kuchh sukuun mile kitanaa vo badnasiib hai gam bhii jise milaa nahiin

Title: o o terii aankhon men pyaar maine dekh liyaa
Lyrics: ra 	o o terii aankhon men pyaar maine dekh liyaa gorii tuu laakh chhupaa la 	tuu bhii hai beqaraar maine dekh liyaa sainyaa na baat banaa  ra 	jhukiijhukii palaken uthaao zaraa gorii la 	ankhiyaan na daalo sainyaa ankhiyon men morii ra 	ab to main jaan gayaa gorii terii chorii 	terii aankhon men pyaar threedots  la 	dhiiredhiire chalanaa ye raahen anajaanii ra 	bachapan biitaa kaise biitegii javaanii la 	main huun naadaan main na jaanii ye kahaanii 	tuu bhii hai beqaraar threedots  ra 	kaahe terii batiyaan lage hain badii pyaarii la 	maine bhii tere lie sudh hai bisaarii ra 	isako hii pyaar kahe duniyaa ye saarii 	terii aankhon men pyaar threedots

Title: aaj duniyaa badii suhaanii hai
Lyrics: aaj duniyaa badii suhaanii hai 2 kaisii rangiin zindagaanii hai 2 aaj duniyaa badii threedots  jaane kyuun aaj dil men rahrah kar miithemiithe kyaal aate hain jaane kyuun aaj mere honthon par kuchh adhuure savaal aate hain ye haqiiqat hai yaa kahaanii hai 2 aaj duniyaa badii threedots  yuun nazar aa rahaa hai jaise koii aaj mere qariib aataa ho aur dil kii hasiin raahon men zindagii ke die jalaataa ho jaane kisakii ye meharabaanii hai 2 aaj duniyaa badii threedots

Title: rimjhim ke giit saavan gaae haay
Lyrics: ra rimjhim ke giit saavan gaae haay    bhiigiibhiigii raaton men la honthon pe baat dilakii aae haay    bhiigiibhiigii raaton men  la teraa meraa puuchhe naataa    badii vo ye ghataa ghanghor hai    chup huun aise men kah do kaise    meraa saajan nahiin tuu koii aur hai    ke teraa naam honthon pe mere terethreedots    sapane merii aankhon men  ra rimjhim ke giit saavan gaae haay    bhiigiibhiigii raaton men  ra meraa dil bhii hai diivaanaa    tere nainaa bhii hain naadaan se    kuchh na sochaa kuchh na dekhaa    kuchh bhii puuchhaa na is anjaan se    chal pade saath ham aise kaise    banake saathii raahon men   ra rimjhim ke giit saavan gaae haay    bhiigiibhiigii raaton men     badii lambii jii kii baaten    badii chhotii barakhaa kii raat jii la kahanaa kyaa hai sunanaa kyaa hai    kahane sunane kii ab kyaa baat hai rala bin kahe bin sune dil ne dilase    kar liin baaten baaton men  ra rimjhim ke giit saavan gaae haay    bhiigiibhiigii raaton men la honthon pe  baat dilakii aae haay    bhiigii bhiigii raaton menthreedots

Title: jaane vaalon zaraa mud ke dekho mujhe
Lyrics: jaane vaalon zaraa mud ke dekho mujhe  ek insaan huun main tumhaarii tarah		2 jisane sabako rachaa apane hii ruup se usakii pahachaan huun main tumhaarii tarah jaane vaalon zaraa threedots  is anokhe jagat kii main taqadiir huun	2 main vidhaataa ke haathon kii tasaviir huun ek tasaviir huun is jahaan ke liye dharatii maan ke liye shiv kaa varadaan huun main tumhaarii tarah jaane vaalon zaraathreedots  man ke andar chhipaae milan kii lagan		2 apane suuraj se huun ek bichhadii kiran ek bichhadii kiran phir rahaa huun bhatakataa main yahaan se vahaan aur pareshaan huun main tumhaarii tarah jaane vaalon zaraathreedots  mere paas aao chhodo yah saaraa bharam		2 jo meraa dukh vahii hai tumhaaraa bhii gam hai tumhaaraa bhii gam dekhataa huun tumhe jaanataa huun tumhe laakh anjaan huun main tumhaarii tarah jaane vaalon zaraathreedots

Title: le ke sahaaraa tere pyaar kaa dekhe rastaa
Lyrics: le ke sahaaraa tere pyaar kaa dekhe rastaa teraa haay koii beqaraar saa  khilii to hai daaliidaalii kalii terii yaad kii magar tere gam kaa sholaa lagaataa hai aag sii 2 sanam hai suhaanaa zamaanaa ye bahaar kaa le ke sahaaraa tere threedots  dil hii milaa aisaa hamako nasiib se bahale na dekhe binaa tujhako kariib se 2 kahe hai diivaanaa diivaanaa main huun yaar kaa le ke sahaaraa tere threedots  kabhii ghar se baahar aake merii chaahat dekhate patharaa gae do nainaa terii raah dekhate 2 zaraa sun ke jaanaa afasaanaa intazaar kaa le ke sahaaraa tere threedots

Title: teraa dil mere dil se jo aan milaa
Lyrics: teraa dil mere dil se jo aan milaa2 diye jagamag chamake nainan men teraa dil mere dil se jo aan milaa2 diye jagamag chamake nainan men teraa dil mere dil se jo aan milaa2  pyaar ke tuune mujhe pankh lagaae2 mast jawanii merii udiiudii jaae udiiudii jaae piyuu tere gun gaae meraa jiyaa koii koyal jaise saawan men teraa dil mere dil se jo aan milaa2  sunatii huun sapanon men dhadakan terii2 man chaahe ban jaauun dulhan terii dulhan terii ho albele mere saanwariyaa tere nagame rache hain merii jhaanjhan men teraa dil mere dil se jo aan milaa2  samajhegaa tuu jo mere nainon kii bolii2 pyaar lutaauungii main bharbhar jholii bharbhar jholii ye to bataa de mere bhole piyaa kab mujhase milegaa mere aangan men teraa dil mere dil se jo aan mila2 diye jagamag chamake nainan men teraa dil mere dil se jo aan milaa2

Title: sapanon men agar mere tum aao to so jaauun
Lyrics: sapanon men agar mere tum aao to so jaauun 2 sapanon men agar mere baahon ki agar maalaa pehanaao to so jaauun 2 sapanon men agar mere  sapanon men kabhii saajan baitho mere paas aake jab siine pe sar rakh duun main pyaar men sharamaate ek giit muhabbat kaa tum gaao to so jaauun 2 sapanon men agar mere  biitii huii wo yaaden hansatii huii aatii hain leharon kii tarah dil men aatii kabhii jaatii hain yaadon kii tarah tum bhii aa jaao to so jaauun 2 sapanon men agar mere tum aao to so jaauun 2 sapanon men agar mere

Title: zamaane ne maare javaan kaisekaise
Lyrics: zamaane ne maare javaan kaisekaise zamiin khaa gaii aasamaan kaisekaise pale the jo kal rang men dhuul men hue darbadar kaaravaan kaisekaise zamaane ne maare threedots  hazaaron ke tan kaise shiishe hon chuur jalaa dhuup men kitanii aankhon kaa nuur chehare pe gam ke nishaan kaisekaise zamaane ne maare threedots  lahuu ban ke bahate vo aansuu tamaam ki hogaa inhiin se bahaaron kaa naam banenge abhii aashiyaan kaisekaise zamaane ne maare threedots

Lyrics: ma 	e jii o o 	kuchh to bolo 	itanii kyuun hamase naaraaz ho aa 	main tumhen jaan gaii 	hato pahachaan gaii 	jaao jaao jii tum ho bade wo  ma  aisaa kyaa kasuur huaa gorii taabedaar se 2 aa  gairon se milate ho jii tum to bade pyaar se 2 ma  zaraa sii ye galatii hai 	ajii ye to chalatii hai 	ab to mem saab maaf kar do  aa 	main tumhen jaan gaii 	hato pahachaan gaii 	jaao jaao jii tum ho bade wo ma 	e jii o o 	kuchh to bolo 	itanii kyuun hamase naaraaz ho aa 	main tumhen jaan gaii 	hato pahachaan gaii 	jaao jaao jii tum ho bade wo  ma  jaise bhii ham hai tumhaare hain raanii 2 aa  haath meraa chhodiye jii badii meharabaanii 2 ma 	chhodo ye gussaa chhodo 	puraanaa qissaa chhodo 	e jii dil todo naa musakaraa do  aa 	main tumhen jaan gaii 	hato pahachaan gaii 	jaao jaao jii tum ho bade wo ma 	e jii o o 	kuchh to bolo 	itanii kyuun hamase naaraaz ho aa 	main tumhen jaan gaii 	hato pahachaan gaii 	jaao jaao jii tum ho bade wo  aa 	naazuk hai dil meraa ab naa dukhaanaa 2 	waranaa padegaa tumhen jii baad men pachhataanaa 2 ma 	todenge naa pyaarii 	ham to wafaadaarii 	jab bhii jii chaahe aazamaa lo  aa 	main tumhen jaan gaii 	hato pahachaan gaii 	jaao jaao jii tum ho bade wo ma 	e jii o o 	kuchh to bolo 	itanii kyuun hamase naaraaz ho aa 	main tumhen jaan gaii 	hato pahachaan gaii 	jaao jaao jii tum ho bade wo

Title: kabhii to milegii kahiin to milegii
Lyrics: kabhii to milegii kahiin to milegii bahaaron kii manzil raahii bahaaron kii manzil raahii   threedots  lambii sahii dard kii raahen dil kii lagan se kaam le aankhon ke is tuufaan ko pii jaa aahon ke baadal thaam le duur to hai par duur nahiin hai nazaaron kii manzil raahi bahaaron kii manzil raahii   threedots  aa haa haa haa la laa laa la la ah haa haa ha ha  maanaa ki hai gaharaa andheraa gum hai dagar kii chaandanii mailii na ho dhundhalii pade na dekh nazar kii chaandanii daale hue hai raat kii chaadar sitaaron kii manzil raahii bahaaron kii manzil raahii   threedots  hone ko hai sukh kaa ujaalaa ashkon ke taare dhal gaye har suu tere naqsheqadam ke phuulon ke diipak jal gaye dekh to mud ke saath hai tere sahaaron kii manzil raahii threedots

Title: aaj tumase duur ho kar aise royaa meraa pyaar
Lyrics: aaj tumase duur ho kar aise royaa meraa pyaar chaand royaa saath mere raat royi baar baar  kuchh tumhaare bandishen hain kuchh hain mere daayare jab muqaddar hii bane dushman to koi kyaa kare hay koi kyaa kare is mukaddar par kisikaa kyaa hai aakhir ikhtiyaar chaand royaa saath mere raat royi baar baar threedots  har tamannaa se judaa main har khushii se duur huun ji rahaa huun kyonki jiine ke liye majabuur huun hay main majabuur huun mujhako marane bhii na degaa ye tumhaaraa intazaar chaand royaa saath mere raat royi baar baar threedots

Title: mujhe mubaaraq puraanii yaaden  mahalon ne chhiin liyaa

Title: allaah jaane main huun kaun kyaa hai meraa naam
Lyrics: allaah jaane main huun kaun kyaa hai meraa naam chaahe kah lo alaah diin chaahe raadheshyaam  main yaar jin dinon men bambaii men thaa maujuud aate jaate log samajhate the mujhako mahamuud aa phir bhii milaa na koii filmon men kaam chaahe kah lo alaah diin chaahe raadheshyaam threedots  suurat hai jangalii jaisii aavaaraa jaise baal mere baare men is duniyaan kaa hai ye kayaal aa pariyaan samajhatii hain mujhe gulafaam chaahe kah lo alaah diin chaahe raadheshyaam threedots  dekhii hai saarii duniyaan merii hai ye taariif ab main apane gaanv vaapas laayaa huun tashariif subah kaa bhulaa ghar laut aayaa shaam chaahe kah lo alaah diin chaahe raadheshyaam threedots

Title: main sunaataa huun tujhe  tuu ho ke badaa ban jaanaa
Lyrics: main sunaataa huun tujhe ek kahaanii sun le o mere laal zaraa merii jabaanii sun le  mere nanhe mere munne merii aulaad hai tuu maine bhagavaan se jo kii thii vo fariyaad hai tuu  baap huun teraa magar tujhako khilaa sakataa nahiin donon haathon se kabhii tujhako uthaa sakataa nahiin  tuu agar chaahe ki ban jaauun main teraa ghodaa jo na ban paauun to dukh hogaa tujhe bhii thodaa  lekin ik baat mere bachche tujhe yaad rahe 2 dil terii maan kaa tere pyaar se aabaad rahe  tuu ho ke badaa ban jaanaa apanii maataa kaa rakhavaalaa badaqismat ke ghar men huaa hai paidaa qismatavaalaa tuu ho ke badaa threedots  tere do haathon kii taaqat hii taqadiir hai terii mehanat jisakaa naam hai betaa vo jaagiir hai terii har mushkil se lada sakataa hai do do haathon vaalaa tuu ho ke badaa threedots  dekh kisii ke raste kii diivaar kabhii naa honaa 2 jab tak jaage teraa padosii tab tak tuu na sonaa dard paraaye kaa letaa hai koii nasiibon vaalaa tuu ho ke badaa threedots  paanv jahaan tere pad jaaen phuul vahaan khil jaaen 2 pyaar se tere bichhade dil bhii aapas men mil jaaen 2 kahataa hai ye chaand saa mukhadaa tuu hai muhabbat vaalaa tuu ho ke badaa threedots

Title: bhor bhae nit suuraj uge  kabar morii naa liinii re
Lyrics: bhor bhae nit suuraj uge saanjh pade dhal jaae aise hii morii aas bandhe bandhbandh kar mit jaae  kabar morii naa liinii re bahut din biite  biite re bahut din biite  gokul kii ye galiyaan roen madhuban kii ye kaliyaan roen yamunaa roe raadhaa roe rasavantii rangaraliyaan roen more shyaam haay roeroe mere do nainaa bhae riite bahut din biite threedots  sapane men to daras dikhaa de kuchh dhiiraj bandh jaae 2 sapanaa bhii to kis vidhi aae jab nindiyaa nahiin aae more shyaam haay roeroe mere do nainaa bhae riite bahut din biite threedots

Title: jaane vaale zaraa hoshiyaar yahaan ke ham hain raaj kumaar
Lyrics: jaane vaale zaraa hoshiyaar yahaan ke ham hain raaj kumaar oy hoy aage piichhe hamaarii sarakaar yahaan ke ham hain raaj kumaar oy hoy jaane vaale  amariikii andaaz bhii siikhe ham yoraph ke raaz bhii siikhe ham se jo baazii le kar jaaye hai koii aisaa saamane aaye saarii duniyaa men apanii jayakaar yahaan ke ham hain raaj kumaar   threedots  hamase muhabbat hamase javaanii rang bharii hai apanii kahaanii  dard saa apane dil men jo paayaa jaan gaye ham kisane bulaayaa unase hii milane jhuum ke nikale bhaii thaath se nikale dhuum se nikale unako bhii hai hamaaraa intazaar yahaan ke ham hain raaj kumaar   threedots

Title: ham dil kaa kanval denge jisako
Lyrics: ham pyaar kaa saudaa karate hain ek baar 2 chaahe mit jaaen chaahe mar jaaen 2 ham pyaar kaa saudaa threedots  ishq teraa aag hai to isamen jalate jaaenge maut ho yaa zindagii ham saath chalate jaaenge ham vo nahiin hain pyaar ke raahii jo duniyaa se dar jaaen ham pyaar kaa saudaa threedots  chaahe badale aasamaan aur chaahe badale ye zamiin aankh niichii ho vafaa kii aisaa ho sakataa nahiin ham tuufaan men daal ke kashtii duub ke paar utar jaaen ham pyaar kaa saudaa threedots

Title: tum sitam aur karo tuutaa nahiin dil ye abhii
Lyrics: tum sitam aur karo tuutaa nahiin dil ye abhii ham bhii kyaa yaad karenge tumhen chaahaa thaa kabhii tum sitam aur karo threedots  ye vahii honth hain jo giit mere gaate the aaj kyaa ho gayaa kyon ho gaye begaane sabhii tum sitam aur karo threedots  apane khvaabon kaa jahaan mujhamen kabhii dhuundhaa thaa tum vahii ho ki kabhii tumane mujhe puujaa thaa dekhate ho hamen aise ki na dekhaa ho kabhii tum sitam aur karo threedots

Lyrics: pad gaye jhuule saawan rut aaii re pad gaye jhuule 2 siine men huuk uthe allaah duhaaii re pad gaye jhuule saawan rut aaii re pad gaye jhuule  chanchal jhonken munh ko chuumen buunden tan se khele 2 peng badhen to jhukate baadal paanv kaa chumban le len paanv kaa chumban le len peng badhen to jhukate baadal paanv kaa chumban le len hamako na bhaaye sakhii aisii dhitaaii re pad gaye jhuule saawan rut aaii re pad gaye jhuule  giiton kaa ye allahad mausam jhuulon kaa ye melaa 2 aisii rut men hamen jhulaane aaye koii alabele aaye koii alabele aisii rut men hamen jhulaane aaye koii alabele thaame to chhode nahiin naazuk kalaaii re  pad gaye jhuule saawan rut aaii re pad gaye jhuule

Title: sun le baapuu ye paigaam merii chitthii tere naam
Lyrics: sun le baapuu ye paigaam merii chitthii tere naam chitthii men sabase pahale likhataa tujhako raam raam likhataa tujhako raam raam sun le baapuu ye paigaam  kaalaa dhan kaalaa vyaapaar rishwat kaa hai garam baazaar saty ahinsaa karen pukaar tuut gayaa charakhe kaa taar tere anashan satyaagrah ke badal gaye asalii bartaav ek naii vidyaa upajii jisako kahate hain gheraav terii kathin tapasyaa kaa ye kaisaa nikalaa anjaam  praant praant se takaraataa hai maayaa par bhaashaa kii laat main panjaabii tuu bangaalii kaun kare bhaarat kii baat terii hindii ke paanv men angrejii na daalii dor terii lakadii thagon ne thag lii terii bakarii le gaye chor saabaramatii sisakatii terii tadap rahaa hai sevaagraam  raam raaj kii terii kalpanaa udii hawaa men ban ke kapuur bachchon ne padhanaa chodaa tod phod men hain magaruur netaa ho gaye dal badaluu desh kii pagadii rahe uchhaal tere puut bigad gaye baapuu daaruu bandii huii halaal tere raajaghaat par phir bhii phuul chadhaate subah shaam

Title: hogaa tumase kal bhii saamanaa kal to jaanoge
Lyrics: hogaa tumase kal bhii saamanaa kal to jaanoge dilavaalaa naachiiz hai koii tab to maanoge  mausam hai pyaar kaa ye samaan mere saath hai manzil hai merii ghadii do ghadii kii ye baat hai laa laa laa laa hogaa tumase kal threedots  aate ho jaate ho mere kyaalon men tum sadaa banate ho kyon ajanabii ye bhii kyaa hai koii adaa laa laa laa laa hogaa tumase kal threedots  raahon men milatii ho chaahe jidhar se jaauun main behatar hai ghar pe bulaalo bataa do kab aauun main laa laa laa laa hogaa tumase kal threedots

Title: paas baitho tabiiyat bahal jaayegii
Lyrics: paas baitho tabiiyat bahal jaayegii maut bhii aa gaii ho to tal jaayegii  dhaar kaajal kii tum aur tiikhii karo maang honthon kii miithii hansii se bharo zindagii jhuumane par machal jaayegii  maut bhii aa gaii ho to tal jaayegii threedots  ham ne maanaa ki chhaaii hai kaalii ghataa gore gaalon se gesuu hataa do zaraa is andhere men ik shammaa jal jaayegii maut bhii aa gaii ho to tal jaayegii threedots  gam ne chhedaa hamen tum na chhedaa karo jo tumhaare hain un se na pardaa karo muskuraa do tamannaa nikal jaayegii maut bhii aa gaii ho to tal jaayegii paas baitho threedots

Title: subhaan allaah hasiin cheharaa ye mastaanaa adaaen
Lyrics: subhaan allaah haay hasiin cheharaa haay subhaan allaah hasiin cheharaa ye mastaanaa adaaen kudaa mahafuuz rakhe har balaa se har balaa se  tumhen dekhaa haay to dil bolaa haay tumhen dekhaa to dil bolaa tumako duun duaaen kudaa mahafuuz rakhe threedots  kare puujaa zamaanaa jisakii vo tasviir ho tum milaa karatii hai jannat jisase vo taqadiir ho tum qamar patalii haay nazar bijalii haay zulfen hain yaa ghataaen kudaa mahafuuz rakhe threedots  na jaane kisakii qismat men hai mukhadaa chaand saa ye na jaane kisake ghar chamakegaa tukadaa chaand kaa ye ijaazat ho to phir ham bhii muqaddar aazamaaen kudaa mahafuuz rakhe threedots  badii hasarat se tumako dekhataa hai ye zamaanaa sunaanaa chaahataa hai har koii apanaa fasaanaa koii dil ho koii mahafil jahaan bhii aap jaaen kudaa mahafuuz rakhe threedots

Title: goregore chaand se mukh par kaaliikaalii aankhen hain
Lyrics: goregore chaand se mukh par kaaliikaalii aankhen hain dekh ke jinako niind ud jaae vo matavaalii aankhen hain goregore chaand se threedots  munh se pallaa kyaa sarakaanaa is baadal men bijalii hai  duur hii rahanaa  2 inase qayaamat dhaane vaalii aankhen hain goregore chaand se threedots  be jinake andher hai sab kuchh aisii baat hai inamen kyaa  aankhenaankhen  3 sab hain baraabar kaun niraalii aankhen hain goregore chaand se threedots  be dekhe aaraam nahiin hai dekho to dil kaa chain gayaa  dekhane vaale  3 yuun kahate hain kyaa bholiibhaalii aankhen hain goregore chaand se threedots

Title: tiir aankhon kaa jigar ke paar kar do yaar tum
Lyrics: tiir aankhon kaa jigar ke paar kar do yaar tum jaan le lo yaa ki jaan ko nisaar kar do yaar tum tiir aankhon kaa threedots  ham tumhaare dil tumhaaraa phir tumhen dar kaahe kaa shauq se tirachhii nazar ke vaar kar do yaar tum jaan le lo yaa ki threedots  kab talak tadapaa karenge ham vafaa kii raah men aaj apane pyaar kaa ikaraar kar do yaar tum jaan le lo yaa ki threedots

Title: ham jaan lutaa denge apanii saajan kii jaan
Lyrics: ham jaan lutaa denge apanii saajan kii jaan se pahale 2 o naag tujhe dasanaa hogaa mujhako mahamaan se pahale ham jaan lutaa denge threedots  haathon men lagii hai mehandii isamen na zahar bhar denaa kahatii hai navelii dulhan dulhan kaa suhaag na lenaa ghuunghat meraa kyon khol rahaa mere aramaan se pahale ham jaan lutaa denge threedots  jis raah pe chalataa hai tuu ab isako badalanaa hogaa ruk jaa re nahiin to tujhako merii jaan pe chalanaa hogaa mere pyaar se jo ulajhanaa chaahe ulajhe merii aan se pahale ham jaan lutaa denge threedots  main haar nahiin maanuungii sunakar phunkaar tihaarii tuu bhii dushman ban jaa re dushman ye duniyaa saarii duniyaa kii tarah le le badalaa tuu bhii apamaan se pahale ham jaan lutaa denge threedots

Title: phir tere shahar men lutane ko chalaa aayaa huun
Lyrics: phir tere shahar men lutane ko chalaa aayaa huun 2 phir vahii jaan vahii dil laayaa huun phir tere shahar men threedots  dekh kis shaan se aayaa hai teraa saudaaii shor baajon kaa kahiin hai to kahiin shahanaaii saarii duniyaa ko main tamaashaaii banaa laayaa huun phir tere shahar men threedots  tuu na ghabaraa ke teraa ghuunghat main na uthane duungaa zindagii chaahe lute pyaar main na lutane duungaa dil ke shiishe ko patthar kaa banaa laayaa huun phir tere shahar men threedots  terii is maang men sinduur sajaane ke lie  surk menhadii tere haathon men rachaane ki lie kuunedil laayaa huun aur kuunejigar laayaa huun phir tere shahar men threedots  baat rah jaatii insaan rahe yaa na rahe yaar kii aan rahe jaan rahe yaa na rahe yaar ke naam par mitane to chalaa aayaa huun phir tere shahar men threedots

Title: mast nazar dekh idhar ham hain vahii dilavaale
Lyrics: mast nazar dekh idhar ham hain vahii dilavaale ishq men jo dete hain jaan ham hain vahii matavaale mast nazar dekh threedots  dekhaa ye husn jab se meraa dil hii kho gayaa hai mere dost puuchhate hain kyaa tumako ho gayaa hai mast nazar dekh threedots  gairon se hans ke baaten hamase nazar churaanaa mujhe maar hii na daale teraa ruk ye qaatilaanaa mast nazar dekh threedots  terii ek nazar pe zaalim qismat kaa faisalaa hai jiine kii aarazuu hai marane kaa hausalaa hai mast nazar dekh threedots

Title: puuchho na hamen ham unake liye
Lyrics: puuchho na hamen ham unake liye  kyaa kyaa nazaraane laaye hain dene ko mubaarakabaad unhen aankhon men ye aansuu aaye hain 	 2   jiivan kii suhaanii raahon men unako ek jiivan miit milaa aur hansatii huii is mahafil se hamako birahaa kaa giit milaa kaliyon kii tarah threedots musakaaye the ham threedots kaliyon kii tarah musakaaye the ham phuulon kii tarah murajhaaye hain puuchho na hamen ham unake liye threedots  tuufaan hazaaron saath lie jiivan kii dhaaraa bahatii hai aur dekhake usakii maujon ko taqadiir yah hansakar kahatii hai saahil ke lie jo threedots tadape the threedots saahil ke lie jo tadape the vah aaj bhanvar men aae hain puuchho na hamen ham unake liye threedots

Title: main nigaahen tere chehare se hataauun kaise
Lyrics: main nigaahen tere chahare se hataauun kaise lut gae hosh to phir hosh men aauun kaise main nigaahen tere chahare se hataauun kaise main nigaahen  chhaa rahii thii terii mahakii huii zulfon kii ghataa terii aankhon ne terii aankhon ne pilaa dii to main piitaa hii gayaa taubaa taubaa taubaa taubaa taubaa taubaa vo nashaa hai ki bataauun kaise main nigaahen  merii aankhon men gileshikave hain aur pyaar bhii hai aarazuen bhii aarazuen bhii hain aur hasaratediidaar bhii hai itane tuufaan tuufaan itane tuufaan main aankhon men chhupaauun kaise main nigaahen  shok nazaren ye sharaarat se na baaz aaengii kabhii ruuthengii kabhii ruuthengii kabhii mil ke palat jaaengii tujh se nibh jaaegii nibh jaaegii  tujh se nibh jaaegii main in se nibhaauun kaise main nigaahen    endindian

Title: diivaanaa mujh saa nahiin is ambar ke niiche
Lyrics: diivaanaa mujh saa nahiin is ambar ke niiche 2 aage hai qaatil meraa aur main piichhepiichhe diivaanaa mujh saa threedots  paayaa hai dushman ko jab se pyaar ke qaabil tab se ye aalam hai rastaa yaad na manzil niind men jaise chalataa hai koii chalanaa yuun hii aankhen miinche diivaanaa mujh saa threedots  hamane bhii rakh dii hain kal pe kal kii baaten 2 jiivan kaa haasil hain pal do pal kii baaten do hii ghadii kaa saath rahegaa karanaa kyaa hai tanahaa jii ke diivaanaa mujh saa threedots

Title: merii tasaviir lekar kyaa karoge tum
Lyrics: ra merii tasaviir lekar kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar    merii tasaviir lekar kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar     merii tasaviir lekar diledil jeer lekar    lutii jaagiir lekar jalii taqadiir lekar    kyaa karoge kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar    merii tasaviir lekar kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar  aa chale ho ab na jaane kab miloge    sabab koii banegaa tab miloge    na jiine kaa na marane kaa bahaanaa    kategaa kaise fursat kaa zamaanaa    hamen de jaao ek apanii nishaanii    badii hogii tumhaarii maharabaanii    sukuun kii to koii tadabiir hogii    hamaare paas ye tasaviir hogii  ra merii tasaviir bhii mujhasii kahaan hai    ke ye bejaan hai ye bezubaan hai    tumhaare kaam ye na aa sakegii    tumhaaraa dil na ye bahalaa sakegii    junuun men to girahabaan chaak hogaa    ke parvaanaa to jal ke kaak hogaa    tumhaare saamane jab ham no honge    ye gam tasaviir se to kam na honge    yuunhii tadapoge tum aahen bharoge    kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar    merii tasaviir lekar kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar  aa bajah hai baat ye ham maanate hain    na bahalegii tabiiyat jaanate hain    karengii hasaraten fariyaad aksar    ke tum aayaa karoge yaad aksar    gamefurqat na hogaa yuun gavaaraa    magar thodaa saa to hogaa sahaaraa    judaaii men mulaaqaaten karenge    ke ham tasaviir se baaten karenge  ra kayaalon men basaa lo merii suurat    merii tasaviir kii hai kyaa zaruurat    merii yaadon ko samajho yaadagaaren    kizaan men bhii rahengii phir bahaaren    samay kvaabon kaa hotaa hai suhaanaa    kabhii aanaa kabhii mujhako bulaanaa    hamen ek duusare kii diid hogii    nihaagon kii dilon kii iid hogii    na maanoge to roro ke maroge    kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar    merii tasaviir lekar kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar  aa bahaane par banaate ho bahaanaa    diivaane ho banaate ho diivaanaa    kudaa jaane tumhen inakaar kyuun hai    hamen phir bhii tumhiin se pyaar kyuun hai    sitam ke tiir ham pe chhodate ho    na aisii bevafaa betiir hogii     bhalii tum se to ye tasaviir hogii  ra guzaarish aapake diladaar kii hai    vajah ek aur bhii inakaar kii hai    zamaane kii nigaahon se bachaake    ise tum laakh rakhoge chhupaake    kisii din dekh hii legaa zamaanaa    o badaa mashahuur hogaa ye fasaanaa    jo logon kii zubaan tak baat pahunche    to phir jaane kahaan tak baat pahunche    kaho kyaa pyaar ko rusavaa karoge    kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar    merii tasaviir lekar kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar  aa hamen manzoor ye rusvaaiyaan hain    ke inase bhii burii tanahaaiyaan hain  ra muhabbat ke nahiin dastuur aise    hamen charche nahiin manzoor aise  aa vafaa men log lutaate hain jaanen    tumhen aashiq bhalaa ham kaise maanen  ra shubhaa ho ishq men to imtehaan lo    merii tasaviir na lo merii jaan lo    kaho jaanevafaa ab kyaa kahoge    kyaa karoge tum meri tasaviir lekar    meri tasaviir lekarthreedots  ra zubaan kyuun ruk gaii hai    ho nigaah kyuun jhuk gaii hai    ajii ghabaraa gae kyaa    kaho sharmaa gae kyaa    abhii hai raat baqii    abhii hai baat baqii    abhii se haar baithe    dilojaan vaar baithe    nayaa andaaz koii    naii parvaaz koii    labon ko sii liyaa kyaa    zahar pii liyaa kyaa    chale taqaraar aage    chalo sarakaar aage    bane tasaviir kyaa baithe rahoge    kyaa karoge tum merii tasaviir lekar    merii tasaviir lekar    merii tasaviir lekar

Title: aaj to junalii raat maa
Lyrics: chorusolala lala huhu huhu huhu hu huaa huaa huaa ho ho latajunalii raat maa chorusho ho lataare aunas aunas aaj ko junalii raat maa choruso kailii  kyaa ho o maailii ke ho hey saailii aahaa lataho kaanchaare aunas aunas aaj ko junalii raat maa aaj ko junalii raat maa dhartii par hai aasamaan koii re ban ke chaandanii utaraa man ke aanganaa chandaa re tuu jaa na jaa  rafiaaj ko junalii raat maa dhartii par hai aasamaan koii re ban ke chaandanii utaraa man ke aanganaa latachandaa re tuu jaa na jaa bothaaj ko junalii raat maa  latachuuke man ko ik anjaanaa le udaa mujhako mastaana2 chunarii  kii dhadakane lagaa jiyaa aaj ko junalii raat maa threedots  lataare aunas aunasaaj ko junalii raat maa2  rafikiyaa hai nainon ke kaajal ne jiivan bhar kaa vaadaa pal men2 milan dhun pe tirakane lagaa jiyaa aaj ko junalii raat maa threedots  latapyaar ne sau sau ruup rachaayaa sab kahiin jaake tum ko paayaa2 rafithaam lo mujhako kii bas men nahiin jiyaa bothaaj ko junalii raat maa threedots

Title: jo hamane daastaan apanii sunaaii aap kyon roe
Lyrics: jo hamane daastaan apanii sunaaii aap kyon roe tabaahii to hamaare dil pe aaii aap kyon roe  hamaaraa dardegam hai ye ise kyon aap sahate hain ye kyon aansuu hamaare aapakii aankhon se bahate hain gamon kii aag hamane khud lagaaii aap kyon roe  bahut roe magar ab aapakii khaatir na roenge na apanaa chain khokar aapakaa ham chain khoenge kayaamat aapake ashkon ne dhaaii aap kyon roe  na ye aansuu ruke to dekhiye ham bhii ro denge ham apane aansuon men chaand taaron ko dubo denge fanaa ho jaaegii saarii khudaaii aap kyon roe

Title: ai vatan ke sajiile javaano mere nagme tumhaare liye hain
Lyrics: ai vatan ke sajiile javaano mere nagme tumhaare liye hain  sarfaroshii hai iimaan tumhaaraa jurraton ke parastaar ho tum jo hifaazat kare sarahadon kii vo falakbos diivaar ho tum ai shujaaat ke zindaa nishaano mere nagme tumhaare liye hain  biiviyon maaon behanon kii nazaren tum ko dekhen to yuun jagamagaayen jaise khaamoshiyon kii zubaan se de rahii hon vo tum ko duaayen qaum ke ai jarii paasbaan mere nagme tumhaare liye hain  tum pe jo kuchh likhaa shaairon ne us men shaamil hai aavaaz merii ud ke pahunchoge tum jis ufaq par saath jaayegii paravaaz merii chaand taaron ke ai raazadaano mere nagme tumhaare liye hain

Title: le lo le lo duaaen maan baap kii
Lyrics: le lo le lo duaaen maan baap kii sar se utaregii gatharii paap kii le lo le lo duaaen threedots  god men maan kii aankh khulii jag dekhaa baap ke kandhe chadh ke sevaa badii na hogii koii in donon kii sevaa se badhake le lo le lo duaaen threedots  dukh sahanaa maan baap kii kaatir farz to hai ehasaan nahiin karz hai inakaa tere sar par bhixaa yaa koii daan nahiin le lo le lo duaaen threedots  maatpitaa ki charan chhue jo chaar dhaam tiirath phal paae jo aashiish vo dil se den bhagavaan se bhii taalii naa jaae le lo le lo duaaen threedots

Title: machalatii huii havaa men chham chham
Lyrics: la aa aa aa aa aa ki o ho ho ho ho     machalatii huii havaa men chham chham      hamaare sang sang chalen gangaa kii laharen	 2 la o zamaane se kaho akele nahiin ham     hamaare sang sang chalen gangaa kii laharen koras zamaane se kaho threedots  ki hariyaalii sii chhaa jaatii hai      chhaanv men in ke aanchal kii	 2 la sar ko jhukaa ke naam lo in ke     ye to hai shaktii nirabal kii     himaalay ne bhii chuume hain in ke qadam koras machalatii huii threedots      zamaane se kaho threedots  la sukh men duubaa tan man us kaa      aayaa jo in ke aangan men	 2 ki pyaar kaa pahalaa darpan dekhaa     duniyaa ne in ke darshan men     ke yuun hii nahiin khaate ham in kii qasam koras zamaane se kaho threedots     machalatii huii threedots  ki saath diyaa hai in laharon ne      jab sab ne munh pher liyaa	 2 la aur kabhii jab gam kii jalatii     dhuup ne ham ko gher liyaa     to aao in ke hii qadamon men jhuk jaaen ham koras machalatii huii threedots     zamaane se kaho threedots

Title: main aashiq huun bahaaron kaa fizaaon kaa nazaaron kaa
Lyrics: main aashiq huun bahaaron kaa fizaaon kaa nazaaron kaa main mastaanaa musaafir huun javaan dharatii ke anjaane kinaaron kaa  sadiyon se jag men aataa rahaa main nae rang jiivan men laataa rahaa main har ek des men nit nae bhes men  kabhii mainne hans ke diipak jalaae kabhii ban ke baadal aansuu bahaae meraa rastaa pyaar kaa rastaa  chalaa gar safar ko koii besahaaraa to main ho liyaa sang liye ek taaraa gaataa huaa dukh bhulaataa huaa

Title: akele hain chale aao jahaan ho
Lyrics: rafii akele hain chale aao jahaan ho 2 kahaan aavaaz den tumako kahaan ho akele hain chale aao   tumhen ham dhuundhate hain hamen dil dhuundhataa hai 2 na ab manzil hai koii na koii raastaa hai akele hain chale aao   ye tanhaaii kaa aalam aur is par aapakaa gam 2 na jiite hain na marate bataao kyaa karen ham akele hain chale aao   lataa akele hain chale aao jahaan ho 2 kahaan aavaaz den tumako kahaan ho akele hain chale aao   ye mausam ye nazaare ye chaand aur ye sitaare 2 sabhii hain yaad lekin nahiin mere sahaare akele hain chale aao   merii aankhon men aansuu mere lab pe hain aahen 2 tumhiin ko dhuundhatii hain merii viiraan nigaahen akele hain chale aao   tarasatii huun main jinako vo din aakar rahenge 2 mujhe ummiid hai ye tumhen paakar rahenge akele hain chale aao

Title: tere kayaalon men tere hii kwaabon men
Lyrics: tere kayaalon men tere hii kvaabon men din jaae rainaa jaae re jaane naa tuu saanvariyaa            2  phuulon ke mausam ne koyal kii pancham ne rangiin sapane jagaae               2 tarase bahaaron ko tere nazaaron ko dil kii kalii khil naa paae re jaane naa tuu saanvariyaa tere kayaalon men threedots  paas jo aatii huun kuchh kahane jaatii huun merii zubaan ladakhadaae          2 bebas bechaarii main apane se haarii main pachhataauun nehaa lagaae re jaane naa tuu saanvariyaa tere kayaalon men threedots  kitane bahaanon se dilakash taraanon se aavaaz terii bulaae                  2     chhupanechhupaane men yuun aanejaane men ye aag badhatii hii jaae re jaane naa tuu saanvariyaa tere kayaalon men threedots

Title: jawaan muhabbat hasiin aankhon men
Lyrics: mukesh jawaan muhabbat hasiin aankhon men kis liye muskuraa rahii hai 2 2 kyuun kyuun kyuun jii  lataa jo baat aaii thii apane dil men vo unake dil men 2 bhii aa rahii hai jo baat aaii thii  mu ye bhiigii bhiigii hasiin raaten 2 ye pyaarii pyaarii tihaarii baaten tihaarii baaten la aaa bahaar aaii bahaar aakar koii nayaa gul khilaa rahii hai 2 bahaar aaii hai  zaraa meraa haath haath men lo mu zaraa mere dil pe haath rakh do haath rakh do la kyuun kyuun kyuun jii mu suno to ik bezubaan dil se ye kaisii aawaaz aa rahii hai 2  la jo baat aaii hai tere dil men vo mere dil men 2 bhii aa rahii hai jo baat aaii hai  mu qariib aao gale lagaa luun yahaan chhupaa luun yahaan basaa luun yahaan bithaa luun la kyuun kyuun kyuun jii mu mujhe bahut pyaar aa rahaa hai la magar mujhe laaj aa rahii hai 2  dono jo baat aaii thii apane dil men vo unake dil men 2 bhii aa rahii hai jo baat aaii thii

Title: ye kis manzil pe le aaii merii badaqismatii mujhako
Lyrics: ye kis manzil pe le aaii merii badaqismatii mujhako jahaan hasarat se mud kar dekhatii hai zindagii mujhako  mere daaman men kaanten rakh die phuulon ke badale men mere maalik bataa aisii sazaa kyuun dii gaii mujhako  dilenaadaan terii baaton men aakar lut gayaa huun main bahut tadapaa rahii hai aaj merii bekasii mujhako  merii ye zindagii hai yaa andherii raat saawan kii nazar aatii nahiin ab duur tak bhii roshanii mujhako

Title: chal rii sajanii ab kyaa soche kajaraa naa baha jaaye rote rote
Lyrics: chal rii sajanii ab kyaa soche   2 kajaraa naa baha jaaye rote rote chal rii sajanii ab kyaa soche  baabul pachhataae haathon ko mal ke  kaahe diyaa parades tukade ko dil ke    2 aansu liye soch rahaa duur khadaa re chal rii sajanii threedots  mamataa kaa aangan gudiyon kaa kanganaa chhotii badii sakhiyaan ghar gali angana  chhut gayaa chhut gayaa chhut gayaa re chal rii sajanii threedots  dulhan banake gorii khadii hai  koii nahii apanaa kaisii ghadii hai    2 koii yahaan koii vahaan koii kahaan re  chal rii sajanii ab kyaa soche kajaraa naa baha jaaye rote rote chal rii sajanii ab kyaa soche

Title: phuulon se mukhade vaalii  kudaayaa kair
Lyrics: phuulon se mukhade vaalii nikalii hai ek matavaalii gulashan kii karane sair  kudaayaa kair  2  le thaam le merii baanhen uunchiiniichii hain raahen kahiin phisal na jaae pair kudaayaa kair threedots  kyaa haal nazaaron kaa hogaa kyaa rang bahaaron kaa hogaa ye husn agar muskaayaa to kyaa ishq ke maaron kaa hogaa matavaale nain hain aise taalaab men jaise do phuul rahe hon tair kudaayaa kair threedots  ye honth nahiin afasaane hain afasaane nahiin maikaane hain na jaane kisakii qismat men ye pyaar bhare paimaane hain in honthon kaa mastaanaa in zulfon kaa diivaanaa ban jaae na koii gair kudaayaa kair threedots  har ek adaa mastaanii hai ye vaqt kii raanii hai jo pahalii baar sunii maine vo rangiin kahaanii hai maujon kii tarah chalatii hai shabanam sii ye jalatii hai kaliyon se hai bair kudaayaa kair threedots

Title: dilebetaab ko siine se lagaanaa hogaa
Lyrics: r  dilebetaab ko siine se lagaanaa hogaa aaj pardaa hai to kal saamane aanaa hogaa s  aapako pyaar kaa dastuur nibhaanaa hogaa dil jhukaayaa hai to sar ko bhii jhukaanaa hogaa  r  apanii suurat ko tu ai jaanevafaa yuun na chhupaa garmiiehusn se jal jaaye na aanchal teraa lag gaii aag to mujh ko hii bujhaanaa hogaa aaj pardaa hai to   threedots  s  aaj aalam hai vo dil kaa ki bataaye na bane paas aaye na bane duur bhii jaaye na bane main huun madhosh mujhe hosh men laanaa hogaa dil jhukaayaa hai to    threedots  s  aap to itane qariib aa gaye allaah taubaa r  kyaa karen aap se takaraa gaye taubaa taubaa s  ishq in baaton se rusvaaezamaanaa hogaa r  aaj parda hai to   threedots

Title: vo din yaad karo
Lyrics: ra 	vo din yaad karo 2 	vo chhupchhup ke milanaa vo hansanaahansaanaa 	vo din yaad karo la 	vo din yaad karo 2 	vo phuulon kii chhainyaa vo mausam suhaanaa 	vo din yaad karo  ra 	phirate the aazaad ham to chaman men 2 	chaand aur suuraj hain jaise gagan men 	ab to ye jiivan hai ulajhan kii siimaa 	dhadake meraa dil ab dhiimaadhiimaa 	vo din yaad threedots  la 	jab main kalii thii tab hii bhalii thii 2 	naa koii gam thaa naa bekalii thii 	merii galii se teraa guzaranaa 	nainon ke raste dil men utaranaa 	vo din yaad threedots  ra 	ham to vahiin hain din vo kahaan hain 	dil to hamaare ab bhii javaan hain 	dil men hii tadape aramaan saare 	pyaase ke pyaase nadiyaa kinaare 	vo din yaad threedots

Title: bekudii men sanam uth gae jo qadam  aa gae paas ham
Lyrics: la 	bekudii men sanam uth gae jo qadam 	aa gae aa gae  aa gae paas ham  2 ra 	bekudii men sanam threedots  la 	aag ye kaisii man men lagii hai 	man se badii to tan men lagii hai ra 	aag nahiin ye dil kii lagii hai 	jitanii bujhaaii utanii badhii hai la 	dil kii lagii naa ho to kyaa zindagii hai 	sath ham jo chale mit gae faasale 	aa gae aa gae threedots do 	bekudii men sanam threedots  ra 	khoii nazar thii soe nazaare 	dekhaa tumhen to jaage ye saare la 	dil ne kie jo dil ko ishaare 	mil ke chale ham saath tumhaare 	aaj kushii se meraa dil ye pukaare 	teraa daaman milaa pyaar meraa khilaa 	aa gae aa gae threedots do 	bekudii men sanam threedots  la 	dil kii kahaanii pahunchii zubaan tak 	kisako kabar ab pahunche kahaan tak ra 	pyaar ke raahii aae yahaan tak 	jaaenge dil kii had hai jahaan tak la 	tum saath do to chalen ham aasamaan tak 	dil men aramaan lie laakhon tuufaan lie 	chal pade qaafile do 	aa gae aa gae threedots 	bekudii men sanam threedots

Title: tum jo hamaare miit na hote
Lyrics: tum jo hamaare miit na hote giit ye mere giit na hote hansake jo tum ye rang na bharate kvaab ye mere kvaab na hote tum jo hamaare threedots  tum jo na sunate kyon gaataa main tum jo na sunate kyon gaataa main bebas ghutakar rah jaataa main tum jo hamaare threedots  suunii dagar kaa ek sitaaraa suunii dagar kaa ek sitaaraa jhilamil jhilamil ruup tumhaaraa tum jo hamaare threedots  jii karataa hai ud kar aauun jii karataa hai ud kar aauun saamane baithuun aur doharaauun tum jo hamaare threedots

Title: he niile gagan ke tale dharatii kaa pyaar pale
Lyrics: hethreedots niile gagan ke tale dharatii kaa pyaar pale aise hii jag men aatii hain subahen aise hii shaam dhale threedots  shabanam ke motii phuulon pe bikhare donon kii aas phale threedots  balakhaatii belen mastii men khelen pedon se milake gale threedots  nadiyaa kaa paanii dariyaa se milake saagar kis or chale threedots

Title: matavaalii aankhon vaale o alabele dilavaale
Lyrics: la 	matavaalii aankhon vaale o alabele dilavaale 	dil teraa ho rahegaa gar tuu ise apanaa le 	matavaalii aankhon vaale threedots  ra 	ho tujhako shaayad dhokhaa ho gayaa 	sun e hasiin main vo nahiin la 	tuu hai to mahafil men rang hai 	tuu jo nahiin to kuchh bhii nahiin 	matavaalii aankhon vaale threedots  	jabase tujhako dekhaa ek nazar 	mujhe kyaa huaa mere dilabar ra 	mujhape apanaa jaaduu naa chalaa 	kahaa meraa sun kahiin aur hai manzil merii  la 	kahsun le do baaten pyaar kii 	duniyaa terii mahafil terii ra 	main terii duniyaa men ajanabii 	kahiin aur manzil merii 	matavaalii aankhon vaale threedots

Title: aae re din saavan ke balam tere aavan ke
Lyrics: aae re din saavan ke saavan ke balam tere aavan ke aavan ke aae re din threedots  tere pyaar kaa jog liyaa mohe log kahen diivaanii 2 ho gharghar kii is kahaasunii men main ban gaii kahaanii o aae re din threedots  do nainon ke diip jalaae jaaguun saarii rainaa 2 o kaise laagen nain piyaa jab tum sang laage nainaa o aae re din threedots

Title: kahiye kaisaa mizaaj hai aap kaa
Lyrics: ra kahiye kaisaa mizaaj hai aap kaa aa ham se kyaa vaastaa hai janaab kaa ra are are aap to bigadane lage aa nahiin nahiin aap ko samajhane lage ra kahiye kaisaa mizaaj hai aap kaathreedots  ra jis din se pyaar huaa     dil beqaraar huaa     jiinaa dushvaar huaa terii qasam 2 aa yuun na sataayaa karo     dil na jalaayaa karo     qasamen na khaayaa karo jhuuthe balam ra teraa diivaanaa huun terii qasam aa kyaa bharosaa hai mardon kii zaat kaa ra kyaa iraadaa hai aakir janaab kaa aa are are aap to bigadane lage ra nahiin nahiin aap ko samajhane lage aa kahiye kaisaa mizaaj hai aap kaathreedots  aa nazaron ne jaan liyaa     dil ne pahachaan liyaa     lo ham ne maan liyaa apanaa tumhen 2 ra mushkil se baat banii     dil ko bas hai ye kushii     tum ne samajhaa to sahii apanaa hamen aa dekho jii aise na dekho hamen ra o saaraa jhagadaa thaa itanii sii baat kaa aa ham se kyaa vaastaa hai janaab kaa ra are are aap to bigadane lage aa nahiin nahiin aap ko samajhane lage ra kahiye kaisaa mizaaj hai aap kaathreedots  ra ye rut ye pyaaraa samaa     dil kii duniyaa hai javaan     ye baaten roz kahaan jaanevafaa 2 aa aise men dil bhii meraa     mastii men jhuum uthaa     halkaahalkaa saa nashaa chhaane lagaa do ab zindagii kaa mazaa aane lagaa aa ham se kyaa vaastaa hai janaab kaa ra are are aap to bigadane lage aa nahiin nahiin aap ko samajhane lage ra kahiye kaisaa mizaaj hai aap kaathreedots

Title: dekho jii ek baalaa jogii matavaalaa jogii
Lyrics: dekho jii ek baalaa jogii matavaalaa jogii dvaar tere aayo rii dekho jii ek baalaa jogii threedots  aayaa huun dvaar tere milane kii aas lie tere daras kii main ankhiyon men pyaas lie nainon ke pat khol diivaanii kuchh to bol diivaanii mukhadaa kaahe chhupaayo re dekho jii ek baalaa jogii threedots  na kisii des kaa hai na kisii gaanv kaa hai milane kaa sahaaraa le ke ikataaraa le ke man kaa raag sunaayo rii dekho jii ek baalaa jogii threedots  kaahe ye ruup dhaaraa koii na bhed jaane tuu merii main teraa yah duniyaa maane na maane maine to teraa ho ke diivaanaa dekhaa saaraa zamaanaa chain kahiin naa paayorii dekho jii ek baalaa jogii threedots

Title: mat jaiiyo naukariyaa chhod ke
Lyrics: mat jaiiyo naukariyaa chhod ke tore paiyaan paduun balamaa 2 tore paiyaan paduun  main binatii karuun 2 mat jaiiyo naukariyaa threedots  dekh piyaa parades men aisii ruup kii chhayaa naahiin milegii 2 paisaa rupaiiyaa mil jaaegaa prem kii maayaa naahiin milegii priit nahiin to kuchh bhii nahiin hai saanchii kahuun balamaa mat jaiiyo naukariyaa threedots  priit karo aur riit na jaano tum to ho saiyaan ek anaadii 2 bhuul bhaii ye mose priitam jo main jiyaravaa tose haarii jaao main tumase naa boluungii saanchii kahuun balamaa mat jaiiyo naukariyaa threedots  diipak laiike dhuundh lo jag men hamasii mohaniyaa naa paaoge 2 jisake gore gaal pe til ho aisii sajaniyaa naa paaoge hamase bichhad ke pachhataaoge saanchii kahuun balamaa mat jaiiyo naukariyaa threedots

Title: ai mohabbat merii duniyaa men teraa kaam na thaa
Lyrics: ai mohabbat merii duniyaa men teraa kaam na thaa tuu naa aaii thii to gam kaa bhii kahiin naam na thaa ai mohabbat merii duniyaa threedots  jaane kyuun aaj hai shikavaa mujhe duniyaa bhar se isase pahale to kisii par koii ilzaam na thaa ai mohabbat merii duniyaa threedots  merii qismat ki mujhe ashq hii piine ko mile mere hisse men mohabbat kaa koii jaam na thaa ai mohabbat merii duniyaa threedots  dene vaale mujhe kyon tuune mohabbat de dii kyaa mujhe ishq se pahale koii aaraam na thaa ai mohabbat merii duniyaa threedots

Title: jaataa huun main mujhe ab naa bulaanaa
Lyrics: jaataa huun main mujhe ab naa bulaanaa merii yaad bhii apane dil men na laanaa meraa hai kyaa merii manzil na koii thikaanaa jaataa huun main   pyaasaa thaa bachapan jawaanii bhii merii pyaasii piichhe gamon kii galii aage udaasii  2 ho main tanhaaii kaa raahii koii apanaa naa begaanaa  mujhe ab na bulaanaa merii yaad bhii apane dil men na laanaa meraa hai kyaa merii manzil na koii thikaanaa jaataa huun main   mujhako hansii bhii milii saaye liye dukh ke khul ke na royaa kisii kaandhe pe jhuk ke  2 ho meraa jiiwan bhii kyaa hai adhuuraa saa ik afasaanaa  mujhe ab na bulaanaa merii yaad bhii apane dil men na laanaa meraa hai kyaa merii manzil na koii thikaanaa jaataa huun main   thaa pyaar kaa ik diyaa wo bhii bujhaa daalaa dhundhalaa saa bhii kahiin kyuun ho ujaalaa  2 ho ab un yaadon se kah do merii duniyaa men naa aanaa  mujhe ab na bulaanaa merii yaad bhii apane dil men na laanaa meraa hai kyaa merii manzil na koii thikaanaa

Title: milatii hai nazar nazaron se agar
Lyrics: ra milatii hai nazar nazron se agar sharmaate ho kyon kyon kyon la duniyaa kaa hai dar nazaron se nazar takaraate ho kyon kyon kyon  la milate hii nigaahen diivaane kyon machal gayaa dil teraa hai ra bas ye samajho ik bhanvare ne tumhe phuul samajhakar gheraa hai la huun phuul agar bhanvaraa banakar tarasaate ho kyon kyon kyon  la jaao jii ham nahiin dil dete ham dekhenge kyaa kar loge ra ye achchhii tarah ham jaan gae tum koii bahaanaa kar loge la phir banthan ke is ladakii ke paas aate ho kyon kyon kyon

Title: chehare pe girii zulfen
Lyrics: chehare pe girii zulfen kah do to hataa duun main gustaakii maaf gustaakii maaf ik phuul tere juude men kah do to lagaa duun main gustaakii maaf gustaakii maaf  ye ruup hasiin dhuup bahut khuub hai lekin ulfat ke binaa phiikaa cheharaa teraa rangiin ik diip muhabbat kaa kah do to jalaa duun main gustaakii maaf gustaakii maaf chehare pe girii zulfen   threedots  ik aag lagii hai mere zakhmejigar men ye kaisaa karishmaa hai terii shokh nazar men jo baat rukii lab par kah do to bataa duun main gustaakii maaf gustaakii maaf chehare pe girii zulfen   threedots  sarakaar huaa pyaar kataa hamase huii hai ab dil men tum hii tum ho ye jaan bhii terii hai ab chiir ke is dil ko kah do to dikhaa duun main gustaakii maaf gustaakii maaf chehare pe girii zulfen   threedots

Title: jaane merii ankhiyon ne dekhaa hai kyaa
Lyrics: ra 	jaane merii ankhiyon ne dekhaa hai kyaa 	dekhaa hai kyaa 	paanii se nikalaa hai chaand nayaa 2  	mukhade pe nanhiinanhii buundon ke dhaare 	chandaa ke saath jaise chhotechhote taare 	din men hain taare ye jaaduu hai kyaa 	paanii se nikalaa hai chaand nayaa 2  aa 	jaane terii ankhiyon ne dekhaa hai kyaa 	dekhaa hai kyaa ra 	paanii se nikalaa hai chaand nayaa 2  aa 	nain kisii ke rote hain apanaa  	din kii laalii men dekh aaii sapanaa 	angang kisane rang bharaa 	paanii se nikalaa hai chaand nayaa 2  ra 	main huun pujaarii tuu merii kalaa hai 	jahaan tere pag wahaan man bhii chalaa hai 	kyaa hai ye naataa zaraa tuu hii bataa 	paanii se nikalaa hai chaand nayaa 2 aa 	jaane terii ankhiyon ne dekhaa hai kyaa 	dekhaa hai kyaa ra 	paanii se nikalaa hai chaand nayaa 2

Title: naa jaane chaand kaisaa hogaa
Lyrics: kamal naa jaane chaand kaisaa hogaa mukesh tum saa hasiin to nahiin kamal honge rangiin ye sitaare mukesh tum se rangiin to nahiin  kamal aate hain niile aasamaan pe jaane kidhar se sitaare mukesh chalataa hai saaraa hii zamaanaa terii nazar ke sahaare kamal dil chaahe aasamaan ko chhuu luun mukesh le chal hamen bhii vahiin kamal naa jaane chaand threedots  mukesh chhaaye hain kaale kaale baadal yaa tum ne zulfen bakherii kamal kho jaauun jaa ke baadalon men kab se tamannaa hai merii mukesh jaane do kvaab kii ye baaten kamal ham ko hai in pe yakiin kamal naa jaane chaand threedots  kamal saare zamaane se niraalii ham koii duniyaa basaayen mukesh dil ke rangiile sapanon se mahafil rangiilii sajaayen kamal aisaa jahaan hai kahaan pe mukesh hogaa kahiin naa kahiin kamal naa jaane chaand threedots mukesh tum saa hasiin to nahiin

Title: ajii o taash ke baavan patte panje chhakke satte
Lyrics: ajii o taash ke baavan patte panje chhakke satte sab ke sab harajaaii main to lut gayaa main to lut gayaa raam duhaaii 2 taash ke baavan threedots  daan yatiimon ko detaa to daanii main kahalaataa kush ho jaatii biivii jo usake gahane banavaataa 2 maine kaagaz kii begam se kaahe aankh ladaaii main to lut gayaa threedots  apane dil kaa chain bhii haaraa aur daulat bhii haarii maalik ne insaan banaayaa main ban gayaa juaarii 2 galiigalii men ho gaii yaaron aaj merii rusavaaii main to lut gayaa threedots

Title: o gangaa maiyaa paar lagaa de mere sapanon kii naiyaa
Lyrics: o gangaa maiyaa  2 paar lagaa de mere sapanon kii naiyaa  2 o gangaa maiyaa threedots  guzare idhar se bhii kaalii ghataayen  2 maan terii mamataa ko degii duaayen  2 dukhiyaa ke aangan kii tuu thii kalaiyaa o gangaa maiyaa threedots  jisaliye nainaa taras rahe hain saawan bhaado se baras rahe hain  2 sandes laike wo aaye purawaiyaa o gangaa maiyaa threedots  suunaa padaa hai chandan kaa palanaa  2 palane men jhuule ek chandaa saa lalanaa  2 jaise yashodaa kaa krrishna kanhaiyaa o gangaa maiyaa threedots

Title: zindagii men pyaar karanaa siikh le
Lyrics: laa laa laa threedots  zindagii men pyaar karanaa siikh le jisako jiinaa ho maranaa siikh le ho piisiigaalaa piisiigaalaa nikiidaalaa yolaa 6  jiine vaale zindagii kaa gam naa kar aa mohabbat hii mohabbat hai idhar ham se dil men rang bharanaa siikh le jisako jiinaa ho maranaa siikh le ho piisiigaalaa piisiigaalaa nikiidaalaa yolaa 6  zulf koii tujhape jab laharaaegii pyaar kii manzil tujhe mil jaaegii dil kii raahon se guzaranaa siikh le jisako jiinaa ho maranaa siikh le ho piisiigaalaa piisiigaalaa nikiidaalaa yolaa 6  kis liye kaamosh hai tuu ai sanam husn ke rangiin ishaaron kii qasam kuchh nazar se baat karanaa siikh le jisako jiinaa ho maranaa siikh le ho piisiigaalaa piisiigaalaa nikiidaalaa yolaa 6

Title: ye pardaa hataa do zaraa mukhadaa dikhaa do
Lyrics: ra 	ye pardaa hataa do zaraa mukhadaa dikhaa do 	ham pyaar karane vaale hain koii gair nahiin 	are ham tum pe marane vaale hain koii gair nahiin aa 	o majanuun ke naanaa mere piichhe na aanaa 	jaa pyaar karane vaale terii kair nahiin 	are o hamape marane vaale terii kair nahiin ra 	ye pardaa hataa threedots  aa 	shukr karo ki pade nahiin hai merii maan ke dande 	ek haath men ho jaate aramaan tumhaare thande ra 	maan ko bhii samajhaa do bas itanaa bataa do 	ham pyaar karane threedots aa 	o majanuun ke naanaa threedots  ra 	jahaan milen do javaan nazar hotii takaraar vahiin hai 	dil par rakh kar haath ye kah do hamase pyaar nahiin hai aa 	dil kii baaten dilavaale nazaron se hii pahachaanate 	lekin kuchh aise hain anaadii jo ye bhii nahiin jaanate ra 	ye pahale bataate baaraat le ke aate 	ham pyaar karane threedots aa 	o majanuun ke naanaa threedots

Title: vo dekho jalaa ghar kisii kaa
Lyrics: vo dekho jalaa ghar kisii kaa ye tuute hain kisake sitaare vo qismat hansii aur aise hansii ke rone lage gam ke maare vo dekho jalaa threedots  gayaa jaise jhonkaa havaa kaa hamaarii kushii kaa zamaanaa die hamako qismat ne aansuu jab aayaa hamen muskaraanaa binaa hamasafar hai suunii dagar kidhar jaaen ham besahaare vo dekho jalaa threedots  hain raahen kathin duur manzil ye chhaayaa hai kaisaa andheraa ki ab chaandsuuraj bhii milakar nahiin kar sakegaa saveraa ghataa chhaaegii bahaar aaegii naa aaenge vo din hamaare vo dekho jalaa threedots  idhar ro rahii hain aankhen udhar aasamaan ro rahaa hai mujhe kar ke barabaad zaalim pashemaan ab ho rahaa hai ye barakhaa kabhii to ruk jaaegii rukenge naa aansuu hamaare vo dekho jalaa threedots

Title: mohe panaghat pe nandlaal chhed gayo re
Lyrics: mohe panaghat pe nandalaal chhed gayo re morii naajuk kalaiyaa marod gayo re mohe panaghat pe   threedots  kankarii mohe maarii gagariyaa phod daarii morii saadii anaadii bhigoy gayo re mohe panaghat pe   threedots  nainon se jaaduu kiyaa jiyaraa moh liyaa moraa ghuunghataa najariyo se tod gayo re mohe panaghat pe   threedots

Title: dupatte kii girah men baandh liijie
Lyrics: dupatte kii girah men baandh liijie meraa dil hai kabhii kaam aaegaa dupatte kii girah men threedots  ye maanaa tum hasiin ho naazaniin ho mere dil men tum hii pardaanashiin ho kahaan le jaaogii tum aisii suurat kabhii to hogii saathii kii zaruurat meraa dil hai ise saathii banaa lo ise apanii nigaah men chhupaa lo dupatte kii girah men threedots  mere dil se ab na daaman bachaao tumhen merii qasam hai tum paas aao meraa dil pyaar men duubaa huaa hai tumhaarii yaad men khoyaa huaa hai meraa dil aapase badhakar hasiin hai hasiinon kii tarah qaatil nahiin hai dupatte kii girah men threedots  javaanii tak hain ye saare jhamele na honge aashiq ke phir ye mele karegii ye umar jab bevafaaii churaa legii nazar saarii kudaaii meraa dil hii tumhen degaa sahaaraa banegaa tuufaan men kinaaraa dupatte kii girah men threedots

Title: nain milaakar chain churaanaa kisakaa hai ye kaam
Lyrics: nain milaakar chain churaanaa kisakaa hai ye kaam 2 hamase puuchho hamako pataa hai us zaalim kaa naam 2 nain milaakar chain threedots  vo aayaa to kho gaii ye saarii mahafil dekhaa is andaaz se sab kho baithe dil thodaa saa vo meharabaan thodaa saa qaatil vo jisakii har ek adaa par laakhon hain ilzaam hamase puuchho hamako threedots  kisakaa gussaa hai bhalaa jisape aae pyaar aisaa dushman haay re jisako samajhe yaar socho to vah kaun hai sharmiilaa diladaar 2 jisakii mast nashiilii nazaren aisii jaise jaam 2 hamase puuchho hamako threedots  jaagiijaagii sii zaraa kuchh soiisoii 2 aankhen bhii us shokh kii hain khoiikhoii 2 sholaa hai vo phuul hai yaa sapanaa koii 2 jisakii kaatir koii bhii ho sakataa hai badanaam hamase puuchho hamako threedots

Title: husn vaale husn kaa anjaam dekh
Lyrics: husn vaale husn kaa anjaam dekh duubate suuraj ko vaqteshaam dekh subah ke suuraj kaa bhii andaaz dekh bhuul jaa anjaam ko aagaaz dekh  dil kii dhadakan dard kaa saamaan huun husn kaa uthataa huaa tuufaan huun ahaledil hatate nahiin maidaan se khelane nikalaa huun main tuufaan se husn ke jalavon se shaayad tuu abhii anajaan hai subah ke suuraj kaa threedots  dekhe jo mujhako jaahid kaabe ko bhuul jaae kaashii ko jaane vaalaa kaashii se palat jaae kaashii bhii terii mujhamen kaabaa bhii teraa mujhamen jo mujhape nazar daale kaashii bhii nazar aae jo mujhape nazar daale kaabaa bhii nazar aae kaashii bhii nazar aae kaabaa bhii nazar aae husn ke jalavon se ishq se takaraae husn vaale husn kaa threedots

Title: diivaane tum diivaane ham
Lyrics: diivaane tum diivaane ham kise hai gam kyaa kahe ye zamaanaa vahii hai dil vahii hain ham magar nazar men nayaa hai fasaanaa  naye andaaz liye aaii hai ye raat naii zaraa saa chhed bhii do aaj koii baat naii naii mehafil naii halachal hai kahaan ham jaane naa diivaane tum diivaane ham threedots  yahaan nazaron men kaii rang bhare daur chale phir bhii pyaas kahe daur zaraa aur chale jalii shamaa uthe shole jale kyon paravaane naa diivaane tum diivaane ham threedots  nahiin hai hosh men vo hosh kii jo baat kahe nashe men jhuumen chalo hansatii huii raat kahe koii kitanaa hamen roken rukenge mastaane naa diivaane tum diivaane ham threedots

Title: aansuu samajh ke kyon mujhe aankh se tuune giraa diyaa
Lyrics: aansuu samajh ke kyon mujhe aankh se tuune giraa diyaa motii kisii ke pyaar kaa mittii men kyon milaa diyaa aansuu samajh ke kyon mujhe  nagmaa huun kab magar mujhe apane pe koii naaz thaa 2  gaayaa gayaa huun jis pe main tuutaa huaa vo saaz thaa jis ne sunaa vo hans diyaa hans ke mujhe rulaa diyaa aansuu samajh ke kyon mujhe    jo naa chaman men khil sakaa main vo gariib phuul huun jo kuchh bhii huun bahaar kii chhotii sii ek bhuul huun jis ne khilaa ke khud mujhe khud hii mujhe bhulaa diyaa aansuu samajh ke kyon mujhe  merii kataa muaaf main bhuule se aa gayaa yahaan varanaa mujhe bhii hai khabar meraa nahiin hai ye jahaan duub chalaa thaa niind men achchhaa kiyaa jagaa diyaa aansuu samajh ke kyon mujhe

Title: ye raaste hain pyaar ke chalanaa sanbhalsanbhalake
Lyrics: ye raaste hain pyaar ke chalanaa sanbhalsanbhalake yahaan luutate hain dil ko aramaan machalmachalake  jo bhii is taraf se guzaraa kabhii lautake na aayaa aayaa to saath apanii betaabiyaan hii laayaa 2 guzaregii umr saarii pahaluu badalbadalake ye raaste hain pyaar ke threedots  is anjuman men samajhaa jisako chiraag dil kaa dekhaa qariib se to nikalaa vo daag dil kaa 2 paravaanaa jo banegaa rah jaaegaa vo jalake ye raaste hain pyaar ke threedots

Title: kyaa dekhaa nainon vaalii nainaa kyon bhar aae
Lyrics: kyaa dekhaa nainon vaalii nainaa kyon bhar aae nainaa kyon bhar aae kokh bharii aur god hai kaalii nainaa yuun bhar aae nainaa yuun bhar aae  maan banakar bhii maan na banii main badanaamii ke dar se duudh merii bojhal siine ko aansuu banban barase apanaa dhan aur aankh sawaalii nainaa yuun bhar aae nainaa yuun bhar aae 2  kyaa dekhaa nainon vaalii threedots  jii bhii sakii to jiitejii ye sog rahegaa mujhako bolegaa par munnaa meraa maan na kahegaa mujhako maan kahalaanaa ban gayaa gaalii nainaa yuun bhar aae nainaa yuun bhar aae 2  kyaa dekhaa nainon vaalii threedots

Title: chhupaa lo yuun dil men pyaar meraa ke jaise mandir men
Lyrics: chhupaa lo yuun dil men pyaar meraa  ke jaise mandir men lau diye kii  tum apane charanon men rakh lo mujhako tumhaare charanon kaa phuul huun main main sar jhukaae khadii huun priyatam   2 ke jaise mandir men lau diye kii  ye sach hai jiinaa thaa paap tum bin ye paap maine kiyaa hai ab tak magar hai man men chhavi tumhaarii  2 ke jaise mandir men lau diye kii  phir aag birahaa kii mat lagaanaa ke jalake main raakh ho chukii huun ye raakh maathe pe maine rakh lii  2 ke jaise mandir men lau diye kii

Title: terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii hasiin hai lekin
Lyrics: terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii hasiin hai lekin is pe qurbaan merii jaanehaziin hai lekin ye merii zakmii umangon kaa madaavaa to nahiin  zabt kii taab na kahane kaa saliikaa mujh ko us pe ye zurm ke kaamosh hai tasaviir terii ghutake mar jaauun magar kisii ko kabar tak bhii na hon kaisii chattaanon se takaraaii hai taqadiir merii  haaledil is butekaafir ko sunaauun kaise isake ruksaaron kii shaadaabii ko chheduun kyonkar isake honthon ke tabassum ko jagaauun kaise terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii threedots  yahii tasaviir tasavvur men utar jaane par chaand kii kiranon se go badhake nikhar jaatii hai dard palakon se lipat jaataa hai aansuu ban kar merii ehasaas kii duniyaa hii bikhar jaatii hai  is liye terii tasavvur se nahiin kud tujhase iltijaa karataa huun bas itanaa bataa de mujhako kyaa merii dil kii tadap kaa tujhe ehasaas bhii hai 2 varnaa phir merii hii vahashat men sulaa de mujhako  terii tasaviir bhii tujh jaisii hasiin hai lekin is pe qurbaan merii jaanehaziin hai lekin ye merii zakmii umangon kaa madaavaa to nahiin

Title: hamen un raahon pe chalanaa hai
Lyrics: hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai ham hai vo diye auron ke liye jinhen tuufaanon men jalanaa hai  ko hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai     jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai  jab tak na lagan ho siine men bekaar hai aise jiine men jab tak na lagan ho siine men bekaar hai aise jiine men chadhanaa hai hamen chandaa kii tarah suuraj kii tarah nahiin dhalanaa hai  ko hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai     jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai     ham hain vo diye auron ke liye     jinhen tuufaanon men jalanaa hai     hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai     jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai  main paas rahuun yaa duur rahuun ye baat abhii tum se kah duun main paas rahuun yaa duur rahuun ye baat abhii tum se kah duun hansanaa hii nahiin phuulon ki tarah diipak kii tarah hamen jalanaa hai  ko  hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai      jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai      ham hai vo diye auron ke liye      jinhen tuufaanon men jalanaa hai      hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai      jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai  aakaash se aatii hai ye sadaa gam aae agar to jii na dhalaa aakaash se aatii hai ye sadaa gam aae agar to jii na dhalaa kabhii gam hain yahaan kabhii hain kushiyaan har haal men ham ko palanaa hai  ko  hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai      jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai      ham hai vo diye auron ke liye      jinhen tuufaanon men jalanaa hai      hamen un raahon par chalanaa hai      jahaan giranaa aur sanbhalanaa hai

Title: tumhaarii zulf ke saaye men shaam kar luungaa
Lyrics: tumhaarii zulf ke saaye men shaam kar luungaa safar ik umr kaa pal men tamaam kar luungaa  nazar milaaii to puuchhuungaa ishq kaa anjaam nazar jhukaaii to khaalii salaam kar luungaa  jahaanedil pe huquumat tumhen mubaarak ho rahii shikast to main apane naam kar luungaa

Title: jab dukh kii ghadiyaan aayen  buddham sharanam gachchhami
Lyrics: ma buddham saranam gachchhaamii dhammam saranam gachchhaamii sangham saranam gachchhaamii  ghabaraae jab man anamol hriday ho uthe daanvaadol  ghabaraae jab man anamol aur hriday ho danvaadol tab maanav tuu mukh se bol buddham saranam gachchhaamii  jab ashaanti kaa raag uthe laal lahuu kaa phaag uthe hinsaa kii vo aag uthe maanav men pashu jaag uthe uupar se muskaate nar bhiitar zahar rahen hon ghol tab maanav tuu mukh se bol buddham saranam gachchhaamii   jab duhkh kii ghadiyaan aaen sach par jhuuth vijay paae is nirmal paavan man par jab kalank ke ghan chhaaen anyaayon kii aandhii men kaan uthe jab tere dol    ruuth gayaa jab sun ne vaalaa kis se karuun pukaar pyaar kahaan pahachaan sakaa ye ye nirday sansaar  ma nirdayataa jab le le dhaam daya huii ho antaryaam jab ye chhotaa saa insaan bhuul rahaa apanaa bhagavaan satya teraa jab ghabaraae shradhdhhaa ho jab daanvaadol  jab duniyaa se pyaar uthe nafarat kii diivaar uthe maan ki mamataa par jis din bete kii talawaar uthe dharatii kii kaayaa kaanpe anbar dagamag uthe dol tab maanav tuu mukh se bol buddham saranam gachchhaamii  duur kiyaa jis ne janjan ke vyaakul man kaa andhiyaaraa jisakii ek kiran ko chhuukar chamak uthaa ye jag saaraa  diip saty kaa sadaa jale dayaa ahinsaa sadaa phale sukh shaanti kii chhaayaa men janganman kaa prem pale bhaarat ke bhagawaan buddha kaa guunje gharghar mantr amol he maanav nit mukh se bol buddham saranam gachchhaamii

Title: sach hue sapane tere
Lyrics: sach hue sapane tere jhuum le o man mere chikii chikii chik chaa chaa chai 2 chikii chikii chik chaa   bekal man kaa dhiiraj lekar mere saajan aaye jaise koi subah kaa bhuulaa saanjh ko ghar aa jaaye priit ne rang bikhere jhuum le o man mere chikii chikii chik chaa chaa chai 2 chikii chikii chik chaa   man kii paayal chham chham bole har ek saans taraanaa dhiire dhiire siikh liyaa akhiyon ne musakaanaa ho gaye duur andhere jhuum le o man mere chikii chikii chik chaa chaa chai 2 chikii chikii chik chaa   jis ulajhan ne dil ulajhaake saarii raat jagaayaa banii hai vo aaj priit kii maalaa man kaa miit milaayaa jagamag saanjh savere jhuum le o man mere chikii chikii chik chaa chaa chai 2 chikii chikii chik chaa

Title: hamako samajh baithii hai duniyaa diivaanaa
Lyrics: hamako samajh baithii hai duniyaa  diivaanaa  2 par main agar paagal huun duniyaa hai paagalakaanaa  diivaanaa  2 hamako samajh baithii threedots  chaal bedhangii duniyaa durangii matalab kii andhii hamako na puuje patthar puuje daulat kii bandii dhokhe men mat aa jaanaa duniyaa se dil naa lagaanaa hai baat ye pate kii lo kah chalaa  diivaanaa  3 hamako samajh baithii threedots  ham sar ke bal tum sar ke bal pair tale ambar andhaa baante khud ko deve qismat kaa nambar har shai pe hai nazaraanaa chupachaap dete jaanaa hai baat ye pate kii threedots

Title: dhadakaa o dil dhadakaa
Lyrics: dhadakaa o dil dhadakaa guzaraa galii se teremere sapanon vaalaa ladakaa  maine bhii dekhaa usane bhii dekhaa aankhon hii aankhon men huiin batiyaan ek bhuul huii pataa bhii na puuchhaa kaise ab to likhuun patiyaan dhadakaa o dil threedots  hogaa milan kab main to na jaanuun jaaneman rasiyaa unakii lagan men gaatii rahuungii aae na manbasiyaa dhadakaa o dil threedots

Title: phir terii yaad naye giit sunaane aaii
Lyrics: phir terii yaad nae giit sunaane aaii dil kii duniyaa men nae diip jalaane aaii phir terii yaad nae giit threedots  ye kayaalon men bhii kvaabon men bhii tadapaatii hai muskuraatii huii ye kahake chalii aatii hai main tujhe ishq ke sholon se bachaane aaii phir terii yaad nae giit threedots  yaademahabuub idhar aa main tujhe pyaar karuun tuu agar jaan bhii maange to na inakaar karuun ek diiwaane se kyon pyaar jataane aaii phir terii yaad nae giit threedots

Title: hato kaahe ko jhuutiii banaao batiyaan
Lyrics: hato kaahe ko jhuutiii banaao batiyaan  gair kaa saath hai aur roz mulaaqaaten hain pyaar hai us ke liye aur ham se faqat baaten hain jaao jaao jaao jhuuthii baat na banaao jal rahii virah men sainyaa aur na jalaao  hato kaahe ko jhuutii threedots  ye udii udii sii rangat ye khule khule se gesu terii subah kah rahii hai terii raat kaa fasaanaa  dekho jii kisii kaa pyaar ham se na chhupaao sab hamen pataa hai pyaare nain na jhukaao suno kahatii hai kyaa kyaa tumharii akhiyaan hato kaahe ko jhuutii threedots
