Title: is bharii duniyaa men koii bhii hamaaraa na huaa
Lyrics: is bharii duniyaa men koii bhii hamaaraa na huaa gair to gair hain apanon kaa sahaaraa na huaa  log roro ke bhii is duniyaa men jii lete hain ek ham hain kii hanse bhii to guzaaraa na huaa  ik muhabbat ke sivaa aur na kuchh maangaa thaa kyaa karen ye bhii zamaane ko ganvaaraa na huaa  aasamaan jitane sitaare hain terii mahafil men apanii taqadiir kaa hii koii sitaaraa na huaa

Title: jaane kaisaa hai meraa diivaanaa kabhii apanaa saa lage
Lyrics: aa jaane kaisaa hai meraa diivaanaa kabhii apanaa saa lage  kabhii begaanaa ki badii bholii ho ye bhii na jaanaa kabhii apanon ko nahiin kahate begaanaa  ki yuun bhii jiitaa thaa magar koi aramaan na the jab talak aap mere dil ke mehamaan na the dil ke mehamaan na the tumase mahakaa hai meraa viiraanaa kabhii apanon ko nahiin threedots  aa main vo aazaad ghataa tumane jise baandh liyaa apanii aankhon men mujhe nayaa aakaash diyaa nayaa aakaash diyaa yahii chhotaa saa meraa afasaanaa kabhii apanaa saa lage threedots  kabhii chhede hai pavan kabhii chhede hain piyaa ki yahii to hogaa sanam tumane jab pyaar kiyaa tumane jab pyaar kiyaa mere paas aao chhodo sharamaanaa kabhii apanon ko nahiin threedots

Title: ek anaar do biimaar
Lyrics: dil hamaaraa husnvaalon kaa akhaadaa ho gayaa are apane hii haathon se kud apanaa kabaadaa ho gayaa  ek anaar ek anaar do biimaar kaisii ulajhan men hai pyaar badii mushkil hai do do ulfat ke baazaar kaisaa hogaa kaarobaar badii mushkil hai threedots  koii mere do tukade kar ke rok de is bambaarii ko ek tukadaa shole ko de de aur ik tukadaa chingaarii ko is jhamele se yaaro main ghabaraa gayaa dil dhadakane lagaa sar bhii chakaraa gayaa merii kaatir do do yaar  ladanemarane ko taiyar badii mushkil hai threedots  uupar vaale ne mujh ko  do kaan diye do aankhen mil jaate jo dil mujh ko  phir yuun na ukhadatii saansen do ke chakkar men merii aqal phans gayii main ne khelii thii single double phans gayii dadada bababa lalala dabala phansa gayii re badii samajhe mujhako yaar chhotii hai merii dildaar badii mushkil hai threedots

Title: bolo jii bolo kuchh  paravaanaa terii mahafil aayaa hai
Lyrics: mu 	bolo jii bolo kuchh bolo jii bolo 	paravaanaa terii mahafil aayaa hai 	diivaanaa terii mahafil aayaa hai su 	socho jii socho kuchh socho jii socho 	kyuun shamaa ne tumako bulaayaa hai 2  mu 	shamaa roshanii terii kam ho na jaae 	terii bazm men dil jalaane ko aae su 	nahiin dilajalon kaa yahaan kaam koii 2 mu 	hamaare hii dam se hai terii kahaanii su 	navaazish inaayat karam meharabaanii 	socho jii socho kuchh threedots  	hai paravaane terii zaraa sii ye hastii 	nahiin dekh achchhii ye aatishparastii mu 	mohabbat men jalanaa hai iimaan meraa 2 su 	mohabbat kii duniyaa badii beraham hai mu 	magar aashiqon pe kudaa kaa karam hai 	bolo jii bolo kuchh threedots

Title: har qadam par nit nae saanche men
Lyrics: har qadam par nit nae saanche men dhal jaate hain log dekhate hii  dekhate  kitane badal jaate hain log  kis liye kiije kisii gumgashtaa jannat kii talaash jab ki mittii ke khilonon se bahal jaate hain log  shamaa kii maanind ahleanjuman se beniyaaz akasar apanii aag men chup chaap jal jaate hain log  shayar un kii dostii kaa ab bhii dam bharate hain aap thokaren khaa kar to sunate hain sambhal jaate hain log

Title: ajahun naa aaye baalamaa saavan biitaa jaae
Lyrics: ajahun naa aae baalamaa saavan biitaa jaae haay re saavan biitaa jaae  niind bhii ankhiyan dvaar na aae tose milan kii aas bhii jaae aai bahaar khile phulavaa  more sapane kaun sajaae aa threedots ajahun threedots  chaand ko badaraa garavaa lagaae aur bhii more man lalachaae yaar hasiin gale lag jaa morii umr guzaratii jaae aa threedots ajahun threedots

Title: vo jo milate the kabhii ham se diivaanon kii tarah
Lyrics: vo jo milate the kabhii ham se diivaanon kii tarah aaj yuun mialte hain jaise kabhii pahachaan na thii  dekhate bhii hain to yuun merii nigaahon men kabhii ajanabii jaise milaa karate hain raahon men kabhii is qadar unakii nazar ham se to anjaan na thii vo jo milate the kabhii threedots  ek din thaa kabhii yuun bhii jo machal jaate the khelate the merii zulfon se bahal jaate the vo pareshaan the merii zulf pareshaan na thii vo jo milate the kabhii threedots  vo muhabbat vo sharaarat mujhe yaad aatii hai dil men ik pyaar kaa tuufaan uthaa jaatii thii thii magar aisii to ulajhan men merii jaan na thii vo jo milate the kabhii threedots

Title: milaa hai kisii kaa jhumakaa thandethande harehare
Lyrics: milaa hai kisii kaa jhumakaa thandethande harehare niim tale o sachche motii vaalaa jhumakaa thandethande harehare niim tale suno kyaa kahataa hai jhumakaa thandethande harehare niim tale milaa hai kisii kaa threedots  pyaar kaa hindolaa yahaan jhuul gae nainaa sapane jo dekhe mujhe bhuul gae nainaa 2 haay re bechaaraa jhumakaa thandethande harehare threedots  jiivan bhar kaa naataa paradesiyaa se jodaa aap gaii piyaa sang mujhe yahaan chhodaa 2 padaa hai akelaa jhumakaa thandethande harehare threedots  haay re ye priit kii hai riit jaane kaisii tanman haar jaane men hai jiit jaane kaisii 2 jaane ne bechaaraa jhumakaa thandethande harehare threedots

Title: ye mere andhere ujaale na hote
Lyrics: ta  ye mere andhere ujaale na hote      agar tum na aate merii zindagii men la  na jaane meraa dil ye kyon kah rahaa hai      tumhen kho na baithuun kahiin roshanii men  ta  merii aankh ne tum ko dekhaa nahiin hai frddkmkq1     magar dil to meraa tumhen jaanataa hai      tumhen jaanataa hai      to gam ke safar men meraa hamasafar hai      main kyon saath us kaa na duungaa khushii men      ye mere andhere threedots  la  tumhaarii muhabbat pe mujh ko yakiin hai      magar apanii qisamat pe hargiz nahiin hai      hargiz nahiin hai      muhabbat ke kuchh khel aankhon ne merii      bigadate bhii dekhe hansii hii hansii men      na jaane meraa dil threedots  ta  abhii to ummiidon kii duniyaa javaan hai      na chhedo ye maayuusiyon ke taraane la  tumhen bhii qasam hai ki dil men na rakhanaa      kataa ho gaii ho agar bekhudii men      agar bekhudii men ta  ye mere andhere threedots la  na jaane meraa dil threedots

Title: aaii hai bambaii se piyaa jii kii paatii
Lyrics: aaii hai bambaii se piyaa jii kii paatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke ho aaii hai bambaii se piyaa jii kii paatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke  kyuun jhuule hai man moraa sapanon ke jhuule jhuule hai man moraa jhuule hai man moraa sapanon ke jhuule jaa ke bides mohe piyaa nahiin bhuule ho jaa ke bides mohe piyaa nahiin bhuule maare kushii ke maare kushii ke main to phuulii na samaatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke ho aaii hai bambaii se piyaa jii kii paatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke  o  laakhon men ek hain jii more sanwariyaa jii more sanwariyaa  2 lag nahiin jaaye kahiin jag kii najariyaa 2 dar ke nazar se  dar ke nazar se unhen nainon me chhupaatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke ho aaii hai bambaii se piyaa jii kii paatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke  o  tarase hai jiyaa meraa pii ke milan ko jii pii ke milan ko  2 kaise chhupaauun bhalaa man kii lagan ko 2 raah takuun main raah takuun main baithii piyaapiyaa gaatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke ho aaii hai bambaii se piyaa jii kii paatii phiruun itaraatii main jhuumjhuum ke

Title: khoyaakhoyaa chandaa khoekhoe taare
Lyrics: khoyaakhoyaa chandaa khoekhoe taare so gae tuu bhii so jaa chaand hamaare 2 khoyaakhoyaa chandaa threedots  o o leke jaaduu kii chhadii aaii sapanon kii parii ruupnagarii men tujhe chhod aaegii abhii hai vo sapanon kaa jahaan ik melaa hai vahaan desparades ke bachche chale vahaan niile aakaash kii gangaa ke kinaare khoyaakhoyaa chandaa threedots  jhuulaa chaandii kaa padaa hiirepannon se jadaa reshamii dor bandhii jhuulegaa laal meraa jab bhii tuu piing bhare jaa ke baadal ko chhue chhuule bijalii ko to vo khilakhilaa pade aur chhup jaae kahiin laaj ke maare khoyaakhoyaa chandaa threedots  kahiin koii giit gaae koii banshii bajaae aur koii dhol lie dhindhin tak sunaae sab pe ik rang pade koii bhii bach na sake pyaar aur milaap kaa gulaal yuun ude hilmil ke koii jiite koii haare khoyaakhoyaa chandaa threedots

Title: yah duniyaa badii luterii na terii hai na merii
Lyrics: yah duniyaa badii luterii na terii hai na merii munh men isake raamraam dil men heraapherii  machchhar bhii kaate pahale kare pukaar ghuu ghuu aa sarakaar aayaa huun main hoshiyaar lekin gupachup kaate duniyaa jab ho raat andherii ye duniyaa badii luterii threedots  subah kabuutar ko laalaajii nisdin daanaa daalen mutthii bhar daanon se apane dharm kaa rob jamaa len savaa ser kaa ser tolane men naa karen ye derii ye duniyaa badii luterii threedots  sunate hain kal ho gayaa chorii mandir men prasaad isalie ye duniyaa men bhuut khaane aabaad chhaayaa men bhagavaan kii vaahvaah kaisii dhuup ghanerii ye duniyaa badii luterii threedots

Title: badaa kushanasiib hai jise tuu nasiib hai
Lyrics: badaa kushanasiib hai jise tuu nasiib hai use aur chaahie kyaa jisake tuu qariib hai badaa kushanasiib threedots  sadaqe jaaen terii nazar ke tiir chalaaen jii bharbhar ke jii uthen ham tujhape mar ke haaledil naa puuchhie haaledil ajiib hai use aur chaahie threedots  ham to kahaan the tere qaabil teraa qaram hai tuune diyaa dil kud hii chal ke aa gaii manzil vah to baadashaah hai bhale hii gariib hai use aur chaahie threedots

Title: raatraat bhar jaagjaag kar intazaar karate hain
Lyrics: raatraat bhar jaagjaag kar intazaar karate hain ham tumase pyaar karate hain  jabjab baadal chaand se khele aankhmichaulii jabjab bhanvaraa phuul se bole pyaar kii bolii us ghadii sanam tumako yaad ham baarbaar karate hain ham tumase pyaar threedots  tumako karake duur ham aaj hain kud pachhataate nain bichhe hain raah men kaash ke tum aa jaate jab se tum gae hamako gam nae beqaraar karate hain ham tumase pyaar threedots

Title: yaahuu chaahe koii mujhe jangalii kahe
Lyrics: yaahuu 2 chaahe koii mujhe jangalii kahe kahane do jii kahataa rahe ham pyaar ke tuufaanon se ghire hain ham kyaa karen 2 chaahe koii mujhe threedots  mere siine men bhii dil hai hain mere bhii kuchh aramaan mujhe patthar to na samajho main huun aakir ik insaan raah merii vahii jisape duniyaa chalii 2 chaahe koii mujhe threedots  ik muddat se ye tuufaan mere siine men the bechain kyaa chhupaauun kyaa chhupaa hai jab milate hain nain se nain 2 sabr kaise karuun kyuun kisii se daruun 2 chaahe koii mujhe threedots  sard aahen kah rahii hain hai ye kaisii balaa kii aag sotesote zindagaanii ghabaraa ke uthii hai jaag 2 main yahaan se vahaan jaise ye aasamaan 2 chaahe koii mujhe threedots

Lyrics: aa 	 aa jaa mere saathii aa jaa ra 	aa jaa mere saathii aa jaa  2  ra 	yahii yahii jaaduu bharii 	miithii miithii taan 	jisako sun kar dolate mere tan man praan 	kis muralii ne chhiin lii merii subah aur shaam 	raaton kii nindiyaa gaii din kaa gayaa aaraam

Title: nashiilii raat hai  lo aayii milan kii raat suhaanii raat
Lyrics: nashiilii raat hai saare chiraag gul kar do kushii kii raat men kyaa kaam jalane vaalon kaa  lo aayii milan kii raat suhaanii raat 2 nainon se kisii ke nain mile haathon men kisii kaa haath lo aayii milan kii threedots  dene ko mubaarakabaad tumhen ye chaandanii dar par aa hii gaii honthon pe vafaa ke giit lie ik chandra kiran sharamaa hii gaii jiivan men kitane rang bhare ye mehandii vaale haath lo aayii milan kii threedots  duniyaa ne to kyaakyaa nazar diyaa dulhan ko chamakataa nazaraanaa ham dil kaa shaguufaa laae hain anamol hai ye to diivaanaa kar liijie qubuul is dil ko rah jaaegii apanii baat lo aayii milan kii threedots

Title: raat ke hamasafar thak ke ghar ko chale
Lyrics: raat ke hamasafar thak ke ghar ko chale jhuumatii aa rahii hai subah pyaar kii dekh kar saamane ruup kii roshanii phir lutii jaa rahii hai subah pyaar kii  raat ne pyaar ke jaam bhar kar diye aankhon aankhon se jo main ne tumane piye hosh to ab talaq jaa ke laute nahiin jaane kyaa laa rahii hai subah pyaar kii raat ke hamasafar   threedots

Title: akelaa huun main hamasafar dhuundhataa huun
Lyrics: akelaa huun main hamasafar dhuundhataa huun muhabbat kii main rahaguzar dhuundhataa huun 2 kisii ko main shaamosahar dhuundhataa huun akelaa huun threedots  ye mahakii huii raat kitanii hasiin hai 2 magar mere pahaluu men koii nahiin hai 2 muhabbat bharii ik nazar dhuundhataa huun akelaa huun threedots  mere dil men aajaa nigaahon men aajaa 2 muhabbat kii rangiin raahon men aajaa 2 tujhii ko main o bekabar dhuundhataa huun akelaa huun threedots  kidhar jaauun viiraan hain merii raahen 2 kisii ko na apanaa sakii merii aahen 2 main aahon me apane asar dhuundhataa huun akelaa huun threedots

Title: sun chaand merii ye daastaan
Lyrics: sun chaand merii ye daastaan main kahuun tujhe yaa ke na kahuun terii chaandanii tere paas hai mujhe ye bataa main kahaan rahuun sun chaand merii ye threedots  khilii rain men dekho chain se hai ye saaraa aalam so rahaa tere in sitaaron kii chhaanv men main akelaa chupchaap so rahaa lagii aag birah kii ang men main sahuun ise yaa ke na sahuun sun chaand merii yethreedots  voh nazar jo dil men utar gaii jaise chubh gayaa koii shuul ho voh hathelii par teraa mukh sajaa jaise phuul par koii phuul ho yuun bahe nadii terii yaad kii main bahuun yahaan yaa ke na bahuun sun chaand merii ye threedots

Title: sakhii kaise dharuun main dhiir
Lyrics: sakhii kaise dharuun main dhiir haay re mere ab lo shaam na aaye ri bahe nainon se nis din niir haay re mere ab lo shaam na aaye ri sakhii kaise dharuun main dhiir  ghir ghir shaam ghataa laharaaye bedardii kii yaad dilaaye un bin muralii kaun sunaaye ri thaarii rouun main jamunaa ke tiir haay re mere ab lo shaam na aaye ri sakhii kaise dharuun main dhiir  jii na kare jogan ban jaauun jaise bane unhen dhuundh ke laauun vo na mile to biraj men na aauun kahiin raste men taj duun shariir haay re mere ab lo shaam na aaye ri bahe nainon se nis din niir haay re mere ab lo shaam na aaye ri sakhii kaise dharuun main dhiir

Title: merii jaan na zulfen kholo kahiin raat thahar naa jaae
Lyrics: merii jaan merii jaan na zulfen kholo kahiin raat thahar naa jaae 2  betaab havaaen aise men kushbuu na udaa len baalon kii khilatii huii kaliyaan chupake se rangat naa churaa len gaalon kii ye rang kahiin bant jaae naa ye husn bikhar naa jaae merii jaan na zulfen threedots  is phuul sii naazuk baanhon se har shaakh lachakanaa siikh na le yuun jaan ke gaharii saans na lo har maujh chhalakanaa siikh na le laharaa ke tumhaare aanchal tak har shok nazar naa jaae merii jaan na zulfen threedots  tum yuun hii qayaamat lagatii ho ab aur adaaen jaane do maathe pe ye bal kyon daale hain ye darzaa sazaaen jaane do itanaa bhii kisii se ruutho naa koii jaan se guzar naa jaae merii jaan na zulfen threedots

Title: dushmano saavadhaan shatruo saavadhaan
Lyrics: dushmano saavadhaan shatruo saavadhaan chal pade hai aaj hind ke jawaan sar pe baandh kar kafan karake siinaa taan chhod do chhod do chhod do paapiyo hamaaraa hindustaan dushmano saavadhaan threedots  rah chukaa hai waqt dagaabaaz tumhaaraa ab na rahegaa ye taktotaaj tumhaaraa dhuul men mil jaayegaa ye raaj tumhaaraa maut se muqaabalaa hai aaj tumhaaraa tum pe ham girenge vajr ke samaan dushmano saavadhaan threedots  jhanajhanaa rahaa suno aakaash zaalimo hogaa ab tumhaaraa sarvanaash zaalimo denge ham bichhaa tumhaarii laash zaalimo kaal banake aayaa subhaashh zaalimo ham chalen hatheliyon pe leke jaan dushmano saavadhaan threedots

Title: champaa kalii dekho jhuk hii gayii jaaduu kiyaa mere pyaar ne
Lyrics: champaa kalii dekho jhuk hii gayii jaaduu kiyaa mere pyaar ne juhii ke phuul tuune dil le liyaa re paagal kiyaa tere pyaar ne  ye teraa shabaab pyaar kaa kamal ankhadiyaan hain yaa koii gazal hai pyaar kii ban gaye ham yuun hasiin aap kii ye inaayat huii champaa kalii dekho threedots  mere dil kii aag raag ban gayii mujh ko zindagii men gunagunaanaa aa gayaa jaaneman tum jaan lo pyaar patthar ko detaa hai jhukaa juhii kii phuul threedots  o raat naujavaan tum bhii ho yahaan aaj apane pyaar par bahaar aa gayii mil gaye dil khil gaye ye kalii terii dulhan banegii champaa kalii dekho threedots

Title: har cheharaa yahaan chaand to har zarraa sitaaraa
Lyrics: har cheharaa yahaan chaand to har zarraa sitaaraa ye vaadiiekashmiir hai  jannat kaa nazaaraa  2 har cheharaa yahaan threedots  hansatii hain jo kaliyaan to hasiin phuul hain khilate hain log yahaan jaise utar aae farishte har dil se nikalatii hai yahaan pyaar kii dhaaraa ye vaadiiekashmiir threedots  ye chotiyaan barafon kii hain aazaadii kaa paracham hansatii hai gulaamii pe ye inasaan kii haradam detii hai aakaash ko baanhon kaa sahaaraa ye vaadiiekashmiir threedots  dinraat havaa saaj bajaatii hai suhaane nadiyon ke labon par hain muhabbat ke taraane mastii men hai duubaa huaa behosh kinaaraa ye vaadiiekashmiir threedots  ye jalavaaerangiin hai kisii kvaab kii taabiir yaa phuulon men baithii huii dulhan kii hai tasviir yaa tham gayaa chalataa huaa pariyon kaa shikaaraa ye vaadiiekashmiir threedots

Title: shok nazar kii bijaliyaan dil pe mere giraae jaa
Lyrics: shok nazar kii bijaliyaan dil pe mere giraae jaa meraa na kuchh kyaal kar tuu yuun hii muskaraae jaa shok nazar kii threedots  jaag uthii hai aarazuu jaise chiraag jal pade ab to vafaa kii raah pe ham tere saath chal pade chaahe hansaae jaa hamen chaahe hamen rulaae jaa shok nazar kii threedots  chain kahiin kisii ghadii aae ne tere bin mujhe kaash main is jahaan se chhiin luun ek din tujhe shok nazar kii threedots

Title: aao bachcho khel dikhaayen  rel gaadii
Lyrics: aao bachcho khel dikhaayen chhukchhuk karatii rel chalaayen siitii de kar seat pe baitho ekduuje kii piith pe baitho  aagepiichhe piichheaage saarii siidhii line men chalanaa aankhen donon Title: diivaanaa huaa baadal
Lyrics: rafii	o ho ho o ho ho aa haa haa diivaanaa huaa baadal saavan kii ghataa chhaai ye dekhake dil jhuumaa  lii pyaar ne angadaai diivaanaa huaa baadal  aisii to merii taqadiir na thii tumasaa jo koii mahabuub mile dil aaj khushii se paagal hai  2 ai jaanevafaa tum khuub mile  2 dil kyuun naa bane paagal  kyaa tumane adaa paai ye dekhake dil jhuumaa  lii pyaar ne angadaai diivaanaa huaa baadal  aashaa	jab tumase nazar takaraai sanam jazabaat kaa ek tuufaan uthaa tinake kii tarah main bah nikalii  2 sailaad mere roke na rukaa  2 jiivan men machii halachal aur bajane lagii shahanaai ye dekhake dil jhuumaa  lii pyaar ne angadaai rafii	diivaanaa huaa baadal  hai aaj naye aramaanon se  aabaad merii dil kii nagarii barason se fizaan kaa mausam thaa  2 viiraan badii duniyaa thii merii  2 haathon men teraa aanchal  aayaa jo bahaar aai ye dekhake dil jhuumaa  lii pyaar ne angadaai  aashaa	diivaanaa huaa baadal  saavan ki ghataa chhaai ye dekhake dil jhuumaa  lii pyaar ne angadaai rafii	diivaanaa huaa baadal  saavan kii ghataa chhaai ye dekhake dil jhuumaa  lii pyaar ne angadaai diivaanaa huaa baadal

Title: aa ab laut chalen

Title: falasafaa pyaar kaa tum kyaa jaano
Lyrics: falasafaa pyaar kaa 2 tum kyaa jaano 2 tumane kabhii pyaar na kiyaa tumane intazaar na kiyaa  kuubasuurat ho magar pyaar ke andaaz nahiin ye kamii hai ke tumhaaraa koii hamaraaz nahiin dil men jab dard nahiin baat banegii kaise saaz chhedaa bhii magar pyaar kii aavaaz nahiin 2 falasafaa pyaar kaa threedots  kaise samajhaauun ye naazuk saa fasaanaa tumako ye vo manzar hai jo mahasuus huaa karataa hai rahatii duniyaa men vahii rahataa hai marakar zindaa pyaar ke naam pe jo jaan diyaa karataa hai 2 falasafaa pyaar kaa threedots  pyaar shiiriin ne kiyaa pyaar hii lailaa ne kiyaa pyaar miiraa ne kiyaa pyaar hii raadhaa ne kiyaa pyaar har rang men logon ko sadaa detaa hai pyaar ke parde men ham sabakaa kudaa rahataa hai 2 falasafaa pyaar kaa threedots

Title: vo hans ke mile ham se ham pyaar samajh baithe
Lyrics: vo hans ke mile ham se ham pyaar samajh baithe bekaar hii ulfat kaa izahaar samajh baithe vo hans ke mile threedots  aisii to na thii qismat apanaa bhii koii hotaa 2 apanaa bhii koii hotaa kyuun kud ko muhabbat kaa haqadaar samajh baithe vo hans ke mile threedots  roen to bhalaa kaise kholen to zubaan kyuun kar 2 kholen to zubaan kyuun kar darate hain ki jaane kyaa sansaar samajh baithe bekaar hii ulfat kaa threedots

Title: phuul hai bahaaron kaa baag hai nazaaron kaa
Lyrics: lataa  phuul hai bahaaron kaa baag hai nazaaron kaa aur chaand hotaa hai sitaaron kaa meraa tuu tuu hii tuu  rafii  haan mauj hai kinaaron kii raat beqaraaron kii aur rimajhim saavan kii phuhaaron kii merii tuu tuu hii tuu  kabhii kahiin main kho jaauun kahaan dhuundhe kahaan jaae meraa pataa phir tuu kisase puuchhe  lataa  jisake jii men tuu basaa hai jisake dil men tuu chhupaa hai vo tujhe galiyon men kyuun dhuundhe vo tujhe galiyon men kyuun dhuundhe  rafii  haa haa jaam hai mastaane kaa ishq hai diivaane kaa aur tiir hotaa hai nishaane kaa merii tuu tuu tuu tuu hii tuu  lataa  o diivaane mainne aisaa kyaa kahaa hai kyaa huaa hai tuune dil kyuun thaam liyaa hai  rafii  o hasiinaa kyaa bataauun tere dil ne mere dil ko pyaar bharaa paigaam diyaa hai haa haa  lataa  riit hai zamaane kii baat hai fasaane kii aur shammaa hotii hai paravaane kii meraa tuu tuu hii tuu  rafii   haa mauj hai kinaaron kii threedots  lataa  meraa tuu tuu hii tuu

Title: jhuum jhuum dhalatii raat
Lyrics: jhuum jhuum dhalatii raat leke chalii mujhe apane saath jhuum jhuum dhalatii raat threedots  jaane kahaan le jaaye dard bharaa ye dil jaise sadaa detii hai khoii huii manzil jaise sadaa detii haithreedots chhodo piyaa meraa chhodo haath jhuum jhuum dhalatii raat threedots   haal ye hai mastii kaa saans lagii thamane utane rahe pyaase ham jitanii bhii pii hamane utane rahe pyaase hamthreedots gam ko badhaa gaii gam kii raat jhuum jhuum dhalatii raat threedots  jisako koii samajhe naa baat na vo doharaa meraa teraa jiivan kyaa chhaayaa huaa koharaa meraa teraa jiivan kyaa threedots  kisane sunii kabhii dil kii baat jhuum jhuum dhalatii raat threedots

Title: jiinaa hamako raas na aayaa
Lyrics: jiinaa hamako raas na aayaa ham jaane kyon jiite hain kyaa saavan kyaa bhaadon apane sab din rote biite hain jiinaa hamako threedots  ham se to jag ruuth gayaa hai ek tumhaaraa kyaa shikavaa    2 ab kyon aahen bharate hain ham ab kyon aansuu piite hain jiinaa hamako threedots  pyaar kii baazii aasaan samajhe ham ne badii naadaanii kii    2 dil kii duhaaii dene vaale yah baazii kab jiite hain jiinaa hamako threedots  dore junuun men kyaa kyaa sujhii kyaa kyaa ham ne kar daalaa    2 khud hii girahabaan phaad liyaa hai khud hii girahabaan siite hain jiinaa hamako threedots

Title: churaa le naa tumako ye mausam suhaanaa
Lyrics: mu 	churaa le naa tumako ye mausam suhaanaa 	khulii vaadiyon men akelii na jaanaa 2 la 	lubhaataa hai mujhako ye mausam suhaanaa 	main jaauungii tum mere piichhe na aanaa 2  mu 	lipat jaaegaa koii  bebaak jhonkaa 	javaanii kii rau men naa aanchal udaanaa la 	mere vaaste tum pareshaan na honaa 	mujhe kuub aataa hai daaman bachaanaa 2 	main jaauungii tum threedots  mu 	ghataa bhii kabhii chuum letii hai cheharaa 	samajh soch kar ruk se zulfen hataanaa la 	ghataa mere nazadiik aakar to dekhe 	in aankhon ne siikhaa hai bijalii giraanaa 2  mu 	tum ek phuul ho tumako dhuundhuungaa kaise 	kahiin mil ke phuulon men gum ho na jaanaa la 	jo phuulon men rangat mile bhii to kyaa hai 	judaa merii kushbuu judaa muskuraanaa 2 	main jaauungii tum threedots

Title: har dam tumhiin ko pyaar kiye jaa rahii huun main
Lyrics: har dam tumhiin ko pyaar kiye jaa rahii huun main jiinaa nahiin qubuul jiye jaa rahii huun main  har dam tumhiin ko yaad kiye jaa rahaa huun main milane kii aarazuu men jiye jaa rahaa huun main  tum mere dil ke paas ho chaahe jahaan raho saanson kii lay pe naam liye jaa rahii huun main  tumhiin ko dhuundhatii hai ye aansuu bharii nazar ab har taraf nigaah kiye jaa rahaa huun main  dil meraa bolataa hai papiihe ke ruup men pii pii ke  jiye jaa rahii huun main

Title: dil ne phir yaad kiyaa
Lyrics: dil ne phir yaad kiyaa barq sii laharaaii hai phir koii chot muhabbat kii ubhar aaii hai dil ne phir yaad kiyaa threedots  vo bhii kyaa din the hamen dil men bithaayaa thaa kabhii aur hans hans ke gale tum ne lagaayaa thaa kabhii khel hii khel men kyon jaan pe ban aaii hai phir koii chot muhabbat kii threedots  kyaa bataayen tumhen ham shammaa kii qisamat kyaa hai aag men game ke jalane ke sivaa muhabbat kyaa hai ye vo gulashan hai ki jis men na bahaar aaii hai dil ne phir yaad kiyaa threedots  ham vo paravaane hain jo shammaa kaa dam bharate hain husn kii aag men khaamosh jalaa karate hain aah bhii nikale to pyaar kii rusavaaii hai phir koii chot muhabbat kii threedots

Title: dhadakane lagataa hai meraa dil tere naam se
Lyrics: dhadakane lagataa hai meraa dil tere naam se aisaa lagataa hai ab ham gaye kaam se 2 dha dha dha dhadakane lagataa threedots  mere dil men jab se tuutaa tere nain kaa tiir dil men rahakar ban gayaa vo to merii hii tasviir niind nahiin aatii hai mujhe aaraam se dhadakane lagataa threedots  terii baaten tere kisse rahate hain haradam mahafil ho yaa viiraanaa ho yaa koii mausam darate nahiin hain ham ishq ke anjaam se aisaa lagataa hai threedots

Title: sharaabiisharaabii meraa naam ho gayaa
Lyrics: sharaabiisharaabii meraa naam ho gayaa meraa naam kaahe ko badanaam ho gayaa sharaabiisharaabii threedots  shaayaron ne mujhako likhaa saaqii janaab aapane kisalie mujhe samajhaa karaab aisaa kyaa mujhase koii kaam ho gayaa sharaabiisharaabii threedots  aap roz merii nazaron se piite rahe is nashe ke sahaare hii jiite rahe lekin kudaa kii qasam bade kudagarz hain o maine pii mujhape ye ilzaam ho gayaa sharaabiisharaabii threedots  jii aapako dekh ke yaad aayaa mujhe aapane shiishe se kyuun banaayaa mujhe pattharon kii zamiin pe giraayaa mujhe tuut ke dekhie shiishaa jaam ho gayaa sharaabiisharaabii threedots

Title: abhii na jaao chhodakar ke dil abhii bharaa nahiin
Lyrics: ra  abhii na jaao chhod kar ke dil abhii bharaa nahiin  2 abhii abhii to aaii ho  abhii abhii to abhii abhii to aaii ho bahaar banake chhaaii ho havaa zaraa mahak to le nazar zaraa bahak to le ye shaam dhal to le zaraa  2 ye dil sambhal to le zaraa main thodii der jii to luun nashe ke ghuunt pii to luun nashe ke ghuunt pii to luun abhii to kuchh kahaanahiin abhii to kuchh sunaa nahiin abhii na jaao chhodakar ke dil abhii bharaa nahiin  aa sitaare jhilamilaa uthe sitaare jhilamilaa uthe charaag jagamagaa uthe bas ab na mujhako tokanaa bas ab na mujhako tokanaa na badhake raah rokanaa agar main ruk gaii abhii to jaa na paauungii kabhii yahii kahoge tum sadaa ke dil abhii nahiin bharaa jo khatm ho kisii jagah ye aisaa silasilaa nahiin ra  abhii nahiin abhii nahiin aa nahiin nahiin nahiin nahiin ra  abhii na jaao chhodakar ke dil abhii bharaa nahiin  ra  adhuurii aas adhuurii aas chhodake adhuurii pyaas chhodake jo roz yuunhii jaaogii to kis tarah nibhaaogii ki zindagii kii raah men javaan dilon kii chaah men kaii muqaam aaenge jo ham ko aazamaaenge buraa na maano baat kaa ye pyaar hai gilaa nahiin aa haan yahii kahoge tum sadaa ke dil abhii nahiin bharaa ra  haan dil abhii bharaa nahiin aa nahiin nahiin nahiin nahiin

Title: prabhu tumhiin prakash do
Lyrics: prabhu tumhiin prakash do saanjh ho gayii prabhu tumhiin prakash do prakash do prakash do  zindagii kii naav ye liye hamen kidhar chalii raah dhuundatii huii bhanvar men aaj ghir chalii jhilamilaa rahaa hriday nayan kii putaliyaan hilii aansuon kii dhaar aaj baadalon sii jhar chalii bhiikh maangate nayan bhiikh maangate nayan inhen suhaas do is niraash kaanpate hriday ko aas do prabhu tumhiin prakash do  milaa kahiin na chain hai katii kahiin na rain hai sivaa rudan ke aaj tak sune na madhur bain hain bujhaa huaa prakaash diip paanv ladakhadaa rahen kuch bhii suujhataa nahiin andhere aise chhaa rahen praan ye pukaarate praan ye pukaarate tumhiin vikaas do is niraash kaanpate hriday ko aas do prabhu tumhiin prakaash do

Title: tumhaare pyaar men ham  shikaar karane ko aae
Lyrics: tumhaare pyaar men ham beqaraar ho ke chale shikaar karane ko aae shikaar ho ke chale shikaar karane ko threedots  tumhen qariib se dekhaa to dil ko haar diyaa tumhaarii shok adaa ne hamen to maar diyaa har ek baat pe ham to nisaar ho ke chale shikaar karane ko threedots  tumhaarii aankh mohabbat kii baat kahatii hai tumhen bhii kisii kii talaash rahatii hai ye raaz jaan gae raazadaar ho ke chale shikaar karane ko threedots  na apanaa hosh na apanii kabar kahaan hain ham isii kaa naam mohabbat hai ai mere hamadam tumhaare kuuche se diivaanaavaar ho ke chale shikaar karane ko threedots

Title: dil kii tamannaa thii mastii men manzil se happy version
Lyrics: ra ho dil kii tamannaa thii mastii men manzil se bhii duur nikalate     apanaa bhii koii saathii hotaa ham bhii bahakate chalatechalate     ho dil kii tamannaa   aa hote kahiin ham aur tum khwaabon kii rangiin vaadii men gum  2 ra phir un khwaabon kii vaadii se uthate aankhen malatemalate do ho dil kii tamannaa   ra hansatii zamiin gaate qadam chalate nazaare chalate jo ham  2 aa rukate ham to rukruk jaataa dhalataa suuraj dhalatedhalate do ho dil kii tamannaa   ra aur shaamegam banake agar dukh ke andhere karate safar  2 aa raahon ke diipak ban jaate pyaar bhare dil jalatejalate do ho dil kii tamannaa

Lyrics: aa 	niiliiniilii ghataa o bhiigiibhiigii havaa 	hai nashaa hii nashaa kahiin kho jaaen aa mu 	niiliiniilii ghataa threedots  	palakon chhalake gaalon pe dhalake 	saavan kii buundon men chanchal ishaare hain aa 	samajho ishaaraa de do sahaaraa 	tum bhii hamaare ho ham bhii tumhaare hain 	aa jhuumen zaraa 	niiliiniilii ghataa threedots  	laharon kaa aanchal saahil pe dole 	barakhaa kii raanii bhii zulfon ko khole mu 	laharon men kho jaa ojhal tuu ho jaa 	manzil ye apanii hai dil meraa bole hai 	aa jhuumen zaraa 	niiliiniilii ghataa threedots  	mausam kaa jaaduu dil hai beqaabuu 	bahake qadam hain kyuun hogaa aur aage kyaa aa 	jannat yahii hai mujhako yaqiin hai 	pahaluu men tuu jo hai dil aur maange kyaa 	aa jhuumen zaraa do 	niiliiniilii ghataa threedots

Lyrics: ra 	haay soniye hiiriyehiiriye haay re haay u 	oe soniyaa oe soniyaa hoe raanjhiyaa raanjhiyaa raanjhiyaa ko 	oe shaabaa oe shaabaa nii kudiye pahaad diye 	oe shaabaa oe shaabaa ve mundiyaa shahar diyaa  ra 	o tuu raat khadii thii chhat pe nii main samajhaa ke chaand nikalaa ko 	hoy tuu raat khadii threedots u 	buraa ho teraa tujhe dekh ke kothe se meraa pair phisalaa ko 	buraa ho teraa threedots  ra 	 kat jaae naa merii zindagii  2 hoe terii kal parason men ko 	kat jaae naa threedots u 	 kal parason men baat nahiin banatii  2 banatii hai jaa ke barason men ko 	kal parason men threedots  ra 	 tere paanv men nahiin ghungharuu  2 hotii hai chhamchham kaise ko 	tere paanv men threedots u 	 ye to raaz kii baaten hain  2 bataa den tujhe ham kaise ko 	ye to raaz threedots  ra 	 terii zulf jo bikharii to  2 leke biin sapere aa gae ko 	terii zulf jo threedots u 	 merii zulf hai naagin to  2 bure din bas tere aa gae ko 	merii zulf hai threedots  ra 	chal chalie nii mutiyaare baisaakhii vaale mele men ko 	chal chalie nii threedots u 	 mele kaa to bahaanaa hai  2 tuu mujhe chhedegaa akele men ko 	mele kaa to threedots

Title: aaj koii pyaar se dil kii baaten kah gayaa
Lyrics: aaj koii pyaar se dil kii baaten kah gayaa haay main to aage badh gaii  piichhe zamaanaa rah gayaa haay raam  chiir kar patthar kaa siinaa jhuum kar jharanaa bahaa is men ik tuufaan thaa sau karawaten letaa huaa aaj maujon kii rawaanii men kinaaraa bah gayaa haay ik kinaaraa bah gayaa  unake hothon par hansii haay khil ke jab laharaa gaii  wo bhii kuchh ghabaraa gae main bhii kuchh sharamaa gaii wo bhii kuchh ghabaraa gae aur main bhii kuchh sharamaa gaii  kuchh nahiin kahate hue bhii koii sab kuchh kah gayaa haay koii sab kuchh kah gayaa

Title: main to pyaar se tere piyaa maang sajaauungii
Lyrics: main to pyaar se tere piyaa maang sajaauungii tere anganaa ye saarii umariyaa bitaauungii  sajdhaj ke main savere savere mahakii mahakii karatii huun phere lagatii huun kaise tuu bhii to dekhe khol de akhiyaan saajan mere tere haathob se ye ghuunghat uthaauungii tere anganaa ye threedots   tohe rakh luungii jiyaa men basaa ke dekhuungii phir shiish jhukaake ghar ko tere jaan ke mandir aur mandir men tujhe bithaa ke diyaa gore gore tan kaa jalaauungii tere anganaa ye threedots

Title: maine kahaa tumase hamen pyaar hai
Lyrics: la 	maine kahaa ai jii maine kahaa tumase hamen pyaar hai maine kahaa mu 	ai jii maine kahaa hamako kab inkaar hai maine kahaa  la 	ai jii ye to bataa do ki huii hai kyaa baat 	kyuun main tere sapane dekhuun saariisaarii raat mu 	main kyaa jaanuun shaayad yahii pyaar hai la 	maine kahaa hamako kab threedots  mu 	hamako bhii tanhaaiyon men niind na aaii 	le lo chaahe chaandsitaaron se gavaahii la 	jaane bhii do hamako etabaar hai mu 	maine kahaa tumase hamen threedots  la 	ab to tamannaa hai tere dil men hii rahen mu 	ham bhii yahii chaahate hain aur kyaa kahen la 	phir merii jaan mu 	haan merii jaan do 	bahaar hii bahaar hai 	maine kahaa tumase hamen threedots

Title: muft hue badanaam kisii pe haay dil ko lagaa ke
Lyrics: muft hue badanaam kisii pe haay dil ko lagaa ke jiinaa huaa iljaam kisii pe haay dil ko lagaa ke muft hue badanaam  gaye aramaan leke luute luute aate hain log jahaan men kaise dil ko lagaate hain  2 dil ko lagaate hain apanaa banaate hain ham to phire naadaan   2 kisii pe haay dil ko lagaa ke muft hue badanaam  samajhe the saath bhejaa kisiikaa suhaanaa gam usii jo nazar ko dekhaa tanhaa khade hain ham  2 tanhaa khade hain ham dil bhii rahaa hai kam rastemen ho gaii shaam  2 kisii pe haay dil ko lagaa ke muft hue badanaam

Title: sansaar se bhaage phirate ho bhagawaan ko tum kyaa paaoge
Lyrics: sansaar se bhaage phirate ho bhagawaan ko tum kyaa paaoge is log ko bhii apanaa naa sake us lok men bhii pachhataaoge sansaar se bhaage phirate ho   ye paap hai kyaa ye puny hai kyaa riiton par dharm kii moharen hain  2 riiton par dharm kii moharen hain har yug men badalate dharmon ko kaise aadarsh banaaoge sansaar se bhaage phirate ho   ye bhog bhii ek tapasyaa hai tum tyaag ke maare kyaa jaano  2 tum tyaag ke maare kyaa jaano apamaan rachetaa kaa hogaa rachanaa ko agar thukaraaoge sansaar se bhaage phirate ho   ham kahate hain ye jag apanaa hai tum kahate ho jhuuthaa sapanaa hai  2 tum kahate ho jhuuthaa sapanaa hai ham janam bitaa kar jaayenge tum janam ganvaa kar jaaoge  sansaar se bhaage phirate ho bhagawaan ko tum kyaa paaoge sansaar se bhaage phirate ho

Title: dil sambhaale sambhalataa nahiin aaj to
Lyrics: mu 	dil sambhaale sambhalataa nahiin aaj to 	paas aane kii de do ijaazat hamen la 	dekhie ye hasiin shaam dhalane ko hai 	ab to jaane kii de do ijaazat hamen 2 	dekhie ye hasiin threedots  mu 	kaise kah den ki jaao in aankhon se ab 	tumako jaate hue dekhaa jaataa nahiin la 	ham bhii majabuur hain varanaa jaane kaa to 	ye kyaal apane dil men bhii aataa nahiin mu 	jhiil sii apanii aankhon men pahale zaraa 	duub jaane kii de do ijaazat hamen la 	ab to jaane kii de do ijaazat hamen 	dekhie ye hasiin threedots  	daal dii tumane aankhon men aankhen agar 	jaane phir kab sanam aaen ham hosh men mu 	zindagii bhar hamen saath rahanaa hai ab 	ham rahenge mohabbat ke aagosh men la 	kyaa bataaen hamen dar zamaane kaa hai 	is zamaane kii le do ijaazat hamen 	paas aane kii de do threedots

Title: kisii na kisii se kabhii na kabhii  dil lagaanaa padegaa
Lyrics: kisii na kisii se kabhii na kabhii kahiin na kahiin dil lagaanaa padegaa  2  ek se ek hasiin chehare hain kiskis ko main dekhuun kisako inamen apanaa samajhuun aur sang main apane le luun koii rangiilii chhailchhabiilii 2 aaj merii zindagii men aa ke rahegii kisii na kisii se threedots  dhuundh rahaa huun main vo duniyaa pyaar jise kahate hain kaun vo qismat vaale hain jo log vahaan rahate hain mujhako mere dil le ke vahiin chal 2 aae jahaan haath koii reshamii aanchal kisii na kisii se threedots  aisii naazuk ho vo jisakaa shabanam munh dhotii ho chaand bhii sadake hotaa ho jab raat ko vo sotii ho aankh sharaabii gaal gulaabii 2 pyaar se sanvaar de jo zindagii merii kisii na kisii se threedots

Title: merii taqadiir kahaan par  raam kare kahiin nainaa na ulajhen
Lyrics: merii taqadiir kahaan par mujhe le aaii hai saarii duniyaa merii ulfat kii tamaashaaii hai isalie laaj kaa pardaa hai mere chehare par khul gayaa raaz to isamen terii rusavaaii hai  raam kare kahiin nainaa na ulajhen 2 nainaa jo ulajhen to mushkil se sulajhe raam kare kahiin threedots  aae na jis din ghar saanvariyaa paagal banakar dhuundhe najariyaa morii kaayaa aise tadape jaise tadape jal bin machhariyaa raam kare kahiin threedots  jisake kaaran sab kuchh chhodaa usane mere dil ko todaa har tuufaan men saath rahaa vo aake kinaare mukhadaa modaa raam kare kahiin threedots

Title: main dekhuun jis or sakhii rii saamane mere saanvariyaa
Lyrics: main dekhuun jis or sakhii rii 2 saamane mere saanvariyaa 2  prem ne jogan mujhako banaayaa 2 tan ko phuunkaa man ko jalaayaa prem ke dukh men duub gayaa dil jaise jal men gaagariyaa saamane mere threedots  roro kar har dukh sahanaa hai 2 dukh sahsah kar chup rahanaa hai kaise bataauun kaise bichhadii 2 pii ke mukh se baansuriyaa saamane mere threedots  duniyaa kahatii mujhako diivaanii 2 koii na samajhe prem kii baanii saajansaajan ratateratate 2 ab to ho gaii baavariyaa saamane mere threedots

Title: tasaviir terii dil men jis din se utaarii hai
Lyrics: lataa tasaviir terii dil men jis din se utaarii hai  2 phiruun tujhe sang leke nae nae rang leke sapanon kii mahafil men    rafii tasaviir terii dil men jis din se utaarii hai phiruun tujhe sang leke nae nae rang leke sapanon kii mahafil men tasaviir terii dil men     lataa maathe kii bindiyaa tuu hai sanam nainon kaa kajaraa piyaa teraa gam  2 nain kiye niiche niiche rahuun tere piichhe piichhe chaluun kisii manzil men tasaviir terii dil men      rafii tumase nazar jab gaii hai mil jahaan hai qadam tere vahiin meraa dil  2 jhuke jahaan palaken terii khule jahaan zulfen terii rahuun usii manzil men tasaviir terii dil men      lataa tuufaan uthaaegii duniyaa magar  ruk na sakegaa dil kaa safar  2    rafii yuunhii nazar milatii hogii yuunhii shamaa jalatii hogii terii merii manzil men     lataa tasaviir terii dil men jis din se utaarii hai  phiruun tujhe sang leke nae nae rang leke sapanon kii mahafil men    rafii tasaviir terii dil men jis din se utaarii hai phiruun tujhe sang leke nae nae rang leke sapanon kii mahafil men     donon tasaviir terii dil men

Title: jaane terii nazaron ne kyaa kar diyaa
Lyrics: la 	jaane terii nazaron ne kyaa kar diyaa 	jab tujhe dekhuun meraa dhadake jiyaa ra 	tuune mohabbat se meraa dil bhar diyaa 	apanaa banaane vaale teraa shukriyaa  la 	piyaa jabase huaa teraameraa milan 	mere jiivan men chamakii kushii kii kiran ra 	din guzarane lage hain terii yaad men 	aur sataatii hai raaton ko terii lagan la 	ud gaii nainon se merii nindiyaa  ra 	ye bahaaron kaa mausam ye thandii havaa 	isamen hai rang zaalim tere husn kaa la 	mujhe tuune mohabbat sikhaaii balam 	varanaa mere to jiivan men kuchh bhii na thaa ra 	terii adaaon ne meraa dil le liyaa 	apanaa banaane vaale threedots

Title: chhuune na duungii haath re najariyon se dil bhar duungii
Lyrics: chhuune na duungii haath re najariyon se dil bhar duungii baithii rahuungii saarii raat re najariyon se dil bhar duungii  dil kii hasarat na kabhii dil se nikalane duungii pyaar kaa koii bhii jaaduu na chalane duungii  ishq kii aag tez hai hamane maanaa dil ke motii ko haragiz na pighalane duungii hotii rahegii mulaakaat re najariyon se dil bhar duungii chhuune na duungii threedots

Title: aaii ab kii saal divaalii munh par apane khuun male
Lyrics: aaii ab kii saal divaalii munh par apane khuun male  aaii ab kii saal divaalii  chaaron taraf hai ghor andheraa ghar men kaise dip jale  aaii ab kii saal threedots   baalak tarase phulajhadiyon ko diipon ko diivaaren  2 maan kii godii suunii suunii aangan kaise sanvaare  2 raah men unakii jaao ujaalon ban men jinakii shaam dhale  aaii ab kii saal threedots   jinake dam se jagamag jagamag karatii thii ye raaten 2 chorii chorii ho jati thii man se man kii baaten  2 chhod chale vo ghar men amaavas jyotii lekar saath chale  aaii ab kii saal threedots   taptap taptap tapake aansuu chhalakii khaalii thaalii 2  jaane kya kya samajhaatii hai aankhon kii ye laalii 2 shor machaa hai aag lagi hai katate hai parvat pe gale  aaii ab kii saal threedots

Title: prabhu tero naam jo dhyaaye phal paaye
Lyrics: from surajit a bose psurajitnetscapenet date 20021208 230437 pst  prabhu tero naam jo dhyaaye phal paaye sukh daaye tero naam threedots  tuu daanii tuu antarayaamii terii kripaa ho jaaye to swaamii har bigadii ban jaaye jiivan dhan mil jaaye mil jaaye mil jaaye sukh daaye tero naam threedots  bas jaaye moraa suunaa anganaa khil jaaye murajhaayaa kanganaa jiivan men ras aaye jiivan dhan mil jaaye mil jaaye mil jaaye sukh daaye tero naam threedots

Title: mere pairon men koii ghungharuu pahanaa de
Lyrics: dil paayaa alabelaa main ne tabiiyat merii rangiilii haay aaj khushii men main ne bhaiyya thodii sii bhang pii lii  mere pairon men haay mere pairon men ghungharuu bandhaa de to phir merii chaal dekh le      zaraa jam ke bhaiyyaa  mohe laalii chunar mohe laalii chunariyaa odhaa de to phir merii chaal dekh le mere pairon men   threedots      kyaa chaal hai torii     zaraa jhuum le gorii     ahaa vaah  haale dole kisii kii nathanii jhuume kisii kaa juhmakaa har paarii dil thaam le apanaa aisaa lagaauun thumakaa      kaise bhalaa     aise ding ka tikat phurr ka tikat aa  jab ho kisii kii byaah sagaaii merii javaanii le angadaaii koii merii bhii shaadii karaa de to phir merii chaal dekh le mere pairon men   threedots  koii ghuunghat vaali mere dil pe chalaaye chhuriyaan koii nainon vaalii chhode nainon se phuljhadiyaan ruup hai laakhon aur ik dil hai aape men rahanaa bhii mushkil hai koii akhiyon se daaruu pilaa de to phir merii chaal dekh le      zaraa nain milaa ke     zaraa dil lagaa ke  ek najar se dil bharamaaye duujii se le jaaye tiikhii najar tuu aisii maare jo dekhe lut jaaye saarii duniyaa tujhape diivaanii main bhii to dekhuun terii javaanii zaraa mukhade se ghunghataa hataa de to phir merii chaal dekh le mohe laalii chunar   threedots

Title: mahalon men rahane vaalii dil hai gariib kaa
Lyrics: ta 	mahalon men rahane vaalii dil hai gariib kaa 	rakh le ise yaa tod de la 	o terii rahuungii sainyaa chaahe tere pyaar men 	mujhako zamaanaa chhod de 2  ta 	 tumako na rok len ye rasmen jahaan kii la 	tum pe to khel denge ham baazii jaan kii  2 	ham baazii jaan kii ta 	chaand sitaaron vaalii dil hai gariib kaa threedots  la 	 nazaron kii aas hai tuu dil kaa qaraar hai ta 	apanii bhii aarazuu to ik teraa pyaar hai  2 	ik teraa pyaar hai la 	kuchh na kahuungii sainyaa chaahe tere pyaar men threedots  ta 	 ankhiyon men dekh gorii terii tasviir hai la 	ab tere haath sainyaa merii taqadiir hai  2 	merii taqadiir hai ta 	dil men samaane vaalii dil hai gariib kaa threedots

Title: merii aavaaz suno pyaar ke raaz suno
Lyrics: meri aavaaz suno pyaar ke raaz suno  mainne ek phuul jo siine pe sajaa rakhaa tha  usake parade main tumhe dil se lagaa rakhha tha  tha judaa sabase mere ishq ka andaaz suno   1 zindagii bhar mujhe nafarat si rahi ashkon se  mere khvaabon ko tum ashkon men dubote kyon ho  jo meri tarah jiyaa karate hain kab marate hain  thak gayaa huun mujhe so lene do rote kyon ho  so ke bhi jaagate hii rahate hain jaanbaaz suno threedots  2 meri duniya men na purab hai na pashchim koi  saare insaan simat aaye khulii baahon men  kal bhatakataa tha main jin rahon main tanhaa tanhaa kaafile kitane mile aaj unhiin rahon main  aur sab nikale mere hamadard mere hamaraz  suno threedots  3 naunihaal aate hain arathii ko kinaare kar lo  main jahaan tha inhen jaanaa hai vahaan se aage  aasamaan inakaa zamiin inakii zamaanaa inakaa  hain kai inake jahaan mere jahaan se aage  inhen kaliyaan na kaho hain ye chamanasaaz suno threedots  4 kyon sanvarii hai ye chandan kii chitaa mere liye  main koi jism nahiin huun ke jalaaoge mujhe  raakh ke saath bikhar jaauungaa main duniya men  tum jahaan khaaoge thokar vahiin paaoge mujhe  har kadam par hai nae mod ka aagaaz suno threedots

Title: arii o shokh kaliyon muskuraa denaa vo jab aaye
Film: jab yaad kisi ki aati hai
Lyrics: arii o shokh kaliyon muskuraa denaa vo jab aaye  vo jab aaye adab se daaliyaan phuulon kii jhuk jaaye vo jab guzare chaman se qaafile bhanvaron ke ruk jaaye suno phuulon mahak apanii lutaa denaa vo jab aaye arii o shokh kaliyon muskuraa denaa   threedots  bahut taariif karatii hain ye kaliyaan baar baar usakii tamannaa hai ki main bhii dekh luun rangiin bahaar usakii havaaon tum naqaab usakii uthaa denaa vo jab aaye arii o shokh kaliyon muskuraa denaa   threedots  bagair usakii muhabbat ke main zindaa rah na paauungaa magar ye baat dil kii man kisii se kah na paauungaa nigaahon haaledil usako sunaa denaa vo jab aaye arii o shokh kaliyon muskuraa denaa   threedots

Title: puuchho naa kaise main ne rain bitaaii ik pal jaise ik yug biita
Lyrics: puuchho naa kaise maine rain bitaai ik pal jaise ik yug biita  2 yug biite mohe niind naa aayii puuchho naa kaise threedots  naa kahiin chandaa naa kahiin taare jyot ke pyaase mere nain bichaare   2 bhor bhii aas kii kiran naa laayi puuchho naa kaise threedots  ik jale diipak ik man meraa mera man mera mera threedots ik jale diipak ik man meraa phir bhi naa jaaye mere ghar kaa andheraa tadapat tarasat umar ganvaayii puuchho naa kaise threedots

Title: duur ke o chandaa aa merii baanhon men aa
Lyrics: duur ke o chandaa aa merii baanhon men aa dil men roshanii kar aankhon men tuu muskuraa   gharghar saavan barase hai pyaasii mamataa tarase hai  2 bin tere meraa aangan suunaasuunaa duur ke o chandaa threedots  bholiibhaalii aankhon men in matavaalii aankhon men dil men hai jiivan kaa manahar sapanaa duur ke o chandaa threedots

Title: hamako tumhaare ishq ne kyaakyaa banaa diyaa
Lyrics: hamako tumhaare ishq ne kyaakyaa banaa diyaa jab kuchh na ban sake to tamaashaa banaa diyaa  kaashii se kuchh garaz thii na qaabe se vaastaa ham dhuundhane chale the mohabbat kaa raastaa dekhaa tumhaare dar ko to sar ko jhukaa diyaa jab kuchh na ban threedots  dil kii lagii ne kar diyaa donon ko beqaraar doharaa ke daastaanemohabbat phir ek baar majanuun hamen aur aapako lailaa banaa diyaa jab kuchh na ban threedots  nikale terii talaash men aur khud hii kho gae jab kuchh na ban padii to diivaane ho gae diivaanagii me phir teraa kuunchaa dikhaa diyaa jab kuchh na ban threedots  jalavon kii bhiikh phenkane vaale kii khair ho pardaa hataake dekhane vaale kii khair ho ban ke bhikhaarii ishq ne daaman bichhaa diyaa jab kuchh na ban threedots

Title: aankhon men rang kyuun aayaa
Lyrics: mu 	aankhon men rang kyuun aayaa bolo nashaa saa kyon chhaayaa 	hamako ye raaz batalaao dil kho ke tumane kyaa paayaa la 	chamakii nasiib kii raahen ham kyuun na aaj itaraaen 	raahon se hat gae kaante to phuul kyuun na muskaaen mu 	aankhon men rang threedots  	mukhade pe subah kii dhuup ye khilataakhilataa ruup 	kaajal lakiir chitavan ke tiir ye nainaa ruup anuup la 	tum kyaa samajho ye raaz ulfat ke ye andaaz 	sun ke zaruur hogaa guruur aur karane lagoge naaz mu 	aisaa kyaal mat kiije ham se ye bhed kah diije 	ham bhii to aap hii ke hain hamase yuun sharm naa kiije la 	chamakii nasiib kii raahen threedots mu 	aankhon men rang threedots  	tarasaao na yuun hamadam tumhen naazoadaa kii qasam 	jaldii se bol do ye raaz khol do paradaa uthaa do sanam la 	haragiz na kahuungii ye baat jodoge na jab tak haath 	banake nasiib rahanaa qariib jyuun taare chaand ke saath mu 	tumase judaa na honge ham badalen hazaar ye aalam 	ham tumape jaan de denge gaatii hai saans kii saragam 	aankhon men rang threedots

Title: merii zindagii hai nagamaa
Lyrics: aa merii zindagii hai nagamaa merii zindagii taraanaa2 main sadaaezindagii huun mujhe dhuundh le zamanaa merii zindagii hai nagamaa merii zindagii taraanaa  main kisii ko kyaa bataauun mujhe yaad kuch nahiin hai kahaan rah gaii bichad kar merii shaakheaashiyaanaa merii zindagii hai nagamaa merii zindagii taraanaa2  mere dil kii dhadakanen hain2 mere bachapane kii yaaden ke kahiinkahiin se ab tak mujhe yaad hai fasaanaa merii zindagii hai nagamaa merii zindagii taraanaa  mere soz men tabassum merii aah men tarannum2 main charaag shaamegam huun meraa naam hai shabaanaa merii zindagii hai nagamaa merii zindagii taraanaa main sadaaezindagii huun mujhe dhuundh le zamanaa merii zindagii hai nagamaa merii zindagii taraanaa2

Title: piyaa charan kii babhuut ramaaii  apane piyaa kii main to banii re joganiyaa
Lyrics: piyaa charan kii babhuut ramaaii pahanii priit kii maalaa ab kaahe kaa daranaa jag se man men huaa ujaalaa o threedots  apane piyaa kii main to banii re joganiyaa hansii udaae chaahe saarii duniyaa  main to banii re joganiyaa threedots  saanvariyaa ke rang men chunariyaa rangaauungii chandramaa kaa jhumakaa pahan piyaa aauungii jhan jhan jhaanjhe morii ho o o jhan jhan jhan baaje morii painjaniyaa main to banii re joganiyaa threedots  tere liye mainne to sharamlaaj chhodii re tere sang jodii to jagat sang todii re tuu hai mohan meraa ho o o tuu hai mohan main terii mohaniyaa main to banii re joganiyaa threedots

Title: jiivan dor tumhiin sang baandhii
Lyrics: jiivan dor tumhiin sang baandhii kyaa todenge is bandhan ko jag ke tuufaan aandhii re aandhii jiivan dor threedots  ho na sake kabhii hamtum nyaare do tan hain ik praan hamaare chaahe mile path men andhiyaare chaahe ghire hon baadal kaare phir bhii rahuungii tumhaarii tumhaarii jiivan dor threedots  yuun ghul mil rahanaa jiivan men jaise rahe kajaraa akhiyan men terii chhavi chaaii rahe man men teraa hii naam rahe dhadakan men tere daras kii main pyaasii re pyaasii jiivan dor threedots  aisaa mujhe varadaan milaa hai tum kyaa mile bhagavaan milaa hai ab to janam bhar sang rahegaa is mehandii kaa rang rahegaa tere charan kii main daasii re daasii jiivan dor threedots

Title: jaa re jaa re ud jaa re panchhii bahaaron ke des jaa re
Lyrics: jaa re jaa re ud jaa re panchhii bahaaron ke des jaa re yahaan kyaa hai mere pyaare kyuun ujad gaii bagiyaa mere man kii jaa re threedots  naa daalii rahii naa kalii ajab gam kii aandhii chalii udii dukh kii dhuul raahon men jaa re threedots  main viinaa uthaa naa sakii tere sang gaa naa sakii dhale mere giit aahon men jaa re threedots

Title: tuut gaii hai maalaa motii bikhar chale
Lyrics: tuut gaii hai maalaa tuut gaii hai maalaa motii bikhar chale do din rah kar saath jaane kidhar chale tuut gaii hai maalaa  milan kii duniyaa chhod chale ye aaj birah men sapane 2 khoyekhoye nainon men hain ujadeujade sapane ujadeujade sapane vyaadh kii gatharii liye jhukaaye nazar chale do din rah kar saath jaane kidhar chale tuut gaii hai maalaa  ab to ye jag men jiyenge aansuu piitepiite 2 jaisii inape biitii vaisii aur kisii pe na biite aur kisii pe na biite koii mat puuchho inhen ke ye kis dagar chale do din rah kar saath jaane kidhar chale tuut gaii hai maalaa motii bikhar chale do din rah kar saath jaane kidhar chale

Title: nainon men badaraa chhaae bijalii sii chamake haae
Lyrics: nainon men badaraa chhaae bijalii sii chamake haae aise men balam mohe garavaa lagaa le nainon menthreedots  madiraa men duubii ankhiyaan chanchal hain donon sakhiyaan dhalatii rahengii tohe palakon kii pyaarii pakhiyaan sharamaa ke dengii tohe madiraa ke pyaale nainon menthreedots  prem diivaanii huun men sapanon kii raanii huun main pichhale janam se terii prem kahaanii huun main aa is janam men bhii tuu apanaa banaa le nainon menthreedots

Title: duniyaa men dilawaale honge hazaaron
Lyrics: duniyaa men dilawaale honge hazaaron phir bhii hamaarii wafaa dilarubaa yaad karoge   2 hamane bhii apanaa mohabbat bharaa dil jaao tumhen de diyaa tum bhii kyaa yaad karoge   pyaar men aakir hamaare  kaam aa gayiin wo dard bharii aahen dard bharii aahen   2 aapake qadamon ke niiche jalatii thiin raahen jalatii thiin raahen is dhuup men tumako zulafon kaa saayaa jaise ki hamane diyaa saajanaa yaad karoge  duniyaa men dilawaale honge hazaaron phir bhii hamaarii wafaa dilarubaa yaad karoge   beqaraar main bhii huun lekin lab tharatharaaye aankh jhuk jaaye aankh jhuk jaaye   2 tum rahe aanchal samete tan ko churaaye phir bhii udaa laayaa baahon men tumako jhonkaa mere pyaar kaa ye hawaa yaad karoge  hamane bhii apanaa mohabbat bharaa dil jaao tumhen de diyaa tum bhii kyaa yaad karoge   ham mile to raah kyaa hai chalatii hai manzil sang hamen leke sang hamen leke   2 dekhanaa chhuute na bainyaan milake gale se milake gale se pal men andheraa hai pal men ujaalaa ye bekudii kii ghataa baalamaa yaad karoge  duniyaa men dilawaale honge hazaaron phir bhii hamaarii wafaa dilarubaa yaad karoge tum bhii kyaa yaad karoge

Title: mere man ke diye
Lyrics: mere man ke diye2 yuunhii ghut ghut ke jal tuu mere laadale o mere laadale  khaaq ho jaaye ham pyaar ke naam par2 pyaar kii raah men roshanii to rahe mere man ke diye2 yuunhii ghut ghut ke jal tuu mere laadale o mere laadale  aag ke phuul aanchal men daale hue2 kab se jalataa hai vo aasamaan dekhale mere man ke diye2 yuunhii ghut ghut ke jal tuu mere laadale o mere laadale

Title: na jaane kahaan kho gayaa vo zamaanaa

Lyrics: aaj ye merii zindagii dekho kushii men jhuumatii jaane chalii kahaan jaane chalii kahaan 2  tanhaa nahiin chalii huun main dil bhii hai meraa hamasafar guzarii to huun idhar se main phir bhii naii hai rahaguzar 2 zarron men bhii hai roshanii leke tu mujhako aa gayii ai zindagii kahaan ai zindagii kahaan 2  mujhako bulaa rahaa hai kyon dekho vo koii duur se badhane lage mere qadam jisakii taraf guruur se 2 dil men bhii hai suruur saa aankhon men bhii hai nuur saa shamaa jalii kahaan  shamaa jalii kahaan  raahon men merii phuul hai taare merii nigaah men ab naa mujhe pukaaraanaa duub chalii huun chaah men 2 apanaa nahiin hai kuchh pataa ai merii bekudii bataa tuu le chalii kahaan tuu le chalii kahaan  aaj ye merii zindagii threedots

Title: main pyaar kaa raahii huun
Lyrics: ra main pyaar kaa raahii huun terii zulf ke saae men kuchh der thahar jaauun aa tum ek musaafir ho kab chhodake chal doge ye sochake ghabaraauun ra main pyaar kaa raahii huun  ra tere bin jii lage na akele aa ho sake to mujhe saath le le ra naazaniin tuu nahiin jaa sakegii chhodakar zindagii ke jhamele naazaniin aa jab bhii chhaae ghataa yaad karanaa zaraa saath rangon kii umr kahaanii ra main pyaar kaa raahii huun  ra pyaar kii bijaliyaan  muskuraaen aa dekhiye aap par gir na jaaen ra dil kahe dekhataa hii rahuun main saamane baithakar ye adaaen dil kahe aa na main huun naazaniin na main huun mahajabiin aap hii kii nazar hai diivaanii ra main pyaar kaa raahii huun

Title: tum jahaan ho vahaan kyaa ye mausam nahiin
Lyrics: tum jahaan ho vahaan kyaa ye mausam nahiin kyaa nazaare vahaan muskuraate nahiin kyaa vahaan ye ghataaen barasatii nahiin kyaa kabhii ham tumhen yaad aate nahiin tum jahaan ho vahaan kyaa ye mausam nahiin kyaa nazaare vahaan muskuraate nahiin  ye zamaanaa hameshaan kaa bedard hai dardedil pe koii haath dharataa nahiin dil kii fitrat kabhii ek rahatii nahiin zindagii bhar vafaa koii karataa nahiin phir bhii jaise bhulaayaa hai tumane hamen 	2 is tarah bhii kisii ko bhulaate nahiin tum jahaan ho vahaan  kyaa ye mausam nahiin kyaa nazaare vahaan muskuraate nahiin  dard hai mere dil kaa mere giit men giit gaataa huun main tum mujhe saaz do raat khaamosh hai aur tanahaa hai dil tum kahaan ho zaraa dil ko aavaaz do jo guzaare the hamane mohabbat men din	2 kyaa vo din ab tumhen yaad aate nahiin tum jahaan ho vahaan kyaa ye mausam nahiin kyaa nazaare vahaan muskuraate nahiin tum jahaan ho vahaan kyaa ye mausam nahiin

Title: bahot diyaa dene waale ne tujhako
Lyrics: bahot diyaa dene waale ne tujhako 2 aanchal hii na samaaye to kyaa kiije biit gaye jaise ye din rainaa baakii bhii kat jaaye duaa kiije  jo bhii dede maalik tuu kar le qubuul 2 kabhiikabhii kaanton men bhii khilate hain phuul wahaan der bhale hai andher nahiin ghabaraa ke yuun gilaa mat kiije  bahot diyaa dene waale ne tujhako aanchal hii na samaaye to kyaa kiije  denge duhkh kab tak bharam ke ye chor 2 are dhalegii ye raat pyaare phir hogii bhor kab roke rukii hai samay kii nadiyaa ghabaraa ke yuun gilaa mat kiije  bahot diyaa dene waale ne tujhako aanchal hii na samaaye to kyaa kiije biit gaye jaise ye din rainaa baakii bhii kat jaaye duaa kiije

Title: aao baadal chain se roen
Lyrics: baadal aao baadal aao aao baadal aao  aao baadal chain se roen 2 jalatii dhuup 2 jalatii dhuup men main huun akelaa aao baadal chain se roen 2 kush rahen 2 kush rahen ye duniyaa waale 2 katm huaa meraa melaa 2 main huun aaj akelaa aao baadal chain se roen 2  aramaan the dil men mere kitane chandaa ke haae chandaa ke saathii taare jitane haae chandaa ke saathii taare jitane duuba dil aramaan bhii duube 2 tuufaan kaa dekhaa relaa main huun aaj akelaa aao baadal chain se roen 2  din the chaar jo biit gae mere 2 honge dukh ke ab dhere 2 dar nahiin par hanse bhii kaise 2 gam se ab tak khelaa aao baadal chain se roen 2

Title: dulhan se tumhaaraa milan hogaa o man thodii dhiir
Lyrics: dulhan se tumhaaraa milan hogaa o man thodii dhiir dharo baanhon men chaandii kaa badan hogaa o man thodii dhiir dharo  chaand parii hai chanchal hai vo terii hai chitachor mukhade ko hii takatetakate ho jaaegii bhor gore tan kaa tumhen darashan hogaa o man thodii dhiir dharo baanhon men chaandii threedots  vo hai merii padminiyaa aur tuu baankaa raajapuut gaz bhar kii chhaatii rakhataa hai dil bhii rakh majabuut nayanonnayanon men ran hogaa o man thodii dhiir dharo dulhan se tumhaaraa threedots

Title: dilabardilabar kahatekahate huaa diivaanaa
Lyrics: ra 	dilabardilabar kahatekahate huaa diivaanaa 	aankh men merii jhaank ke dekho jaanejaanaan 	kaun tumhaaraa apanaa hai aur kaun begaanaa 	o merii jaan zaraa pahachaan 2 aa 	dilabardilabar sunatesunate huii diivaanii 	haay re kis manzil pe aake rukii kahaanii 	bol mere dil kisase hai ab priit nibhaanii 	phansii hai jaan 2  ra 	ab husn ishq kaa sangam ho jaane de 	aagosh men apane jaanam kho jaane de 	ye mel hai dil se dil kaa koii khel nahiin 	do dil naa agar mil jaaen vo mel nahiin aa 	o mar gaii mar gaii ab kyaa karuun main 	haay re mohabbat kyaa karuun main 	tujhase miluun yaa isase miluun main 	ho phansii hai jaan threedots  ra 	hai zulf terii aavaaraa haay kyaa kahanaa 	mujhe luut liyaa diladaar haay kyaa kahanaa 	jo pyaar kare ye usakaa andaaz nahiin 	paravaane ke jalane men aavaaz nahiin aa 	ho kaisii mushqil aan padii hai 	doraahe pe priit khadii hai 	kis jaalim se aankh ladii hai 	ho phansii hai jaan threedots  ra 	terii aankh hai yaa zaalim paimaane hain 	terii ek baat men laakhon afasaane hain 	tuu dekh gaur se mujhako teraa apanaa huun 	har raat ko tuu jo dekhe vo sapanaa huun aa 	ek hai dil aur do diivaane 	ek shamaa aur do paravaane 	kyaa hogaa ye koii na jaane	 	ho phansii hai jaan threedots ra 	dilabardilabar threedots

Title: suno sajanaa papiihe ne kahaa sabase
Lyrics: aa suno sajanaa papiihe ne suno sajanaa papiihe ne kahaa sabase pukaar ke sambhal jaao chaman waalon sambhal jaao chaman waalon ke aaye din bahaar ke suno sajanaa 2  phuulon kii daaliyaan bhii yahii giit gaa rahii hain ghadiyaan piyaa milan kii nazadiik aa rahii hain nazadiik aa rahii hain hawaaon ne jo chhede hain hawaaon ne jo chhede hain fasaane hain wo pyaar ke sambhal jaao chaman waalon ke aaye din bahaar ke suno sajanaa 2  dekho na aise dekho marazii hai kyaa tumhaarii bechain kar na denaa tumako qasam hamaarii tumako qasam hamaarii hamiin dushaman na ban jaayen hamiin dushaman na ban jaayen kahiin apane qaraar ke sambhal jaao chaman waalon ke aaye din bahaar ke suno sajanaa 2  baagon men pad gaye hain saawan ke mast jhuule aisaa samaan jo dekhaa raahii bhii raah bhuule raahii bhii raah bhuule ke jii chaahaa yahiin rakh den ke jii chaahaa yahiin rakh den umar saarii guzaar ke sambhal jaao chaman waalon ke aaye din bahaar ke suno sajanaa 2

Title: ek nazar kisii ne dekhaa aur dil huaa diivaanaa
Lyrics: kishor ek nazar kisii ne dekhaa aur dil huaa diivaanaa hai baat bas itaniisii aur ban gayaa afasaanaa lataa ik nazar kisii ne dekhaa aur dil huaa diivaanaa hai baat bas itaniisii aur ban gayaa afasaanaa  kishor choriichorii bagiyaa men aaii jo bahaar kaliyon kii ankhiyon se chhalakaa kumaar    2 chhupchhup kisii se nazar huii chaar koii dil jiit gayaa koii gayaa haar man mere jhuum taaron ko chuum aayaa teraa zamaanaa lataa ik nazar kisii ne dekhaa aur dil huaa diivaanaa hai baat bas itaniisii aur ban gayaa afasaanaa  lataa baaje moraa bichhuaa thumak chaluun chaal dhakdhak dil meraa detaa jaae taal  2 ude hai chunar jaise shaayar kaa kayaal jaane kaise jaaduu leke aayaa hai ye saal aankhen churaauun chhupchhupake gaauun main ek nayaa taraanaa kishor ek nazar kisiine dekhaa aur dil huaa diivaanaa hai baat bas itaniisii aur ban gayaa afasaanaa  lataa naiinaii duniyaa hai main huun anajaan abhiiabhii kisii se huii hai pahachaan 2 kishor sochsoch haar gayaa main huun hairaan tumhen kis naam se pukaaruun mehamaan sapanaa kahuun ki apanaa kahuun ki rangiin ik fasaanaa lataa ik nazar kisii ne dekhaa aur dil huaa diivaanaa hai baat bas itaniisii aur ban gayaa afasaanaa kishor ek nazar kisiin e dekhaa aur dil huaa diivaanaa hai baat bas itaniisii aur ban gayaa afasaanaa

Title: ilaahii tuu sun le hamaarii duaa
Lyrics: ilaahii tuu sun le hamaarii duaa hamen sirf ek aasaraa hai teraa terii rahamaten raah roshan karen salaamat rahe saayaa maanbaap kaa ilaahii tuu sun le threedots  hamase lekar umar saarii niind dede unhen dard unake dede hamen burii ye ghadii taal de e kudaa ilaahii tuu sun le threedots  naaz uthaae jisane paalaa pyaar haradam diyaa ho na hamase vo judaa tuu ummiid kaa ye diiyaa mat bujhaa ilaahii tuu sun le threedots  sivaa tere maalik meraa kaun hai yahaan bevafaa ye hai jahaan kahiin tuu bhii hamako na denaa bhulaa ilaahii tuu sun le threedots

Title: o sajanaa barakhaa bahaar aayii ras kii phuhaar laayii
Lyrics: o sajanaa barakhaa bahaara aai rasa kii phuhaara laai ankhiyon me pyaar laai   2 o sajanaa  tumako pukaare mere mana kaa papiharaa  2 miithii miithii aganii men jale moraa jiyaraa o sajanaa threedots  aisi rimajhima men o saajan pyaase pyaase mere nayana tere hii khvaaba men kho gae   2 saanvalii salonii ghataa jaba jaba chhaai  2 ankhiyon men rainaa gai nindiyaa na aai o sajanaa threedots

Title: haaledil hamaaraa jaane na bevafaa ye zamaanaa zamaanaa
Lyrics: haaledil hamaaraa jaane na bevafaa ye zamaanaa zamaanaa  2 suno duniyaa vaalon aaegaa laut ke din suhaanaa suhaanaa haaleedil hamaaraa  ek din duniyaa badalakar raaste pe aaegii aaja thukaraatii hai hamako kal magar sharmaaegii baat ko tum maan lo are jaan lo bhaiyaa haaledil hamaaraa threedots  daag hain dil par hazaaron ham to phir bhii shaad hain aas ke diipak jalaaye dekh lo aabaad hain tiir duniyaa ke sahe par khush rahe bhaiyaa haaledil hamaaraa threedots  jhuutha kii manzil pe yaaron ham naa hargiz jaayenge ham zamiin kii khaak sahii aasamaan par chhaaenge kyun bhalaa dabakar rahen darate nahin bhaiyaa haaledil hamaaraa jaane na bevafaa ye zamaanaa zamaanaa suno duniyaa vaalon aayegaa laut ke din suhaanaa suhaanaa haaledil hamaaraa

Title: raah banii kud manzil
Lyrics: raah banii kud manzil piichhe rah gae mushkil saath jo aae tum raah banii kud manzil threedots  dekho phuul ban ke saarii dharatii khil parii guzare aarazuu ke raasten the jis ghadii jis me churaae tum raah banii kud manzil threedots  jharanaa gaa rahii hai merii dil kii daastaan merii pyaas lekar chhaa rahii hain mastiiyaan jin me nahaae tum raah banii kud manzil threedots  panchhii uud gae sab gaa ke nagamaa pyaar kaa lekin dil ne aisaa jaal phekaa pyaar kaa udane na paae tum raah banii kud manzil threedots

Title: vaqt karataa jo vafaa aap hamaare hote
Lyrics: vaqt karataa jo vafaa aap hamaare hote ham bhii gairon kii tarah aap ko payaare hote vaqt karataa jo vafaa threedots  apanii taqadiir men pahale hii kuuchh to gam hain aur kuchh aap kii fitarat men vafaa bhii kam hai varana jiitii huii varana jiitii huii baazii to naa haare hote vaqt karataa jo vafaa threedots  ham bhii pyaase hain ye saaqii ko bataa bhii na sake saamane jaam thaa aur jaam uthaa bhii na sake kaash gairate mahafil ke na maare hote vaqt karataa jo vafaa threedots  dam ghutaa jaataa hai siine men phir bhii zindaa hain tum se kyaa ham to zindagii se bhii sharmindaa hain mar hii jaate jo na yaadon ke sahaare hote vaqt karataa jo vafaa threedots

Title: path bhuulaa ik aayaa musaafir
Lyrics: path bhuulaa ik aayaa musaafir leke meraa man duur chalaa bikhare sapane rah gaiin yaaden raat se pahale chaand dhalaa  koii na samajhe koii na jaane dil kii lagii hai kyaa laakh chhupaao chhup na sake ye prem kaa rog buraa path bhuulaa ik aayaa threedots  usake aage in ankhiyon ne dukh sau baar kahaa par vo naadaan kuchh bhii na samajhaa haay re bhaag meraa path bhuulaa ik aayaa threedots

Title: yah duniyaa patang nit badale yah rang
Lyrics: yah duniyaa patang nit badale yah rang koii jaane na udaane vaalaa kaun hai  sab apanii udaaen ye jaan na paaen kab kisakii chadhe kisakii kat jaae 2 hai ye kisako pataa kab badale havaa aur dor idhar se udhar hat jaae ho vo dor yaa kamaan yaa zamiinaasamaan koii jaane na banaane vaalaa kaun hai ye duniyaa patang threedots  ude akadakad dhanavaalon kii patang sadaa dekhaa hai gariib se hii pench lade 2 hai guruur kaa huzuur sar niichaa sadaa jo bhii jitanaa uthaae use utanii pade kisakaa gumaan bhalaa kare insaan jab jaane na banaane vaalaa kaun hai ye duniyaa patang threedots

Title: chamcham chamakaa saaraa jahaan
Lyrics: chamcham chamakaa saaraa jahaan dhadakan gaaye dil hai jawaan jaan se pyaare pyaar pukaare aisaa samaan phir kahaan  2   shabanam se bhiigaa hai mausam duubaa hai mastii men aalam  2 soye nazaare chaandsitaare chup hai zamiinaasamaan o o o  chamcham chamakaa saaraa jahaan dhadakan gaaye dil hai jawaan jaan se pyaare pyaar pukaare aisaa samaan phir kahaan   soii hain aankhon men niinden  jaagii hain dil men ummiiden  2 mast hawaayen saaz bajaayen gaatii hain tanahaaiyaan o o o  chamcham chamakaa saaraa jahaan dhadakan gaaye dil hai jawaan jaan se pyaare pyaar pukaare aisaa samaan phir kahaan   aayengii phir kab ye raaten  kar len mohabbat kii baaten  2 gaaye taraanaa aaj zamaanaa ham pe huaa meharabaan o o o  chamcham chamakaa saaraa jahaan dhadakan gaaye dil hai jawaan jaan se pyaare pyaar pukaare aisaa samaan phir kahaan

Lyrics: shammaa men taaqat kahaan jo ek paravaane men hai 2 lutf jalane men nahiin jaljal ke mar jaane men hai 2 shammaa men taaqat threedots  chaandanii raaton men aksar sochataa rahataa huun main kisakii ye tasviir hai jo dil ke viiraane men hai 2 shammaa men taaqat threedots  may kii mastii to utar jaatii hai thodii der men zindagii bhar kaa nashaa aankhon ke paimaanon men hai shammaa men taaqat threedots  tuu kahe to aasamaan kii dhajjiyaan kar duun sanam aaj ik aisii hii vahashat tere diivaane men hai 2 lutf jalane men threedots

Title: haay tabassum teraa  dhuup khil gaii raat men
Lyrics: haay tabassum teraa 2 dhuup khil gaii raat men yaa bijalii girii barasaat men haay tabassum teraa threedots  dekhii terii angadaaii shammaa kii lau tharatharaaii uf ye hansii maasuum sii jannat kaa jaise saveraa haay tabassum teraa threedots  palakon kii chilaman uthaanaa dhiire se ye muskaraanaa lab jo hile zulfon tale chhaayaa gulaabii andheraa haay tabassum teraa threedots  roko na apanii hansii ko jiine do vallaah kisii ko terii hansii jo ruk gaii ruk jaaegaa saans meraa haay tabassum teraa threedots

Title: jhankaaro jhankaaro jhananana jhan jhan
Lyrics: he jhankaaro jhankaaro jhananana jhan jhan     jhankaaro agniviinaa     aazaad hoke jiyo bandhuon      ye jiinaa bhii kyaa jiinaa  ko jhankaaro jhankaaro jhananana jhan jhan      jhankaaro agniviinaa     aazaad hoke jiyo bandhuon      ye jiinaa bhii kyaa jiinaa  he baj gayaa bigul diiwaano chalate chalo     manzil kii taraf mastaano chalate chalo ko baj gayaa bigul diiwaano chalate chalo     manzil kii taraf mastaano chalate chalo he aazaadii hai apanaa haq      jab tak na mile tab tak     aazaadii ke parawaano chalate chalo ko jhankaaro jhankaaro threedots  sa o sir katawaanewaalo aage badho ko o sir katawaanewaalo aage badho sa phaansii pe latakanewaalo aage badho sa bandhan men hai apanii maan      zanjiir men apanii maan     o kuun bahaanewaalo aage badho ko jhankaaro jhankaaro threedots  he tum ho sheron kii tolii tum na daro ko tum ho sheron kii tolii tum na daro he chaahe laathii chale yaa golii tum na daro ko chaahe laathii chale yaa golii tum na daro he shamashiir ho desh kii tum      taqadiir ho desh kii tum     bolo inqalaab kii bolii tum na daro ko jhankaaro jhankaaro threedots

Title: main raahii anjaan raahon kaa o yaaron meraa naam anajaanaa
Lyrics: ra 	saathiyaa nahiin jaanaa ke jii naa lage 	mausam hai suhaanaa ke jii naa lage 	saathiyaa nahiin jaanaa threedots la 	saathiyaa maine maanaa ke jii naa lage 	jii ko thaa samajhaanaa ke jii naa lage ra 	saathiyaa nahiin jaanaa threedots  la 	mere achchhe baalamaa chhodo aaj baiiyaan 	vo jhuuthaa jo saiyaan kal aae naa ra 	jaake phir aaogii aake phir jaaogii 	aanejaane men javaanii dhal jaae naa 	ho chhodo aanaa jaanaa ke jii naa lage 	saathiyaa nahiin jaanaa threedots  	jii kaa buraa haal hai jab se jii lagaayaa 	tujhe jii men basaayaa tere ho lie la 	jii kaa thaa kyaal to kaahe jii lagaayaa 	mujhe jii men basaayaa ai jii bolie ra 	ho ab kaahe pachhataanaa ke jii naa lage la 	saathiyaa maine maanaa threedots  	jaane kii to baalamaa marzii nahiin merii 	dar lagataa hai bairii jagavaalon se ra 	oy chhaddo vii naa soniyon jag se darate ho 	jag kud darataa hai dilavaalon se la 	o ho chhodo ye bahaanaa ra 	ke jii naa lage do 	saathiyaa nahiin jaanaa threedots

Title: chhodo kal kii baaten kal kii baat puraanii
Lyrics: chhodo kal kii baaten kal kii baat puraanii nae daur men likhenge mil kar naii kahaanii ham hindustaanii  ham hindustaanii  aaj puraanii zanjiiron ko tod chuke hain kyaa dekhen us manzil ko jo chhod chuke hain chaand ke dar par jaa pahunchaa hai aaj zamaanaa nae jagat se ham bhii naataa jod chuke hain nayaa khuun hai naii umangen ab hai naii javaanii  ham ko kitane taajamahal hain aur banaane kitane hain ajantaa ham ko aur sajaane abhii palatanaa hai rukh kitane dariyaaon kaa kitane pavrt raahon se hain aaj hataane   aao mehanat ko apanaa iimaan banaaen apane haathon se apanaa bhagavaan banaaen raam kii is dharatii ko gautam ki bhuumii ko sapanon se bhii pyaaraa hindustaan banaaen   daag gulaamii kaa dhoyaa hai jaan lutaa ke diip jalaae hain ye kitane diip bujhaa ke lii hai aazaadii to phir is aazaadii ko rakhanaa hogaa har dushman se aaj bachaa ke   har zarraa hai motii aankh uthaakar dekho mittii men sonaa hai haath badhaakar dekho sone ki ye gangaa hai chaandii kii jamunaa chaaho to patthar pe dhaan ugaakar dekho

Title: tum aaj mere sang hans lo tum aaj mere sang gaa lo
Lyrics: tum aaj mere sang hans lo tum aaj mere sang gaa lo aur hansategaate is jiivan kii ulajhii raah sanvaaro tum aaj mere threedots  shaam kaa suuraj bindiyaa ban kar saagar men kho jaae subahsavere vo hii suuraj aashaa lekar aae naii umangen naii tarangen aas kii jyoti jagaae re aas kii jyoti jagaae tum aaj mere threedots  dukh men jo gaae malhaar vo insaan kahalaae 2 jaise banshii ke siine men chhed hai phir bhii gaae gaategaate roe mayuuraa phir bhii naach dikhaae re phir bhii naach dikhaae tum aaj mere threedots

Title: raag bhairav pratham shaant ras jaake
Lyrics: raag bhairav pratham shaant ras jaake shankar ko priy laage svar madhur baaje ni sa gaa ma pa dhaa ni sa sa ni dha pa ma ga ri ri saa raag bhairav pratham raag bhairav pratham  pa dha sa ma da ni vitarat ri pa varaj taru maane bhogyam chatur ansh malkauns pahachaane malkauns pahachaane malkauns pahachaane  hindol ke bol sa ga ma dha ni dha ma ga ma hindol ke bol hindol ke bol aaroh avaroh vipa varaja kar dhaaye hindol ke bol hindol ke bol  shrii raag bhav tyaag aaroh kharajii pancham rikhab sur ati hii suhaavan pa sa ni dha pa ma pa ma ga ri sa ri sa ni sa shrii raag   threedots  diipak mahaa raag gaavat jale jyoti aaroh khag rikhab avaroh sampuunr pa ma ga ma ga ri sa na dha pa diipak mahaa raag  megh malhaar sab guniyaan bakhaane ni sa ri ma ma pa ni pa ni sa re ma ri sa sa pa pa ni ma pa megh malhaar sab  megh malhaar sab guniyaan bakhaane ni sa ri ma ma pa ni pa ni sa re ma ri sa sa pa pa ni ma pa pa pa ni ma pa ma ri sa sa pa pa ni ma pa ma ri sa sa pa pa ni ma pa  megh malhaar sab guniyaan bakhaane

Lyrics: saathii re saathii re  tujh bin jiyaa udaas re ye kaisii anbujh pyaas re aajaa aajaa saathii re   threedots  donon jahaan se duur yahaan main bhatak rahii main jaane kahaan main saathii re   threedots  naa main kaayaa naa main chhaayaa phir kyon dole man bharamaayaa man bharamaayaa saathii re   threedots  pyaar kii main anbuujhii kahaanii kuchh jaanii aur kuchh anjaanii saathii re   threedots

Lyrics: tuu hai meraa prem devataa in charanon kii daasii huun main man kii pyaar bujhaane aaii antaraghat tak pyaasii huun main tuu hai meraa prem devataa  ra 	main gaurii tuu kant hamaaraa ma 	main gangaa tuu meraa kinaaraa ra 	main gaurii tuu kant hamaaraa  ra 	main gaurii tuu kant hamaaraa ma 	main gangaa tuu meraa kinaaraa ra 	ang lagaao pyaas bujhaao 2 ma 	nadiyaa ho kar pyaasii huun main ra 	man kii pyaar bujhaane aaii 2 	antaraghat tak pyaasii huun main do 	tuu hai meraa prem devataa  ra 	dam dam dam dam damaruu baaje ma 	 main naachuun shankar ke aage ra 	dam dam dam dam damaruu baaje  ra 	dam dam dam dam damaruu baaje ma 	 main naachuun shankar ke aage ra 	ho ke rahegii jiit usii kii 2 ma 	jisakii kalaa se shankar jaage ra 	man kii pyaar bujhaane aaii 2 	antaraghat tak pyaasii huun main do 	tuu hai meraa prem devataa

Title: pyaase panchhii niil gagan men  giit milan ke gaaen
Lyrics: pyaase panchhii niil gagan men  giit milan ke gaaen  2 is mele men ham hain akele saathii kise banaaen giit milan ke gaaen pyaase panchhii threedots  o matavaale raahii tujhako manzil kahaan bulaae kisako kabar hai in raahon men kaun kahaan mil jaae jaise saagar kii do laharen chupake se mil jaaen giit milan ke gaaen pyaase panchhii threedots  chhupii hain aahen kis premii kii baadal kii aahon men bikharii huii hai kushbuu kaisii alabelii raahon men kisakii zulfen chhuu kar aaiin mahakii huii ye havaaen giit milan ke gaaen pyaase panchhii threedots

Title: tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae
Lyrics: r tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae    dil hathelii par le aae re		2 su tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae     jaan hathelii par le aae re	2  r aao baitho hamaare pahaluu men panaah le lo    merii jalatii huii aankhon pe ye aankhen rakh do    ai mere pyaar ke kvaabon kii hasiin shahazaadii    honth kyon kaanp rahe hain zaraa kuchh to bolo  su tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae    jaan hathelii par le aae re r tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae  su aaj khelo merii zulfon se ijaazat hai tumhen    mujhako chhuu lo merii nas nas men sharaare bhar do    mere diladaar merii aankhon men rahane vaale    main tumhaarii huun merii maang men taare bhar do  r tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae    dil hathelii par le aae re  r naam raushan hai tumhiin se mere afasaane kaa    zindagii naam hai ulfat men jiie jaane kaa    tum agar hamako na milate to ye suurat hotii    log le jaate janaazaa tere diivaane kaa  su tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae    jaan hathelii par le aae re r tum ne pukaaraa aur ham chale aae

Title: jaagiye gopaal laal bansii ban bole
Lyrics: jaagiye gopaal laal bansii ban bole2 nanhenanhe palaken kholo chuumuun nain pyaare2 tohe jagaaye jhuume gaaye2 panchhii pankh kholen jaagiye gopaal laal bansii ban bole   tuu hii meraa chaand tuu hii ankhiyon kaa taaraa tuu hanse to bhuul jaauun jiivan kaa dukh saaraa2  gangaa jal se tohe nahalaauun 2 bholii bhaalii ankhiyon me kajaraa lagaauun ho vaari jaauun tuu hii merii aashaa tuu hii meraa sahaaraa tuu roye to laage mohe jiivan andhiyaaraa tuu hii meraa chaand threedots  haule haule pag pag chal mere munne 2 tere sang chalii jal thal  mere munne  tuu hii meraa chaand tuu hii ankhiyon kaa taaraa tuu roye to laage mohe jiivan andhiyaaraa tuu hii meraa chaand threedots

Lyrics: chal mere dil laharaa ke chal mausam bhii hai vaadaa bhii hai unakii galii kaa faasalaa thodaa bhii hai zyaadaa bhii hai chal mere dil threedots  main huun raahii pyaar kaa raahii merii manzil pyaar kii galiyaan dil men basii hai husn kii suurat aankhon men diladaar kii galiyaan chal mere dil threedots  usakii chaahat usakii tamannaa ho to ho bekaar kaa sapanaa 2 ghar se nikalanaa yaar se milanaa ye to kaarobaar hai apanaa 2 chal mere dil threedots
