Title: itanii hasiin itanii javaan raat kyaa karen
Lyrics: itanii hasiin itanii javaan raat kyaa karen 2 jaage hain kuchh ajiib se jazbaat kyaa karen  itanii hasiin itanii javaan raat kyaa karen   pedon ke baazuon men lachakatii hai chaandanii 2 bechain ho rahe hain khayaalaat kyaa karen 2 itanii hasiin itanii javaan raat kyaa karen   saanson men ghul rahii hai kisii saans kii mahak 2 daaman ko chhuu rahaa hai koii haath kyaa karen 2 itanii hasiin itanii javaan raat kyaa karen   shaayad tumhaare aane se ye bhed khul sake 2 hairaan hain ki aaj nai baat kyaa karen 2 itanii hasiin itanii javaan raat kyaa karen

Title: aao sakhii is dukhiyaa man kii  mere piyaa ko dhuund ke  laao sakhii
Lyrics: aao sakhii is dukhiyaa man kiiaa kar dhiir bandhaao rii    jaane piyaa kis des sidhare unakaa khoj lagaao rii               mere piyaa ko dhuund ke  laao sakhii koii piyaa ko dhuund ke laao sakhii jaane kahaan vo kho gae haan kis bairan ke ho gae   pal bhar pii kaa mukhadaa dekhaa kaalii rain huii ujayarii shahb dikhalaa ke  duubaa chandaa bintii kar kar haarii re koii unakii suuratiyaa dikhaao sakhii mere piyaa ko dhuund ke laao sakhii jaane  kahaan vo kho gae  haan  kis bairan ke ho gae  chhaaii chaaron or udaasii manavaa pal pal unhain  are  birhaa agan men jal marne ko saiyaan chod sidhare koii unako manaa kar laao sakhii mere piyaa ko dhuund ke laao sakhii jaane  kahaan vo kho gae  haan  kis bairan ke ho gae

Title: ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan
Lyrics: rafii ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan muhabbat kii duniyaa hai kitanii javaan aashaa ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan muhabbat kii duniyaa hai kitanii javaan donon ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan  aashaa aa aaaaa aaa aaaa aaa  aashaa o ho ho rafii aa haa aashaa aa aa aa aa aa aa raii aa haa haa aashaa o ho rafii o ho ho ho ho ho aashaa ye sardii kaa mausam badan kaanpe thar thar2 rafii ye hain barf ke dher yaa sangamaramar  rafi says sangemaramar donon banaa len na kyuun apanii jannat yahaan rafii ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan muhabbat kii duniyaa hai kitanii javaan donon ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan  rafii ye uunche pahaadon ke magaruur saaye aashaa ye kahate hain unako nazar to milaaye2 donon farishte bhii hain is jagah bezubaan aashaa ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan muhabbat kii duniyaa hai kitanii javaan donon ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan  rafii na paradaa hai koii na hai koii chilaman aashaa jahaan paanv rakh den hai phisalan hii phisalan2 donon qadam chhodate jaa rahe hain nishaan  rafii ye kaamoshiyaan aa aa aa ye tanahaaiyaan aa aa aa muhabbat kii duniyaa hai kitanii javaan donon ye kaamoshiyaan ye tanahaaiyaan  rafii  aa aaaaa aaa aaaa aaa aashaa   aa aaaaa aaa aaaa aaa donon aa aaaaa aaa aaaa aaa

Title: rang rangiilaa saanvaraa mohe mil gayo jamunaa paar
Lyrics: rang rangiilaa saanvaraa mohe mil gayo jamunaa paar hoe vaase nainaa chaar ib main kaa boluun sarkaar ib main kaa boluun threedots  niir bharan ko jabjab jaauun  taake chandra chakor aatejaate rok le rastaa na maane chitchor dhaagaa ho to tor bhii daaruun priit pe kisa kaa jor sainyaa chhde biich bazaar ib main kaa boluun sarkaar ib main kaa boluun threedots  natakhat mohan baaj na aayaa diinii gaagar tod phuul sii naajuk  naram kalaaii jaalim ne dii mod phans gaii morii jaan gajug men bhaagii chunarii chhod sainyaa chhde biich bazaar ib main kaa boluun sarkaar ib main kaa boluun threedots

Title: o mistar dil badii mushakil men tuune aaj daalaa
Lyrics: o mistar dil badii mushakil men tuune aaj daalaa havaa bahakii samaa chikanaa ajab jaaduu niraalaa o mistar dil jigii jigii jigjigii aa haa ha haa haa haa  ghadii bhar men iraaden kyon badalataa hai kabhii is pal kabhii us pal machalataa hai badii mushakil se pahauluu men tujhe ham ne sambhaalaa o mistar dil threedots jigii jigii jigjigii threedots  muhabbat ke gulistaan men khilegii tuu main kuchh kar luun kisii but ko milegii tuu andhere men karegii kyaa muhabbat kaa ujaalaa o mistar dil threedots jigii jigii jigjigii threedots  main tang aaii nahiin itanaa sataa mistar nahiin hai tuu mere bas men to jaa mistar threedots

Title: nazar bachaa kar chale gaye vo varanaa ghaayal kar detaa
Lyrics: nazar bachaa kar chale gaye vo varanaa ghaayal kar detaa dil se dil takaraa jaataa to dil men agni bhar detaa varanaa ghaayal kar detaa nazar bachaa kar threedots   milatii aankh to vo bhii dekhate mere pyaar kaa jaaduu apane rang men ham bhii kam na the kar dete beqaabuu  2 nazar bachaa kar threedots   agar thaharate mere saamane dil pe tiir chal jaate vo hasiin hain main javaan huun saare bhed khul jaate  2 nazar bachaa kar threedots   hamase kab tak yuun chhupenge vo apanii shaan dikhalaa ke ek roz to aa hii jaaenge vo mere paas sharamaa ke  2 nazar bachaa kar threedots

Title: aajaa re pyaar pukaare nainaa to roro haare
Lyrics: aajaa re pyaar pukaare nainaa to roro haare koii na jaane dard meraa o koii na jaane dard meraa aajaa re pyaar pukaare threedots  luutaa de ke sahaaraa tere pyaar ne ho bairii hamako to maaraa tere pyaar ne 2 terii yaad to hamako rulaae re kahaa bhii na jaae re aajaa re pyaar pukaare threedots  chandaa bichhad na jaae terii chaandanii ho aajaa tujhako bulaae terii chaandanii 2 ab aavaaz do dil ghabaraae re chain na paae re aajaa re pyaar pukaare threedots

Title: vo zindagii ai merii bebasii
Lyrics: vo zindagii ai merii bebasii vo zindagii ai merii bebasii apanaa koii na thaa apanaa koii nahiin is duniyaa men haay  ham sailaanii ghar na gharaanaa kaam hamaaraa chalate jaanaa kaam hamaaraa chalate jaanaa apanii kabhii koii manzil na thii apanaa koii na thaa apanaa koii nahiin is duniyaa men haay  aankh se jo ik buund girii hai har sapane kaa mol yahii hai har sapane kaa mol yahii hai ai dil terii koii qiimat na thii apanaa koii na thaa apanaa koii nahiin is duniyaa men haaye  jo ye sapane sach ho jaate to ye sapane kyon kahalaate to ye sapane kyon kahalaate aur is ghadii niind kyon tuutatii apanaa koii na thaa apanaa koii nahiin is duniyaa men haay  vo zindagii ai merii bebasii apanaa koii na thaa apanaa koii nahiin is duniyaa men haay

Title: uunche himaalay ke niiche
Lyrics: uunche himaalay ke niiche chhup ke chanaaron ke piichhe soe rahenge mere sapane  2 kab tak yuun hii ankhiyaan miichemiiche ho uunche himaalay ke threedots  aise rahe ye manavaa vyaakul qaid men jaise koii bulabul ab naa bhaaen mujhako baabul ye tere baagbagiiche uunche himaalay ke threedots  dhuup se khele aise chhaiiyaan pyaar men jaise koii sainyaa thaam le kanganaa vaalii baiiyaan 2 panaghat pe piipal ke niicheniiche uunche himaalay ke threedots

Lyrics: qadamon men samaake paravaane kabhii hansate hain kabhii rote hain daaman se lipatakar diivaane kabhii hansate hain kabhii rote hain  bekudii kaa ik andaaz liye aankhon men sausau naaz liye kuchh nagmon kii paravaaz liye kuchh soz liye kuchh saaz liye vo sunakar ishq ke afasaane kabhii hansate hain kabhii rote hain  jazbaatemastii duub gaii ashkon men hansii duub gaii go dil kii bastii duub gaii saahil pe kashtii duub gaii diivaane magar hain diivaane kabhii hansate hain kabhii rote hain

Lyrics: odii duruduru dorudoru dei udhdu dudhdu dei dii  main huun jhum jhum jhum jhum jhumaruu   fakkad ghum ghum banake ghumaruu main ye pyaar kaa giit sunaataa chalaa o manzil pe merii nazar  main duniyaa se bekhabar biitii baaton pe dhuul udaataa chalaa main huun jhum jhum jhum jhum threedots  hei diridiri diridiri pakkurthreedots yudadei bagaayon kaa baagaa heii diridiri diridiri pakkurthreedots minimini minimini aav yudadei bagaayon kaa baagaa eii duruduru dorudoru duruduru odu deyii how can i leave it    main huun jhum jhum jhum jhum jhumaruu fakkad ghum ghum banake ghumaruu saath men hamasafar na koi kaaravaan o bholaa bhaalaa siidhaa saadaa lekin dil kaa huun shahazaadaa hai ye merii zamiin ye meraa aasamaan  main huun jhum jhum jhum jhum jhumaruu fakkad ghum ghum banake ghumaruu mere dil men hai pyaar har kisii ke liye o mujhako pyaaraa har inasaan  dilavaalon pe huun qurabaan zindagii hai merii zindagii ke liye  yedili yudili o ho yudili yedili o adili yudili o ho yudili yudili o

Title: aa jaa re aa zaraa laharaa ke aa zaraa
Lyrics: ye zindagii kii mahafil mahafil men ham akele daaman ko koii thaame zulfon se koii khele  aa jaa re aa zaraa laharaa ke aa zaraa aankhon se dil men samaa aa jaa re aa zaraa   threedots  dekh fizaa men rang bharaa hai mere jigar kaa zakm haraa hai siine se mere sar ko lagaa de haathon men tere dil kii davaa hai aa jaa re aa zaraa   threedots  tere bhii dil men aag lagii hai mere bhii dil men aag lagii hai donon taraf hai ek sii haalat donon dilon par bijalii girii hai aa jaa re aa zaraa   threedots  dil kaa sulagaanaa kisako dikhaauun saanson ke tuufaan kaise chhupaauun aankhen kyaa kyaa dekh rahiin hain dil pe jo guzarii kaise bataauun aa jaa re aa zaraa   threedots

Title: mandave tale gariib ke do phuul khil rahe hain
Lyrics: ho saath agar pahaluu men ik masteshabaab ik jaam ho aur haath men sheron kii qitaab ik saaz ho aur saaz pe gaatii ho hasiinaa ban jaae ye viiraanaa bahaaron kaa javaab  mandave tale gariib ke do phuul khil rahe hain ai raat tuu na jaanaa ai chaand tuu na jaanaa ye naubahaar chupake se dekho nazaren na tum milaanaa mandave tale gariib ke do phuul khil rahe hain  mausameishq hai zaraa hosh sambhaal haasil tujhe mahabuub hai armaan nikaal kuchh baat to karale nahiin kal kii kabar kyaa hai gameduniyaa use kaaq men daal mandave tale gariib ke do phuul khil rahe hain

Title: aapase pyaar huaa aap kafaa ho baithe
Lyrics: aapase pyaar huaa aap kafaa ho baithe mil ke baithe bhii na the aur judaa haay judaa ho baithe  o o haay saans letii ho to kyaa qahar kii luu chalatii hai buu ye kahatii hai koii dil kii sii shai jalatii hai surk sholon kii tarah aap yah kyaa ho baithe mil ke baithe bhii threedots  josh pe husn kaa tuufaan nazar aataa hai ishq kii maut kaa samaan nazar aataa hai aur kashtii se kinaare bhii kafaa ho baithe mil ke baithe bhii threedots  o o haay har nazar tiir sahii dekhie ek baar hamen maranaa taqadiir sahii maut se hai pyaar hamen khiinchie yuun naa kamaan tiir kafaa ho baithe mil ke baithe bhii threedots

Lyrics: haan aan aan adaa qaatil nazar barqebalaa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii balaa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii mohabbat karane waalon kii qazaa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii qazaa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii  aa aa  kabhii chilaman uthaa denaa kabhii chilaman giraa denaa  2 kabhii chilaman giraa denaa sitamagar naazaniinon kii adaa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii adaa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii  aa aa  hamen chaahaa to kyuun chaahaa hamen bhuule to kyuun bhuule  2 hamen bhuule to kyuun bhuule 2 haay sazaa ham kyuun na de unakii kataa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii  kataa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii  2  adaa qaatil nazar barqebalaa yuun bhii hai yuun bhii balaa yuun bhii hai aur yuun bhii

Title: na jaa kahiin ab na jaa dil ke sivaa
Lyrics: na jaa kahiin ab na jaa dil ke sivaa hai yahii dil kuuchaa teraa ai mere hamdam mere dost naa jaa kahiin ab na jaa   threedots   aaj saharedil men chalake suuratechiraag jalake jhukii jhukii nigaah kii kaajal se dil pe likhe aa naamevafaa naa jaa kahiin ab na jaa   threedots  aake khuunedil milaake bhar duun in labon ke khaake bujhaa bhujhaa badan teraa kamal kamal khilaa ke khilaa duun rangehinaa naa jaa kahiin ab na jaa   threedots

Title: mujhe mil gaii hai mohabbat kii manzil
Lyrics: mujhe mil gaii hai mohabbat kii manzil koii puuchh le ye mere hamasafar se  2 mujhe mil gaii hai threedots  nazar se nazar kaa badaa faasalaa thaa magar aaj dil ke qariin ho gae ho  tumhen maine dekhaa jo dil kii nazar se merii bhii nazar men hasiin ho gae ho  2 mujhe mil gaii hai threedots  mere haath men yuun teraa haath aayaa ke gulashan men jaise bahaar aa gaii ho  magar haath se yuun khinchaa haath teraa main samajhaa kalii koii sharamaa gaii ho  2 mujhe mil gaii hai threedots  jise sunakar dil kii huii tez dhadakan mujhe aaj aisii kahaanii milii hai  nigaahon se chaahe n nigaahen milii naa mohabbat kii lekin nishaanii milii hai  2 mujhe mil gaii hai threedots

Title: ye kis ne giit chhedaa
Lyrics: suman  ye kis ne giit chhedaa ye kis ne giit chhedaa         dil meraa naache thirak thirak kis ne giit chhedaa mukesh ye kis kii zulf bikharii ye kis kii zulf bikharii         jag saaraa gayaa mahak mahak kis kii zulf bikharii     mukesh chorii chorii haule haule thandii thandii havaa aaye         kaliyon ke mukh chuume bagiyaa ko sulagaaye         daalii daalii jaaye lachak lachak kis kii zulf bikharii suman  ye kis ne giit chhedaa threedots   suman  tum ne hii kiyaa tonaa tumane jaaduu pheraa         anjaanii dagarii pe chalaa dekho man meraa         matavaalaa gayaa bahak bahak kis ne giit chhedaa mukesh ye kis kii zulf bikharii threedots   mukesh ek baazii main ne jiitii ek baazii dil haaraa suman  mere saajan tere kaaran main ne chhodaa jag saaraa         sang tere chalii runak jhunak kis ne giit chhedaa   mukesh ye kis kii zulf bikharii jag saaraa gayaa mahak mahak suman  kis ne giit chhedaa dil meraa naache thirak thirak dono   kis ne giit chhedaa ye kis ne giit chhedaa ye kis ne giit chhedaa

Title: javaan tum ho javaan ham hain
Lyrics: javaan tum ho javaan ham hain ye pyaar tum se ho gayaa hai milan kaa ik pal gazab khudaa kaa jigar men nashtar chubh gayaa hai  ye gamr retii ye paanv naazuk ajii na jaao padenge chhaale merii ummiidon kaa tum ho suuraj tumhaare dam se hain ye ujaale javaan tum ho   threedots  vo thandii laharon men kab hai thandak jo mere siine kii aag men hai vo giit maujon men kab milegaa jo mere saanson ke raag men hai javaan tum ho   threedots  na aage jaao hai gaharaa paanii phir usape sholaa hai ye javaanii tumhare tapate hue badan se lagegeii jal men agan suhaanii javaan tum ho   threedots

Lyrics: khanake kanganaa bindiyaa hanse aaenge sajanaa hamare anganaa khanake kanganaa threedots  aaii main saj ke unake lie jhuume ye jhumakaa jinake lie baaje re bichhuaa kahanaa maane naa khanake kanganaa threedots  sainyaa ne ulataa ghunghataa meraa maine bhii hans ke mukhadaa pheraa jaagatii ankhiyaan dekhen ye sapanaa khanake kanganaa threedots  thaamenge jab vo bainyaa morii daaruungii ankhiyaan kajaraa bharii kahuungii balamaa hamako chhuo naa khanake kanganaa threedots

Lyrics: kitanii akelii  kitanii akelii kitanii tanahaa sii lagii un se milake main aaj 2 kitanii akelii   is tarah khule nainaa aaye wo mere aage 2 jis tarah kisii gaharii niind se koii jaage ab jahaan se duur huun kahiin baithii main alabelii kitanii akelii threedots  kaash wo mere ban ke paas yuun kabhii aate 2 khulate dvaar baanhon ke tan diye se jal jaate pyaar ke binaa hai ye man meraa jaise suunii havelii kitanii akelii threedots

Title: kaanton men rahane vaale kaanton se kyaa
Lyrics: kaanton men rahane vaale kaanton se kyaa darenge 2 hanshans ke aafaton kaa ham saamanaa karenge 2 kaanton men rahane threedots  har haal men kush huun main kuchh bhii nahiin kahanaa hai jis haal men rakhe tuu us haal men rahanaa hai minnat nahiin karenge hamase na tuu ye kahanaa o aasamaan vaale gafalat men tuu na rahanaa tere hii faisale ko manzuur ham karenge kaanton men rahane threedots  thokaren khaakhaa ke ik din kaaq men mil jaaenge par tere zulmositam ham na zubaan par laaenge maranaa to ik din hai darane se faayadaa kyaa shikavaa gilaa kisii ko karane se faayadaa kyaa rakhaa hai soch hamane hansate hue marenge 2 kaanton men rahane threedots

Title: dil hii to hai na sangokiisht dard se bhar naa aaye kyuun
Lyrics: dil hii to hai na sangokiisht dard se bhar naa aaye kyuun royenge ham hazaar baar koii hamen sataaye kyuun royenge ham hazaar baar  dair nahiin haram nahiin aa dair nahiin haram nahiin dar nahiin aastaan nahiin baithe hain rahaguzar par ham koii hamen uthaaye kyuun royenge ham hazaar baar  qaidohayaat aur bandogam asl men donon ek hain maut se pahale aadamii gam se nijaat paaye kyuun  dil hii to hai na sangokiisht dard se bhar naa aaye kyuun royenge ham hazaar baar  aa

Title: ye hasiin ye naazaniin
Lyrics: ye hasiin ye naazaniin 2 ye pyaar ke dushaman hasiin kis qadar maasuum hain 2 aur kis qadar purafan hasiin ye hasiin ye naazaniin 2   bemuravvat inake jalawe bewafaa inakaa jamaal sach to ye hai berukii men inako haasil hai kamaal 2 hamasafar samajho to ban jaayen vahiin rahazan hasiin ye hasiin ye naazaniin  in hasiinon kii galii se jab kisii kaa ho guzar daawatenazzaaraa ban jaatii hai inakii har nazar 2 aur jab dekhe koii to daal de chilaman hasiin ye hasiin ye naazaniin  inake dhoke men ham ahaledil na aayen kis tarah saadaaomaasuum aate hain nazar ye is tarah 2 chaandanii men jis tarah aaye nazar naagan hasiin ye hasiin ye naazaniin

Title: pyaaraa pyaaraa ye samaa hai
Lyrics: pyaaraa pyaaraa ye samaa hai aur suhaanii raat hai aa rahii honthon pe ab dil men chhupii jo baat hai  aaj sapane jagamagaate jhuumataa aakaash hai ek chandaa duur hai aur ek mere paas hai ek mere paas hai pyaar kii puunam khile aur nuur kii barasaat hai  chaandanii kii odh chaadar saarii duniyaa so rahii jaagate ham tum akele dil men halachal ho rahii dil men halachal ho rahii aaj taaron ne sajaayii ruup kii baaraat hai

Title: laakhon hai yahaan dilavaale aur pyaar nahiin milataa
Lyrics: laakhon hai yahaan dila vaale  aur pyaar nahiin milataa aankhon men kisii kii vafaa kaa iqaraar nahiin milataa  mahafil mahafil jaa dekhaa  har dil men samaa kar dekhaa har saaz pe gaa kar dekhaa dil ko kahiin chain naa milaa  2 main to duniyaa men pyaare akelaa hii rahaa laakhon hai yahaan threedots  is dil ko kahaan le jaaen  kuchh aap agar faramaaen to aap ke ham ho jaaen kah do hamen hansake zaraa  2 ajii jo kuchh bhii dil ne tumhaare hai kahaa laakhon hai yahaan threedots

Title: ek shahanshaah ne banavaa ke hasiin taajamahal
Lyrics: ek shahanshaah ne banavaa ke hasin taajamahal saarii duniyaa ko muhabbat kii nishaanii dii hai isake saaye me sadaa pyaar ke charche honge khatm jo ho naa sakegii vo kahaanii dii hai ek shahanshaah ne banavaake threedots  taaj vo shammaa hai ulfat ke sanam khaane kii jisake paravaano me mufalis bhii zaradaar bhii hai sangemaramar me samaae hue khvaabon kii qasam marahale pyaar ke aasaan bhii dushvaar bhii hain dil ko ek josh iraadon ko javaanii dii hai ek shahanshaah ne banavaake threedots  taaj ik zindaa tasavvur hai kisii shaayar kaa isaka afasaanaa hakiikat ke sivaa kuchh bhii nahii isake aagosh me aakar ye gumaan hotaa hai zindagii jaise muhabbat ke sivaa kuchh bhii nahii taaj ne pyaar kii maujon ko ravaanii dii hai ek shahanshaah ne banavaake threedots  ye hasin raat ye mahakii huii puranur fazaa ho ijaazat to ye dil ishq kaa izahaar kare ishq insaan ko insaan banaa detaa hai kisakii himmat hai muhabbat se jo inakaar kare aaj takadir ne ye raat suhaanii dii hai ek shahanshaah ne banavaake threedots

Title: o mere bechain dil ko chain tuune diyaa shukriyaa shukriyaa
Lyrics: o mere bechain dil ko chain tuune diyaa shukriyaa shukriyaa o shukriyaa shukriyaa o teraa ehasaan hai jo pyaar tuune kiyaa shukriyaa shukriyaa threedots  kabhii kvaabon men maine aaaa ke terii niinden churaaiin raaton men kabhii ulajhaayaa kabhii sulajhaayaa terii zulfon ko mulaaqaaton men o merii gustaakiyon ko tuune maaf kiyaa 2 shukriyaa shukriyaa threedots  har vaqt samaaii rahatii thii maayuusii merii nigaahon men main bhatak jaataa main bahak jaataa gir jaataa main in raahon men o mere saathii mujhe tuune thaam liyaa shukriyaa shukriyaa threedots  maujon ne terii hii baat kii taaron ne teraa hii naam liyaa jab gulashan men huaa teraa guzar phuulon ne bhii daaman thaam liyaa 2 o tuune jaanejahaan dil mujhako diyaa shukriyaa shukriyaa threedots

Title: duniyaa men aayaa hai to phuul khilaae jaa
Lyrics: duniyaa men aayaa hai to phuul khilaae jaa aansuu kisii ke le ke kushiyaan lutaae jaa  chhotii sii zindagii terii hans ke guzaar de apanii bigaad ke kisii kii sanvaar de jo ho begaanaa yahaan apanaa banaae jaa aansuu kisii ke threedots  aayaa thaa pyaar se to jaanaa bhii pyaar se karanaa gilaa naaa kabhii jaanebahaar se dil par jo biit rahii hai dil men chhupaae jaa aansuu kisii ke threedots  aaj terii aarazuu ban gaii daastaan phuulon pe aaj hotaa teraa bhii aashiyaan bujh gaii shamaa terii kisii kii jalaae jaa aansuu kisii ke threedots

Title: munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa
Lyrics: munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa ek hansii deke lejaa ye umariyaa 2 munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa  aajaa re chhup jaa mere aanchal kii chhainyyaa tale mukh se tere pahale pahal  anganaa mere diip jale tere binaa suunii phire ye nagariyaa  munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa ek hansii deke lejaa ye umariyaa munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa  aa aa aa  munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa ek hansii deke lejaa ye umariyaa 2 munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa  tere mukh se aanchal bharaa mamataa ko giit milaa patthar pe phuutii kalii  dharatii pe chaand khilaa aaj merii taaron bharii hai dagariyaa munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa ek hansii deke lejaa ye umariyaa munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa  pyaarii sii chhotii sii ye muurat hai man men basii man meraa dole jahaan tuu hai aur terii hansii dam se tere swarg banii merii duniyaa munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa ek hansii deke lejaa ye umariyaa 2 munne mere aa sadaqe tere aa

Title: aaraam hai haraam
Lyrics: aaraam hai haraam tum desh ke konekone men pahunchaa do ye paigaam aaraam hai haraam threedots  dekho pade hain desh men ab tak kitane kaam adhuure milakar haath badhaao tabhii ho sakate hain puure jaao ek ho jaao is desh ko swarg banaao bhaarat kaa ho is duniyaa men sabase uunchaa naam aaraam hai haraam threedots  jaatpaat ke bandhan todo uunchniich ko chhodo nae samay se nae jagat se apanaa naataa jodo badalaa dhang puraanaa hai nayaa zamaanaa hai aisaa karo saveraa jisakii kabhii na aae shaam aaraam hai haraam threedots  kabhii kisii ke aage na jholii phailaanaa chaahe ruukhiisuukhii hii haathon se kamaakar khaanaa yahii hai aan tumhaarii yahii jaan tumhaarii jisamen apanaa sar jhukataa ho karo na aisaa kaam aaraam hai haraam threedots

Title: aa gale lag jaa mere sapane mere apane mere paas aa
Lyrics: aa gale lag jaa mere sapane mere apane mere paas aa 2  aabaad hai tuu merii dhadakanon men merii jaan tujhamen basii hai baadal se jo aas hai mor ko mere dil ko vo tujhase lagii hai ik terii muskaan angadaaii letii huii merii taqadiir jaage ik terii jhalak chalii aae pal men merii manzilen mere aage aa gale lag jaa threedots  man aazamaan tuu mere pyaar ko khel mat yuun merii zindagii se ulfat ke maaron ko kyaa maaranaa jaan de dete hain jo kushii se ye husn jisako mile jaanejaan bedilii usakii janchatii nahiin hai ho ruubaruu chaand se jo hasiin berukii usako sajatii nahiin hai aa gale lag jaa threedots

Title: jaa jaa jaa chhod de o chhaliyaa merii gorii kalaiyaan

Lyrics: mu 	dil men ai jii dil men koii rahataa hai rahataa hai 	kaun hai batalaao sapanaa hai ki apanaa hai 	ai jii dil men koii threedots  la 	dil men ai jii dil men vahii rahataa hai rahataa hai 	jo koii apanaa hai aur jiivan kaa sapanaa hai 	ai jii dil men koii threedots  mu  ye nayan hamase hii magar kyuun begaane se 	faasale badhate hain kyon aur qariib aane se 2 la 	duurii ai jii duurii bas itanii hai itanii hai 	faasalaa chhaayaa kaa apane tan se jitanaa hai mu 	ai jii dil men koii threedots  mu 	laaj to rakh logii adhuurii sii in baaton kii 	tod to naa dogii zanjiir mulaakaaton kii 2 la 	haay rii merii mushqil tum kyaa jaano kyaa jaano 	saamane aanaa bhii ghuunghat men bhii chhipanaa hai mu 	ai jii dil men koii threedots  do 	ai jii dil men koii threedots

Title: main ne dekhaa thaa sapanon men ek chandrahaar
Lyrics: main ne dekhaa thaa sapanon men ik chandrahaar aaj baalam ne pahanaa diyaa ho mujhe ulafat kaa gahanaa diyaa  bandhii bandhii nadiyaa sii bahane lagii ghadii ghadii laharaa ke kahane lagii main to saajan se jaakar miluungii abhii ho na jaauun kahiin pyaar men baawarii main ne dekhaa thaa threedots  khoii khoii jaauun main jaane kahaan milaa mujhe sab kuchh mile do jahaan aaj merii khushii ki to siimaa nahiin aaj mujhako milii hai naii zindagii  main ne dekhaa thaa threedots

Title: mere dushman tuu merii dostii ko tarase
Lyrics: mere dil se sitamgar tuune achchhii dillagii kii hai ki banke dost apane doston se dushmanii kii hai  mere dushman tuu merii dostii ko tarase mujhe gam denevaale tuu khushii ko tarase  tuu phuul bane patajhad kaa tujhape bahaar na aae kabhii merii hii tarah tuu tadape tujhako qaraar na aae kabhii jie tuu is tarah ki zindagii ko tarase  itanaa to asar kar jaaen merii vafaaen o bevafaa ek roz tujhe yaad aaen apanii jafaaen o bevafaa pashemaan hoke roe tuu hansii ko tarase  tere gulashan se ziyaadaa viiraan koii viiraanaa na ho is duniyaa men koii teraa apanaa to kyaa begaanaa na ho kisiikaa pyaar kyaa tuu berukhii ko tarase

Title: akhiyan sang akhiyaan laage aaj
Lyrics: taranaana tana aa aa threedots o o threedots akhiyan sang akhiyaan laage aaj 2 jhuume baar baar mere man men pyaar nit aisa to mausam aaye na akhiyan sang akhiyaan laage aaj akhiyan sang  aa aa threedots ik pyaari chhabi mere man men base din rain mere nainan men hanse nayaa sapanaa milaa koii apana mila phir aise kyon mera man gaaye na akhiyan sang akhiyaan laage aaj akhiyan sang  saa saa dha saa saa nii saa saa dha saa saa nii saa saa  saa nii nii dha ga ma ga ma madhumati pawan ikhalake chalii jaise naar koii sharmake chalii kabhi rukati huii kabhi jhukati huii ab aake ye saavan jaaye na akhiyan sang akhiyaan laage aaj akhiyan sang akhiyaan  ma ma ma ma ga ma ga ma ga ma saa  ma dha ma ma dha nii saa nii saa dha nii saa nii saa dha dha nii saa ga saa ga nii saa ga saa ga nii saa ga ma ma ga ma dha nii saa saa nii saa ga ma ga saa ga saa saa ga saa nii saa nii dha nii dha ma dha ma ma ga ma ga ma ga saa  nii dha nii dha nii dha ma dha nii saa nii dha nii saa  aa aa threedots  akhiyan sang akhiyan sang akhiyan sang akhiyaan laage

Title: meraa yaar banaa hai dulhaa
Lyrics: meraa yaar banaa hai dulhaa aur phuul khile hain dil ke are merii bhii shaadii ho jaaye duaa karo sab mil ke  aaj kii kushiyaan dekh ke meraa dil bhii le angdaaii mere bhii ghar ho dhuum dhadakkaa aur baje shehanaaii main bhii seharaa baandh ke baithuun biich bharii mahafil ke  ai mere maalik mere daataa mere paalanahaaraa yaar ko tuune dulhan de dii rah gayaa main hii kunvaaraa mujh ko bhii merii dulhan de de main bhii hasuun khil khil ke  ai mere maalik rahe hameshaa terii salaamat jodii aaj tere sehare ne bhaiyyaa mujhape qayaamat todii merii bhii aankhon men jaage haay kvaab naii manzil ke  meraa yaar banaa hai dulhaa aur phuul khile hain dil ke are merii bhii shaadii ho jaaye duaa karo sab mil ke

Title: aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe
Lyrics: aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe2 bekudii itanii badhaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe  dostii kyaa hai wafaa kyaa hai muhabbat kyaa hai dil kaa kyaa mol hai ehasaas kii kiimat kyaa hai hamane sab jaan liyaa hai ke haqiiqat kyaa hai aaj bas itanii duaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe  mufalisii dekhii amiirii kii adaa dekh chuke gam kaa maahaul masarrat kii kizaa dekh chuke kaise phiratii hai zamaane kii hawaa dekh chuke shammaa yaadon kii bujhaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe  ishq bechain kyaalon ke siwaa ke kuchh bhii nahiin husn beruuh ujaalon ke siwaa kuchh bhii nahiin zindagii chand sawaalon ke siwaa kuchh bhii nahiin har sawaal aise mitaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe  mit na paaegaa jahaan se kabhii nafarat kaa riwaaj ho na paaegaa kabhii ruuh ke zakmon kaa ilaaj saltanat zulm kudaa waham musiibat hai samaaj2 zahan ko aise sulaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe bekudii itanii badhaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe aaj is darjaa pilaa do ke na kuchh yaad rahe

Title: allaah tero naam iishvar tero naam
Lyrics: allaah tero naam ishvar tero naam sabako sanmati de bhagavaan allaah tero naam   is dharatii kaa ruup naa ujade pyaar kii thandii dhuup naa ujade sabako mile daataa sabako mile sukh kaa varadaan sabako sanmati de bhagavaan allaah tero naam  o saare jag ke rakhavaale nirbal ko bal dene vaale balavaanon ko  balavaano ko de de gyaan sabako sanmati de bhagavaan allaah tero naam  maangon kaa sinduur naa chhuute maan bahanon kii aas naa tuute deh binaa daataa deh binaa bhatake naa praan sabako sanmati de bhagavaan allaah tero naam

Title: ek pyaasaa tujhe  baazii kisii ne pyaar kii jiitii yaa haar dii
Lyrics: ek pyaasaa tujhe maikaanaa die jaataa hai jaatejaate bhii ye nazaraanaa die jaataa hai  baazii kisii ne pyaar kii jiitii yaa haar dii jaise guzar sakii ye shabegam guzaar dii baazii kisii ne threedots  saahil karegaa yaad usii naamuraad ko kashtii kushii se jisane bhanvar men utaar dii baazii kisii ne threedots  chal pade safar ko to mud ke kyaa dekhanaa duniyaa ne usako sadaa baarbaar dii baazii kisii ne threedots

Title: naav chalii naanii kii naav chalii
Lyrics: naav chalii naanii kii naav chalii niinaa ke naanii kii naav chalii lambe safar pe  saamaan ghar se nikaale gaye naanii ke ghar se nikaale gaye idhar se udhar se se nikaale gaye aur naanii kii naav men daale gaye kyaa kyaa daale gaye ek chhadii ek ghadii ek talwaar ek salwaar ek andaa ek dandaa ek jhandaa ek handaa ek jiiwar kaa jaal ek ghode kii naal ek totaa ek bhaaluu ek lahsun ek aalu ek kelaa ek aam ek pakkaa ek kachchaa aur threedots tokarii men ek billii kaa bachchaa myaauun myaauun  phir ek magar ne piichhaa kiyaa naanii kii naav kaa piichhaa kiyaa niinaa ke naanii kii naav kaa piichhaa kiyaa phir kyaa huaa chupake se piichhe se upar se niiche se ek ek saamaan khiinch liyaa ek billii kaa bachchaa ek kelaa ek aam ek pakkaa ek kachchaa ek lahsun ek aalu ek totaa ek bhaaluu ek ghode kii naal ek jiiwar kaa jaal ek jhandaa ek handaa ek andaa ek dandaa ek talwaar ek salwaar ek chhadii ek ghadii magar naanii kyaa kar rahii thii naanii thii bichaarii buddhii baharii naanii kii niind thii itanii gaharii itanii gaharii kittii gaharii natakhat thaharii din dopaharii raat kii raanii thandaa paanii garam masaalaa pet men daalaa saade solaa  pachattar chhakke nabbe  gale men rassaa aa aa threedots

Title: ai husn zaraa jaag tujhe ishq jagaaye
Lyrics: ai husn zaraa jaag tujhe ishk jagaaye badale merii takadir jo tu hosh men aaye  2  ye pyaara ke nagame ye muhabbat ke taraane tujhako bade aramaan se laayaa huun sunaane ummid mere dil kii kahiin tut na jaaye ye husn threedots  saazedile khaamosh men ek soj jagaa de tu bhii merii avaaz men avaaz milaa de aayaa huun tere dar pe badii aas lagaaye ye husn threedots  ai shammaa tu aajaa zaraa chilamanase nikalake hasarat hai ki rahaa jaauun terii aag men jalake paravaanaa vo kyaa tujhape jo mitakar naa dikhaa de ye husn threedots

Title: na jaane kyuun hamaare dil ko tumane dil nahiin samajhaa
Film: mohabbat zindagi hai love is life
Lyrics: na jaane kyuun hamaare dil ko tumane dil nahiin samajhaa na jaane kyuun  ye shiishaa tod daalaa   2 pyaar ke qaabil nahiin samajhaa na jaane kyuun   hamaaraa pyaar dekho aur hamaaraa hausalaa dekho   2 muhabbat kaa junuun hamako kahaan tak le chalaa dekho  tumhiin ne jaan le lii   2 aur tumhen kaatil nahiin samajhaa na jaane kyuun threedots  tadap dii bhii to aisii dii ke mushkil ho gayaa jiinaa chalaaye tiir wo tumane ke chhalanii ho gayaa siinaa  aur usapar ye sitam hai   2 ke hamen ghaayal nahiin samajhaa na jaane kyuun threedots   muhabbat kaa ye jaaduu ek din sar chadh ke bolegaa   2 har ik aandhii har ik tuufaan ko daaman men le legaa  muhabbat ne kisii bhii   2 kaam ko mushkil nahiin samajhaa na jaane kyuun threedots

Title: vo ham na the vo tum na the vo rahaguzar thii pyaar kii
Lyrics: vo ham na the vo tum na the  2 vo rahaguzar thii pyaar kii lutii jahaan pe bevajah  paalakii bahaar kii  2 vo ham na the threedots   ye khel thaa nasiib kaa  2 na hans sake na ro sake na tuur par pahunch sake na daar par hii so sake kahaanii kisase ye kahen chadhaav kii utaar kii lutii jahaan pe threedots   tumhiin the mere rahanumaa tumhiin the mere hamasafar tumhiin the merii roshanii tumhiin ne mujhako  dii nazar  2  binaa tumhaare zindagii  2 shamaa hai ik mazaar kii lutii jahaan pe threedots   ye kaun saa muqaam hai  2 falak nahiin zamiin nahiin ke shab nahiin sahar nahiin ke gam nahiin kushii nahiin kahaan ye leke aa gaii havaa tere dayaar kii lutii jahaan pe threedots  guzar rahii hai tumape kyaa banaake hamako darbadar ye soch ke udaas huun ye soch kar hai  chashm tar  2  na chot hai ye phuul kii 2 na hai kalish ye kaar kii lutii jahaan pe threedots

Title: khelo naa mere dil se o mere saajanaa
Lyrics: khelo na mere dil se o mere saajanaa o saajanaa 2 khelo na khelo na mere dil se khelo na threedots   muskuraake dekhate to ho mujhe  gam hai kis liye nigaah men  manzil apanii tum alag basaaoge  mujhako chhod doge raah men  pyaar kya dillagii pyaar kya khel hai  khelo na threedots   kyuun nazar milaaii thii lagaav se  hansake dil meraa liyaa thaa kyuun  kyuun mile the zindagii ke mod par  mujhako aasaraa diyaa thaa kyuun  pyaar kya dillagii pyaar kya khel hai  khelo na threedots

Title: ek baat puuchhatii  huun
Lyrics: ek baat puuchhatii huun ai dil jawaab denaa  2 kyon unakii ho gayii huun ai dil jawaab denaa ek baat puuchhatii huun  nadiyaa kii laharen machalake saahil se kyon takaraatii hain saawan kii bijaliyaan tadapakar baadal men kyon laharaatii hain aapas men pyaar hai dil beqaraar hai milake gale kho jaatii hai jaatii hai jaatii hai  ek baat puuchhatii huun ai dil jawaab denaa haan dil jawaab denaa ek baat puuchhatii huun  kisakii lagan men ye shamaa har raat dil ko jalaatii hai chandaa ke pyaar men chakorii kyon apanii jaan ganvaatii hai sholon kii baanhon men raahat kii raahon men marake bhii zindagii paatii hai  paatii hai paatii hai  ek baat puuchhatii huun ai dil jawaab denaa haan dil jawaab denaa ek baat puuchhatii huun  suuraj ko dekh ke kisii kii aankhen ye kyon jhuk jaatii hain paate hii saamane kisii ko saansen ye kyon ruk jaatii hain jis dil men chor ho mastii kaa daur ho aankhen wahiin jhuk jaatii hain jaatii hain jaatii hain  ek baat puuchhatii huun ai dil jawaab denaa kyon unakii ho gayii huun ai dil jawaab denaa ek baat puuchhatii huun

Title: haan main ne bhii pyaar kiyaa pyaar se kab inkaar kiyaa
Lyrics: mu haan main ne bhii pyaar kiyaa     pyaar se kab inkaar kiyaa     bhiigiibhiigii raaten miithiimiithii baaten     aur main ne dil ko nisaar kiyaa     haan main ne bhii pyaar kiyaa su main ne bhii pyaar kiyaa mu pyaar se kab inkaar kyaa su pyaar se kab inkaar kiyaa     bhiigiibhiigii raaten miithiimiithii baaten     aur main ne dil ko nisaar kiyaa mu haan main ne bhii pyaar kiyaa  mu pyaar kiyaa kaliyon ke mahakate angon se     pyaar kiyaa main ne halake gulaabii gaalon se su aahaa haa aahaa haa aa     pyaar kiyaa nargis kii nashiilii aankhon se     pyaar kiyaa badalii kii rangiile diipon se     khulii chaandanii men su ahaa haa     khulii chaandanii men main ne adhikaar kiyaa donon haan main ne bhii pyaar kiyaa  mu thaam liyaa siine se uchhalatii laharon ko     jhuum uthaa baahon men pakad tuufaanon ko su ahaa haa ahaa haa aa mu chuum liyaa bijalii se machalate honthon ko     luut liyaa main ne mast ubharatii bahaaron ko     raat kii dulhan kaa su ahaa haa     raat kii dulhan kaa main ne singaar kiyaa donon  haan main ne bhii pyaar kiyaa threedots

Title: main abhii gair huun mujhako abhii
Lyrics: aa 	main abhii gair huun mujhako abhii apanaa na kaho mu 	haay mar jaaenge mit jaaenge aisaa na kaho aa 	main abhii gair huun threedots  mu 	dil kii dhadakan kii tarah dil men basii rahatii ho 	kvaab ban kar merii palakon pe sajii rahatii ho 	kyaa kahuun tumako agar jaanetamannaa na kahuun aa 	main abhii gair huun threedots  	yuun na dekho ke merii saans rukii jaatii hai 	jo nazar uthatii hai sharamaa ke jhuk jaatii hai 	merii nazaron ko mere dil kaa taqaazaa na kaho mu 	haay mar jaaenge threedots  	raaz kyuun raaz rahe isakii zaruurat kyaa hai 	hamase daaman na chhudaao ye qayaamat kyaa hai 	ham to kahate hain hamen shauq se diivaanaa kaho aa 	main abhii gair huun threedots mu 	haay mar jaaenge threedots

Title: ai dil tujhe ab unase ye kaisii shikaayat hai
Lyrics: ai dil tujhe ab unase ye kaisii shikaayat hai wo saamane baithe hain kaafii ye inaayat hai ai dil tujhe ab unase  mat dekh unhen ai dil is tarah muhabbat se is tarah muhabbat se afasaanaa banaa lenge logon kii to aadat hai ai dil tujhe ab unase  gulashan se judaa hokar phuulon ne ye jaanaa hai phuulon ne ye jaanaa hai is duniyaa men hansane kii kitanii badii qiimat hai ai dil tujhe ab unase  shamaa mere jalane par ik roz pashemaan ho ik roz pashemaan ho parawaane ke siine men is baat kii hasarat hai ai dil tujhe ab unase   taqadiir se jab puuchhaa lutane kaa sabab kyaa hai lutane kaa sabab kyaa hai  2 hans kar kahaa diiwaane diiwaane hans kar kahaa diiwaane ye dil kii sharaarat hai  ai dil tujhe ab unase ye kaisii shikaayat hai wo saamane baithe hain kaafii ye inaayat hai ai dil tujhe ab unase

Title: ik ghar banaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane
Lyrics: dev   chaahe aasamaan tuut pade        chaahe dharatii phuut jaaye        chaahe hastii hi kyon na mit jaaye        phir bhii main threedots nutan phir bhii main  rafii  tere ghar ke saamane        ik ghar banaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane        duniyaa basaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane        ik ghar banaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane  lataa  ghar kaa banaanaa koii aasaan kaam nahiin        duniyaa basaanaa koii aasaan kaam nahiin rafii  dil men vafaayen hon to tuufaan kinaaraa hai        bijalii hamaare liye pyaar kaa ishaaraa hai        tan man lutaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane        duniyaa basaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane        ik ghar banaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane  lataa  kahate hain pyaar jise dariyaa hai aag kaa        yaa phir nashaa hai koii jiivan ke raag kaa rafii  dil men jo pyaar ho to aag bhii phuul hai        sachchii lagan jo ho to parbat bhii dhuul hai        taare sajaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane        duniyaa basaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane        ik ghar banaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane  lataa  kaanton bhare hain lekin chaahat ke raaste        tum kyaa karoge dekhen ulafat ke vaaste rafii  ulafat me taaz chhuute ye bhii tumhen yaad hoga        ulafat me taaz bane ye bhii tumhen yaad hoga        main bhii kuchh banaauungaa lataa   huun rafii  tere ghar ke saamane lataa  dekhen rafii  duniyaa basaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane        ik ghar banaauungaa tere ghar ke saamane

Title: mujhe le chalo aaj phir us galii men
Lyrics: mujhe le chalo aaj phir us galii men jahaan pahalepahale ye dil ladakhadaayaa  vo duniyaa vo merii mohabbat kii duniyaa jahaan se main betaabiyaan leke aayaa mujhe le chalo threedots  jahaan so rahii hai merii zindagaanii jahaan chhod aayaa main apanii javaanii vahaan aaj bhii ek chaukhat tazaa mohabbat ke sajaadon kii hogii nishaanii	2 mujhe le chalo threedots  vo duniyaa jahaan usake naqshekadam hain vahiin merii khushiyaan vahiin mere gam hain main le aauungaa khaak us rahaguzar kii ke us rahaguzaraa kii to zarre sanam hai      2 mujhe le chalo threedots  vahaan ek rangeen chilaman ke piichhe chamakataa huaa usakaa rukasaar hogaa basaa luungaa aankhon men vo roshanii main yuun hii kuchh ilaajedilezaar hogaa     2 mujhe le chalo threedots  mujhe le chalo aaj phir us galii men jahaan pahalepahale ye dil ladakhadaayaa vo duniyaa vo merii mohabbat kii duniyaa jahaan se main betaabiyaan leke aayaa mujhe le chalo threedots

Title: aap ke hasiin ruk pe aaj nayaa nuur hai
Lyrics: aap ke hasiin ruk pe aaj nayaa nuur hai meraa dil machal gayaa to meraa kyaa qusuur hai aap kii nigaah ne kahaa to kuchh zuruur hai meraa dil machal gayaa to meraa kyaa qusuur hai  khulii laton kii chhaanv men khilaakhilaa saa ruup hai ghataa pe jaise chhaa rahii subahsubah kii dhuup hai jidhar nazar mudii udhar suruur hii suruur hai meraa dil threedots  jhukiijhukii nigaah men bhii hain balaa kii shokiyaan dabiidabii hansii men bhii tadap rahii hain bijaliyaan shabaab aap kaa nashe men kud hii chuurchuur hai meraa dil threedots  jahaanjahaan pade kadam vahaan fizaan badal gaii ki jaise sarbasar bahaar aap hii men dhal gaii kisii men ye kashish kahaan jo aap men huzuur hai meraa dil threedots

Title: naaz thaa jisape mere siine men vo dil hii nahiin
Lyrics: naaz thaa jisape mere siine men vo dil hii nahiin ab yah shiishaa kisii tasviir ke qaabil hii nahiin main kahaan jaauun ki merii koii manzil hii nahiin naaz thaa jisape threedots  pher lii mujhase nazar apanon ne begaanon ne meraa ghar luutaa mere ghar ke hii mehamaanon ne jo mujhase pyaar kare aisaa koii dil hii nahiin main kahaan jaauun threedots  do jahaan soch men hain aaj fizaa bhii chup hai kisase fariyaad karuun ab to kudaa bhii chup hai main vo afasaanaa huun jo sunane ke qaabil hii nahiin main kahaan jaauun threedots mu 	naaz thaa jisape mere siine men vo dil hii nahiin 	ab yah shiishaa kisii tasviir ke qaabil hii nahiin 	main kahaan jaauun ki merii koii manzil hii nahiin 	naaz thaa jisape threedots  	dil bahal jaae kyaalaat kaa ruk mod sakuun 	main jahaan baith ke har ahadevafaa tod sakuun 	merii taqadiir men aisii koii mahafil hii nahiin 	main kahaan jaauun threedots  uu 	mujhako barabaad kiyaa dil kii meharabaanii ne 	mujhako maaraa hai mere pyaar kii naadaanii ne 	kisako ilzaam duun meraa koii qaatil hii nahiin 	main kahaan jaauun threedots

Title: saavan kii raaton men aisaa bhii hotaa hai
Lyrics: bolaa huaa ta saavan kii raaton men aisaa bhii hotaa hai ta raahii koii bhuulaa huaa ta tuufaanon men khoyaa huaa ta raah pe aa jaataa hai ta aisaa bhii hotaa hai  tarannum men la saavan kii raaton men aisaa bhii hotaa hai la saavan kii raaton men la raahii koii bhuulaa huaa la tuufaanon men khoyaa huaa la raah pe aa jaataa hai la saavan kii raaton men aisaa bhii hotaa hai la saavan kii raaton men  bolaa huaa ta terii nazar se ise dekh luun main ta dil se mere tum ye mahasuus kar lo  tarannum men la terii nazar se ise dekh luun main la dil se mere tum ye mahasuus kar lo ta tuufaan ye mere dil se uthaa hai ta chaaho to tum apane daaman men bhar lo la tuufaanon men khoyaa huaa ye raastaa hai la saavan kii raaton men aisaa bhii hotaa hai la saavan kii raaton men  la haaraa huaa thaa andheron ka raahii la manzil se pahale hii niind aa rahii thii ta tum nuur lekar chale aae varanaa ta mere charaagon se lau jaa rahii thii la tere lie jiite hain ham dil jaanataa hai  do saavan kii raaton men aisaa bhii hotaa hai do saavan kii raaton men do raahii koii bhulaa huaa  do tuufaanon men khoyaa huaa do raah pe aa jaataa hai do saavan kii raaton men aisaa bhii hotaa hai do saavan kii raaton men

Title: mere do nainaa matawaare kis ke liye
Lyrics: mere do nainaa matawaare kis ke liye bechain hain chaand sitaare kis ke liye bhiigii hai raat mere dil ke saath barasaa ho pyaar jaise hoa mere do nainaa matawaare kis ke liye bechain hain chaand sitaare kis ke liye  hoa rang laaii hai ajab ye 2 shok dhadakan pyaar kii hai vahii duniyaa magar 2 har baat lagatii hai naii hoa dhadakataa dil meraa machalatii har adaa dhadakataa dil meraa ye dekhe nain jalave aaj pahalii baar ulfat ke  hoa mere do nainaa matawaare kis ke liye bechain hain chaand sitaare kis ke liye  hoa pyaar kii nazaren inaayat 2 jab se ham par ho gaiin kushanumaa kwaabon men hansakar 2 zindagii yuun kho gaii hoa jawaan har kwaab hai ye jii betaab hai jawaan har kwaab hai diiwaanaa kar na denge  do ishaare ye muhabbat ke  hoa mere do nainaa matawaare kis ke liye bechain hain chaand sitaare kis ke liye

Title: kisii meharabaan kii nazar dhuundhate hain
Lyrics: kisii meharabaan kii nazar dhuundhate hain jo dede sahaaraa vo dar dhuundhate hain kisii meharabaan kii threedots  tumhaarii galii men sadaa hamane dii hai tumhen zindagii kii duaa hamane dii hai duaaon kaa apanii asar dhuundhate hain kisii meharabaan kii threedots  nasiibon ke gulashan men khilatii hain kushiyaan kahiin dhuundhane se bhii milatii hain kushiyaan magar ham to hain bekabar dhuundhate hain kisii meharabaan kii threedots

Title: bhiigii chaandanii chhaaii bekhuudii aa jaa daal de baahon men
Lyrics: bhiigii chaandanii chhaayii bekhudii  aa jaa daal de baahon men apanii baahen   1 zulfon kaa ye andheraa mukhade kaa ye saveraa  tere hii vaaste hai baahon ka narm gheraa  meraa aramaan tuu hai dil kaa tuufaan tuu hai mere sanam bhiigii threedots  2 dil ke kariib aa jaa mere nasiib aa jaa  aa meri jaan hai tuu saanson men tuu samaa jaa  honthon pe naam teraa ulfat hai kaam meraa terii kasam bhiigii threedots

Title: ye kaisii ajab daastaan ho gayii hai
Lyrics: ye kaisii ajab daastaan ho gaii hai chhupaate chhupaate bayaan ho gaii hai  2 ye kaisii  ye dil kaa dhadakanaa ye nazaron kaa jhukanaa jigar men jalan sii ye saanson kaa rukanaa kudaa jaane kyaa daastaan ho gaii hai chhupaate chhupaate bayaan ho gaii hai ye kaisii  bujhaa do bujhaa do bujhaa do sitaaron kii shammen bujhaa do chhupaa do chhupaa do chhupaa do hasiin chaand ko bhii chhupaa do yahaan raushanii mahamaan ho gaii hai aaa  ye kaisii  ilaahii ye tuufaan hai kis balaa kaa ki haathon se chhutaa hai daaman hayaa kaa kudaa kii qasam aaj dil kah rahaa hai  2 ki lut jaauun main naam lekar vafaa kaa tamannaa tadap kar javaan ho gaii hai aaaa  ye kaisii chhupaate chhupaate

Title: ye hai reshamii zulfon kaa andheraa na ghabaraaiye
Lyrics: ye hai reshamii zulfon kaa andheraa na ghabaraaiye   jahaan tak mahak hai mere gesuon kii chale aaiye    2   suniye to zaraa jo haqikat hai kahate hain ham  khulate rukate in rangiin labon kii qasam  jal uthenge diye juganuon kii tarah  2 ye tabassum to faramaaiye laugh ye hai reshami threedots   haay kyaa hansii hai mar gaye ham ajii sunatii ho tum to  kabhii aise nahiin hansatii ho hamaaraa qatl karate vaqt khair  hansatii hogii to bhii hamen kyaa pataa bas ek najar hii hosh  udaa detii hai ki bas   lalaa laa laa lar lar laa  pyaasii hai nazar haan ye bhii kahane kii hai baat kyaa  tum ho mehamaan to na thaharegii ye raat kyaa  raat jaaye rahen aap dil men mere  2 aramaan ban ke rah jaaiye laugh ye hai reshami threedots

Title: rangat terii suuratsii kisii men nahiin nahiin
Lyrics: lataa  rangat terii suuratsii kisii men nahiin nahiin rafii  kushabuu tere badansii kisii men nahiin nahiin    2 lataa  rangat terii suuratsii kisii men nahiin nahiin  lataa  dekhaa thaa jo bahaar kaa sapanaa tuu hii to hai jisakaa thaa intazaar vo apanaa tuu hii to hai  2 rafii  haradam ye sharaaratsii kisii men nahiin nahiin kushabuu tere badansii kisii men nahiin nahiin lataa  rangat terii suuratsii kisii men nahiin nahiin  rafii  yuun to hasiin laakh hain duniyaa kii raah men aataa nahiin hai koii bhii merii nigaah men  2 lataa  tujhamen hai jo agansii kisii men nahiin nahiin rafii  kushabuu tere badansii kisii men nahiin nahiin lataa  rangat terii suuratsii kisii men nahiin nahiin  lataa  tere hasiin kayaal nigaahon pe chhaa gae duniyaa ko chhodakar tere pahaluu men aa gae  2 rafii  hamadam ye muhabbatsii kisii men nahiin nahiin kushabuu tere badansii kisii men nahiin nahiin lataa  rangat terii suuratsii kisii men nahiin nahiin

Title: merii pat raakho giradhaarii main dukhiyaa sharan tihaarii
Lyrics: merii pat raakho giradhaarii main dukhiyaa sharan tihaarii  chhod tumhaaraa dvaar prabhujii kisake dvaare jaauun tum bin meraa kaun sahaaraa kisase aas lagaauun ye bolo krishn muraarii re merii pat raakho threedots  dekho biich bhanvar merii duub rahii hai naiyaa chaaron or hai andheraa koii nahiin khivaiyaa tuufaan uthaa hai bhaarii mujhe shakti ko banavaarii merii pat raakho threedots

Title: o kanhaiyaa  aaj panaghat pe hai terii raadhaa
Lyrics: o kanhaiyaa 2 kanhaiyaa 4 o  kanhaiyaa  3 aaj panaghat pe hai  terii raadhaa akelii khadii  2 o kanhaiyaa threedots  man ye kahataa hai ab naa pukaaruun tujhe pyaar kahataa hai kaise bisaaruun tujhe priit kii riit kaise badal duun bhalaa nain kahate hain haradam nihaaruun tujhe  aa bhii jaa saanvare  2  phir chhed de  2 re vahii baansurii o kanhaiyaa threedots  man ke mandir men maine bithaayaa tujhe apanaa sab kuchh hii maine banaayaa tujhe terii puujaa men main to rahii re magan aur bhagavaan bananaa na aayaa tujhe  aa bhii jaa saanvare  2  phir chhed de  2 re vahii baansurii o kanhaiyaa threedots

Title: aap naaraaz kudaa kair kare naazoandaaz
Lyrics: aap naaraaz kudaa kair kare naazoandaaz kudaa kair kare apanii to jaan pe ban aaii hai aap naaraaz threedots  aakir to koii baat hai tujhamen aaj jo paas chale aae aap naaraaz threedots  aap achchhe lage mujhako huzuur mere dil kaa hai bas yahii qusuur isake lie le liijie merii jaan aur koii sazaa diijie huzuur aap naaraaz threedots  aapake pyaar kaa sahaaraa thaa varanaa duniyaa men kyaa hamaaraa thaa sapanaa vo tuut gayaa kyaa karen lekin bharam vo dil ko pyaaraa thaa aap naaraaz threedots

Title: mat puuchhie dil hai kahaan  ham matavaale naujavaan
Lyrics: mu 	mat puuchhie dil hai kahaan dil kii manzil hai kahaan 	saarii duniyaa kaa gam chale bhuul ke ham matavaale naujavaan 2 ra 	mat puuchhie dil hai threedots  ra 	ujale ujale mukhade tasviir lie mu 	nazaren lie tiir kamaan zulfezanjiir lie ra 	phirate hain yahaan se vahaan dilavaale jaaen kahaan do 	saarii duniyaa kaa gam threedots  ra 	chalate chalate kyon yuun hii guzar jaaen mu 	dil de ke khariidenge jiine kii tamannaaen 	sundar sapanon kii dukaan lagataa hai saaraa jahaan do 	saarii duniyaa kaa gam threedots

Title: lut gayaa mere sapanon kaa deraa
Lyrics: lut gayaa mere sapanon kaa deraa kaisaa insaaf maalik ye teraa 2  phuul khilane na paae the dil ke ho gae ham judaa tumase mil ke kar liyaa gam ne dil men baseraa lut gayaa mere threedots  khel duniyaa ne kaisaa ye khelaa 2 ho gayaa aaj saathii akelaa lut gayaa mere threedots  jhuk gayaa pyaar daulat ke aage pad gae kachche ulfat ke dhaage aur tadapataa rahaa pyaar meraa lut gayaa mere threedots

Title: ankhiyon kaa nuur hai tuu ankhiyon se duur hai tuu
Lyrics: ankhiyon kaa nuur hai tuu ankhiyon se duur hai tuu phir bhii pukaare chale jaaenge tuu aae na aae phir bhii pukaare threedots  dil men payaam teraa lab pe hai naam teraa ho ke divaane tere pyaar men lo aae jii aae ho ke divaane threedots  o mere hamaraaz kahaan hai mujhako de aavaaz kahaan hai pyaar kii aankhon se tum dekho ishq vahiin hai pyaar jahaan hai chhup chhup ke aane vaale dil ko jalaane vaale chupake se aajaa mere saamane tuu aajaa re aajaa chupake se aajaa mere saamane ankhiyon kaa nuur threedots  isalie aayaa huun main chhup ke dekh ke hamako duniyaa jale naa pyaar kii mahafil kitanii anokhii nuur hai lekin diip jale naa yaadon ke daag le ke dil ke charaag le ke kabase khadaa huun tere saamane tuu maane na maane kabase khadaa huun tere saamane ankhiyon kaa nuur threedots

Title: ajii ham dillii ke daade hain
Lyrics: mu 	ajii ham dillii ke daade hain ma 	daade kyaa paradaade hain do 	buron ke haq men tedhe hain bhalon ke haq men saade hain 	ham dillii ke daade hain threedots  mu 	shahar kii chaudii sadakon par ham siinaa taan ke chalate hain ma 	dhandaulat vaale bhadabhuuje hamako dekh ke jalate hain do 	ajii unake aur iraade hain apane aur iraade hain 	are ham dillii ke daade hain threedots  mu 	jaamaa maszid kii siidhii par baith kar khichadaa khaate hain 	laal qile ke agalepichhale sab qisse doharaate hain do 	ajii yuun lagataa hai jaise ham laavaaris shahazaade hain 	are ham dillii ke daade hain threedots  mu 	do din apanaa baind bajaa kar gaii huquumat goron kii ma 	lekin ab bhii dhauns hai baakii chormunaafaakoron kii 	dekhen kab tak puure hon jo sarakaar ke vaade hain do 	dillii ke daade hain threedots

Title: nigaahen milaane ko jii chaahataa hai
Lyrics: aa a a raaz kii baat hai mahafil men kahen yaa na kahen bas gayaa hai koii is dil men kahen yaa na kahen kahen yaa na kahen  nigaahen milaane ko jii chaahataa hai dilojaan lutaane ko jii chaahataa hai  vo tohamat jise ishq kahatii hai duniyaa vo tohamat uthaane ko jii chaahataa hai  kisii ke manaane men lazzat vo paaii  ki phir ruuth jaane ko jii chaahataa hai meraa ruuth jaane ko jii chaahataa hai  vo jalavaa jo ojhal bhii hai saamane bhii vo jalavaa churaane ko jii chaahataa hai  o jis ghadii merii nigaahon ko terii diid huii vo ghadii mere lie aish kii tamahiid huii jab kabhii mainne teraa chaandsaa cheharaa dekhaa iid ho yaa ki na ho mere lie iid huii vo jalavaa jo ojhal bhii hai saamane bhii vo jalavaa churaane ko jii chaahataa hai  nii re ga ga re ga nii re ma ma ga ma nii re ga ga re ga nii ga re re ga ga ma ma dha nii saa saa nii nii dha dha pa pa ga re saa nii dha pa ma ga re nii dha pa ma ga re saa nii nii re ga  mulaaqaat kaa koii paigaam diije ki chhupchhupke aane ko jii chaahataa hai aur aake na jaane ko jii chaahataa hai aur aake na jaane ko jii chaahataa hai nigaahen milaane ko jii chaahataa hai

Title: ham jii lenge bin tumhaare  kyuunki tum merii zindagii ho
Lyrics: mu 	ham jii lenge bin tumhaare tum phir ye kabhii na kahanaa 	merii jaan kyuunki tum merii zindagii ho 	tum merii merii zindagii ho la 	tum jaao kahiin bhii pyaare mere dil ke qariib rahanaa 	sajanaa kyuunki tum merii zindagii ho 	tum merii merii zindagii ho  mu 	aatii bahaaren na gul kabhii khilate 	tum zindagii men jo hamase na milate la 	yuun mere dil men tum aae ho machal ke 	ulajhaa de aanchal havaa jaise chal ke mu 	laten hil rahii hain kuchh aise tumhaarii 	abhii hai tasallii abhii beqaraarii la 	mere paas aao ye naazuk ghadii hai 	koii shai mere dil ke piichhe padii hai 	mere aramaan mere sahaare mere dil ke qariib rahanaa 	sajanaa kyuunki tum merii threedots mu 		tum merii merii zindagii ho  la 	duniyaa hai qaatil pakad lo ye baanhen 	roke khadii hain muhabbat kii raahen mu 	jo terii dhun men nikal pade ghar se 	vo kyaa rukenge zamaane ke dar se la 	yahaan ishq ko qatl hote hii dekhaa 	sadaa husn ko chhupakar rote hii dekhaa mu 	hamen tumane chaahaa to kaise mitenge 	nazar daal dogii to ham jii uthenge 	mar jaaenge gam ke maare tum phir ye kabhii na kahanaa 	merii jaan kyuunki tum merii zindagii ho threedots la 	tum merii merii zindagii ho do 	tum merii merii zindagii ho 2

Title: apanaa gam bhuul gaye terii jafaa bhuul gaye
Lyrics: apanaa gam bhuul gaye terii jafaa bhuul gaye ham to har baat muhabbat ke sivaa bhuul gaye  ham akele hii nahiin pyaar ke diivaane sanam aap bhii nazren jhukaane kii adaa bhuul gaye  ab to sochaa hai ki daaman hii tera thaamenge haath jab ham ne uthaaye hain duaa bhuul gaye  shukr samjho yaa ise apanii shikaayat samjho tum ne vo dadr diyaa hai ki davaa bhuul gaye

Title: chal die de ke gam ye na sochaa ke ham
Lyrics: chal die de ke gam ye na sochaa ke ham is jahaan men akele kidhar jaaenge aisii manzil pe chhodaa hai tumane hamen ab sahaaraa na doge to mar jaaenge chal die de ke gam threedots  bijaliyon kaa na dar thaa na aandhii kaa gam kho gae the muhabbat kii duniyaa men ham kyaa kabar thii ki lut jaaegaa aashiyaan kyaa kabar thii ki tinake bikhar jaaenge chal die de ke gam threedots  yaad karake tumhen roenge umr bhar chain aaegaa dil ko na shaamosahar zindagii men rahegii tumhaarii kamii din guzarane ko yuun bhii guzar jaaenge chal die de ke gam threedots

Title: rut alabelii mast samaan saath hasiin har baat javaan
Lyrics: rut alabelii mast samaan saath hasiin har baat javaan havaa kaa aanchal badaa hai chanchal dhiiredhiire gaae man terii qasam  in machalate paaniyon men sun gunagunaate saahilon kii dhun rut hasiin ham javaan haay taubaa naazaniin jo koii hans padii motiyon kii khul gaii ladii laajavaab hai kyaa shabaab haay taubaa reshamii nazar pad gaii jidhar khil gaii duniyaa are rut alabelii mast samaan threedots  ye mahal na dekhe kahiin aasamaan ko chuume zamiin kyaa kyaal hai bemisaal haay taubaa aarazuu lie nigaah men manzilen bulaaen raah men intazaar men beqaraar haay taubaa kvaab to nahiin yah zamiin kahiin kuub hai ye duniyaa are rut alabelii mast samaan threedots

Title: niind nigaahon kii kho jaatii hai mohabbat
Lyrics: niind nigaahon kii kho jaatii hai kyonki javaanii men ho jaatii hai mohabbat 4 aur mohabbat jo ho jaatii hai jaan hii jaatii hai so jaatii hai mohabbat 4  duniyaa se judaaii kii baaten 2 guzarii hain kaii aisii raaten jab chaand sitaare bhii soe rahe ham unake kyaalon men khoe rahe hamako jagaa ke ye so jaatii hai kyonki javaanii men threedots  nazaron se lapakate hain shole 2 jal jaataa hai dil haulehaule ikaraar karo ki inkaar karo chupachaap raho ki izahaar karo baat ye honii hai ho jaatii hai kyonki javaanii men threedots  qasamen naa uthaae zamaanaa 2 kyonki mushkil daaman chhudaanaa har ek qasam dekho tuut gaii ye jo aap hii unase ruuth gaii aap manaane ko lo jaatii hai kyonki javaanii men threedots

Title: o re sanam dil ye kaise bataae
Lyrics: sazaa ye kaisii milii ham ko dil lagaane kii ki ro rahe hain tamannaa thii muskaraane kii  o re sanam dil ye kaise bataae payaar men berii ho gae apane paraae o re sanam dil threedots  sab kuchh lutaa ke ham ne kuchh bhii naa paayaa dil kaa lagaanaa hamen raas na aayaa o re sanam dil threedots  biite dinon kii baaten ham ko rulaaen palakon se taare tuuten daaman pe aayen o re sanam dil threedots

Title: hamase mat puuchho  haay allaaqasam badaa qaatil hai
Lyrics: aa 	hamase mat puuchho ki ham kyaa kar gae 	kis tarah nazaron kaa daaman bhar gae 	koii inakii shokiyaan dekhaa kie 	ham to inakii saadagii par mar gae  ra 	haay allaaqasam badaa qaatil hai meraa yaar 	chinaa chin chin chuu 2 aa 	haath men tiir na talavaar 	chinaa chin chin chuu  ra 	haay ye naaz ke jis naaz pe lailaa mit jaae 	haay ye husn ke jis husn pe duniyaa lut jaae 	dil ise dekhe to mushqil hai ki kaamosh rahe 	meraa jimmaa hai kisii ko bhii agar hosh rahe aa 	haayhaay sadaqe 	hai kuchh aisaa meraa diladaar 	chinaa chin chin chuu ra 	badaa qaatil hai threedots aa 	haath men tiir threedots  	inakii har baat pe nikale na meraa dam kaise 	ye adaaen hon to qurbaan na hon ham kaise 	kabhii is tarah kafaa jaise koii pyaar kare 	kabhii kaamosh ki jaise koii ikaraar kare ra 	aur kabhii ikaraar men inkaar 	chinaa chin chin chuu aa 	badaa qaatil hai threedots ra 	badaa qaatil hai threedots aa 	haath men tiir threedots  ra 	hamane chaahaa thaa ki zaalim ko na chaahenge kabhii 2 	ik sitamagar se yuun na nibhaaenge kabhii 	par karen kyaa ki hamii kafaa ho ke bhuul gae 	jab milii aankh to sab zorojafaa bhuul gae aa 	o qasam kudaa kii kyaa karen aa hii gayaa pyaar 	chinaa chin chin chuu ra 	badaa qaatil hai threedots aa 	haath men tiir threedots ra 	badaa qaatil hai threedots

Title: meraa prem himaalay se uunchaa saagar se gaharaa
Lyrics: meraa prem himaalay se uunchaa saagar se gaharaa pyaar meraa apanaa kah de ik baar mujhe hogaa upakaar teraa meraa prem himaalay se threedots  jab mast pavan ke giiton pe bajatii hai bahaaron kii paayal chanchal nadiyaa kii baanhon men jab ghir aae pyaasaa baadal tab yaad mujhe terii aatii hai kuchh tujhape adhikaar meraa meraa prem himaalay se threedots  nainon men hain amrit ke pyaale tan niilgagan saa nirmal hai vaanii men hai viinaa kii saragam man phuul se bhii teraa komal hai tujhe dekh ke aisaa lagataa hai kitanaa sundar sansaar meraa meraa prem himaalay se threedots

Title: main bevafaa nahiin huun tere pyaar kii qasam
Lyrics: main bevafaa nahiin huun tere pyaar kii qasam ikaraar jo kiyaa hai usii ikaraar kii qasam main bevafaa nahiin threedots  maanaa hamaare pyaar kaa aalam badal gayaa apane hii dil kii aag se kaashaanaa jal gayaa dil phir bhii hai vo hii tere diidaar kii qasam main bevafaa nahiin threedots  ulfat ke phuul gir gae qismat kii dhuul men kushbuu hai tere saans kii har ek phuul men is pyaar ke lute hue gulazaar kii qasam main bevafaa nahiin threedots

Title: ye samaa samaa hai ye pyaar kaa
Lyrics: ye samaan samaan hai ye pyaar kaa kisii ke intazaar kaa dil naa churaa le kahiin meraa mausam bahaar kaa ye samaan   basane lage aankhon men kuchh aise sapane  2 koii bulaae jaise nainon se apane  2 ye samaan samaan hai diidaar kaa kisii ke intazaar kaa   milake khayaalon men hii apane balam se  2 niind ganvaa lii apanii mainne qasam se  2 ye samaan  samaan hai khumaar kaa kisii ke intazaar kaa   main to huun sapanon ke raajaa kii raanii  2 sach ho na jaae ye  jhuuthii kahaanii  2 ye samaan samaan hai iqaraar kaa kisii ke intazaar kaa

Title: sambhal ke baitho  chaand hai taare bhii hain

Lyrics: ye chaand saa roshan cheharaa zulfon kaa rang sunaharaa ye jhiil sii niilii aankhen koi raaz hai inamen gaharaa taariif karuun kyaa usakii jisane tumhen banaayaa  taariif karuun kyaa usakii jisane tumhen banaayaa  threedots  ek chiiz qayaamat sii hai logon se sunaa karate the tumhe dekhake maine maanaa vo thiik kahaa karate the  vo thiik kahaa karate the  hai chaal men terii zaalim kuchh aisii balaa kaa jaaduu sau baar sambhaalaa dil ko par hoke rahaa bekaabuu taariif karuun kyaa usakii jisane tumhen banaayaa  threedots  har subah kiran kii laalii hai rang tere gaalon kaa har shaam kii chaadar kaalii saayaa hai tere baalon kaa saayaa hai tere baalon kaa tuu balakhaatii ek nadiyaa har mauj terii angadaai jo in maujon men duubaa usane hii duniyaa paai taariif karuun kyaa usakii jisane tumhen banaayaa  threedots  main khoj men huun manzil ke aur manzil paas hai mere mukhade se hataa do aanchal ho jaaen duur andhere  ho jaaen duur andhere  maanaa ke ye jalave tere kar denge mujhe diivaanaa jii bhar ke zaraa main dekhuun andaaz teraa mastaanaa taariif karuun kyaa usakii jisane tumhen banaayaa  threedots

Title: main jab bhii akelii hotii huun tum chupake se aa jaate ho
Lyrics: main jab bhii akelii hotii huun tum chupake se aa jaate ho aur jhaank ke merii aankhon men biite din yaad dilaate ho biite din yaad dilaate ho  mastaanaa havaa ke jhonkon se har baar vo parde kaa hilanaa parde ko pakadane kii dhun men do ajanabii haathon kaa milanaa aankhon men dhuaan saa chhaa jaanaa saanson men sitaare se khilanaa biite din yaad dilaate ho biite din yaad dilaate ho  mudmud ke tumhaaraa raste men takanaa vo mujhe jaatejaate aur meraa thithak kar ruk jaanaa chilaman ke qariib aateaate nazaron kaa taras kar rah jaanaa ek aur jhalak paatepaate biite din yaad dilaate ho biite din yaad dilaate ho  baalon ko sukhaane ke kaatir kothe pe vo meraa aa jaanaa aur tumako muqaabil paate hii kuchh sharmaanaa kuchh balakhaanaa hamasaayon ke dar se kataraanaa ghar vaalon ke dar se ghabaraanaa biite din yaad dilaate ho biite din yaad dilaate ho  barasaat ke bhiige mausam men sardii kii thithuratii raaton men paharon vo yuun hii baithe rahanaa haathon ko pakadakar haathon men aur lambii lambii ghadiyon kaa kat jaanaa baaton baaton men biite din yaad dilaate ho biite din yaad dilaate ho  roro ke tumhen kat likhatii huun  roro ke tumhen kat likhatii huun aur kud padhakar ro letii huun haalaat ke tapate tuufaan men jazbaat kii kashtii khetii huun kaise ho kahaan ho kuchh to kaho main tum ko sadaaen detii huun main jab bhii akelii hotii huun  main jab bhii akelii hotii huun tum chupake se aa jaate ho aur jhaank ke merii aankhon men biite din yaad dilaate ho biite din yaad dilaate ho

Title: diivaane kaa naam to puuchho
Lyrics: diivaane kaa naam to puuuchho pyaar se dekho kaam to puuchho are chaahe phir na milanaa chaahe phir na milanaa  gussaa chhodo baat to maano is bande ko apanaa jaano duur se dhokhaa ho sakataa thaa paas huun main ab to pahachaano diivaane kaa naam to puuchho   threedots  hat gayaa aakhir bharam kaa saayaa ab samajhaa main ab yaad aayaa kvaab men tumako aqsar dekhaa aaj mudassim saamane aayaa diivaan kaa naam to puuchho   threedots  ye pairis kii shaam suhaanii pyaar kii nagarii ruup kii raanii chhid ke rahegaa koii afasaanaa ban ke rahegii koii kahaanii diivaane kaa naam to puuchho   threedots

Title: ai dost mere maine duniyaa dekhii hai
Lyrics: ai dost mere maine duniyaa dekhii hai achchhii tarah apanii nazar se dekhii hai yahaan achchhaa buraa kaun hai pahachaananaa mushqil  sach kii puujaa karane vaale hamane bhuukhe marate dekhe jhuuth kaa daaman thaamane vaale hamane maujen karate dekhe phuulon kii sej par so kar jhuuthe ko aaraam naa aae lekin sachche ko pal bhar men kaanton par niind aa jaae ai dost mere threedots  jisakaa man ho saaf  vo girakar  2 bhii uupar aataa hai chaand ko dekho jo ghatghat kar phir bhii aage badh jaataa hai jisakaa taaraa chamakaa sab ne badhakar usakaa saath diyaa girate ko yahaan kisane thaamaa kisane usako haath diyaa apanii to har subah holii apanii to har shaam diivaalii do din kii ye duniyaa saath nahiin hai jaane vaalii ai dost mere threedots

Title: dabe labon se kabhii jo koii
Lyrics: la dabe labon se kabhii jo koii salaam le le 2 aa main aasamaan kii tarah se guunjuun 2 jo naam le le donon dabe labon se kabhii jo koii threedots  la sunii thii kahaanii pariyon se 2 aa bhanvaren milenge kaliyon se aa milenge sunahare shahazaade 2 la ujalii sunaharii pariyon se la ujale ranhg liye khilate ang liye aa niil parii se kam to nahiin huun aaye koii thaamane donon dabe labon se kabhii jo koii threedots  la ajii ishq pe zor nahiin hai ik baat chalii thii gaalib se aa hamen husn pe zor nahiin hai kah do ye hamaarii jaanib se aa socho thaa jo ang khilenge 2 la ho baandhegaa koii gajaron se maanenge sunenge jo kahegaa 2 aa do reshamaii sii nazaron se dil bhii haazir hai jaan bhii haazir hai la dil aur jaan ke qaabil koii aaye zaraa thaamane donon dabe labon se kabhii jo koii threedots

Lyrics: aa  nazar uthaa ki ye rangiin samaan rahe na rahe ta  qariib aa ki ye mausam jawaan rahe na rahe donon  zamaanaa aaj hai kal meharabaan rahe na rahe aa  nazar uthaa ki ye rangiin samaan rahe na rahe  aa  qariib aao to kamabakt dil dhadakataa hai qariib aao qariib aao to kamabakt dil dhadakataa hai qadam qadam pe koii jaise mujhako takataa hai ye raaz tere mere daramiyaan rahe na rahe donon  zamaanaa aaj hai kal meharabaan rahe na rahe aa  nazar uthaa ki ye rangiin samaan rahe na rahe aa aa  ta dilon men rang nigaahon men roshanii bhar le2 zaraa sii der to baanhon men zindagii bhar le2 kise kabar hai ki ham kal yahaan rahen na rahen donon  zamaanaa aaj hai kal meharabaan rahe na rahe ta  qariib aa ki ye mausam jawaan rahe na rahe  aa khile hain phuul dilon ke khulii hawaaon men khile hain phuul khile hain phuul dilon ke khulii hawaaon men basii rahegii ye kushabuu sadaa fizaaon men zamiin rahe na rahe aasamaan rahe na rahe donon  zamaanaa aaj hai kal meharabaan rahe na rahe

Title: baaadab baamulaahizaa hoshiyaar
Lyrics: la tere darabaar men tere sarakaar men la leke aaii huun pyaar ko baaadab baamulaahizaa hoshiyaar la tere darabaar men tere sarakaar men la leke aaii huun pyaar ta rashkeaafataab ho rashkemaahataab ho ta yaa ho rangiin bahaar ko baaadab baamulaahizaa hoshiyaar  la  bewafaa nasiib ho main to bewafaa nahiin la pyaar ke sivaa merii koii bhii kataa nahiin  2 la phir bhii mere vaaste dil men kyaa jagah nahiin la dekhie to pyaar se bhii ek baar ta baaadab baamulaahizaa hoshiyaar  la tere darabaar men tere sarakaar men la leke aaii huun pyaar ko baaadab baamulaahizaa hoshiyaar  ta  tujhase hii ye zindagii tujhase hii nasiib hai ta dil ko kuchh naa chaahie tuu agar qariib hai  2 ta mil sake naa pyaar to baadashaah gariib hai ta dil men aa bhii jaae leke qaraar la baaadab baamulaahizaa hoshiyaar  la tere darabaar men tere sarakaar men la leke aaii huun pyaar ta rashkeaafataab ho rashkemaahataab ho ta yaa ho rangiin bahaar ko baaadab baamulaahizaa hoshiyaar 2

Title: ye parbaton ke daayare ye shaam kaa dhuaan
Lyrics: ye parbaton ke daayare ye shaam kaa dhuaan aise men kyon na chhed den dilon kii daastaan  zaraa sii zulf khol do fizaa men itr ghol do nazar jo baat kah chukii vo baat munh se bol do ki jhuum uthe nigaah men bahaar kaa samaan ye parbaton ke daayare threedots  ye chup bhii ek savaal hai ajiib dil kaa haal hai har ik kayaal kho gayaa bas ab yahii kayaal hai ki faasalaa na kuchh rahe hamaare darmiyaan ye parbaton ke daayare threedots  ye ruup rang ye phaban chamakte chaand saa badan buraa na maano tum agar to chuum luun kiran kiran ki aaj hausalon men hai balaa kii garmiyaan ye parbaton ke daayare threedots

Title: lag jaa gale dilarubaa
Lyrics: aa lag jaa gale dilarubaa kahaan ruuth ke chalii o gulaab kii kalii tere kadamon men dil hai meraa lag jaa gale dilarubaa   threedots  ai sholaa badan ai zoharaa jabiin tum gusse men lagatii ho aur hasiin baithaa huun jigar ko thaame hue mujh pe na gire ye bijalii kahiin kyaa kahane nazaakat ke saamaan hai qayaamat ke main to pahalii nazar men gayaa lag jaa gale dilarubaa   threedots  itaraa ke na chal balakhaa ke na chal aanchal ko havaa men udaa ke na chal ban jaayegaa koii afasaanaa dil ko mere tadapaa ke na chal itanaa na sitam karanaa kuchh nazareqaram karanaa dekhiye dil hai naazuk meraa lag jaa gale dilarubaa   threedots

Title: jo un kii tamannaa hai barabaad ho jaa
Lyrics: jo un kii tamannaa hai barabaad ho jaa  tu ai dil muhabbat kii kismat banaa de  tadap aur tadap kar abhii jaan de de  yuun marate hain mar jaane vale dikhaa de  jo un kii tamannaa hai barabaad ho jaa threedots   na un kaa tabassum tere vaaste hai na tere liye un kii zulfon ke saaye tu beaas phir kyon jiye jaa rahaa hai javani men ye zindagaanii lutaa de  jo un kii tamannaa hai barabaad ho jaa threedots   sitam yaa karam husn vaalon kii marzii yahii soch kar koi shikavaa na karanaa sitamagar salaamat rahe husn teraa yahii us ko mitane se pahale duaa de  jo un kii tamannaa hai barabaad ho jaa threedots

Title: tumhaarii bhii jayjay  na tum haare na ham haare
Lyrics: tumhaarii bhii jayjay hamaarii bhii jayjay na tum haare na ham haare safar saath jitanaa thaa ho hii gayaa na tum haare threedots  yaad ke phuul ko ham to apane dil se rahenge lagaae aur tum bhii hans lenaa jab ye diivaanaa yaad aae milenge jo phir se milaa den sitaare na tum haare threedots  vaqt kahaan rukataa hai to phir tum kaise ruk jaate aakir kisane chaand ko chhuaa hai ham kyon haath badhaate jo us paar ho tum ham is kinaare na tum haare threedots  thaa to bahut kahane ko lekin ab to chup behatar hai ye duniyaa hai ek saraay jiivan ek safar hai rukaa bhii hai koii kisii ke pukaare na tum haare threedots

Title: ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol bhanware
Lyrics: ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol bhanware ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol  aur kahiin jaa ke dol meraa ruup badaa hai anamol ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol re bhanware ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol   kal hii to mainne bachapan ko chhodaa bachapan ko chhodaa kal hii to mainne bachapan ko chhodaa naii  umangon se naataa hai jodaa 2 komal kishorii ko tuu barajorii 2 mat kar daanvaadol  ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol bhanware ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol re bhanware ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol   rahatii huun main sadaa aanchal sambhaale 2 kahiin koii merii naa kushbuu udaa le kushbuu udaa le gun gun karatii taanon men merii 2 pyaar kii bolii naa bol  ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol bhanware ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol  aur kahiin jaa ke dol meraa ruup badaa hai anamol ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol re bhanware ghuunghat kalii kaa na khol

Title: log kahate hain ki tujhase kinaaraa kar len
Lyrics: log kahate hain ki tujhase kinaaraa kar len tum jo kah do to sitam ye bhii gavaaraa kar len log kahate hain threedots  tumane jis haalepareshaan se nikaalaa thaa hamen aasaraa de ke mohabbat kaa sambhaalaa thaa hamen sochate hain ki vahii haal dobaaraa kar len tum jo kah do to threedots  yuun bhii ab tumase mulaaqaat nahiin hone kii mil bhii jaao to koii baat nahiin hone kii aakarii baar bas ab zikr tumhaaraa kar len tum jo kah do to threedots  aakarii baar kyaalon men bulaa len tumako aakarii baar kaleje se lagaa len tumako aur phir apane tadapane kaa nazaaraa kar len tum jo kah do to threedots

Title: mere kvaabon men kayaalon men chhupe
Lyrics: mere kvaabon men kayaalon men chhupe ek din miit mere merii galii aap chale aaenge kabhii to hogii bahaaron kii nazar aaegii aisii lahar aarzuu ke phuul muskuraaenge  main unakii rang bharii yaad lie kho saa gayaa unakaa har zikr meraa ek nayaa giit banaa mere giiton ke machalate hue svar unake aangan men utar unhen mere paas khiinch laaenge  hiran kii ban rahii hai chaal ye madhhosh nazar vo mere paas hain duniyaa kii nahiin mujhako khabar duur duniyaa se zamaane se pare chaand taaron ke tale ham bhii ek aashiyaan banaaenge  yakiin hai mujhako meraa pyaar na ruuthegaa kabhii saazedil kaa koii bhii taar na tuutegaa kabhii dil ke is taar kii jhanakaar ke sang badhatebadhate ye kadam manzilon ko khud hii pahunch jaaenge

Title: ab kyaa misaal duun main tumhaare shabaab kii
Lyrics: ab kyaa misaal duun main tumhaare shabaab kii inasaan ban gaii hai kiran maahataab kii ab kyaa misaal duun   threedots  chehare men ghul gayaa hai hasiin chaandanii kaa nuur aankhon men hai chaman kii javaan raat kaa suruur garadan hai ek jhukii huii daalii gulaab kii ab kyaa misaal duun   threedots  gesuu khule to shaam ke dil se dhuaan uthe chhuule kadam to jhuk ke na phir aasmaan uthe sau baar jhilamilaaye shamaa aafataab kii ab kyaa misaal duun   threedots  diivaarodar kaa rang ye aanchal ye pairahan ghar kaa mere chiraag hai buutaa sa ye badan tasaviir ho tumhiin mere jannat ke kvaab kii ab kyaa misaal duun   threedots

Title: ho raajaa sainyaa aatii huun main bhii
Lyrics: ho raajaa sainyaa aatii huun main bhii ruk jaanaa akele jaanaa naa  chaloge sang to aanchal kii chhaiyaan kar duungii rukoge tum to tanman tumape vaar duungii tumhaarii main piyaa hamase kataraanaa naa ho raajaa sainyaa threedots  na hove aisaa koii gaur se terii or dekhe lagaa ke nehaa koii jaaduugar naa dor phenke burii hai duniyaa raahon men lut jaanaa naa ho raajaa sainyaa threedots  bade naadaan ho apanon se naataa todate ho kalaaii morii bedardii kaahe modate ho pukaare hans ke tumako koii diivaanaa naa ho raajaa sainyaa threedots

Title: taqadiir ke chakkar  gam ho ke sitam tuu kabhii
Lyrics: taqadiir ke chakkar ye ulatapher ye andher banate na lage der bigadate na lage der  gam ho ke sitam tuu kabhii aansuu na bahaanaa jhuk jaaegaa ek din tere qadamon pe zamaanaa  din dhalataa hai shaam aatii hai badhataa hai andheraa phir raat guzar jaatii hai aataa hai saveraa aise hii gam ke baad kushii kaa bhii hai pheraa dukh dard ke aage tuu kabhii sar naa jhukaanaa jhuk jaaegaa ek din threedots  kyuun bhuul gayaa pagale ye mashahuur kahaanii kaanton pe palaa karatii hai phuulon kii javaanii inasaan to kar detaa hai patthar ko bhii paanii himmat se musiibat ke ye din kaatate jaanaa jhuk jaaegaa ek din threedots  afasos na kar dekh ke in haathon kii taabiir ik roz badalakar hii rahegii terii taqadiir taqadiir kaa shiqavaa kabhii honthon pe na laanaa jhuk jaaegaa ek din threedots

Title: jaa re jaa re merii chhod chunariyaa
Lyrics: jaa re jaa re merii chhod chunariyaa  ab main nyaarii jhuuluungii jhuuluungii  jaa re jaa re merii chhod chunariyaa   tere kaaran jhuulaa daalaa nayii  laayii  terii priit ke giit adaa pe koyal sun sharamaayii  ai rii ai rii mujhe laagii nazariyaa  ab main nyaarii jhuuluungii jhuuluungii  jaa re jaa re merii chhod chunariyaa   bhaav kii daalii chaav men aalii prem dor latakaaye  bhaav na jaanaa chaav na jaanaa jhonka de jhatakaii  ai rii rii mujhe ai rii rii mujhe aaii suratiyaa  ab main nyaarii jhuuluungii jhuuluungii  jaa re jaa re merii chhod chunariyaa   tuune aisaa jaaduu daalaa sudh budh bisaraii  tere rang men rang liya baala bandhan kar itaraaii  ai rii rii mai to ai rii rii mai to bhuulii dagariyaa  ab main nyaari jhuuluungii jhuuluungii  jaa re jaa re merii chhod chunariyaa

Title: mujhe jab jab bahaaron  kal chaman thaa aaj ik
Lyrics: mujhe jab jab bahaaron kaa zamaanaa yaad aaegaa kahiin apanaa bhii thaa ik aashiyaanaa yaad aaegaa  kal chaman thaa aaj ik saharaa huaa dekhate hii dekhate ye kyaa huaa kal chaman thaa threedots  mujhako barabaadii kaa koii gam nahiin 2 gam hai barabaadii kaa kyon charchaa huaa kal chaman thaa threedots  ek chhotaa saa thaa meraa aashiyaan 2 aaj tinake se alag tinakaa huaa kal chaman thaa threedots  sochataa huun apane ghar ko dekhakar 2 ho na ho ye hai meraa dekhaa huaa kal chaman thaa threedots  dekhane vaalon ne dekhaa hai dhuaan 2 kisane dekhaa dil meraa jalataa huaa kal chaman thaa threedots

Title: happy birthday to you sunita happy birthday to you
Lyrics: baar baar din yah aaye baar baar dil yah gaaye tuu jiye hazaaron saal yah merii aarazuu hai  beqaraar hoke daaman thaam luun main kisakaa  2 kyaa misaal duun main terii naam luun main kisakaa nahiin nahiin aisaa hasiin koii nahiin hai jis pe yah nazar ruk jaaye bemisaal jo kahalaaye tuu jiye hazaaron saal yah merii aarazuu hai  auron kii tarah kuchh main bhii tohfaa le aataa main terii hasiin mahafil men phuul le ke aataa jinhen kahaa use chaahaa phuulon kii zaruurat jo pahar khud kahalaaye har kalii kaa dil dhadakaaye tuu jiye hazaaron saal yah merii aarazuu hai
