Title: badal jaaye agar maalii  bahaaren phir bhii aayengii
Lyrics: badal jaaye agar maalii chaman hotaa nahiin khaalii bahaaren phir bhii aatii hain bahaaren phir bhii aayengii  badal jaaye agar maalii chaman hotaa nahiin khaalii   thakan kaisii ghutan kaisii chal apanii dhun men diiwaane   2  khilaa le phuul kaanton men sajaa le apane viiraane   2 hawaaen aag bhadakaaen fizaaen zahar barasaaen bahaaren phir bhii aatii hain bahaaren phir bhii aayengii  badal jaaye agar maalii chaman hotaa nahiin khaalii   andhere kyaa ujaale kyaa naa ye apane naa wo apane   2  tere kaam aayenge pyaare tere aramaan tere sapane   2 zamaanaa tujhase ho baraham naa aaye raah par mausam bahaaren phir bhii aatii hain bahaaren phir bhii aayengii  badal jaaye agar maalii chaman hotaa nahiin khaalii

Title: babam babam bam bam laharii
Lyrics: bam babam babam bam bam laharii  2 lahar lahar nadiyaa gaharii jiivan nadiyaa bahatii jaae shaam savere dopaharii babam babam bam threedots  naav chalaa mat mastii men tuufaanon kii bastii men lobh kii maarii duniyaa vaale naag hain terii kashtii men isakaa kaataa paanii na maange duniyaa hai itanii zaharii babam babam bam threedots  nafarat se man kyuun hai bharaa prem se mil insaan zaraa prem ne tujhako janm diyaa hai prem to hai bhagavaan teraa prem kii bhakti kar le phir tuu ban dehaatii yaa shaharii babam babam bam threedots  jag kii baaten duur ke dhol kaan tere kachche mat khol bas men tere koii baat nahiin hai tuu kyaa bolegaa mat bol ho teraa kalyaan banaa le aatmaa guungii baharii babam babam bam threedots

Title: badhaaii ho badhaaii janamadin kii tumako
Lyrics: badhaaii ho badhaaii janamadin kii tumako janamadin tumhaaraa milenge ladduu hamako badhaaii ho badhaaii janamadin kii tumako  sadaa dil lagaa ke tuu mehanat se padhanaa mehanat se padhanaa padhaaii men aage se aage hii badhanaa aage hii badhanaa achchhaa jii bataao mainne aisaa kyuun kahaa jo tum paas hoge milenge ladduu hamako badhaaii ho badhaaii janamadin kii tumako  bade ho ke laanaa hamaarii tuu bhaabhii hamaarii tuu bhaabhii ke jisakii ho rangat gulaabiigulaabii gulaabiigulaabii achchhaa jii bataao mainne aisaa kyuun kahaa tumhaarii hogii shaadii milenge ladduu hamako badhaaii ho badhaaii janamadin kii tumako  budhaape men honge idhar baal pakke idhar baal pakke udhar honge ghar men jii bachchon ke bachche jii bachchon ke bachche achchhaa jii bataao mainne aisaa kyuun kahaa tumhaare hogaa potaa milenge ladduu hamako badhaaii ho badhaaii janamadin kii tumako

Title: vo bhuulii daastaan lo phir yaad aa gayii
Lyrics: vo bhuulii daastaan lo phir yaad aa gaii  2 nazar ke saamane ghataa sii chhaa gayii  2 vo bhuulii daastaan lo phir yaad aa gayii  kahaan se phir chale aaye vo kuchh bhatake hue saaye vo kuchh bhuule hue nagame jo mere pyaar ne gaaye vo kuchh bikharii huii yaaden vo kuchh tuute hue nagame paraaye ho gaye to kyaa kabhii ye bhii to the apane na jaane inase kyon milakar nazar sharmaa gayii vo bhuulii threedots  bade rangiin zamaane the taraane hii taraane the magar ab puuchhataa hai dil vo din the yaa fasaane the faqat ik yaad hai baakii bas ik fariyaad hai baakii vo khushiyaan lut gayii lekin dilebarabaad hai baakii kahaan thii zindagii merii kahaan par aa gayii vo bhuulii threedots  ummiidon ke hansii mele tamannaaon ke vo rele nigaahon ne nigaahon se ajab kuchh khel se khele havaa men zulf laharaaii nazar pe bekhudii chhaaii khule the dil ke daravaaze muhabbat bhii chalii aaii tamannaaon kii duniyaa par javaanii chhaa gayii vo bhuulii threedots  vo bhuulii daastaan lo phir yaad aa gayii  2 nazar ke saamane ghataa sii chhaa gayii  2 vo bhuulii daastaan lo phir yaad aa gayii

Title: nuktaachiin hai gamedil usako sunaaye na bane
Lyrics: aa nuktaachiin hai gamedil usako sunaaye na bane kyaa bane baat jahaan baat banaaye na bane nuktaachiin hai gamedil  gair phirataa hai liye yuun tere kat ko ke agar 2 koii puuchhe ke ye kyaa hai to chhupaaye na bane nuktaachiin hai gamedil  main bulaataa to huun usako magar ai jazbaaedil us pe ban jaaye kuchh aisii ki bin aaye na bane nuktaachiin hai gamedil  ishq par zor nahiin hai ye vo aatish gaalib 2 ke lagaaye na lage aur bujhaaye na bane nuktaachiin hai gamedil usako sunaaye na bane nuktaachiin hai gamedil

Lyrics: ra 	tuu shok kalii main mast pavan tuu shammaevafaa main paravaanaa 	gulashangulashan mahafilmahafil teraa meraa afasaanaa  aa 	merii pahalii pyaas hai tuu aas hai tuu vishvaas hai tuu 	jabase dil ne dhadakanaa siikhaa tabase dil ke paas hai tuu 	tan bhii teraa man bhii teraa le le le le nazaraanaa ra 	tuu shok kalii main threedots  	dil ko dil pahachaan gayaa pyaar kii baaten maan gayaa 	niichii aankhen kyaa kahatii hain main bin bole jaan gayaa 	dhalakedhalake mastii dhalake chhalakechhalake paimaanaa 	tuu shok kalii main threedots  aa 	haradam aankhen chaar karen haradam sau ikaraar karen 	nafarat duniyaa se mit jaae ham tum aisaa pyaar karen 	 mahaken machalen  2 haradam zulfen haradam lahake diivaanaa ra 	tuu shok kalii main threedots ra 	hue tum meharabaan phir dil ke taar tharraae 	mere ruuthe hue sab giit sab nagamen palat aae

Title: jabjab tumhen bhulaayaa tum aur yaad aae
Lyrics: jabjab tumhen bhulaayaa tum aur yaad aae  jabjab tumhen bhulaayaa haan tum aur yaad aae tum aur yaad aae  2 jaate nahiin hain dil se ab tak tumhaare saae 2 jaate nahiin hain dil se haan ab tak tumhaare saae jabjab tumhen bhulaayaa threedots  tumase bichhad ke hamane dil ko bahut sambhaalaa 4 dil ko bahut sambhaalaa gulashan men ye na bahalaa aa gulashan men ye na bahalaa saharaa men bhii sataae tum aur yaad aae jabjab tumhen bhulaayaa threedots  marane kii aarazuu men ham jii rahe hain aise 2 marane kii aarazuu men ho ham jii rahe hain aise 2 ham jii rahe hain aise jaise kii laash apanii khud hii koii uthaae tum aur yaad aae jabjab tumhen bhulaayaa threedots

Title: saavan ke raat men aisaa bhii hotaa hai
Lyrics: saavan ke raat men aisaa bhii hotaa hai  raahii koii bhulaa huaa tuufaanon men khoyaa huaa  raah men aa jaataa hai   1 terii najar se ise dekh  dil se mere tum ye mahasuus kar lo  tuufaan ye mere dil se uthaa hai  chaaho to tum apane daaman men bhar lo  tuufaanon men khoyaa threedots  2 haaraa huaa thaa andhere ko raahii  manzil se pahale  aa rahii thii  tum dur lekar chali aaii  mere charaagon se lau jaa rahii thi  tere liye  hain ham dil jaanataa hai  tuufaanon men threedots
